bible.status: Moore New Testament © Bible Society of Burkina Faso, 1997

chapter.verse: A Abraham yageng a David yageng a Zezi Kirist roog la a woto.
A Abraham n dog a Izak, t'a Izak dog a Zakob, t'a Zakob dog a Zuda ne a ba-biisi,
t'a Zuda ne pag a Tamaar dog a Farɛs ne a Zaara, t'a Farɛs dog a Hesrom, t'a Hesrom dog a Aram,
t'a Aram dog a Aminadab, t'a Aminadab dog a Naasõ, t'a Naasõ dog a Salmo,
t'a Salmo ne a pag a Rahaab dog a Booz, t'a Booz ne a pag a Rut dog a Obɛɛd,
t'a Obɛɛd dog a Izayi, t'a Izayi dog a David. Rĩm a David ne a Uri pagã doga a Salomo,
la a Salomo doga a Roboam, t'a Roboam dog a Abiya, t'a Abiya dog a Aza,
t'a Aza dog a Zozafat, t'a Zozafat dog a Zoram, t'a Zoram dog a Oziyas,
t'a Oziyas dog a Zoatam, t'a Zoatam dog a Akaaz, t'a Akaaz dog a Ezekiyas,
t'a Ezekiyas dog a Manase, t'a Manase dog a Amo, t'a Amo dog a Zozɩyas,
t'a Zozɩyas dog a Zekonyas ne a ba-biisi. Zemsa wakat ning b sẽn yõg Israyɛll nebã n kẽng Babilonnã.
La bãmb sẽn ta Babilon, a Zekonyas yaool n doga a Salatyɛl, t'a Salatyɛl dog a Zorobabɛlle,
t'a Zorobabɛll dog a Abiyuud, t'a Abiyuud dog a Eliyakim,
t'a Eliyakim dog a Azaoor, t'a Azaoor dog a Sadok, t'a Sadok dog a Akim,
t'a Akim dog a Eliyuud, t'a Eliyuud dog a Eleyazaar, t'a Eleyazaar dog a Mata, t'a Mata dog a Zakob,
t'a Zakob dog a Zozɛf sẽn ya a Maari sɩda, Maari ning sẽn dog a Zezi b sẽn boond tɩ Kiristã.

Woto, sẽn sɩng ne a Abraham tɩ ta a David, yaa zamaan piig la a naase. La sẽn sɩng ne a David tɩ ta b sẽn na n yõg Israyɛll nebã n kẽng Babilonnã, yaa zamaan piig la a naase. La sẽn sɩng ne b sẽn yõg bãmb n kẽng Babilonnã tɩ ta Kiristã, yaa zamaan piig la a naase.
Ad a Zezi Kirist dogem sẽn yɩ to-to: B rag n dɩka bãmb ma a Maari n kõ a Zozɛf, la sẽn deng b sẽn na n vɩɩmd ne taaba, b mikame t'a Maari tʋtame, la yaa Sɩɩg-sõng n kɩt t'a yɩ a woto.
La a sɩd a Zozɛf sẽn ya nin-tɩrga, n ka rat n ning-a yãnd neb nifẽ yĩnga, a tagsame n dat n soos n bas-a.

Wakat ning a Zozɛf sẽn tagsd a woto, Zu-soabã malɛk puka a meng ne yẽnda zãmsd pʋgẽ n yeele: Zozɛf, a David yagenga, da zoe dabeem tɩ peeg f pag a Maari ye, bala pʋgã a sẽn tarã yita Sɩɩg-sõng nengẽ.
Yẽ na n doga bi-ribla, la fo na n pʋda a yʋʋr t'a Zezi. Yaa bãmb n na n yols b nebã ne yel-wẽnã.
Bõn-kãens fãa maaname tɩ Zu-soabã sẽn dag n gom ne b no-rɛɛsã noorã paam pidsgu:
Ade, pa-kuil na n dɩka pʋga, n dog bi-ribla, la b na n pʋda a yʋʋr tɩ Emanuwɛlle, sẽn dat n togs tɩ Wẽnd be ne-do.
A Zozɛf sẽn neke, yẽ maana wa Zu-soabã malɛkã sẽn yeel yẽ wã, la a peega a pagã.
La yẽ ka bãng-a hal t'a rog bi-riblã, t'a pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Zezi.
A Zezi sẽn dog Zude Betlehɛm, rĩm a Herood zamaanẽ, gese, yam dãmb yii yaang n wa Zeruzalɛm n soke:
Zuif-rãmba rĩmã sẽn nan dogã bee yɛ? Bala tõnd yãa bãmb ãdg yaanga, la tõnd waame n na n waoog bãmba.
Rĩm a Herood sẽn wʋm dẽnda, yẽ ne Zeruzalɛm dãmbã fãa maana yɩɩre.
Herood tigma tẽngã maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba fãa ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã n sok-b Kirist sẽn da tog n dog tẽng ninga.
Bãmb yeela yẽnda tɩ yaa Zude Betlehɛm, bala Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã dag n gʋlsame n yeel a woto:
"Foo Betlehɛm, Zuda tẽnga, yaa vẽeneg tɩ fo ka poorẽ Zuda tẽn-kãsemsã sʋk ye. Tɩ bõe, naab n na n yi fo pʋgẽ n dɩlg Israyɛll sẽn ya mam nebã."
La Herood soosame n bool yam dãmbã n sok-b neere n bãng ãdgã sẽn puk wakat ninga.
Yẽ tʋma bãmb Betlehɛm n yeel-ba: Kẽng-y n tɩ bao-y n bãng-y biigã yell neere, la y sã n yãnd-a, bɩ y lebg n wa n togs-ma, tɩ mam me tõe n kẽng n tɩ waoog-a.
Bãmb sẽn kelg rĩmã goam n sɛ, b loogame. La haya, ãdg ning bãmb sẽn dag n yã yaangã kẽnga bãmb taoore, hal tɩ ta zĩig ning bi-bilfã sẽn be wã, la a yalsame.
Bãmb sẽn yã ãdgã, b paama sũ-no-kãsenga.

Bãmb kẽe roogẽ wã, la b yãa biigã ne a ma a Maari, la bãmb wõgemdame n waoog biigã. Dẽ poore, bãmb logsa b kordo, n yãgs kũun n kõ Bãmba: yaa sãnem la wisdu, la miir sẽn tar yũ-noogo.
La Wẽnnaam sẽn sagl bãmb zãmsd pʋgẽ tɩ b ra leb n tũ Herood nengẽ, bãmb dɩka sor a to n kuili.

Bãmb sẽn looge, Zu-soabã malɛk puka a meng ne a Zozɛf zãmsd pʋgẽ n yeel-a: Yik n dɩk biigã ne a ma n zoe n kẽng Ezipte. Zĩnd be hal tɩ mam leb n wa n gom ne foom. Tɩ bõe, Herood na n baoo biigã, sẽn na yɩl n kʋ-a.
A Zozɛf yikame n dɩk biigã ne a ma ne yʋngo n kẽng Ezipt.
La yẽ zĩnda be hal tɩ ta Herood kũum, tɩ bũmb ning Zu-soabã sẽn dag n gom ne b no-rɛɛsã noorã paam pidsgu. Bãmb yeelame: Mam boola m biigã t'a yi Ezipte.

La Herood sẽn mik tɩ yam dãmbã belga yẽnda, a sũurã puuga hal wʋsgo, t'a tʋm neb Betlehɛm ne a tẽn-kɩremsã tɩ b tɩ kʋ kom-dibli fãa sẽn zems yʋʋm a yiibu la sẽn ka ta woto me, sẽn zems yẽ sẽn dag n sok yam dãmbã n bãng ãdgã sẽn puk wakatã.
Woto, Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Zeremi sẽn dag n togsã paama pidsgu. A yeelame:
Koɛɛg n zẽk Rama, yãbr la wiis-kãsemse. Yaa a Rasɛll n yãbd a kamba, la a ka sakd belsg ye, a kambã sẽn ka be wã yĩnga.
La Herood sẽn ki, Zu-soabã malɛk puka a meng ne a Zozɛf zãmsd pʋgẽ Ezipt tẽng n yeel-a:
Yik n dɩk biigã ne a ma n leb Israyɛll tẽnga, bala neb nins sẽn dag n baood biigã n na n kʋ wã kiime.
La a Zozɛf yik n dɩka biigã ne a ma n leb Israyɛll tẽnga.
La yẽ sẽn wʋm t'a Arkelawus reega a ba zĩig n dɩt naam Zude, yẽ zoee rabeem n ka kẽng be ye. La Wẽnnaam sẽn sagl yẽ zãmsd pʋgẽ yĩnga, a kẽnga Galile soolmẽ,
la a tɩ zĩnda tẽng sẽn boond tɩ Nazarɛt tɩ bũmb ning Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn dag n togsã paam pidsgu. B ra yeelame tɩ b na n boola a Zezi tɩ Nazarɛt neda.
Wakat kãnga, a Zãmbatiis waa n moonda koe-noog Zude we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ wã n yetẽ:
Tek-y yam n kos sugr tɩ arzãn soolem kolgame.
Yaa a Zã yell la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi dag n gom n yeele: Ned a yembr koɛɛg n kelemd we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ n yetẽ: Segl-y Zu-soabã sore. Rems-y bãmb so-bugs tɩ yɩ tɩrse.
A Zã futã ra wʋga ne yʋgemd kõbdo, la a dag n sẽbda a sɛɛg ne gãong sẽbdga. A rɩɩb dag n yaa sʋɩy la weoog sɩɩdo.
Zeruzalɛm dãmba ne Zude fãa nebã la tẽns fãa sẽn pẽ Zʋrdẽ wã neb kẽnga yẽ nengẽ.
La bãmb vẽnegame n togs b yel-wẽna, tɩ yẽ lis bãmb Zʋrdẽ koomã pʋgẽ.
La a Zã sẽn yã Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne Saduusẽ-dãmbã wʋsg sẽn wat lisgã, a yeel-b lame yaa: Wag-toos buudu, ãnna n wilg yãmb tɩ y zoe sũ-puugr sẽn watã?
Sã n yaa a woto, bɩ y wom biis sẽn zems neb sẽn tek yam n kos sugri,
la y ra tags t'a Abraham sẽn ya yãmb ba wã sekame ye. Tɩ bõe, mam yeta yãmb tɩ Wẽnnaam tõe n dɩka kug-kãensã n kɩt tɩ b lebg a Abraham kamba.
Lar zoe n bee tɩɩs yẽgẽ moasã. B na n kɛɛga tɩɩg ning fãa sẽn ka womd bi-sõamy n lob bugmẽ.
Mam yẽ lisda yãmb koomẽ yam tekr yĩnga, la sẽn pʋgend-a maam n watẽ wã yɩɩda maam, tɩ mam pʋs n pa zems tɩ logs bãmb neooda ye. Bãmb na n lisa yãmb Sɩɩg-sõng pʋgẽ la bugum pʋgẽ.
Bãmb zãada b kãorgo. Bãmb na n pɩɩsa b zɛɛga, n wʋk b ki n sui b baoorẽ, la b na n yõoga wudgã ne bugum sẽn ka kiida.
A Zezi yii Galile n wa a Zã nengẽ Zʋrdẽ t'a lis-ba.
La a Zã zãgsame n yeele: Yaa maam n tog n wa yãmb nengẽ tɩ yãmb lis maam, tɩ yãmb wat mam nengẽ?
A Zezi leoka yẽ yaa: Bas tɩ yɩ a woto, bala a zemsame tɩ tõnd pids bũmb nins fãa sẽn ya tɩrse. La a Zã ka kɩɩs bãmb yɛs ye.
A Zezi sẽn paam lisg n sa, b yii koomẽ wã. La gese, yĩngr pakame, la bãmb yãa Wẽnnaam Sɩɩg sẽn wẽnd wall t'a sigd bãmb zugu.
La koɛɛg zĩnda saasẽ n yeele: Ada yaa mam Bi-ribl-nongr sẽn ta mam yam zãnga.
Dẽ, Sɩɩg-sõng talla a Zezi n kẽng we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ tɩ rõatã na n mak bãmba.
La bãmb sẽn loe noor rasem pis-naase, wĩndg ne yʋngo, kom yaool n yõka bãmba.
La makdã kolgame n yeel bãmb yaa: Yãmb sã n yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, bɩ y kɩt tɩ kug-kãensã lebg buri.
A Zezi leokame t'a gʋlsame tɩ ninsaal ka na n vɩ ne rɩɩb bal ye, la yaa ne goam nins fãa sẽn yit Wẽnnaam noorẽ wã.
Rõatã talla bãmb n kẽng Zeruzalɛm, tẽn-sõngẽ wã, n zĩndg bãmb Wẽnd-doogã zug n yeel-b yaa:
Yãmb sã n yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, bɩ y yɩk n tiims tẽnga, tɩ bõe, a gʋlsame tɩ bãmb na n kɩtame tɩ b malegsã gũ yãmba, tɩ b na n zãa yãmb ne b nusi, tɩ y ra wa n lak y naoor ne kugr ye.
A Zezi yeela yẽnda t'a gʋlsame me tɩ f ra mak Zu-soaba fo Wẽnnaamã ye.
Rõatã leb n talla bãmb n kẽng tãn-luglug zugu, n wilg bãmb dũni soolem dãmba fãa la b ziirã n yeel bãmba:
Yãmb sã n wõgemd n waoog maam, mam na n kõo yãmb yõ wã fãa.
A Zezi yeela yẽnda: Kẽng n looge, Sʋtãana! Bala a gʋlsame tɩ f waoog Zu-soabã fo Wẽnnaamã la f sak bãmb b yen bal tãa.
Dẽ, rõatã basa a Zezi, la malegs waame n sõng bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn wʋm tɩ b kẽesa a Zã bi-bees roogo, b loogame n kẽng Galile.
Bãmb yii Nazarɛt n kẽng Kapɛrnawom sẽn be ko-kãsengã noore, Zabulon ne Neftali soolmẽ,
tɩ bũmb ninga Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sẽn dag n togsã pidsi:
Zabulon tẽnga, Neftali tẽnga, sor sẽn dabd ko-kãsengã sẽne n be Zʋrdẽ rʋʋnde, Galile, bu-zẽms sẽn vɩ a pʋgẽ,
neb sẽn zĩ lik pʋgẽ yãa vẽen-kãsenga, la vẽenem puka neb nins sẽn dag n zĩ kũum tẽngẽ la a maasmẽ wã yĩnga.
Wakat kãng tɛka, a Zezi sɩngame n moon n yeele: Tek-y yam n kos sugr tɩ arzãn soolem kolgame.

A Zezi sẽn kẽng Galile ko-kãsengã noore, b yãa raop a yiib sẽn ya ba-biisi, a Sɩmo b sẽn boond t'a Pɩyɛɛr ne a ba-biig a Ãndre, tɩ b lobd zĩm-gãmbr ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ. Bãmb dag n yaa zĩm-yõagdba.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Tũ-y maam la mam na n kɩtame tɩ yãmb yɩ mam nebã baoodba.
Tao-tao bala bãmb basa b zĩm-gãmbã n tũ a Zezi.
Bãmb sẽn kẽng taoor bilfu, b leb n yãa raop a yiib sẽn ya ba-biisi, a Zebde kom-dibli a Zak ne a ba-biig a Zã tɩ b be koom koglgẽ ne b ba a Zebde n tõgd b zĩm-gãmba. La a Zezi bool-b lame.
Tao-tao bala, bãmb basa b koom-koglgã ne b ba n tũ a Zezi.
A Zezi saaga Galile soolmã fãa n zãms nebã karen-dot pʋse, n moon Wẽnnaam soolem koe-noogã, n maag bãad-rãmba la koms-rãmb buud fãa sẽn be neba sʋka.

Bãmb yʋʋr saaga Siiri soolem fãa, la b talla bãad-rãmba ne neb nins fãa yĩns tood buud toay-toay sẽn namsda, zĩn sẽn tar b rãmba, la neb sẽn lʋɩt kisĩnkiiri, la ki-boaga n wa bãmb nengẽ, la a Zezi maaga bãmba.
Neb kʋʋng yii Galile ne Dekapol la Zeruzalɛm ne Zude la tẽns sẽn be Zʋrdẽ rʋʋndã n tũ bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn yã neb kʋʋngã, b rʋʋ tãng zug n zĩndi, la b karen-biisã kolga bãmba.
Dẽ a Zezi sɩngame n zãms bãmb n yeele:
Bark bee sik-m-mens rãmbã zutu, bala arzãn soolem yaa bãmb dẽnda.
Bark bee sũ-sãoong rãmbã zutu, bala b na n paama belsgo.
Bark bee sũ-maasem dãmbã zutu, bala b na n sooga dũniyã.
Bark bee tɩrlem kom la a ko-yũud sẽn tar b rãmbã zutu, bala b na n tɩgame.
Bark bee nimbãan-zoɛtbã zutu, bala Wẽnnaam na n zoee bãmb me nimbãanega.
Bark bee pʋ-peelem dãmbã zutu, bala bãmb na n yãa Wẽnnaam.
Bark bee zab-paasdbã zutu, bala b na n boola bãmb tɩ Wẽnnaam kamba.
Bark bee neb nins sẽn namsd tɩrlma yĩngã zutu, bala arzãn soolem yaa bãmb dẽnda.
Bark bee yãmb zutu, nebã sã n gom yãmb wẽnga la b nams yãmba la b sa n sãam yãmb yʋʋr mam yĩnga.
Maan-y sũ-noog n kɩdme, yãmb keoor sẽn na n yɩ kãseng arzãn pʋgẽ wã yĩnga. Tɩ bõe, b rag n namsa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn deng yãmbã a woto.
Yãmb yaa dũni yamsem. La yamsem noosem sã n yi, ned na n yɩ a wãn t'a le lebg yamsem? A ka le tar yõod ye, a tɛk yaa b lob-a yɩng tɩ nebã tab-a ne nao.
Yãmb yaa dũniyã vẽenem. Tẽng sẽn be tãng zug ka tõe n solg ye.
Ned ka yõgend fɩtɩl n na n fõgen-a ne peoog ye. A na n dogl-a-la fɩtɩl doagendgã zug t'a kõt neba fãa sẽn be roogã pʋgẽ wã vẽenem.
Bɩ yãmb vẽenem yãg a woto me nebã sʋka, tɩ bãmb tõe n yã yãmb tʋʋm sõamyã la b waoog yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã. Zuif-rãmbã kʋdem wẽndẽ fɩtla (5.15)
Da tags-y tɩ mam waame n na n sãam tõogã ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã noy ye. Mam ka wa n na n sãam-b ye, la yaa tɩ pids-ba.
Tɩ bõe, mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ hal tɩ yĩngr la tẽng looge, i ba a ye la kargr ba a yen sẽn be tõogã pʋgẽ kõn loog hal tɩ fãa paam pidsg ye.

Dẽ yĩnga, tõ-kãensã sʋka, ned sã n kɩɩs tõog a yembr sẽn ya-a bilf n yɩɩda, la a zãms nebã tɩ b maan a woto, b na n boola yẽ tɩ yao-zʋʋg arzãn soolmẽ. La b na n boola ned ninga sẽn sakd-bã, la sẽn zãmsd nebã tɩ b sak-bã tɩ nin-kãseng arzãn soolmẽ.
Tɩ bõe, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb tɩrlmã sã n ka yɩɩg tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmba tɩrlem, yãmb kõn kẽ arzãn soolmẽ ye.
Yãmb wʋmame tɩ b rag n yeela kʋdem-dãmbã tɩ b ra kʋ ye, la tɩ ned sã n kʋ a to, a zemsame tɩ bʋ-kaoodbã kao a bʋʋdo.

La mam yeta yãmb tɩ ned sũur sã n yik ne a ba-biiga, a zemsame tɩ bʋ-kaoodbã kao yẽ bʋʋdo. Ned sã n yeel a ba-biig t'a ka bark ye, a zemsame tɩ kaorengã yɛl bʋ-bʋʋdbã kao a bʋʋdo. La ned sã n yeel a ba-biig tɩ yalma, yẽ soab zemsa bug-tẽnga.
Woto yĩnga, fo sã n wa ne kũun tẽn-kugrã taoore, n zĩnd be n tẽeg tɩ f ba-biig n tar yell ne foom,
bɩ f bas f kũunã tẽn-kugrã taoore, n deng n kẽng n tɩ maneg f yellã ne f ba-biigã, n yaool n wa kõ f kũunã.
Maneg f yell ne f zabd-n-taag tao-tao, yãmb sẽn ket n be sor zug n dabda, tɩ yẽ ra ning foom bʋ-bʋʋdã nugẽ, tɩ bʋ-bʋʋdã ning foom gũud nugẽ t'a kẽes foom bi-bees roogẽ ye.
Mam yeta foo sɩda, tɩ fo kõn yi be hal tɩ f yao-a a yaoolem lagfo.
Yãmb wʋmame tɩ b ra yeelame tɩ b ra yo ye.
La mam yeta yãmb tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn get pag ne ratem wẽng zoe n maana yoob ne-a a sũurẽ.
Fo rɩtg nifã sã n wat ne fo lʋɩɩs bɩ f feoog-a n lob yɩɩga, tɩ bõe, fo yĩngã will a yembr sã n sãam n são b sẽn na n lob fo yĩngã tõr bug-tẽnga.
La fo nug rɩtg sã n wat ne fo lʋɩɩs bɩ f fiuug-a n lob yɩɩga, tɩ bõe, fo yĩngã will a yembr sã n sãam n são b sẽn na n lob fo yĩngã tõr bug-tẽnga.
B rag n yeelame tɩ ned sã n bas a pag bɩ a kõ-a baosg sebre.
La mam yeta yãmb tɩ ned sẽn basd a pag tɩ ka yoob yĩnga, a kɩtdame t'a kẽ yoobo. La ned ning fãa sẽn dɩkd pag b sẽn bas maanda yoobo.
Yãmb leb n wʋmame tɩ b rag n yeela kʋdem dãmbã a woto: "Da wẽen tɩ yaool n ka sɩd ye, la fo sẽn pʋlem Zu-soabã ne bũmb ninsã, pids-ba."
La mam yeta yãmb tɩ ra wẽen lae-lae ye. Da wẽen-y ne arzãn ye, bala a yaa Wẽnnaam geere.
Da wẽen-y ne tẽngã ye, bala a yaa bãmb nao roagendga. Da wẽen-y ne Zeruzalɛm ye, bala a yaa rĩm-kãseng tẽnga.
Da wẽen ne f zug me ye, bala fo ka tõe tɩ f zoobg ba a yen lebg pɛɛlg bɩ sableg ye.
Bɩ yãmb n-ye yɩ n-ye, tɩ y ayo yɩ ayo. Sã n yɩɩd a woto, sẽn paasã yita wẽng soabã nengẽ.
Yãmb wʋmame tɩ b rag n yeelame tɩ nif nif yĩnga, la yẽnd yẽnd yĩnga.
La mam yeta yãmb tɩ y ra rok y sũur ne ned sẽn maand yãmb wẽng ye. Ned sã n wẽ fo rɩtg yɛgdgã pɛk bɩ f wẽnemd a to wã me n kis-a.
Ned sã n dat n bool foom bʋʋd zĩigẽ n deeg f fu-bila, bɩ f kɩs-a fu-kãsengã me.
Ned sã n modg foom tɩ f yãag-a nao-yakem tusr bɩ f yãag-a nao-yakem tus a yiibu.
Ned sã n kos foom bũmb bɩ f kõ-a. La ned sã n dat n peng foom bũmb bɩ f ra mong-a ye.
Yãmb dag n wʋmame tɩ b yeelame tɩ f nong f to la f kisg f bɛya.

La mam yeta yãmb tɩ y nong y bɛɛba la y ning neb nins sẽn kãabd yãmb wẽngã zut barka, la y maan neb nins sẽn kis yãmbã neere la y pʋʋs neb nins sẽn maand yãmb wẽnga la sẽn namsd yãmbã yĩnga,
tɩ yãmb tõe n yɩ yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã kamba. Bala bãmb kɩtdame tɩ bãmb wĩntoogã zẽk nin-wẽns la nin-sõamy yĩnga, la b kɩtdame tɩ saagã niid nin-tɩrs la sẽn ka-b tɩrsã yĩnga.
Yãmb sã n nong neb nins sẽn nong yãmbã bala, bõe keoor la yãmb na n paame? Yaood-dɛɛgdbã me ka maand a woto sɩda?
La yãmb sã n pʋʋsd y ba-biisã bala, bõe la yãmb maand n yɩɩd y taabã? Neb nins sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaamã me ka maand a woto sɩda?
Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ yãmb yɩ neb sẽn zems zãnga, a wa yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã sẽn zems zãngã.
Gũus-y y mens n da tʋm tẽebã tʋʋm nebã nin gesg yĩng tɩ b tõe n yãnd yãmb ye. Sã n ka rẽ, yãmb kõn paam keoor yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã nengẽ ye.

Woto yĩnga, fo sã n na n sõng naong rãmba, da kɩt tɩ b peeb baorg fo taoor wa zãmb dãmbã sẽn maand karen-dotẽ la soayã zut tɩ nebã tõe n waoog-bã ye. Mam yeta yãmb sɩd tɩ bãmb zoe n paamda b keoore.
La fo sã n kõt naong rãmba, da sak tɩ f nug-goabg bãng f nug-rɩtgã sẽn maand bũmb ningã ye.
Woto, fo kũunã na n yɩɩ soosgo, la fo ba sẽn yã tɩ fo soosame n kõ wã, bãmb na keo foom.
Yãmb sã n pʋʋsdẽ, bɩ y da maan wa zãmb dãmbã sẽn nong n yals yĩngri, karen-dotẽ la so-tiisẽ n pʋʋs tɩ nebã tõe n yãnd bãmbã ye. Mam yeta yãmb sɩd tɩ bãmb zoe n paamda b keoore.
La fo sã n na n pʋʋse, kẽ f roogẽ n pag kʋɩlenga, n pʋʋs f ba sẽn be zĩig sẽn solge. La fo ba sẽn yã tɩ fo soosame n pʋʋse, bãmb na n keoo foom.
Yãmb sã n pʋʋsdẽ, bɩ y da gom n leb n gom gom-vɩɩd wa buud a taabã sẽn maanda, n tẽed tɩ b goamã wʋsgã yĩnga Wẽnnaam na n leoka bãmb pʋʋsgã ye.
Da yɩ-y wa bãmb ye, bala sẽn deng yãmb sẽn na n kose, yãmb ba wã mii bũmb nins yãmb sẽn tog n paame.
Woto yĩnga, ad yãmb sẽn tog n pʋʋs to-to: Tõnd ba sẽn be arzãna, bɩ yãmb yʋʋrã paam waoogre,
tɩ yãmb soolmã wa, tɩ yãmb daab maan tẽng zug wa a sẽn maand arzãnã.
Kõ-y tõnd d daar o daar dɩɩbã dũnna.
Kõ-y tõnd sugr d beegr yĩnga, a wa tõnd me sẽn kõt d bɛɛgdbã sugrã.
Da bas-y tõnd tɩ d kẽ makr pʋgẽ ye. Fãag-y tõnd wẽng soabã nugẽ, tɩ yãmb n so soolem la pãnga la waoogr wakat sẽn kõn sa. Ãmina!
Yãmb sã n kõ nebã sugr b beegr yĩnga, yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã na n kõo yãmb me sugri.
La yãmb sã n ka kõ nebã sugr b beegr yĩnga, yãmb ba kõn kõ yãmb me sugr y beegrã yĩng ye.
Yãmb sã n loe noore, bɩ y da gãnem y nens wa zãmb dãmbã sẽn gãnemd b nens tɩ wilg nebã tɩ bãmb loee noorã ye. Mam yeta yãmb sɩd tɩ bãmb zoe n paamda b keoore.
La foom, fo sã n loe noor bɩ f sõog f zug kaam la f widg f nenga,
tɩ fo no-loeerã ra yɩ nebã nin gesg yĩng ye, la a na yɩ f ba sẽn be zĩig sẽn solgã yĩnga. La f baaba sẽn yã tɩ fo soosame n loe noorã, bãmb na keo foom.
Da bĩng-y paoong tẽng zug ka tɩ mogd bɩ tẽngempiisim sãamd-b lame, la wagda kẽed n wʋkdame.
Bĩng-y yãmb paoongã arzãna, tɩ mogd bɩ tẽngempiisim ka sãamd-a be ye, la wagda ka kẽed be n wʋk-a ye.
Tɩ bõe, fo paoong sẽn be zĩig ningã, fo sũur me na n zĩnda beene.
Nif yaa yĩng fɩtla. Fo nif sã n ya sõama, fo yĩngã tõr na n pida ne vẽenem.
La fo nif sã n ka sõama, fo yĩngã tõr na n yɩɩ lika. Dẽ yĩnga, vẽenem ning sẽn be fo pʋgẽ wã sã n ya lika, lik-kãng na n yɩɩ bida.
Ned ba a yen ka tõe n sak zu-soben-dãmb a yiib ye. Bala a na n kisga a yen la a nong a to wã, wala a loe a meng ne a yen la a paoog a to wã. Yãmb ka tõe n sak Wẽnnaam la y sak arzegs me ye.

Dẽ n kɩt tɩ mam yet yãmb tɩ y ra maan yɩɩr ne y vɩɩmã yelle, yãmb sẽn na n dɩ bũmb ninga la y sẽn na n yũ bũmb ninga, wala y maan yɩɩr ne y yĩngã yelle, yãmb sẽn na n yeelg bũmb ningã ye. Vɩɩm ka yɩɩd dɩɩb la, bɩ yĩng ka yɩɩd futu?
Ges-y bõn-pɩgsã sẽn yɩgd yĩngrã. Bãmb ka bʋta, b ka tigsda, b ka suiid baoẽ ye. La yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã rɩlgda bãmba. Yãmb ka yɩɩd bãmb wʋsg sɩda?
Yãmb ned a bõe n tõe n paas a vɩɩmã woglem kãntɩɩg a yen tãa a sẽn maand yɩɩr yĩnga?
La yaa bõe tɩ y na n maan yɩɩr ne fut yelle? Tags-y weoog rulg-lɛlem sẽn bɩt to-to wã yelle. Bãmb ka tʋmda, b ka wĩid lamdo.
Baoosgo, mam yeta yãmb t'a Salomo mengã sẽn dag n tar ziir wʋsgã, a ka tõog n yeelg a meng tɩ be neer n ta rulg lelemd a yembr ye.
Yãmb tẽeb bilf rãmba! Sã n yaa tɩ Wẽnnaam nagsa mood ning sẽn be weoogẽ dũnna n na n dɩ bugum beoogã a woto, bãmb kõn ges yãmb fut yell n yɩɩda?
Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ y da maan yɩɩr n sokd y mens y sẽn na n dɩ wall y yũ bũmb ninga, wall y sẽn na n yeelg bũmb ninga ye.
Bala yaa neb nins sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaamã n baood bõn-kãense. La yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã miime tɩ yãmb data bõn-kãense.
Deng n bao-y Wẽnnaam soolmã ne bãmb tɩrlmã, la b na n kõo yãmb bõn-kãens n paase.
Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ y da maan yɩɩr ne beoog yell ye, tɩ bõe, daar fãa yell sek-a lame.
Da bʋ-y neb a taab bʋʋdo, tɩ b da wa bʋ yãmb bʋʋd ye.
Tɩ bõe, yãmb sẽn bʋʋd nebã bʋʋd to-to wã, b na n bʋʋ yãmb bʋʋd a woto me. Yaa ne makdg ning yãmb sẽn tar n makdẽ wã la b na n mak n lebs yãmba.
Yaa bõe tɩ fo ne moogã sẽn be f ba-biigã nifẽ n yaool n ka ne sug-raoogã sẽn be fo mengã nifẽ wã?
Walla fo na n maana a wãn n yeel f ba-biig t'a bas tɩ f yãk moog sẽn be a nifẽ, tɩ sug-raoog yaool n be f rẽndẽ?
Zãmb soaba! Reng n yãk sug-raoogã sẽn be fo nifẽ wã n yaool n tõog n yã moogã sẽn be f ba-biigã nifẽ wã neer n yãk-a.
Da rɩk-y bõn-sõama n kõ baas ye, la y da rɩk y kĩndi n lob kurkuy taoor tɩ b tõe n tab-b-la ne b nao la b wẽnemd n pogl yãmba.
Kos-y tɩ b na n kõo-y lame. Bao-y tɩ y na n yãame. Kabs-y tɩ b na n paka kʋɩlengã tɩ y kẽ.
Tɩ bõe, ned ning sẽn kot na paame, ned ning sẽn baood na yã, la b na pak kʋɩleng tɩ ned ning sẽn kabsd kẽ.
Ãnna yãmb sʋkã biig n na n kos-a bur t'a kõ-a kugri?
Wall a kos-a zĩinf t'a kõ-a waafo?
Dẽ, yãmb sẽn ya nin-wẽnsã sã n mi tɩ kõ y kambã bõn-sõama, ka Wẽnnaam n mi n yɩɩd n na n kõ neb nins sẽn kot bãmbã bõn-sõama sɩda?
Bũmb nins fãa yãmb sẽn dat tɩ neb a taabã maan yãmba, bɩ yãmb me maan bãmb bõn-kãense. Yõwã yaa Wẽnnaam tõogo la b no-rɛɛsdbã noore.
Tũ-y zag-no-sẽkã n kẽ. Bala zag-noor ning sẽn kẽesd sãoong zĩigẽ, ne sor ning sẽn dɛbd-a be wã yaa yalemse, la neb wʋsg n tũud be.
La zag-noor ning sẽn kẽesd vɩɩm pʋgẽ wã yaa sẽka, tɩ sor ning sẽn dɛbd-a be wã yaa bãanega, la yaa neb bilf bal n yãt-a.
Gũus-y yãmb mens ne belgr no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn wat yãmb sʋk wa piis tɩ b pʋsẽ wã b ya digd-n-yĩid-toosã.
Biis nins bãmb sẽn womdã n na n kɩt tɩ yãmb bãng-ba. Dẽ yĩnga yãmb kaooda sib kɛglg zugu, walla y wobd kankam zaang zugu?
Tɩ-sõng fãa womda bi-sõama, la tɩ-wẽng fãa womda bi-yoodo.
Tɩ-sõng ka tõe n wom bi-yood ye, la tɩ-wẽng me ka tõe n wom bi-sõama ye.
B kɛɛda tɩɩg ning fãa sẽn ka womd bi-sõama wã n tugund bugum.
Dẽ, yaa ne biis nins bãmb sẽn womdã la yãmb na n bãng-ba.
Ka ned ning fãa sẽn boond maam tɩ Zu-soaba! Zu-soaba! N na n kẽ arzãn soolmẽ ye. Yaa ned ning bal sẽn maand-a mam ba sẽn be arzãnã raab n na n kẽ.
Baraare, neb wʋsg na n yeela maam yaa: Zu-soaba! Zu-soaba! Tõnd dag n ka togs bãngr goam ne yãmb yʋʋre, la d dig zĩn-dãmb ne yãmb yʋʋre, la d maan bõn-bãn wʋsg ne yãmb yʋʋr sɩda?
La mam na n yeel-b lame: "Mam zɩ n bãng yãmb lɛ-lɛ. Tʋʋm-wẽns maandbã, yi-y mam taoore."
Woto yĩnga, ned ning fãa sẽn wʋmd goam nins mam sẽn yetã n tũudẽ, yẽ na n yɩɩ wa yam soab sẽn me a roog kugr zugu.
Saag niime, koom zoee wʋsgo, sobg fugame n wẽ roogã la a ka lʋɩ ye, bala a yẽbga pĩig zugu.
La ned ning fãa sẽn wʋmd goam nins mam sẽn yetã n ka sakdẽ, yẽ na n yɩɩ wa yalem sẽn me a roog bĩisir zugu.
Saag niime, koom zoee wʋsgo, sobg fugame n wẽ roogã. A lʋɩɩme la a sãoongã yɩɩ kãsenga.
A Zezi sẽn gom koe-kãens n sa, bãmb zãmsgã yɛɛsa nebã.
Bala bãmb zãmsa nebã wala ned sẽn tar noor ne a sẽn maandã, la a ka wa bãmb tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ye.
A Zezi sẽn sig tãngã, kʋʋng-kãseng tũu bãmba.
La gese, yĩng-soab a yen n wa n wõgemd bãmb taoor n yeele: Zu-soaba, yãmb sã n data, yãmb tõe n kɩtame tɩ mam lebg yɩlemde.
A Zezi tẽega b nug n sɩɩs-a n yeele: Mam datame. Lebg yɩlemde. La tao-tao bala a yĩn-gãong-bãagã bas-a lame t'a lebg yɩlemde.
La a Zezi yeela yẽnda yaa: Gũus f meng la f ra sak tɩ ned wʋm ye. Kẽng maan-kʋʋdã nengẽ tɩ b ges foom, la f kõ bũmb nins a Moyiis sẽn wilgã, t'a tõe n yɩ kaset b yĩnga.
A Zezi sẽn kẽ Kapɛrnawom, sodaas koabg naab a yembr waa bãmb nengẽ n kos bãmb a woto:
Zu-soaba, mam tʋmtʋmd n ki bogr n gãe yiri, la a namsda wʋsgo.
A Zezi yeela yẽnda tɩ b na n kẽngame n tɩ maag-a.
Sodaas koabg naabã leoka bãmb yaa: Mam ka sek yãmb na wa mam yir ye. Yãmb ye n gom bala, la mam tʋmtʋmdã na n paama laafɩ.

Bõe yĩnga, mam yaa rao neb sẽn so, la mam me soo sodaase. Mam sã n yeel a yembr t'a kẽnge, a kẽngdame. La mam sã n yeel a to t'a wa, a watame. La mam sã n yeel m tʋmtʋmd t'a maan woto, a maandame.
La a Zezi sẽn wʋm woto, b ges-a lame n nand-a, la b yeela neb nins sẽn tũud bãmbã yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd tɩ mam nan pa yã tẽ-kãseng a woto, baa Israyɛll sʋkã ye.
La mam yeta yãmb tɩ neb n na n yi yaang la taoore, n zĩnd n dɩ ne a Abraham arzãn soolmẽ.
La b na n loba soolmã kamb lik sẽn be kɛɛngã pʋgẽ, la yãbr ne yẽn wãbr na n zĩnda beene.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela sodaas koabg naabã: Kuil tɩ na n yɩɩ wa fo sẽn tẽ wã bala. La wakat kãng bala tʋmtʋmdã paama maagre.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi kẽnga a Pɩyɛɛr yiri, la b mikame t'a reem-poakã gãee ne yĩn-wɩngre.
La a Zezi sɩɩsa a nugu, la a yĩn-wɩngrã sigame t'a yik n maan bãmb sãando.
Zaabr sẽn ta, b talla neb wʋsg zĩn-dãmb sẽn tar n wa a Zezi nengẽ. A Zezi riga zĩn-dãmbã ne b noor goama, la b maag neb nins fãa sẽn ka laafɩ wã.
Yɩɩ a woto tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sẽn togsã paam pidsgu. A yeelame: Bãmb deega tõnd yĩns toodo, la b zɩɩ tõnd bãase.
A Zezi sẽn yã neb kʋʋngã sẽn gũbg bãmbã, b yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b loog n kẽng ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde.
La tõog karen-saamb a yembr kolgame n yeel a Zezi yaa: Mam na n tũuda yãmb n kẽnd zĩig ning fãa yãmb sẽn na n kẽnge.
La a Zezi yeela yẽnda: Waas tara bogdo, tɩ liuuli sẽn yɩgd yĩngrã tar tʋgdo, la Ninsaal Bi-riblã ka tar zĩig n na n gãneg a zug ye.
Ned a to zĩnda bãmb karen-biisã sʋk n yeel bãmba: Zu-soaba, bas-y tɩ m deng n kẽng n tɩ mum m ba la m wa.
La a Zezi leoka yẽnda yaa: Tũ maam, la f bas kũ-rãmbã tɩ b mum b kũum. Waas sẽn be b bok noore (8.20)
Bãmb kẽe koom-koglgã, la bãmb karen-biisã tũu bãmba.
La tao-tao bala sob-kãseng yika ko-kãsengã zug hal tɩ ko-pɛm limd koom-koglgã. La a Zezi da gõeeme.
Bãmb karen-biisã wa n neka bãmb n yeele: Zu-soaba, fãag-y-do! Ad tõnd na n kiime!
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Tẽeb bilf rãmba, yaa bõe tɩ yãmb zoet rabeem? La a Zezi yikame n tãs sobdã ne ko-kãsengã, la zĩiga fãa lebga sɩddd.
Daopã yɛɛsame n yeele: Nin-kãngã yaa bõe ned tɩ baa sobdã ne ko-kãsengã sakd bãmba?
Bãmb sẽn dʋʋg ko-kãsengã n ta Gadara neba tẽngẽ, gãeems a yiib yii yaadẽ n wa a Zezi nengẽ. B yaa gãeen-zabds hal wʋsgo, tɩ ned ka saagd n pɩʋʋg zĩig ning b sẽn be wã ye.
Bãmb kelmame n yeele: Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, yãmb waame n na n maan tõnd bõe? Yãmb waame n na n nams tõnd tɩ wakatã nan ka ta laa?
Kurkuy wʋsg n dag n be hal yɩɩg n wãbdẽ.
La zĩn-dãmbã bõosa a Zezi n yeel tɩ b sã n dig bãmb tɩ b yi, bɩ b tʋm-b tɩ b tɩ kẽ kurkuyã.
A Zezi yeela zĩn-dãmbã tɩ b kẽnge. La b yiime n kẽ kurkuyã. Dẽ, kurkuyã wudgame n yi ko-kãsengã noor sigdgã n bilim n lʋɩ koomã pʋgẽ, la koomã rɩ-b lame.
Kurkuyã gũudbã zoeeme, la b kẽnga tẽngã pʋgẽ n tɩ togs bũmb nins fãa sẽn maanã, la bũmb ning sẽn maan neb nins zĩn-dãmbã sẽn dag n tarã.
La tẽngã rãmb fãa yiime n seg a Zezi. La b sẽn yã a Zezi, b kosa bãmb tɩ b loog la b bas-b b tẽnga.
A Zezi kẽe koom-koglg n leb n pɩʋʋg ko-kãsengã n kuil b tẽngẽ.
B talla rao a yembr sẽn ki bogre, n gãe a gãagẽ, n wa bãmb nengẽ. A Zezi sẽn yã bãmb tẽebo, b yeela sẽn ki-a bogrã yaa: M biiga, keng f sũuri! Fo paama f yel-wẽnã sugri.
Gom-kãng yĩnga, tõog karen-saam-dãmb kẽer tagsa b sũyẽ tɩ rao-kãnga paoogda Wẽnnaam.
La a Zezi sẽn mi bãmb tagsgã yeela bãmba: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb tar tags wẽns y sũyã pʋse?
Bʋg yeelg n ya naana n yɩɩda: "Fo paama f yel-wẽna sugr bii, bɩ yik n kẽne?"
La yaa tɩ nebã na bãng tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã tara noor tẽng zug ka tɩ kõ yel-wẽnã sugri. A Zezi yeela sẽn ki-a bogrã: Yik n dɩk f gãag n kuili.
Yẽ yikame n kuil a yiri.
La kʋʋngã sẽn yã woto, b yɛɛsame la b waooga Wẽnnaam b sẽn kõ ninsaalb pãng a woto wã yĩnga.
A Zezi sẽn yi be n kẽng taoore, b yãa rao a yembr sẽn boond t'a Matye t'a zĩ yaood-deegr zĩigẽ. Bãmb yeela yẽnda t'a tũ bãmba. Daowã yikame n tũ bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn zĩ a Matye roogẽ n dɩtẽ, yaood-dɛɛgdb ne yel-wẽn maandb waa wʋsgo, n zĩnd ne bãmb ne b karen-biisã n dɩtẽ.
Fariisẽ-dãmba sẽn yã rẽnda, b soka a Zezi karen-biisã yaa: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb karen-saambã rɩt ne yaood-dɛɛgdb la yel-wẽn maandba?
A Zezi sẽn wʋm b sokrã yeela bãmb yaa: Ka neb nins sẽn tar laafɩ wã n baood tɩp ye, yaa bãad-dãmba.
Dẽ, kẽng n zãms-y koe-kãngã võore: "Mam sẽn dat yaa nimbãan-zoeere la ka maand ye." Bala mam ka wa tɩ bool nin-tɩrs ye la yaa yel-wẽn maandbã.
Dẽ, a Zã karen-biis waa a Zezi nengẽ n sok bãmb a woto: Yaa bõe tɩ tõnd ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã loet noor tɩ yãmb karen-biisã yaool n ka loetẽ?

A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Dẽ yĩnga pʋg-paal sɩd tũud-n-taas tõe n maana sũ-sãoong wakat ninga a sẽn ket n be ne bãmba? Day n wat tɩ b na n yiis pʋg-paalã sɩdã n bas-ba. Dẽ bãmb na yaool n loe noore.
Ned ka be sẽn na n dɩk peen-paalg n lisg fu-kʋdg ye. Tɩ bõe, peen-paalgã na n yõbgame n kɩt tɩ fu-kʋdgã kẽeg n yɩɩg pĩnda.

Ned ka be sẽn na n sui rã-paalg ko-wao-kʋdẽ ye. Sã n ka rẽ, ko-waoosã na pusi, rãamã na raage, la ko-waoosã na sãam. Rã-paalg tog n suii ko-wao-paalsẽ. Woto b tõe n bĩng-a lame t'a ka sãam ye.
A Zezi sẽn ket n gomd ne bãmb a woto, naab a yembr waa n wõgemda bãmb taoor n yeele: Mam bi-pugl n ki moas-moasã. Wa-y n tik-y yẽnda ne y nugu la a na n vʋʋgame.
A Zezi yika ne b karen-biisã n tũ yẽnda.
La gese, pag a yembr bãag sẽn tar t'a zɩɩm daagd hal yʋʋm piig la a yiib waa a Zezi poorẽ n sɩɩs bãmb fuug noore.
Bala a yeela a sũurẽ t'a sã n tõog n sɩɩs bãmb fuugã bala, a na n paama laafɩ.
A Zezi sẽn wẽnemd n yã pagã, b yeel-a lame: M biiga, keng f sũuri! Fo tẽeb n maag foom. La pʋg-kãng paama maagr wakat kãng bala.
La a Zezi sẽn ta naabã yir n yã wɩ-pɛɛbdbã ne neb kʋʋng sẽn maand bʋrga, bãmb yeel-b lame:
Yi-y tɩ bi-puglã ka ki ye, a gõeeme. La nebã yaala a Zezi.
La b sẽn yiis nebã n sɛ, a Zezi kẽeme n gãd bi-puglã nugu, la a yikame.
La bõn-kãng kibar saaga tẽngã fãa.
A Zezi sẽn yit zĩ-kãnga, zoens a yiib pʋgla bãmb n kelemdẽ n yetẽ: David Bi-ribla, zoe-y tõnd nimbãanega!
A Zezi sẽn ta yiri, zoensã kolga bãmba, la a Zezi sok-b lame: Yãmb tẽedame tɩ mam tõe n maana bõn-kãnga? La b leokame tɩ n-ye Zu-soaba.
Dẽ a Zezi sɩɩsa zoensã ninã n yeele: Bɩ a yɩ ne yãmb a wa yãmb sẽn tẽedã.
La b ninã pukame. La a Zezi keooga bãmb neer n yeel-b tɩ b gũus tɩ ned da bãng yõwã ye.
La bãmb sẽn looge, b moona a Zezi yʋʋrã tẽn-kãng zĩiga fãa.
La bãmb sẽn yita, b talla muk zĩn sẽn tar n wa a Zezi nengẽ.
La a Zezi sẽn dig zĩnã, mukã gomame. La neb kʋʋngã yɛɛsame n yeel tɩ ned nan ka yã bũmb a woto Israyɛll pʋgẽ ye.
La Fariisẽ-dãmbã yeelame tɩ yaa ne zĩn-dãmbã naab pãng la a Zezi digd zĩn-dãmbã.
A Zezi saaga tẽn-bɛd la tẽn-bõoneg fãa n zãms nebã b karen-dotẽ, la b moon Wẽnnaam soolem koe-noogã, la b maag bãad-dãmba la koms-rãmb buud fãa.
A Zezi sẽn yã neb kʋʋngã, b nimbãaneg yõka bãmba. Tɩ bõe, nin-kãens da yɛɛme tɩ b nensã yeege, n ya wa piis sẽn ka tar pe-kɩɩm ye.
Dẽ a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Koodã sẽn dat tigsgã yaa wʋsgo, la tigsdbã sõor paoodame.
Dẽ yĩnga, kos-y tigsgã soab tɩ b tʋm tʋmtʋmdb b pʋʋgẽ wã.
La a Zezi boola b karen-biis piig la a yiibã n kõ-b pãn-tõog tɩ b rig zĩn-dẽgdo, la b maag bãad-dãmb buud fãa la koms-rãmb buud fãa.
Ad tẽn-tʋmdb piig la a yiibã yʋya: Dẽenem soab yaa a Sɩmo b sẽn boond t'a Pɩyɛɛr ne a ba-biig a Ãndre, la a Zebde bi-ribl a Zak ne a ba-biig a Zã,
a Filip ne a Bartelemi, a Toma ne a Matye sẽn ya yaood-dɛɛgda, a Zak sẽn ya a Alfe biigã ne a Tade,
a Sɩmo b sẽn boond tɩ Zelot ne a Zudas Iskaryo, soab ning sẽn zãmb a Zezi wã.
Yaa bãmb piig la a yiibã la a Zezi tʋmyã, n yeel-b a woto: Da kẽng-y bu-zẽmsã nengẽ ye, la y ra kẽ Samari nebã tẽnsẽ ye.
Bas-y be la y kẽng Israyɛll pe-menemdsã nengẽ.
Kẽnd-y la y moondẽ tɩ arzãn soolem kolgame.
Maag-y bãad-dãmba la y vʋʋg kũum, la y kɩt tɩ yĩn-gãong bãas sẽn tar b rãmbã lebg yɩlma, la y rig zĩn-dãmba. Yãmb deega zaalem, bɩ y kõ zaalem.
Da zã-y sãnem bɩ wanzuri bɩ lagf y sɛɛg sẽbdsẽ ye,
la y ra zɩ korg y so-toakã yĩng ye. Da rɩk-y fut a yiibu la neooda wall dasaar ye. Tɩ bõe, tʋmtʋmd togd n paama a rɩɩbo.
Yãmb sã n kẽ tẽngẽ, tɩ yaa tẽn-bedre, tɩ yaa tẽn-bila, bɩ y bao n bãng ned sã n bee be n zems tɩ sik yãmb a yiri, la y zĩnd be hal tɩ ta y loogre.
La yãmb sã n kẽed zakẽ wã, bɩ y yeel tɩ laafɩ zĩnd ne zakã rãmba.
La zag-kãng sã n zemsa ne laafɩ, bɩ yãmb laafɩ wã zĩnd ne a nebã. La a sã n ka zems ne laafɩ, bɩ yãmb laafɩ wã leb y nengẽ.
La b sã n ka reeg yãmba, la b ka kelg yãmb goamã, bɩ y foos y nus la y yi zag-kãnga walla tẽn-kãng n bas-ba.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩda tɩ bʋʋdã daare, Sodom ne Gomoor sɩbgrã toolem ka na n ta tẽn-kãng rẽndã ye.
Ade, mam tʋmda yãmb wa piis digd-n-yĩids sʋka. Dẽ yĩnga, yɩ-y yam dãmb wa wiisi, la y yɩ neb sẽn ka tar yell ye, n ya wa wala.
Gũus-y y mens ne nebã, bala b na n yõga yãmb n kẽng bʋʋd zĩisẽ, la b na n pãba yãmb ne kalwaas b karen-dotã pʋse.
B na n kẽnga ne yãmb Gʋvɛrneer dãmb ne rĩm-dãmb taoor mam yĩnga, tɩ tõe n yɩ kaset bãmb ne bu-zẽmsã yĩnga.
La b sã n tall yãmb n kẽnge, bɩ y da maan yɩɩr ne yãmb sẽn na n gom to-to wall y sẽn na n yet tɩ bũmb ning ye. Wakat kãng bala, b na n wilga yãmb bũmb ning y sẽn na n gomã.
Bala ka yãmb n na n gom ye, yaa yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã Sɩɩgã sẽn be yãmb pʋsã n na n gome.
Ned na n kɩtame tɩ b yõk a ba-biig n kʋ, la ba-rãmb me na n maana b kamb a woto. Kamb na n yika ne b ba-rãmb la b ma-rãmb n kɩt tɩ b kʋ-ba.
Neba fãa na n kisga yãmb mam yʋʋrã yĩnga, la ned ning sẽn na n yals-a kãenkãe tɩ wakat ta na paam fãagre.
B sã n nams yãmb tẽn-kãnga, bɩ y zoe n kẽng tẽng a to. Mam yeta yãmb sɩda tɩ yãmb ka na n saag Israyɛll tẽnsã n sɛ tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã nan ka wa ye.
Karen-biig ka yɩɩd a karen-saamb ye, la tʋmtʋmd ka yɩɩd a zu-soab ye.
Karen-biig sã n yɩ wa a karen-saamba, tɩ tʋmtʋmd yɩ wa a zu-soaba, sekame. B sã n boola yirã soab tɩ Belzebul, b kõn bool a yirã rãmb a woto n yɩɩda?
Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ y ra zoe dabeem ye. Tɩ bõe, bũmb ka be sẽn lud n kõn puki, la sẽn solg neb sẽn kõn yã ye.
Togs-y bũmb nins mam sẽn yeel yãmb likẽ wã vẽenemẽ, la y rʋ rot zut n moon bũmb nins mam sẽn walem yãmb tʋbẽ wã.
Ra zoe-y neb nins sẽn kʋʋd yĩngã n yaool n ka tõe n kʋ sɩɩgã ye. Zoe-y soab ning sẽn tõe n kɩt tɩ yĩngã ne sɩɩgã sãam bug-tẽngã.
B ka koosd yirg su a yembr sɩda? La baoosgo, a yembr bãmb sʋk ka lʋɩt tẽng tɩ ka tũ ne yãmb ba wã raab ye.
La baa yãmb zugã zoobd fãa sõdame.
Dẽ yĩnga, da zoe-y rabeem ye. Yãmb bee yõod n yɩɩd yirs wʋsgo.
Ned sã n kɩs kaset nebã taoor t'a yaa mam neda, mam me na n kɩsa kaset m ba sẽn be arzãnã taoor tɩ mam yaa yẽ neda.
La ned sã n yeel nebã taoor t'a ka mi maam, mam me na n yeela m ba sẽn be arzãnã taoor tɩ mam ka mi-a ye.
Ra tags-y tɩ mam waame tɩ laafɩ na zĩnd tẽng zug ye. Mam ka wa ne laafɩ ye, la yaa ne zabr sʋʋga.
Bala mam waame n na n kɩt tɩ welgr zĩnd rao ne a baaba sʋka, bi-pugl ne a ma sʋka, bi-pag ne a sɩd ma sʋka,
la ned yir dãmb meng n na n yɩ a bɛɛba.
Ned ning sẽn nong a ba bɩ a ma n yɩɩd maam ka zems tɩ yɩ mam dẽnd ye. La sẽn nong-a a bi-ribl bɩ a bi-pugl n yɩɩd maam ka zems tɩ yɩ mam dẽnd ye.
Ned ning sẽn ka rɩkd a da-pɩk n pʋg maam ka zems tɩ yɩ mam dẽnd ye.
Ned ning sẽn na gɩbl a vɩɩm, na n kong-a lame. La ned ning sẽn na bas a vɩɩm mam yĩng na n leb n paam-a lame.
Ned sã n deeg yãmba, yaa maam la a reeg-yã. La ned sã n deeg maam, yaa sẽn tʋm-a maamã la a reeg-yã.

Ned ning sẽn deegd Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa, a sẽn ya bãmb no-rɛɛsã yĩnga, a na n deega Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs keoore. La ned ning sẽn deegd nin-tɩrga, a sẽn ya nin-tɩrgã yĩnga, a na n deega nin-tɩrg keoore.
Ned sã n kõ kom-bõoneg kãensã ned a yembr ko-maasg t'a yũ, a sẽn ya mam karen-biig yĩnga, baa ya ne wũmbla, mam yeta yãmb sɩd t'a kõn kong a keoor ye.
A Zezi sẽn wilg bãmb karen-biisã piig la a yiibã b tʋʋmã n sɛ, b meng yii be n kẽng n tɩ zãms nebã la b moon koe-noogã b tẽnsã pʋse.
A Zã zĩnda bi-bees roogẽ n wʋm tɩ b gomd a Zezi tʋʋmã yelle. Dẽ, yẽ tʋma a karen-biis tɩ b tɩ sok a Zezi woto:
Yãmb la sẽn tog n wa-a wã bii, bɩ d tog n gũ a to?
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Kẽng-y n tɩ togs-y-yã a Zã bũmb nins yãmb sẽn wʋmd la y yãtã:
zoens nin pugsdame, wobs kẽndame, yĩn-gãong bãas sẽn tar b rãmbã yĩns lebgda yɩlma, wʋms wʋmdame, kũum vʋʋgdame, la koe-noogã moonda naong rãmb sʋka.
Bark bee ned ning mam sẽn kõn yɩ kug-lakdg a yĩngã zugu.
La a Zã karen-biisã sẽn looge, a Zezi sɩngame n gom ne neb kʋʋngã a Zã yell n yeele: Bõe la yãmb kẽng n tɩ ges we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ wã? Tãnwĩig sobg sẽn miimda?
La yaa bõe la yãmb tɩ gese? Dao sẽn yeelg waoogr futu? Neb nins sẽn yer fu-bʋgs sẽn ya neebã bee rĩm-dãmb zagsẽ.
Dẽ, bõe la yãmb kẽng n tɩ gese? Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa? Mam yeta yãmb tɩ n-ye. La yaa ned sẽn yɩɩd Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
Bala, yaa rao-kãng kibar la b sẽn dag n gʋls n yeel a woto wã: "Ade, mam tʋmda m koe-toagsda, t'a reng fo taoore, n lʋɩ taoor n maneg f sorã."
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ pagb sẽn dog b rãmbã sʋka, ned ka zĩnd sẽn ya kãseng n yɩɩd a Zãmbatiis ye. Baoosgo, soab ning sẽn ya-a yao-zʋʋg arzãn soolmẽ wã yaa kãseng n yɩɩd yẽnda.
Hal a Zãmbatiis wakat tɩ ta moasã, yaa ne pãng la nebã kẽed arzãn soolmẽ. La yaa pãens rãmbã n tõogd n paamd-a.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã fãa ne tõogã togsa pĩnd-n-bãngr goam soolmã wɛɛngẽ hal tɩ ta a Zã wakate.
La yãmb sã n na n sak n deege, yẽ yaa Eli ning sẽn dag n tog n wa-a wã.
Sẽn tar-a tʋb bɩ a wʋme.
Mam na n mamsa zamaan-kãngã nebã ne ãnna rãmba? Bãmb wẽnda wa kamb sẽn zĩ raagẽ n boond taab n yetẽ:
"Tõnd peeba wɩɩs la yãmb ka sao ye. Tõnd yɩɩla kʋʋr yɩɩl la yãmb ka wiis ye."
Bala a Zã waame n ka rɩt la a ka yũud ye, tɩ b yet tɩ sɩ-wẽng n tar-a.
Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn wa, b rɩtame la b yũuda, tɩ nebã yetẽ tɩ b yaa yão-be-neda, la rã-yũuda, la yaood-dɛɛgdb ne yel-wẽn maandb zoa. Yam biis n wilgd t'a yaa tɩrga.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi sɩngame n leng tẽns nins bãmb sẽn maan bõn-bãn wʋsg b pʋsẽ wã, bãmb sẽn ka tek yam n kos sugrã yĩng n yeele:

Korazin, fo na paam toogo! Betsayida, fo na paam toogo! Bala bõn-bãn nins sẽn maan yãmb pʋsẽ wã sã n dag n maanẽ Tɩɩr ne Sɩdõ sẽn ya tẽn-wẽnsã pʋse, bãmb dag n na tekẽ yam hal daar zãr n pil bot n zĩnd tompeglmẽ n kos sugri.
Yaa woto yĩng la mam yet yãmb tɩ bʋʋdã daare, Tɩɩr ne Sɩdõ nebã sɩbgrã toolem kõn ta yãmb ye.

La foom, Kapɛrnawom, b na n zẽka foom hal tɩ f ta arzãna? Ayo, b na n sika foom hal tɩ ta kɩɩm-kulgu. Bala bõn-bãn nins sẽn maan fo pʋgẽ wã sã n dag n maanẽ Sodom pʋgẽ, a rag n na ketẽ tɩ ta rũnna.
Yaa woto yĩng la mam yet yãmb tɩ bʋʋdã daare, Sodom sɩbgrã toolem ka na n ta foom ye.

Wakat kãnga, a Zezi gomame n yeele: M ba sẽn ya arzãn la tẽng Zu-soabã, mam pẽgda yãmba, yãmb sẽn solg bõn-kãens ne yam-dãmba la yẽesem-dãmba, n yaool n vẽneg kom-bõonegã ne-bã yĩnga.
N-ye, m ba, yãmb sẽn dat tɩ ya a woto wã yĩnga.
M ba ninga bũmb fãa mam nugẽ, la ned ba a yen ka mi Bi-riblã, sã n ka ba wã bala. La ned ba a yen ka mi ba wã, sã n ka Bi-riblã bala, la a sẽn dat n vẽneg bãmb ne ned ningã.
Yãmb fãa, zɩɩb sẽn zɩsg tɩ y yɛ wã, wa-y mam nengẽ, la m na n kɩtame tɩ y vʋʋse.
Rɩk-y mam yubl-balgr n pidi, la y sak mam zãmsgo, bala mam yaa nin-bʋgsga la sũ-mar soaba, la yãmb na paam vʋʋsgo.
Bala yubl-balgr ning mam sẽn pit yãmbã yaa faoogo, la zɩɩb ning mam sẽn tʋkd yãmbã yaa faasga.
Wakat kãnga, a Zezi pɩʋʋga pʋt vʋʋsg daare. B karen-biisã sɩngame n yãgs koodã n wãbe, kom sẽn tar-b yĩnga.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn yã yõwã, b yeela a Zezi yaa: Ges-y-yã! Yãmb karen-biisã maanda bũmb sẽn ka zems tɩ maan vʋʋsg daar ye.
La a Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Yãmb ka karem bũmb ning a David sẽn maan wakat ning kom sẽn yõk yẽ ne a tũud-n-taasã,
a sẽn yɩ to-to n kẽ Wẽnnaam doogẽ wã n dɩ bur ning sẽn ya Wẽnnaam dendã, yẽ wall a tũud-n-taasã sẽn ka zems tɩ rɩ, sã n ka maan-kʋʋdbã balã laa?
Bɩ yãmb ka karem tõogã pʋgẽ tɩ vʋʋsg daare, maan-kʋʋdbã sẽn be wẽnd-doogẽ wã kɩɩsda vʋʋsg daar tõog tɩ ka beegr b yĩng laa?
Mam yaool n yeta yãmb tɩ sẽn yɩɩd wẽnd-doogã n be ka.
Yãmb sã n dag n bãngẽ gomd ning sẽn yet-a tɩ "mam data nimbãan-zoeer la ka maoongã" võore, yãmb dag n ka na n sɩbg neb sẽn ka tar yell ye.
Bala Ninsaal Bi-riblã soo vʋʋsg daarã.
A Zezi yii be n kẽng b karen-doogẽ wã.
La dao a yen n da be be t'a nug ki. La b soka a Zezi noor sã n beeme tɩ maag bãad vʋʋsg daare. La sok-kãng yaa sẽn na yɩl n paam bũmb n dõd a Zezi.
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Ãnna n be yãmb sʋkã sẽn na n tar pesg a yen tãa t'a lʋɩ bokẽ vʋʋsg daare, t'a ka tɩ tak-a n yiisi?
Ninsaal yõod sẽn yɩɩd pesg zĩig ka zãra? Dẽ, noor beeme tɩ maan neer vʋʋsg daare.
La a Zezi yeela raowã t'a tẽeg a nugã. La a tẽeg-a lame, la a vʋʋgame n lebg sõama wa nug a to wã.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã yii yɩng n yẽs ne taab n bao b sẽn na n maan to-to n kʋ a Zezi.
A Zezi sẽn wʋm rẽnda, b yii zĩ-kãnga. Neb wʋsg tũu bãmba, la b maaga b fãa.
La a Zezi keoog-b-la neer n yeel tɩ b ra sak tɩ ned bãng bãmb ye,
tɩ bũmb ning Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sẽn yeelã pidsi:
Ad mam tʋmtʋmd mam sẽn yãke, mam nin-nongr sẽn ta m yam. Mam na n ninga m Sɩɩgã yẽ zugu, la yẽ na n moona tɩrlem koɛɛg buudã fãa sʋka.
Yẽ kõn wẽ nokoeemde wall a zẽk a koɛɛg ye, la ned kõn wʋm yẽ koɛɛg soay zut ye.
Yẽ kõn kaoog tãnwĩ-kaoong n baas ye, la yẽ kõn kiis fɩtɩl peend sẽn ket n nusd ye, hal t'a kɩt tɩ tɩrlem paam tõogre.
La buud toay-toayã na n teega yẽ yʋʋrã.
Dẽ, b talla ned sẽn ya zoang la muka tɩ zĩn tar-a n wa a Zezi nengẽ, la bãmb maag-a lame, tɩ yẽ sẽn dag n ya mukã, a gomdame la a yãtẽ.
Neb kʋʋngã fãa yɛɛsame n yeele: Dao-kãngã ka na n yɩ a David biigã sɩda?
La Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn wʋm woto, b yeelame: Dao-kãngã ka rigd zĩn-dãmbã tɩ sã n ka ne zĩn-dãmbã naab a Belzebul pãng ye.

La a Zezi sẽn mi bãmb tagsgã yeel-b lame yaa: Soolem ning fãa neb sẽn welg n gõdg n zabd ne taaba, a na n wãame. La tẽng ning fãa bɩ yir ning fãa neb sẽn welg n gõdg n zabd ne taab kõn tõog n yals ye.
Sã n yaa t'a Sʋtãan digda a Sʋtãana, a welgame n gõdg n zabd ne a menga. Dẽ, yẽ soolem na n yɩɩ a wãn n yalse?
La mam sã n digda zĩn-dãmbã ne a Belzebul pãnga, yãmb kambã yẽ digd-b-la ne ãnna pãnga? Yaa woto yĩng n kɩt tɩ bãmb na n yɩ yãmb bʋ-kaoodba.
La sã n yaa ne Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã pãng la mam digd zĩn-dãmbã, dẽ, Wẽnnaam soolem taa yãmb sʋka.
Bɩ ned na n yɩɩ a wãn n kẽ pãng soab roogẽ n wʋk a teedo, t'a ka reng n sẽb-a? A sã n sẽb-a, a na yaool n tõog n wʋk a roogã teedã.
Ned ning sẽn ka be mam poorẽ kisa maam, la ned ning sẽn ka naagd maam n tigsdẽ, a sãeegdame.
Yaa woto yĩng la mam yet yãmb tɩ ninsaalbã na n paama sugr b yel-wẽnã la b paoogrã buud fãa yĩnga. La ned ning sẽn paoog-a Sɩɩg-sõng kõn tol n paam sugr ye.
Ned ning sẽn gom-a Ninsaal Bi-riblã wẽng na n paama sugri. La ned ning sẽn na n gom Sɩɩg-sõng wẽng kõn paam sugr dũni-kãnga pʋga, la dũni ning sẽn watã pʋg me ye.
Yeel-y tɩ tɩɩgã n ya sõama la a biis ya sõama, wall y yeel tɩ tɩɩgã yaa yooko la a biisã yaa yoodo. Bala yaa tɩɩg biisẽ la b bãngd a yaa sõama wall yooko.
Yãmb wag-toos buudu, yãmb sẽn ya nin-wẽns a woto wã, yãmb na n yɩɩ a wãn n tõog n gom gom-sõama? Bala yaa bũmb nins sẽn pid sũurẽ wã n yit noorẽ wã.
Nin-sõng yiisda bõn-sõama a paoon-sõngã pʋgẽ. La nin-wẽng yiisda bõn-wẽns a paoon-wẽngã pʋgẽ.
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ bʋʋdã kaoob daare, ninsaalbã na n leoka gom-vɩɩd nins fãa bãmb sẽn dag n gomã yelle.
Bala yaa ne fo noorã goam la f na n paam bʋʋm, la yaa ne fo noorã goam la f na n kong bʋʋm.
Dẽ, tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã kẽer yeela a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, tõnd datame tɩ yãmb maan bãnd tɩ d yãnde.
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Zamaan kãngã neb sẽn ya nin-wẽns la yoaadbã kota bãnde, la b kõn kõ bãmb bãnd a to tɩ sã n ka Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Zonaas bãndã ye.
Bala, a wa a Zonaas sẽn zĩnd zĩm-bedrã pʋgẽ rasem a tãab la yʋnd a tãabã, woto me, Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n paa tãnd tẽngr dasem a tãab la yʋnd a tãabo.

Niniiv nebã na n yika bʋʋdã daar n kao zamaan kãngã nebã bʋʋd n yeel tɩ b ka bʋʋm ye. Bala Niniiv nebã teka yam n kos sugr a Zonaas koe-moonegã yĩnga. La ade, sẽn be-a ka wã yɩɩda a Zonaase.

Bʋʋdã wakate, rĩm-poakã sẽn yit wĩndg goabgã na n yika ne zamaan kãngã nebã n kao b bʋʋd n yeel tɩ b ka bʋʋm ye. Bala, yẽ yii dũni satmẽ n wa n kelg a Salomo yam goama. La ade, sẽn be-a ka wã yɩɩda a Salomo.
Zĩn-dẽgd sã n yi n bas neda, a saada zĩ-pɛɛlẽ n baood vʋʋsgo, la a ka yãt ye.
Dẽ, a yetame t'a na n leba a roog ning yẽ sẽn yi n basã. La a sã n ta, a mikdame tɩ roogã yaa vɩʋʋgo, n pɩɩs n maneg tɩ ya neere.

A kẽngdame n tɩ peeg zĩn-dãmb a yopoe sẽn ya wẽns n yɩɩd yẽ mengã tɩ b wa n kẽ n zĩnd be. La dao-kãng yaoolem toogã na n yɩɩ wẽng n yɩɩg pipi wã. A na n yɩɩ a woto zamaan kãngã nin-wẽnsã yĩnga.
La a Zezi sẽn ket n gomd ne neb kʋʋngã, b ma wã ne b ma-biisã da yasa yɩng n baood n na n gom ne bãmba.
Ned a yembr yeela a Zezi yaa: Yãmb ma wã ne y ma-biisã yasa yɩng n baood n na n gom ne yãmba.
A Zezi leoka sẽn gom-a ne bãmbã a woto: Ãnna la mam ma, la ãnna rãmb la mam ma-biisi?
La a Zezi teesa b karen-biisã ne b nug n yeele: Ad mam ma ne mam ma-biisi.
Sɩda, ned ning fãa sẽn maand-a mam Ba sẽn be arzãnã raabo, yẽ soab la mam ma-bi-raoogo, mam ma-bi-poaka la m ma.
Badaare, a Zezi yii roogẽ wã n tɩ zĩnd ko-kãsengã noore.
Neb kʋʋng wʋsg tigma taab bãmb nengẽ tɩ yɩ tɩlɛ tɩ bãmb kẽ koom-koglgẽ n zĩndi. Neb kʋʋngã fãa ra yasa kʋɩl-koakẽ wã.
A Zezi goma ne bãmb bũmb wʋsg yell ne yel-bũn n yeele: Ka-koaad n yi n na n fẽrg bõn-buudu.
La yẽ sẽn fẽrgdã, bõn-buud kẽer lʋɩɩ sorã kɩrenga, la liuuli waa n dɩ-b lame.
La kẽer lʋɩɩ kug zĩigẽ, tom sẽn ka waoogẽ. La tao-tao bala b yiime, toma sẽn ka waoogã yĩnga.
La wĩndgã sẽn zẽke, a yõog-b lame tɩ b kʋɩ, b sẽn ka tar yẽgna yĩnga.
Kẽer lʋɩɩ gõos sʋka, la gõosã yikame n wulumd-b n dɩ-ba.
La kẽer lʋɩɩ zĩ-sõngẽ, la b woma biisi. Kẽer womame tɩ ta koabg-koabga, kẽer pis-yoobyoobe, la kẽer pis-tãtã.
Sẽn tar-a tʋb bɩ a wʋme.
Karen-biisã kolg n soka a Zezi tɩ yaa bõe tɩ bãmb gomd ne nebã ne yel-bũna?
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: B kõo yãmb arzãn soolem yel-soalmã bãngre, la ka bãmb ye.
Tɩ bõe, ned ning sẽn tara, b na n kõo yẽnda n paas t'a paam wʋsgo. La ned ning sẽn ka tara, b na n deega baa bũmb bilf ning yẽ sẽn tarã.
Ad bũmb ning sẽn kɩt tɩ mam gomd ne bãmb ne yel-bũnã: baa ne b sẽn ne wã, b ka ne ye, la b sẽn wʋmdã, b ka wʋmd ye la b ka wʋmd võor me ye.
La Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi bãngr-goamã paama pidsg bãmb yĩnga. A yeelame: "Yãmb na n wʋma sõama la y kõn bãng a võor ye, yãmb na n gesa neere la y kõn yã ye.
Bala nin-kãensã sũyã riglimame. Bãmb yẽda b tʋba la b mum b nini, tɩ b nin da yã la b tʋb ra wʋme, tɩ bãmb yamã kõn wʋm a võore, tɩ b kõn lebg n wa tɩ mam maag-b ye."
La yãmba, bark bee yãmb zutu, y ninã sẽn yãtã la y tʋbã sẽn wʋmdã yĩnga.
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb la nin-tɩrs wʋsg dag n dat n yãnda bũmb nins yãmb sẽn yãtã la b ka yã ye. B dag n dat n wʋma bũmb nins yãmb sẽn wʋmdã la b ka wʋm ye.
Dẽ, kelg-y bõn-bu-fẽrgdã yel-bũndã võore.
Ned sã n kelg Wẽnnaam soolem koɛɛgã n ka wʋm a võore, wẽng soabã wat n yiisa bõn-buudã sẽn dag n fẽrg yẽ sũurẽ wã. Yẽ wẽnda bõn-buudã sẽn lʋɩ sorã kɩrengã.
Bõn-buudã sẽn lʋɩ kugã zĩigẽ wã yaa ned ning sẽn wʋmd Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã n deeg-a tao-tao ne sũ-noogo,
la a yaool n ka tar a meng yẽgen ye. Yẽ kaoosda wakat bilf bala, la toog bɩ namsg sã n yaool n paam-a Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã yĩnga, yẽ lʋɩtame.
Bõn-buudã sẽn lʋɩ gõosã sʋkã yaa ned ning sẽn wʋmd Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã, tɩ dũniyã yɩɩre la arzegs belgr wulumd koɛɛgã t'a ka womd biis ye.
Bõn-buudã sẽn lʋɩ zĩ-sõngẽ wã yaa ned ning sẽn wʋmd Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã n wʋmd a võore la a womd biisi. Kẽer womame tɩ ta koabg-koabga, kẽer pis-yoobyoobe, kẽer pis-tãtã.
A Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd a to n yeele: Arzãn soolem wẽnda wa rao sẽn bʋd bõn-bu-sõng a pʋʋgẽ.
La nebã sẽn gõe wakate, a bɛy waa n bʋda nadens koodã sʋk n bas n looge.
Koodã sẽn zẽk n wom biisi, nadensã me pukame.
Yirã soab tʋmtʋmdb waa n sok-a lame yaa: Zu-soaba, ka bõn-bu-sõng la yãmb bʋd y pʋʋgẽ wã wɛ? Nadensã yii yɛ n wa n be be?
Yẽ leoka bãmb tɩ yaa bɛy n maan bõn-kãnga. La tʋmtʋmdbã soka yẽnda a sã n datame tɩ b kẽng n tɩ võ nadensã.
Yẽ leoka bãmb yaa: Ayo! Bala, yãmb sã n võod nadensã, tõe tɩ y wa n yĩd n naag koodã n võ.
Bas-y b yiibã fãa tɩ b bɩ ne taab hal tɩ ta tigsg wakate. La tigsgã wakate, mam na n yeela tigsdbã tɩ b reng n võ nadensã n sẽb kil n wa n yõog bugum, la b tigs koodã n sui m baoorẽ wã.
A Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd a to n yeele: Arzãn soolem wẽnda wa siin-bil ned sẽn dɩk n bʋd a pʋʋgẽ.
Yẽnda n ya bilf n yɩɩd bõn-buud a taabã fãa. La a sã n wa n bɩ, a lebgda bedr n yɩɩd zẽed buud fãa, n lebg tɩɩg hal tɩ liuuli wat n zao a wila.
Bãmb leb n wẽe yel-bũn-kãngã me: Arzãn soolem wẽnda wa rã-bɩll pag sẽn dɩk n ning zom wam a tã hal t'a wuk zomã zãnga.
A Zezi goma bõn-kãens fãa ne neb kʋʋngã ne yel-bũna. B ka gomda tɩ ka ne yel-bũn ye,
tɩ bũmb nins Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã sẽn dag n yeelã pidsi. A yeelame yaa: Mam na n yaaga m noor n wẽ yel-bũna, mam na n wilga bũmb sẽn solg hal naaneg wẽndẽ tɩ ta moasã.
Dẽ, a Zezi basa neb kʋʋngã n leb yiri. Bãmb karen-biisã kolg n yeela bãmb yaa: Bilg-y tõnd nadensã sẽn be pʋʋgẽ wã yel-bũndã võore.
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Ned ning sẽn bʋt bõn-bu-sõngã yaa Ninsaal Bi-riblã.
Pʋʋgã n ya dũni wã, bõn-bu-sõamy wã yaa soolmã kamba, nadensã yaa wẽng soabã kamba.
Bɛyã sẽn bʋd nadensã yaa rõatã. La tigsgã yaa dũniyã sɛɛbo. Tigsdbã yaa malegsã.
La wa b sẽn võod nadensã n yõogd bugmã, a na n yɩɩ a woto me dũni sɛɛb wakate.
Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n tʋma bãmb malegsã tɩ b yãgs kug-lakdsã fãa ne neb nins sẽn maand wẽngã n yiis-b bãmb soolmẽ wã.
La b na n loba bãmb wʋng bugmẽ, la be na n yɩɩ yãbr la yẽn wãbre.
Dẽ, nin-tɩrsã na n yãga wa wĩndgã bãmb ba soolem pʋgẽ. Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar tʋb wʋme.
Arzãn soolem leb n wẽnda wa paoong sẽn solg pʋʋg pʋgẽ tɩ rao a yen yã-a n maneg n solg-a n paase. La a sũurã yɩɩ noog t'a kẽng n tɩ koos a sẽn tarã fãa n da pʋʋgã.
Arzãn soolem leb n wẽnda wa toand sẽn baood kĩndi sẽn ya neeba.
Yẽ yãa kĩndf a yembr t'a ligdã ya wʋsgo, n kẽng n tɩ koos a sẽn dag n tarã fãa n da-a.
Arzãn soolem leb n wẽnda wa zĩm-gãmbr b sẽn lob ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ n wʋk zĩm buud fãa.
La a sẽn pidi, b vuugd-a lame n yi kʋɩl-koakã n zĩnd n tũus sẽn ya sõama wã n sag yaasẽ, la b lob sẽn ka-b sõama wã.
A na n yɩɩ a woto dũni sɛɛb wakate. Malegsã na n waa n baka nin-wẽnsã n yiis nin-tɩrsã sʋka,
n lob-b wʋng bugmẽ. Yãbr la yẽn wãbr na n zĩnda beene.
Yãmb wʋma bõn-kãens fãa võore? Bãmb leokame tɩ n-ye.
La a Zezi yeela bãmba: Yaa woto yĩng tɩ tõog karen-saamb ning fãa sẽn zãms arzãn soolem yɛl n bãnge, yẽ wẽnda wa yir soab sẽn yãkd bõn-paals ne bõn-kʋd a paoong pʋgẽ.
A Zezi sẽn wẽ yel-bũn-kãens n sa, b yii zĩ-kãnga n kẽng b meng tẽngẽ.
La b sẽn ta be, b sɩngame n zãms nebã b karen-doogẽ wã, hal tɩ nebã yɛɛs n yeele: Bãmb yamã ne b bõn-bãnã yita yɛ?
Ka bãmb la ra-wãadã biigã wɛ? Ka b ma wã yʋʋr la a Maari laa? La ka b ma-biis la a Zak ne a Zozɛf la a Sɩmo ne a Zuud laa?
B tãopã fãa ka be tõnd sʋk ka sɩda? Dẽ, bãmb paama bõn-kãensã fãa yɛɛne?
La tags-kãng kɩtame tɩ b ka nand a Zezi ye. La a Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ no-rɛɛs ka kongd waoogre, sã n ka a meng tẽngẽ la a roagdbã sʋk ye.
La bãmb ka maan bõn-bãn wʋsg zĩ-kãnga, nebã ka-tẽebã yĩnga.
Wakat kãnga, naab a Herood wʋma b sẽn gomd a Zezi yelle,
la a yeela a tʋmtʋmdbã tɩ yaa a Zãmbatiis n vʋʋge, la tɩ yaa woto yĩng n kɩt t'a tar pãn-tõog n maand bõn-bãnã.
Bala Herood dag n yõka a Zã n sẽb n kẽes bi-bees roogẽ, a ba-biig a Filip pag a Herodyaad poorẽ.
Tɩ bõe, a Zã rag n yeela yẽnda t'a ka tar noor tɩ peeg a Heroodyaad n maan a pag ye.
Herood dag n dat n kɩtame tɩ b kʋ a Zã, la a dag n zoeta neb kʋʋngã, tɩ bõe, b rag n geta a Zã wa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
La Herood dogmã tẽegr daare, a Heroodyaad bi-puglã saoo neb nins sẽn be-b be wã taoore, la yɩɩ Herood noogo,
hal t'a wẽen t'a na n kõ-a-la bũmb ning a sẽn na n kose.
A ma wã saglg yĩnga, a yeelame yaa: Kõ-y maam a Zãmbatiis zug ne lengr ka.
Rĩmã sũur sãamame, la a wẽenegã yĩnga, la nebã sẽn be be n dɩtẽ wã yĩnga, a yeelame tɩ b kõ-a a sẽn datã.
La a tʋma neb tɩ b tɩ fiuug a Zã zugã bi-beesã roogẽ.
B talla a Zã zugã ne lengr n wa n kõ bi-puglã, la a tallame n tɩ kõ a ma.
A Zã karen-biisã waa n dɩka a Zã kũumã n tɩ mumi. La b kẽngame n tɩ togs a Zezi.
A Zezi sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, bãmb kẽe koom-koglg n kẽng zĩig neb sẽn ka be. La neb kʋʋngã sẽn bãnge, b yii tẽnsẽ wã n pʋg bãmb ne nao.
A Zezi sẽn yi koom-koglgẽ wã, b yãa neb kʋʋngã, tɩ b nimbãaneg yõk-ba, la bãmb maaga bãad-dãmbã.
Zaabr sẽn ta, karen-biisã kolga a Zezi n yeel-b tɩ zĩ-kãngã yaa weoogo, la wakatã zoe n yõsgame. Rẽ wã, bɩ b kuils nebã tɩ b kẽng tẽnsẽ wã n tɩ ra dɩɩbo.
A Zezi leokame tɩ ka tɩlɛ tɩ nebã loog ye, bɩ bãmb mensã kõ-b rɩɩb tɩ b rɩ.
Karen-biisã leokame tɩ yaa bur a nu bal ne zĩm a yiib la bãmb tar be.
T'a Zezi yeel-b tɩ b tall rẽnda n wa-ne.
A Zezi kɩtame tɩ nebã zĩnd moodã zugu, la b reega bur a nu wã ne zĩm a yiibã n nak n ges yĩngri, n ning-b barka, n yaool n kao burã n kõ b karen-biisã tɩ b reeg n pʋɩ neb kʋʋngã.
Nebã fãa rɩɩme n tɩge, la b wʋka bur-kɛlã pet piig la a yiibu.
Neb nins sẽn dɩ wã sõor kolga raop tus a nu, pagbã ne kambã toog sẽn ka naage.
Rẽ poore, a Zezi modga b karen-biisã tɩ b kẽ koom-koglgã n deng bãmb taoor ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde, tɩ bãmb na n yõdg n kuilsa neb kʋʋngã.
A Zezi sẽn kuils nebã n sɛ, b rʋʋ tãnga, zĩig ned sẽn ka be n na n pʋʋse. La yʋng sẽn ta, bãmb dag n bee be b yembre.
Koom-koglgã da zoe n zãaga ne kʋɩl-koakã, la ko-pɛm da wẽed-a lame hal t'a lengdẽ, bala, sebgã da segda bãmba.
Tõd-beoog sẽn ta, a Zezi kẽna koomã zug n babsd-ba.
Bãmb karen-biisã sẽn yã bãmb tɩ b kẽnd ko-kãsengã zugu, b yɛɛsame n yeel tɩ yaa kɩɩma. La rabeemã yĩnga b kelmame.
Tao-tao bala a Zezi yeela bãmb tɩ b keng b sũyã la b ra zoe rabeem tɩ yaa bãmba.
La a Pɩyɛɛr leokame yaa: Zu-soaba, sã n sɩd yaa yãmb bɩ y yeel-m tɩ m kẽn koomã zug n wa yãmb nengẽ.
Bãmb yeela yẽnda t'a wa. A Pɩyɛɛr yii koom-koglgẽ wã n kẽn koomã zug n dabd a Zezi nengẽ.
La a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn yã tɩ sebgã yaa wʋsgo, rabeem yõka yẽnda. La yẽ sẽn sɩng n na n lisi, a kelmame n yeel tɩ Zu-soaba, fãag-y-ma.
Tao-tao bala, a Zezi tẽega b nug n gãd yẽnda n yeel-a: Tẽeb bilf soaba, yaa bõe tɩ fo yam yoaada?
Bãmb kẽe koom-koglgã pʋgẽ la sebgã yõkame.
Neb nins sẽn dag n be koom-koglgã pʋgẽ wã wõgemda a Zezi taoor n yeele: Yãmb sɩd yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
Bãmb dʋʋga ko-kãsengã n ta Genezarɛt tẽnga.
Zĩ-kãng nebã bãnga a Zezi, n tʋm neb tẽns nins sẽn pẽ wã fãa, la b talla bãad-dãmbã fãa n wa a Zezi nengẽ.
Bãad-dãmbã bõosa a Zezi tɩ b bas tɩ b sɩɩs bãmb fuugã noor bala. La neb nins fãa sẽn sɩɩsã paama laafɩ zãnga.
Dẽ, Fariisẽ-dãmb ne tõog karen-saam-dãmb yii Zeruzalɛm n wa a Zezi nengẽ n sok-b yaa:
Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb karen-biisã kɩɩsd kãsem-dãmbã miningu? Bala, bãmb sã n na n dɩ b ka nudgd b nus ye.
A Zezi leok-b lame yaa: La yãmba, bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb kɩɩsd Wẽnnaam tõogã y mensã mining sakr yĩnga?
Tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam yeelame tɩ: "Waoog f ba la f ma, la ned ning sẽn na n paoog a ba bɩ a ma, a sɩbgr na n yɩɩ kũum."
La yãmba, yãmb yetame tɩ ned ning sẽn na n yeel a ba bɩ a ma tɩ: "Kũun ninga mam sẽn da na n sõng yãmb ne-wã lebga Wẽnnaam dẽnda," ka tɩlɛ t'a waoog a ba wã bɩ a ma wã ye.
Woto, yãmb kɩtdame tɩ Wẽnnaam goamã lebg zaalem tɩ yãmb miningã reeg zĩiga.
Zãmb dãmba, a Ezayi sɩd togsa bãngr goam ne yãmb yell n yeele:
"Nin-kãensã waoogda maam ne nobɩmse, la b sũyã zãra ne maam.
Bãmb sẽn waoogd maamã yaa zaalem, bala, bãmb zãmsda nebã ninsaalb tõod bala."
La a Zezi boola neb kʋʋngã n yeel-b yaa: Kelg-y la y bãng tɩ
ka bũmb ning sẽn kẽed ninsaal noorẽ wã n maand-a t'a yɩ rẽgd ye. Bũmb ning sẽn yit ninsaal noorẽ wã, yaa rẽnda n maand-a t'a lebg rẽgdo.
Dẽ, bãmb karen-biisã kolgame n sok bãmb b sã n bãngame tɩ bãmb goamã zaba Fariisẽ-dãmbã.
A Zezi leokame n yeele: B na n võoga bõn-bɩtg ning fãa mam ba sẽn be arzãnã sẽn ka selã.
Bas-y-ba. Bãmb yaa zoens sẽn tat zoense. Zoang sã n tat zoanga, bãmb b yiibã fãa na n lʋɩɩ bokẽ.
A Pɩyɛɛr goma ne a Zezi n yeel-b tɩ b bilg bãmb yel-bũn-kãng võore.
La a Zezi yeela yẽnda yaa: Yãmb me yam ket n nan ka wek laa?
Yãmb ka mi tɩ bũmb nins fãa sẽn kẽed ninsaal noorẽ kẽeda pʋgẽ tɩ b yaool n tɩ bas-a we-kɛɛng laa?
La bũmb ning sẽn yit noorẽ yita sũurẽ, la yaa bõn-kãng n maand ned t'a yɩ rẽgdo.
Bala, tags-wẽnse, nin-kʋʋre, yoobo, yoob tʋʋmde, wagdem, zĩrĩ la kãnegr yita sũur pʋgẽ.
Ad yaa bõn-kãensã n maand ned t'a yɩ rẽgdo. La tɩ rɩ n ka nudg f nusi, yõwã ka maand ned t'a yɩ rẽgd ye.
A Zezi basa zĩ-kãng n loog n kẽng Tɩɩr ne Sɩdõ soolmẽ.
La gese, Kanaã pag sẽn yit tẽn-kãens zẽka a koɛɛg n yeel bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba! A David Bi-ribla! Zoe-y mam nimbãanega. Zĩn n namsd mam bi-pugl hal wʋsgo.
La bãmb ka leok yẽ tɩ bũmb ye. Bãmb karen-biisã kolgame n kos bãmb tɩ b rig-a t'a looge, bala a pʋgda bãmb n kelemdẽ.
A Zezi leokame tɩ b sẽn tʋm bãmbã, yaa Israyɛll pe-menemdsã nengẽ bala.
La pagã waame n wõgemd bãmb taoor n yeele: Zu-soaba, sõng-y-ma.
A Zezi leokame t'a ka sõama tɩ rɩk kamb rɩɩb n lob ba-bi ye.
La pagã leokame yaa: Zu-soaba, yaa sɩda, la baoosgo, ba-bi rɩta rɩ-zersã sẽn lʋɩt b zu-soben-dãmbã taabl tẽngrã.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-a lame: Paga, ad f tẽebã yaa kãsenga. Bɩ fo sẽn datã yɩ. La wakat kãng bala, a bi-puglã paama maagre.
A Zezi yii be n kẽng Galile ko-kãsengã noore. Bãmb dʋʋ tãngã n zĩnd be.
La neb wʋsg waa bãmb nengẽ ne wobse la zoense la mugsi la koms-rãmba la neb wʋsg bãas a taab sẽn tara, n zĩnig bãmb a Zezi taoore, la a Zezi maaga bãmba.
La neb kʋʋngã sẽn yã mugsã sẽn gomdã, la koms-rãmbã sẽn paam maagrã, la wobsã sẽn kẽnd sõama wã, la zoensã sẽn yãtã, b yɛɛsame n waoog Israyɛll Wẽnnaamã.

A Zezi boola b karen-biisã n yeele: Kʋʋn-kãngã nimbãaneg tara maam, bala, yaa rasem a tãab moasã b sẽn be ne maam, la b ka tar rɩɩb sẽn na rɩ ye. Mam ka rat n kuils-b ne kom tɩ b wa tek n tadg sorã zug ye.
Karen-biisã soka bãmb yaa: Tõnd na n maana a wãn n paam bur weoogẽ ka sẽn sekd tɩ nin-kãensã fãa rɩ n tɩge?
A Zezi sok-b lame tɩ b tara bur a wãna? Tɩ b leok t'a yopoe n paas zĩm-bõoneg bilfu.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela nebã tɩ b zĩnd tẽnga.
La bãmb deega bur a yopoe wã ne zĩmã. La b sẽn ning-a barka, b kaoome n kɩs b karen-biisã tɩ b pʋɩ neb kʋʋngã.
Neba fãa rɩɩme n tɩge, la b wʋka gɩrsã sẽn kellã tɩ pid peoog a yopoe.
Neb nins sẽn dɩ wã sõor yaa tus a naase, pagbã ne kambã sõor sẽn ka naag ye.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi kuilsa neb kʋʋngã la b kẽ koom-koglg n kẽng Magdala tẽnsẽ.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne Saduusẽ-dãmbã kolga a Zezi n kos tɩ b maan bãnd sẽn yit yĩngr tɩ b yã, la yaa sẽn na yɩl n paam n mak bãmba.
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Zaabre, yãmb yetame tɩ zĩigã na n yɩɩ vẽenega, bala yĩngr yaa miuugu.
La yibeoogo, yãmb yetame tɩ saag na n nii rũnna, bala yĩngr yaa miu-sablga. Yãmb mii yĩngr yɛl bilsgu, n yaool n ka tõe n bãng bãn sẽn wilgd wakatã yɛlã ye.
Zamaan neb sẽn ya wẽns la yoaadbã baooda bãnde. La b ka na n kõ bãmb bãnd a to tɩ ka a Zonaas bãndã ye. La a Zezi basa nebã n looge.
A Zezi karen-biisã sẽn wa n dabd ko-kãsengã rʋʋnd a to wã, b yĩmame n ka zɩ bur ye.
A Zezi yeela bãmb tɩ b gũus b mens neer ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã la Saduusẽ-dãmbã rã-bɩlle.
La b tagsame tɩ yaa bãmb sẽn ka zɩ burã yĩng la a Zezi gom woto.
La a Zezi bãnga b tagsgã n yeel-ba: Tẽeb bilf rãmba! Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb tagsd y sũyẽ tɩ yaa yãmb sẽn ka zɩ burã yĩnga?
Yãmb ket n nan ka wʋm laa? Yãmb ka tẽr bur a nu wã sẽn sek raop tus a nu wã, la a kɛlã yãmb sẽn wʋkã pet sõor laa?
Yãmb ka tẽr bur a yopoe wã sẽn sek raop tus a naase, la a kɛlã yãmb sẽn wʋkã pet sõore?
Bõe tɩ yãmb ka bãng tɩ ka bur yell la mam gomd ne yãmba? Gũus-y y mens ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã la Saduusẽ-dãmbã rã-bɩlle.
La karen-biisã bãngame tɩ b sẽn yeel bãmb tɩ b gũus ne bũmb ningã, ka rã-bɩll sẽn ningd burã ye, la yaa Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne Saduusẽ-dãmbã zãmsgã.
A Zezi sẽn ta Sezaare sẽn ya a Filip soolmã tẽngã, b soka b karen-biisã yaa: Nebã yetame tɩ maam a Ninsaal Bi-riblã yaa ãnna?
B leokame tɩ: Neb kẽer yetame tɩ yãmb yaa a Zãmbatiis, tɩ kẽer t'a Eli, tɩ kẽer t'a Zeremi wall Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã ned a yembre.
T'a Zezi leb n sok-ba: La yãmba, yãmb yetame tɩ mam yaa ãnna?
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr leokame n yeele: Yãmb yaa Kirist, Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ wã Bi-riblã
La Zezi goma ne-a n yeel-a: Sɩmo! A Zonaas biiga, bark bee fo zugu. Tɩ bõe, ka nemd walla zɩɩm n vẽneg foom ne bõn-kãngã ye. Yaa m ba sẽn be arzãnã.
La maam, mam yeta foom tɩ foo la a Pɩyɛɛre, la tɩ mam na n mee m roogã kug-kãngã zugu, la kɩɩm-kulg ka na n tõog-a ye.
Mam na n kõo foom arzãn soolem kʋɩlen-biisi: Bũmb nins fãa fo sẽn na n loe tẽng zug ka na n loee arzãna, la bũmb ning fãa fo sẽn na n lok tẽng zug ka na n loka arzãn me.
Dẽ, bãmb sagla b karen-biisã neere, n yeel-b tɩ b ra togs ned baa a yen tɩ bãmb yaa Kirist ye.

Sẽn sɩng wakat kãnga, a Zezi sɩngame n wilg b karen-biisã tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bãmb kẽng Zeruzalɛm tɩ kãsem-dãmbã ne maan-kʋʋdbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã nams bãmb wʋsgo, la b kʋ bãmba. La ra-yɩt-n-daare, bãmb na n vʋʋgame.
A Pɩyɛɛr boola bãmb n yi kɛɛng n leng-b n yeele: Zu-soaba, Wẽnd na gũ-yã! Yel-kãngã ka na n paam yãmb ye.
La a Zezi wẽnemdame n yeel a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Leb mam poorẽ, Sʋtãana! Fo yaa gɩdgr mam sor zugu. Bala fo tagsdã ka Wẽnnaam dẽnd ye, la yaa ninsaal dẽnda.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Ned sã n dat n tũ maam, bɩ a kɩɩs a meng raabo, n tʋk a ra-pɩk n pʋg maam.
Bala ned ning sẽn baood tɩ kogl a vɩɩm, a vɩɩm na sãame, la ned ning sẽn na n bas a vɩɩm mam yĩnga, a na paam-a.
La ned sã n paam dũni gill fãa n bas n ki, a yõod bee yɛ? Walla bõe la ninsaal na n dɩk n tek ne a yõorã?
Bala, Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n waa ne b ba wã ziiri, ne malegse. La rẽ wẽnde, bãmb na n dola ned kam fãa wa sẽn zems a tʋʋmde.
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ sẽn be-b ka wã, neb kẽer n ka na n ki hal tɩ b yãnd Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn wat ne b naamã.
Rasem a yoob zugẽ, a Zezi peega a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zak la a ba-biig a Zã n tall-b n yi kɛɛnga, n dʋ tãn-luglug zugu.
A Zezi tedga bãmb nifẽ. B nengã ra yãgda wa wĩntoogo, la b futã lebga peels wa vẽenem.
A Moyiis ne a Eli puka b mens ne bãmba n sõsd ne a Zezi.
A Pɩyɛɛr gomame n yeel a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba! Yaa sõama tɩ tõnd pa ka. Yãmb sã n data, mam na n tilga fu-rot a tãab ka: a yembr yãmb yĩnga, a yembr a Moyiis yĩnga, la a yembr a Eli yĩnga.
La yẽ sẽn ket n gomda, sawadg sẽn pɩnd wa n gũbga bãmba. La ade, koɛɛg yii sawadgẽ wã n yeele: Ada yaa mam Bi-ribl-nongr sẽn ta mam yam zãnga. Kelg-y-yã-a.
La karen-biisã sẽn wʋm koe-kãngã, rabeem kãseng yõk-b lame tɩ b lʋɩ n fõgen b nens tẽnga.
La a Zezi kolgame n sɩɩs bãmb n yeel-b tɩ b yik la b ra zoe dabeem ye.
Bãmb zẽka b nens n ges la b ka yã ned a to tɩ sã n ka a Zezi b yen bala.
La bãmb sẽn wa n yi tãngã zug n sigda, a Zezi keooga bãmb a woto: Da gom-y ne ned ba a yembr yã-kãngã yell hal tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã wa vʋʋg n bas kũum ye.
La karen-biisã soka a Zezi tɩ yaa bõe yĩng tɩ tõog karen-saam-dãmbã yetẽ t'a Eli n tog n deng n wa?
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Yaa sɩd t'a Eli na n deng n waa n lebs n manega bũmb fãa tɩ leb n yɩ wa pĩndã.
La mam yeta yãmb t'a Eli zoe n waame la neba ka bãng-a ye, la b maana yẽ wa b sẽn date. Woto me, bãmb na n namsa Ninsaal Bi-riblã.
Dẽ, bãmb karen-biisã bãngame tɩ yaa a Zãmbatiis yell la a Zezi sẽn gom ne bãmbã.
Bãmb sẽn kolg neb kʋʋngã, dao a yembr waa n yĩgimda a Zezi taoor n yeele:
Zu-soaba, zoe-y mam bi-riblã nimbãaneg tɩ kisĩnkĩir n tar-a t'a namsd wʋsgo. Naoor wʋsgo, a lʋɩta bugmẽ wall koomẽ.
Mam tall-a lame n wa yãmb karen-biisã nengẽ la b ka tõog n maag-a ye.
A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Zamaan neb sẽn ka tẽeb la sẽn ya nin-wẽnse! Mam na n bee ne yãmb hal tɩ ta wakat bʋgo? Mam na n maana sũ-mar ne yãmb tɩ ta wakat bʋgo? Tall-y biigã n wa-ne ka.
A Zezi lenga zĩna, la a yiime n bas biigã, la a paama laafɩ wakat kãng bala.
Dẽ, a Zezi karen-biisã kolga bãmb wakat neb sẽn ka be ne bãmba n sok-b yaa: Bõe tɩ tõnd ka tõog n dig zĩn-kãngã?

A Zezi yeela bãmba: Yaa yãmb tẽebã sẽn paoodã yĩnga. Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ yãmb sã n tar tẽeb sẽn zem siin-bila, yãmb na n yeela tãn-kãngã t'a serg ka n kẽng ka, la a na n kẽngame. La bũmb kõn zĩnd yãmb sẽn kõn tõog n maan ye.
La zĩn-kãngã buud ka yita, tɩ ka ne pʋʋsg la no-loeer ye.
La bãmb sẽn gõod Galile, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: B na n zãmba Ninsaal Bi-riblã n yõk n kõ ninsaalbã.
B na n kʋʋ-b lame, la ra-yɩt-n-daare, b na n vʋʋgame. La karen-biisã sũyã sãama wʋsgo.
A Zezi ne b karen-biisã sẽn ta Kapɛrnawom, neb nins sẽn deegd wẽnd-doog yaood darkem a yiib-yiibã kolga a Pɩyɛɛr n sok-a bãmb karen-saambã sã n ka yaood wẽnd-doogã yaoodã.

La a Pɩyɛɛr leokame tɩ b yaoodame sẽ! La bãmb sẽn kẽ roogẽ, a Zezi renga a Pɩyɛɛr n gom n sok-a: Sɩmo! Fo tagsda a wãna? Dũni rĩm-dãmba deegda yaood la yõor yaood ãnna rãmb nengẽ? B kamba nengẽ bii, bɩ sãambã nengẽ?
La a leoka bãmb tɩ yaa sãambã nengẽ. La a Zezi leoka yẽnda yaa: Sã n ya a woto, rẽnd tẽngã kamb ka tog n yao ye.

La sẽn na yɩl tɩ tõnd da beeg-ba, kẽng ko-kãsengã noore, n lob zĩm-lɛoog n yõk zĩif ning sẽn na n yɩ-a pipi n gãd lɛoogã. Yaag a noorã tɩ f na n yãa ligd beene n yiis n wa n yao maam ne fo yĩnga.
Wakat kãnga, a Zezi karen-biisã kolga bãmb n sok tɩ ãnna n ya kãseng n yɩɩd arzãn soolem pʋgẽ?
La a Zezi boola bi-bilf n yals bãmb sʋk n yeele:
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb sã n ka tek yam n lebg wa kom-bõonego, yãmb kõn kẽ arzãn soolmẽ ye.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn na n sik a meng n yɩ wa bi-kãngã, yẽnda n na n yɩ kãseng n yɩɩd arzãn soolmẽ.
La ned ning fãa sẽn na n deeg bi-bilf a woto mam yʋʋr yĩnga, yaa mam mengã la a reegda.
La ned sã n maan kom-bõon-kãensã sẽn tẽed maamã ned a yembr t'a lʋɩ, b sã n loe a soabã kokor ne neer kugr n lob-a ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ n ket n são a yĩnga.
Bũmb nins sẽn wat ne lʋɩɩsã na n kɩtame tɩ toog paam dũni wã. Tɩ bõe, bũmb nins sẽn wat ne lʋɩɩsã ka tõe n ka wa ye. La ned ning sẽn na n waa-a ne-bã na paam toogo.

Fo nug bɩ f naoor sã n wat ne fo lʋɩɩse, fiuus-b n lob yɩɩga. Fo sã n ya nug-yend wall kar-yend n paam vɩɩmã n são fo sẽn na n tall f nao a yiibã bɩ f nus a yiibã tɩ b lob foom bugum sẽn ka kiidã pʋgẽ.
La fo nif sã n wat ne fo lʋɩɩse, bɩ f feoog-a n lob yɩɩga. Fo sã n yɩ nin-feoog n paam vɩɩm n são fo sẽn na n tall f nin a yiibã tɩ b lob foom bug-tẽngã bugum pʋgẽ.
Gũus-y n da paoog-y kom-kãensã ned ba a yembr ye. Tɩ bõe, mam yeta yãmb tɩ bãmb malegsã sẽn be arzãnã geta mam ba sẽn be arzãnã neng daar fãa.
Bala Ninsaal Bi-riblã waame tɩ fãag bũmb nins fãa sẽn menemã.
Yãmb tagsda a wãna? Ned sã n tar piis koabga, t'a yen bãmb sʋkã meneme, a ka na n bas pis-wɛ la a wɛ wã sẽn ketã kũnkubã zut n tɩ bao sẽn menemã wã sɩda?
La a sã n tõog n yãnd-a, sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb t'a maanda sũ-noog pe-kãng yĩng n yɩɩd pis-wɛ la a wɛ wã sẽn ka menemã.
Woto me, yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã ka rat tɩ kom-kãensã ned ba a yembr menem ye.
Fo ba-biig sã n maan yel-wẽnde, kẽng n tɩ yã-a, foo ne yẽnda bala n wilg-a a kongrã. A sã n kelg foom, fo paama f ba-biiga.
La a sã n ka kelg foom, bɩ f peeg ned a yen bɩ neb a yiib n kẽnge, "tɩ yellã fãa tõe n paam manegr kaset dãmb a yiib bɩ a tãab taoore," wa Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yetã.
La a sã n tõdg n ka kelg-ba, togs yellã tẽedbã sʋka. La a sã n tõdg n ka kelg wẽnd-doogã, bɩ f ges a soabã wa ned sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaam la a wa yaood-dɛɛgda.
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ bũmb ning fãa yãmb sẽn na n loe tẽng zug ka na n loee arzãna, la bũmb ning fãa yãmb sẽn na n lok tẽng zug ka na lok arzãna.
Mam leb n yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb neb a yiib sã n lagem taab noor a yembr tẽng zug n kos bũmbu, ba sẽn ya bũmb ninga, mam ba sẽn be arzãnã na kõ-a bãmba.
Tɩ bõe, zĩig ning neb a yiib bɩ a tãab sẽn tigim taab ne mam yʋʋre, mam bee bãmb sʋka.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr kolgame n sok a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba! Naoor a wãn la m ba-biig na n beeg maam tɩ mam kõ-a sugri? Hal tɩ ta naoor a yopoe?
A Zezi yeela yẽnda yaa: Mam ka yet foom tɩ hal tɩ ta naoor a yopoe ye, la yaa hal tɩ ta naoor pis-yopoe naoor a yopoe.
Yaa woto yĩnga, arzãn soolem yaa wa rĩm a yen sẽn dat t'a tʋmtʋmdbã wilg-a b tʋʋmã yɛla.
La a sẽn sɩng n geendẽ, b waa ne tʋmtʋmd a yembr sẽn tar a zu-soabã samd talã tus-piiga.
Daowã sẽn ka tar n na n yao wã yĩnga, a soaalã yeelame tɩ b koos-a ne a pagã la a kambã, la bũmb nins fãa a sẽn tarã n wa n yao a sãmdã.
Tʋmtʋmdã wõgemda yẽ taoore, n wẽ kãntɩɩg n yeele: "Maan-y sũ-mar ne maam tɩ m na n yaoo y samdã zãnga."
Tʋmtʋmdã nimbãaneg yõka a zu-soabã t'a bas a samdã taale, n bas-a t'a looge. b
La tʋmtʋmd kãng sẽn yi, a sega a tʋmd-n-taag a yembr sẽn tar yẽ samd deniye koabga. Yẽ yõka yẽnda n sog a kokoɛy n yeel-a: "Yao maam m samdã."
La a tʋmd-n-taagã wõgemda yẽ taoor n bõos-a n yeel-a t'a maan sũ-mar ne-a t'a na n yao-a-la a sãmdã.
La a ka sak ye, n kẽng ne-a n tɩ sui bi-bees roogẽ hal t'a na yao a samdã n sa.
La a tũud-n-taasã sẽn yã bũmb ning a sẽn maanã, b sũyã sãama hal wʋsgo, la b kẽngame n tɩ togs b zu-soabã bũmb nins fãa sẽn maanã.
Dẽ, a zu-soabã kɩtame tɩ b bool yẽnda t'a yeel-a: Tʋmtʋmd-wẽnga! Mam da basa fo samdã fãa taale fo sẽn bõos maamã yĩnga.
Dẽ, fo da ka tog n zoe f tʋmd-n-taagã nimbãaneg wa mam sẽn zoe fo nimbãanegã sɩda?
A zu-soabã sũur yĩigame t'a ning-a bi-bees gũudbã nusẽ tɩ b nams-a hal t'a wa n yao a samdã zãnga.
Mam ba sẽn be arzãnã na n maana yãmb a woto me, yãmb ned kam fãa sã n ka kõ a ba-biig sugri ne a sũur fãa.
La a Zezi sẽn gom gom-kãens n sɛ, b yii Galile n kẽng Zude soolem sẽn be Zʋrdẽ rʋʋndã.
Neb kʋʋng wʋsg tũu bãmba, la a Zezi maag-b-la beene.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã kolg n soka a Zezi, sẽn na yɩlg n bẽd bãmb n yeele: Dẽ yĩnga, tõog kõta noor tɩ rao dig a paga a beegr buud fãa yĩnga?
La a Zezi leokame n yeele: Yãmb nan ka karem tɩ hal sɩngr wẽndẽ, Naandã "naan-b-la rao ne paga,"
la b yeel tɩ "yaa woto yĩng tɩ rao na n bas a ba ne a ma n zĩnd ne a paga, la bãmb b yiiba na n lebga yĩng a yembr laa?"
Woto, b ka leb n ya neb a yiib ye, b lebga yĩng a yembre. Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ ninsaal da welg bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn lagem ne taabã ye.
Bãmb soka a Zezi tɩ la yaa bõe yĩng la a Moyiis yeel tɩ b kõ pagã baosg sebr la b rig-a?
A Zezi leoka bãmba: Yaa yãmb sũyã sẽn ya kegemsã yĩng n kɩt t'a Moyiis kõ yãmb noor tɩ y rig y pagbã. La hal sɩngr wẽndẽ, rag n ka a woto ye.
La mam yeta yãmb tɩ ned sã n dig a paga, tɩ sã n ka yoob yĩnga, n dɩk a to, a maanda yoobo.
Bãmb karen-biisã yeela bãmb yaa: Rao ne pag yellã sã n ya a woto, dall f sã n ka kẽ kãadem n são.
A Zezi leok-b lame yaa: Nebã fãa ka wʋmd gom-kãngã võor ye, sã n ka b sẽn kõ b rãmb pãn-tõog tɩ wʋmã bala.

Tɩ bõe, zu-soben-dãmb n be n ya a woto hal b rogem wakate, la kẽer yaa neb n maan-b tɩ b lebg a woto, la kẽer maana b mens zu-soben-dãmb arzãn soolmã yĩnga. Ned ning sẽn tõe n wʋm-a koe-kãngã bɩ a wʋme.
Dẽ, neb talla kom-bõoneg n wa a Zezi nengẽ tɩ b na tik-b ne b nus n pʋʋs b yĩnga. La karen-biisã lenga bãmba.
La a Zezi yeelame: Bas-y kom-bõonegã, ra gɩdg-b tɩ b ra wa mam nengẽ ye. Bala, arzãn soolem yaa neb nins sẽn wẽnd bãmbã yĩnga.
A Zezi tika kambã ne b nusi, n yaool n yi zĩ-kãnga.
Dẽ, dao a yen kolg n soka a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, bõe n ya sõama mam sẽn tog n maane, n tõog n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã?
A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Yaa bõe tɩ fo sokd maam n dat n bãng sẽn ya sõama? Ned a yen bal n ya sõama. Fo sã n dat n kẽ vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã pʋgẽ, bɩ f sak tõodã.
A soka a Zezi tɩ tõ-bʋse? La a Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: "Da kʋ ye, da yo ye, da zu ye, da kɩs kaset-zĩrĩ ye,
waoog f ba la f ma, la f nong f to wa f menga."
Bi-bɩɩgã yeela a Zezi tɩ yẽ saka tõ-kãens fãa, la a sokame tɩ bõe n ket n paoog yẽnda?
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Fo sã n dat n zems zãnga, kẽng n tɩ koos fo sẽn tarã, n dɩk ligdã n kõ naong rãmba, la fo na paam paoong arzãn pʋga. La f wa n tũ maam.
Bi-bɩɩgã sẽn wʋm gom-kãensã, a looga ne nen-gãnenga, bala, a ra tara arzegs wʋsgo.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb t'a yaa toog tɩ arzɛk soab kẽ arzãn soolmẽ.
Mam leb n yeta yãmb tɩ yʋgemd sẽn na n tũ fu-pĩim yõorẽ n yi yaa naana n yɩɩd arzɛk soab sẽn na n kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ.
Karen-biisã sẽn wʋm gom kãense, a linga bãmb wʋsgo, tɩ b sok tɩ rẽ wã, ãnna n tõe n paam fãagre?
A Zezi ges-b lame n yeel-ba: Ne ninsaala bõn-kãng ka tõe ye, la Wẽnnaam tõe bũmb fãa.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr goma ne a Zezi n yeele: Tõnd yell na n yɩɩ a wãn-wãna?

A Zezi leoka bãmb tɩ yaa: Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ bũmb fãa manegr wakat sã n ta, Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n zaoonda b naamã geer zugu, la yãmb me sẽn tũ maamã, y na n zĩnda gɛy piig la a yiib zut n kao Israyɛll buud piig la a yiibã bʋʋdo.

La ned ning fãa sẽn na n bas a yiya, a ba-bi-raopa, a ba-bi-pogse, a ba, a ma, a paga, a kamba wall a pʋʋg mam yʋʋrã yĩnga, a na n deega wʋsgo, n yɩɩd bũmb nins a sẽn basã la a na n paama vɩɩm sẽn kõn sɛ wã tɩ yɩ a dogem pʋɩɩre.
Taoor dãmb wʋsg n na n lebg poorẽ dãmba, tɩ poorẽ dãmb wʋsg lebg taoor dãmba.
Tɩ bõe, arzãn soolem wẽnda wa yir soab sẽn yi yibeoog pĩnd n na n rɩgs tʋmtʋmdb tɩ b tɩ tʋm a nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ.
B sara taab tɩ daar a yen tʋʋmd na n yɩɩ deniye a yembre, t'a kɩt tɩ b kẽng a nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ wã.
A yii sõ-bɩɩmd wakate, n yã neb sẽn be raagẽ wã n ka maand bũmb ye,
n yeel-b tɩ b kẽng n tɩ tʋm yẽ nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ wã, t'a na n kõ-b-la yaood sẽn zemse.
Nin-kãens kẽngame. A leb n yii wĩnto-sʋka, la wẽn-kaoore n leb n maan a woto bala.
Wĩndg sẽn dabd lʋɩɩse, a leb n yiime n yã neb sẽn yas be, n sok-b tɩ yaa bõe tɩ b be be daarã tõr n ka maand bũmbu?
B leokame tɩ yaa ned ba a yen sẽn ka rɩk bãmb tʋʋmdã. A yeel-b lame tɩ bãmb me kẽng yẽ nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ wã.
Zĩ-sobd sẽn ta, nasaar sib pʋʋgã soab yeela ned ning sẽn get-a yẽ tʋʋma yellã t'a bool tʋmtʋmdbã n yao ned kam fãa, n sɩng ne yaoolem dãmbã n tɩ baas ne dẽenem dãmbã.
Neb nins sẽn wa wĩndgã lʋɩɩs wakatã waame tɩ b kõ ned fãa deniye a yembre.
Dẽenem dãmbã n yaool waoongo, n tẽed tɩ bãmb na n deeg n yɩɩda neb a taabã. La b kõo bãmb ned fãa deniye a yembre.
B sẽn deeg deniye a yen-yen wã, b yẽgma ne yirã soab n yeele:
Sẽn wa-b yaoolmã tʋma lɛɛr a yen tãa, tɩ tõnd tʋm daarã tõr ne wĩndgã n ya, tɩ yãmb kõ bãmb bũmb a yen ne tõndo.
La a leoka bãmb ned a yembr a woto: "M zoa, mam ka maan foom sẽn ka tɩrg ye. Tõnd ka sar taab deniye a yembr tɩ fo sak sɩda?
Rẽ wã, deeg f ligd n looge. Maam n dat n kõ yaoolem soabã n zeng fo rẽndã.
Dẽ yĩnga, mam ka noor tɩ maan m sẽn dat ne m sẽn so laa? Bɩ fo getame tɩ mam maan-neerã ka sõama?
Woto, yaoolem dãmbã na n yɩɩ dẽenem dãmba, tɩ dẽenem dãmbã yɩ yaoolem dãmba.
La a Zezi sẽn dabd Zeruzalɛm, b peega b karen-biis piig la a yiibã toore, la b yeela bãmb sorã zug yaa:
Ges-y-yã! Tõnd dabda Zeruzalɛm, la b na n yõka Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kõ maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã, la b na n kaoo bãmb bʋʋd tɩ yɩ kũum.
La b na n ninga bãmb bu-zẽms nusẽ tɩ b yaal bãmba, la b pãb-b ne kalwaase, la b ka-b da-pɩk zugu. La rasem a tãab daare, b na n vʋʋgame.
Dẽ, a Zebde kom-dibli wã ma waa a Zezi nengẽ ne a kom-dibli wã n yĩgimd bãmb taoor n na n bõos bãmba.
Bãmb soka yẽ t'a rata bõe? La a yeela bãmb yaa: Kõ-y noor tɩ mam kom-dibl kãens a yiibã zĩnd ne yãmb y soolmã pʋgẽ, a yembr y dɩtgo, a to wã y goabga.
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Yãmb ka mi yãmb sẽn kot maam bũmb ningã ye. Dẽ yĩnga, yãmb tõe n yũu bõn-yũudl ning mam sẽn na n yũ wã? La b leokame tɩ b tõeeme.

La a Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Yaa sɩd tɩ yãmb na n yũu bõn-yũudl ning mam sẽn na n yũ wã. La a ka be ne maam tɩ kõ noor tɩ ned zĩnd mam dɩtgo wall mam goabg ye. M sã n na n kõ me, yaa neb nins mam ba sẽn segl zĩ-kãens b yĩngã.
Karen-biis piigã sẽn wʋm woto, b sũyã sãama ne ba-biis a yiibã.
A Zezi boola bãmb n yeele: Yãmb miime tɩ soolem nanams maanda b nebã pãnga, la tɩ nin-kãsemsã yabenda nebã ne pãnga.
La a kõn yɩ a woto yãmb sʋk ye. La ned ning fãa sẽn dat n yɩ yãmb sʋkã nin-kãsenga, bɩ a yɩ yãmb sõangda.
La ned ning fãa sẽn dat n yɩ yãmb taoor soaba, bɩ a yɩ yãmb yamba.
Yaa woto yĩng la Ninsaal Bi-riblã wayã. Ka tɩ nebã na sõng bãmb ye, la yaa tɩ sõng nebã, la tɩ kõ b vɩɩm, n yao n fãag neb wʋsgo.
La bãmb sẽn yi Zeriko, neb kʋʋng wʋsg tũu a Zezi.
La zoens a yiib sẽn zĩ sorã noor wʋmame t'a Zezi n loogda, la b zẽka b koees n yeele: Zu-soaba! A David Bi-ribla! Zoe-y tõnd nimbãanega.
Neb kʋʋngã lenga bãmb n yeel-b tɩ b sĩndi. La b zẽka b koɛɛg n yɩɩd pĩnd n yeele: Zu-soaba! David Bi-ribla! Zoe-y tõnd nimbãanega.
A Zezi yalsame n bool-ba, n sok-b b sẽn dat tɩ bãmb maan bũmb ning n kõ-ba.
La b yeelame: Zu-soaba, d data d ninã pukri.
La a Zezi zoee bãmb nimbãanega, n sɩɩs b ninã. La tao-tao bala b ninã pukame, la bãmb tũu a Zezi.
Bãmb sẽn kolg Zeruzalɛm n ta Bɛtfaaze sẽn be oliiv tɩɩs tãngã sẽne, a Zezi tʋma b karen-biis a yiib
n yeel-b yaa: Kẽng-y tẽng ning sẽn be yãmb taoorã. Yãmb sã n kẽ be bala, y na n yãnda bõn-yãang sẽn loe tɩ bõn-bil be ne-a. Lok-y-b n wa n kõ maam.
Ned sã n yeel tɩ bũmb bɩ y leok tɩ yaa Zu-soabã n dat-ba, la wakat kãnga, a na n bas-b lame tɩ b looge.
Mik bõn-kãng maaname tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã sẽn gomã paam pidsgu:
Yeel-y Siyõ nebã yaa: Ges-y-yã! Yãmb Rĩmã zaoo bõn-yãanga, bõn-bila, rũng b sẽn zombd biiga, n wat yãmb nengẽ ne sũ-bʋgsem wʋsgo.
Karen-biisã kẽngame n tɩ maan wa a Zezi sẽn yeel bãmbã.
Bãmb talla bõn-yãangã ne bõn-bilã n wa, n paal b fut bõensã poɛy t'a Zezi zombe.
Sẽn kolg neb kʋʋngã fãa yɛɛda b fut sorã zugu, tɩ kẽer kɛ tɩɩs vãad n gãneg sorã zugu.
