Neb nins sẽn da be a Zezi taoorã ne neb nins sẽn pʋgd-b bãmbã dag n kelemdame n yetẽ yaa: Hozaana a David Bi-ribla! Bark bee ned ning sẽn wat ne Zu-soabã yʋʋrã zugu! Hozaana hal saasẽ.
A Zezi sẽn kẽ Zeruzalɛm, tẽngã fãa rãmbame tɩ b sokdẽ tɩ yaa yɛ ned la woto?
Kʋʋngã rag n leokdame tɩ yaa a Zezi, Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs sẽn yit Galile Nazarɛt.
A Zezi kẽe wẽnd-doogã zakẽ n dig neb nins fãa sẽn dag n koosd la b raad wẽnd-doogã zakẽ wã. Bãmb leeba ligd tekdbã taabl dãmba la wall-koaasdbã goeelse.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: A gʋlsame tɩ "b na n boola mam roogã tɩ pʋʋsg roogo." La yãmba, yãmb maan-a lame t'a lebg wagda geongo.
Zoens la wobs kolga a Zezi wẽnd-doogẽ wã, la a Zezi maag-b lame.

Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã sẽn yã bõn-yɛɛsds nins a Zezi sẽn maanã, la kambã sẽn kaasd Wẽnnaam doogẽ wã n yetẽ tɩ "hozaana a David Bi-riblã," b sũyã sãamame.

La bãmb soka a Zezi b sã n wʋmda kambã sẽn yetã. A Zezi leoka bãmb tɩ n-ye, n sok-b b sã n nan ka karem gom-kãensã sẽn yet tɩ yãmb paama pẽgr sẽn yit kom-bõoneg la kamb sẽn ket n yẽsemd noyẽ laa?
A Zezi basa bãmb be n yi tẽngã n kẽng Betani n tɩ pa be yʋʋn-kãnga.
La yibeoogo, a Zezi sẽn leb n lebd Zeruzalɛm, kom da tara bãmba.
La bãmb yãa kankang sẽn yas sorã noore. Bãmb kẽngame n tɩ mik t'a ka tar biis ye, yaa vãad bala. La b yeel-a lame yaa: Fo kõn leb n wom biis ye, abada. La wakat kãng bala kankangã kʋɩɩme.
La karen-biisã sẽn yã woto, a linga bãmba, tɩ b sok tɩ kankangã yɩɩ wãn n kʋɩ zĩig pʋgẽ a woto?

A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ yãmb sã n tar tẽeb n ka sãmbdẽ, yãmb na n maana bũmb ning sẽn maan kankangã, la ka rẽ bal ye. Yãmb sã n yeel tãn-kãngã t'a yik a sẽn beẽ wã n kẽ ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ, a na n yɩɩ a woto bala.
Yãmb na n paama bũmb ning fãa y sẽn na n pʋʋs n kos ne tẽebo.

A Zezi kẽe wẽnd-doogẽ wã, la b sẽn zãmsd nebã wakate, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tẽngã nin-kẽemb waa n soka bãmb tɩ yaa ne no-bʋg la bãmb maand bõn-kãngã, la ãnna n kõ bãmb no-kãnga?
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Mam me na n soka yãmb sokr a yembre. Yãmb sã n leok maam, mam na togs yãmb mam sẽn paam noorã zĩig ning n maand bõn-kãnga.
A Zã lisgã yii yɛ? Arzãn bii, bɩ ninsaalb nengẽ? La b yẽsa ne taab n yeele: Tõnd sã n leok t'a yii arzãna, b na n yeelame tɩ la yaa bõe tɩ tõnd ka tẽ bãmba?
La tõnd sã n leok t'a yii ninsaalb nengẽ, d tog n zoee neb kʋʋngã: Bala b fãa tẽedame t'a Zã yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
Dẽ, b leoka a Zezi tɩ b ka mi ye. T'a Zezi lebs n leok-b tɩ bãmb me ka na n togs-b bãmb sẽn paam noorã zĩig ning n maand bõn-kãnga wã ye.
Yãmb tagsg yaa a wãna? Dao a yen n dag n tar a kom-dibli a yiibu. Yẽ goma ne pipi soabã n yeel-a: "M biiga, kẽng n tɩ tʋm m nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ wã rũnna."
La a leokame t'a ka na n kẽng ye. La yẽ teka yam n kẽnge.
Ba wã goma ne yiib-n-soabã n yeel yẽnda me a woto bala. La bi-kãng leokame n yeele: "M baaba, mam na n kẽngame." La a yaool n ka kẽng ye.

Bãmb b yiibã sʋka, bʋg n maan a ba wã raabo? La bãmb leokame tɩ yaa pipi soabã. La a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ yaood-dɛɛgdbã ne pʋg-yoaadbã na n denga yãmb Wẽnnaam soolmã pʋgẽ.
Bala, a Zã waa yãmb nengẽ n wilg yãmb tɩrlem sore, la yãmb ka tẽ yẽnda ye. La yaood-dɛɛgdbã ne pʋg-yoaadbã tẽe yẽnda. La baa ne yãmb sẽn yã bõn-kãngã, yãmb yam ka tek tɩ y tẽ-a ye.
Kelg-y yel-bũnd a to. Yir soab a yembr n dag n sel nasaar sib pʋʋgo, n wẽ yãgr n gũbg-a, la a tuk vẽ wẽkr bok a pʋgẽ, la me gãosgo, n dɩk-a n peng nasaar sib koaadba, la a yi n tog sore.
Nasaar sibã yãgsg wakat sẽn kolge, yẽ tʋma a tʋmtʋmdb nasaar sib koaadbã nengẽ tɩ b tɩ reeg nasaar sibã.
La nasaar sib koaadbã yõga tʋmtʋmdbã n pãb a yembre, n kʋ a yembre la b lob a tãab soabã ne kuga.
Yẽ leb n tʋma tʋmtʋmdb a taaba, sõor sẽn yɩɩd pĩnd dãmbã, la b maana bãmb me a woto.
A yaool n tʋma a bi-ribl bãmb nengẽ n tẽed tɩ b na n waoog-a lame.
La nasaar sib koaadbã sẽn yãnd biigã, b yẽsa ne taab a woto: Yaa yõwã n na n soog a ba wã paoongã fãa. Wa-y tɩ d kʋ-a tɩ paoongã lebg tõnd tẽnda.
La bãmb yõka biigã n yiis nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ wã n kʋ.
Moasã, nasaar sib pʋʋgã soab sã n wa, a na n maana koaadb kãens bõe?
Bãmb leoka a Zezi yaa: A na n kɩtame tɩ nin-wẽns kãens ki nimbãan-kũum, la a rɩk pʋʋgã n peng koaadb a taab sẽn na kõ yẽ nasaar sibã a bɩʋʋng wakate.

A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Yãmb nan ka karem gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yetã laa? "Kugr ning tãn-metbã sẽn zãgsã, a lebga roogã pãng kugri, a soakã zĩig kugri. Yaa Zu-soabã n kɩt t'a lebg a woto, la a yaa bõn-kãseng tõnd nifẽ."
Yaa woto yĩnga mam yeta yãmb tɩ b na n deega Wẽnnaam soolmã yãmb nugẽ n kõ buud a to sẽn na wom soolmã biisi.
Ned ning sẽn na n lʋɩ kug-kãngã zug na n tõtmame. La kug-kãngã sẽn na n lʋɩ ned ning zugu, a na n beds-a lame.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn wʋm yel-bũndã, b bãngame tɩ yaa bãmb yell la a Zezi da gomda.
Bãmb baoome n dat n yõk a Zezi la b rag n zoeta nebã, tɩ bõe, nebã tẽedame t'a Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
A Zezi leb n wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd n yeele:
Arzãn soolem yaa wa rĩm sẽn maan pʋg-peegr kibs a bi-ribl yĩnga.
Yẽ tʋma a tʋmtʋmdb tɩ b tɩ yeel neb nins yẽ sẽn dag n boolã tɩ b wa, la b da ka rat n wa ye.

Yẽ leb n tʋma tʋmtʋmdb a taab n yeel-b tɩ b tɩ yeel neb nins yẽ sẽn dag n boolã tɩ yaa: "Mam segla kibsã rɩɩb n sa, mam kʋʋ m niigi la m rũm-nobdse, bũmba fãa seglame n sa. Wa-y pʋg-peegr kibsã."
La b sẽn ka nand boollã yĩnga, b loogame. A yen kẽnga a pʋʋgẽ, t'a to wã kẽng a koosmẽ.
La neb a taabã yõga tʋmtʋmdbã n maan-b wẽnga, n kʋ-ba.
Rĩmã sũur yikame t'a tʋm a tãb-biisã tɩ b tɩ sãam nin-kʋʋdb kãense, la b yõog b tẽngã bugum.
Dẽ, a yeela a tʋmtʋmdbã yaa: "Pʋg-peegrã kibs seglame n sa. La neb nins mam sẽn boolã dag n ka zems tɩ rɩ-a ye.
Woto wã, kẽng-y so-tiisẽ wã n bool neb nins fãa yãmb sẽn na yã tɩ b wa."
Tʋmtʋmdbã saa soayã n tigs neb nins fãa b sẽn yã, nin-wẽns la nin-sõamy, hal tɩ kibsã roog pid ne neba.
Rĩmã kẽeme n na n ges nebã sẽn paam boolgã, la a yãa rao a yembr be sẽn ka yer pʋg-peegrã kibs fuug ye.
A yeel-a lame: "M zoa, fo maana a wãn n wa n kẽ ka n ka yeelg pʋg-peegrã kibs fuugu?" La raowã ka tõog n leok tɩ bũmb ye.
Dẽ, rĩmã yeela tʋmtʋmdbã yaa: "Sẽb-y-yã a naowã ne a nusã, n lob-a lik bida sẽn be yɩngã pʋgẽ. Yãbr la yẽn wãbr na n zĩnda be."
Bala, b sẽn bool b rãmbã yaa kʋʋng wʋsgo, la neb nins b sẽn tũusã sõor paoodame.
Dẽ, Fariisẽ-dãmbã kẽng n tɩ yẽsa ne taaba n na n bao sor ning b sẽn na n maan n bẽd a Zezi ne b mengã noor goam n yõke.

Bãmb tʋma b karen-biis kẽer ne Herood poorẽ dãmb a Zezi nengẽ. Bãmb yeela a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, tõnd miime tɩ yãmb yaa sɩd soaba, la yãmb zãmsda nebã Wẽnnaam soayã ne sɩd n ka zoet ned ye. Bala yãmb ka get ninsaalbã sẽn ya to-to wã ye.
Togs-y-do. Ne yãmb tagsgo, noor beeme tɩ yao Sezaar yõor yaoodo?
La a Zezi sẽn mi bãmb sɩlmã, b yeel-b lame yaa: Zãmb dãmba, bõe tɩ y bẽt maam?
Wilg-y maam ligd ning yãmb sẽn tar n yaood yõor yaoodã. La b wilga bãmb deniye a yembre.
La a Zezi soka bãmb tɩ maasmã ne gʋlsmã sẽn be lagfã zugã yaa ãnna dẽnda?
La b leokame tɩ yaa Sezaar dẽnda. Dẽ a Zezi yeela bãmb woto: Sã n ya woto, bɩ y lebs Sezaar bũmb ning sẽn ya Sezaar dẽnda, la y lebs Wẽnnaam bũmb ning sẽn ya Wẽnnaam dẽnda.
Gom-kãens yɛɛsa bãmba, la b basa a Zezi n looge.
Badaar bala, Saduusẽ-dãmbã, sẽn yet-b tɩ kũum vʋʋgr ka be wã kolga a Zezi n sok-b sok-kãnga:
Karen-saamba, a Moyiis yeelame "tɩ ned sã n ki n ka bas biiga, a ba-biig na n deega pʋgkõorã n dog kamb a ba-biigã yĩnga."
La ba-biis a yopoe n dag n be tõnd sʋka. Kãsmã peega paga, la a kiime. La a sẽn ka paam biig yĩnga, a basa a pagã ne a yaowã.
Yiib soabã me yɩɩ a woto, tɩ ta tãab soabã, hal tɩ ta b yopoe wã fãa.
Bãmb fãa sẽn ki n sa, pagã me kiime.
Kũum vʋʋgrã wakate, bʋg ba-biisã a yopoe wã sʋk n na n soog pagã? Bãmb fãa la sẽn tall-a wã la!
A Zezi leoka bãmba: Yãmb bee tudgr pʋgẽ, bala yãmb ka wʋmd gʋls-sõamyã wall Wẽnnaam pãngã võor ye.
Tɩ bõe, kũum vʋʋgrã wakate, raop ka na n peeg pagba, pagb ka na n kuil sɩdba, la b na n yɩɩ wa Wẽnnaam malegsã sẽn be arzãnã.
La ne kũum vʋʋgrã yelle, yãmb nan ka karem Wẽnnaam sẽn yeel yãmb tɩ:
"Mam yaa a Abraham Wẽnnaam, a Izak Wẽnnaam, la a Zakob Wẽnnaamã" laa? Wẽnnaam ka kũum Wẽnnaam ye, bãmb yaa nin-vɩɩs Wẽnnaam.
La a Zezi zãmsgã linga neb kʋʋngã sẽn dag n kelgd bãmbã.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn wʋm t'a Zezi muma Saduusẽ-dãmbã noeyã, b tigsa taaba.
La bãmb ned a yen sẽn ya tõog karen-saamb soka a Zezi sokr n na n mak bãmba:
Karen-saamba, tõodã sʋka, bʋg n ya kãseng n yɩɩda?
A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: "Nong Zu-soaba fo Wẽnnaam ne f sũur fãa, la ne f sɩɩgã fãa, la ne f tagsgã fãa."
Yẽnda n ya pipi tõogo, n leb n yɩɩd b fãa.
La ad sẽn pʋgd-a yẽnda, la a wẽnda yẽnda: "Nong f to wa f menga."
Tõodã fãa ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã koees fãa yẽbga tõ-kãens b yiibã zutu.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn tigma, a Zezi sok-b-la woto:
Yãmb tagsda bõe ne Kiristã yelle? B yaa ãnna biiga? B leokame tɩ yaa a David.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame: La yɩta a wãn tɩ Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn ning goam a noorẽ wã, a David bool bãmb tɩ Zu-soab n yeele:
"Zu-soabã yeela mam Zu-soaba yaa: Zĩnd mam dɩtgo, hal tɩ m kɩt tɩ f tab f bɛɛbã n zĩẽ?"
A David sã n boonda bãmb tɩ Zu-soaba, bãmb le yɩta wãn n ya yẽnda biiga?
Ned baa a yen ka tõog n yã gomd n leok bãmb ye. La sẽn sɩng ne badaare, ned baa a yen ka leb n saag n sok bãmb bũmb ye.
Dẽ, a Zezi goma ne neb kʋʋngã la ne b karen-biisã n yeele:
Tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã bee a Moyiis zĩigẽ.
Dẽ wã, maan-y bũmb nins b sẽn na n yeel yãmbã, la y tũ bũmb nins b sẽn na n zãms yãmbã, la y da maan wa bãmb sẽn maandã ye. Bala, bãmb yetame la b yaool n ka maandẽ ye.
Bãmb sẽbda zɩɩb sẽn ya zɩsdo n tʋgend nebã, n yaool n ka rat n sɩɩs-b ne b nug-bil ye.
Bãmb maanda b tʋʋmã fãa nebã nin gesg yĩnga. Woto, bãmb maanda b pʋʋsg gãnã tɩ yɩ yalemse, la b kɩtd tɩ b futã zerd yɩ wogd n yɩɩd b taaba. Pʋʋsg gãn la fut zerdo (23.5)
Bãmb nonga naam zĩndg zĩis rɩɩb zĩisẽ la karen-dotẽ.
Bãmb nonga nebã pʋʋsem raasẽ, la b nongẽ tɩ nebã boond bãmb tɩ karen-saamba.
La yãmba, ra kɩt-y tɩ nebã boond yãmb tɩ karen-saamb ye. Bala, yãmb karen-saamb yaa a yen tãa, la yãmb fãa yaa ba-biisi.
Da bool-y ned baa a yen tãa dũni ka tɩ ba ye. Bala, ned a yen tãa n ya yãmb ba, soab ning sẽn be-a saasẽ wã.
Da kɩt-y tɩ nebã bool yãmb tɩ taoor dãmb ye, bala, ned a yen tãa n ya taoor soaba, yaa Kirist.
Sẽn ya-a kãseng n yɩɩd yãmb sʋkã, bɩ a yɩ yãmb tʋmtʋmda.
Ned sã n zẽk a menga, b na n sik-a lame, la ned sã n sik a menga, b na n zẽk-a lame.

Yãmba, tõog karen-saam-dãmbã, la Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn ya zãmb dãmbã, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb pagda arzãn soolmã tɩ nebã ka tõe n kẽ ye. Yãmb mensã ka kẽede, la yãmb ka basd neb nins sẽn dat n kẽ wã me tɩ b kẽ ye.

Yãmba, tõog karen-saam-dãmbã, la Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn ya zãmb dãmba, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb sɛɛsda pʋgkõap paoongo, n pʋʋsd pʋʋs-wogd n belgd neba. Bõn-kãng yĩnga, yãmb sɩbgr na n yɩɩ toog n yɩɩda.

Yãmba, tõog karen-saam-dãmba, la Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn ya zãmb dãmba, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb saagda ko-kãsengã ne tẽngã fãa n baood ned sẽn na sak yãmb kaorengã. La yãmb sã n paam neda, yãmb kɩtdame t'a lebg bug-tẽng ned sẽn ya wẽng n yɩɩd yãmb naoor a yiibu.
Yãmb sẽn ya tɛtb sẽn ya zoensã, yãmb na paam toogo! Yãmb yetame tɩ ned sã n pʋlem wẽnd-doogã, rẽ ka be yell ye, la t'a sã n pʋlem sãnemã sẽn be wẽnd-doogẽ wã, yaa tɩlɛ t'a pidsi.
Ka-yam dãmb la zoense, bʋg n ya kãseng n yɩɩda, sãnemã bii, bɩ wẽnd-doogã sẽn kɩtd tɩ sãnemã lebg bõn-sõngã?
Yãmb leb n yetame tɩ ned sã n wẽen ne tẽn-kugrã, rẽ ka be ye, la tɩ ned sã n wẽen ne kũunã sẽn be tẽn-kugrã zugã, yaa tɩlɛ t'a pidsi.
Zoensã, bʋg n ya kãseng n yɩɩda, kũunã bii, bɩ tẽn-kugrã sẽn kɩtd tɩ kũunã lebg bõn-sõngã?
Ned ning sẽn pʋlemd tẽn-kugrã pʋlemda tẽn-kugrã la ne bũmb ning sẽn be a zugã.
Ned ning sẽn wẽend ne wẽnd-doogã wẽenda ne roogã la ne ned ning sẽn so-a roogã.
La ned ning sẽn wẽend ne arzãn wẽenda ne Wẽnnaam geerã la ne a soab sẽn zao a zugã.

Yãmba, tõog karen-saam-dãmba, la Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn ya zãmb dãmbã, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb yãkda zẽ-vãad wa mant la anet la kume piig-pʋɩɩre, la yãmb basda bũmb ning sẽn ya kãseng n yɩɩd fãa tõogã pʋgẽ: yaa nimbãan-zoeere la sɩd maanego. Yaa bõn-kãensã la yãmb tog n maane, la y da bas sẽn ketã me ye.
Tɛtb sẽn ya zoense, yãmb yoogda koom n kokd dũmpigla, n yaool n vend yʋgemde.
Yãmba, tõog karen-saam-dãmba, la Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn ya zãmb rãmbã, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb nedgda ko-yũud wamd ne laag poore, tɩ b pʋsã yaool n pid ne fãab la yĩng ratem sakre.
Fariisẽ sẽn ya zoanga, deng n nedg ko-yũud wamdã ne laagã pʋg tɩ yɩ yɩlemde, tɩ b poeyã me na yɩ yoalma.

Yãmba, tõog karen-saam-dãmba la Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn ya zãmb rãmbã, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb wẽnda wa yaad sẽn puus goor tɩ ya pɛɛlga, tɩ b yɩngã ya neere, tɩ b pʋsa pid ne kũum kõab, la rẽgd buud fãa.
Yãmb me, nebã sã n get yãmb yɩngã, yãmb yaa wa nin-tɩrse. La pʋgẽ wã, yãmb pida ne zãmbo la tʋʋm-wẽnse.
Yãmba, tõog karen-saam-dãmba, la Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn ya zãmb dãmba, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb meta Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã yaado, la y nagsd nin-tɩrsã yaado,
la y yetẽ tɩ yãmb sã n dag n vɩɩmdẽ y ba-rãmbã zamaanẽ, yãmb dag n kõn naag ne bãmb n daag Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã zɩɩm ye.
Ne gom-kãense, yãmb kaooda y mens bʋʋdo, n wilgdẽ tɩ yãmb yaa neb nins sẽn kʋ-b Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã kamba.
Beneere, bɩ y kell n maan y yaab-rãmbã tʋʋmd n baase.
Wiisã! Wag-toos buudu! Yãmb na n yɩɩ a wãn n põs bug-tẽng sɩbgrã?

Yaa woto yĩng la mam tʋmd yãmb Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba, la yam dãmba, la tõog karen-saam-dãmba. Yãmb na n kʋʋ kẽere, n ka kẽer da-pɩgs zutu. Yãmb na n pãba b taabã karen-dotã pʋse, la y na n namsa bãmb tẽng-tẽnga.
Woto, nin-tɩrsã zɩɩm sẽn daage, sẽn sɩng ne a Abɛl tɩ ta a Berikɩya biig a Zakari yãmb sẽn kʋ wẽnd-doogã ne tẽn-kugrã sʋkã zɩɩm na n zĩnda yãmb zutu.
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ bõn-kãens fãa na n waa zamaan kãngã nebã zutu.

Zeruzalɛm! Zeruzalɛm! Tẽnga, a neb sẽn kʋʋd Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba, la a lobd neb nins b sẽn tʋm foomã kuga! Naoor wʋsg la mam da tʋlg n tigs f kambã wa no-yãang sẽn põgended a no-bi a pɩgsẽ, la yãmb ka ralg ye.
Gese, b na n basa y roogã vɩʋʋg ne-yã.
Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb ka na n leb n yã maam yɛs hal tɩ ta wakat ning yãmb sẽn na n yeel tɩ "bark bee soab ning sẽn wat ne Zu-soabã yʋʋrã zugu."
A Zezi sẽn yi wẽnd-doogẽ wã n loogdẽ, b karen-biisã kolgame n wilg bãmb tɩ b ges a meebã sẽn yɩ to-to
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Yãmb yãa bõn-kãensã fãa? Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ kugr baa a yen kõn pa a to zug ye. B na n leeb-b-la zãng n lubi.

Bãmb zĩnda oliiv tɩɩs tãngã zugu, la bãmb karen-biisã waa bãmb nengẽ neb sẽn ka be be wakat n yeel-b yaa: Togs-y tõnd wakat ning bõn-kãens fãa sẽn na n zĩndã, la bãnd ning sẽn na n wilg tɩ yãmb watame la tɩ dũni na n saame wã.
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Gũus-y y mens tɩ ned da belg yãmb ye.
Tɩ bõe, neb wʋsg n na n dɩk mam yʋʋr n wa n yeel tɩ yaa bãmb la Kiristã. La b na n tudga neb wʋsgo.
Yãmb na n wʋmame tɩ b gomd zab yelle, la y wʋm zab rãamde. Yõk-y y mens n da yɛɛs ye, bala, bõn-kãens fãa tog n waame. La ket n nan ka wakat saab ye.
Soolem na n yika zabr ne soolem a to, tɩ rĩung yik ne rĩung a to, la kom ne tẽn-digimdg na n zĩnda zĩig-zĩiga.
Yõwã fãa na n yɩɩ wa rogem toog sɩngr bala.
Dẽ, b na n namsa yãmba, n kʋ yãmba, la soolem fãa nebã na n kisga yãmb mam yʋʋrã yĩnga.
Bõn-kãng na n waa ne neb wʋsg lʋɩɩse. B na n zãmba taaba, n kisg taaba.
Belgr no-rɛɛsdb wʋsg na n pukame la b na n belga neb wʋsg n tõoge.
Wẽngã maaneg sẽn na n paamd paoosgã yĩnga, neb wʋsg nonglem na n boogame.
La ned ning fãa sẽn na n mao-a tɩ wakat ta, a na paam fãagre.
Wẽnnaam soolmã koe-no-kãngã na n moona dũni gill fãa, tɩ yɩ kaset soolem fãa nebã yĩnga. Dẽ, wakat saab na yaool n ta.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ yãmb sã n yãnd sũ-sãoong bõn-wẽngã Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Daniyɛl sẽn dag n gom a yellã sẽn be zĩ-sõngẽ wã, bɩ sẽn karemd-a wã gũusi,
bɩ neb nins sẽn be Zude wã zoe n dʋ tãmsã,
bɩ ned ning sẽn be beoong zug da sig n kẽ a roogẽ n na n dɩk bũmb be ye,
la bɩ ned ning sẽn be a pʋʋgẽ ra leb a poorẽ n na n tɩ rɩk a fuug ye.
Pagb nins sẽn tʋte la sẽn yẽsemd kamb wakat kãngã na paam toogo.
Bõos-y Wẽnnaam tɩ y zoeesã ra yɩ waood wẽnd wall vʋʋsg daar ye.
Bala, wakat kãnga, to-kãseng n na n zĩndi, la a buud ka zĩnd hal dũni sɩngr wakat tɩ ta masã ye, la a buud kõn zĩnd yɛs ye, abada.
La da-kãens sõorã sã n dag n ka boogẽ, ned baa a yen dag n kõn põsẽ ye. La b booga da-kãens sõor nin-tũusdsã yĩnga.
Dẽ, ned sã n yeel yãmb tɩ Kiristã bee ka wall ka sẽne, bɩ y da tẽ a soab ye.
Tɩ bõe, belgr kirist-rãmb la belgr no-rɛɛsdb n na n puki. B na n maana bõn-kãsemse, la bõn-yɛɛsdse, hal tɩ b sã n tõe menga, b na n tudga nin-tũusdsã mense.
Gese, mam pĩnd n togsa yãmb bõn-kãnga.
Dẽ, b sã n yeel yãmb tɩ "ad Kiristã bee we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ wã," bɩ y ra kẽng ye, wall "ad b bee roogẽ wã," bɩ y ra tẽ ye.
Sɩda, a wa sa-yãgb sẽn yit yaang n yãg n tãag nin-taoorã, Ninsaal Bi-riblã waoong me na n yɩɩ a woto.
Dɩgr sẽn be zĩig ning fãa, yɩbrend na tigs taab be.
Tao-tao bala, ra-kãens toogã zugẽ, wĩndgã na n sobgame, kiuugã peelem kõn leb n zĩnd ye, ãdsã na n yii yĩngr n sʋʋge, la saasẽ pãens na rigimdi.
Wakat kãng masã, Ninsaal Bi-riblã bãnd na n puka saasẽ. Buud fãa sẽn be dũni na n wiisame, la b na n yãa Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn zao sawat n wat ne pãn-kãsenga la ne ziiri.
Bãmb na n tʋma b malegs ne baorg koe-kãsenga, tɩ b tigs bãmb nin-tũusdsã sẽn be kɩrems a naasã, hal saasẽ kɩreng a yen tɩ ta a to.
Reeg-y kankangã yel-bũndã tɩ yɩ zãmsg y yĩnga. Kankang sã n wa n tãood wil-poala, n sɩng n tobdẽ, yãmb miime tɩ sig-noy kolgame.
Woto me, yãmb me sã n wa n yã bõn-kãensã fãa, bɩ y bãng tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã kolgame la b bee dignoorẽ.
Sɩd sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ zamaan kãngã kõn sa tɩ bõn-kãensã fãa ka maan ye.
Saasẽ la tẽng na looge, la mam goamã kõn loog ye.
Sã n yaa ne a daarã la a wakatã, ned baa a yen ka mi ye: malegsã sẽn be arzãnã ka mi, Bi-riblã ka mi. Yaa d ba wã bal n mi.
Bũmb ning sẽn zĩnd a Nowe wakatã n na n zĩnd Ninsaal Bi-riblã waoong wakat me.
Bala, rasem nins sẽn deng sãoong sa-kãsengã, nebã dag n dɩtame la b yũuda, n kẽed kãadem la b yiisd b kamb kãadem, hal tɩ ta daar ning a Nowe sẽn kẽ koom koglgã pʋgẽ wã.
Bãmb da ka tẽed yell hal tɩ sãoong sa-kãsengã wa n kãag bãmb fãa. Na n yɩɩ a woto me Ninsaal Bi-riblã waoong wakate.
Dẽ, daop a yiib n na n tʋmd pʋʋg pʋgẽ: b na n dɩka a yen la b bas a to wã.
Pagb a yiib n na n werd neerẽ: b na n dɩka a yembr la b bas a to wã.
Rẽ yĩnga, neend-y, yãmb sẽn ka mi daar ning yãmb Zu-soabã sẽn na n wa wã yĩnga.
Bãng-y tɩ yir soab sã n da bãngẽ wagdr sẽn na n wa yʋngã wakat ninga, a dag n na n gũume la a ka na n bas-a t'a poog a roogã ye.
Woto yĩnga, yãmb me segl n sɛ, bala, Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n waa wakat ning yãmb sẽn ka tagsd tɩ b na wa wã ye.
Dẽ wã, tʋmtʋmd bʋg n maand sɩda, la a ya gũus-m-meng soaba, t'a soaalã lʋɩɩs-a a nebã taoore, t'a tõe n kõ-b rɩɩb wakat fãa sẽn segde?
Tʋmtʋmd kãng soaalã sã n lebg n wa n mik t'a maanda a woto, tʋmtʋmdã sũur na n yɩɩ noogo.
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb t'a soaalã na n kɩtame t'a soog bũmb nins fãa yẽ sẽn tarã.
La a sã n ya tʋmtʋmd yoog sẽn yet t'a soaalã kaoosda waoongo,
a sã n sɩng n pãb a zĩnd-n-taasã, a sã n naag rã-yũudbã n dɩtẽ la a yũuda,
a soaalã na n waa daar ning a sẽn ka tẽeda, la wakat ning a sẽn ka mi ye.
La a na n sɩbg-a-la sõama, tɩ bũmb ning sẽn paamd zãmb dãmbã paam-a, zĩig ning yãbr la yẽn wãbr sẽn na n zĩndã.
Dẽ, arzãn soolem na n yɩɩ wa pa-kuil-n-dãmb piig sẽn dɩgs b fɩtɩl dãmb n yi n na n tɩ seg pʋg-paal sɩda.
Nu bãmb sʋkã yaa ka-yam dãmba, tɩ nu wã ya yam dãmba.
Ka-yamã rãmb rɩgsa b fɩtɩl dãmbã, la b ka zɩ kaam ye.
La yamã rãmb rɩgsa b fɩtɩl dãmbã, la b zɩ kaam ne tʋgdo.
La pʋg-paalã sɩd sẽn kaoos waoong yĩnga, gõeem yõka b fãa tɩ b gũsi.
Kɛleng n zẽk yʋn-sʋkã n yeele: Pʋg-paalã sɩd watame! Yi-y n seg-y-yã-a.
Dẽ, pa-kuil-n-dãmb kãens fãa yikame n maneg b fɩtɩl dãmba.
Ka-yamã rãmb kosa yamã rãmb tɩ b yãk b kaamã bilf n kõ-b tɩ bãmb fɩtɩl dãmbã sɩnga kũum.
Yam dãmbã leok-b lame n yeele: Ayo! Ka na n sek tõnd ne yãmb me ye. Kẽng-y ka-koaasdbã nengẽ n tɩ ra y mens yĩng tɩ rẽnda n são.
Bãmb sẽn wa n kẽnd n na n tɩ ra wã, pʋg-paalã sɩd taame. Pʋg-sadb nins sẽn dag n segl n sɛ wã tũu yẽnda n kẽ kãadmã kibsã, la b paga kʋɩlengã.
Pa-kuil-n-dãmb a taabã yaool n wa waame n yeele: M kẽema! M kẽema! Pak-y tɩ d kẽ!
La a leoka bãmb tɩ sɩd-sɩdã, a ka mi-b ye.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ y neende, tɩ bõe, yãmb ka mi daarã, wall wakatã ye.
Arzãn soolmã leb n na n yɩɩ wa rao a yembr sẽn dat n tog sore, n bool a tʋmtʋmdbã, n dɩk a paoongã n pʋɩ-ba.
A kõo ned a yen talã a nu, n kõ a yiib soabã talã a yiibu, la a kõ tãab soabã talã a yen, n zems ned fãa sẽn tõe n tall n tʋme, la a bas n toge. Ligd sẽn boond tɩ talã (25.15)
A sẽn loog yee, la sẽn deeg-a talã a nu wã loog-yã, n tall-b n leebe, n paam yõod talã a nu n paase.
Sẽn deeg-a talã a yiibã me maana a woto, n paam yõod talã a yiib n paase.
La sẽn deeg-a talã a yen tãa wã tɩ tuka bok tẽnga, n bus a zu-soabã ligdi.
Kaoosg pʋgẽ, tʋmtʋmd-kãens zu-soabã waame n zĩnd ne-b n na n geele.
Sẽn dag n deeg-a talã a nu wã kolgame, la a talla talã a nu wã a sẽn paamã n wa-ne n yeele: Zu-soaba, yãmb da kõo maam talã a nu. La ad talã a nu a taab mam sẽn tʋm n paame.
A zu-soabã yeel-a lame: Yaa sõama, tʋmtʋmd sõng sẽn maand sɩda! Fo maana sɩd ne bũmb bilfu, la mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo ges bũmb wʋsg yelle. Wa n paam pʋɩɩr ne f zu-soabã sũ-noogã.
Sẽn dag n deeg-a talã a yiibã me kolgame n yeele: Zu-soaba, yãmb dag n kɩsa maam talã a yiibu, la ad talã a yiib a taab mam sẽn tʋm n paame.
A zu-soabã yeel-a lame: Yaa sõama, tʋmtʋmd sõng sẽn maand sɩda! Fo maana sɩd ne bũmb bilfu, la mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo ges bũmb wʋsg yelle. Wa n paam pʋɩɩr ne f zu-soabã sũ-noogã.
Sẽn dag n deeg-a talã a yen tãa wã yaool n kolgame n yeele: Zu-soaba, mam dag n miime tɩ yãmb yaa nen-kɛgeng soaba, n tigsd y sẽn ka bʋdẽ, la y koond y sẽn ka yɛdgẽ ye.
Dabeem yõka maam tɩ mam kẽng n tuk bok tẽng n solg y talã wã. Ad-y y talã! Deeg-y-yã.
A zu-soabã yeel-a lame: tʋmtʋmd-wẽng sẽn ya kʋɩɩma, fo rag n miime tɩ mam tigsda m sẽn ka bʋdẽ ye, la m koond m sẽn ka yɛdgẽ ye.
Fo rag n tog n tɩ ningẽ la mam ligdã bãnkẽ, tɩ m sã n wa lebg bɩ m reeg m ligd-ma ne a yõodo.
Deeg-y-yã a talã wã n kõ ned ning sẽn tar-a talã piigã.
Tɩ bõe, b na n kõo ned ning sẽn tar-a wã t'a paam hal wʋsgo, la sẽn ka tar-a wã, b na n deega baa bũmb bilf ning a sẽn tarã n bas-a.
La tʋmtʋmd ning sẽn ka-a yõodã, lob-y-yã-a lik bida sẽn be-a yɩngã pʋgẽ, zĩig ning yãbr la yẽn wãbr sẽn na n zĩndã.
Ninsaal Bi-riblã sã n wa ne b ziirã, la ne b malegsã fãa, b na n zaoonda b ziir geerã.
Soolem fãa nebã na n tigma bãmb taoore. Bãmb na n welga nebã ne taab wa rũm-kɩɩm sẽn welgd piis ne bʋʋsã.
Bãmb na n yalsa piisã b rɩtgo, la bʋʋsã b goabga.
Dẽ, Rĩmã na n yeela neb nins sẽn be bãmb dɩtgã yaa: Yãmb dãmb sẽn tar m ba wã barkã, wa-y-yã! Reeg-y soolmã sẽn dag n segl yãmb yĩng hal dũni naaneg wakatã tɩ yɩ y rogem pʋɩɩre.
Tɩ bõe, kom dag n talla maam, la yãmb kõo maam rɩɩbo. Ko-yũud yõka maam, la yãmb kõo maam koom tɩ m yũ. Mam dag n yaa sãana, la yãmb sika maam y yiri.
Mam dag n yaa beelle, la yãmb yeelga maam fuugu. Mam dag n yaa bãada, la yãmb waa n gesa maam. Mam dag n bee bi-bees roogẽ, la yãmb waa mam nengẽ.
La nin-tɩrsã na n leokame yaa: Zu-soaba, dabʋr la tõnd yã yãmb tɩ kom tar yãmb tɩ tõnd kõ yãmb tɩ y rɩ, wall tɩ ko-yũud tar yãmb tɩ tõnd kõ yãmb tɩ y yũ?
Dabʋr la tõnd yã yãmb tɩ y ya sãan tɩ tõnd sik yãmb d yiri, wall tɩ y ya beel tɩ tõnd yeelg yãmb fuugu?
Dabʋr la tõnd yã yãmb tɩ y ya bãada, wall y be bi-bees roogẽ tɩ tõnd wa yãmb nengẽ?
Dẽ, Rĩma na n leoka a woto: Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ wakat ning fãa yãmb sẽn maan bõn-kãens kom-kãensã sẽn ya bõoneg n yɩɩda, la b ya mam ba-biisã, yaa maam la yãmb maan-yã.

Dẽ poore, b na n yeela neb nins sẽn be-b bãmb goabgã yaa: Yãmb dãmb kãab-wẽng sẽn be y zutã, yi-y mam taoore! Kẽng-y bugum sẽn paad wakat sẽn kõn sa wã pʋgẽ, bugum ning sẽn segl rõatã ne a malegsã yĩngã.
Tɩ bõe, kom talla maam, la yãmb ka kõ maam tɩ m dɩ ye. Ko-yũud talla maam, la yãmb ka kõ maam tɩ m yũ ye.
Mam dag n yaa sãana, la yãmb ka sik maam y yir ye. Mam dag n yaa beelle, la yãmb ka yeelg maam fuug ye. Mam dag n yaa bãada, la mam zĩnda bi-bees roogẽ tɩ yãmb ka wa n ges maam ye.
La bãmb me na n leokame yaa: Zu-soaba, dabʋr la tõnd yã yãmb tɩ kom wall ko-yũud tar yãmba, wall y ya sãan bɩ beelle, bɩ bãada, wall y be bi-bees roogẽ la keta tõnd n ka sõng yãmba?
La b na n leoka bãmb yaa: Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ wakat ning fãa yãmb sẽn tõdg n ka maan kom-kãens sẽn ya bõoneg n yɩɩd fãa wã ned a yembr bõn-kãense, yaa maam la yãmb ka maane.
La nin-kãens na n kẽe sɩbgr sẽn kõn sa pʋgẽ, la nin-tɩrsã na n kẽe vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã pʋgẽ.
La a Zezi sẽn gom gom-kãens n sɛ, b yeela b karen-biisã yaa:
Yãmb miime tɩ zʋʋg-n-basã yaa ra-yɩta, la tɩ b na n yõka Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kɩs tɩ b ka ra-pɩk zugu.
Dẽ, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tẽngã nin-kẽemb tigsa taab maan-kʋʋd kãsmã b sẽn boond t'a Kayifã zakẽ,
la b seda ne taab n na n maan sɩlem n yõk a Zezi n kʋ-ba.
Baoosgo, b yetame tɩ ka tog n yɩ kibsã pʋgẽ, tɩ rãmbg ra wa n yik nebã sʋk ye.
A Zezi sẽn be Betani n zĩ yĩng soab a Sɩmo roogẽ,
pag a yen kolga bãmba. A dag n zãada albatr tʋk sẽn pid ne tɩdare, a raab sẽn ya toogo. A kiiga tɩdarã a Zezi zug bãmb sẽn dɩt wakate.
Karen-biisã sẽn yã rẽnda, b sũyã sãamame tɩ b yeel tɩ yaa bõe tɩ pagã sãam tɩdarã?
Bala, b da tõe n koos-a lame n paam ligd wʋsg n kõ naong rãmba.
A Zezi bãngame n yeel-ba: Bõe tɩ yãmb maan tɩ pagã sũur sãame? A maana maam yel-sõmde.
Bala, naong rãmbã bee ne yãmb daar fãa, la maam, yãmb ka na n paam tɩ mam be ne yãmb daar fãa ye.
Pagã sẽn walg mam yĩngã tɩdar kaamã, yaa mam mumb yĩnga.
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ dũni tɛk fãa, zĩig ning fãa b sẽn na n moon koe-no-kãngã fãa, b na n goma bũmb ning pagã sẽn maanã yelle, a tẽegr yĩnga.
Dẽ, karen-biisã piig la a yiibã ned a yembr sẽn boond t'a Zudas Iskaryo kẽnga maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã nengẽ
n tɩ sok-b tɩ b na n kõo yẽnda bõe t'a yõk a Zezi n kõ-ba? La b yao-a-la wanzuri ligd pis-tã.
Sẽn sɩng ne wakat kãnga, a baoo we-sõng a sẽn na n paam n yõk a Zezi n kõ.
Bur sẽn ka rã-bɩllã wakat pipi daare, karen-biisã waa n soka a Zezi b sẽn dat tɩ bãmb segl zʋʋg-n-basã rɩɩb zĩig ning n kõ-ba.

A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Kẽng-y tẽngã pʋgẽ, a zagl yiri, n tɩ yeel-a tɩ yãmb karen-saambã n yet a woto: "Mam wakat kolgame. Yaa fo yirã la mam dat n maan zʋʋg-n-basã kibs ne m karen-biisã."
Karen-biisã maana bũmb ning a Zezi sẽn yeelã, la b segla zʋʋg-n-basã kibsa.
Zĩ-sobd sẽn ta, a Zezi zĩnda ne b karen-biisã n na n dɩ.
La b rɩɩbã wakate, a Zezi yeelame: Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb ned a yembr n na n yõk maam n kõ.
Karen-biisã sũy sãama wʋsgo, tɩ ned fãa sok a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, yaa maam?
B leoka bãmb n yeele: Ned ning sẽn tʋm-a laagẽ wã ne maamã, yaa soab kãng n na n zãmb maamã.
Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n looga wa b sẽn dag n gʋls b yellã to-to wã. La ned ning sẽn na n yõk-a Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kõ wã na paam toogo. Dao kãng sã n dag n ka dogẽ n são.
A Zudas, soab ning sẽn na n zãmb-a bãmbã gomame n soke: Karen-saamba, yaa maam? A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Foom n yeele.
Bãmb sẽn dɩta, a Zezi dɩka buri. La b sẽn ning-a barka, b kaoo-a lame n kõ b karen-biisã n yeele: Reeg n dɩ-y-yã. Yõwã yaa mam yĩngã.
Rẽ zugẽ, b rɩka bõn-yũudla. La b sẽn ning-a barka, b kõo b karen-biisã n yeele: Bɩ yãmb fãa yũ-a,
bala, yõwã yaa mam zɩɩm, kãab-paalgã zɩɩm sẽn daag neb wʋsg yĩnga, yel-wẽna sugr yĩnga.
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ mam ka na n leb n yũ nasaar sib ko-kãngã hal tɩ ta daar ning m sẽn na n yũ a paalg ne yãmb m ba soolmã pʋgẽ ye.
La bãmb sẽn yɩɩl yɩɩn-sõamyã, bãmb kẽnga oliiv tɩɩs tãngã zugu.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela bãmba: Yʋn-kãngã bala, yãmb fãa na n zoee n basa maam. Bala, b gʋlsa a woto: "Mam na n wẽe rũm-kɩɩmã, la piisã sẽn dag n ya sullã na n sãeegame."
La m vʋʋgrã zugẽ, m na n deng-y la Galile.
A Pɩyɛɛr gomame n yeele: Baa neba fãa sã n na n bas yãmba, mam yẽ kõn bas yãmb ye.
La a Zezi yeel-a lame: Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta foom tɩ yʋn-kãngã bala, sẽn deng no-raoog kɛlenga, fo na n yeela naoor a tãab tɩ fo ka mi maam ye.
A Pɩyɛɛr yeela bãmba: Baa sã n na n yɩ tɩlae tɩ mam ki ne yãmba, mam ka na n yeel tɩ m ka mi yãmb ye. La karen-biis a taabã me yeela a woto.
Rẽ poore, a Zezi kẽnga zĩig ning sẽn boond tɩ Getsemaane wã ne b karen-biisã, la b yeel-b lame yaa: Zĩnd-y ka tɩ m kẽng taoor bilf n tɩ pʋʋse.
A Zezi peega a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zebde kom-dibli a yiibã, la sũ-sãoong kãseng ne pelen-yɩk yõka a Zezi.
Dẽ, bãmb yeelame: Sũ-sãoong n tar maam hal n dat n kʋ maam. Pa-y ka n neend ne maam.

La bãmb kẽnga taoor bilfu, n wõgemd n fõgen b nenga, n pʋʋs a woto: M ba, sã n tõeeme, bɩ y kɩt tɩ bõn-yũudl kãngã loog n bas maam. Baoosgo, bɩ a ra yɩ mam sẽn dat ye, a yɩ wa yãmb sẽn data.
Bãmb lebg n waa b karen-biisã nengẽ n mik tɩ b gõeeme, la b yeela a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Yãmb ka tõog n neend ne maam lɛɛr a yen tãa ye.
Neend-y la y pʋʋse, tɩ y ra wa n kẽ makr pʋgẽ ye. Sɩɩgã ratame, la yĩngã pãng paoodame.
Bãmb leb n vẽsga naoor a yiib soab n pʋʋs a woto: M ba, sã n yaa tɩ ka tõe tɩ bõn-yũudl kãngã loog kal mam yũ-a, bɩ y tʋlsem maane.
Bãmb waame n mik tɩ b leb n gõeeme, gõeem sẽn tar-bã yĩnga.
Bãmb basa b karen-biisã n leb n zãag naoor a tãab soaba, n leb n pʋʋs wa pĩndã.
Dẽ poore, b leb n waa b karen-biisã nengẽ n yeel-ba: Yãmb gõee moasã n vʋʋsdẽ. Ad wakat kolgame tɩ b na n yõk Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kõ yel-wẽn maandba.
Yik-y tɩ d kẽnge. Sẽn zãmb-a maamã kolgdame.
Bãmb sẽn na n ket n gomda, piig la a yiibã ned a yembre, a Zudas waa ne neb kʋʋngo, maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmba ne tẽnga nin-kẽembã sẽn tʋme, la b ra zãada zabr sʋʋs ne roɛya.
Ned ning sẽn zãmbd a Zezi wã dag n kõo nebã bãnd n yeel tɩ ned ning yẽ sẽn na n mokã, yaa yẽ la a Zezi, la b yõk-a.
A kolga a Zezi tao-tao bal n yeele: Karen-saamba, ne y yʋngo! La a moka bãmba.
A Zezi yeela yẽnda: M zoa, fo sẽn wa n na n maan bũmb ningã, maane. Woto, nin-kãens kolgame n gãd a Zezi, n yõk-ba.
Neb nins sẽn dag n be ne a Zezi wã, ned a yembr gãda a sʋʋg n wõog n kɛ maan-kʋʋd kãsmã tʋmtʋmd n fiuug a tʋbre.
La a Zezi yeel-a lame: Lebs f sʋʋgã n sui a wʋʋgẽ. Bala neb nins fãa sẽn na n zab ne zabr sʋʋse, zabr sʋʋs n na n sãam-ba.
Fo tẽedame tɩ mam ka tõe n bool m ba tɩ b tʋm maam malegs sẽn yɩɩd tus-tus sul piig la a yiib laa?
Sã n yɩ a woto, gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yet t'a tog n yɩɩ a woto wã na n yɩɩ a wãn n paam pidsgu.

Wakat kãnga, a Zezi yeela neb kʋʋngã: Yãmb waa ne zabr sʋʋse la ne roɛy n na n yõk maam wa m yaa fãada. Mam dag n zĩi ne yãmb wẽnd-doogẽ wã daar fãa, n zãmsd nebã, la yãmb ka yõk maam ye.
La bõn-kãens fãa maaname tɩ bũmb nins Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn gʋlsã paam pidsgu. Dẽ, karen-biisã fãa basa a Zezi n zoe.
Neb nins sẽn yõk a Zezi wã talla bãmb n kẽng maan-kʋʋd kãsem a Kayif zakẽ, zĩig ning tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne kãsem-dãmba sẽn tigs taabã.
A Pɩyɛɛr pʋgla a Zezi yɩɩg-yɩɩg hal tɩ ta maan-kʋʋd kãsmã zakẽ, n kẽ n naag ne gũudbã n zĩẽ n dat n ges yellã sẽn na n baas to-to
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne kaorengã yɛl-bʋʋdbã fãa da baooda kaset zĩrĩ n na n paam n rõd a Zezi n kɩt tɩ b kʋ-ba,
la b ka paam ye, baa ne zĩrĩ kaset rãmb wʋsg sẽn wa wã. Neb a yiib n yaool n wa n yeele:
Rao-kãngã yeelame tɩ yẽ tõe n sãama wẽnd-doogã n lebs n me-a dasem a tãab pʋgẽ.
Maan-kʋʋd kãsmã yikame n sok a Zezi yaa: Yãmb ka leokd tɩ bũmb laa? Yaa ne bõe la b rõt yãmbã?
A Zezi kell n sĩndame. La maan-kʋʋd kãsmã yeela bãmba: Mam kota yãmb ne Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ wã yʋʋr tɩ y togs tõnd yãmb sã n yaa Kirist, Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.

A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Yaa yãmb sẽn yeelã. Sẽn paase, mam yeta yãmb tɩ sẽn sɩng ne moasã, yãmb na n yãa "Ninsaal Bi-riblã, tɩ b zĩ Sẽn-Tõe-a-fãa wã rɩtgo, la b zao yĩngr sawat n watẽ."
Dẽ, maan-kʋʋd kãsmã kẽesa a fut n yeele: Bãmb paooga Wẽnnaam. Tõnd leb n baooda kaset dãmb n na n maan bõe? Yãmb la sẽn wʋm bãmb sẽn paoog Wẽnnaamã la! Yãmb tagsg yaa bõe?
B leokame n yeele: Bãmb togda kʋʋbo.
Dẽ, b tʋbsa a Zezi nengã kolkoodo, la b pãb bãmb ne nug-gila. Neb kẽer laala bãmb pegs n yeele:
Kirist, togs-y bãngr gomd n wilg tõnd ned ning sẽn pãb-a yãmbã.
Wakat kãnga, a Pɩyɛɛr dag n zĩi yɩnga, zaka pʋga. Tʋmtʋmd-poak a yembr kolga yẽnda n yeele: Fo me rag n bee ne Galile ned a Zezi wã.
La a kɩɩsa neba fãa taoor n yeel tɩ yẽ ka mi bũmb ning pagã sẽn dat n yeelã ye.
La yẽ sẽn yik n kẽnd zakã noor sẽne, tʋmtʋmd-poak a to n yãnd yẽnda n yeel neb a taabã tɩ rao-kãngã dag n bee ne Nazarɛt dao a Zezi.
A leb n kɩɩsame, n wẽen n yeele: Mam ka mi rao-kãngã ye.
Sẽn yɩ bilfu, neb nins sẽn dag n be be wã kolgame n yeel a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Sɩda yẽ, fo yaa bãmb ned a yembre, bala fo goamã bal wilgda fo sẽn ya a soaba.
Dẽ, a sɩngame n kãab la a wẽen n yeele: Mam ka mi rao-kãngã ye. Tao-tao bala, no-raoog kelmame.
La a Pɩyɛɛr tẽega a Zezi sẽn dag n yeel tɩ: Sẽn deng no-raoog sẽn na n kelme, fo na n kɩɩsa naoor a tãabo, tɩ fo ka mi maam ye. La a yii yɩng n yãb ne sũ-sãoong-kãsenga.
Beoog sẽn vẽege, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tẽngã nin-kẽemb yẽsa ne taab a Zezi yellã poorẽ n dat n kʋ-ba.
La b sẽba bãmb n tall n tɩ kɩs Gʋvɛrneer a Pilat.

A Zudase, soab ning sẽn yõk a Zezi n kõ wã sẽn yã tɩ b kaoo a Zezi bʋʋd tɩ na n yɩ kũumã, a sũurã sãamame, la a talla wanzuri ligd pis-tã wã n wa n na n lebs maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tẽngã nin-kẽembã la a yeel-ba:
Mam beegame, mam sẽn zãmb rao-kãng sẽn ka tar yellã tɩ b yõk-a wã yĩnga. La b leoka yẽnda n yeele: Tõnd toogo? Paka foom.
A Zudas loba ligdã wẽnd-doogẽ wã la a yi n kẽng n tɩ sãrg a menga.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã wʋka ligdã, la b yeel tɩ bãmb ka tar noor tɩ lebs-a wẽnd-doogã ligdẽ ye, bala, a yaa zɩɩm ligdi.
La b sẽn yẽs ne taaba, b rɩka ligdã n da yagbã pʋʋg n maan sãamb yaad zĩiga.
Yaa rẽnda n kɩt tɩ b boond pʋ-kãng tɩ zɩɩm pʋʋg hal tɩ ta rũnna.
Woto, gomd ning Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Zeremi sẽn goma pidsame. A yeelame tɩ: B rɩka wanzuri ligd pis-tã, ligd ning Israyɛll nebã sẽn tall n da bãmbã,
n kɩs n deeg yagbã pʋʋgo, wa Zu-soabã sẽn dag yeel yẽ t'a maanã.
A Zezi yalsa Gʋvɛrneerã taoore. Gʋvɛrneerã soka bãmb woto: Yãmb yaa Zuif-rãmb rĩma? T'a Zezi leok-a tɩ yaa wa yẽ sẽn yeelã:
La maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb ne nin-kẽembã sẽn dõt bãmbã, bãmb ka leok yẽ gomd baa a yen.
Dẽ, a Pilat soka bãmb tɩ b ka wʋmd bũmb nins fãa b sẽn gomd n rõt bãmbã laa?
La a Zezi ka leok yẽ gomd baa a yembr ye, la rẽ yɛɛsa Gʋvɛrneerã wʋsgo.
Kibs fãa, Gʋvɛrneerã minim n yiisda bi-bɛɛg a yembre, neb kʋʋngã sẽn kot a soabã n base.
Bãmb dag n tara bi-bɛɛg a yembr nebã sẽn mi a yell sõama, n boond t'a Barabas.
Dẽ, nebã sẽn tigmã, a Pilat sok-b lame yaa: Bʋg la yãmb dat tɩ mam yiis n bas n kõ-yã? A Barabas bii, bɩ a Zezi b sẽn boond tɩ Kiristã?
Bala, a dag n miime tɩ yaa sũ-kiir yĩng la b yõk a Zezi n wa kõ yẽ wã.
La yẽ sẽn be bʋʋda zĩigẽ wã, a pagã tʋma ned t'a yeel-a yaa: Da kẽes f toog nin-tɩr-kãngã yellẽ wã ye, Bala rũnna, mam namsa wʋsg zãmsd pʋgẽ daowã poorẽ.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã sagla nebã n tõog tɩ b kos a Barabas la b kɩt tɩ b kʋ a Zezi.
Gʋvɛrneerã goma ne-b n yeele: Bãmb b yiibã sʋka, bʋg la yãmb dat tɩ mam yiis n base? La b leokame t'a Barabas.
A Pilat leb n sok-b lame: La woto wã, mam na n maana a Zezi b sẽn boond tɩ Kiristã bõe? La b fãa leokame tɩ b ka-b ra-pɩk zugu.
Gʋvɛrneerã sokame tɩ yaa bõe yel-wẽnd la b maan-yã? La nebã leb n kelma ne pãng n yɩɩd pĩnda, tɩ b ka-b da-pɩk zugu.
A Pilat sẽn yã tɩ yẽ ka tõogd baa bilfu, la tɩ bʋrgã paasdame wã, a reega koom n nudg a nus neb kʋʋngã taoor n yeele: Nin-tɩr-kãngã zɩɩm ka be mam zug ye. Rẽ bee ne yãmba.
La nebã fãa leokame n yeel tɩ bɩ b zɩɩmã zĩnd bãmb ne b kambã zutu.
Dẽ, a Pilat yiisa a Barabas n bas n kõ-ba. La yẽ sẽn kɩt tɩ b pãb a Zezi ne kalwaase, yẽ rɩka bãmb n kõ nebã tɩ b tɩ ka-b da-pɩk zugu.
Gʋvɛrneerã sodaas talla a Zezi n kẽng sodaas naabã zakẽ, n tigs sodaasã fãa tɩ b gũbg bãmba.
B yeesa a Zezi futã, n lebs fu-miuug n yeelg bãmba.
B wʋga maanf ne gõos n fõgen a Zezi zugu, la b bao tã-wĩig n ning b nug-rɩtgã, n yaool n wõgemd bãmb taoor n paoogd bãmb n yetẽ tɩ: Zuif-rãmbã rĩma, Wẽnd na kaoos-yã!
B tʋbsa a Zezi kolkoodo, la b reegd tã-wĩigã bãmb nugẽ n wẽed b zugã.
B sẽn yaal a Zezi woto n sɛ, b yeega fuugã n lebs b futã n yeelg-ba, la b tall-b n na n tɩ ka ra-pɩk zugu.
Bãmb sẽn yita, b yãa Sirɛn dao a yen sẽn boond t'a Sɩmo, la b modga yẽnda t'a tʋk a Zezi ra-pɩkã.
Bãmb sẽn ta zĩig sẽn boond tɩ Golgota, sẽn dat n togs tɩ zu-wang zĩiga,
b kõo a Zezi divẽ sẽn kalem ne tɩɩm sẽn ya toog wa yam tɩ b yũ. La a Zezi sẽn lembe, b tõdgame n ka yũ ye.

Sodaasã sẽn ka a Zezi da-pɩk zug n sa, b pʋɩɩ bãmb futã ne taaba, n maan bãnd n na n bãng ned fãa sẽn na n paame, tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã gomd pidsi. A yeelame yaa: B pʋɩɩ mam futã ne taaba, la b maana bãnd n na n bãng ned ning sẽn na n soog-a mam fuug sẽn ka tar sẽnesmã.
Dẽ, sodaasã zĩndame n gũ a Zezi.
B ninga gʋlsem bãmb zugẽ n wilgd bãmb kʋʋbã võore: Rao-kãngã yaa a Zezi, Zuif-rãmbã rĩma.
Dẽ, b kaa fãadb a yiib ne bãmba: a yembr bãmb dɩtgo, a to wã bãmb goabga.
So-loaagdbã da paoogda bãmba, n gõmsd b zut
n yetẽ: Fo soab sẽn tõe n sãam wẽnd-doogã n lebs-a n me rasem a tãab pʋgẽ wã, bɩ f fãag f meng wɛ! Fo sã n yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, bɩ f sig da-pɩkã zugu.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã, la nin-kẽembã me yaala bãmb n yetẽ:
Yẽ fãaga neb a taaba, la a yaool n ka tõe n fãag a meng ye. Yẽ ka Zuif-rãmb rĩm la! A wa sig ra-pɩkã zug la tõnd na tẽ-a.
Yẽ teega Wẽnnaam: bɩ Wẽnnaam fãag-a moasã, sã n yaa tɩ b nong-a lame. Tɩ bõe, a yetame tɩ yẽ yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
Fãadbã me b sẽn ka ne bãmbã me da tʋʋda bãmb a woto bala.
Sẽn sɩng ne wĩnto-sʋk hal tɩ ta wẽn-kaoore, zĩigã fãa lebga lika.
La wẽn-kaoorã wakate, a Zezi zẽka b koɛɛg n gom ne pãng n yeele: Eli! Eli! Lama sabaktani? Sẽn dat n yeel tɩ: "Mam Wẽnnaam! Mam Wẽnnaam! Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb bas maam?"
Neb nins sẽn dag n be-b be wã, kẽer wʋma bãmb goamã n yeel tɩ b boonda a Eli.
Tao-tao bala, bãmb ned a yembr wudgame n dɩk neoodg n los divẽ miisgẽ, n sel tãnwĩig n tees bãmb tɩ b fõose.
La neb a taabã yeelame tɩ b bas n gese, a Eli sã n na wa n fãag-a.
A Zezi leb n zẽka b koɛɛg n kelem ne pãnga, la b bas b sɩɩga.
La gese, wẽnd-doogã fu-lillidgã sɩnga yĩngr n kẽeg n tãag tẽnga, n pasg a yiibu. Tẽngã rigimdame, pĩisã pusame,
yaad pagsame, la nin-sõamy wʋsg sẽn dag n ki wã vʋʋgame.
B yii yaadẽ wã n kẽ tẽn-sõngã pʋgẽ, a Zezi vʋʋgrã zugẽ, la b puka b mens ne neb wʋsgo.

Sodaas koabg naabã ne neb nins sẽn dag be ne yẽnda n gũud a Zezi wã sẽn yã tẽn-digimdgã ne bũmb ning sẽn maanã, rabeem kãseng yõka bãmb tɩ b yeele: Hakɩɩka, dao-kãngã yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
Pagb wʋsg n dag n yas yɩɩg n getẽ. Yaa pagb nins sẽn yi hal Galile n yãag a Zezi n na n ges b yellã:
A Maari sẽn yit Magdala, la a Zak ne a Zozɛf ma a Maari, la a Zebde kom-dibli wã ma ra bee pʋg-kãens sʋka.
Zaabr sẽn ta, Arimate dao a yen sẽn ya arzɛk soab t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Zozɛf waame. Yẽ me dag n yaa a Zezi karen-biiga.
Yẽ kẽnga a Pilat nengẽ n tɩ kos a Zezi kũumã. Dẽ, a Pilat yeelame tɩ b kõ-a.
A Zozɛf dɩka kũumã, n vil-a ne lẽ peend sẽn ya sõama,
n gãneg-a yao-paalg pʋgẽ. Yẽ dag n kɩtame tɩ b tuk yao-kãng pĩig pʋgẽ a meng yĩnga. La a bilma kug-bedr n yẽd yaoogã noor la a looge.
A Maari sẽn yit Magdala ne Maari a to wã dag n zĩi be tɩ b nens tees yaoogã.
Vẽkembeoogo, seglg daarã yɩ tɩ zaamẽ, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã tũu taab n tɩ yã a Pilat
n yeel-a: N na! Tõnd tẽrame tɩ bɛlgd-kãngã dag n yeela a sẽn ket n vɩ wakat t'a na n vʋʋga dasem a tãab daarã.

Dẽ wã, bɩ y kɩt tɩ b gũ yaoogã hal tɩ ta dasem a tãab daarã, t'a karen-biisã da wa n zuk a kũumã la b yeel nebã tɩ b vʋʋg n basa kũum ye. Yaoolem belg-kãng na n yɩɩ wẽng n yɩɩg pipi soabã.
A Pilat yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb tara gũudba. Bɩ y kẽng n tɩ gũ-a wa yãmb sẽn datã.
La b kẽngame n tɩ sog yaoogã noor kugrã, la b ning gũudb tɩ b gũ yaoogã.
Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daar loogr zugẽ, semennã pipi daar tõd-beoogo, a Maari sẽn yit Magdala, ne Maari a to wã kẽngame n na n tɩ ges yaoogã.
La gese, tẽn-digimdg kãseng zĩndame. Tɩ bõe, Zu-soabã malɛk yii arzãn n sigi, n wa bilg kugrã n zĩnd a zugu.
Malɛkã dag n wẽnda wa sa-yãgbo, la a fuugã yaa pɛɛlg fas wa lampalga.
Gũudba rigda ne rabeem n lebg wa kũum.
La malɛkã goma ne pagbã n yeel-ba: Sã n yaa ne yãmba, bɩ y ra yɛɛs ye. Mam miime tɩ yãmb baooda a Zezi b sẽn ka da-pɩk zugã.
Bãmb ka be ka ye, bala, b vʋʋga wa b sẽn dag n yeelã. Wa n ges-y zĩig ning b sẽn dag n gãe wã,
la y kẽng tao-tao n tɩ togs b karen-biisã tɩ b vʋʋgame n bas kũum. La ade, b renga yãmb taoor Galile. Yaa be la yãmb na n yã bãmba. Ade, mam togsa yãmba.
B yii yaoogã zĩigẽ tao-tao ne rabeem, la ne sũ-no-kãsenga, la b zoeeme n tɩ togs karen-biisã koɛɛgã.
La gese, a Zezi wa n sega pagbã n yeel-b yaa: Mam pʋʋsda yãmba. Bãmb kolgame n gãd a Zezi naowã n waoog-ba.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Da maan-y rabeem ye. Kẽng n tɩ yeel-y m ba-biisã tɩ b kẽng Galile. Yaa be la b na n yã maam.
Pagbã sẽn nan ket n be sorẽ, gũudbã neb kẽer kẽnga tẽngã pʋgẽ n tɩ togs maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã bũmb nins fãa sẽn maanã.
Bãmb ne nin-kẽembã tigsa taab n yã taaba, la b kõo sodaasã ligd wʋsg
n yeel-b tɩ b yeel tɩ bãmb gũsame t'a Zezi karen-biisã wa zuk kũumã,
la Gʋvɛrneerã sã n wʋme, bãmb mensã na n goma ne-a n tõog t'a ka maan bãmb bũmb ye.
Sodaasã deega ligdã, la b maana wa b sẽn yeel bãmbã. La gom-kãng kell n saaga Zuif-rãmbã sʋk hal tɩ ta rũnna.
Karen-biis piig la a yembrã kẽnga Galile, tãng ning a Zezi sẽn dag n bilg bãmbã zugu.
La b sẽn yãnd a Zezi, b waooga bãmba. La neb kẽer maana sãmbse.
A Zezi kolgame n gom ne bãmb a woto: Wẽnnaam kõo maam pãng fãa sẽn be arzãn la tẽng zugu.
Bɩ y kẽng n maan neba buud fãa tɩ yɩ mam karen-biisi, n lis bãmb ne Ba, la Bi-ribla, la Sɩɩg-sõng yʋʋre,
la y zãms bãmb tɩ b sak bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn yeel yãmb tɩ y maanã. La gese, mam bee ne yãmb wakat fãa, hal tɩ ta wakat sɛɛbo.
Koe-noog ninga sẽn togsd a Zezi Kirist sẽn ya Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã yɛlã sɩngr la a woto.
A zemsa wa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sẽn gʋlsã: Ade, mam tʋmda m koe-toagsd t'a reng fo taoor n maneg f sorã.
Yaa yẽ koɛɛg n kelemd we-rasempʋɩɩgã pʋgẽ n yetẽ: Maneg-y Zu-soaba sore, rems-y bãmb so-bugsã tɩ yɩ tɩrse.
A Zã ra bee weoogẽ n lisd nebã la a moondẽ n yetẽ tɩ b tek yam n deeg lisg b yel-wẽna sugr yĩnga.
Zude rãmba ne Zeruzalɛm dãmba yitame n kẽngd yẽ nengẽ, n vẽnegd n togsd b yel-wẽna t'a lisd bãmb Zʋrdẽ kʋɩlga pʋgẽ.
A Zã futã ra wʋga ne yʋgemd kõbdo. A sẽbdgã ra yaa gãongo, la a rɩɩb ra yaa sʋya la weoog sɩɩdo.
Yẽ ra moondame n yetẽ: Ned sẽn yɩɩd maam n na n pʋgl maam n wa. Mam pʋs n pa zems tɩ zõond n lok bãmb neooda loets ye.
Mam lisa yãmb koomẽ, la bãmb na n lisa yãmb Sɩɩg-sõng pʋgẽ.
Wakat kãnga, a Zezi yii Galile Nazarɛt n wa, la a Zã lisa bãmb Zʋrdẽ kooma pʋgẽ.
La b sẽn yit koomẽ wã, b yãa yĩngr sẽn pake, la Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn wẽnd wall sẽn sigd bãmb zugu.
Koɛɛg zĩnda saasẽ n yeele: Fo yaa mam Bi-ribl-nongr sẽn ta mam yam zãnga.
Tao-tao bala, Sɩɩgã kɩtame t'a Zezi kẽng we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ.
Bãmb paa be rasem pis-naas tɩ Sʋtãanã mak bãmba. B ra bee be ne we-rũmsi, la malɛk-rãmb ra sõngda bãmba.
B sẽn kẽes a Zã bi-bees roogã zugẽ, a Zezi kẽnga Galile n tɩ moond koe-noogã n yetẽ:
Wakat taame, la Wẽnnaam soolem kolgame. Tek-y yam n bas y yel-wẽna la y tẽ koe-noogã.
Bãmb sẽn tũud Galile mogrã noore, bãmb yãa a Sɩmo ne a ba-biig a Ãndre tɩ b lobd zĩm-gãmbr mogrã pʋgẽ. Bala, b ra yaa zĩm-yõagdba.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Wa n tũ-y maam, tɩ m na n kɩtame tɩ y lebg nin-baoodba.
Bãmb basa b zĩm-gãmba wã tao-tao n tũ a Zezi.
Bãmb sẽn kẽng taoor bilfu, b yãa a Zebde kom-dibli a Zak ne a ba-biig a Zã. Bãmb me ra bee koom-koglgẽ n tõgd b zĩm-gãmba.
Tao-tao bala, a Zezi boola bãmba, la b basa b ba a Zebde koglgã pʋgẽ ne tʋmtʋmdbã n tũ bãmba.
A Zezi ne b karen-biisã kẽnga Kapɛrnawom. La Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daarã sẽn ta, a Zezi kẽe karen-doogẽ wã n sɩng n zãms nebã.
Bãmb zãmsgã yɛɛsa nebã, bala, b zãmsa ne noore, la ka wa tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ye.
La rao a yen n da be bãmb karen-doogẽ wã tɩ zĩn-dẽgd tar-a. A kelmame n yeele:
Zezi sẽn yit Nazarɛt, yãmb toor bee ne tõndo? Yãmb waame n na n sãam tõnd laa? Mam bãnga yãmb sẽn ya ned ninga. Yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam sõmblem soaba.
A Zezi leng-a lame n yeele: Sĩnd la f yi n bas rao wã.
Zĩn-dẽgdã kelma ne pãnga, n yi n bas rao wã t'a rigd wʋsgo.
Neba fãa yɛɛsame n sok taaba: Bõn-kãnga yaa bõe? Koe-paalga! B tãsda zĩn-dãmb mens hal tɩ b sakd-ba.
Tao-tao bala, bãmb yʋʋr saaga zĩiga fãa Galile soolmẽ.
A Zezi ne b karen-biisã sẽn yi karen-doogẽ wã, a Zezi ne a Zak la a Zã kẽnga a Sɩmo ne a Ãndre rãmb zakẽ.
A Sɩmo reem-poakã yĩns ra wɩngame t'a gãeyã. La a Zezi sẽn ta bala, b togs-b lame.
Bãmb kolgame n gãd a nug n sõng-a t'a yiki, la wakat kãng bala, a yĩn-wɩngrã sigame t'a yik n maan-b sãando.
La zĩ-sobdo, wĩndgã lʋɩɩs poore, neba talla bãad-dãmba fãa ne neb nins zĩn-dãmb sẽn tarã n wa a Zezi nengẽ.
La tẽngã nebã tigma taab roogã noore.
A Zezi maaga neb wʋsgo, bãas buud toay-toay sẽn da tara. Bãmb diga zĩn-dãmb wʋsg me n ka sak tɩ b gom ye, bala, zĩn-dãmba da mii bãmba.
A Zezi sãda beoogo, tɩ zĩigã ket n ya lika, n kẽng zĩig neb sẽn ka be n tɩ pʋʋse.
A Sɩmo ne neb nins sẽn be ne yẽ wã baoo bãmba.
La b sẽn yãnd a Zezi, b yeel-b lame yaa: Neba fãa baooda yãmba.
La a Zezi leoka bãmba: Wa-y tɩ d kẽng tẽn-kɩremse, tɩ m tɩ moon koe-noogã beene me, tɩ yaa rẽnda yĩng la m wa-yã.
Bãmb saaga Galile n moon koe-noogã karen-dotã pʋse, la b rig zĩn-dãmba.
Ned a yen yĩn-gãong bãag sẽn tar n wa a Zezi nengẽ n yĩgimd n bõos bãmb ne nimbãaneg n yeele: Yãmb sã n data, y tõe n maaga maam tɩ m yɩ yɩlemde.
Rao wã nimbãaneg yõka a Zezi tɩ b tẽeg b nug n sɩɩs-a n yeele: Mam datame, lebg yɩlemde.
Wakat kãng bala, yĩn-gãongã bãag loog n bas-a lame t'a lebg yɩlemde.
A Zezi yeel-a-la tao-tao t'a looge, n keoog-a neer n yeele:
Yõk f noor n da yeel ned tɩ bũmb ye. La f kẽng n tɩ wilg f meng maan-kʋʋdã, la f maan maoong ning a Moyiis sẽn wilgã, f yɩlgr yĩnga, t'a yɩ kaset neba yĩnga.
La rao wã sẽn looge, a puka yellã n moone, hal t'a Zezi ka le tõe n kẽ tẽngẽ tɩ ka yɩ ne soosg ye. Bãmb zĩnda zĩis neb sẽn ka be, la neb ra yita zĩiga fãa n wat bãmb nengẽ.
Rasem bilf rẽ loogr poore, a Zezi lebg n waa Kapɛrnawom, la nebã wʋmame tɩ b bee roogẽ.
Nebã tigma taab hal wʋsgo, tɩ weer ka be baa rig-noorẽ wã ye. La a Zezi moona bãmb Wẽnnaam koɛɛga.
B talla ned a yen sẽn ki bogr n wa bãmb nengẽ, la yaa neb a naas n tʋk-a.
La bãmb sẽn ka tõe n tall-a n ta a Zezi nengẽ neba waooglem yĩngã, b laka roogã zugu, zĩig ning a Zezi sẽn yɛsã n tũnug võ-kãnga n sik ki-bogrã ne a gãagã.
A Zezi sẽn yã b tẽebã, b yeela sẽn ki-a bogrã yaa: M biiga, fo paama f yel-wẽna sugri.
Tõog karen-saam-dãmb kẽer sẽn da zĩ be ra tagsda b sũurẽ woto:
Yaa a wãn tɩ ra-kãnga gomd a woto? Bãmb paoogda Wẽnnaam. Ãnna n tõe n kõ yel-wẽn sugr tɩ ka Wẽnnaam b yen tãa?
A Zezi bãnga bũmb nins b sẽn tagsd b sũurẽ wã n sok-b yaa: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb tagsd woto y sũyã pʋse?
Bʋg n ya naana n yɩɩd tɩ yeel ki-bogr soabã: Fo paama f yel-wẽna sugri, bɩ yik n dɩk f gãagã n kẽne?
La yaa tɩ yãmb na bãng tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã tara pãng dũni zug tɩ kõ yel-wẽn sugri.
La a Zezi yeela ki-bogr soabã yaa: Mam yeta foom tɩ f yik n dɩk f gãagã n kuili.
Tao-tao bala, a yikame n dɩk a gãagã n loog nebã fãa nifẽ, tɩ b fãa yɛɛs n pẽg Wẽnnaam n yeele: Tõnd nan ka yã bũmb a woto nand ye.
A Zezi leb n kẽnga mogrã noore, la kʋʋngã fãa waa bãmb nengẽ. La bãmb zãms-b lame.
A Zezi sẽn loogda, b yãa a Alfe biig a Levi t'a zĩ yaood-deegr zĩigẽ. Bãmb yeela yẽnda yaa: Tũ maam. La a Levi yikame n tũ bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn zĩ a Levi roogẽ n dɩtẽ, yaood-dɛɛgdbã ne yel-wẽn maandb wʋsg me lagmame n dɩt ne bãmba, ne b karen-biisã. Bala, b yɩɩ wʋsg n tũ bãmba.

Tõog karen-saam-dãmbã sẽn ya Fariisẽ-dãmb sẽn yã t'a Zezi rɩt ne yaood-dɛɛgdbã la ne yel-wẽn maandbã, b soka b karen-biisã yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ bãmb dɩt la b yũud ne yaood-dɛɛgdbã la ne yel-wẽn maandbã?
A Zezi sẽn wʋm woto, b yeela bãmba: Nin-kegems ka baood tɩp ye, yaa bãad-dãmb n baooda. Mam ka wa n na n bool nin-tɩrs ye, la yaa yel-wẽn maandbã.
A Zã karen-biisã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã da loeta noore. Nebã wa n soka a Zezi: Yaa bõe t'a Zã karen-biisã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã karen-biisã loet noor tɩ yãmb karen-biisã ka loetẽ?

A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Ned sã n maan kãadem n bool neba, nin-kõens tõee n loee noor wakat ning b sẽn ket n be ne-a wã sɩda? Bãmb sã n ket n be ne pʋg-paalã sɩda, b ka tõe n loe noor ye.
Daar n wat tɩ b na n yiis pʋg-paalã sɩdã b sʋka. Dẽ, wakat kãnga, b na yaool n loe noore.
Ned ka rɩkd peen-paalg n lisg fu-kʋdg ye, tɩ bõe, peen-paalgã na n kɩtame tɩ fu-kʋdgã kẽeg n yɩɩg pĩnda.
Ned ka suiid divẽ paalg ko-wao-kʋdẽ ye, tɩ bõe, divẽ wã na n kɩtame tɩ b pusi: Divẽ wã na raage, ko-waoosã na sãame. Divẽ paalg tog n suii ko-wao-paals pʋse.
Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daar a yen, a Zezi ne b karen-biisã da pɩʋʋgda pʋto, la b karen-biisã sẽn kẽndã, b sɩngame n yãgs koodo.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã yeela bãmb yaa: Gese, yaa bõe tɩ bãmb maand bũmb ning sẽn ka zems tɩ maan vʋʋsg daare?
A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Yãmb zɩ n karem bũmb ning a Daviid sẽn maan b yel-pakr wakate, la kom sẽn tar bãmb ne neb nins sẽn dag n be ne bãmbã laa?
La tɩ bãmb kẽe Wẽnnaam roogẽ, maan-kʋʋd a Abiyataar zamaanẽ, n dɩ kaset bur-paadem sẽn ka zems tɩ neba rɩ, kal maan-kʋʋdbã bala, la tɩ bãmb kõo neb nins sẽn da be ne bãmbã me laa?
B yeel-b lame yɛs yaa: Vʋʋsg raarã maana ninsaal yĩnga, la b ka maan ninsaal vʋʋsg daarã yĩng ye.
Woto yĩnga, Ninsaal Bi-riblã soo bũmba fãa, baa ne vʋʋsg daarã me.
A Zezi leb n kẽe karen-doogã pʋgẽ, la rao a yen n da be be t'a nug ki.
La Fariisẽ-dãmbã gũusa a Zezi n dat n bãng b sã n na n maaga yẽnda Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsgã daare, sẽn na yɩlẽ n paam n dõd bãmba.
A Zezi yeela rao ninga nug sẽn ki wã yaa: Yik n yaas sʋk ka!
La b soka Fariisẽ-dãmba yaa: Dẽ yĩnga, noor beeme tɩ maan neer vʋʋsgã daar bii, bɩ tɩ maan wẽnga? Tɩ fãag ned bii, bɩ tɩ kʋ-a? La b sĩndame.
A Zezi wẽneg n gesa b fãa ne sũ-yikri la ne sũ-sãoongo, b sũyã sẽn diglmã yĩngã. La b yeela rao wã t'a tẽeg a nugã. Rao wã tẽegame la a nugã vʋʋgame.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã yiime n yẽs ne Herood poorẽ dãmba tao-tao n bao b sẽn na n maan to-to n menes a Zezi.
A Zezi ne b karen-biisã kẽnga mogrã sẽne. La neb wʋsg yii Galile la Zude la Zeruzalɛm la Yidume la Zʋrdẽ rʋʋnde la Tɩɩr ne Sɩdõ tẽmse n tũ bãmba.
Neb kʋʋng kʋʋng sẽn wʋm bũmb nins fãa bãmb sẽn maanã waa bãmb nengẽ.
A Zezi yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b pẽneg kogl-bil yam-yam wakat fãa bãmb yĩnga, tɩ kʋʋngã ra wa n dɩdg bãmb ye.
Bãmb sẽn maagd neb wʋsgã yĩng kɩtame tɩ bãad-dãmb wʋsg da maoodẽ n dɩdgd taab n dat n sɩɩs bãmba.
Zĩn-dãmb nins sẽn ya rẽgdã sã n yã bãmba, b wõgemdeda bãmb taoor n kelem n yeele: Yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
La a Zezi keooga bãmb neere, n yeel-b tɩ b ra kaas b yʋʋrã ye.
Rẽ zugẽ, bãmb dʋʋ tãngã n bool b sẽn dat b rãmbã tɩ b wa bãmb nengẽ.
Bãmb yãka raop piig la a yiib tɩ b pa ne bãmba,
tɩ b tõe n tʋm-b tɩ b tɩ moon koe-noogã, ne pãn-tõog tɩ rig zĩn-dãmba.
Ad raop piig la a yiibã bãmb sẽn yãkã: a Sɩmo b sẽn pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Pɩyɛɛr,
a Zak sẽn ya a Zebde biiga, ne a ba-biig a Zã, a Zezi sẽn pʋd b yʋy tɩ Boanergɛs, sẽn dat n yeel tɩ raop sẽn wẽnd wa sa-kɛlenga,
a Ãndre, a Filip, a Bartelemi, a Matye, a Toma, a Alfe biig a Zak, a Tade,
a Sɩmo sẽn boond tɩ zelot la a Zudas Iskaryo, ned ning sẽn zãmb-a a Zezi wã.
A Zezi kuila yir ne b karen-biisã. La neb kʋʋng wʋsg tigma taab yɛs hal tɩ bãmb ka tar sẽk n na n dɩ ye.
A Zezi roagdbã sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, b waame n na n peeg-ba, bala, b ra tagsdame t'a Zezi ra zʋbsdame.
La tõog karen-saam-dãmbã sẽn yi Zeruzalɛmã yeelame: Belzebul n so bãmba. Bãmb rigda zĩn-dãmbã ne zĩn-dãmbã naab pãnga.
A Zezi boola bãmba, n gom ne bãmb ne yel-bũnd n yeele: Sʋtãanã na n yɩɩ a wãn n dig sʋtãana?
Soolem neb sã n welg taab n gõdg n zabd ne taaba, soolem kãng na wã.
La yir a yen neb sã n welg taab n gõdg n zabd ne taaba, yi-kãng na wã.
Woto, Sʋtãanã sã n zabd ne a menga, a welgame la a ka tõe n yals ye, a yell sãamame.
Ned ka tõe n kẽ pãng soab roogẽ n wʋk a teedo, a sã n ka reng n sẽb-a ye. La a sã n sẽb-a, a tõe n yaool n wʋka a roogã teedo.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd tɩ ninsaalbã yel-wẽna fãa b sẽn maandã, la paoogr nins fãa b sẽn paoogdã tõe n paama sugri.
La ned sã n paoog Sɩɩg-sõngo, a ka tõe n paam sugr abada. Yel-wẽn kãng paada ne-a wakat sẽn kõn sa.
A Zezi goma a woto b sẽn yeel tɩ zĩn-dẽgd n tar bãmbã yĩnga.
A Zezi ma ne b ma-biis waa n yalsa yɩng n tʋm tɩ b bool-b tɩ b wa.
Kʋʋngã ra zĩndame n gũbg bãmba, la b yeela a Zezi yaa: Ad y ma ne y ma-biisã bee yɩng n baood yãmba.
La b leokame: Mam ma yaa ãnna, la m ma-biis yaa ãnna rãmba?
La b wẽnemdame n ges neb nins sẽn zĩ n gũbg bãmbã n yeele: Ad m ma ne m ma-biisi.
Bala, ned ninga fãa sẽn maand-a Wẽnnaam daabo, ada soab n ya mam ma-bi-raoogo, la m ma-bi-poaka, la m ma.

A Zezi leb n sɩngame n na n zãms nebã mogrã noore. Neb kʋʋng wʋsg sẽn tigim taab bãmb nengẽ yĩnga, bãmb kẽe koom-koglg ninga sẽn be mogrã pʋgẽ wã n zĩndi. La kʋʋngã fãa zĩnda koomã noore.
Bãmb wẽe yel-bũn n zãms nebã bũmb wʋsgo. Zãmsgã pʋgẽ b yeela nebã yaa:
Kelg-y-yã! Ned a yen n da kẽng n na n tɩ fẽrg bõn-buudu.
Fẽrgrã wakate, bõn-biis kẽer lʋɩɩ sor kɩrenga, la liuuli waa n dɩɩ bãmba.
La kẽer lʋɩɩ kug zĩiga, tom sẽn ka waoogẽ, la tao-tao bala, b yiime, tomã sẽn ka waoogã yĩnga.
La sõor sẽn zẽke, wĩntoogã yõog-b lame tɩ b ki, b sẽn ka paam yẽgã yĩnga.
La kẽer lʋɩɩ gõos sʋka, la gõosã yikame n dɩ-b tɩ b ka wom biis ye.
La kẽer lʋɩɩ zĩ-sõngẽ n yik n wom biisi. Kẽer womame tɩ ta bɛɛl pis-tãtã, tɩ kẽer ta pis-yoobyoobe, tɩ kẽer ta koabg-koabga.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeelame: Sẽn tar-a tʋb sẽn wʋmd bɩ a wʋm.
Bãmb sẽn wa n be kɛɛnga, neb nins sẽn tũ-b bãmbã ne karen-biis piig la a yiibã soka bãmb yel-bũnã võore.
A Zezi yeela bãmba: Yaa yãmb la Wẽnnaam kɩt tɩ y bãng bãmb soolem bõn-solgdse, la ne neb nins sẽn ka be soolmã pʋgẽ wã, yel-kãens yaa soalem bala,
"hal tɩ baa b sã n get sõama, b kõn yã ye, la b sã n wʋmd sõama, b kõn wʋm a võore, tɩ b ra wa n tek yam n kos sugr n paam ye."
A Zezi leb n sok-b lame yaa: Yãmb ka wʋmd yel-bũn-kãnga võor laa? Dẽ, yãmb na n maana a wãn n wʋm yel-bũnã fãa võore?
Bõn-bu-fẽrgdã fẽrga Wẽnnaam goama.
Neb kẽer wẽnda wa sor kɩrengã, zĩig ning Wẽnnaam goama sẽn fẽrgã. Bãmb sẽn wʋm koɛɛgã yee, la Sʋtãanã sẽn wat n yiis koɛɛg ning sẽn bʋd b sũurẽ wã.
Woto me, neb nins sẽn wʋm Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã n deeg-a tao-tao ne sũ-noogã wẽnda wa kugã zĩig bõn-buudã sẽn lʋɩẽ wã.
Bãmb ka tar yẽg ye, bãmb kaoosda bilf bala. La toog bɩ namsg sã n paam bãmba Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã yĩnga, tao-tao bala, b lʋɩtame.
Neb a taab wẽnda wa gõos zĩigã bõn-biisã sẽn lʋɩẽ wã. Bãmb yaa neb nins sẽn wʋmd Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã, tɩ yɩɩr ne dũniyã yɛlã,
la arzegs belgre, la bũmb a taab ratem kẽedẽ n dɩt Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã t'a ka womd biis ye.

La neb a taab wẽnda wa zĩ-sõngã bõn-biisã sẽn lʋɩ a pʋgẽ wã. Bãmb dãmb yaa neb sẽn wʋmd Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã n deegdẽ n womd biisi. Kẽer womame tɩ ta bɛɛl pis-tãtã, tɩ kẽer ta pis-yoobyoobe, tɩ kẽer ta koabg-koabga.
A Zezi leb n soka bãmb yaa: Rẽ yĩnga, b fõgenda fɩtɩl ne peoogo, wall b ning-a gãag tẽngre? B kõn dogl-a fɩtɩl doagendgã zug sɩda?
Tɩ bõe, bũmb ka be sẽn ludi, sẽn kõn puk ye, la bũmb ka be sẽn solge, sẽn kõn vẽneg ye.
Bɩ sẽn tar-a tʋb sẽn wʋmd wʋme.
Bãmb leb n yeela neba yaa: Gũus-y neer ne bũmb ning yãmb sẽn wʋmdã. Wẽnnaam na n maka ne makdg ninga yãmb sẽn tar n makd n kõt nebã n lebs yãmba, la b na n ningame tɩ sudgi.
Bala, b na n kõo ned ning sẽn tar-a, la ned ning sẽn ka tar-a wã, b na n deega baa bũmb bilf ning a sẽn tarã.
Bãmb leb n yeelame: Wẽnnaam soolem yaa wa rao sẽn bʋd bõn-biis a pʋʋgẽ.
A gõe t'a ne me, wĩndg ne yʋngo, bõn-biisã bundame n yikdẽ, la yẽ ka mi sẽn yɩt to-to ye.
Bõn-bulã yita b toore, n deng n ya vãado, n wa rɩk pʋse, n yaool n wom biis sẽn ya sõama.
La biisã sã n bɩ zãnga, b tigsdame, bala, a tigsg wakat taame.
A Zezi leb n yeelame: Tõnd na n mamsa Wẽnnaam soolemã ne bõe, wall d bilg-a ne bõe yel-bũndi?
A wẽnda wa siin-bila. Yẽ yaa bilf n yɩɩd bõn-biisã fãa sẽn bʋt tẽngã.
La b sã n bʋd-a, a yikdame n lebg wok n yɩɩd zẽed buud a taabã fãa, n tãoodẽ tɩ liuuli tõe n tʋɩ b tʋgd a maasmẽ.
Yaa ne yel-bũn a woto buud wʋsg la a Zezi wilg nebã Wẽnnaam goamã, a wa sẽn zems b wʋmbo.
A Zezi ka gom ne-ba, a sã n ka ne yel-bũn ye. La b sã n wa n be ne b karen-biisã bala, b bilgda bãmb bũmb fãa võore.
La baraar bala, zĩ-sobd sẽn ta, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Wa-y tɩ d kẽng mogrã rʋʋnde.
La karen-biisã sẽn kuils nebã n sɛ, bãmb looga ne a Zezi ne koom-koglg ning b sẽn dag n be a pʋgẽ wã. La kogond a taab me tũu bãmba.
Sob-kãseng yikame tɩ ko-pɛma kẽed koglgã pʋg hal t'a zoe n kolg pidbu.
La a Zezi ra bee koglgã poorẽ n kʋgl zu-kʋk n gõe. La b neka bãmb n yeele: Karen-saamba, tõnd sẽn na n sãamã yell ka pak yãmb laa?
A Zezi sẽn neke, b lenga sobgã, n yeel ko-kãsengã t'a bas bʋʋr la a sĩndi! La sobgã yõkame tɩ zĩigã lebg sɩddd.
Dẽ, a Zezi sok-b lame: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb zoet rabeem a woto? Yaa a wãn tɩ yãmb ka tar tẽebo?
Dabeem kãseng yõk-b lame, la b soka taab tɩ nin-kãnga yaa bõe neda, tɩ hal baa sobgã ne ko-kãsengã sakd bãmba?
A Zezi ne b karen-biisã taa ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde, tẽng sẽn boond tɩ Gadara.
A Zezi sẽn yi koom-koglgã pʋgẽ bala, rao a yen zĩn-dẽgd sẽn tar yii yaad zĩigẽ n wa bãmb nengẽ.
Rao-kãng da gãee yaadẽ wã, la neb da ka le tõe n sẽb-a ye, baa ne kutu.
Bala, naoor wʋsgo, b ra balga a naowã ne kutu la b sẽb-a ne bãense, la a kaoo bãensã n sãam kutã, la ned baa a yen ka tar pãng sẽn sek tɩ tõog-a ye.
Daar fãa, yʋng ne wĩndga, a bee yaadẽ wã la tãensã zut n kelemdẽ la a pogend a meng ne kuga.
A sẽn yã a Zezi sẽn ket n be yɩɩga, a wudgame n ta n wõgemd bãmb taoore, n zẽk a koɛɛg n gom ne pãng n yeele:
Zezi! Saasẽ-saasẽ Wẽnnaam bi-ribla, yãmb data maam ne bõe? Mam kota yãmb ne Wẽnnaam yʋʋr tɩ y ra nams maam ye.
Bala, a Zezi yeela yẽnda yaa: Zĩn-dẽgdã! Yi n bas rao wã.
La bãmb sok-a lame yaa: Fo yʋʋr la a bõe? T'a leok-ba: Mam yʋʋr la a Tusa wã, bala, tõnd yaa wʋsgo.
La yẽ kosa a Zezi ne a sũur fãa n yeel tɩ b ra rig zĩn-dãmbã tɩ b yi tẽn-kãng ye.
Kurkuy kʋʋng wʋsg n da be tãngã sẽne n wãbdẽ.
La zĩn-dãmbã bõosa a Zezi n yeele: Tʋm-y tõnd kurkuyẽ wã tɩ d tɩ kẽ-ba.
La b kõ-b la noore. La zĩn-dãmba yiime n kẽ kurkuyã tɩ b yi tãngã sigdg n wudg n lʋɩ ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ. La b sõorã kolga tus a yi, la koomã rɩ-b lame.
La neb nins sẽn dag n gũud bãmbã zoeeme n tɩ togs koɛɛgã tẽngã pʋgẽ la a kɩremsã, la neba yiime n tɩ ges bũmb ninga sẽn maanã.
Bãmb waa a Zezi nengẽ, la b yãa ned ning zĩn sẽn boond tɩ Tusa wã sẽn dag n tarã, t'a yer fut n zĩẽ, n mi a nenga.
Neb nins sẽn yãnd bũmb ning sẽn maanã togsa neb a taabã sẽn yɩ to-to ne rao ning zĩna sẽn da tarã, la ne kurkuyã.
Dẽ, bãmb sɩngame n kos a Zezi ne b sũur fãa tɩ b yi n bas b tẽngã.
Bãmb sẽn wa n kẽed koom-koglgẽ wã, rao ning zĩna sẽn dag n tarã kosa bãmb noor n na n pa ne bãmba.
La a Zezi ka sak ye, n yeel-a t'a kuil a nebẽ n tɩ wilg bũmb nins fãa Zu-soabã sẽn maan yẽnda wã, la b sẽn zoe yẽ nimbãaneg to-to.
Yẽ kẽnga Dekapol soolem n tɩ moon bũmb nins fãa a Zezi sẽn maan n kõ yẽ wã. La neba fãa yɛɛsame.
A Zezi kẽe koom-koglgã n leb ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde. La neb kʋʋng wʋsg le tigma taab bãmb nengẽ, la a Zezi da bee koomã noore.
La karen-doog kãsem a yembr n wa be t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Zayirus. Yẽ sẽn yã a Zezi, a wõgemda bãmb taoore,
n kos bãmb ne a sũur fãa n yeele: Mam bi-pugl n kolg kũum. Wa-y n sɩɩs-y-yã-a ne y nus t'a sãoog n tɩlge.
A Zezi yãaga yẽnda, la neb kʋʋng wʋsg tũu bãmba, n dɩdgd bãmba.
Mik tɩ pag a yen n da be be t'a zɩɩm yit hal yʋʋm piig la a yiibu.
Yẽ namsa wʋsg tɩpdb wʋsg nusẽ, n kɩs bũmb nins fãa a sẽn da tarã, la a ka sãoog baa bilfu, bãagã pʋs n yãngdame.
A wʋma a Zezi kibare, la a wẽdga nebã n wa a Zezi poorẽ n sɩɩs bãmb fuugu.
Bala, a ra yeela a sũurẽ woto: Mam sã n tõog n sɩɩs b futã bala, mam na n paama maagre.
La wakat kãng bala, zɩɩma sẽn dag n yitã yõkame, la a bãnga a yĩngã pʋgẽ tɩ bãagã bas-a lame.
Wakat kãng bal me, a Zezi bãnga b mengã pʋgẽ tɩ pãng n yi bãmb nengẽ. La b wẽnemda kʋʋngã sʋk n soke: Ãnna n sɩɩs mam futã?
Bãmb karen-biisã yeela bãmb yaa: Yãmb yãame tɩ neb wʋsg rɩdga yãmba, tɩ yãmb le sokdẽ tɩ ãnna n sɩɩs yãmba.
La bãmb da wẽnemdame n na n ges n bãng sẽn maan-a bõn-kãngã.
La rabeem yõka pagã t'a rigda, la a sẽn mi bũmb ning sẽn maan yẽ yĩngẽ wã yĩnga, a waa n yĩgimda a Zezi taoore, n pelg a pʋgã fãa n togs bãmba.
La a Zezi yeela yẽnda: M biiga, fo tẽeb n maag-fo. Kẽng ne laafɩ n paam f meng ne bãag ning sẽn tar foomã.
Bãmb sẽn ket n gomda, neb yii karen-doog kãsmã zakẽ n wa n yeele: Yãmb bi-puglã kiime, bõe tɩ y na n kell n nams karen-saamba?
La a Zezi ka kelg gom-kãens ye, la b yeela karen-doog kãsmã yaa: Da maan dabeem ye, tẽ bala.
La b ka sak tɩ ned yãag bãmb ye, sã n ka a Pɩyɛɛr la a Zak ne a ba-biig a Zã.
B sẽn ta karen-doog kãsmã zakẽ, a Zezi yãa neb wʋsg sẽn be be n yãbda, n wiisdẽ, n maand bʋʋr wʋsgo.
Bãmb kẽeme n sok neba yaa: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb maand bʋʋr a woto la y yãbda? Biigã ka ki ye, a gõeeme.
La neba yaala bãmba. Dẽ, a Zezi kɩtame tɩ neba fãa yi, la b tall biigã ba ne a ma, ne b karen-biis a tãabã sẽn yãag bãmbã n kẽ biigã sẽn be zĩig ningã.
Bãmb gãda biigã nug n yeel-a: "Talita kumi" sẽn dat n yeel tɩ: Mam bi-pugla, mam yeta foom tɩ f yiki.
Tao-tao bala, bi-puglã yikame n sɩng n kẽnda, bala, a ra tara yʋʋm piig la a yiibu. La nebã yɛɛsa wʋsgo.
A Zezi sagla bãmb neere n yeel-b tɩ b gũus tɩ ned da bãng ye, n yaool n yeel-b tɩ b bao rɩɩb n kõ biigã t'a rɩ.
A Zezi basa zĩ-kãnga n leb b meng tẽngẽ, la b karen-biisã tũu bãmba.

La Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daar sẽn ta, bãmb zãmsa nebã karen-doogẽ wã. Neba wʋsg sẽn wʋm bãmb zãmsgã, b yɛɛsame n soke: Bãmb bãng-kãng yita yɛ? Ad yaa yam meng-meng la b kõ-ba, hal tɩ b tõe n maan bõn-bãn ne b nusi!
Ka bãmb la ra-wãadã, a Maari biigã, a Zak la a Zoze la a Zuud la a Sɩmo ma-biigã? Bãmb ma-bi-pogs ka be tõnd sʋk ka sɩda? La yõwã kɩtame tɩ Nazarɛt nebã ka tẽ a Zezi ye.
La a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs ka kongd waoogre, sã n ka a meng tẽngẽ la a roagdb sʋka la a meng zakẽ ye.
Bãmb ka tõog n maan bõn-bãnd baa a yen beene, sã n ka b sẽn tik bãad-dãmb kẽer ne b nus n maag-bã bala.
La nebã ka-tẽebã yɛɛsa a Zezi. A Zezi saaga tẽn-kɩremsã n zãms nebã.
Dẽ, bãmb boola b karen-biisã piig la a yiibã, n sɩng n tʋm bãmb b yiib-yiibu, n kõ-b pãn-tõog tɩ b rig zĩn-dãmb nins sẽn ya rẽgdã.
A Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ b ra zã baa fʋɩ b kẽndã yĩnga, sã n ka rasaar bal ye. Tɩ b ra zã buri, wall korg bɩ ligd b sẽbds pʋs me ye.
B yeel-b lame tɩ b wid neooda la b ra yeelg fu-yord a yiib ye.
La a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Yãmb sã n tɩ sig ned zakẽ, pa-y be hal tɩ ta y loogre.
La yãmb sã n kẽng tẽngẽ tɩ b ka reeg yãmba, la b ka kelg yãmba, bɩ y yi be la y pĩms y naowã tom tɩ bõn-kãng yɩ kaset b yĩnga.
Bãmb loogame n moon n yeel nebã tɩ b tog n teka yam n kos sugri.
Bãmb diga zĩn-dãmb wʋsgo, la b tigsa bãad-dãmb wʋsg ne kaam n maag-ba.
Naab a Herood wʋma a Zezi kibare, bala, b yʋʋrã saaga zĩigã fãa. Neba yeelame: A Zãmbatiis vʋʋgame n yi kũum sʋka. Yaa woto n kɩt t'a tar pãng n maand bõn-bãna.
Neb a taab yeelame: Yaa a Eli! La neb kẽer yeelame: Bãmb yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs wa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb a taabã.
La Herood sẽn wʋm woto, yẽ yeelame: Yaa Zã ning mam sẽn da fiuug a zugã. Yaa yẽnda n vʋʋge.
Tɩ bõe, Herood meng da kɩtame tɩ b yõk a Zã n sẽb n kẽes bi-bees roogẽ, yẽ ba-biig a Filip pag a Herodyaad a sẽn peegã poorẽ.
Bala, a Zã ra yeel-a lame tɩ ka zems ne tõog tɩ yẽ dɩk a ba-biigã pag ye.
A Herodyaad sũur yika ne a Zã t'a rat n kɩt tɩ b kʋ-a.
La yẽ ka tõe ye, bala, Herood zoeta a Zã, a sẽn mi t'a yaa nin-tɩrg la nin-sõngã yĩnga. Herood gũ-a lame, la a sẽn wʋm a Zã goamã, lebga tagsg wʋsg ne-a. Baoosgo, a kelg-a la ne sũ-noogo.
Herood sẽn tẽeg a dogem daar n maan kibs a nin-kãsemsã ne a sodaas nanamsã ne Galile soolem nanamsã yĩnga, a Herodyaad paama weer n na n maan a sẽn dag n datã.
A Herodyaad bi-pugl kẽe roogẽ wã n sao, la biigã saoog yɩɩ Herood ne neb nins sẽn dag n zĩ ne yẽ n dɩtẽ wã noogo.
Herood wẽena ne yẽnda n yeele: Fo sẽn kos maam bũmb ning fãa, mam na kõ foom, baa sã n ya mam soolemã pʋɩ-sʋka.
La bi-puglã yiime n tɩ sok a ma: M kos bõe? La a ma wã leokame: Kos a Zãmbatiis zugã.
La yẽ leba rĩma nengẽ tao-tao n tɩ kos yẽnda a woto: Mam datame tɩ y kõ maam a Zãmbatiis zug ne lengr moasã bala.
Rĩma sũur sãamame. La a wẽenegã ne neba sẽn zĩ ne yẽnda wã yĩnga, a ka rat n tõdg ye.
Tao-tao bala, rĩmã yeela dapoe-bil t'a kẽng n tɩ wa ne a Zãmbatiis zugã.
Dapoe-bilã kẽngame n tɩ fiuug a Zã zugã bi-beesã roogẽ n sagl lengrẽ n tall n wa n kõ bi-puglã, la bi-puglã tallame n tɩ kõ a ma.
La a Zã karen-biisã sẽn wʋme, b waa n dɩka kũuma n tɩ ning yaoogẽ.
A Zezi tẽn-tʋmdbã tigma taab bãmb nengẽ n wilg bãmb bũmb nins fãa bãmb sẽn maane, la b zãms nebã.
Neb wʋsg ra watame la b loogdẽ hal tɩ bãmb ka tol n tar weer n na n dɩ ye. Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Wa-y tɩ d yi we-kɛɛnga, neb sẽn ka beẽ tɩ y tɩ vʋʋs bilfu.
Bãmb kẽe koom-koglgã n na n yi kɛɛnga, zĩig neb sẽn ka beẽ.
La neb wʋsg yãa bãmb loogrã n bãng bãmba. La neb yii tẽns fãa n zoe ne nao n deng bãmb n ta zĩig ning bãmb sẽn dabdã.
A Zezi sẽn yi koom-koglgẽ wã, b yãa neb kʋʋng wʋsgã, la b nimbãaneg yõka bãmba, tɩ bõe, bãmb wẽnda wa piis sẽn ka tar pe-kɩɩm ye. La bãmb sɩngame n zãms-b bũmb wʋsgo.
Wakatã sẽn loogdã yĩnga, a Zezi karen-biisã kolga bãmb n yeele: Zĩ-kãngã yaa weoogo, la wakatã loogdame.
Kɩt-y tɩ nebã loog n kẽng tẽn-bõonego la tẽn-kɩrems sẽn pẽ n tɩ ra dɩɩb n dɩ.
A Zezi leok-b lame tɩ bãmb mensã kõ nebã rɩɩb tɩ b rɩ. La b yeela a Zezi: Tõnd na n kẽngame n tɩ ra bur deniye kobsi n wa n kõ-b tɩ b rɩ?
La a Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Yãmb tara bur a wãna? Kẽng n ges-y yã. Karen-biisã kẽngame n tɩ gese, la b wa n togs a Zezi tɩ yaa bur a nu ne zĩm a yiibu.
Dẽ, bãmb yeelame tɩ b zĩnig nebã fãa sull-sull mo-maasã zugu.
La bãmb zĩnda rulg-rulga, koabg-koabga la pis-nunu.
A Zezi dɩka bur a nu wã ne zĩm a yiibã n nak n ges yĩngri, n ning barka, n yaool n kao burã n kõ b karen-biisã tɩ b pʋɩ kʋʋngã. Bãmb pʋɩɩ zĩm a yiibã me tɩ ta neba fãa.
Bãmb fãa rɩɩme n tɩge.
La b wʋka bur-gɩrsã ne zĩm-kɛlã peoog piig la a yiibu.
Neb nins sẽn dɩ burã yaa raop tus a nu.
Tao-tao bal yõwã zugẽ, a Zezi kɩtame tɩ b karen-biisã kẽ koom-koglgã n deng bãmb taoor ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde, Betsayida sẽne, tɩ bãmb mengã yõdg n kuils nebã.
Bãmb sẽn kuils nebã n sa, b kẽnga tãngã zug n tɩ pʋʋse.
Zĩ-sobd sẽn ta, koom-koglgã bee ko-kãsengã sʋka, t'a Zezi be tẽng b yembre.
Bãmb yãame tɩ b karen-biisã namsda wʋsgo, n dugsd koom-koglgã, bala, sobg n segd-ba. Sẽn kolg tõd-beoogo, a Zezi kẽna ko-kãsengã zug n dabd b karen-biisã sẽne, n dat n loog-ba.
Bãmb sẽn yã a Zezi tɩ b kẽnd koomã zugã, b tẽeme tɩ yaa kɩɩma,
la b kelmame, bala, bãmb fãa yã-b lame, la rabeem yõka bãmba. Tao-tao bala, a Zezi goma ne bãmb n yeele: Keng-y y sũyã, yaa maam. Da zoe-y rabeem ye.
Bãmb kẽe koom-koglgã pʋgẽ n paas b karen-biisã, la sobgã yõkame. Karen-biisã yɛɛsame n sẽege,
tɩ bõe, bãmb dag n ka wʋm burã bõn-bãndã võore, b sũyã sẽn diglmã yĩnga.
La bãmb sẽn pɩʋʋg mog-kãsengã, bãmb taa Genezarɛt soolmẽ, la b yalsa koomã noore.
La bãmb sẽn yi koom-koglgẽ wã, nebã bãnga a Zezi tao-tao.
La b zoeeme n kẽ soolemã fãa n tɩ rɩgs bãad-dãmbã ne pãnday n wa zĩig ning fãa b sẽn wʋm t'a Zezi be.

A Zezi sẽn taẽ fãa, tɩ yaa tẽn-bõonegẽ, tɩ yaa tẽn-bɛdẽ, tɩ yaa pʋt rotẽ, nebã gãnegda bãad-dãmb raas pʋse, la b kosa a Zezi tɩ b sak tɩ b sɩɩs b fuugã noor bala. La neb nins fãa sẽn sɩɩsã paama laafɩ.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã kẽer sẽn yi Zeruzalɛm tigma taab n gũbg a Zezi.
Bãmb yãa a Zezi karen-biisã kẽer sẽn dɩt rɩɩb ne nus-rẽgdo, sẽn dat n togs tɩ sẽn ka nudg ye.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne Zuif-rãmbã fãa yaool n ka rɩt tɩ b ka reng n nudg b nusã neer wa sẽn zems b yaab-rãmbã miningã ye.
La bãmb sã n yi raagẽ n wa, b sã n ka waase b ka rɩt ye. La b tara minind a taab b sẽn sakda, a wa wama la yʋya la zũud laas needgo.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã soka a Zezi tɩ yaa bõe yĩng tɩ bãmb karen-biisã ka sakd b yaab-rãmbã miningu, n dɩt ne nus-rẽgdo?
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Zãmb-dãmba, a Ezayi sɩd togsa bãngr goam ne yãmb yelle, a sẽn gʋls n yeele: "Nin-kãensã waoogda maam ne b nobɩms bala, la b sũyã zãra ne maam.
La bãmb sẽn waoogd maamã yaa zaalem, bala, bãmb zãmsa nebã kaoreng sẽn ya ninsaalb tõod bala."
Yãmb basda Wẽnnaam tõod n sakd ninsaalb minindu.
A Zezi kẽnga taoor n yeele: Yãmb tara sɩlem n maandẽ n basd Wẽnnaam tõodã kɛɛnga n sakd y mens minindu.
Bala, a Moyiis ra yeelame: "Waoog f ba la f ma, la ned sã n paoog a ba bɩ a ma bɩ b kʋ-a."
La ne yãmba, ned sã n yeel a ba bɩ a ma: "Mam sẽn da na n sõng yãmb ne bũmb ningã, a lebga korbã, sẽn dat n togs tɩ kũun Wẽnnaam yĩnga," a ka yell ye.
Yãmb ka le sakd t'a maan baa fʋɩ a ba bɩ a ma yĩng ye.
Woto, yãmb minindã yãmb sẽn karemd nebã kɩtdame tɩ Wẽnnaam goamã lebg zaalem. La yãmb maanda bũmb a woto buud wʋsgo.
Dẽ poore, bãmb leb n boola neb kʋʋngã n yeel-ba: Yãmb fãa, kelg-y maam la y bãnge.
Bũmb ka be n kẽed ninsaal pʋgẽ n tõe n kɩt t'a lebg rẽgd ye. Yaa bũmb ning sẽn yit ninsaal pʋgẽ wã n kɩtd t'a lebg rẽgdo.
Sẽn tar-a tʋb sẽn wʋmda, bɩ a wʋm.
Bãmb sẽn bas nebã n kẽ roogẽ, b karen-biisã soka bãmb yel-bũn kãng võore.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb me yam ka vẽneg laa? Yãmb ka wʋmd tɩ bũmb sẽn be yɩng n kẽed ninsaal pʋgẽ ka tõe n kɩt t'a lebg rẽgd laa?
Bala, bõn-kãng ka kẽed yẽ sũurã pʋgẽ ye, a kẽeda a pʋgẽ tɩ b yaool n tɩ yiis-a n bas we-kɛɛnga. (A Zezi goma a woto n na n wilg tɩ rɩɩb fãa yaa sẽn na rɩ.)
Bãmb leb n yeelame: Yaa bũmb ning sẽn yit ninsaal pʋgẽ wã n kɩtd t'a lebg rẽgdo.
Bala, yaa pʋgẽ, ninsaalb sũyã pʋs la bõn-wẽnsã yita: tags-wẽnse, tʋʋm-dẽgdo,
wagdem, nin-kʋʋre, yoobo, yão-beedo, pʋ-toogo, sɩlem, rãmbgo, sũ-kiiri, nin-tʋʋre, tɩtaam la yalem-tagsgo.
Bõn-wẽn kãens fãa yita ninsaal pʋgẽ n kɩtdẽ t'a lebg rẽgdo.
A Zezi basa zĩ-kãnga n kẽng Tɩɩr soolmẽ. Bãmb kẽe roogẽ n ka rat tɩ ned bãng ye, la b ka tõog n soond ye.
Bala, zĩn-dẽgd n dag n tar pag a yembr bi-pugla, la pagã wʋma a Zezi kibare, n wa n wõgemd bãmb taoore.
Yẽ yaa Gɛrk sẽn yit Siiri Fenisi. Yẽ kosa bãmb tɩ b rig zĩnã sẽn tar a biigã.
A Zezi yeela yẽnda: Bas tɩ kambã rɩ n tɩg nanda, bala, a ka zems tɩ b rɩk kamb rɩɩb n kõ ba-bi ye.
Yẽ leoka bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, yaa sɩda, la ba-bi sẽn be taabl tẽngr rɩta kambã rɩ-zersã.
Dẽ, bãmb yeel-a lame yaa: Gom-kãnga yĩng bɩ f kẽnge. Zĩnã yiime n bas f bi-puglã.
La yẽ sẽn ta yiri, a mikame tɩ zĩnã yii n basa a bi-puglã t'a gãe a gãagẽ.
A Zezi basa Tɩɩr soolem n leb n tũ Sɩdõ n pɩʋʋg Dekapol n kẽng Galile mog-kãsengã sẽne.
B waa ne wʋng sẽn ya bidg bãmb nengẽ n kos-b tɩ b tik-a ne b nusi.
Bãmb peega yẽnda kʋʋngã sʋk n yi kɛɛnga, n ning b nus-bi a tʋbã pʋsẽ, la b tʋbsame, n tẽk a zelemdã ne kolkoodã,
n yaool n nak n ges yĩngr n wẽ sir n yeele: "Effata", sẽn dat n togs tɩ yoke.
Tao-tao bala, a tʋba yoosame, la a zelemdã lakame t'a gomd sõama.
A Zezi sagla bãmb tɩ b ra togs ned ye. La bãmb sã n sagendẽ, b moondame n yɩɩd pĩnda.
Nebã yɛɛsa hal wʋsg n yetẽ: Bãmb maanda bũmb fãa neere. Bãmb kɩtdame tɩ baa wʋms wʋmdẽ, tɩ mugs gomda.
Ra-kãense, neb wʋsg sẽn leb n tigim taaba, la b ka tar rɩɩb sẽn na rɩ, a Zezi boola b karen-biisã n yeel-b yaa:
Kʋʋngã nimbãaneg tara maam, bala, rasem a tãab moasã la b be ne maam n ka tar rɩɩb sẽn na rɩ ye.
Mam sã n kɩt tɩ b kuil ne kom, b na n tadga sorẽ, bala, kẽer sẽn yiẽ zãrame.
Bãmb karen-biisã sok-b lame yaa: Ned na n yɩɩ a wãn n paam bur weoogẽ ka tɩ sek bãmba fãa?
A Zezi soka bãmb yaa: Yãmb tara bur a wãna? Bãmb leokame t'a yopoe.
Dẽ, bãmb kɩtame tɩ kʋʋngã zĩnd tẽnga. Bãmb dɩka bur a yopoe wã, la b sẽn ning-a bark n sa, b kaoome n kõ b karen-biisã tɩ b pʋɩ nebã, la b pʋɩ-b lame.
La bãmb dag n tara zĩm-bõoneg bilfu. La a Zezi sẽn ning-a barka, b yeelame tɩ b pʋɩ rẽ me.
Nebã dɩɩme n tɩge. La karen-biisã wʋka bur-gɩrsã sẽn kellã peoog a yopoe n zã.
Sẽn dɩ-bã sõor kolga neb tus a naase. Dẽ poore, a Zezi kuils-b lame.
Tao-tao bala, bãmb ne b karen-biisã kẽe koom-koglgã n kẽng Dalmanuta.
Fariisẽ-dãmba waame n sɩng n gom ne a Zezi. La sẽn na yɩlẽ n mak a Zezi, b kosa bãmb tɩ b wa ne bãnd sẽn yit yĩngri.
A Zezi wẽe sir-kãseng b sũurẽ n yeele: Bõe tɩ zamaan kãngã nebã baood bãnde? Mam yeta yãmb sɩd tɩ zamaan kãngã nebã kõn tol n paam bãnd ye.
Dẽ, a Zezi basa bãmb n kẽ koom koglg n kẽng ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde.
B karen-biisã yĩmame n ka zɩ bur ye. Yaa bur a yen tãa bal la b dag n tar koglgã pʋgẽ.
A Zezi sagla bãmb woto: Gũus-y y mens neer ne Fariisẽ-dãmba la Herood rã-bɩlle.
B karen-biisã yẽsa ne taab n yeel tɩ yaa bãmb sẽn ka tar burã yĩng la a Zezi gom a woto wã.
A Zezi bãngame n sok-b yaa: Yaa a wãn tɩ yãmb yẽsd ne taab n yetẽ tɩ yaa yãmb sẽn ka tar burã yĩnga? Yãmb yam ket n nan ka vẽneg laa? Yãmb ket n nan ka wʋm laa? Yãmb yamã kɩdame laa?
Yãmb sẽn tar ninã y ka ne laa? "Yãmb sẽn tar tʋbã y ka wʋmd laa? Yãmb ka tol n tar pʋ-tẽer laa?"
Mam sẽn kao bur a nu n kõ neb tus a nu wã, yãmb wʋka bur-gɩrsã sẽn kellã peoog a wãna? Bãmb leokame tɩ piig la a yiibu.
La mam sẽn kao bur a yopoe n kõ neb tus a naasã, yãmb wʋka bur-gɩrsã sẽn kellã peoog a wãna? Bãmb leokame t'a yopoe.
La a Zezi sok-b lame yaa: Yãmb ket n ka wʋm laa?
Bãmb kẽnga Betsayida, la b waa ne zoang a Zezi nengẽ n kos bãmb tɩ b sɩɩs-a.
Bãmb gãda zoangã nug n tɛ-a n yi tẽngã, n tʋbs kolkood n ning a ninã, n tik-a ne b nusi, n sok-a a sã n yãta bũmbu.
Zoangã gesame la a leok tɩ yẽ nee nebã, la b wẽnda wa tɩɩse, la b kẽndame.
A Zezi leb n tika yẽ ninã ne b nusã yɛsa. La zoangã sẽn ges kũii, a ninã pukame t'a ne vẽenega.
Dẽ, a Zezi kuilsa yẽ a yiri, n yeel-a t'a da kẽ tẽngã pʋgẽ ye.
A Zezi ne b karen-biisã kẽnga tẽns sẽn pẽ tẽng sẽn boond tɩ Filip Sezaare. La b sẽn be sorẽ, a Zezi soka b karen-biisã tɩ nebã yetame tɩ bãmb a Zezi yaa ãnna?
B leokame tɩ kẽer yetame t'a Zãmbatiis, tɩ kẽer yetẽ t'a Eli, tɩ kẽer me yetẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã ned a yembre.
La a Zezi sok-b lame yaa: La yãmba, yãmb yetame tɩ mam yaa ãnna? A Pɩyɛɛr leoka bãmb n yeel tɩ b yaa Kiristã.
A Zezi sagla bãmb neer tɩ b ra togs ned yõwã ye.

Dẽ, a Zezi sɩngame n zãms b karen-biisã n yeel tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã nams wʋsgo, la tɩ tẽngã nin-kẽembã ne maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã, ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã na n zãgsa bãmba, la tɩ b na n kʋʋ bãmba, la tɩ ra-yɩt-n-daarã, bãmb na n vʋʋgame.
Bãmb wilga bõn-kãens vẽenega. La a Pɩyɛɛr boola bãmb kɛɛnga, n sɩng n zab bãmba.
A Zezi leb n wẽnegame n ges b karen-biisã, n leng a Pɩyɛɛr n yeele: Sʋtãana, leb mam poorẽ, bala, fo tagsgã ka Wẽnnaam tagsg ye, yaa ninsaalb rẽnda.
Dẽ, bãmb boola b karen-biisã ne neb kʋʋngã n yeel-b yaa: Ned sã n dat n tũ maam, bɩ a kɩɩs a mengã raabo, n dɩk a ra-pɩk n tũ maam.
Bala, ned ning fãa sẽn dat n gũ a vɩɩm, a vɩɩmã na sãam, la ned ning fãa sẽn na bas a vɩɩm mam yĩnga la koe-noogã yĩnga, a na põse.
La ned sã n paam dũni bũmb fãa n yaool n bas n ki, bõe yõod la a paam a pʋgẽ?
Ninsaal na n teka a vɩɩmã ne bõe?

Mam yelle la mam goamã sã n ya yãnd ne nina zamaan kãngã nebã sẽn ya yoaadbã la yel-wẽn maandbã sʋka, yẽ me yell na n yɩɩ yãnd ne maam a Ninsaal Bi-riblã, wakat ning mam sẽn na n wa ne m ba wã naam la ne maleg-sõmyã.
A Zezi leb n yeela nebã yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ neb n be ka n ka na n ki hal tɩ b yãnd Wẽnnaam soolemã sẽn wat ne pãnga.
Yɩ tɩ rab-yoaablẽ, a Zezi peega a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zak la a Zã n tall bãmb bal n dʋ tãn-luglug zugu, zĩig neb sẽn ka be. La a Zezi nengã tedga bãmb taoore.
Bãmb futã pɩndame, n ya peels n yɩɩd dũni neb sẽn tõe n kɩt tɩ yɩ.
A Eli ne a Moyiis puka bãmb taoore, n gom ne a Zezi.
A Pɩyɛɛr yeela a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, yaa neer tɩ d pa ka, tɩ d tilg fu-rot a tãabo: yãmb a yembre, a Moyiis a yembre, a Eli a yembre.
