A ra ka mi a sẽn yet ye, bala, rabeem kãseng n da kẽ-ba.
Sawadg waa n luda bãmba, la koɛɛg yii sawadgẽ wã n yeele: Ada yaa mam Bi-ribl-nongre. Kelg-y-yã-a.
Tao-tao bala, karen-biisã wẽnesame n ges zĩiga fãa, la b ka yã neda, sã n ka a Zezi bal sẽn yɛs ne bãmbã.
Bãmb sẽn sigd tãngã, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b ra saag n togs ned bũmb nins b sẽn yã wã, hal tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã vʋʋg n bas kũum.
Bãmb talla koe-kãng bãmb sʋka, la b soka taab tɩ "vʋʋg n bas kũumã" võor yaa bõe.
Karen-biisã soka bãmb woto: Yaa bõe tɩ tõog karen-saam-dãmbã yetẽ tɩ yaa tɩlɛ t'a Eli reng n wa?
Bãmb leok-b lame yaa: Sɩda, a Eli n na n deng n wa n lebs n maneg bũmba fãa. La yaa bõe tɩ b gʋls tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã nams wʋsgo la b paam paoogre?
La mam yeta yãmb t'a Eli waame, la nebã maana yẽ wa b sẽn data, wa b sẽn pĩnd n gʋls n gom a yellã.
La bãmb sẽn kolg b karen-biis a taabã nengẽ, bãmb yãa neb kʋʋng wʋsg sẽn gũbg bãmba, la tõog karen-saam-dãmb sẽn wẽed nokoɛɛm ne bãmba.
La nebã sẽn yã a Zezi wã, a ling-b la wʋsgo, la b zoeeme n tɩ pʋʋs-ba.
A Zezi soka nebã: Yaa bõe yell la yãmb gomd ne bãmba?
La rao a yen n zĩnd kʋʋngã sʋk n leok bãmba: Karen-saamba, mam waa ne m biig yãmb nengẽ. Zĩn sẽn kɩtd tɩ ned lebg mukã n tar-a.
A sẽn yõk-a zĩig ning fãa, a lubd-a-la tẽnga tɩ tãntãn-puud yit a noorẽ, tɩ biigã wãb a yẽn n tɩre. La mam kosa yãmb karen-biisã tɩ b rig zĩnã la b ka tõog ye.
A Zezi leoka bãmba: Yãmba, zamaan kãngã neb sẽn ka tẽebo, mam na n zĩnda ne yãmb hal tɩ ta wakat bʋgo? Mam na n maana sũ-mar ne yãmb hal tɩ ta wakat bʋgo? Tall-y biigã n wa ka.
La b tall-a lame n wa bãmb nengẽ. Tao-tao bala, zĩnã sẽn yã a Zezi, a rĩmsa biigã ne pãnga, hal t'a lʋɩ tẽng n bilimdẽ t'a tãntãn-puud yita.
A Zezi soka a ba wã: Wakat bʋg la a sɩng n maand biigã a woto? Yẽ leokame: Hal a sẽn ket n ya bilf wakate.
La naoor wʋsgo, a lub-a-la bugmẽ bɩ koomẽ n dat n kʋ-a. La yãmb sã n tõe n maana bũmb bɩ y zoe d nimbãaneg n sõng-do.
A Zezi yeela yẽ yaa: Yãmb sã n tõe? Ned ning fãa sẽn tẽed tõee bũmb fãa.
Tao-tao bala, biigã ba zẽka a koɛɛg n yeele: Mam tẽedame. Paas-y m tẽebã t'a paoodame.
A Zezi sẽn yã kʋʋngã sẽn zoet n watẽ wã, bãmb lenga zĩn-dẽgdã n yeel-a: Zĩn sẽn maand ned t'a lebg muk la wʋngã, mam yeta foom, yi n bas biigã la f ra leb n kẽ-a yɛs ye.
La zĩnã kelmame, n zugs biigã ne pãng t'a lebg wa kũum, la a yi bas-a. Neb kẽer yeelame t'a kiime.
La a Zezi gãda a nug n zẽk-a, la a yik n yalsa yĩngri.
Wakat ning a Zezi sẽn kẽ roogẽ tɩ neb a taab ka be be, bãmb karen-biisã soka bãmb yaa: Bõe tɩ tõnd ka tõog n dig zĩn-kãngã?
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Bõn-kãngã ka yita, tɩ sã n ka ne pʋʋsg ye.
Bãmb yii be n pɩʋʋg Galile. La a Zezi ka rat tɩ ned bãng bãmb sẽn beẽ ye.
Bala, bãmb zãmsa b karen-biisã n yeele: B na n ninga Ninsaal Bi-riblã neb nusẽ. B na n kʋ-b lame, la b kʋ-b tɩ rab tãtẽ, b na n vʋʋgame.
La bãmb karen-biisã ka wʋm gom kãng võor ye, la b zoee rabeem n ka sok bãmb ye.
Bãmb taa Kapɛrnawom, la a Zezi sẽn kẽ roogẽ, b soka b karen-biisã: Yaa bõe poorẽ la yãmb da wẽed nokoeemd ne taab sorã zugã?
La b sĩndame, bala, bãmb sẽn dag n be sorã zugã, b ra wẽeda nokoeemd ne taaba n dat n bãng sẽn ya-a kãseng n yɩɩd bãmb sʋka.
Dẽ, a Zezi zĩndame n bool b karen-biis piig la a yiibã n yeel-b yaa: Ned sã n dat n yɩ taoor soaba, bɩ a yɩ neba fãa poorẽ soaba, la neba fãa tʋmtʋmda.
Bãmb peega bi-bilfu n yals-a bãmb sʋka, n kogl-a n yeel b karen-biisã:
Ned sã n deeg bi-bilf a woto mam yĩnga, yaa maam la a reeg-yã. La ned sã n deeg maam, ka maam la a reegɩ ye, yaa sẽn tʋm-a maamã la a reeg-yã.
A Zã yeela bãmb yaa: Karen-saamba, tõnd yãa rao a yembr t'a rigd zĩn-dãmb ne yãmb yʋʋre, n yaool n ka tõnd tũud-n-taag ye. La tõnd gɩdg-a lame a sẽn ka tũud tõndã yĩnga.
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Da gɩdg-y-yã-a ye, bala, ned ka be sẽn na n maan bõn-bãnd ne mam yʋʋre, n wẽneg n sãbs maam ye.
Ned sã n ka kɩɩsd tõndo, a bee ne tõndo.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ ned sã n kõ yãmb koom mam yĩng tɩ y yũ, yãmb sẽn ya Kirist nebã yĩnga, a soab kõn kong a keoor ye.
La ned sã n maan kom-bõoneg kãens sẽn tẽed maamã ned a yembr t'a lʋɩ, sẽn ya neer n yɩɩd a soab yĩnga, yaa b sẽn na n loe a yubl ne neer kugr n lob-a ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ. Neer kuga (9.42)
Fo nug sã n dat n maan foom tɩ f lʋɩ, bɩ f fiuug-a. Yaa neer tɩ fo yɩ nug-yend n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa, n yɩɩd tɩ fo tall f nus a yiibã n tɩ kẽ bug-tẽnga, bugum sẽn ka kiid pʋgẽ,
zĩig ning bãmb zũnzũy sẽn ka kiida la bugum sẽn ka kiida.
Fo naoor sã n dat n maan foom tɩ f lʋɩ, bɩ f fiuug-a. Yaa neer tɩ fo yɩ nao-yende, n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa, n yɩɩd tɩ f tall f nao a yiibã n tɩ kẽ bug-tẽnga,
zĩig ning bãmb zũnzũy sẽn ka kiida, la bugum sẽn ka kiida.
Fo nif sã n dat n maan foom tɩ f lʋɩ, bɩ f feoog-a. Yaa neer tɩ f yɩ nin-feoog n kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ, n yɩɩd tɩ tall f nin a yiibã n tɩ kẽ bug-tẽnga,
"zĩig ning bãmb zũnzũy sẽn ka kiida la bugum sẽn ka kiida."
Tɩ bõe, ned fãa na n paama yuglg ne bugum wa yamsem.
Yamsem yaa bõn-sõngo. La yamsem noosem sã n yi, yãmb na n maana bõe t'a leb n yɩ noogo? Tall-y yamsem noosem n zĩnd ne taab ne laafɩ.
A Zezi yii be n kẽng Zude soolem pʋgẽ tẽnsẽ, la Zʋrdẽ rʋʋnd a to wã. La neb kʋʋng leb n tigma bãmb nengẽ, la bãmb leb n zãms-b lame wa b sẽn mi n maandẽ wã.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã waa a Zezi nengẽ. B soka a Zezi sok-bẽdgo, n yeel tɩ rẽ yĩnga tõogã kõta rao noor t'a lebs a paga?
A Zezi leoka bãmba: A Moyiis tõogã yeela yãmb tɩ bõe?
Bãmb yeelame: A sakame tɩ b gʋls baosg sebr n kɩs-a la b rig-a.
A Zezi yeela bãmba: Yaa yãmb sũyã sẽn diglmã yĩng la a Moyiis kõ yãmb tõ-kãnga.
La hal dũni sɩngrẽ, "Wẽnnaam naana rao la paga.
Yaa woto yĩnga, rao na n yii n basa a ba la a ma, n zĩnd ne a paga.
La bãmb b yiibã fãa na n lebga yĩng a yembre." Woto, bãmb ka leb n ya a yiib yɛs ye, bãmb yaa yĩng a yembre.
Dẽ, bɩ ninsaal da welg bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn lagem ne taab ye.
Bãmb sẽn kẽ roogẽ, b karen-biisã le soka bãmb koe-kãng yelle.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Ned sã n dig a pag n dɩk pag a to, a yaa yoaad a pipi pagã nifẽ.
La pag sã n bas a sɩd n dɩk a to, a maanda yoobo.
Neb talla kom-bõoneg n wa a Zezi nengẽ tɩ b sɩɩs-ba, la b karen-biisã lenga neb nins sẽn wa-b ne-bã.

A Zezi sẽn yã bõn-kãnga, a ka yɩ b sũurã noog baa bilf ye. La bãmb yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Bas-y kom-bõonegã tɩ b wa mam nengẽ la y ra gɩdg-b ye, tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã yaa neb nins sẽn wẽnd-b bãmbã yĩnga.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩda tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn kõn deeg Wẽnnaam soolmã koɛɛg wa bi-bilfu, a kõn kẽ be ye.
Dẽ, bãmb deega kambã n tik-b ne b nusi, n ning-b barka.
A Zezi sẽn yik n dɩk sore, dao a yen n zoe n wa n yĩgimd bãmb taoor n sok bãmb yaa: Karen-saamb sõngo, bõe la mam na n maan n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa?
A Zezi yeela yẽnda: Bõe tɩ fo boond maam tɩ sõngo? Nin-sõng ka be tɩ sã n ka Wẽnnaam b yen bala.
Fo mii tõodã: "Da kʋ ye. Da yo ye. Da zu ye. Da kɩs kaset-zĩrĩ ye. Da zãmb ned ye. Waoog f ba la f ma."
Yẽ leoka bãmb yaa: Karen-saamba, mam saka rẽnda fãa hal m yãadem wakat tɩ ta moasã.
A Zezi ges-a lame n noang-a. La bãmb yeela yẽnda: Bũmb a yen n paoog foom. Kẽng n koos bũmb nins fãa fo sẽn tarã n kõ naong rãmba, la fo na paam paoong arzãna, la wa n tũ maam.
La koe-kãng kɩtame tɩ rao wã neng gãnem t'a loog ne sũ-sãoongo, bala, a rag n tara paoong wʋsgo.
A Zezi wẽnegame n ges n yeel b karen-biisã: A na n yɩɩ toog ne neb nins sẽn tar-b arzegsã tɩ kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ.
A Zezi gom-kãng yɛɛsa b karen-biisã, la a Zezi kẽnga taoor n yeel-ba: M kamba, ad na n yɩɩ toog ne neb nins sẽn teegd arzegsã tɩ b kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ.
A yaa naana tɩ yʋgemd tũ fu-pĩim yõorẽ n looge, n yɩɩd tɩ arzɛk soab kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ.
Bãmb karen-biisã yɛɛsg paasame tɩ b sok taab yaa: Dẽ, ãnna n tõe n paam fãagre?
A Zezi gesa bãmb n yeele: Ninsaal ka tõe bõn-kãng ye, la ka a woto ne Wẽnnaam ye. Bala, Wẽnnaam tõee bũmb fãa.
A Pɩyɛɛr sɩngame n yeel bãmba: Gese, tõnd basa bũmba fãa n tũud yãmba.
A Zezi leokame: Mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ ned ka be sẽn na n bas a yiri, bɩ a ba-bi-raopa, bɩ a ba-bi-pogse, bɩ a ma, bɩ a ba, bɩ a kamba, bɩ a pʋt mam yĩnga la koe-noogã yĩnga,
n ka paam yiyã, la ba-bi-raopa la ba-bi-pogse, la ma-rãmba, la kamba, la pʋt naoor koabga, la namsg ye. La wakat sẽn wata, a na paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Taoor rãmb wʋsg na n lebga poorẽ dãmba, tɩ poorẽ dãmb wʋsg lebg taoor dãmba.

Bãmb bee sorẽ n dabd Zeruzalɛm, la a Zezi lʋɩɩ bãmb taoore. Bãmb karen-biisã yɛɛsame, la neb nins sẽn dag n pʋgd bãmbã da maanda yɩɩre. A Zezi leb n peega b karen-biis piig la a yiibã n sɩng n togs-b bũmb nins sẽn na n paam bãmbã.

Gese, tõnd dabda Zeruzalɛm, la b na n yõka Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kõ maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã. La b na n kaoo bãmb bʋʋd n yeel tɩ b kʋ-ba. B na n ninga bãmb bu-zẽms nusẽ,
b na n yaala bãmba, n tʋbs bãmb kolkoodo, n pãb bãmb ne kalwaase, n kʋ bãmba. La b ki tɩ rab tãtẽ, b na vʋʋge.
A Zebde kom-dibli a Zak ne a Zã kolga a Zezi n yeel bãmb yaa: Karen-saamba, tõnd datame tɩ yãmb maan bũmb ning tõnd sẽn na n kos yãmbã n kõ-do.
A Zezi soka bãmba: Bõe la yãmb dat tɩ mam maan n kõ yãmba?
Bãmb yeelame: Yãmb sã n wa n be y naama sẽn tar ziirã pʋgẽ, sak-y tɩ tõnd ned a yembr zĩnd yãmb dɩtgo, t'a to wã zĩnd yãmb goabga.
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Yãmb ka mi bũmb ning yãmb sẽn kotã ye. Dẽ yĩnga, yãmb tõee n yũu bõn-yũudl ning mam sẽn na n yũ wã, la y reeg toog ning mam sẽn na n deegã?
Bãmb yeelame tɩ b tõeeme! La a Zezi leoka bãmba: Yaa sɩda, yãmb na n yũu bõn-yũudl ning mam sẽn na n yũ wã, la y reeg toog ning mam sẽn na n deegã.
La a ka be ne maam tɩ sak tɩ yãmb zĩnd mam dɩtgo wall mam goabg ye. La neb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn segl zĩ-kãng b yĩngã na paam-a.
Karen-biis piigã sẽn wʋm gom-kãngã, b sũur sãama ne a Zak la a Zã.
A Zezi boola bãmb n yeel-b yaa: Yãmb mi tɩ neb nins nebã sẽn get wa soolem nanamsã maanda b nebã pãnga, la tɩ nin-kãsemsã soo bãmb ne pãnga.
La a kõn yɩ a woto yãmb sʋk ye. Ned sã n dat n yɩ kãseng yãmb sʋka, bɩ a yɩ yãmb tʋmtʋmda.
La ned sã n dat n yɩ taoor soab yãmb sʋka, bɩ a yɩ yãmb fãa yamba.
Tɩ bõe, Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn wa wã, ka tɩ nebã na tʋm bãmb yĩng ye, la yaa tɩ tʋm nebã yĩnga, la tɩ kõ b vɩɩm tɩ yɩ yaoodo, tɩ neb kʋʋng wʋsg tõe n paam yolsgo.
Bãmb taa Zeriko. La bãmb sẽn yit Zeriko ne b karen-biisã la neb kʋʋng wʋsgã, a Time biig a Bartime ra zĩi sorã kɩreng n bõosdẽ.
Yẽ sẽn wʋm tɩ yaa Nazarɛt Zezi n watã, a sɩngame n kelem n yeele: Zezi! A Daviid Bi-ribla! Zoe-y mam nimbãanega.
Neb wʋsg lenga yẽnda n yeel-a t'a sĩndi, la a zẽka a koɛɛg n yɩɩd pĩnd n yeele: A Daviid Bi-ribla, zoe-y mam nimbãanega!
A Zezi yalsame n yeel tɩ b bool-a. La b boola zoangã n yeel-a: Keng f sũuri. Yik tɩ b boonda foom.
Zoangã loba a fuug tẽng n yik wʋgʋp, n wa a Zezi nengẽ.
A Zezi sok-a lame yaa: Bõe la fo rat tɩ mam maan n kõ foom? Zoangã leoka bãmb n yeele: M karen-saamba, m data m ninã pukri.
La a Zezi yeel-a lame: Kẽnge! Fo tẽeb n maag foom. Tao-tao bala, a paama a nini, la a sɩngame n tũ a Zezi sorã zugu.
Bãmb sẽn kolg Zeruzalɛm n pẽneg Bɛtfaaze la Betani, oliiv tɩɩs tãngã sẽne, a Zezi tʋma b karen-biis a yiib n yeel-b yaa:
Kẽng-y tẽng ninga sẽn be-a yãmb taoorã. Yãmb sã n kẽ tẽngã bala, y na n yãa bõn-bil sẽn loe, ned sẽn nan ka zomb-a ye. Lok-y-yã-a n wa-ne ka.
Ned sã n sok yãmb tɩ yaa bõe tɩ yãmb maand a woto? Bɩ y leok-a tɩ yaa Zu-soabã n dat-a, la bãmb na n kɩtame tɩ b leb n tall-a n wa ka moas-moasã bala.
Bãmb karen-biisã kẽngame n tɩ yã bõn-bil sẽn loe zak noore, sorã kɩrenga, la bãmb lok-a lame.
Neb kẽer sẽn be be soka bãmb yaa: Yãmb maanda bõe? Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb lokd bõn-bilã?
Bãmb leoka wa a Zezi sẽn da yeel bãmbã, la b basa bãmb tɩ b looge.
Bãmb waa ne bõn-bilã a Zezi nengẽ, n palg-a b futu, la a Zezi zomb-a lame.
Neb wʋsg yɛɛda b fut sorã zugu, tɩ kẽer gãneg tɩɩs vãad b sẽn kao pʋt pʋsẽ.
Neb nins sẽn be a Zezi taoorã ne neb nins sẽn pʋgd bãmbã kelmame n yeele: Hozaana! Bark bee ned ning sẽn wat ne Zu-soaba yʋʋrã zugu!
Bark bee soolem ning sẽn wat-a wã, tõnd ba a Daviid soolmã zugu. Hozaana hal saasẽ!
A Zezi taa Zeruzalɛm n kẽ wẽnd-doogẽ wã. La bãmb sẽn ges bũmbã fãa n sa, rẽ tɩ zĩigã sobgame. La b yii be ne b karen-biisã piig la a yiibã n kẽng Betani.
Vẽkembeoog yibeoogo, bãmb sẽn yit Betani, kom da tara a Zezi.
La b sẽn tool n yã kankang sẽn tar vãad yɩɩga, bãmb kẽngame n na n tɩ ges b sã n na paam bũmb beene. La b sẽn kolge, b ka yã bũmb ye, yaa vãad bala: Bala, kankam wakat nan ka ta ye.
Dẽ, bãmb yeela kankangã yaa: Ned kõn leb n dɩ fo biis yɛs ye, abada. La bãmb karen-biisã wʋmame.
Bãmb taa Zeruzalɛm, la a Zezi sẽn kẽ wẽnd-doogã zakẽ, b sɩngame n dig neb nins sẽn koosda, wall b raad beene wã. La b leeba ligd tekdbã taabl-dãmba la wan koaasdbã goeelse.
La bãmb ka sak tɩ ned baa a yen zã teoog n pɩʋʋg wẽnd-doogã zak ye.
La bãmb zãmsa nebã n yeele: Rẽ yĩnga, b ka gʋls tɩ "b na n boola mam doogã tɩ pʋʋsg roog buud fãa yĩng" sɩda? La yãmb maan-a lame t'a lebg wagda geongo.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã wʋma a Zezi gomdã, la b baoo sor ning b sẽn na n tũ n kʋ-ba. Bãmb dag n zoeta a Zezi, bala, b zãmsgã ra kẽe neb kʋʋngã sõama.
La zĩ-sobd sẽn ta, a Zezi yii tẽngã ne b karen-biisã.
La yibeoogo, bãmb sẽn loogda, b yãa kankangã sẽn kʋɩ ne a yẽgã fãa.
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn tẽeg bũmb ninga sẽn dag n maanã, a yeela a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, ges-y-yã! Kankangã yãmb sẽn dag n kãab wẽngã, a kʋɩɩme.
A Zezi yeela bãmba: Maan-y tẽeb ne Wẽnnaam.

Mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ ned sã n yeel tãn-kãngã t'a serg a sẽn beẽ wã n kẽ ko-kãsengã pʋga, la a sã n ka sãmb a sũurã pʋgẽ, la a sã n tẽ tɩ bũmb ning yẽ sẽn yeelã na n yɩɩme, Wẽnnaam na n kɩtame tɩ yɩ a woto.
Yaa woto yĩnga, mam yeta yãmba: Bũmb ning fãa yãmb sẽn na pʋʋs n kose, bɩ y tẽ tɩ y reeg-a lame, la yãmb na yã t'a pidsame.
Yãmb sã n yas yĩngr n pʋʋsdẽ, yãmb sã n tara yell ne neda, bɩ y kõ-a sugri, tɩ yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã me kõ yãmb sugr y beegrã yĩnga.
La yãmb sã n ka maan sugri, yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã me kõn maan yãmb sugr ne y beegrã ye.
Bãmb leb n kẽnga Zeruzalɛm yɛsa, la a Zezi sẽn gõod wẽnd-doogẽ wã, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã, ne kãsem-dãmbã waa bãmb nengẽ n sok-b yaa:
Yãmb maanda bõn-kãens ne no-bʋgo, la ãnna n kõ yãmb noor tɩ y maane?
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Mam na n soka yãmb sokr a yembre. Leok-y maam tɩ mam na yaool n togs yãmb mam sẽn paam noorã zĩig ning n maand bõn-kãensã.
A Zã lisgã yii arzãn bii, bɩ ninsaalb nengẽ? Leok-y maam.
La bãmb yẽsa ne taab a woto: Tõnd sã n leok t'a yii arzãna, bãmb na n yeelame tɩ la yaa wãn tɩ tõnd ka tẽ-a?
La tõnd sã n yeel t'a yii ninsaalb nengẽ, ha!... Bãmb dag n zoeta nebã, bala, nebã ra tẽedame t'a Zã sɩd yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs hakɩɩka.
Dẽ, bãmb leoka a Zezi tɩ b ka mi ye. La a Zezi yeela bãmba: Mam me kõn togs yãmb mam sẽn paam noorã zĩig ning n maand bõn-kãensã ye.

Dẽ poore, a Zezi sɩngame n tão bãmb yel-bũnd n yeele: Dao a yen n da sel a nasaar sib tɩɩse, n wẽ yãgr n gũbg-a, n tuk divẽ wẽkr boko la a me gãosgo. La yẽ gũnug-a-la ne sib koaadba la a bas n tog sore.
La bõn-bɩʋʋng sẽn ta, yẽ tʋma tʋmtʋmd sib koaadbã nengẽ t'a tɩ reeg a pʋɩɩr n wa n kõ-a.
La bãmb yõka yẽnda n pãbe, n dig-a t'a lebg a nug-zaala.
La yẽ leb n tʋma tʋmtʋmd a to bãmb nengẽ, la b pãba yẽ zugã n yaal-a.
Yẽ tʋma a tãab soaba, la b kʋʋ yẽnda. La yẽ tʋma neb a taab wʋsgo, la b pãba kẽere, n kʋ kẽere.
Nin-yend tãa n da ket yẽ sẽn tõe n tʋme: A bi-ribl nongre. Yẽ yaool n tʋma yẽnda n tagsdẽ: B na n waooga mam biigã.
La sib koaadb kãens yẽsa ne taab n yeele: Yaa yõwã n na n soog a ba wã paoongã. Wa-y tɩ d kʋ-a tɩ paoongã lebg tõnd dẽnda.
La bãmb yõka yẽnda n kʋ, n yiis-a nasaar sibã pʋʋgẽ n lob kɛɛnga.
Woto wã, nasaar sib pʋʋgã soab na n maana bõe? Yẽ na n waame n kʋ sib koaadb kãense, la a rɩk pʋʋgã n gũnug koaadb a taaba.
Yãmb nan ka karem gʋls-sõmyã koe-kãngã laa? Kugr ninga tãn-metbã sẽn zãgsã lebga roogã pãng kugri, a soakã zĩigẽ wã.
Yaa Zu-soabã n kɩt t'a yɩ a woto, la a yaa bõn-kãseng tõnd nifẽ. Gãosg nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ (12.1)

Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã la kãsem-dãmbã da rat n yõka a Zezi, la b zoee kʋʋngã. B bãngame tɩ yaa bãmb yell la a Zezi gom yel-bũndã pʋgẽ. La b basa a Zezi n looge.
Bãmb tʋma Fariisẽ-dãmba kẽer ne Herood poorẽ dãmb kẽer tɩ b tɩ maan sɩlem n kɩt t'a Zezi gom n yõk b meng n kõ-ba.

B waa n yeela a Zezi a woto: Karen-saamba, tõnd miime tɩ yãmb yaa sɩd soaba, la tɩ yãmb ka zoet ned baa a yen: Bala, yãmb ka tũusd neb ye. La yãmb zãmsda nebã Wẽnnaam sorã ne sɩda. Dẽ yĩnga, a zemsa ne tõnd tõogã tɩ yao Sezaar yõor yaood bɩ a ka zemse? Tõnd tog n yaoome bii, bɩ d ka tog n yao?
A Zezi sẽn mi b zãmbã leoka bãmb yaa: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb makd maam? Wa-y ne lagf a yen tɩ m gese.
La b talla a yen n wa n kõ bãmba. La a Zezi sok-b lame yaa: Maasmã ne yʋʋrã yaa ãnna rẽnda? Bãmb leokame tɩ yaa Sezaar rẽnda.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Lebs-y Sezaar bũmb nins Sezaar sẽn so, la y lebs Wẽnnaam bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn so. A Zezi leokrã yɛɛsa bãmba.
Saduusẽ-dãmba sẽn yet tɩ kũum vʋʋgr ka be wã waa a Zezi nengẽ n sok bãmb a woto:
Karen-saamba, a Moyiis ra gʋlsame n yeel tõnd tɩ: "Ned sã n ki n bas a paga, n ka tar biiga, bɩ a ba-biig reeg a pagã n dog kamb a ba-biigã yĩnga."
Raop a yopoe n da be n ya ba-biisi. Kẽem soabã peega paga, la a kiime n ka paam biig ye.
Yiib soabã reega pʋgkõorã, la yẽnda me kiime n ka paam biig ye. Tãab soaba me yɩɩ a woto.
Bãmb b yopoe wã ned baa a yen ka paam biig ye. Bãmb fãa sẽn ki, pagã me yaool n kiime.
Kũum vʋʋgr wakate, pagã na n yɩɩ ãnna soab paga? Bala, yẽ yɩɩ bãmb b yopoe wã fãa paga.
A Zezi leoka bãmba: Ka yãmb sẽn ka wʋmd gʋls-sõamyã, wall Wẽnnaam pãngã võor yĩng la yãmb tudg-y sɩda?
Tɩ bõe, kũum vʋʋgr wakate, raop ka na n le rɩgs pagba, pagb me ka na n kuil sɩdba: Bãmb na n yɩɩ wa malegsã sẽn be arzãnã.

La ne kũum vʋʋgrã yelle, yãmb nan ka karem a Moyiis sebrẽ wã, Wẽnnaam sẽn gom ne a Moyiis to-to, tuugã sẽn wit bugma sɛɛgẽ wã n yeele tɩ: "Mam yaa a Abraham Wẽnnaam, a Izak Wẽnnaam la a Zakob Wẽnnaam" laa?
Wẽnnaam ka kũum Wẽnnaamã ye b yaa nin-vɩɩse Wẽnnaam. Ad yãmb tudgrã yaa kãsenga!
Tõog karen-saamb a yembr sẽn wʋm bãmb goama, la a sẽn yã t'a Zezi leoka bãmba ne yam, a kolgame n sok bãmb yaa: Tõodã fãa sʋka, bʋg n yɩɩda?
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Ad tõog ning sẽn yɩɩd-a wã: "Israyɛl dãmba, kelg-y-yã. Zu-soaba, tõnd Wẽnnaamã yaa Zu-soab b yen tãa.
Nong Zu-soaba fo Wẽnnaam ne f sũur fãa la f ratem fãa la f yam fãa la f pãng fãa."
Tõog ninga sẽn pʋgd-a yẽ la woto: "Nong f to wa f menga." Tõog ka be sẽn yɩɩd bãmba ye.
Tõog karen-saambã yeela bãmb yaa: Karen-saamba, y gomd yaa sɩda. Wẽnnaam sɩd yaa b yen tãa, la a to ka be kal bãmb bala,
la tɩ nong bãmb ne f sũur fãa la f yam fãa la f pãng fãa, la tɩ nong f to wa f menga, a yɩɩda maand sẽn yõogd bugum la maand buud a taabã fãa.
A Zezi sẽn yã tɩ yẽ leoka ne yam, b yeel-a lame: Fo ka zãr ne Wẽnnaam soolem ye. La ned baa a yen ka saag n le sok bãmb bũmb ye.
A Zezi sẽn zãmsd nebã wẽnd-doogẽ wã, b sokame: Yɩta a wãn tɩ tõog karen-saam-dãmbã yetẽ tɩ Kirist yaa a Daviid biiga?
Sɩɩg-sõng kɩtame t'a Daviid meng yeel tɩ: "Zu-soaba yeela mam Zu-soaba yaa: Zĩnd mam dɩtgo, hal tɩ m kɩt tɩ f tab f bɛɛbã n zĩẽ."
A Daviid meng boonda bãmb tɩ Zu-soaba. Dẽ, bãmb na n yɩɩ a wãn n le yɩ a Daviid biiga? La neb kʋʋng wʋsg kelga bãmb ne sũ-noogo.
Zãmsgã pʋgẽ, a Zezi yeela nebã yaa: Gũus-y y mens ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã sẽn nong n gõ ne fu-bɛda, n dat tɩ nebã pʋʋsd bãmb raas pʋsã.
Bãmb baooda waoogr zaoods karen-dotẽ la rɩɩb zĩisẽ.
Bãmb gʋsda pʋgkõap paoongo, la b pʋʋsd pʋʋs-wogd nebã gesg yĩnga. Bãmb na n paama sɩbgr sẽn ya toog n yɩɩd a taabã.
A Zezi zĩndame n tees b neng ligdã koglgã, n get kʋʋngã sẽn ningd ligdã be wã. Arzegs rãmb wʋsg ninga ligd wʋsgo.
Pʋgkõor a yen sẽn ya naong soab n wa n ning lagd-bõoneg sẽn zem tãma.
La a Zezi boola b karen-biisã n yeel-ba: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ pʋgkõ-kãngã sẽn ya naong soabã kõome n yɩɩd neba fãa sẽn ning ligd ligdã koglgẽ wã.
Tɩ bõe, bãmb ned kam fãa tʋm n yõngame n ningi, la yẽ sẽn ka tarã, a pɩɩsa a meng zãng n kɩse, hal a rɩɩb ligdi.
A Zezi sẽn yit wẽnd-doogẽ wã, bãmb karen-biig a yembr yeela bãmb yaa: Karen-saamba, ges-y kugã neerlem la rotã bedrem!
A Zezi leoka yẽnda: Fo nee ro-kãsems kãensã? Kugr baa a yen kõn pa a to zug b sẽn kõn leeb n lub ye.
A Zezi zĩnda oliiv tɩɩs tãngã sẽn be wẽnd-doogã neng taoorã zugu. Bãmb sẽn ya b yen tɩ neb a taab ka be ne bãmba, a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zak la a Zã la Ãndre kosa a Zezi a woto:
Wilg-y tõnd bõn-kãng sẽn na n wa wakat ninga, la bãnd sẽn na n wilg bõn-kãens fãa saab wakate.
La a Zezi sɩngame n yeel bãmba: Gũus-y y mens neer tɩ ned da tõog n tudg yãmb ye.
Bala, neb wʋsg na n dɩka mam yʋʋr n wa n yeel tɩ bãmb yaa maam, la b na n tudga neb wʋsgo.
Yãmb sã n wʋm zabr rãamde, la y wʋm zabr kibare, bɩ y ra yɛɛs ye, tɩ bõe, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bõn-kãens fãa zĩndi, la rẽ nan ka wakat saab nand ye.

Tẽng a ye rãmb na n yika zabr ne tẽng a to rãmba, tɩ soolem a ye rãmb yik ne soolem a to rãmba. La tẽn-digimdg na n zĩnda zĩig-zĩiga, la kom na n zĩndame. Bõn-kãens fãa na n yɩɩ wa rogem toog sɩngr bala.

Gũus-y y mense. Neb na n yõga yãmb n kẽng bʋʋd zĩisẽ, la b na n pãba yãmb karen-dot pʋse. Neb na n yõga yãmb n kẽng Gʋvɛrneer dãmba la rĩm-dãmb taoor mam yĩnga, tɩ bãmb paam n wʋm kasetã.
Yaa tɩlɛ tɩ koe-noogã reng n moon tẽnsã fãa pʋse.

La b sã n yõg yãmb n kẽnd bʋʋdã zĩigẽ, bɩ y ra maan yɩɩr ne yãmb sẽn na n tɩ yeel tɩ bũmb ning ye. Togs-y bũmb ning Wẽnnaam sẽn na n wilg yãmb wakat kãngã, bala, ka yãmb n na n gom ye, yaa Sɩɩg-sõngo.
Ned na n zãmba a ba-biig tɩ b kʋ-a. Kamb na n yika ne b ba-rãmb la b ma-rãmba, n kɩt tɩ b kʋ-ba.
Neb na n kisga yãmb mam yʋʋrã yĩnga, la ned ninga fãa sẽn na yals kãenkãe hal tɩ wakat ta na paam fãagre.
Yãmb sã n wa n yã "sãoong bõn-wẽngã" t'a be zĩig ning sẽn ka zems t'a beẽ wã - bɩ sẽn karemd-a wã wʋm a võor sõama - bɩ neb nins sẽn be Zude soolmẽ wã zoe n dʋ tãensã.
Bɩ ned ning sẽn be a roog zug ra sig n kẽ a roogẽ n na n dɩk bũmb ye.
La bɩ ned ning sẽn be a pʋʋgẽ ra lebg n tɩ rɩk a fuug ye.
Pagb nins sẽn tʋta la sẽn yẽsemd kamb na yã toog da-kãens daare.
Pʋʋs-y tɩ bõn-kãens ra yɩ waood wẽnd ye.
Tɩ bõe, tood nins sẽn na n zĩnd da-kãens daarã, sẽn sɩng ne Wẽnnaam sẽn naan dũni hal tɩ ta moasã, a buud nan ka zĩnd ye, la tood a woto buud kõn leb n zĩnd ye, abada.
Zu-soabã sã n da ka boogẽ da-kãens sõore, ned baa a yen dag n kõn põs ye. La nin-tũusdsã bãmb sẽn tũusã yĩnga, bãmb booga da-kãens sõore.
Dẽ, ned sã n yeel yãmb tɩ Kirist bee ka, wall b bee ka sẽne, bɩ y ra tẽ-a ye.
Tɩ bõe, neb sẽn yagd zĩrĩ tɩ b yaa Kirist, la neb sẽn yagd zĩrĩ tɩ bãmb yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb na n yikame n maan bãna la bõn-yɛɛsdse, tɩ b sã n tõe, bɩ b tudg nin-tũusdsã.
Gũus-y y mense. Mam pĩnd n togsa yãmb bũmba fãa.
Wakat kãnga, to-kãng zugẽ, wĩntoogã na n sobgame la kiuugã kõn kõ a vẽenem yɛs ye.
Ãdsã na n yii yĩngr n dʋʋge, la saasẽ pãens rãmbã na n digimdame.
Dẽ poore, nebã na n yãa "Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn wat ne sawato," ne pãn-kãsenga, la naam.
La bãmb na n tʋma b malegsã, n tigs b nin-tũusdsã sẽn be dũni kɩrems a naasã, hal dũni tɛk tɩ ta yĩngr tɛka.
Ges-y kankang n paam zãmsgo: a sã n tão wil-poal n tobdẽ, yãmb miime tɩ sig-noor kolgdame.
Woto me, yãmb sã n yã tɩ bõn-kãens maandẽ, bɩ y bãng tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã waoong kolgame, la b waame n sa.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ zamaan kãngã kõn looge, hal tɩ bõn-kãens fãa paam pidsgu.
Yĩngr la tẽng na looge, la mam goamã kõn tol n loog ye, abada.
Sã n yaa ne da-kãng daare la a wakatã, ned baa a yen ka mi ye: Malegs sẽn be arzãn ka mi, bi-riblã me ka mi. Yaa m ba bal n mi.
Gũus-y neere. Neend-y, tɩ bõe, yãmb ka mi wakat ninga ra-kãng sẽn na n wa ye.
A na n yɩɩ wa rao sẽn togd sore, n bas a yir ne a tʋmtʋmdbã, n wilg ned kam fãa a tʋʋmde la a yeel zag-no-gũudã t'a gũ.
Woto yĩnga, neend-y, tɩ yãmb ka mi wakat ning yirã soab sẽn na n wa wã ye. Tõe n yɩɩ zĩ-sobdo, wall yʋʋn-sʋka, wall no-kɛleng wakate, wall yibeoogo.
Maan-y rabeem tɩ b ra ling n wa n mik tɩ yãmb gõeeme ye.
Bũmb ning mam sẽn yet yãmbã, mam yet-a-la neba fãa: Neend-y-yã.

Ra keta rasem a yiib tɩ ta zʋʋg-n-bas kibsã, la bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll kibsã. La maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã da baooda sɩlem ning bãmb sẽn na n maan n paam n yõk a Zezi n kɩt tɩ b kʋ.
La b yeelame tɩ b ra maan kibsã wakate, tɩ rãmbg ra wa n zĩnd nebã sʋk ye.

A Zezi sẽn be Betani n zĩ yĩng soab a Sɩmo roogẽ n dɩtẽ, pag a yembr n wa be n tar albatre tʋk sẽn pid ne naar halaal tɩdar kaam, a raab sẽn ya toogo. La a wãaga tʋkã n kiig kaamã a Zezi zugu.
Bãmb karen-biis kẽer sũy yikame tɩ b gom ne taab n yeel tɩ yaa bõe tɩ b sãam tɩdar kaamã?
Tɩ b ra tõe n koos-a-la deniye kobs-tã n kõ naong rãmba. La b yẽgma ne pagã.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame: Bas-y-yã-a laafɩ. Bõe tɩ yãmb namsd-a? A maana maam yel-sõmde.
Tɩ bõe, naong rãmb na n kell n bee ne yãmb wakat fãa, la yãmb tõe n maan-b la neer y sẽn dat wakate. La mam ka na n be ne yãmb daar fãa ye.
Pagã maana a sẽn tõe. A pĩnd n ninga mam yĩngã tɩdar kaam m mumb yĩnga.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩda tɩ dũni tɛk fãa, zĩig ning fãa b sẽn na n moon koe-no-kãngã, b na n togsa bũmb ning pagã sẽn maanã, a tẽegr yĩnga.
A Zudas Iskaryo sẽn ya a Zezi karen-biis piig la a yiibã ned a yembr kẽnga maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb nengẽ n tɩ yeel-b t'a na n yõka a Zezi n kõ-ba.
Koe-kãng yɩ-b la noogo, tɩ b kãab-a ligdi. La a Zudas baoo weer ninga a sẽn na paam n yõk bãmb n kõ.
Bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll kibsã pipi daar sẽn ya zʋʋg-n-basã pe-bilã kʋʋb raare, a Zezi karen-biisã soka bãmb tɩ b ratame tɩ bãmb kẽng n tɩ segl zʋʋg-n-basã kibs rɩɩb yɛ bãmb yĩnga.
La a Zezi tʋma b karen-biis a yiib n yeel-ba: Kẽng-y tẽngã pʋgẽ, la yãmb na n sega rao sẽn zɩt koom ne yʋʋre. Pʋg-y yẽnda.
La a sẽn na n kẽ zak ningã, bɩ y yeel yirã soab tɩ karen-saamb sokdame yaa: "Zĩig bee yɛ mam sẽn na n dɩ zʋʋg-n-basã kibs ne m karen-biisã?"
La a na n wilga yãmb do-kãseng sẽn be roog zugu, sẽn segle, tɩ teed fãa be a pʋgẽ. Yaa be la yãmb na n segl pakã tõnd yĩnga.
Karen-biisã loogame n kẽng tẽngã pʋgẽ, la b mikame tɩ bũmba fãa yɩɩ wa a Zezi sẽn da yeelã, la b segla zʋʋg-n-basã kibsã.
Zĩ-sobd sẽn ta, bãmb waa ne b karen-biisã piig la a yiibã.
Bãmb sẽn zĩ n dɩtẽ, a Zezi yeelame: Yãmb ned a yen sẽn dɩt ne maamã n na n zãmb maam.
Sũ-sãoong sɩng n yõka bãmb tɩ b sok a Zezi yembr-yembre: Yaa maam?
A Zezi leoka bãmba: Yaa yãmb piig la a yiibã ned a yembr sẽn tʋmd a nug ne maam laagẽ wã.
Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n kii wa b sẽn gʋls b yellã to-to wã. La rao ning sẽn na n yõk-a bãmb n kõ wã na n paama toogo. Rao-kãng ma sã n dag n ka rogẽ-yã-a n são.
Rɩɩbã wakate, a Zezi rɩka bur n ning bark n kao n kõ bãmb n yeele: Deeg-y n dɩ-y-yã. Yõwã yaa mam yĩngã.
Dẽ poore, bãmb dɩka bõn-yũudla, n ning-a bark n kõ b karen-biisã, la b fãa yũume.
La a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Yõwã yaa mam zɩɩm, kãab-paalg zɩɩm sẽn daag neb wʋsg yĩnga.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩda, tɩ mam kõn leb n yũ nasaar sib biis koom yɛs ye, hal tɩ ta daar ninga mam sẽn na n yũ a paalg Wẽnnaam soolmẽ wã.
Bãmb sẽn yɩɩl yɩɩlã n sɛ, bãmb kẽnga oliiv tɩɩs tãngã zugu.
A Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Yãmb fãa na n targ n basa maam. Tɩ bõe a gʋlsa a woto: "Mam na n wẽe pe-kɩɩmã, la piisã na n sãeegame."
La mam sã n vʋʋge, mam na n denga yãmb taoor Galile.
A Pɩyɛɛr yeela bãmb yaa: Baa neba fãa sã n targ n bas yãmba, mam yẽ kõn targ ye.
A Zezi leoka yẽnda: Mam yeta foom sɩda, tɩ rũnna, yʋngã bala, sẽn deng no-raoog kɛleng a yiib soabã, foo, fo na n kɩɩsa naoor a tãab tɩ f ka mi maam ye.
La a Pɩyɛɛr yeela ne pãng n yɩɩd pĩnda, tɩ baa sã n ya tɩlɛ tɩ yẽ naag bãmb n ki, yẽ kõn kɩɩs t'a ka mi bãmb ye. La bãmb fãa me yeela a woto.
Bãmb taa zĩig a yen sẽn boond tɩ Getsemaane. La a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b zĩnd ka tɩ bãmb kẽng n tɩ pʋʋs la b wa.
B peega a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zak la a Zã tɩ b tũ bãmba. A Zezi sɩngame n paam sũur zɩ-kãsenga.
Bãmb yeela a Pɩyɛɛr dãmb yaa: Sũ-sãoong n tar maam hal n dat n kʋ maam. Pa-y ka n neende.
Dẽ, a Zezi kẽnga taoor bilfu, n vãbend tẽng n pʋʋs n yeel tɩ sã n da tõeẽ bɩ to-kãngã da paam bãmb ye.
Bãmb yeelame: Abba, m ba, yãmb tõee bũmb fãa. Yiis-y bõn-yũudl kãngã mam taoore. Baoosgo, da maan-y mam daab ye, maan-y y raabo.
A Zezi waa b karen-biisã nengẽ n mik tɩ b gõeeme. La bãmb yeela a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Sɩmo, fo gõeeme laa? Fo ka tõe n neend lɛɛr a yembre?
Neend-y la y pʋʋse n da wa n lʋɩ makr pʋg ye. Sɩɩgã ratame, la yĩngã bee pãn-komsem pʋgẽ.
A Zezi leb n zãaga bilf n tɩ pʋʋs wa pĩndã bala.
Bãmb leb n waa n mikame tɩ b karen-biisã gõeeme yɛsa, tɩ bõe, gõeema ra tar-b la wʋsgo. La b karen-biisã ka mi b sẽn na n leok bãmb tɩ bũmb ning ye.
A Zezi leb n waa naoor a tãab soab n yeel bãmb yaa: Kell n gũs-y moasã n vʋʋse. Maan n saame. Wakatã taame. Ges-y-yã, b zãmba Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kõ yel-wẽn maandbã.
Yik-y tɩ d kẽnge. Ned ninga sẽn na n zãmb-a maam n yõk n kõ wã kolgdame.

A Zezi sẽn nan ket n gomda, a Zudas sẽn ya bãmb karen-biisã piig la a yiibã ned a yembr waame, la a waa ne neb kʋʋng maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne kãsem-dãmbã sẽn tʋm, la b zãada sʋʋs ne roaya.
Ned ning sẽn na n zãmb a Zezi wã dag n kõo bãmb bãnd n yeel tɩ ned ninga yẽ sẽn na n mokã, yaa soab kõng la a Zezi. Bɩ b yõk-a, n gũ-a neer n tall n looge.
A Zudas sẽn ta bala, a kolga a Zezi n yeel-b tɩ "karen-saamba", la a mok-ba.
Neb a taabã yõka a Zezi. A Zudas waa ne sodaase (14.43)
Ned a yen sẽn dag n be be wõoga a sʋʋg n kɛ maan-kʋʋd kãsmã tʋmtʋmd n fiuug a tʋbre.
A Zezi goma ne-b n yeele: Yãmb waa ne sʋʋs la roay n na n yõk maam wa m yaa fãada!
Mam dag n bee ne yãmb daar fãa n zãmsd nebã wẽnd-doogẽ wã, la yãmb ka yõk maam ye. La yaa tɩ gʋls-sõmyã na paam pidsgu.
La bãmb karen-biisã fãa basa bãmb n zoe.
Bi-bɩɩg a yembr n dag n lob fu-goabg bal n tũ bãmba.
La b gãda yẽnda t'a bas a fu-goabgã n zoe beelle.
Bãmb talla a Zezi n kẽng maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem yiri, zĩig ning maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba fãa la kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã sẽn tigmã.
A Pɩyɛɛr pʋgla bãmb yɩɩg-yɩɩga, n ta maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem zakẽ n zĩnd ne tʋmtʋmdbã n woot bugum.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne kaoreng yɛl bʋ-bʋʋdbã fãa baoo kaset dãmb sẽn na n dõd a Zezi n kɩt tɩ b kʋ-ba, la b ka yã ye.
Bala, neb wʋsg yaga zĩrĩ n dõd bãmba la b kasetã ka zems taab ye.
Neb kẽer yik n kɩsa kaset zĩrĩ ne bãmb yell n yeel tɩ bãmb wʋma a Zezi sẽn yeel tɩ:
Mam na n sãama Wẽnd-do-kãnga ninsaalb nus sẽn me wã, n lebs n me a to ninsaalb nus sẽn ka me, dasem a tãab pʋgẽ.
La baa ne yel-kãnga, bãmb kasetã ka zems taab ye.
Dẽ, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem yika tigingã sʋk n sok a Zezi yaa: Yãmb ka leokd tɩ bũmb laa? Yaa bõe rõadg la nebã rõt yãmbã?
A Zezi sĩndame n ka leok tɩ bũmb ye. Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem soka bãmb yɛsa, bãmb sã n yaa Kirist, Wẽnnaam sẽn ya bark soabã Bi-ribla.
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Mam sɩd yaa Kirist. La yãmb na n yãa "Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn zao sẽn-tõe-a-fãa wã soabã rɩtgo, la b sẽn wat ne sawato."
Dẽ, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem pãrsa a fut n yeele: Tõnd le rata kaset rãmb n maan bõe?
Yãmb wʋma b sẽn gom n paoog Wẽnnaamã. Yãmb tagsda a wãna? La nebã fãa kaoo bãmb bʋʋd n yeel tɩ b zemsa kũum.
Neb kẽer sɩngame n tʋbs bãmb kolkoodo, n pil bãmb neng ne peend n pãb bãmb ne nug-gila, n yeel bãmb yaa: Togs-y bãngr goama. La tʋmtʋmdbã deega a Zezi n laal bãmb pegse.
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn zĩ zakã pʋgẽ wã, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem tʋmtʋmd-poak n wa be.
A sẽn yã a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn woot bugmã, a ges-a lame n yeel-a: Yãmb me ra bee ne Nazarɛt dao a Zezi.
Yẽ kɩɩsame n yeele: Mam ka mi ye. Mam ka bãng fo sẽn dat n togs bũmb ningã ye. La a yiime n kẽng zãongẽ wã. La no-raoog kelmame.
Tʋmtʋmd-poakã sẽn yã yẽnda, a leb n sɩngame n wilg neb nins sẽn be be wã t'a Pɩyɛɛr yaa a Zezi neda.
La a Pɩyɛɛr leb n kɩɩsame tɩ ka sɩd ye. Sẽn yɩ bilfu, neb nins sẽn be be wã yeela a Pɩyɛɛr: Fo sẽ ya bãmb neda, bala, fo yaa Galile ned wɛ!
La a sɩngame n kãab a meng n wẽen n yeele: Mam ka mi rao ning yãmb sẽn gomd a yellã ye.

Wakat kãng bala, no-raoog kelma naoor a yiib soaba. La a Pɩyɛɛr tẽega gomd ning a Zezi sẽn dag n yeel yẽ wã: Sẽn deng no-raoog sẽn na n kelem naoor a yiibu, fo na n kɩɩsa naoor a tãab tɩ f ka mi maam ye. La a sẽn tagse, a yãbame.
Yibeoog pĩnda, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb tigma ne kãsem-dãmbã la tõog karen-saam-dãmbã, la kaoreng yɛl bʋ-bʋʋdbã fãa. Bãmb sẽba a Zezi n tall-b n tɩ kɩs a Pilat.
A Pilat soka a Zezi: Yãmb yaa Zuif-rãmbã rĩma? A Zezi leoka yẽ a woto: Yãmb n yeele.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã rõda bãmb ne bũmb wʋsgo.
A Pilat leb n soka bãmb yaa: Yãmb ka leokd tɩ bũmb laa? Ges-y bũmb nins fãa b sẽn dõt yãmbã.
La a Zezi ka tol n leok tɩ bũmb ye. La rẽ yɛɛsa a Pilat.
Kibs fãa, a Pilat dag n yiisda bi-bɛɛg a yen, nebã sẽn kos a soabã n base.
La ned a yen sẽn boond t'a Barabas dag n bee bi-bees roogẽ ne tẽn-dãmbdba, tɩ bõe, tẽn-dãmbg wakate, b kʋʋ neda.
Kʋʋngã rʋʋme n tɩ kos a Pilat bũmb ning a sẽn mi n maand n kõt bãmbã.
A Pilat soka bãmb b sã n datame t'a bas Zuif-rãmbã dĩmã n kõ-ba.
Bala, yẽ bãngame tɩ yaa sũ-kiir yĩng la maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã yõk a Zezi n wa n kɩs yẽnda.
La maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã kɩtame tɩ nebã kos tɩ b yiis a Barabas n base.
A Pilat leb n gomame n sok bãmb tɩ b ratame tɩ yẽ maan a soab ning bãmb sẽn boond tɩ Zuif-rãmbã dĩmã bõe?
Bãmb leb n kelmame n yeele: Ka-y bãmb da-pɩk zugu.
A Pilat soka bãmba: B maana bõe sẽn ya wẽnga? La nebã leb n kelma ne pãng n yɩɩd pĩnda: Ka-y bãmb da-pɩk zugu.
A Pilat sẽn dat n noog neba sũur yĩnga, a yiisa a Barabas n base. La yẽ sẽn kɩt tɩ b pãb a Zezi ne kalwaase, yẽ rɩka bãmb n kõ nebã tɩ b ka-b da-pɩk zugu.
Sodaasã talla a Zezi n kẽng zaka pʋgẽ, sẽn dat n togs tɩ sodaasã zakẽ, la bãmb tigma sodaasã fãa sẽn be zĩ-kãngã.
B yeelga a Zezi fu-miuugu, la b kala gõos wa maanfo n fõgen bãmb zugu.
Dẽ, sodaasã sɩngame n pʋʋs bãmb n yeele: Zuif-rãmbã dĩma, tõnd pʋʋsda yãmba.
La bãmb wẽe a Zezi zug ne tãnwĩiga, n tʋbs bãmb kolkoodo, la b yĩgimdame n wõgemd bãmb taoore.
Bãmb sẽn yaal a Zezi a woto n sɛ, b pidga fu-miuugã n lebs a Zezi futã n yeelg-ba, la b talla bãmb n na n tɩ ka da-pɩk zugu.
Bãmb modga ned a yen sẽn yi weoogẽ n loogdẽ t'a tʋk a Zezi da-pɩkã. A yʋʋr la a Sɩmo, n ya Sirɛn neda. Yẽ yaa a Alegsãndr ne a Rufus ba.
Bãmb talla a Zezi n kẽng zĩig ning sẽn boond tɩ Golgota, sẽn dat n togs tɩ zu-wang zĩiga.
Bãmb kõo a Zezi rãam sẽn kalem ne miir la a Zezi ka yũ ye.
Bãmb kaa a Zezi da-pɩk zugu, la b pʋɩɩ bãmb futã n maan bãnde, n na n bãng ned kam fãa sẽn na n paam fuug ninga.
Yaa sõ-bɩɩmd wakat la b ka bãmb da-pɩkã zugu.
Gʋlsem ning sẽn wilgd b sẽn dõd bãmb ne bũmb ningã yeta a woto: Zuif-rãmbã rĩma.
Bãmb kaa fãadb a yiib da-pɩgs zut ne a Zezi: A yembr b rɩtgo, a to wã b goabga.
Woto, gʋls-sõng sẽn yet tɩ b lagma bãmb ne wẽng maandbã paama pidsgu.
Neb nins sẽn loogd be wã tʋʋ bãmba, n gõms b zut n yeele: N-faa! Yãmb sẽn tõe n sãam wẽnd-doogã n lebs n me-a rasem a tãabã,
bɩ y fãag y meng n wa n sig da-pɩkã zugu.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã me goma ne taab n yaal bãmb n yeele: B fãaga neb a taaba, n yaool n ka tõe n fãag b meng ye.
Bɩ Kirist sẽn ya Israyɛl dĩmã sig da-pɩkã zug moasã tɩ d yã n tẽ. La neb nins b sẽn ka da-pɩgs zut ne bãmbã me goma bãmb wẽnga.
Sẽn ta wĩnto-sʋka, dũni gill fãa lebga lik bida hal tɩ ta wẽn-kaoore.
La wẽn-kaoor wakate, a Zezi zẽka b koɛɛg n kelem n yeele: Eloyi! Eloyi! Lama sabaktani? Sẽn dat n togs tɩ: "Mam Wẽnnaam! Mam Wẽnnaam! Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb bas maam?"
Neb kẽer sẽn dag n be be wã sẽn wʋm a woto, b yeelame: Gese, bãmb boonda a Eli.
La bãmb ned a yembr wudgame n dɩk needg n los miismẽ, n yaag n sel tãnwĩig n kõ bãmb tɩ b yũ, la a yeele: Bas-y tɩ d ges a Eli sã n na wa n sik bãmba.
La a Zezi zẽka b koɛɛg n kelem ne pãnga, la b kiime.
Wẽnd-doogã fu-lilldig sɩnga yĩngr n kẽeg n tãag tẽnga.
Sodaas koabg naabã sẽn dag n yas t'a neng tees a Zezi wã, a sẽn yã b kũuma sẽn yɩ to-to wã, a yeelame: Hakɩɩka, rao-kãngã yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
Pagb me n dag n be be n yas yɩɩg n getẽ. A Maari sẽn yit Magdala, ne a Maari sẽn ya a Zak-bil ne a Zoze ma, la a Salome da bee bãmb sʋka.
Bãmb dag n tũuda a Zezi n sõngd bãmb wakat ninga b sẽn dag n be Galile. Pagb a taab wʋsg da tũu a Zezi n wa Zeruzalɛm.
Dag n yaa seglg daare, sẽn dat n togs tɩ daar ninga sẽn deng vʋʋsg daarã. La wĩndgã sẽn kolg lʋɩɩs yĩnga,
a Zozɛf sẽn yit Arimate waame. Yẽ yaa kaorengã yɛl bʋ-bʋʋd neba fãa sẽn waoogda, la a me rag n gũuda Wẽnnaam soolem waoongo. Yẽ maana raood n kẽng a Pilat nengẽ n tɩ kos a Zezi kũumã.
A Pilat sẽn wʋm t'a Zezi zoe n kiime, a yɛɛsame, la a kɩtame tɩ b bool sodaas koabg naabã t'a wa, t'a sok-a n na n bãng b sã n kii sẽn kaoose.
Sodaas koabg naabã sẽn wilg yẽ yellã sẽn yɩ to-to wã, a kõo a Zozɛf a Zezi kũumã.
La a Zozɛf raa lẽ peen-peelse, n sik a Zezi kũumã da-pɩkã zugu, n vil-b ne pɛɛlã n gãneg-b yaoog sẽn tuk kugr zug pʋgẽ, la a bilma kugr n lud yaoogã noore.
A Maari sẽn yit Magdala ne a Zoze ma a Maari ra geta zĩig ninga b sẽn gãneg bãmbã.
Vʋʋsg daarã sẽn looge, a Maari sẽn yit Magdala ne a Zak ma a Maari la a Salome daa tɩdar sẽn ya yũ-noogo n na n tɩ yug a Zezi kũumã.
Dimaasã daar yibeoog pĩnda, bãmb taa yaoogẽ wã sõ-pukr wakate.
Bãmb goma ne taab n yeel tɩ ãnna n na n lak kugrã n bas yaoogã noor n kõ-ba.
La bãmb sẽn zẽk b nens n gese, b yãame tɩ b bilga kugrã sẽn ya bedr wʋsgã n bas yaoogã noore.
Bãmb sẽn kẽ yaoogẽ wã, b yãa bi-bɩɩg t'a zĩ rɩtgo n yer fu-pɛɛlga, la b yɛɛsame.
Yẽ yeela bãmba: Da yɛɛs-y ye. Yãmb baooda Nazarɛt dao a Zezi b sẽn ka da-pɩkã zugã. Bãmb vʋʋgame. Bãmb ka be ka ye. Ad zĩig ning b sẽn dag n gãneg bãmbã.
La y kẽng n tɩ yeel b karen-biisã ne a Pɩyɛɛr t'a Zezi na n denga yãmb taoor n kẽng Galile. Yaa beene la yãmb na n yã bãmba wa b sẽn da yeel yãmbã.
Pagbã yii yaoogẽ wã n zoe ne yɛɛsg la rigbu. La yɛɛsgã yĩnga, bãmb ka togs ned tɩ bũmb ye.
A Zezi sẽn vʋʋg dimaas daar yibeoogã, b reng n puka b meng ne a Maari sẽn yit Magdala, soab ninga bãmb sẽn dig zĩn-dãmb a yopoe tɩ yi n basã.
La yẽ kẽngame n tɩ togs neb nins sẽn dag n be ne a Zezi wã la sẽn zĩ ne sũ-sãams la nintãmã.
Bãmb sẽn wʋm t'a Zezi vɩɩme, la tɩ pagã yã-b lame, bãmb ka tẽ-a ye.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi puka b meng ne bãmb neb a yiib sẽn dag n be sorẽ n kẽnd weoogẽ, la yɩɩ ne wẽneg a to.
Bãmb me lebg n waa n togsa b taabã, la b kell n ka tẽ bãmb me ye.

A Zezi yaool n puka b meng ne karen-biis piig la a yembrã, dẽ tɩ b zĩ n dɩtame. La a Zezi zab-b lame, b ka-tẽebã la b sũ-riglmã yĩnga. Bala, b ka tẽ neb nins sẽn yã bãmb b vʋʋgrã zugẽ wã ye.
La a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Saag-y dũni tɛk fãa n moon neba fãa koe-noogã.
Ned ning fãa sẽn na tẽ, tɩ b lis-a, a na paam fãagre. La ned ning fãa sẽn kõn tẽ na kong bʋʋm.
Ad bãn nins sẽn na n tũ neb nins sẽn na n tẽ wã: ne mam yʋʋre, bãmb na n diga zĩn-dãmba la b gom gom-zẽnse.
Bãmb na n yõga wiisi, la b sã n yũ bũmb sẽn ya zẽnem, a kõn zab-b ye. Bãmb na n tika bãad-rãmb ne b nusi, la b na n paama maagre.
Zu-soab a Zezi sẽn gom woto n sɛ, dẽ Wẽnnaam zẽka bãmb n kẽng arzãna, la bãmb zĩnda Wẽnnaam nug rɩtgo.
La bãmb karen-biisã kẽngame n moon koɛɛgã zĩig fãa. Zu-soabã tʋma ne bãmba, n maan bãn n tũnug koɛɛgã n wilg t'a yaa sɩda.
Neb wʋsg makame n gʋls bũmb nins sẽn maan tõnd sʋkã.
B sẽn gʋlsã zemsa wa neb nins sẽn dag n yã yellã hal a sɩngrẽ, la b lebg koe-noogã moaandbã sẽn togs tõndã.
Teofill sõngo, mam sẽn fees n bao n bãng fãa neb nins sẽn bils maamã nengẽ wã, mam tagsame tɩ yaa neer tɩ mam me gʋls yãmb n wilg yɛlã sẽn pʋg taab to-to,
tɩ yãmb tõe n deeg tɩ bũmb nins b sẽn dag n zãms yãmbã yaa sɩda.

Wakat ning Herood sẽn dag n ya Zude rĩma, maan-kʋʋd a ye n da be tɩ b boond t'a Zakari. Yẽ yaa maan-kʋʋd a Abiya sull a ye neda. A pagã yaa maan-kʋʋd kãsem a Aarõ yagenga, la a yʋʋr la a Elizabɛt.
Bãmb b yiibã fãa dag n yaa nin-tɩrs Wẽnnaam nifẽ, la b da sakda Zu-soabã tõodã la b noyã fãa sõama.
La b ra ka tar biig ye. Bala, a Elizabɛt da yaa kiiri, la b yiibã fãa da kʋʋlame.
Daar a yembre, a Zakari buudã sẽn da tog n ges maoongã yelle, a Zakari dag n maanda maan-kʋʋr tʋʋmdã Wẽnnaam taoore.
Bala, b dag n maana bãnde, wa sẽn zems maan-kʋʋdbã miningu, n yãk yẽnda t'a kẽ Zu-soabã roogẽ wã n yõog wusdã.
La neb kʋʋngã dag n bee yɩng wisdã yõogr wakat n pʋʋsdẽ.
La Zu-soabã malɛk puka a meng ne a Zakari, n yas wusdã yõogr tẽn-kugrã rɩtgo.
La a Zakari sẽn yã malɛkã, a yɛɛsame, tɩ rabeem yõk-a.
Malɛkã yeela yẽnda yaa: Zakari, da zoe rabeem ye, tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam leoka fo pʋʋsgo. Fo pag a Elizabɛt na n doga bi-ribl n kõ-fo. La fo na n pʋda a yʋʋr t'a Zã.
Fo na n paama sũ-noog n kɩdme, la neb wʋsg na n maana sũ-noog a rogmã yĩnga.
Tɩ bõe, yẽ na n yɩɩ nin-kãseng Zu-soabã nifẽ. Yẽ kõn yũ divẽ wall bõn-yũudl sẽn yilimd neng ye. Sɩɩg-sõng na n pida yẽ a ma sẽn na n dog-a wakat bala.
A na n kɩtame t'a Israyɛl kamb wʋsg lebg n wa Zu-soabã sẽn ya bãmb Wẽnnaamã nengẽ.

Yẽ na n kẽna Wẽnnaam taoor ne sɩɩg ning la pãng ning a Eli sẽn da tarã, n kɩt tɩ ba-rãmbã paam zems-n-taar ne b kamba, n kɩt tɩ kɩɩsdbã paam yam n lebg nin-tɩrse. La a na n sõnga nebã tɩ b segl n sa Zu-soabã yĩnga.
A Zakari soka malɛkã tɩ yẽ na n yɩɩ a wãn n bãng bõn-kãnga? Bala, yẽ yaa nin-kẽema, la a pagã me yʋʋm ka paood ye.
La malɛkã leoka yẽnda yaa: Mam yaa a Gabriyɛl, n be Wẽnnaam taoore. B tʋma maam tɩ m wa n gom ne foom la m togs-f koe-no-kãnga.
Gese, fo na n lebga muka, la fo kõn tõog n gome, hal tɩ ta wakat ning bõn-kãngã sẽn na n paam pisdgu, fo sẽn ka tẽ mam goama, tɩ b yaool n na n paam pidsgu, b wakat sã n ta wã yĩnga.
Wakat kãnga, nebã da gũuda a Zakari, la a sẽn kaoosd wẽnd-doogẽ wã yɛɛsa bãmba.
La a sẽn yi, a ka tõog n gom ne nebã ye. La b bãngame t'a yãa yãab wẽnd-doogẽ wã. La a sɩngame n bils bãmb ne magbo, la a ket n yaa muka.
La a Zakari tʋʋmdã rasem sõor sẽn pidi, a kuila a yiri.
La wakat bilf sẽn paase, a pag a Elizabɛt rɩka pʋga. La yẽ soondame hal tɩ ta kiis a nu.
La a yeelame yaa: Ad bũmb ning Zu-soabã sẽn maan n kõ maam, n zems wakat ning bãmb sẽn yãk yam n na n yiis bũmb ning sẽn dag n ya mam yãnd nebã sʋkã.
Kiis a yoob soabã wakate, Wẽnnaam tʋma malɛk a Gabriyɛl, Galile tẽng a yembr sẽn boond tɩ Nazarɛt,
pa-kuil a yembr nengẽ, b sẽn da rɩk n kõ a Daviid yageng a Zozɛf. Pʋg-sadã yʋʋr la a Maari.
Malɛkã waa yẽ nengẽ n yeel-a yaa: Mam pʋʋsda foom, ned ning Wẽnnaam sẽn ning barkã. Zu-soabã bee ne foom.
Gom kãens namsa a Maari t'a sokd a meng tɩ pʋʋs-kãngã võor yaa bõe?
Malɛkã yeel-a lame yaa: Maari, da zoe rabeem ye. Bala, fo paama bark Wẽnnaam nifẽ.
Gese, fo na n dɩka pʋga, n dog bi-ribla, la f na n pʋda a yʋʋr t'a Zezi.
Yẽ na n yɩɩ nin-kãsenga, la b na n boond-a lame tɩ Wẽn-kẽemd Bi-ribla. Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam na n kõo yẽnda a yaab a Daviid naam.
Yẽ na n sooga a Zakob buudã wakat sẽn kõn sa, la a naamã kõn zĩnd saab wakat ye.
A Maari soka malɛkã tɩ bõn-kãng na n yɩɩ wãn n yɩ tɩ yẽ nan ka mi raoa?
La malɛkã leok-a lame yaa: Sɩɩg-sõng na n waa fo zugu, la Wẽn-kẽemdã pãngã na n luda foom ne b maasem. Yaa woto yĩng la b na n bool bi-sõng ning fo sẽn na n dogã tɩ Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
Ad fo kẽem a Elizabɛt me rɩka pʋg a kʋʋlem wakate, n na n dog bi-ribla. B sẽn dag n boond yẽ tɩ kiirã, a tara kiis a yoob pʋg moasã.
Bala, bũmb ka be Wẽnnaam sẽn ka tõe ye.
Dẽ, a Maari yeelame yaa: Mam yaa Zu-soabã tʋmtʋmd poaka. Bɩ yãmb sẽn yeel bũmb ningã yɩ. La malɛkã loogame n bas-a.
Da-kãens pʋgẽ, a Maari yikame n kẽng Zude tẽng a yembr sẽn be tãensã sẽne wã tao-tao.
A Maari kẽe a Zakari zakẽ, n pʋʋs a Elizabɛt.
A Elizabɛt sẽn wʋm a Maari pʋʋsgã bala, biigã sẽn be yẽ pʋgẽ wã virsame, la a Elizabɛt pida ne Sɩɩg-sõngo.
A zẽka a koɛɛg n yeele: Fo tara Wẽnnaam bark n yɩɩd pagbã fãa. La biigã sẽn be fo pʋgẽ wã me tara barka.
Maana a wãn tɩ mam wa paam tɩ m Zu-soabã ma wat m nengẽ?
Bala, ade, fo pʋʋsmã sẽn kẽ mam tʋbrẽ wã yee, la biigã sẽn be mam pʋgẽ wã sẽn virs ne sũ-noogo.
Bark bee pag ning sẽn tẽ tɩ Zu-soabã sẽn yeel yẽnda wã na n paama pidsgã zugu.
La a Maari yeelame yaa: Mam sɩɩgã pẽgda Zu-soabã,
la mam sũur pida ne sũ-noogo, mam fãagd a Wẽnnaam yĩnga.
Bala, bãmb gesa b tʋmtʋmd-poakã a sik-m-mengã pʋgẽ. Bala, sẽn sɩng ne moasã, ad zamaan fãa neb na n yeelame tɩ bark bee mam zugu.
Bala, sẽn Tõe-a-fãa wã maana bõn-kãsems n kõ maam. Bãmb yʋʋr yaa sõmblem.
"Bãmb nimbãan-zoeerã paada neb nins sẽn zoet bãmbã zutu, zamaan o zamaane."
Bãmb wilga b kang pãnga. Bãmb sãeega neb nins sẽn dag n tar wuk-m-meng tagsd b sũyã pʋsẽ wã.
Bãmb deega pãens rãmbã naam n bas-ba, la b zẽk sik-m-mens rãmbã.
Bãmb tɩgsa kom sẽn tar b rãmbã ne arzegse, la b kɩt tɩ arzegsã rãmb loog zaalem.
Bãmb sõnga b tʋmtʋmd a Israyɛl, la b tẽeg n maan nimbãan-zoeere,
wa b sẽn dag n yeel tõnd yaab-rãmbã tɩ b na n maana a Abraham ne a yagensã neer wakat fãa wã.
A Maari paa ne a Elizabɛt sẽn kolg kiis a tãabo, n yaool n lebg n kuil a yiri.
A Elizabɛt rogem wakat taame. La a roga bi-ribla.
Yẽ yags-rãmbã ne a roagdbã wʋmame tɩ Zu-soabã puka b nimbãan-zoeer ne yẽnda, la b lagma ne-a n paam sũ-noogo.
Rogmã rasem a nii daare, bãmb waa ne bi-bilfã n na n kẽes bãongo, la b da rat n pʋda a yʋʋr t'a Zakari wa a baaba.
La a ma wã gomame n yeel tɩ ayo! T'a yʋʋr na n yɩɩ a Zã.
Nebã yeela a Elizabɛt tɩ yẽ roagdbã sʋka, ned ka be n tar yʋ-kãng ye.
La bãmb bilsa biigã baaba ne nus n dat n bãng a sẽn dat tɩ b pʋd biigã yʋʋr ninga.
A Zakari kosa walga, n gʋls tɩ biigã yʋʋr la a Zã. La nebã fãa yɛɛsame.
Wakat kãng bala, a Zakari zelemd lakame t'a sɩng n gomd n pẽgd Wẽnnaam.
Rabeem yõka b yagsã fãa. La koe-kãng saaga Zude tẽmsã fãa sẽn be tãensã sʋkã. Nebã dag n gomda bõn-kãng yell ne taaba.
Neb nins fãa sẽn wʋm gomdã da tagsda a yelle, la b sokdẽ tɩ bi-kãngã na n yɩɩ bõe biiga? Bala, Zu-soabã pãng dag n bee ne-a.
Biigã ba a Zakari pida ne Sɩɩg-sõngo, n gom pĩnd-n-bãngr goam n yeele:
Pẽgr Zu-soabã sẽn ya Israyɛl nebã Wẽnnaam, bãmb sẽn wa n ges b nebã n fãag-bã yĩnga,
la bãmb sẽn kõ tõnd fãagd sẽn tar pãnga, sẽn yit a Daviid sẽn ya bãmb tʋmtʋmdã buud pʋgẽ
wa bãmb sẽn dag n gom ne b no-rɛɛs-sõamyã noey hal wakat sẽn kaoose,
tɩ b na n fãaga tõnd n yiis d bɛɛbã la neb nins fãa sẽn kis-b tõndã nusẽ wã.
Woto, bãmb zoee tõnd yaab-rãmbã nimbãanega, n tẽeg bãmb kãab-sõngã yelle,

wa bãmb sẽn dag n kãabe, n wẽen n yeel tõnd yaab a Abraham 74-75 tɩ b na n fãaga tõnd n yiis d bɛɛbã nusẽ, la b kõ tõnd pãn-tõog tɩ pʋʋs bãmb ne sõmblem la tɩrlem bãmb taoor hal tõnd vɩɩmã tɛka, tɩ rabeem kaẽ ye.
La foom a bi-bilfã, b na n boola foom tɩ Wẽn-kẽemd no-rɛɛsa. Tɩ bõe, fo na n lʋɩɩ Zu-soabã taoore n maneg bãmb soayã,
la f kɩt tɩ nebã bãng tɩ Wẽnnaam na n kõ-b-la b yel-wẽnã sugr n fãag-ba,
tõnd Wẽnnaamã nimbãan-zoeerã sẽn ya kãsengã yĩnga. Yaa nimbãan-zoeerã yĩng la sõorã sẽn pukdã na n wa tõnd nengẽ,
n kõ neb nins sẽn zĩ lik pʋgẽ la kũum maasmẽ wã vẽenem, la a tae tõnd tɩ d tũ laafɩ sore.
La biigã bɩtame t'a yam paasdẽ. La a paa weoogẽ wã hal tɩ ta daar ning a sẽn puk a meng ne Israyɛl nebã.
Ra-kãense, Sezaar a Ogust yiisa tõog n yeel tɩ b sõd a soolmã nebã fãa.
Sõd-kãng sẽn yɩ dẽenem soabã zĩnda Siiri Gʋvɛrneer a Kiriniyus zamaanẽ.
Ned fãa kuiisa a meng tẽngẽ tɩ b tɩ sõd-ba.
A Zozɛf me yii Nazarɛt sẽn be Galile soolmẽ n kẽng a Daviid tẽng sẽn boond tɩ Betlehɛm n be Zude soolmẽ, yẽ sẽn ya a Daviid buud la a yagengã yĩnga.
Yẽ kẽnga be ne a pʋg-bil a Maari tɩ b sõd-a. La a Maari da tʋtame.
La bãmb sẽn be be, a Maari rogem wakat taame.
La yẽ roga a bi-ribl kãsengã, n vil-a ne peend n gãneg rũms rɩɩb koglg pʋgẽ, weer sẽn ka be sik-zĩigẽ wã yĩnga.
La tẽn-kãng pe-kɩɩmb n dag n be we-kɛɛng ne yʋng n gũud b piisi.
Zu-soabã malɛk puka a meng ne bãmba, la Zu-soabã ziir vẽenem yãgame n gũbg bãmba. Dabeem kãseng yõka bãmba.
La malɛkã yeel-b lame yaa: Da zoe-y rabeem ye, bala, mam togsda yãmb koe-noog sẽn na n wa ne sũ-no-kãseng nebã fãa yĩnga.
Fãagd la b rog yãmb yĩng dũnna, a Daviid tẽngẽ wã. Bãmb la Kiristã, Zu-soabã.
Ad bãnd ning sẽn na n kɩt tɩ yãmb bãng bãmba: Yãmb na n yãa bi-pɛɛlg sẽn vil ne peend n gãe rũms rɩɩb koglgẽ.
La zĩig pʋgẽ bala, malegs wʋsg yii arzãn n waa n paas malɛkã n pẽgd Wẽnnaam n yetẽ:
Ziiri! Wẽnnaam sẽn be hal saasẽ saasẽ! Laafɩ bee dũni zugu, neb nins bãmb sẽn nongã sʋka.
Malegsã sẽn bas bãmb n leb n leb arzãna, pe-kɩɩmbã yeela taab yaa: Wa-y tɩ d kẽng Betlehɛm n tɩ ges bũmb ning sẽn maan tɩ Zu-soabã togs tõndã.
La bãmb kẽnga tao-tao n tɩ yã a Maari ne a Zozɛf la bi-pɛɛlgã sẽn gãe rũms rɩɩb koglgẽ wã.
Bãmb sẽn yã bi-pɛɛlgã, b togsa bũmb nins fãa b sẽn dag n gom ne bãmb biigã wɛɛngẽ wã.
Yellã linga neb nins fãa sẽn wʋm bũmb nins pe-kɩɩmbã sẽn togsd bãmbã.
A Maari bĩnga gom-kãens fãa a sũurẽ n tagsd b yelle.
Pe-kɩɩmbã lebgame, n waoogd Wẽnnaam la b pẽgd bãmba, bũmb nins fãa bãmb sẽn wʋme, la b sẽn yã tɩ sɩd yaa wa malɛkã sẽn da togs bãmbã yĩnga.
La rasem a nii daarã sẽn ya biigã bãong kẽesg daarã sẽn ta, b pʋda a yʋʋr t'a Zezi, wala malɛkã sẽn dag n yeel sẽn deng a ma sẽn na n dɩk a pʋgã.
La a Maari ne biigã yɩlgr wakat sẽn pidi, wa sẽn zems ne a Moyiis tõogã, yẽ ne a Zozɛf talla biigã n kẽng Zeruzalɛm n na n tɩ kõ Zu-soabã.
Bãmb maana wa sẽn gʋls Zu-soabã tõog pʋgẽ n yetẽ tɩ b tog n dɩka bi-ribl rẽeng fãa n kõ Zu-soabã.
La b maana wal a yiib bɩ man-wall-bi a yiib maoongo, wa sẽn gʋls Zu-soabã tõog pʋgẽ wã.
La mik rao a yen n da be Zeruzalɛm n boond t'a Sɩmyõ. Rao-kãng dag n yaa nin-tɩrga, la a sakda Wẽnnaam. Yẽ dag n gũuda Israyɛl belsgo, la Sɩɩg-sõng dag n bee a zugu.
Sɩɩg-sõng dag n wilg-a lame t'a kõn ki, hal t'a yã Kiristã, Zu-soabã sẽn na n tʋmã.
Sɩɩg-sõng kɩtame t'a Sɩmyõ kẽng wẽnd-doogẽ wã. La a Zezi ba wã ne b ma wã sẽn tall bãmb n wa n na n pids bũmb ning tõogã sẽn yetã,
a Sɩmyõ deega biigã a nusẽ, n pẽg Wẽnnaam n yeele:
Zu-soaba! Moasã, yãmb basa y tʋmtʋmdã t'a loogd ne laafɩ. Wa yãmb sẽn dag n yeelã,
mam nin yãa fãagr ning yãmb sẽn kõ tõndã,
fãagr y sẽn segl neba fãa nifẽ wã.
A yaa vẽenem sẽn vẽnegd bu-zẽmse, la a yaa Israyɛl sẽn ya yãmb nebã ziiri.
B sẽn gom a Zezi yell a woto wã yɛɛsa b ba ne b ma.
A Sɩmyõ ning-b-la barka, la a yeel a Zezi ma a Maari yaa: Ad bi-kãngã waa Israyɛl neb wʋsg lʋɩɩse la b yikr yĩnga, la a na n yɩɩ bãnd neb sẽn na n zãgse.
A na n puka neb wʋsg sũy pʋsẽ yɛla, la sũ-sãoong sẽn wẽnd sʋʋg sẽn kõs ned n na n paam foom.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs-poak a ye n da be be. A yʋʋr la a Ãnn, a Fanuwɛl bi-pugla, n ya a Azɛɛr buudu. A ra kʋʋla wʋsgo. A zĩnda ne a sɩdã yʋʋm a yopoe a pʋgsademd wakate,
n lebg pʋgkõore, n kell n paa a woto. La baa ne a sẽn tar yʋʋm pis-nii la a naasã, a dag n ka yit wẽnd-doogẽ wã ye. A dag n maanda Wẽnnaam tʋʋmd wĩntoog ne yʋngo, ne no-loeer la pʋʋsgo.
Yẽ me waa wẽnd-doogẽ wã wakat kãng bala. Yẽ dag n pẽgda Wẽnnaam la a gomd ne neb nins sẽn dag n gũud Zeruzalɛm fãagrã a Zezi yelle.
La bãmb sẽn pids bũmb fãa wa sẽn zems Zu-soabã tõogo, a Zozɛf ne a Maari leb n leba b tẽngẽ, Nazarɛt.
Biigã ra bɩtame, la a pãng paasdame, la a da pida ne yam, la Wẽnnaam barkã da bee a zugu.
A Zezi ba-rãmbã dag n kẽngda Zeruzalɛm yʋʋmd fãa, zʋʋg-n-basã kibs yĩnga.
A Zezi sẽn ta yʋʋm piig la a yiibu, b kẽnga Zeruzalɛm wa sẽn zems kibsã miningu.
La kibsã sẽn sa tɩ bãmb lebg n kuiisẽ, biig a Zezi paa Zeruzalɛm, la b ba-rãmbã ka bãng ye.
Bãmb sẽn dag n tags t'a Zezi bee b kẽnd-n-taasã nengẽ wã yĩnga, b kẽna daar a ye kẽnde, n yaool n gẽes a Zezi b mitinsã sʋka.
La b ka yãnd-b ye. La b lebg n lebda Zeruzalɛm la b gẽesd a Zezi.
Ra-yɩt-n-daarã, bãmb yãnda a Zezi wẽnd-doogẽ wã tɩ b zĩ karen-saam-dãmbã sʋk n kelgd-b-la b sogsd-b sokdse.
A Zezi bãngrã ne b leokdsã linga neb nins fãa sẽn da wʋmd bãmbã.
A Zezi ba-rãmbã sẽn yãnd-bã, b yɛɛsame. A Zezi ma wã yeel-b lame yaa: M biiga, yaa bõe tɩ fo maan tõnd a woto? Gese, maam ne f baaba baoo foom ne sũ-sãanga.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb da baood maam? Yãmb da ka mi tɩ mam tog n bee m ba wã roogẽ laa?
La bãmb ka wʋm bũmb ning a Zezi sẽn da gomd ne bãmbã võor ye.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi tũu bãmb n leb Nazarɛt, la b saka bãmb noore. Bãmb ma wã dag n bĩngda bõn-kãens fãa a sũurẽ.
A Zezi ra bɩtame, tɩ b yamã paasdẽ, la b paama Wẽnnaam barka la ninsaalb rẽnd me.

Sezaar a Tɩbɛɛr sẽn deeg naam tɩ yʋʋm piig la nuunẽ, t'a Pilat dag n yaa Zude soolem Gʋvɛrneere, tɩ Herood ya Galile rĩma, t'a biig a Filip ya Yituure ne Tarkonit soolem dĩma, t'a Lizanyaas ya Abilɛn soolem dĩma,
t'a Ann ne a Kayif ya maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba, Wẽnnaam goma ne a Zakari biig a Zã weoogẽ wã.
La a Zã saaga tẽms nins fãa sẽn pẽ Zʋrdẽ wã, n moondẽ n yet nebã tɩ b tek yam n deeg lisgu, n paam b yel-wẽnã sugri.
Yɩɩ wa sẽn gʋls Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sebrã pʋgẽ wã: Yaa ned ning koɛɛg sẽn kelemd we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ wã, n yetẽ tɩ: Maneg-y Zu-soabã sore! Rems-y bãmb so-bugsã tɩ yɩ tɩrse!
Londã fãa na n pidsame! Tãensã ne kũnkubã fãa na n sarmame! So-golemsã na n lebga tɩrse, la b na n kõo so-rʋdã!
La ninsaal buud fãa na n yãa fãagr ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõtã.
Dẽ, a Zã ra yeta neb kʋʋngã sẽn wat yẽ nengẽ t'a lis-bã yaa: Wag-toos buudu, ãnna n wilg yãmb tɩ y zoe sũ-puugr sẽn watã?

Woto yĩnga, bɩ y wom biis sẽn zemsd ne neb sẽn tek yam n kos sugri, la y da tags y sũyã pʋs t'a Abraham sẽn ya yãmb yaabã sekame ye. Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ Wẽnnaam tõe n dɩka kug-kãensã n kɩt tɩ b lebg a Abraham yagense.
Larã zoe n bee tɩɩsã yẽgẽ moasã. Dẽ, b na n keega tɩɩg ning fãa sẽn ka womd bi-sõama, n lob bugmẽ.
Neb kʋʋngã soka a Zã yaa: Woto wã, bõe la tõnd tog n maane?
A Zã leok-b lame n yeele: Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar fu-yerdɩ a yiib yãk a ye n kõ sẽn ka tar-a, la ned ning sẽn tar n dɩtẽ me maan a woto.
Yaood-dɛɛgdbã me waame n dat t'a lis-ba. B soka a Zã yaa: Karen-saamba, tõnd tog n maana bõe?
Yẽ leok-b lame n yeele: Da reeg-y yaood n yɩɩd b sẽn kõ yãmb noor tɩ y reegã baa bilfu.
Sodaas me soka a Zã tɩ la bãmb yẽ tog n maana bõe? Yẽ leoka bãmb n yeele: Da maan-y ned pãng ye, la y da rõd neb zaalem ye, la y maan sũ-noog ne y yaoodã.
Nebã da yas n gũudame, la b fãa da sokda b mens n dat n bãng sãnde ka a Zã la Kiristã.
A Zã leoka bãmb fãa n yeele: Mam lisda yãmb koomẽ. La ned a ye n wata, n tar pãng n yɩɩd maam. Mam pʋs n pa zems tɩ lood bãmb neooda sẽbds ye. Bãmb na n lisa yãmb Sɩɩg-sõngẽ la bugmẽ.
Bãmb zãada b kãoorgo. Bãmb na n pɩɩsa b zɛɛga, n wʋk ki wã n sui b baoorẽ. La b na n yõoga wudgã ne bugum sẽn ka kiida.
A Zã sagla nebã ne sagls a taab wʋsgo, n moon bãmb koe-noogã.
La a Zã sẽn wilg Herood sẽn ya Gʋvɛrneerã t'a sẽn maan ne a ba-biig a Filip pag Herodyaadã, ne tʋʋm wẽnsã fãa a sẽn maanã ka zemse,
Herood leb n maana tʋʋm wẽng a to n paase, n yõk a Zã n sui bi-bees roogo.
Neba fãa sẽn paam koom lisgu, a Zezi me paama lisgu. La bãmb sẽn pʋʋsd wakate, yĩngr pakame,
la Sɩɩg-sõng rɩka man-wall wẽneg n sig bãmb zugu. Koɛɛg zĩnda saasẽ n yeele: Fo yaa mam bi-ribl-nongr sẽn ta mam yam zãnga.
A Zezi sẽn wa n na n sɩng b tʋʋmdã, rẽ tɩ b da tara yʋʋm pis-tã sẽne. Bãmb da yaa a Zozɛf biig wa nebã sẽn dag n tagsdã. A Zozɛf dag n yaa a Heli biiga,
sẽn yaa a Matat biiga, sẽn yaa a Levi biiga, sẽn yaa a Melki biiga, sẽn yaa a Yanayi biiga, sẽn yaa a Zozɛf biiga,
sẽn yaa a Matatyas biiga, sẽn yaa a Amos biiga, sẽn yaa a Nahum biiga, sẽn yaa a Esli biiga, sẽn yaa a Nagayi biiga,
sẽn yaa a Maat biiga, sẽn yaa a Matatyas biiga, sẽn yaa a Semeyin biiga, sẽn yaa a Zozɛf biiga, sẽn yaa a Zoda biiga,
sẽn yaa a Zoaana biiga, sẽn yaa a Resa biiga, sẽn yaa a Zorobabɛll biiga, sẽn yaa a Salatyɛl biiga, sẽn yaa a Neeri biiga,
sẽn yaa a Melki biiga, sẽn yaa a Adi biiga, sẽn yaa a Kozam biiga, sẽn yaa a Elmadam biiga, sẽn yaa a Ɛɛr biiga,
sẽn yaa a Zezi biiga, sẽn yaa a Eliyezɛɛr biiga, sẽn yaa a Zorim biiga, sẽn yaa a Matat biiga, sẽn yaa a Levi biiga,
sẽn yaa a Sɩmyõ biiga, sẽn yaa a Zuda biiga, sẽn yaa a Zozɛf biiga, sẽn yaa a Zonam biiga, sẽn yaa a Eliyakim biiga,
sẽn yaa a Meleya biiga, sẽn yaa a Mena biiga, sẽn yaa a Matata biiga, sẽn yaa a Natã biiga, sẽn yaa a Daviid biiga,
sẽn yaa a Ezayi biiga, sẽn yaa a Zobɛɛd biiga, sẽn yaa a Booz biiga, sẽn yaa a Sala biiga, sẽn yaa a Nasõ biiga,
sẽn yaa a Aminadab biiga, sẽn yaa a Admin biiga, sẽn yaa a Arni biiga, sẽn yaa a Ɛsrom biiga, sẽn yaa a Farɛs biiga, sẽn yaa a Zuda biiga,
sẽn yaa a Zakob biiga, sẽn yaa a Izak biiga, sẽn yaa a Abraham biiga, sẽn yaa a Taara biiga, sẽn yaa a Nakoor biiga,
sẽn yaa a Seruk biiga, sẽn yaa a Reyu biiga, sẽn yaa a Falɛk biiga, sẽn yaa a Ebɛɛr biiga, sẽn yaa a Sala biiga,
sẽn yaa a Kayinam biiga, sẽn yaa a Arfaksaad biiga, sẽn yaa a Sɛm biiga, sẽn yaa a Nowe biiga, sẽn yaa a Lemek biiga,
sẽn yaa a Matusala biiga, sẽn yaa a Henok biiga, sẽn yaa a Zarɛd biiga, sẽn yaa a Maleleyɛl biiga, sẽn yaa a Kayinam biiga,
sẽn yaa a Enos biiga, sẽn yaa a Sɛt biiga, sẽn yaa a Adam biiga, sẽn ya Wẽnnaam biiga.
A Zezi sẽn pid ne Sɩɩg-sõngo, bãmb yii Zʋrdẽ n lebg n wa, la Sɩɩgã talla bãmb n kẽng weoogẽ.
La rõatã maka bãmb beene dasem pis-naase. La dasem kãens pʋgẽ, bãmb ka tol n dɩ bũmb ye. La rẽ sẽn looge, kom yaool n yõka bãmba.
Dẽ, rõata yeela bãmb yaa: Yãmb sã n yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, bɩ y yeel kug-kãensã tɩ b lebg buri.
La a Zezi leoka yẽnda t'a gʋlsame tɩ: Ninsaal kõn vɩ ne rɩɩb bal ye.
Rõata talla bãmb n dʋ yĩngr n paase, n wilg bãmb dũniyã soolem dãmbã nif kamsg pʋgẽ,
n yeel-b yaa: Mam na n kõo yãmb dũni naamã fãa, ne soolem kãensã ziirã, bala, b kõ-a-la maam, la mam kõt-a la m sẽn dat a soaba.
Dẽ, yãmb sã n wõgemd mam taoore, a fãa na n lebga yãmb n so.
A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: B gʋlsame yaa: "Waoog Zu-soaba, fo Wẽnnaam, la f pʋʋs bãmb b yen bala."
Rõata leb n talla a Zezi yɛs n kẽng Zeruzalɛm, n yals bãmb wẽnd-doogã zug n yeel-ba: Yãmb sã n yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, bɩ y yɩk ka n tiimd tẽnga.
Bala, b gʋlsame tɩ: "Bãmb na n yeela b malegsã tɩ b gũ yãmba,
la malegsã na n zãa yãmb ne b nusi, sẽn na n yɩl tɩ yãmb naoor da wa n lak kugr ye."
A Zezi leoka yẽnda tɩ b gʋlsame tɩ: Ra mak Zu-soaba, fo Wẽnnaamã ye.
Rõata sẽn mak a Zezi ne makr buud toor-toor n sɛ, a loogame n bas bãmba, hal tɩ ta a sẽn na n le paam weer a to n mak-ba.
A Zezi lebg n leba Galile ne Sɩɩg-sõngã pãnga. La bãmb yʋʋrã saaga soolmã fãa.
A Zezi da zãmsda nebã karen-dot pʋse, la nebã fãa ra pẽgda bãmba.
A Zezi kẽnga Nazarɛt, tẽng ning b sẽn dag n wub bãmbã. La vʋʋsg daare, bãmb kẽe karen-doogẽ wã wa bãmb sẽn minim n maandẽ wã. Bãmb yikame n na n karem.
La b kõo bãmb Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sebre. Bãmb laka sebrã, n yã zĩig ning b sẽn da gʋls n yeel tɩ:

Zu-soabã Sɩɩg bee mam zugu, tɩ bõe, b pʋdga b kaam mam zugu, tɩ m tõe n bels sũ-sãoong rãmba, tɩ m togs naong rãmbã koe-noogã. Bãmb tʋma maam tɩ m tʋg n moon yemsã yolsg koɛɛga, la m moon n togs zoensã, tɩ b na n leb n paama b nini, tɩ m kɩt tɩ neb nins b sẽn namsdã loog ne lohorem,
tɩ m moon bark yʋʋmd Zu-soabã sẽn kõtã.
A Zezi pila sebrã n kɩs tʋmtʋmdã la b zĩndi. Neba fãa sẽn be karen-doogẽ wã da geta bãmba.
A Zezi sɩngame n gom ne-b n yeele: Gʋls-sõng kãngã yãmb sẽn wʋm moas-moasã wã paama pidsg rũnna.
La nebã fãa da kɩta bãmb kaset n pẽgd bãmba, gom-sõamy nins sẽn dag n yit bãmb noorẽ wã yĩnga, la b sokdẽ tɩ bãmb ka a Zozɛf biigã wɛ?
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Mam miime tɩ yãmb na n wẽe maam yel-bũn kãnga: Tɩpa, tɩp f meng f toor n sãooge, la: bɩ y maan bũmb nins fãa yãmb sẽn maan Kapɛrnawom tɩ tõnd wʋmã, y tẽngẽ ka.
A Zezi leb n yeel-b lame yaa: Sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs baa a yen zɩ n paam tɩ b reeg-a sõama a meng tẽngẽ ye.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd t'a Eli wakate, yĩngr sẽn pag tɩ saag ka ni yʋʋm a tãab la kiis a yoobe, tɩ kom kãseng kẽ tẽngã fãa wã, pʋgkõap wʋsg n da be Israyɛl.
Baoosgo, Wẽnnaam ka tʋm a Eli pʋgkõor baa a yen nengẽ, sã n ka Sɩdõ soolem pʋgkõor a yembr sẽn dag n be Sarɛpta nengẽ bala.
La Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Elize wakate, yĩn-gãong bãas sẽn tar b rãmbã me ra yaa wʋsg Israyɛl. La baoosgo, baa a yen bãmb sʋkã ka paam yɩlgr ye, sã n ka Siiri rao a Naama bala.
Neba fãa sẽn dag n be karen-doogẽ wã sẽn wʋm gom kãensã, b sũyã puugame.
Bãmb yikame n veo a Zezi n yiis tẽngã, n tall-b n tɩ ta tãn-puuf ning bãmb tẽngã sẽn tiẽ wã zugu, n na n tus bãmb tɩ b yi tãngã zug n lʋɩ.
La a Zezi tũu bãmb sʋk bal n looge.
A Zezi kẽnga Kapɛrnawom, Galile tẽng a ye, la bãmb dag n zãmsda nebã Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg raare.
La bãmb zãmsgã yɛɛsa nebã. Bala, bãmb da zãmsda ne noore.
Dao a yen n da be karen-doogẽ wã tɩ zĩn-dẽgd tar-a.
A kelma ne pãng n yeele: Hey! Nazarɛt dao a Zezi, yãmb data tõnd ne bõe? Yãmb waame n na n sãam tõnd laa? Mam mii yãmb sẽn ya ned ninga. Yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam sõmblem soaba.
A Zezi tãsa yẽnda n yeel-a t'a sĩndi, la a yi n bas rao wã. Zĩnã luba daowã nebã sʋka, la a yi n bas-a n ka maan-a wẽng baa bilfu.
Nebã fãa yɛɛsame n gomd ne taab n yetẽ tɩ koe-kãngã yaa bõe koɛɛga? Bãmb tara noor la pãnga, tɩ b sã n yeel zĩn-dãmb nins sẽn ya rẽgdã tɩ b yi, b yitame.
La a Zezi yʋʋrã dag n saagda soolmã fãa.
A Zezi sẽn yi karen-doogẽ wã, b kẽnga a Sɩmo yiri. A Sɩmo reem-poakã yĩns ra wɩnga hal wʋsgo, la b kosa a Zezi tɩ b maag-a.
A Zezi sulga a zugẽ n tãs yĩn-wɩngrã, la a yĩn-wɩngrã sigame. La wakat kãng bala, a yikame n maan-b sãando.
Wĩndg sẽn kẽ, neb nins fãa sẽn dag n tar bãad-dãmba, bãas buud toay-toay sẽn tara, tall-b lame n wa a Zezi nengẽ. A Zezi tika bãmb ned kam fãa ne b nusi, n maag-ba.

Zĩn-dãmb me dag n yit n basda neb wʋsgo, la b kelemdẽ n yetẽ tɩ: Yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla. La a Zezi da tãsda bãmba, n gɩdgd-b tɩ b ra gom ye. Bala, zĩn-dãmbã ra miime t'a Zezi yaa Kiristã.
Beoogã sẽn vẽege, bãmb yiime n kẽng zĩig sẽn ya we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ. Neb kʋʋng sɩngame n gẽesd bãmba, n wa n ta bãmb nengẽ. B dag n datame n gɩdg a Zezi tɩ b da loog n bas-b ye.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bãmb moon Wẽnnaam soolem koe-noogã tẽms a taabã me. Bala, yaa bõn-kãng yĩng la b sẽn tʋm bãmbã.
La a Zezi da moonda koe-noogã Galile karen-dotã pʋse.
A Zezi sẽn da be Genezarɛt mogrã noore, neb kʋʋngã gũbga bãmba, n pẽdgd taab n dat n wʋm Wẽnnaam goamã.
A Zezi yãnda koom kogend a yiib sẽn be kooma noore, zĩm-yõagdb sẽn da sig n bas n pegsd b zĩm-gãmba.
A Zezi kẽe koglg a yen sẽn da ya a Sɩmo rẽnda, n kos-a t'a zãag bilf ne kʋɩl-koakã. La a Zezi zĩnda koom koglgẽ wã n pa be n zãmsd neb kʋʋngã.
A Zezi sẽn gom n sɛ, b yeela a Sɩmo yaa: Kẽng-y kooma sẽn zulmẽ wã, tɩ y lob y zĩm-gãmba wã n yõg zĩma.
A Sɩmo leoka bãmba: Karen-saamba, tõnd tʋma yʋngã tõr n ka tol n yõk bũmb ye. La yãmb sẽn yeelã yĩnga, m na n loba zĩm-gãmba wã.
Bãmb sẽn lobã, b yõga zĩm wʋsgo, la b zĩm-gãmba wã ra pãrsdame.
Bãmb kamsa b tũud-n-taasã sẽn dag n be koglg a to wã pʋgẽ wã tɩ b wa n sõng-ba. B waame la b pidsa koom-kogend a yiibã hal tɩ b rat n lisi.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr sẽn yã woto, a wõgemda a Zezi taoor n yeele: Zu-soaba, zãag-y y meng ne maam. Tɩ bõe, mam yaa yel-wẽn maanda.
Bala, rabeem n da yõk yẽ ne neb nins sẽn da be ne yẽnda wã, zĩma bãmb sẽn yõgã waooglem yĩnga.
La yɩɩ woto me ne a Zebde kom-dibli a Zak ne a Zã sẽn yaa a Sɩmo tũud-n-taasã. La a Zezi yeela a Sɩmo yaa: Da zoe rabeem ye. Sẽn sɩng ne moasã, fo na n yɩɩ nin-baooda.
Dẽ, bãmb lebg n talla kogendã n wa kʋɩl-koakẽ wã, n bas fãa la b tũ a Zezi.

A Zezi ra bee tẽng a yen pʋgẽ, la rao a ye n be be tɩ yĩn-gãong bãag tar-a. A sẽn yãnd a Zezi, a lʋɩɩme n fõgen a neng tẽnga, n bõos bãmb a woto: Zu-soaba, yãmb sã n data, y tõee n kɩtame tɩ m yɩ yɩlemde.
A Zezi tẽega b nug n sɩɩs-a n yeele: Mam datame. Bɩ f yɩ yɩlemde. Tao-tao bala, yĩn-gãong bãagã loog n bas-a lame.

Dẽ, a Zezi keooga yẽ t'a ra gom bõn-kãng ne ned ye. La b yeel-a yaa: Kẽng n tɩ wilg f meng maan-kʋʋdã, la f maan maoong wa sẽn zems a Moyiis sẽn yeelã, f yɩlgrã yĩnga, t'a tõe n yɩ kaset bãmb yĩnga.
A Zezi yʋʋrã ra saagd n yɩɩda pĩnda. Neb kʋʋng wʋsg tigma taab n na n kelg-ba, la b tõe n paam tɩ b maag b bãasã.
La a Zezi ra kẽngda we-rasempʋɩɩsẽ, n tɩgd n pʋʋsdẽ.

Daar a yembre, a Zezi ra zãmsda neba. Fariisẽ-dãmb ne tõog karen-saam-dãmb da yii Galile tẽmsã fãa ne Zude la ne Zeruzalɛm n wa n zĩ be. La Zu-soaba pãng ra bee ne a Zezi tɩ bãmb maagd bãad-dãmba.
La ade, neb n tʋk ned sẽn ki bogre, ne gãaga, n da baood n na n kẽes-a, n sik-a a Zezi taoore.
La nebã sẽn ya wʋsg tɩ bãmb ka mi b sẽn na n tũ zĩig ning n kẽes-a wã yĩnga, b dʋʋ roogã zugu, n maan võore, n sik ki-bogrã ne a gãagã a Zezi taoor nebã sʋka.
A Zezi sẽn yã b tẽebã, b yeela rao wã t'a paama a yel-wẽna sugri.
Tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã sɩngame n tagsdẽ n yetẽ yaa: Yaa yɛ ned la yõwã n paoogd Wẽnnaam a woto? Sã n ka Wẽnnaam b yen, ãnna n tõe n kõ yel-wẽn sugri?
A Zezi bãnga bãmb tagsdã, n gom ne-b n sok-b yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb tagsd a woto y sũyã pʋse?
Bʋg yeelg n ya naana n yɩɩda? "Fo paama f yel-wẽna sugr" bii, bɩ "yik n kẽne"?
La yaa sẽn na yɩl tɩ yãmb bãng tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã tara pãn-tõog tẽng zug tɩ kõ yel-wẽna sugri. Dẽ, a Zezi yeela ki-bogrã yaa: Mam yeta foom tɩ f yik n dɩk f gãag n kuil f yiri.
La wakat kãng bala, a yika bãmb taoore, n dɩk gãag ning yẽ sẽn da gãe a zugã, n loog n kuiis a yir la a pẽgd Wẽnnaam.
Bãmb fãa ra yɛɛsame, la b waoogd Wẽnnaam. La rabeem yõka bãmb tɩ b yeel yaa: Tõnd yãa bõn-bãnd rũnna.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi yiime, la b yãa yaood-dɛɛgd sẽn zĩ a tʋʋm zĩigẽ, t'a yʋʋr la a Levi. A Zezi yeela yẽ t'a tũ bãmba.
A Levi basa fãa n yik n tũ a Zezi.
A Levi maana kibs kãseng a yiri, a Zezi yĩnga. La yaood-dɛɛgdb wʋsg ne neb a taab n da be be n zĩ n dɩt ne bãmba.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne bãmb tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ra yẽgemdame n yet a Zezi karen-biisã yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb dɩtẽ la y yũud ne yaood-dɛɛgdbã la yel-wẽn maandbã?
A Zezi gomame n yeel-b yaa: Ka neb nins sẽn tar laafɩ wã n baood tɩp ye: yaa bãad-dãmbã.
Mam ka wa n na n bool nin-tɩrs tɩ b wa tek yam n kos sugr ye, yaa yel-wẽn maandbã.
Bãmb yeela a Zezi yaa: A Zã karen-biisã ne Fariisẽ-dãmba karen-biis loeta noor naoor wʋsg n pʋʋsdẽ, tɩ yãmb karen-biisã yaool n dɩtẽ la b yũuda.
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Yãmb tõe n modga pʋg-paal sɩd tũud-n-taas tɩ b loe noor wakat ninga pʋg-paal sɩdã sẽn ket n be bãmb sʋk sɩda?
Day n wat tɩ b na n yiis pʋg-paal sɩdã n bas-ba. Dẽ, da-kãense, b na yaool n loe noore.
A Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd me n yeele: Ned kõn kẽeg fu-paalg n yãk a peend n na n lisg fu-kʋdg ye. Sã n ka rẽ, yẽ n kẽeg fu-paalga, la peendã yẽ sẽn yãkã ka zemsd ne fu-kʋdgã ye.
La ned ka suiid divẽ paalg ko-wao-kʋdẽ ye. Sã n ka rẽ, divẽ paalgã na n kɩtame tɩ ko-waoosã pusi. Divẽ wã na raage, la ko-waoosã na sãam.
La b tog n suii divẽ paalg ko-wao-paals pʋse.
La ned sã n yũ divẽ kʋdgo, a ka leb n dat divẽ paalg ye. Tɩ bõe, a yetame tɩ divẽ kʋdgã yaa noogo.
Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daar a yen, a Zezi dag n pɩʋʋgda pʋto. Bãmb karen-biisã ra yãgsda kood n tẽgd n wãbdẽ.
Fariisẽ-dãmba kẽer soka bãmb yaa: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb maand bũmb sẽn ka zems tɩ maan vʋʋsg daare?
A Zezi leok-b lame yaa: Yãmb ka karem bũmb ning a Daviid sẽn maan kom sẽn tar yẽ ne a tũud-n-taasã wakate,
sẽn yɩ wãn tɩ yẽ kẽ Wẽnnaam doogẽ wã n deeg kaset bur paadma n wãb la a kõ a tũud-n-taasã, baa ne ned sẽn ka tar noor tɩ rɩ, sã n ka maan-kʋʋdbã balã laa?
La a Zezi yeela bãmb tɩ Ninsaal Bi-ribla yaa vʋʋsg daarã Zu-soaba.
Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daar a to, a Zezi kẽe karen-doogẽ wã n zãmsd neba. Dao n dag n be be t'a nug rɩtg ki.
Tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã da gũusda a Zezi n dat n ges b sã n na n maaga ned vʋʋsg daarã. Dag n yaa sẽn na n yɩl n paam bũmb n dõd a Zezi.
La a Zezi da mii b tagsdã. Dẽ, b yeela rao ninga nug sẽn ki wã t'a yik n yals sʋk be. Yẽ yik n yaasa yĩngri.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: M sokda yãmba, noor beeme tɩ maan neer vʋʋsg daare, wall tɩ maan wẽnga? Tɩ fãag neda, wall tɩ kʋ-a?
Dẽ, a Zezi wẽnemd n gesa bãmb fãa n yeel rao wã t'a tẽeg a nugã. Yẽ tẽegame la a nugã vʋʋgame.
Bãmb sũyã puuga wʋsg tɩ b yẽsd ne taab n baood b sẽn na n maan a Zezi bũmb ninga.
Wakat kãnga, a Zezi kẽnga tãng zug n na n tɩ pʋʋse. La bãmb pʋʋsa Wẽnnaam yʋngã tɛk fãa.
La beoogã sẽn vẽege, bãmb boola b karen-biisã n tũus bãmb piig la a yiibu, n bool-b tɩ tẽn-tʋmdba.
Yaa a Sɩmo bãmb sẽn pʋd a yʋʋr t'a Pɩyɛɛrã, ne a ba-biiga Ãndre, a Zak la a Zã, la a Filip ne a Bartelemi,
a Matye la a Toma, la a Alfe biig a Zak ne a Sɩmo b sẽn boond tɩ zelot,
la a Zak biig a Zuud, la a Zudas Iskaryo sẽn lebg zãmb soabã.

A Zezi yii ne b karen-biisã tãngã zug n sig n yaas tẽnga. Bãmb karen-bi wʋsgã da bee be ne neb kʋʋng wʋsg sẽn yi Zude soolem fãa, la Zeruzalɛm la Tɩɩr tẽn-kɩremse ne Sɩdõ. Bãmb da waame n na n kelg a Zezi, la b paam tɩ b yiis b bãasã n maag-ba.
Zĩn-dẽgd sẽn da namsd-b rãmbã paama maagre.
La neb kʋʋngã fãa ra baood n sɩɩs a Zezi. Bala, pãng n da yit a Zezi nengẽ n maagd bãmb fãa.
Dẽ, a Zezi zẽka b neng n ges b karen-biisã n yeel yaa: bark bee yãmb sẽn ya naong rãmba zutu, bala, Wẽnnaam soolem yaa yãmb dẽnda.
Bark bee yãmb kom sẽn tar moasã wã zutu, bala, yãmb na n tɩgame. Bark bee yãmb sẽn yãbd moasã wã zutu, bala, yãmb na la.
Bark bee yãmb zutu, nebã sẽn na n kisg yãmba, la b bak yãmb toore, la b tʋ yãmba, la b tõdg yãmb yʋʋrã wa bõn-wẽnga, Ninsaal Bi-riblã yĩnga.
Bɩ y maan sũ-noog da-kãnga n kɩdme, tɩ bõe yãmb keoor na n yɩɩ kãseng arzãn pʋgẽ. Bala, bãmb ba-rãmb dag n maanda Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã me a woto.
La yãmb sẽn ya arzegs rãmbã, yãmb na paam toogo, bala, yãmb tara y belsgo.
Yãmb sẽn dɩt n tɩgd moasã wã, yãmb na paam toogo, bala, kom na n yõka yãmba. Yãmb sẽn laad moasã wã, yãmb na paam toogo, bala, yãmb na n paama sũ-sãoong la nintãm.
Yãmb na paam toogo, neba fãa sã n pẽgd yãmba, bala, ba-rãmba ra maanda belgr no-rɛɛsdbã a woto.
La mam yeta yãmba, yãmb sẽn kelgd maamã, tɩ y nong y bɛɛbã, la y maan neb nins sẽn kis yãmbã neere.
Ning-y neb nins sẽn kãabd yãmb wẽngã zut barka, la y pʋʋs neb nins sẽn maand yãmb wẽngã yĩnga.
Ned sã n wẽ fo yɛgd pɛka, bɩ f wẽnemd a to wã me n kõ-a. Ned sã n deeg fo fu-bedre, bɩ f bas-a t'a reeg f fu-bilã me.
Ned ning fãa sẽn kos foom bũmb bɩ f kõ-a, la ned sã n dɩk fo paoongo, bɩ f ra sok-a ye.
Bũmb ninga yãmb sẽn dat tɩ neba maan yãmbã, bɩ yãmb me maan bãmb me a woto.
Yãmb sã nong neb nins sẽn nong yãmbã bala, bõe bark la yãmb na n paame? Bala, yel-wẽn maandbã me nonga neb nins sẽn nong bãmbã.
La yãmb sã n maand neb nins sẽn maand yãmb neerã bal neere, bõe bark la yãmb na n paame? Bala, yel-wẽn maandbã me maanda a woto.
La yãmb sã n pengd neb nins yãmb sẽn tẽed tɩ b na n paam n lebsa yãmbã bala, bõe bark la yãmb na n paame? Bala, yel-wẽn maandbã me pengda taaba, tɩ b tõe n leb n deeg sẽn zem a woto.

La, nong-y yãmb bɛɛba. Maan-y-b neere, la y peng n da tẽed tɩ b na lebs-y ye. La yãmb keoor na n yɩɩ kãsenga, la yãmb na n yɩɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn be saasẽ saasẽ wã kamba. Bala, bãmb yaa sõama zɩ-beoog rãmbã ne nin-wẽnsã yĩnga.
Bɩ y yɩ nimbãan-zoɛtba, wa yãmb ba wã sẽn ya nimbãan-zoɛtã.
Da bʋ-y ned bʋʋd ye, la b kõn bʋ yãmb bʋʋd ye. Da kao-y ned bʋʋd ye, la b kõn kao yãmb bʋʋd ye. Maan-y sugri, la b na maan yãmb me sugri.
Bɩ y kõ la b na kõ yãmba. B na n maka sõama n kõ yãmba, n dĩ, n yegse, n ning tɩ sudgi. Bala, ne makdg ninga yãmb sẽn makd n kõt nebã, Wẽnnaam na n maka ne rẽnda n kõ yãmba.
A Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd me n yeele: Zoang tõe n tɛɛ zoang sɩda? Bãmb b yiibã fãa kõn lʋɩ bokẽ sɩda?
Karen-biig ka yɩɩd a karen-saamb ye. La karen-biig fãa sẽn paam zãmsg n taas lebga wa a karen-saamba.
Yaa bõe tɩ fo get moogã sẽn be f ba-biigã nifẽ wã, n yaool n ka ne sug-raoogã sẽn be fo mengã rẽndẽ wã?

Fo sẽn ka ne sug-raoogã sẽn be fo nifẽ wã, fo na n yɩɩ a wãn n yeel f ba-biigã t'a bas tɩ f yãk moogã sẽn be a nifẽ wã? Zãmb soaba, deng n yãk sug-raoogã sẽn be fo nifẽ wã, la rẽ, fo na n yãa sõama n tõog n yãk moogã sẽn be f ba-biigã nifẽ wã.
Tɩ-sõng ka be n womd bi-wẽns ye, la tɩ-wẽng me ka be n womd bi-sõama ye.
Bala, b bãngda tɩɩg fãa a biisẽ. B ka wobd kankam gõaag zug ye, la b ka kaood sib kɛglg zug ye.
Nin-sõng yiisda bõn-sõng a laog-sõngã bĩngr zĩigẽ sẽn be a sũurẽ, la nin-wẽng yiisda wẽnga a laog-wẽngã bĩngr zĩigẽ. Bala, yaa bũmb ning sẽn pid sũurã n yit noorẽ wã.
Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb boond maam tɩ Zu-soaba! Zu-soaba! La y ka maand mam sẽn yet yãmbã?
Ned ning fãa sẽn wat mam nengẽ n kelgd mam goama n sakdẽ, mam na n wilga yãmb yẽ sẽn wẽnd ned ninga.

Yẽ wẽnda wa rao sẽn yik n na n me a roogo. Yẽ tuu bog-zulunga, n yẽbg roogã kugr zugu. La ko-kãseng sẽn wa, ko-zoetma zoeeme n wẽ roogã, la a ka tõog n miim-a ye, roogã meebã sẽn da ya sõama wã yĩnga.
La ned ning sẽn wʋmd n ka sakdẽ wã, yẽ wẽnda wa rao a yen sẽn me a roog tom zugu, n ka tuk bok ye. Ko-zoetma zoee n wẽe roogã, la tao-tao bala, a lʋɩɩme, la ro-kãnga sãoongã yɩɩ kãsenga.
A Zezi sẽn gom gom-kãense ne neb nins sẽn da kelgd bãmba n sɛ, b kẽnga Kapɛrnawom.
Sodaas koabg naab a ye n da tar a tʋmtʋmd nongr sẽn gãe ne bãag n kolg kũum.
Yẽ sẽn wʋm tɩ b gomd a Zezi yelle, a tʋma Zuif-rãmbã kãsem-dãmb bãmb nengẽ tɩ b tɩ kos-b tɩ b wa n fãag a tʋmtʋmdã.
Bãmb sẽn ta a Zezi nengẽ, b bõosa bãmb ne pẽdgr n yeele: Rao-kãngã zemsame tɩ y maan a sẽn kotã n kõ-a.
Tɩ bõe, yẽ nonga tõnd buudã, la yaa yẽnda n me tõnd karen-doogã.

Dẽ, a Zezi da tũuda bãmb n dabda, la b sẽn kolg yirã, sodaas koabg naabã tʋma a zo-rãmb tɩ b tɩ yeel a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, da nams-y y meng a woto ye. Bala, mam ka zems tɩ yãmb kẽ mam zakẽ ye.
Yaa woto yĩng me n kɩt tɩ mam ka tags tɩ mam zemsame tɩ wa yãmb nengẽ m toorã. Yãmb ye n gom bala, la mam tʋmtʋmdã na n paama laafɩ.
Bala, neb sẽn yɩɩd maam n so maam, tɩ mam me so sodaase. Mam sã n yeel a yen t'a kẽnge, a kẽngdame, la m yeel a to t'a wa, a watame. Mam sã n yeel m tʋmtʋmd t'a maan woto, a maanda rẽ.
Dẽ, a Zezi sẽn wʋm gom-kãensã wã, a yɛɛsa bãmba. La b wẽnemdame n yeel neb kʋʋngã sẽn da pʋgd bãmbã yaa: Mam yeta yãmb tɩ hal baa Israyɛl pʋgẽ, mam nan ka yã tẽ-kãseng a woto ye.
La b sẽn tʋm-b rãmbã sẽn lebg n ta yiri, b mikame tɩ tʋmtʋmda paama laafɩ.
Vẽkembeoogo, a Zezi kẽnga tẽng a yen sẽn boond tɩ Nayin. Bãmb karen-biisã ne neb wʋsg da tũuda bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn wa n kolg tẽngã noore, mikame tɩ neb n da tʋk kũum n dabd mumbu. Yẽ da yaa pag a yen sẽn ya pʋgkõor bi-ribl yende. La tẽngã neb wʋsg ra yãagda pagãm
Zu-soabã yãnda pagã, t'a nimbãaneg yõk-b tɩ b yeel-a t'a ra yãb ye.
A Zezi kolgame n tik pãndarã, la neb nins sẽn da tʋk-a wã yalsame. A Zezi yeelame yaa: Bi-bɩɩga, mam yeta foom tɩ f yiki.
La sẽn ki-a wã yikame n zĩnd n sɩng n gomda, t'a Zezi lebs-a a ma.
Neba fãa yɛɛsame n pẽgd Wẽnnaam n yetẽ yaa: Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs kãseng puka tõnd sʋka, la Wẽnnaam waa n gesa b nebã.
Nebã sẽn gom a Zezi yell woto wã, koe-kãng saaga Zude soolmã fãa ne a tẽn-kɩremsã.
A Zã karen-biisã togsa yẽ bõn-kãens fãa.
A Zã boola a karen-biis a yiib n tʋm-b tɩ b tɩ sok Zu-soabã n gese, yaa bãmb la sẽn tog n wa-a wã bii, bɩ bãmb tog n gũu ned a to.
Raopã sẽn ta a Zezi nengẽ, b yeelame yaa: A Zãmbatiis tʋma tõnd yãmb nengẽ tɩ d wa sok n gese, yaa yãmb la sẽn tog n wa-a wã bii, bɩ tõnd tog n gũu ned a to?
Wakat kãng bala, a Zezi maaga bãad-dãmb wʋsgo, koms-rãmba, la sɩ-wẽns sẽn tar-b rãmba, la b pugs zoens wʋsg nini.

La a Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: kẽng-y n tɩ togs-y-yã a Zã bũmb nins yãmb sẽn yã la y wʋmã: Zoens nin pugsdame, wobs kẽndame, yĩn-gãong bãas sẽn tar b rãmbã yĩns lebgda sõama, wʋms wʋmdame, koe-noogã moonda naong rãmb sʋka.
La bark bee ned ning mam sẽn kõn yɩ kug-lakdg a yĩngã zugu.
A Zã sẽn tʋm-b rãmbã sẽn looge, a Zezi sɩngame n gom ne neb kʋʋngã a Zã yell n yeele: Yãmb kẽng n tɩ gesa bõe we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ wã? Tãnwĩig sobg sẽn miimda?
La bõe la yãmb sẽn kẽng n tɩ gesã? Rao sẽn yer waoogr futu? Ad neb nins sẽn yer fu-bʋgsã, la b vɩ bõn neeb sʋkã bee rĩm-dãmb zagsẽ.
La boẽ la yãmb sẽn kẽng n tɩ gesã? Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa? Mam yeta yãmb tɩ n-ye, la a pʋs n yɩɩda Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
Yaa yẽ yell la b sẽn gʋls n yeel tɩ: "Gese, mam tʋmda m koe-toagsd t'a reng fo taoor n segl f waoongã."
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ pagb sẽn dog b rãmbã sʋka, baa a yen ka be sẽn ya-a kãseng n yɩɩd a Zã ye. La baoosgo, sẽn ya-a yao-zʋʋg Wẽnnaam soolmẽ wã yaa kãseng n yɩɩd a Zã.
Neba fãa ne yaood-dɛɛgdbã sẽn wʋm a Zã goama, b reega a Zã lisgã, n wilg tɩ Wẽnnaam yaa tɩrga.
La Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã sẽn zãgs t'a Zã kõn lis bãmbã, b tõdga bũmb ning Wẽnnaam sẽn da seglg bãmb yĩngã.
Dẽ, a Zezi kẽnga taoor n yeele: Mam na n mamsa zamaan kãngã neb ne bõe? La b wẽnda ãnna?
Bãmb wẽnda kamb sẽn zĩ raagẽ n boond taab n yetẽ yaa: Tõnd peeba wɩɩg yãmb yĩnga, la yãmb ka sao ye. Tõnd yɩɩla kʋʋr yɩɩla, la yãmb ka yãb ye.
Bala, a Zãmbatiis waame n ka wãbd buri, la a ka yũud divẽ ye, tɩ yãmb yetẽ tɩ zĩn n tar-a.
