Ninsaal bi-riblã sẽn wa, b rɩtame la b yũuda, tɩ yãmb yetẽ tɩ rao-kãnga yaa yão-be-neda, la rã-yũuda, la yaood-dɛɛgdbã ne yel-wẽn maandbã zoa.
La neb nins sẽn deegd Wẽnnaam yamã miime t'a yaa yam.
Fariisẽ a yen bõosa a Zezi tɩ b wa n dɩ ne yẽnda. A Zezi kẽe Fariisẽ wã yir n zĩnd n na dɩ.

La gese, pag a ye n da be tẽngã pʋgẽ n ya yel-wẽn maanda. Yẽ bãngame t'a Zezi zĩi Fariisẽ wã zakẽ n dɩtẽ. Yẽ talla albatr tʋk sẽn pid ne tɩdare, n wa n yals a Zezi poorẽ, b nao wã sɛɛgẽ.
A dag n yãbdame, n sɩng n madgd a Zezi nao wã ne a nintãma, la a da yẽesd-b ne a zoobdo, n mogsd bãmb naowã la a zãgsd-b ne tɩdarã.

Fariisẽ ning sẽn bool a Zezi wã sẽn yã woto, a tagsa a sũurẽ n yeele: rao-kãngã sã n da yaẽ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa, b rag n na bãngẽ pag ning sẽn sɩɩsd bãmbã sẽn ya ned ninga, la a sẽn ya bũmb ninga: yel-wẽn maanda.
A Zezi goma ne a Sɩmo n yeel-a yaa: Sɩmo, mam dat n yeela foom bũmbu. T'a leok tɩ: "Karen-saamba, yeel-y-yã".
A Zezi yeela yẽnda yaa: ned a ye n da be tɩ neb a yiib tar yẽ samde. A yembrã dag n tara deniye kobs-nu samde, t'a to wã tar pis-nu.
La bãmb sẽn da ka tar n na yao wã, yẽ basa b yiibã fãa samã taale. Bãmb b yiibã sʋka, bʋg n na n nong yẽnda n yɩɩda?
A Sɩmo leokame tɩ yẽ tagsdame tɩ yaa ned ning sẽn dag n tar sam-kẽeng tɩ b bas-a taalã. A Zezi yeela yẽ t'a togsa sɩda.
Dẽ, a Zezi wẽnemda paga sẽne n yeel a Sɩmo yaa: Fo nee pʋg-kãngã? Mam kẽe fo zakẽ, la fo ka kõ maam koom tɩ m waas m nao ye. La yẽnda, a madga mam nao ne a nintãm, n yẽes-b ne a zoobdo.
Fo ka mok maam ye, la hal mam sẽn kẽ wã tɛka, yẽ mogsda mam nao n ka basdẽ ye.
Fo ka sõog mam zug kaam ye, la yẽnda, a waala mam nao ne tɩdare.
Yaa woto yĩnga, mam yeta foom tɩ yẽ paama a yel-wẽna sẽn yaa wʋsgã sugri. Bala, yẽ wilga a nonglem kãsenga. La ned ning b sẽn kõt sugr bũmb bilf yĩng nonglem yaa bilfu.
La a Zezi yeela pagã yaa: fo paama f yel-wẽna sugri.
Neb nins sẽn n da zĩ ne bãmb n dɩtẽ wã sɩngame n tags b sũyẽ wã a woto: dao-kãngã yaa ãnna n kõt baa yel-wẽna sugri?
La a Zezi yeela pagã yaa: fo tẽeb n fãag foom. Kẽng ne bãane.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi ra kẽnda tẽn-bõoneg pʋse, n moondẽ la b togsd Wẽnnaam soolem koe-noogã. Karen-biis piig la yiibã ra bee ne bãmba,

n paas pagb kẽere, a Zezi sẽn dig sɩ-wẽns sẽn n dag n be ne-bã, la b maag-b n yiis b bãasã: Yaa a Maari b sẽn boond tɩ Magdala Maari, soab ning a Zezi sẽn dig zĩn-dãmb a yopoe tɩ b yi n bas-a wã,
Herood tʋʋma gɛt a Suuza pag a Zan ne a Suzan, la pagb a taab wʋsg sẽn da yãkd b paoong n sõngd a Zezi ne b karen-biisã.
Neb kʋʋng wʋsg tigma taaba, la neb yii tẽns toay-toay n wa bãmb nengẽ. A Zezi tãoo solem-kãnga:
Bõn-bu-fẽrgd a ye n yi n na n tɩ fẽrg a bõn-buudu, la yẽ sẽn fẽrgdã, bõn-buudã kẽer lʋɩɩ sor kɩrenga. Neb tab-b la ne nao, la liuuli rɩ-b lame.
Kẽer lʋɩɩ kugr zugu. La b sẽn yi, b kʋɩɩme, maasr sẽn n ka be yĩnga.
Kẽer me lʋɩɩ gõos sʋka. La gõosã naaga bãmb n yi n dɩ-ba.
La kẽer lʋɩɩ zĩ-sõngẽ, n yi n wom biis tɩ ta koabg-koabga. A Zezi sẽn gomdã, b zẽka b koɛɛg n yeele: Ned ning sẽn n tar-a tʋb sẽn wʋmd bɩ a wʋme.
A Zezi karen-biisã soka bãmb yel-bũndã võore.

A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeel yaa: b kõo yãmb pãn-tõog tɩ y bãng Wẽnnaam soolem yel-soalma. La ne neb a taabã, b togsda bãmb bõn-kãens ne soalma, sẽn na n yɩl tɩ "bãmb sẽn getã, bɩ b ra yã ye, la tɩ b sẽn wʋmdã, b kõn wʋm a võor ye."
Yel-bũndã võor la a woto: bõn-buudã yaa Wẽnnaam goamã.
Sẽn be-b sor kɩrengã yaa neb nins sẽn wʋm koɛɛgã, tɩ rõata wat n yiisd koɛɛgã sẽn da be b sũyẽ wã, sẽn na n yɩl la b ra tẽ n paam fãagr ye.
Sẽn be-b kugrã zugã yaa neb nins sẽn wʋmd koɛɛgã n deegd-a ne sũ-noogã. La b ka tar yẽgen ye. Bãmb tẽeda wakat bilf bala, la makr wakate, bãmb basda tẽebã.
Gõosã, bõn-buudã sẽn lʋɩ b sʋkã, yaa neb nins sẽn wʋmd koɛɛgã n sɛ n looge, tɩ yɩɩre, la arzegse, la dũni sũ-noogã rɩ koɛɛgã t'a ka womd biis tɩ bɩ ye.
Zĩ-sõngã, yaa neb nins sẽn wʋmd koɛɛgã ne sũur sẽn ya sõama la tɩrga, n talld-a, n yalsd kãenkãe, n womd biisã.
Ned ka yõgend fɩtɩl n fõgn-a ne peoogo, wall a ning-a gãag tẽngr ye. B rogend-a-la fɩtɩl doagendgã zug tɩ neb nins sẽn kẽedã tõe n yã vẽenemã.
Bala, bũmb ka be sẽn lud sẽn kõn puk ye, la bũmb ka be sẽn solg sẽn kõn vẽneg ye.
Dẽ, bɩ y gũus ne yãmb sẽn kelgd to-to wã. Bala, b na n kõo ned ning sẽn tara, la ned ning sẽn ka tara, b na n deega baa bũmb ning yẽ sẽn tagsd t'a tarame wã n bas-a.
A Zezi ma ne b ma-bi-raop waa bãmb nengẽ, la neb kʋʋngã yĩnga, b ka tõog n ta a Zezi ye.
Nebã yeela a Zezi tɩ b ma wã bee yɩng ne b ma-bi-raopã n dat n yãnd-ba.
La a Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: mam ma ne m ma-bi-raop yaa neb nins sẽn kelgd Wẽnnaam goamã n sakdẽ wã.
Daar a ye, a Zezi kẽe koom-koglg ne b karen-biisã, n yeel-b tɩ b wa tɩ b kẽng ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde. La b loogame.
La bãmb sẽn dugsd koglgã wakate, a Zezi gũsame. La sob-kãseng yika kooma zugu, tɩ koom-koglgã ra pid ne koom, tɩ lebg yel-pakr ne-ba.
Karen-biisã kolgame n nek a Zezi n yeel yaa: Karen-saamba! Karen-saamba! Tõnd na n kiime! A Zezi nekame, n tãs sobgã ne ko-pɛmã, la b yõkame, la zĩigã lebga sɩddd.
Dẽ, bãmb soka b karen-biisã yaa: Yãmb tẽebã bee yɛ? La rabeem yõka bãmb tɩ b yɛɛs n sok taab tɩ nin-kãngã yaa yɛ neda? Bala, baa sobgã ne ko-pɛma sakda bãmb noore.
Bãmb taa Geraza rãmbã tẽnga, tẽng sẽn teesd Galile.
La a Zezi sẽn n sig tẽnga, tẽngã rao a ye zĩn-dãmb wʋsg sẽn tar waa n sega bãmba. Hal daar zãra, a ka le yeelgd fut ye, la a ra ka gãe yir ye, yaa yaadẽ.
A sẽn yãa a Zezi, a kelmame n wõgemd bãmb taoor n zẽk a koɛɛg n yeele: Wẽnnaam sẽn be saasẽ saasẽ bi-ribl a Zezi, yãmb data maam ne bõe? Mam bõosd-y lame tɩ y ra nams maam ye.

Bala, a Zezi ra yeta zĩn-dẽgdã sẽn dag n kẽ yẽ hal daar zãrã t'a yi n bas rao wã. B ra sẽbda yẽ ne bãense, n balg a nao wã ne kutu, la a ra kaooda a sẽbdsã. La zĩna ra talld-a lame n kẽngd we-rasempʋɩɩsẽ.
A Zezi soka yẽ t'a yʋʋr la a bõe. T'a leok t'a tusa. Bala, zĩn-dãmb wʋsg n da kẽ yẽnda.
La zĩn-dãmbã bõosa a Zezi tɩ b ra rig-b tɩ b kẽng zĩ-zulungẽ wã ye.
Kurkuy wʋsg n da be tãnga zug n wãbdẽ, la zĩn-dãmbã bõosa a Zezi tɩ b kõ bãmb noor tɩ b tɩ kẽ kurkuyã. La a Zezi kõ-b lame.
Zĩn-dãmbã yii n basa rao wã n tɩ kẽ kurkuyã, la kurkuyã wudga tãnga sigdgẽ, n bilim n lʋɩ koomẽ wã, la koomã rɩ-b lame.
Neb nins sẽn da gũud kurkuyã sẽn yã bũmb ning sẽn maanã, b zoee n tɩ togsa koɛɛgã tẽnga pʋgẽ la pʋtẽ wã me.

Nebã kẽngame n na n tɩ ges bũmb ning sẽn maanã. Bãmb waa a Zezi nengẽ, la b yãa rao ning zĩn-dãmbã sẽn yi n basã t'a zĩ a Zezi sɛɛgẽ, n yer futu, n tar yam sõama. La rabeem yõka bãmba.
Neb nins sẽn yã bũmb ning sẽn maanã togsa bãmb rao ning zĩna sẽn da tarã sẽn paam yolsg to-to.
Geraza soolmã neba fãa kosa a Zezi tɩ b zãag n bas bãmba. Bala, rabeem kãseng n da yõk-ba. A Zezi kẽe koom-koglgã n lebg n lebe.
Rao ning zĩn-dãmbã sẽn yi n basã bõosa a Zezi ne pẽdgr n dat n pa ne bãmba. La a Zezi kuils-a lame n yeele:
Lebg n kuil f yir n tɩ wilg bũmb nins fãa Wẽnnaam sẽn maan n kõ fooma. Rao wã loogame n tɩ moon bũmb nins fãa a Zezi sẽn maan n kõ yẽ wã tẽngã fãa pʋgẽ.
A Zezi sẽn leb rʋʋndã, neb kʋʋng reega bãmba, bala, b fãa ra gũuda bãmba.
La gese, dao a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Zayirus, n yaa karen-doog naab waame n wõgemd a Zezi taoor n bõos bãmb tɩ b wa yẽ yirã.
Bala, yẽ ra tara a bi-pugl yende, a yʋʋm sẽn kolg piig la yiibu, n gãe n dat n ki. A Zezi sẽn dabd be wakate, neb kʋʋngã rɩdga bãmba.
La pag a ye n da be be tɩ bãag tar-a, t'a zɩɩm yit hal yʋʋm piig la a yiibu. Yẽ rɩka a sẽn da tarã fãa n kõ tɩpdba, la b baa a yen ka tõog t'a paam laafɩ ye.
Yẽ kolga a Zezi poorẽ, n sɩɩs bãmb fuugã noore. La wakat kãng bala, zɩɩmã sẽn da yitã yõkame.
La a Zezi sokame tɩ ãnna n sɩɩs bãmba? Ned fãa sẽn kɩɩsd tɩ ka yẽnda, a Pɩyɛɛr yeelame yaa: Karen-saamba, neb kʋʋngã gũbga yãmb n dɩdgd yãmba.
La a Zezi leokame n yeele: Ned n sɩɩs maam. Bala, mam bãngame tɩ pãng n yi mam nengẽ.
Pagã sẽn yã t'a yellã pukame, a waa n yĩgimda a Zezi taoor ne rigbu, neba fãa nifẽ, n togs bũmb ning yĩng sẽn kɩt tɩ yẽ sɩɩs a Zezi wã, la yẽ sẽn paam laafɩ zĩig pʋgẽ to-to.
A Zezi yeel-a lame: M bi-pugla, fo tẽeb n fãag foom, kẽng ne bãane.
A Zezi sẽn ket n gomda, ned n yi karen-doog naabã yir n wa n yeel-a: Da le nams-y karen-saamb ye: Yãmb bi-puglã kiime.
La a Zezi sẽn wʋme, b yeela karen-doog naabã yaa: Da maan dabeem ye. Tẽ bala, la biigã na n põsame.
La a Zezi sẽn ta yirã, bãmb ka sak tɩ ned tũ bãmb n kẽ, sã n ka a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã, la a Zak ne biigã ba la a ma bala.
Neba fãa ra yãbdame n wiisd biigã yĩnga. Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ b ra yãb tɩ biigã ka ki ye, t'a gõeeme.
Nebã sẽn da mi tɩ biiga kiime wã, b yaala a Zezi.
La a Zezi gãda biigã nugu, n zẽk b koɛɛg n yeele: M biiga, yiki.
La a sɩɩgã lebg n waame, la wakat kãng bala, a yikame. La a Zezi yeelame tɩ b kõ biiga rɩɩb t'a rɩ.
Bi-puglã ba-rãmb yɛɛsame, la a Zezi keooga bãmb tɩ b ra togs ned bũmb ning sẽn maanã ye.
A Zezi tigma karen-biis piig la a yiibã n kõ-b pãnga la noor tɩ b tõog zĩn-dãmba, la pãn-tõog tɩ b maag bãad-dãmba.
A Zezi tʋm-b lame tɩ b tɩ moon Wẽnnaam soolem koɛɛga, la b maag bãad-dãmba.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Da rɩk-y bũmb y kẽnda yĩng ye. Da rɩk-y da-saare, korgo, buri wall ligd ye. La y ra zã fut a yiib yiib ye.
Yãmb sẽn sig zak ning pʋgẽ, bɩ y pa be n ta y sẽn na n yi be n looge.
La zĩig ning fãa nebã sẽn ka reeg yãmba, y sã n wa n yit tẽn-kãnga, bɩ y pĩms y nao wã tom tɩ yɩ kaset b yĩnga.
A Zezi karen-biisã loogame n kẽng tẽng tẽnga, n moond koe-noogã, la b maagd neb zĩiga fãa.
Naab a Herood da wʋma bũmb nins fãa sẽn da maandã, la a da ka mi yẽ sẽn na n tags tɩ bũmb ning ye. Bala, neb kẽer da yetame t'a Zã vʋʋgame n yi kũum sʋka,
tɩ kẽer yetẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn zĩnd pĩndã ned a ye n vʋʋge.
La Herood yeelame: Mam kɩtame tɩ b fiuug a Zã zugu. Dẽ, ned ning mam sẽn wʋmd tɩ b gomd a yell woto wã yaa ãnna soaba? La yẽ ra baoodame n dat n yãnd a Zezi.
Tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn lebg n wa, b togsa a Zezi bũmb nins fãa bãmb sẽn maanã. A Zezi peega bãmb n yi kɛɛng n kẽng tẽng a yen sẽn boond tɩ Betsayida sẽne.
La neb kʋʋngã bãngame n pʋg bãmba. A Zezi reeg-b lame n gom ne-b Wẽnnaam soolem yelle, la b maag neb nins sẽn dag n dat maagrã me.

Wĩndgã sẽn kɩlle, karen-biis piig la yiibã kolgame n yeel a Zezi yaa: Kɩt-y tɩ neb kʋʋngã loog n kẽng tẽn-bõonegẽ wã ne pʋtã sẽn pẽ ka wã n tɩ paam gãag zĩisi, la b paam dɩɩbo. Bala, tõnd sẽn beẽ wã yaa we-rasempʋɩɩga.

A Zezi yeela karen-biisã tɩ bãmb mensã kõ nebã rɩɩb tɩ b rɩ. La b leokame n yeele: Tõnd ka tar sẽn yɩɩd bur a nu ne zĩm a yiib ye. Sã n ka tɩ tõnd mens na n kẽngame n tɩ ra rɩɩb nin-kãensã fãa yĩnga.
La nebã sẽn da be be wã kolga raop tus a nu. A Zezi yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b kɩt tɩ neba zĩnd sull-sulli, neb pis-nunu.
Karen-biisã maana a woto n kɩt tɩ b fãa zĩndi.
A Zezi reega bur a nu wã ne zĩm a yiibã n nak n ges yĩngr n ning-b barka, n yaool n kao burã ne zĩma n kõ karen-biisã tɩ b pʋɩ neb kʋʋngã.
Bãmb fãa rɩɩme n tɩge, la b wʋka gɩrsã sẽn kellã n pid pet piig la a yiibu. Bur a nu ne zĩm a yiibu (9.13)
Daar a ye, a Zezi ra bee zĩig neb sẽn ka be, n pʋʋsdẽ, la karen-biisã ra bee ne bãmba. A Zezi soka b karen-biisã yaa: Neb kʋʋngã yetame tɩ mam yaa ãnna?
Bãmb leokame tɩ kẽer yetame t'a Zãmbatiis, tɩ kẽer yetẽ t'a Eli, tɩ kẽer yetẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn zĩnd pĩndã ned a ye sẽn vʋʋge.
La a Zezi soka bãmb yaa: La yãmba, yãmb yetame tɩ mam yaa ãnna? A Pɩyɛɛr leokame tɩ bãmb yaa Kirist sẽn yi Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
A Zezi keooga bãmb neere, n yeel-b tɩ b ra saag n togs ned yõwã ye.

A Zezi gomame n paas n yeel tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ Ninsaal Bi-riblã nams wʋsgo, tɩ kãsem-dãmbã ne maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba la tõog karen-saam-dãmbã kɩɩs bãmba n kʋ-ba, la tɩ rasem a tãab daare bãmb na vʋʋge.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela b fãa yaa: ned sã n dat n tũ maam, bɩ a kɩɩs a mengã ratem, n tʋk a da-pɩk daar fãa n pʋg maam.
Sɩd me, ned ning fãa sẽn dat n kogl a vɩɩm, a vɩɩm na sãame. La ned ning sẽn na n bas a vɩɩm mam yĩnga, a na n le paam-a lame.
Ned sã n paam dũni bũmb fãa, n yaool n menem wall a sãam a menga, a yõod bee yɛ ne-a?
Sɩd me, ned sã n zoe mam yãnde la mam goama yãnde, Ninsaal Bi-riblã sã n wa n wa ne b ziirã, la b ba wã ziiri, ne malegs-sõamyã, b na n zoee yẽ me yãnde.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ neb nins sẽn be ka wã kẽer ka na n ki hal tɩ b yãnd Wẽnnaam soolmã.
Sẽn kolg rasem a nii, a Zezi sẽn gom gom-kãensã zugẽ, bãmb peega a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã la a Zak n dʋ tãngã zug n na n pʋʋse.
La bãmb sẽn pʋʋsd wakate, b nengã yalẽ tedgame, la bãmb futã lebga peels n pɩnda.
La gese, raop a yiib n wa n gom ne a Zezi. Dag n ya a Moyiis ne a Eli,
n puk b meng ne ziiri, n gomd ne a Zezi b kũuma b sẽn na n ki Zeruzalɛma yelle.
Gõeem ra namsda a Pɩyɛɛr ne a tũud-n-taasã, la bãmb neendame n yãnd a Zezi ziirã ne raop a yiibã sẽn da be ne bãmbã.

Wakat ning raopã sẽn bas a Zezi n loogdẽ wã, a Pɩyɛɛr yeela a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, yaa sõama tɩ tõnd pa ka. D tilg fu-rot a tãabo: a yembr yãmb yĩnga, a yembr a Moyiis yĩnga, a yembr a Eli yĩnga. Yẽ ra ka mi a sẽn gomd bũmb ningã ye.
La yẽ sẽn gomd a woto, sawadg waa n luda bãmba, la a Moyiis rãmb sẽn kẽed sawadgẽ wã, rabeem yõka bãmba.
La koɛɛg yii sawadgẽ wã n yeele: Ada yaa mam Bi-ribl mam sẽn yãke, bɩ y kelg-a.
La koɛɛgã sẽn gom a woto n sɛ, a Zezi ra yɛsa b yembre. Karen-biisã kell n sĩndame n ka togs ned bũmb ning bãmb sẽn yã wã da-kãens ye.
Vẽkembeoogo, bãmb sẽn yi tãngã zug n sigi, neb kʋʋng wʋsg waa n sega a Zezi.
La gese, neb kʋʋngã sʋka, dao a ye n zĩnd be n zẽk a koɛɛg n yeele: Karen-saamba, m kot-y lame tɩ y ges m bi-riblã. Bala, yaa m bi-yende.
Zĩn n kẽed-a, la a sã n kẽ-a bala, a kelemdame, la zĩna kɩtdame t'a sobg n gʋɩgsdẽ, tɩ tãntãn-puudã yita. A sã n na n wa n yi n bas biigã, rẽ t'a nams-a-la wʋsgo, n pogl-a.
Mam bõosa yãmb karen-biisã tɩ b rig-a, la b ka tõog ye.
A Zezi yeelame yaa: Neb sẽn ka tẽebo, la sẽn ya nin-wẽnse, mam na n paa ne yãmb la m maan sũ-mar ne yãmb tɩ ta wakat bʋgo? Tall f biigã n wa ne ka.
La biigã sẽn kolgdã, zĩna lub-a-la tẽnga, n nams-a wʋsgo. La a Zezi lenga zĩn-dẽgdã, n maag biigã n kɩs-a a ba.
La neba fãa yɛɛsame, b sẽn yã Wẽnnaam pãn-kãsengã yĩngã.
Yãmba, yok-y y tʋb n kelg gom-kãensã sõama: b na n yõka Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kõ neba.
La karen-biisã ra ka wʋmd gom-kãng võor ye. A ra solga ne bãmba, sẽn na n yɩlg tɩ b ra bãng a võorã ye. La b ra yɛɛsdame n ka rat n sok a Zezi bõn-kãng wɛɛngẽ ye.
Nokoeemd yika bãmb sʋka, tɩ b rat n bãng sẽn ya-a kãseng n yɩɩd bãmb sʋkã.
A Zezi sẽn mi bãmb sũyã tagsgã, b peega bi-bilf n zĩnig-a b sɛɛgẽ

n yeel karen-biisã yaa: ned ning fãa sẽn na n deeg bi-bilf kãngã mam yʋʋrã yĩnga, yaa mam mengã la a reeg-yã. La ned ning fãa sẽn deeg maam, a reegda sẽn tʋma maamã. Bala, ned ning sẽn ya-a yao-zʋʋg yãmb sʋkã, yaa yẽ soab n ya kãsenga.
A Zã gomame n yeele: Karen-saamba, tõnd yãa rao sẽn digd zĩn-dãmb ne yãmb yʋʋre, la tõnd gɩdg-a lame, a sẽn ka naag tõnd n tũud yãmbã yĩnga.
A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: ra gɩdg-a ye. Bala, ned sã n ka kis yãmba, a bee ne yãmba.
Wakat ning b sẽn tog n zẽk a Zezi tɩ b kẽng arzãnã sẽn kolge, bãmb tolg n yãka yam n na n kẽng Zeruzalɛm.
B tʋma neb tɩ b reng bãmb taoore. La b kẽngame n tɩ kẽ Samari n na n segl bũmb fãa a Zezi yĩnga.
La neba ka reeg a Zezi ye, bãmb sẽn dag n dabd Zeruzalɛma yĩnga.
Bãmb karen-biis a Zak ne a Zã sẽn yã woto, b yeelame yaa: Zu-soaba, yãmb datame tɩ d kɩt tɩ bugum yi yĩngr n sig n dɩ-ba?
La a Zezi wẽnemdame n leng bãmb n yeele: yãmb ka mi sɩɩg ning sẽn tar yãmbã ye.
Bala, Ninsaal Bi-riblã ka wa tɩ sãam ninsaalbã vɩɩm ye, la yaa tɩ fãag-ba. La bãmb kẽnga tẽng a to.
Bãmb sẽn be sorẽ n dabda, ned n yeel a Zezi t'a na n tũu bãmb n kẽng zĩig ning fãa bãmb sẽn na n kẽnge.
A Zezi leok-a lame tɩ waas tara bogdo, la liuuli sẽn yɩgda tara tʋgdo, la Ninsaal Bi-riblã ka tar zĩig sẽn na n gãneg a zug ye.
A Zezi yeela ned a to t'a tũ bãmba. La yẽ leoka a Zezi yaa: bas-y-m nand tɩ m tɩ mum m ba la m wa.
La a Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: bas kũ-rãmbã tɩ b mum b kũum, la foo, kẽng n moon Wẽnnaam soolem koɛɛgã.
Ned a to leb n yeelame: Zu-soaba mam na n tũu yãmba, laa, sak-y tɩ m deng n tɩ pʋʋs m zaka rãmb wẽnd-na-taas la m wa.
A Zezi leoka yẽ yaa: ned sã n gãd wãk rũng sẽn tata, la a rat n wẽnemd n ges a poorẽ, yẽ ka zems tɩ kẽ Wẽnnaam soolma ye.
Rẽ poore, Zu-soabã leb n yãka neb pis-yopoe la a yiib a taaba, n tʋm bãmb yiib yiib tɩ b reng bãmb taoor n kẽng tẽng fãa la zĩig ning fãa bãmb meng sẽn tog n kẽngã.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Tigsgã yaa wʋsgo la tʋmtʋmdbã sõor paoodame. Kos-y tigsgã soab tɩ b tʋm tʋmtʋmdb b tigsgẽ wã.
Kẽng-y-yã! Ade, mam tʋmda yãmb wa piis digd-n-yĩids sʋka.
Da zã-y ligd korgo, wall yolgo, wall neooda ye, la y ra yals n pʋʋs ned sor zug ye.
Yãmb sã n na n kẽ yir fãa, bɩ y pʋʋs-b a woto: Bɩ laafɩ zĩnd yi-kãnga pʋga.
La laafɩ ned sã n be be, yãmb laafɩ wã na n siga a zugu. La laafɩ ned sã n ka be, bɩ y loog ne y laafɩ pʋʋsem.
Pa-y yi-yɛnga, n dɩ la y yũ bũmb ning sẽn be be. Bala, tʋmtʋmd toga ne a yaoodo. Da-y tegs-y yiy ye.
Tẽng ning fãa yãmb sẽn na n kẽ tɩ b reeg yãmba, bɩ y rɩ bũmb nins b sẽn na n kõ yãmbã.
Maag-y bãad-rãmb nins sẽn be be wã, la y yeel-b tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã kolga bãmba.
Tẽng ning fãa yãmb sẽn na n kẽ tɩ b ka reeg yãmba, kẽng-y tẽngã soay zut n yeele:
Yãmb tẽngã wubsg meng sẽn bol tõnd nao wã, tõnd pĩmsd-a lame n basd ne yãmba. La baoosgo, bãng-y tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã pẽnegame.
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ da-kõngo, Sodom sɩbgrã toolem kõn ta tẽng kãng rẽndã ye.

Korazin, fo na paam toogo! Betsayida, fo na paam toogo! Bala, bõn-bãn nins sẽn maan yãmb sʋkã sã n dag n maanẽ Tɩɩr ne Sɩdõ, yaa hal daar zãr la b da na n yeelg boto, la b yug b zug tompeglem n kos sugri.
Dẽ n kɩt tɩ bʋʋdã daare, Tɩɩr ne Sɩdõ sɩbgr kõn ta yãmb dẽndã ye.
La foom, Kapɛrnawom, b na n zẽka foom n taas saasẽ bɩ? Ayo! B na n sigsa foom hal n taas kɩɩm-kulgu.
Ned ning sẽn kelgd yãmb kelgda maam. La ned ning sẽn zãgsd yãmb zãgsda maam. La sẽn zãgsd-a maam zãgsda sẽn tʋm-a maamã.
Neb pis-yopoe la a yiibã lebg n waa ne sũ-noog n yeele: Zu-soaba, baa zĩn-dãmba mens sakda tõnd noor yãmb yʋʋrã yĩnga.
A Zezi yeel-b lame: Mam dag n nee a Sʋtãan sẽn yi yĩngr n lʋɩt wa sa-yãgbo.
La ade, mam kõo yãmb pãng tɩ y tab wiis la namse, la bɛyã pãngã fãa, la baa fʋɩ kõn tõog n maan yãmb wẽng ye.
Baoosgo, da maan-y sũ-noogo, zĩn-dãmbã sẽn sakd yãmbã yĩng ye. Maan-y sũ-noogo, yãmb yʋɩyã sẽn gʋls arzãn pʋgẽ wã yĩnga.

Wakat kãng bala, Sɩɩg-sõng kɩtame t'a Zezi paam sũ-no-kãseng n yeele: M ba sẽn ya arzãn la tẽng Zu-soaba, mam pẽgda yãmba, yãmb sẽn solg bõn-kãens ne yam-dãmba la yẽesem-dãmbã, n yaool n vẽneg-b ne kom-bõonegã yĩnga. N ye, m ba, yãmb sẽn dat tɩ yɩ a woto wã yĩnga.

M ba kõo maam bũmba fãa, la ned baa a yen ka mi Bi-riblã sẽn yaa a soaba, a sã n ka a ba wã ye. La ned baa a yen ka mi ba wã sẽn yaa a soaba, sã n ka Bi-riblã bala, la ned ning Bi-riblã sẽn dat n vẽneg bãmb ne-a wã ye.
A Zezi wẽnemdame n gom ne b karen-biisã b yen-yen n yeel-b yaa: Bark bee neb nins nin sẽn yãt bũmb nins yãmb sẽn yãtã zutu.
Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb wʋsgo, la rĩm-dãmb dag n dat n yãa bũmb nins yãmb sẽn yãtã la b ka yã ye. B dag n dat n wʋma bũmb nins yãmb sẽn wʋmdã la b ka wʋm ye.
La gese, tõog karen-saamb a yembr yikame n na n mak a Zezi n yeele: Karen-saamba, bõe la mam tog n maan n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã tɩ yɩ m pʋɩɩre?
A Zezi sok-a lame tɩ bõe la b gʋls tõodã sebrã pʋgẽ, la bõe la yẽ karemd be?
A leokame n yeele: Nong Zu-soaba fo Wẽnnaam ne f sũur fãa, la f sɩɩg fãa, la f pãng fãa, la f tagsg fãa, la f nong f to wa f menga.
A Zezi leok-a lame yaa: Fo leokrã yaa sõama. Maan a woto, la f na vɩɩmde.
La yẽ sẽn dat n wilg t'a yaa tɩrga, a soka a Zezi tɩ ãnna la yẽ to?
A Zezi leb n gomame n yeele: Dao n dag n yi Zeruzalɛm n dabd Zeriko. A tɩ lʋɩɩ fãadb sʋka, tɩ b rees a sẽn tarã, n pãb-a hal t'a kolg kũum, tɩ b bas-a n looge.
Mikame tɩ maan-kʋʋd n dag n dɩk so-kãnga. A yãa rao wã, la a gilg n loog n bas-a lame.
Woto me, Levit a yen taa zĩ-kãnga. A yãa rao wã, la a gilg n loog n bas-a lame.
La Samari ned sẽn dag n togd sor taa rao wã sɛɛgẽ n yãnd-a, t'a nimbãaneg yõk-a.
A kolga rao wã, n tɩbs a noadã ne kaam la divẽ, la a vil-b ne pɛɛla. Rẽ sẽn sa, a rɩk-a lame n zombg a meng bõn-zoambedga, n tall-a n kẽng sik zĩigẽ n tɩ ges a yelle.
Vẽkembeoogo, a yãka deniye a yiib n kɩs sik zĩigã soab n yeel-a t'a yõdg n ges bãadã yelle, la t'a ligd sã n kẽ, a lebgre a meng na lebs-a.
Bãmb b tãabã sʋka, bʋg n wẽnda a yaa ned ning sẽn lʋɩ-a fãadbã sʋkã to?
Tõog karen-saambã leokame tɩ yaa ned ning sẽn zoe-a yẽ nimbãanegã. La a Zezi yeel-a lame t'a me kẽng n tɩ maan a woto. Samari nin-sõngo (10.30)
A Zezi sẽn kẽnd ne b karen-biisã, b taa tẽng a yembre, la pag sẽn boond t'a Mart sika bãmb a yiri.
A dag n tara ma-bi-poak sẽn boond t'a Maari. La a Maari zĩnda Zu-soabã sɛɛgẽ n kelgd bãmb goama.

Rɩɩbã seglg yɛl toay-toayã dag n sooga a Mart tagsgã. A waame n yeel yaa: Zu-soaba, mam ma-bi-poakã sẽn bas maam m yembr tɩ m get seglgã yellã ka namsd yãmba? Dẽ wã yaa, yeel-y-yã-a t'a sõng-ma.
Zu-soabã yeela a Mart yaa: Mart! Mart! Fo maanda yɩɩre, n sidgd ne bũmb wʋsgo.
Bũmb a yen tãa n ya tɩlɛ. A Maari yãka pʋɩ-sõng b sẽn kõn deeg n bas-a ye.
Daar a yen, a Zezi da bee zĩig a ye n pʋʋsdẽ. Bãmb sẽn pʋʋs n sɛ, b karen-biig a yembr yeela bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, zãms-y tõnd pʋʋsgo, wa a Zã sẽn zãms b karen-biisã.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Yãmb sã n pʋʋsdẽ, bɩ y yeele: Tõnd ba! Bɩ yãmb yʋʋrã yɩ ne waoogre, tɩ yãmb soolmã wa.
Kõ-y tõnd d daar o daar dɩɩbã daar fãa.
Kõ-y tõnd d beegrã sugri, tɩ tõnd me kõta neb nins fãa sẽn beegd tõndã sugri, la y ra bas tõnd tɩ d kẽ makr pʋgẽ ye.
A Zezi leb n yeela bãmb a woto: Ãnna yãmb sʋkã n na n tar a zoa, t'a wa a nengẽ yʋn-sʋka, n yeel-a tɩ "m zoa, peng-m bur a tãab
tɩ m zoa n yi sor n wa n sig-m tɩ m ka tar bũmb sẽn na kõ-a t'a rɩ ye".
A zoa wã sã n pa pʋgẽ n leok-a t'a ra nams-a ye, tɩ rignoorã zoe n pagame, la tɩ yẽ ne a kambã zoee n kẽe gãaga, la t'a ka le tõe n yik n kõ-a bur ye.
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ baa a sã n ka na n yik n kõ-a burã, a sẽn ya yẽ zoa wã yĩnga, a na yik n kõ-a bũmb nins fãa a sẽn data, a pẽdgrã yĩnga.
La maam, mam yeta yãmb tɩ y kose la b na kõ yãmba, tɩ y bao la y na yã, tɩ y kabse la b na pak tɩ y kẽ.
Bala, ned ning fãa sẽn kot deegdame. Ned ning sẽn baood yãtame, la b pakdame tɩ sẽn kabsd-a kẽ.
Yãmb sẽn ya ba-rãmbã, ãnna yãmb sʋk bi-ribl n na n kos-a bur t'a kõ-a kugri,
wall a kos-a zĩinf t'a kõ-a waaf tɩ ka zĩinfu, wall a kos-a gell t'a kõ-a nanga?
Sã n yaa tɩ yãmb sẽn ya nin-wẽnsã miime tɩ kõ y kambã bõn-sõamyã, yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã n mi n yɩɩda, n na n kõ neb nins sẽn kot bãmbã Sɩɩg-sõngo.
A Zezi dag n digda zĩn sẽn ya muka. Zĩnã sẽn yi, mukã gomame, la neb kʋʋngã yɛɛsame.
La neb kẽer yeelame tɩ yaa ne zĩn-dãmbã naab a Belzebul pãng la a Zezi digd zĩn-dãmbã.
La neb kẽer sẽn dat n mak bãmbã kosa bãmb tɩ b wa ne bãnd sẽn yit arzãna.
La a Zezi sẽn mi b tagsgã yeel-b lame yaa: soolem ning fãa neb sẽn welg taab n gõdg n zabd ne taaba, a na sãame, la rotã na n lʋɩt n yẽegda taaba.
La sã n yaa tɩ Sʋtãanã welgame n gõdg n zabd ne a menga, a soolmã na n yɩɩ a wãn n yalse? Bõe yĩnga, yãmb yetame tɩ yaa ne a Belzebul pãng la mam digd zĩn-dãmbã.
La sã n yaa tɩ mam digda zĩn-dãmbã ne a Belzebul pãnga, yaa ne ãnna soab pãng la yãmb kambã rigd-ba? Rẽnda n kɩt tɩ bãmb mensã na n yɩ yãmb bʋ-kaoodba.
La sã n yaa ne Wẽnnaam pãngã la mam digd zĩn-dãmbã, rẽnda Wẽnnaam soolem taa yãmb nengẽ.
Pãng soab sẽn raoolem a meng sõama sã n gũud a zaka, bũmb kõn sɩɩs a paoongã ye.
La ned pãng sẽn yɩɩd yẽnda sã n wa n tõog-a, a reegda a zab-teedã fãa a sẽn dag n teegã, la a wʋk a teedã n pʋɩ neba.
Sẽn ka be-a ne maam kisa maam, la sẽn ka naagd-a maam n tigsdẽ sãeegdame.
Sɩɩg sẽn ya rẽgd sã n yi n bas neda, a saagda zĩ-pɛɛlã n baood vʋʋsgo. La a sẽn ka yãt vʋʋsgã yĩnga, a yetame t'a na n leb n leba a yir ning a sẽn dag n yi n basã.
La a sã n ta, a mikdame tɩ yirã pɩɩsame n maneg n nagse.
Dẽ, a kẽngdame n tɩ peeg sɩɩs a yopoe a taab sẽn ya wẽns n yɩɩd yẽnda. B wat n kẽe be n zĩndi, la rao-kãng vɩɩmã lebgda wẽng n yɩɩd pipi wã.
A Zezi sẽn gom a woto, pag n zĩnd nebã sʋk n zẽk a koɛɛg n yeel tɩ pag ning sẽn zã-a a Zezi pʋga la a yẽsem bãmbã yaa ned sẽn tar barka.
La a Zezi leokame n yeel tɩ yaa neb nins sẽn kelgd Wẽnnaam goamã n sakdẽ wã n tar barkã.
Nebã sẽn tigsd taab n lebgd kʋʋngã, a Zezi yeelame yaa: Zamaan kãngã neb yaa nin-wẽnse. B baooda bãnde, la b kõn kõ bãmb bãnd a to tɩ ka a Zonaas rẽndã ye.
Bala, a wa a Zonaas sẽn yɩ bãnd Niniiv nebã yĩngã, Ninsaal Bi-riblã me na n yɩɩ bãnd zamaan kãngã nebã yĩnga.

Rĩm-poak ning sẽn dag n yi wĩndg goabgã na n yika bʋʋdã daar n kao zamaan kãngã nebã bʋʋdo. Bala, a yii tẽngã satmẽ n na n wa n kelg a Salomo yam goama. La gese, sẽn be-a ka wã yɩɩda a Salomo.
Bʋʋdã wakate, Niniiv nebã na n yika ne zamaan kãngã nebã n kao b bʋʋdo. Tɩ bõe, a Zonaas sẽn moon bãmb koɛɛgã, b kosa sugri. La gese, sẽn be-a ka wã yɩɩda a Zonaas.
Ned kõn yõgen fɩtɩl n bao zĩig n solg-a, wall a fõgen-a ne peoog ye. Ayo! A dogend-a-la fɩtɩl doagendg zugu, tɩ neb nins sẽn kẽedã na yã vẽenem.
Fo nifã yaa f yĩngã fɩtla. Fo nif sã n ya sõama, fo yĩngã tõr tara vẽenem. La a sã n ka sõama, fo yĩngã tõr me bee lik pʋgẽ.
Gũus f menga, tɩ vẽenem ning sẽn be fo pʋgẽ wã da wa n lebg lik ye.
Dẽ, fo yĩngã tõr sã n tar vẽenem, tɩ lik baa bilf ka be zĩig baa a ye, a na n paama vẽenem sõama wa wakat ning fɩtɩl sẽn yãgd ne a pãngã fãa n vẽnegd foomã.
A Zezi sẽn gomda, Fariisẽ a yembr bõosa bãmb tɩ b wa n dɩ ne yẽnda. A Zezi kẽeme n zĩnd n na n dɩ.
Fariisẽ wã sẽn yã t'a Zezi ka waas n yaool n na n dɩ wã, ling-a lame.
La Zu-soabã yeel-a lame yaa: Yãmb Fariisẽ-dãmbã, yãmb nedgda wama ne laasã poaya, la yãmb pʋsã pida ne fãab la wẽnga.
Ka-yam-dãmba, ka sẽn maan-a yɩngã n maan pʋgẽ wã me laa?
Kõ-y naong rãmbã ne y sũyã fãa, la bũmba fãa na n yɩɩ yolgemd yãmb yĩnga.

Yãmb Fariisẽ-dãmbã na n paama toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb yaooda mant ne ru la zẽ-vãad buudã fãa piig-pʋɩya, n yaool n basd tɩrlem la Wẽnnaam nonglem. Yaool n yaa bõn-kãensã la yãmb tog n maane, la y ra bas sẽn ketã me ye.
Yãmb Fariisẽ-dãmbã, y na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb nonga pipi zaoog karen-dotẽ wã, la y nong nebã sẽn pʋʋsd yãmb daasẽ wã.
Yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb yaa wa yaado, bũmb sẽn ka wilgd b zĩiga, tɩ neb tabd n ka miẽ ye.
Tõog karen-saamb a yembr goma ne bãmb n yeele: Karen-saamba, yãmb sẽn gomd a woto wã, yãmb paoogda tõnd me.
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Yãmb tõog karen-saam-dãmbã me na n paama toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb dɩkda zɩɩbo, a tʋkr sẽn ya toog n tʋkd nebã, tɩ yãmb mensã yaool n ka sɩɩsd-b ne y nug-bil ye.
Yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb meta Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã yaado, tɩ yaool n ya yãmb ba-rãmbã n kʋ-ba.
Woto, yãmb yaa kaset rãmba, la y wilgdame tɩ yãmb saka y ba-rãmbã sẽn tʋmã. Bãmb n kʋ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã, tɩ yãmb met b yaadã.
Yaa rẽnda n kɩt tɩ Wẽnnaam yamã yetẽ yaa: Mam na n tʋma no-rɛɛsdb la tẽn-tʋmdb b nengẽ. Bãmb na n kʋʋ kẽere, la b nams kẽere,
tɩ m tõe n sok zamaan kãngã nebã m no-rɛɛsdb nins fãa b sẽn kʋ hal dũni sɩngr tɩ ta moasã wã zɩɩm,
sẽn sɩng ne a Abɛl zɩɩm tɩ ta a Zakari b sẽn kʋ tẽn-kugrã ne wẽnd-doogã sʋkã zɩɩm. N-ye! Mam yeta yãmb tɩ b na n soka zamaan kãngã nebã bõn-kãnga.
Yãmb tõog karen-saam-dãmbã, yãmb na paam toogo! Tɩ bõe, yãmb feooga bãngr kʋɩlen-bilã. Yãmb mens ka rat n kẽ ye, la y gɩdgda neb nins sẽn dat n kẽ wã tɩ b ka tõe n kẽ ye.
Bãmb sẽn yi be, tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã pẽdga bãmb wʋsgo, n sogs-b tɩ b gom bũmb wʋsg yelle,
n bẽt bãmba n dat n paam gomd sẽn yi bãmb noorẽ n yõk-ba.
Wakat kãnga, neb tus tus tigma taaba, n sẽbg taaba, tɩ ya wa b na n fẽda taaba. A Zezi deng n goma ne b karen-biisã n yeel-b yaa: Gũus-y y mens ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã rã-bɩllã sẽn ya zãmbã.
Bũmb ka be sẽn ludi, sẽn kõn puk ye. La bũmb ka be sẽn solge, b sẽn kõn bãng ye.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ bũmb ning fãa yãmb sẽn na gom lik bida pʋgẽ, b na n wʋm-a-la vẽenemẽ. La bũmb nins yãmb sẽn na n walem tʋbẽ, rot pʋsẽ, b na n moon-b-la rot zutu.
M zo-rãmba, mam yeta yãmb tɩ y ra zoe neb nins sẽn kʋʋd yĩngã n yaool n ka tõe n maan bũmb a to n paasã ye.
Mam na n wilga yãmb y sẽn tog n zoe a soaba. Zoe-y soab ning sẽn tõe n kʋ, la b tõe n kẽes bug-tẽngẽ me wã. N-ye! Mam yeta yãmb tɩ yaa soab kãng la yãmb tog n zoe.
B ka koosd yirs a nu su a yiib sɩda? Baoosgo, Wẽnnaam ka yĩmd b baa a yembr yell ye.
Baa yãmb zugã zoobd fãa sõdame. Dẽ yĩngã, bɩ y ra zoe rabeem ye. Yãmb bee yõod n yɩɩd yirs wʋsgo.
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn na n kɩs kaset nebã taoor t'a yaa mam neda, Ninsaal Bi-riblã me na n kɩsa kaset Wẽnnaam malegsã taoor tɩ soab kãng yaa bãmb neda.
La ned ning fãa sẽn na n kɩɩs nebã taoor t'a ka mi maam, Ninsaal Bi-riblã me na n kɩɩsa Wẽnnaam malegsã taoor tɩ bãmb ka mi-a ye.
Ned ning fãa sẽn goma Ninsaal Bi-riblã wẽng tõe n paama sugri. La ned ning sẽn na n paoog-a Sɩɩg-sõng kõn tol n paam sugr ye.
B sã n tall yãmb n kẽng karen-dotẽ wall bʋ-kaoodba la pãn-soaadbã taoore, bɩ y da maan yɩɩr ne yãmb sẽn na n gom to-to n yiis y menga, wall y sẽn na n yet tɩ bũmb ning ye.
Tɩ bõe, wakat kãng bala, Sɩɩg-sõng na n wilga yãmb bũmb ning y sẽn tog n yeelã.
Ned a yen zĩnda kʋʋngã sʋk n yeel a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, yeel-y m ba-biigã t'a pʋɩ tõnd dogem pʋɩɩrã n yãk m dẽnd n kõ-ma.
A Zezi leok-a lame yaa: Dao wa, ãnna n yãk maam tɩ m yɩ yãmb bʋ-kaooda, wall y te-pʋɩta?
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela nebã yaa: Gũus-y y mens ne rat wʋsgã. Bala, hal baa naar pʋgẽ, ninsaal vɩɩmã ka tũud ne bũmb nins a sẽn tarã ye.
La a Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd n yeele: Arzɛk soab a yen pʋt n da sak sõama.
La a da tagsda a sũurẽ n yetẽ yaa: Mam na n maana a wãna? Bala, mam ka tar zĩig n na n bĩng m koodã ye.
A yeelame yaa: "Ad bũmb ning mam sẽn na n maane: Mam na n wãa m bao wã n lebs n me sẽn ya bɛd n yɩɩda, n bĩng m koodã fãa ne m teedã be.
La mam a n yeela m meng yaa: Fo tara paoong wʋsg sẽn sekd yʋʋm wʋsg yĩnga. Bɩ f vʋʋse, n dɩ la f yũ, la f maan sũ-noogo."
La Wẽnnaam yeela yẽnda yaa: "Yalma! Yʋn-kãngã bala, mam na n deega fo vɩɩmã. La bũmb nins fo sẽn seglã na n yɩɩ ãnna rẽnda?"
Yaa a woto ne ned ning fãa sẽn tigsd paoong a meng yĩnga, n yaool n ka tar Wẽnnaam arzegsã.

Dẽ poore, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Yaa woto yĩng tɩ mam yet yãmb tɩ y ra maan yɩɩr ne y vɩɩmã yelle, yãmb sẽn na n dɩ bũmb ninga, wall ne y yĩngã yelle, y sẽn na n yeelg bũmb ning ye.
Bala, vɩɩm yɩɩda rɩɩbo, la yĩng yɩɩda futu.
Ges-y gãabdã! B ka bʋta, b ka tigsda, b ka tar pilgu wall baoor ye. La Wẽnnaam rɩlgd-b lame. Yãmb ka be yõod n yɩɩd bõn-yɩgdɩ wã sɩda?
Ãnna yãmb sʋkã n tõe n paas a vɩɩmã woglem kãntɩɩg a yembre, a sẽn maand yɩɩr yĩnga?
Dẽ, yãmb sã n ka tõe n maan bũmb sẽn ya bilf n yɩɩda, bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb maand yɩɩr ne bũmb nins sẽn ketã?
Ges-y rulg-lɛlem sẽn bɩt to-to. B ka tʋmda, la b ka wĩid lamdo. Baoosgo, mam yeta yãmb t'a Salomo mengã ne a naamã fãa ka tõog n maneg a meng ne fut n yɩ neer wa rulg-lelemd a yembr ye.
Yãmb tẽeb bilf rãmba, sã n yaa tɩ Wẽnnaam nagsa mood sẽn be weoogẽ rũnna, tɩ b na n tugl-b bugum beoogã a woto, bãmb kõn ges yãmb fut yell n yɩɩda?
Dẽ wã, bɩ y da nams y mens n baood y sẽn na n dɩ bũmb ninga, wall y sẽn na n yũ bũmb ning ye.
Tɩ bõe, yaa dũni neb nins sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaamã n baood bõn-kãense. Yãmb ba wã miime tɩ yãmb dat-b lame.
Bas-y rẽ la y bao Wẽnnaam soolmã, la b na n kõo yãmb bõn-kãensã n paase.
Mam piisi, da zoe-y dabeem ye. Bala, a taa yãmb ba wã yam tɩ b kõ yãmb b soolmã.
Koos-y yãmb sẽn tarã n dɩk a ligdã n kõ naong rãmba. Bao-y kord sẽn ka sãamda, la paoong sẽn ka sat arzãn pʋga, zĩig ning wagdr sẽn ka kolgda, la mogd sẽn ka sãamda.
Bala, yãmb paoong sẽn beẽ wã, yãmb sũurã me na n zĩnda be.
Bɩ y sẽb y sees sẽbdse, la y yõgen y fɩtɩl-dãmba,
la y yɩ wa neb sẽn gũud tɩ b zu-soab yi pʋg-peegr kibs n lebg n wa, t'a sã n ta bal n wẽ bɩ b pak t'a kẽ.
Bark bee tʋmtʋmd kãens zutu, b zu-soabã sẽn na n wa n ta n mik tɩ b neeme. Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ b zu-soabã na n sẽba a sẽbdga, n kɩt tɩ b zĩnd rɩɩb zĩigẽ, t'a wa n kõ-b rɩɩbo.
Yẽ wat yʋn-sʋk tɩ ya no-kɛlenga, a sã n wa n mik tɩ b ka gõe, b sũur na yɩ noogo.
Bãng-y neer tɩ roog soab sã n dag n miẽ wakat ning wagdr sẽn na n wa, a rag n na n neendame n ka bas t'a poog a roogã ye.
Bɩ yãmb me segl n sɛ. Bala, Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n waa wakat ning yãmb sẽn ka tagsd tɩ b na n waame wã.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr soka a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, yaa tõnd bal la yãmb wẽ yel-bũn kãngã bii, bɩ yaa neba fãa?
T'a Zezi leok yaa: Dẽ, ãnna n ya tʋmtʋmd sẽn maand sɩda la a tar yam, t'a zu-soabã yeel-a t'a ges a tʋmtʋmdbã yelle, n kõt-b rɩɩb wakat fãa sẽn zemse?
Tʋmtʋmd kãng zu-soabã sã n wa n mik t'a maanda a woto, tʋmtʋmdã sũur na yɩ noogo.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd t'a zu-soabã na n kɩtame tɩ yẽ ges a arzegsã fãa yelle.
La tʋmtʋmd kãng sã n yeel a sũurẽ t'a zu-soabã kaoosda waoongo, n sɩng n pãbd tʋmtʋmd daopã la tʋmtʋmd pogsã, n dɩtẽ la a yũud n gãeemdẽ,

tʋmtʋmd kãng zu-soabã na n waa daar ning yẽ sẽn ka gũud-a, la wakat ning a sẽn ka mi. A zu-soabã na n sɩbga yẽ sõama, n kɩt tɩ bũmb nins sẽn paamd neb nins sẽn ka maand sɩdã paam yẽnda me.
Tʋmtʋmd ning sẽn mi a zu-soab raabo, n yaool n ka segl bũmbu, la a ka maan a zu-soabã sẽn datã, b na n pãb-a la wʋsgo.

La ned ning sẽn ka mi a zu-soabã raabo, n maan tʋʋmd sẽn tog ne sɩbgre, b na n pãba yẽ bilfu. B sã n kõ ned bũmb wʋsgo, b na n sok-a-la bũmb wʋsgo. La b sã n gũnug ned bũmb wʋsgo, b na n sok-a-la wʋsg n yɩɩda.
Mam waame n na n lob bugum dũni zugu. La mam nonga a sã n da zoe n widgẽ!
La lisg n be mam sẽn tog n deege, la a yellã na n namsa maam hal t'a wa n pidsi.
Yãmb tẽedame tɩ mam waame tɩ laafɩ na zĩnd tẽng zugu? Mam yeta yãmb tɩ ayo. La yaa tɩ welgr na zĩndi.
Bala, sẽn sɩng ne moasã, neb a nu sẽn be zak a yen pʋg na n welga taaba, tɩ tãabã kɩɩs yiibã, tɩ yiibã kɩɩs tãabã.
Ba na n welga ne a bi-ribla, tɩ bi-ribl welg ne a ba. Ma na n welga ne a bi-pugla, tɩ bi-pugl welg ne a ma. Sɩd ma na n welga ne a bi-paga, tɩ bi-pag welg ne a sɩd ma.
A Zezi leb n yeela neb kʋʋngã yaa: Yãmb sã n yã sawadg sẽn yikd nin-taoore, tao-tao bala, yãmb yetame tɩ saagã na n niime, la a yɩta a woto.
La yãmb sã n yã tɩ sobg yita wĩndg goabga, yãmb yetame tɩ zĩigã na n yɩɩ tʋʋlgo, la a yɩta a woto.
Zãmb-dãmba, yãmb mii tẽng yɛla, la yĩngr yɛl sẽn ya to-to. Bõe tɩ yãmb ka mi moasã wakatã yɛl n welge?
La yaa bõe tɩ yãmb ka tõe n bãng sẽn ya tɩrg y toor n bake?

Fo sã n dabd bʋʋd zĩigẽ ne f zabd-n-taaga, bɩ f modg n maneg f yellã ne-a, yãmb sẽn ket sorã zug wakate, tɩ yẽ ra wa tall foom n kẽng bʋ-kaoodba taoore, tɩ bʋ-kaoodbã yõk foom n kõ bi-bees roog gũud t'a kẽes-f bi-bees roog ye.
Mam yet-f lame tɩ fo kõn yi be hal tɩ f yao a samdã yaoolem lagf ye.
Wakat kãnga, neb kẽer waa n togsa a Zezi bũmb ning sẽn maan Galile neba, a Pilat sẽn daag b zɩɩm n kalem ne b maandã zɩɩmã.
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Yãmb tẽedame tɩ Galile nin-kãens sẽn nams a woto wã, b yaa yel-wẽn maandb n yɩɩd Galile neb a taabã laa?
Ayo! Mam yeta yãmb tɩ ayo. Yãmb sã n ka tek yam n kos sugri, yãmb fãa na n sãama a woto me.
Wall neb piig la a nii Siloe gãosgã sẽn lʋɩ n bʋʋg-b n kʋ-bã, yãmb tagsdame tɩ bãmb yaa bɛɛgdb n yɩɩd Zeruzalɛm neb a taabã laa?
Ayo! Mam yeta yãmb tɩ ayo. Yãmb sã n ka tek yam n kos sugri, yãmb fãa me na n sãama a woto.
A Zezi wẽe yel-bũn kãngã me: Ned n dag n tar kankang sẽn sel a nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ. A waame n na n yãgs biisi, la a ka yã ye.
Dẽ, a yeela pʋʋgã koaad yaa: "Yʋʋm a tãab moasã la mam wat n dat kankangã biisi, la m ka yãt ye. Keeg-a! Bõe yĩng t'a yãmb zĩigã zaalem?"
Nasaar sib pʋʋgã koaad leokame n yeele: "M soaala, leb n bas-y-yã-a roandã yɛsa. Ka ne rẽ, mam na n tuume n gilg-a la m ning-a birga.
Daar ninga a na wom biisi. La a sã n ka wome, bɩ y keeg-a".
Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daar a yembre, a Zezi dag n zãmsda neb karen-doog a yen pʋgẽ.
La pag a yen n da be be, tɩ zĩn kɩt t'a lebg koams hal yʋʋm piig la a nii. A dag n zõrame n ka tõe n doog baa bilf ye.
A Zezi yãa-a lame n gom ne-a n yeele: Paga, fo paama yolsg ne f komsmã.
Bãmb tika yẽ ne b nusi. Wakat kãng bala, a roogame n kõ Wẽnnaam waoogre.

La karen-doogã naab sũur sãama ne a Zezi sẽn maan bõn-bãnd vʋʋsg daarã, la a yeela nebã yaa: Dasem a yoob n be tʋʋm yĩnga. Wa-y da-kãens tɩ b maag-yã, tɩ da yɩt tõnd vʋʋsg daarã ye. Zu-soabã leok-a lame n yeele:
Zãmb rãmba, yãmb ned kam fãa ka lokd a naaf a rɩɩb koglgẽ n tall n tɩ yũnug vʋʋsg daarã sɩda?
La pʋg kãngã sẽn ya a Abraham bi-pugla, t'a Sʋtãan loe-a hal yʋʋm piig la a nii wã, d ka tog n lok-a vʋʋsg daare?
A Zezi sẽn gom a woto, yãnd yõka b bɛɛba fãa, la neb kʋʋngã maanda sũ-noog bũmb nins fãa a Zezi sẽn maan tɩ be ziirã yĩnga.
A Zezi leb n yeelame yaa: Wẽnnaam soolma wẽnda bõe, la m na n mams-a-la ne bõe?
A wẽnda wa siin-bil ned sẽn dɩk n lob a zẽed zĩigẽ. A yitame n lebg tɩɩga, la yĩngr liuuli vɩɩ a wilẽ wã.
B leb n yeelame: Mam na n mamsa Wẽnnaam soolmã ne bõe?
A wẽnda rã-bɩll pag sẽn dɩk n ning zom wam a tãabo, hal tɩ zom-nagdgã fãa wuki.
A Zezi da pɩʋʋgda tẽn-bɛd la tẽn-bõonego, n zãmsd nebã la b dabd Zeruzalɛm.
Ned n sok bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, yaa neb bilf bal n na n paam fãagre? A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele:
Nang-y pãng n tũ digno-sẽkã n kẽ. Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ neb wʋsg na n baoome tɩ kẽ la b ka na n tõog ye.
Yirã soab sã n yik n pag rignoorã, tɩ yãmb pa yɩng n sɩng n kabsdẽ la y yet Zu-soabã tɩ b pak tɩ y kẽ, b na n leoka yãmb tɩ b ka mi yãmb sẽn yitẽ ye.
Dẽ, yãmb na n sɩngame n yeele: "Tõnd dɩɩ ne yãmba la d yũ ne yãmba, la yãmb zãmsa neb tõnd soaya zutu."
La b na n leoka yãmb n yeele: "Mam ka mi yãmb sẽn yitẽ ye. Zãag-y ne maam, yãmb fãa sẽn tʋmd ka-tɩrlem tʋʋma."
Yãmb sã n yã a Abraham, la a Izak, la a Zakob ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã fãa Wẽnnaam soolmã pʋgẽ, tɩ b yaool n lob yãmb yɩnga, nintãm ne yẽn wãbr na zĩnd be.
Neb na n yii yaang la taoore, dɩtg la goabga, n zĩnd n dɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã pʋgẽ.
La gese, poorẽ dãmb n be n na n yɩ dẽenem dãmba, tɩ dẽenem dãmb me yɩ poorẽ dãmba.
Wakat kãnga, Fariisẽ-dãmbã kẽer waa n yeela a Zezi yaa: Kẽng n looge! Yi ka, bala, Herood dat n kʋʋ foom.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Kẽng n tɩ yeel-y bõn-bɛɛgã tɩ mam digda zĩn-dãmba, la m maagd bãad-dãmb rũnna la beooge. La ra-yɩt na n yɩɩ baoosg daar ne maam.
La yaa tɩlɛ tɩ mam kẽn dũnna, la beoogo, la dayɩta. Bala, a ka zems tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs ki zĩig a to tɩ ka Zeruzalɛm ye.

Zeruzalɛm! Zeruzalɛm! Fo sẽn kʋʋd Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba, la f lobd neb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn tʋm fo nengẽ wã kugã, naoor a wãn la mam dag n tʋlg n tigs fo kambã wa no-yãang sẽn põgended a kamb a pɩgsẽ? La yãmb ka ralg ye.
Gese, b na n basa yãmb ne y roogã. La mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb ka na n leb n yã maam yɛsa, hal tɩ ta daar ning yãmb sẽn na n yeel tɩ: "Bark bee ned ning sẽn wat ne Zu-soabã yʋʋrã zugu."
Daar a yembre, a Zezi kẽe Fariisẽ-dãmbã naab a yembr zakẽ n na n dɩ, la Fariisẽ-dãmbã dag n gũusda bãmba.
La ade, rao a ye n dag n be bãmb taoore, bã-motg sẽn tara.
A Zezi goma ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã la Fariisẽ-dãmba n yeele: Dẽ yĩnga, noor beeme tɩ maag ned vʋʋsg daare?
Bãmb kell n sĩndame. Dẽ, a Zezi peega bãadã, n maag-a, la b kuils-a.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Ãnna yãmb sʋkã bi-ribl bɩ a naaf n na n lʋɩ bulgẽ vʋʋsg daar t'a ka yiis-a tao-tao?
La b ka tõog n leok gom kãng ye.
Rẽ poore, a Zezi goma ne neb nins b sẽn bool rɩɩbã yĩngã n wẽ-b yel-bũndi. Tɩ bõe, bãmb yãame tɩ nin-kãens baooda naam zĩndg zĩisi. B yeel-b lame yaa:
Ned sã n bool foom yi-kãadem kibsa, da tʋg n zĩnd naam zĩndg zĩigẽ ye, tɩ tõe t'a boola ned sẽn yɩɩd foom.
Sã n yɩ a woto, sẽn bool-a foom ne yẽnda wã na n waa n yeela foom tɩ f yik n bas zĩig n kõ-a, fo na n yaool n tɩ zĩnda poorẽ zaoogã zugu, la f na n yãa yãnde.

B sã n bool foom, kẽng n tɩ zĩnd poorẽ zaoogã zugu, tɩ ned ning sẽn bool-a foomã sã n wa bɩ a yeel foom yaa: "M zoa, wa taoor ka!" Woto na n yɩɩ fo waoogr neb nins fãa sẽn zĩ ne foom n dɩtẽ wã taoore.
Sɩd me, b na n sika ned ning fãa sẽn zẽkd a menga, la b na n zẽka ned ning fãa sẽn sikd a menga.

La a Zezi yeela ned ning sẽn bool-a bãmb tɩ b wa n dɩ wã yaa: Fo sã n na n bool neb tɩ b wa n dɩ ne foom, tɩ ya wĩntoog bɩ yʋngo, da bool f zo-rãmba, wall f ba-biisi, wall f buudu, wall f yags nins sẽn ya arzegs rãmbã, tɩ bãmb me da wa n bool foom ye. Rẽ na n yɩɩ lebsgo.
Fo sã n na n bool neb tɩ b wa n dɩ ne foom, bool naong rãmba, la koms-rãmba, la wobse, la zoense,
la fo na n paama sũ-noogo, b sẽn ka tar n na n kõ foom n lebsã yĩnga. Bala, nin-tɩrsã vʋʋgr wakate, fo na n paama keoore.
Neb nins sẽn dag n zĩ n dɩtẽ wã sẽn wʋm a Zezi gom kãensã, b ned a yembr yeelame yaa: Bark bee ned ning sẽn na n naag-a n dɩ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ wã zugu!
La a Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Dao a yembr n dag n segl rɩɩb n bool neb wʋsg tɩ b wa rɩ.
Dɩɩbã wakate, a tʋma a tʋmtʋmd t'a tɩ yeel neb nins a sẽn boolã tɩ b wa tɩ bũmba fãa zoe n segl n saame.
La bãmb ned kam fãa sɩng n padmame. Pipi soabã yeelame tɩ yẽ raa pʋʋgo, la yaa tɩlɛ tɩ yẽ kẽng n tɩ gese, la a kotame tɩ b bas-a taale.
A to yeelame tɩ yẽ raa nag-koods piiga, la yẽ na n mak-b lame n gese, la a kotame tɩ b bas-a taale.
Ned a to yeelame tɩ yẽ nan peega a pʋg-paala, la rẽ n kɩt tɩ yẽ ka na n tõog n wa ye.

Tʋmtʋmdã lebgame n tɩ togs a soaalã bõn-kãense. A soaalã sũur yĩigame t'a yeel a tʋmtʋmdã t'a kẽng raasẽ wã, la tẽngã soayã zut tao-tao, n wa ne naong rãmba, la koms-rãmba, la zoense, la wobsã be.
Tʋmtʋmdã yeelame tɩ yẽ maana a soaalã sẽn yeelã, la vɩʋʋg ket n beeme.
La soaalã yeela tʋmtʋmdã yaa: Rɩk soayã, la f yeg yãgã n modg nebã tɩ b wa kẽ hal tɩ mam yirã pid ne neba.
Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ neb nins mam sẽn dag n boolã, bãmb ned baa a yen kõn lemb mam dɩɩbã ye.
Neb kʋʋng wʋsg dag n tũuda a Zezi sorã zugu. A Zezi wẽnemdame n yeel-b yaa:
Ned sã n wat mam nengẽ, n ka kis a ba la a ma la a paga la a kamba la a ba-bi-raopa la a ba-bi-pogse, la baa ne a mengã vɩɩm, a ka tõe n yɩ mam karen-biig ye.
La ned ning fãa sẽn kõn dɩk a da-pɩk n tũ maam, ka tõe n yɩ mam karen-biig ye.
Bala, ãnna n be yãmb sʋkã n dat n me gãosgo, n ka reng n zĩnd n geel ligd ning fãa a sẽn tog n yiis tʋʋmdã yĩnga, n bãng a sã n tara sẽn sek tɩ me-a n sa?
Sã n ka rẽ, a sã n yẽbg roogã n sa, n yaool n ka tõe n baas-a, neb nins fãa sẽn na n yã wã na n yaala yẽnda n yeele:
Rao kãngã sɩnga gãosg meeb la a ka tõog n baas ye.
Wall rĩm bʋg n be n dat n tɩ zab ne rĩm a to, n ka reng n zĩnd n mag n gese, yẽ ne a nebã tus piigã sã n tara pãn-tõog tɩ kẽng n seg rĩm a to wã sẽn wat ne neb tus pisi wã?
Rĩm a to wã sẽn ket n be yɩɩga, a na n tʋma neb a nengẽ tɩ b tɩ yẽs laafɩ yẽsg ne-a.
Woto me, yãmb ned ning fãa sẽn ka basd bũmb nins fãa a sẽn tarã ka tõe n yɩ mam karen-biig ye.
Yamsem yaa bõn-sõngo. La yamsem sã n lebg poada, bõe la b na n ning-a t'a le paam noosem?
A ka yõod tãnd yĩnga, wall birg yĩng ye. B lobd-a la yɩnga. Bɩ sẽn tar-a tʋb n wʋmdẽ wʋme!
Yaood-dɛɛgdba fãa ne yel-wẽn maandba fãa kolga a Zezi n na n kelg-ba.
La Fariisẽ-dãmba la tõog karen-saam-dãmba da yẽgemdame n yetẽ tɩ rao-kãnga reegda yel-wẽn maandba la b rɩt ne-ba.
La a Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũn kãnga n yeele:
Nin-bʋg n be yãmb sʋkã n na n tar piis koabga, t'a yembr meneme, t'a ka bas pis-wɛ la a wɛ wã weoogẽ wã n kẽng n tɩ gẽes pesg ning sẽn menem-a wã hal t'a yãnd-a?
La yẽ sã n yãnd-a, a na n palg-a-la a bagdẽ ne sũ-noogo.
La yẽ sã n lebg n ta yiri, a boonda a zo-rãmbã ne a yagsã a yir n yeel-b yaa: "Naag-y maam n maan sũ-noogo, bala, mam yãnda m pesgã sẽn dag n menemã".
Woto me, mam yeta yãmb tɩ sũ-noog na n zĩnda arzãn pʋgẽ, yel-wẽn maand a yen sẽn tek yam n kos sugr yĩnga, n yɩɩd nin-tɩrs pis-wɛ la a wɛ sẽn ka baood sugr kosgã yĩnga.
Walla, pʋg bʋg n na n tar ligd piiga t'a yembr menem t'a ka yõgen fɩtla, n pɩɩs roogã la a gẽes-a neer hal n yãnd-a?
La a sã n yãnd-a, a boonda a zo-rãmbã ne a yagsã a yir n yeel-b yaa: Naag-y maam n maan sũ-noogo, bala, mam yãnda m lagfã sẽn dag n menemã.
Woto me, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yel-wẽn maand a yen sã n tek yam n kos sugri, sũ-noog na n zĩnda Wẽnnaam malegsã sʋka.
A Zezi leb n yeelame yaa: Rao n dag n tar kom-dibli a yiibu.
La yaowã yeela a ba wã yaa: "M ba, pʋɩ-y y paoongã n yãk m pʋɩɩr n kõ-ma". La ba wã pʋɩ-b-la a paoongã.
Rasem bilf zugẽ, yaowã tigsa a sẽn da tarã fãa n kẽng tẽng sẽn zãra, n tɩ sãam a paoongã be ne tʋʋm-dẽgd maanego.
La yẽ sẽn sãam a paoongã fãa n sa, kom kãseng n kẽ tẽn-kãnga, la koma sɩngame n nams-a.
Yẽ kẽng n tɩ noka tẽnga ned a yembre, t'a tʋm yẽ a pʋtẽ t'a tɩ gũ kurkuyã.
Yẽ dag n datẽ la zãbnã kurkuyã sẽn da rɩtã n dɩ n pid a pʋga, la ned ka kõt yẽnda ye.
Yẽ tagsa a sũurẽ n yeele: "M baaba tʋmtʋmdbã waooga, la b tara rɩɩb n dɩt n tɩgd n kelldẽ, tɩ kom kʋʋd maam ka.
Mam na n yikame n kẽng m baaba nengẽ n tɩ yeel-b yaa: M ba, mam beega Wẽnnaam la m beeg yãmba.
Mam ka le zems tɩ b bool maam tɩ yãmb biig ye. Ges-y maam wa yãmb tʋmtʋmd a yembre".
La a yikame n kẽng a ba wã nengẽ. La yẽ sẽn ket n be yɩɩga, a ba wã yã-a lame t'a nimbãanega yõk-a. A ba wã wudgame n tɩ mobg-a n mok-a.
Biigã yeela a ba wã yaa: "M ba, mam beega Wẽnnaam la m beeg yãmba. Mam ka le zems tɩ b bool maam tɩ y biig ye."
La a ba wã yeela a tʋmtʋmdbã yaa: "Wa-y ne fuug ning sẽn yaa-a neer n yɩɩdã tao-tao n yeelg-a. Ning-y-yã-a nug-bilã nugbĩnga, la y wĩd-a neooda.
Wa-y ne nag-bi-noabdgã, n kʋ-a tɩ d rɩ la d maan sũ-noogo.
Bala, mam bi-ribl kãnga ra kiime la a leb n vʋʋgame. A rag n menemame, la d leb n yãnd-a lame." La bãmb sɩngame n kɩdemdẽ.
La bi-ribl kãsengã ra bee pʋtẽ. La yẽ sẽn lebg n watẽ n kolg yiri, a wʋma yʋʋmb ne saoog rãamde.
Yẽ boola tʋmtʋmd a yembr n sok-a bũmb ninga sẽn maandã võore.
Tʋmtʋmdã yeela yẽ yaa: "Yãmb yaowã lebg n waame, tɩ yãmb ba wã kʋ nag-bi-noabdgã, a sẽn lebg n wa ne laafɩ wã yĩnga."
Yẽ sũurã puugame t'a ka sak n na n kẽ ye. A baaba wã yiime n na n bool-a t'a wa n kẽ.
Dẽ, a leoka a ba wã yaa: "Ade, yaa yʋʋm wʋsg la mam tʋmd n kõt yãmba. Mam nan ka kɩɩs yãmb noor ye. La maam yẽ, yãmb zɩɩ n kõ maam baa bull tɩ m maan sũ-noog ne m zo-rãmb ye.
La yãmb bi-kãnga, sẽn sãam-a yãmb paoongã ne pʋg-yoaadbã sẽn lebg n wa wã, yãmb kʋʋ nag-bi-noabdgã n kõ-a".
A ba wã yeel-a lame yaa: "M biiga, fo bee ne maam daar fãa, la bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn tarã yaa foom n so.
La a zemsame tɩ tõnd maan sũ-noog n kɩdem. Bala fo yao wã fo sẽn ne wã ra kiime, la a leb n vʋʋgame. A rag n menemame, la m leb n yãnd-a lame".
A Zezi yeela b karen-biisã me yaa: Arzɛk soab a yembr n da n be n tar a tʋʋm taoor soaba, la b togs-a lame t'a tʋmtʋmdã sãamda yẽ paoongã.
Yẽ boola tʋʋma taoor soab n yeel-a yaa: "Bõe tɩ b gomd fo yell a woto tɩ mam wʋmdẽ? Wilg maam fo tʋʋma sẽn yɩ to-to. Bala, fo ka na n le yɩ mam tʋʋma taoor soab ye."
Tʋʋma taoor soab tagsa a sũurẽ n yeele: "Mam zu-soabã sẽn dat n yiis maam tʋʋmdẽ wã, mam na n maana boẽ? Koobo? Mam ka tar pãng n na n ko ye, la bõsg yaa yãnd ne maam.
Mam mii m sẽn na n maanega, tɩ b sã n wa n yiis maam m tʋʋmdẽ wã, bɩ neb deeg maam b yiyã".
Dẽ, yẽ kɩtame tɩ b bool a zu-soaba sam-dãmbã yembr yembre, n yeel pipi soabã yaa: "Fo tara mam zu-soaba samd wãna?"
T'a leok tɩ kaam rʋg-bɛd koabga. La a yeela yẽ t'a reeg a sebrã n zĩnd tao-tao n gʋls tɩ pis-nu.
Yẽ leb n soka a to yaa: "La fo yẽ samdã yaa wãna?" Tɩ yẽ leok tɩ kood yond kobs-nu. La a yeela yẽ t'a reeg a sebrã n gʋls tɩ kobs-naase.
La a zu-soaba pẽga a tʋʋma taoor soab sẽn ka tɩrgã a sẽn maan yama yĩnga. Bala, dũni kanga neb maanda yam ne taaba, n yɩɩd vẽenem kambã.
La mam yeta yãmb tɩ y rɩk dũni paoongã n bao zo-rãmba, tɩ paoongã sã n wa n sɛ n bas yãmba, bɩ Wẽnnaam reeg yãmb yiy sẽn paad wakat sẽn kõn sa wã pʋgẽ.
Ned ning sẽn maand sɩd bõn-bõoneg pʋse, a maanda sɩd bõn-kãsems pʋse. La ned ninga sẽn ka maand sɩd bõn-bõoneg pʋs ka na n maan sɩd bõn-kãsens pʋs me ye.
Dẽ, yãmb sã n ka maan sɩd ne dũniyã arzegse, ãnna n na n dɩk paoong sɩd-sɩd n gũnug yãmba?
La yãmb sã n ka maan sɩd ne ned a to paoongo, ãnna n na n kõ yãmb y meng rẽnda?
Tʋmtʋmd baa a ye ka be n tõe n sak zu-soben-dãmb a yiib ye. Bala, yẽ na n kisga a yen la a nong a to wã, wall a waoog a yen la a paoog a to wã. Yãmb ka tõe sak Wẽnnaam la ligd me ye.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn da nong ligdã ra kelgda bõn-kãensã fãa la b ra yaanda a Zezi.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: yãmb yaa neb sẽn wilgd nebã tɩ y yaa tɩrse. La Wẽnnaam mii yãmb sũyã. Bala, bũmb ning neba sẽn pẽgd wʋsgã yaa bõn-wẽng Wẽnnaam nifẽ.
Hal tɩ ta a Zã wakate, dag n yaa tõogã ne no-rɛɛsdbã wakate. La sẽn sɩng ne a Zã wakatã, b moonda Wẽnnaam soolem koe-noogã, la ned kam fãa nangda pãng n dat n kẽ be.
Yĩngr la tẽng loogr yaa naana n yɩɩd tõogã kargr a yen menengo.
Ned ning fãa sẽn dig a pag la a rɩk a to, maanda yoobo. La ned ning fãa sẽn dɩk paga a sɩd sẽn dig maanda yoobo.
Rao a ye n da be n ya arzɛk soaba, n yeelgd fu-sõama sẽn ya neeba. La daar fãa, a tara bũmb fãa tɩ seke, t'a vɩɩma ya noog wʋsgo.
Naong soab a yen sẽn boond t'a Lazaar dag n gãee arzɛk soabã zak noore. La a yĩnga fãa da pida ne noada.
A rag n nongẽ lame n paam rɩ-zeremsã sẽn yit arzɛk soaba taabl zug n lʋɩtẽ wã n dɩ. La sẽn paase, baasã wat n lelemda a noadã.
Naong soabã wa n kiime. La malegsã talla yẽ n kẽng a Abraham nengẽ. La arzɛk soabã me wa n kiime, la b mum-a lame.
Kɩɩm-kulgã pʋgẽ, yẽ nak n gesame. La a namsgã pʋgẽ, a tool n yãa a Abraham yɩɩga, t'a Lazaar be ne-a.
Yẽ zẽka a koɛɛg n yeel: "M ba a Abraham! Zoe-y mam nimbãanega, n tʋm a Lazaar t'a tẽk a nug-bil koomẽ n wa n wʋlg m zelemdã. Bala, mam namsda wʋsg bug-kãnga pʋgẽ."
A Abraham leoka yẽ n yeele: "M biiga, bɩ f tẽeg tɩ fo paama arzegs f vɩɩmã wakate, la t'a Lazaar paama toodo. La moasã, yẽ paamda belsg ka, tɩ fo be toog pʋgẽ.

La rẽ fãa sẽn yãk a toogo, bok-kãseng n be tõnd ne yãmb suka, sẽn na n yɩl tɩ neb nins sẽn dat n yi ka n wa yãmb nengẽ wã ra tõog ye, la tɩ sẽn be-b yãmb nengẽ wã me ra tõog n wa tõnd nengẽ ye".
Arzɛk soabã yeelame yaa: "Sã n ya a woto, m ba, mam kota yãmb tɩ y tʋm a Lazaar mam ba wã yiri.
Bala mam tara ba-bi-raop a nu. Bɩ a kẽng n tɩ kɩs bãmb kaset tɩ b ra wa n wa zĩ-kãnga sẽn ya namsg zĩigã ye".
A Abraham leokame tɩ b tara a Moyiis ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã, la b kelg bãmba.
La arzɛk soabã yeelame yaa: "Ayo, m ba a Abraham! La ned sẽn ki sã n vʋʋg n kẽng bãmb nengẽ, b na n teka yam n kos sugri."
La Abraham leoka yẽ yaa: "Bãmb sã n ka kelg a Moyiis ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã, baa ned sẽn ki sã n vʋʋge, b kõn tẽ-a ye." A Lazaar ne arzɛk soabã (16.19)
A Zezi yeel a b karen-biisã yaa: Bũmb nins sẽn wat ne lʋɩɩsã ka tõe n ka wa ye. La ned ning sẽn na n wa-a ne-bã na paam toogo.
B sẽn na loe ned kokor ne neer kugr n lob-a ko-kãsenga pʋg n são a yĩnga, n yɩɩd a sẽn na n kɩt tɩ kom-bõoneg kãens ned a yembr lʋɩ.
Gũus-y y mense. Fo ba-biig sã n maan yel-wende, bɩ f leng-a, la a sã n kos sugri, bɩ f kõ-a.
La a sã n beeg foom naoor a yopoe daar a yembre, n lebg n wa fo nengẽ naoor a yopoe n yet t'a kota sugri, bɩ f kõ-a sugri.
Tẽn-tʋmdba yeela Zu-soabã yaa: Paas-y d tẽebã.
La Zu-soabã yeelame yaa: Yãmb sã n da tarẽ tẽeb sẽn zem siin-bila, yãmb dag n na yeel wom-sɛ-kãngã t'a vik n tɩ sel ko-kãsengã pʋga, la a dag n na sak yãmba.
Ãnna n be yãmb sʋkã n tar tʋmtʋmd sẽn kood wall sẽn gũud rũmsi, t'a sã n yi weoog n lebg n wa bɩ a yeel tʋmtʋmdã: wa kell n zĩnd n dɩ?
Yẽ ka na n yeel tʋmtʋmdã tɩ: Segl dɩɩb n kõ-ma n tek fuug n tall rɩɩbã n wa n kõ-m tɩ m dɩ la m yũ. Rẽ poore fo na yaool n dɩ la f yũ?
Yẽ na n pʋʋsa tʋmtʋmd-kãng barka, a sẽn maan bũmb ninga b sẽn yeel-a t'a maana yĩnga?
Woto me, yãmb sã n maan bũmb nins fãa b sẽn yeel yãmb tɩ y maana, bɩ y yeele: Tõnd yaa tʋmtʋmdb sẽn ka yõod ye, d maana tʋʋmd ninga tõnd sẽn da tog n maanã bala.
A Zezi sẽn wa n dabd Zeruzalɛm, bãmb da tũuda Samari soolem ne Galile sʋka.
Bãmb sẽn kẽed tẽn-bil a yen pʋga, neb piiga yĩn-gãong bãas sẽn tar waa n sega bãmba. Bãmb yaasa yɩɩg n zẽk b koees n yeele:
Zezi, Zu-soaba, zoe-y tõnd nimbãanega.
A Zezi sẽn yãnd-bã, b yeel-b lame tɩ b kẽng n tɩ wilg b mens maan-kʋʋdbã. La bãmb sẽn dabd be wakate, bãmb kell n lebga yɩlma.
Bãmb sʋka ned a yen sẽn yã t'a paama maagre, yẽ lebg n pʋga a nao, n zẽk a koɛɛg n pẽgd Wẽnnaam.
Yẽ wõgemda a Zezi taoore, n fõgn a neng tẽnga, n pʋʋs bãmb barka. A dag n yaa Samari neda.
A Zezi gomame n yeel yaa: Bãmb piiga fãa ka lebg yɩlma sɩda? La neb a wɛ wã bee yɛ?
Yaa sãan-kãnga bal n lebg n wa n na kõ Wẽnnaam waoogre?
Dẽ a Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: yik n looge. Fo tẽeb n fãag foom.
Fariisẽ-dambã soka a Zezi n dat n bãng Wẽnnaam soolmã sẽn na n wa wakat ninga. A Zezi leok-b lame yaa: Wẽnnaam soolmã ka wate, n ya wa bũmb ned sẽn tõe n gẽnes ye.
B ka na n yeel tɩ ges-y-yã! Wẽnnaam soolem bee ka wall a bee ka sẽne ye. Bala, ad-y Wẽnnaam soolmã bee yãmb sʋka.
La a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Wakat n wat tɩ yãmb na n dat n yã Ninsaal Bi-riblã rayã daar a yen la yãmb kõn yã ye.
B na n yeela yãmb tɩ b bee ka, wala b bee ka sẽne. Da kẽng-y be ye, la y ra babs-b ye.
A wa sa-yãgb sẽn yit kɩreng a yen n yãg n tɩ ta kɩreng a to wã, Ninsaal Bi-riblã me na n yɩɩ a woto b waoongã dãare.
La yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bãmb deng n nams wʋsgo, la tɩ zamaan kãnga nebã zãgs bãmba.
Bũmb ninga sẽn zĩnd a Nowe wakatã na n zĩnda Ninsaal Bi-riblã waoongã wakat me.
Nebã rag n dɩtame la b yũuda, la b kẽed kãadem, la b kõt b kamb sɩdba, hal tɩ ta daar ninga a Nowe sẽn kẽ koom koglgẽ wã. Sa-kãsenga waame n sãam bãmb fãa.
A na n yɩɩ wa a Lot wakatã. Nebã rag n dɩtame la b yũuda, n daadẽ la b koosdẽ, n bʋtẽ la b metẽ.
La daar ning a Lot sẽn yi Sodom tẽngã, bugum yii yĩngr n ni wa saaga, ne kidbri n sãam bãmb fãa.
Na n yɩɩ a woto me daar ning Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn na n puk b mengã.
Badaare, bɩ ned ninga sẽn be roog zug t'a teed be roogã pʋg ra sig n dɩgs-b ye. La bɩ ned ninga sẽn be pʋtẽ da lebg n leb poorẽ me ye.
Tẽeg-y-yã a Lot pagã yelle.
Ned ninga sẽn na n bao tɩ gũ a vɩɩm, a na n menes-a lame, la ned ning sẽn na bas a vɩɩm na n paam-a lame.
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ baraar yʋngo, neb a yiib sẽn na n goẽ gãag a yembr zugu, b na n dɩka a ye, n bas a ye.
Pagb a yiib sẽn na n werd neerẽ ne taaba, b na n dɩka a yembr n bas a ye.
Raop a yiib sẽn na n be pʋʋgẽ, b na n dɩka a yembr la b bas a ye.
Karen-biisã soka a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, na n yɩɩ zĩ-bʋgo? La a Zezi leokame tɩ dɩgr sẽn be zĩig ninga, yɩbrend tigimda beene. Pagb a yiib sẽn werd neerẽ (17.35)
A Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd n na n wilg-b tɩ b tog n pʋʋsa wakat fãa n da yɛ ye.
A Zezi yeelame: Bʋ-kaood a ye n da be tẽng a yen pʋgẽ n ka zoet Wẽnnaam, la a ka zoet ned baa a yen nif ye.
Pʋgkõor a ye me n da be tẽn-kãng pʋga, n wat n yet bʋ-kaoodã t'a sõng-a tɩ ned n zabd ne yẽnda.
Bʋ-kaoodã zãgsame n kaoos t'a ka na n sõng-a ye. La a yaool n tagsa a sũurẽ n yeele: "Baa ne mam sẽn ka zoet Wẽnnaama, la m ka zoet ned nifã,
pʋgkõ-kãngã sẽn pẽdgd maama yĩnga, mam na n baas n sõng-a lame t'a ra wat n namsd maam tɩ wa n loog nug ye."
Zu-soabã leb n yeelame yɛsa: Kelg-y bʋ-kaood-wẽngã sẽn yeelã.
Dẽ, Wẽnnaam kõn sõng bãmb nin-tũusdsã sẽn zẽkd b koees wĩndg la yʋng n kot bãmbã? B na kaoos n sõng-ba?
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ b na n sõnga bãmb tao-tao. La Ninsaal Bi-riblã sã n wa, b na n yãa tẽeb tẽng zugu?
A Zezi leb n wẽe yel-bũn-kãnga neb kẽer yĩnga, b sẽn da tẽed tɩ b yaa tɩrse, la b paoogd neb a taabã yĩnga, n yeele:
Daop a yiib n da kẽng wẽnd-doogẽ n na n tɩ pʋʋse. A ye wã yaa Fariisẽ ned la a to wã yaa yaood-dɛɛgda.

Fariisẽ nedã yalsa yĩngr n pʋʋs a sũurẽ a woto: "Mam Wẽnnaam, m pʋʋsda yãmb bark mam sẽn ka wẽnd wa neb a taabã sẽn ya wagda la nin-wẽnse la yoaadbã, la m ka wẽnd baa yaood-deegd-kãnga wã yĩnga.
Mam loeta noor naoor a yiib rasem a yopoe pʋgẽ, mam yãkda m sẽn tarã piig pʋɩɩr n kõtẽ."
Yaood-dɛɛgdã yalsa yɩɩga, n pʋs n ka saagd n na n doog a neng yĩngr ye. La a ra pĩisda a yãoog n yetẽ: "Mam Wẽnnaam! Zoe-y mam nimbãaneg tɩ m yaa yel-wẽn-maanda."
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ rao-kãng lebg n kuila a yir ne tɩrlem. La fariisẽ nedã ka paam ye. Bala, b na n sika ned ning sẽn zẽkd a menga, la b na zẽka ned ning sẽn sikd a menga.
Neb n dag n talled hal baa kom-peels n wat a Zezi nengẽ tɩ b sɩɩs-ba. La karen-biisã sẽn yã bõn-kãnga, b sɩngame n lengd neb nins sẽn tall-b kambã n wa wã.
La a Zezi kɩtame tɩ b wa ne kambã, la b yeele: Bas-y kom-bõonegã tɩ b wa mam nengẽ la y ra gɩdg-b ye. Bala, Wẽnnaam soolmã yaa neb nins sẽn wẽnd-b bãmbã yĩnga.
Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta yãmb tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn ka reegd Wẽnnaam soolmã wa bi-bilf ka na kẽ be ye.
Naab a yembr soka a Zezi yaa: Karen-saam-sõngo, bõe la mam tog n maan n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa?
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ f boond maam tɩ nin-sõngo? Ned kae n ya sõama tɩ sã n ka Wẽnnaam b yen bala.
Fo mii tõodã: "Da yo ye, da kʋ ye, da zu ye, da kɩs kaset zĩrĩ ye, waoog f ba la f ma".
Rao wã yeelame tɩ yẽ saka bõn-kãensã fãa hal sẽn sɩng a yãadem wakate.
A Zezi sẽn wʋm woto, b yeel-a lame yaa: Bũmb a ye n ket n paoog foom. Koos fo sẽn tarã fãa n pʋɩ naong rãmba la f na n paama paoong arzãna. La f wa tũ maam.
Yẽ sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, a sũurã sãama hal wʋsgo, bala yẽ ra tara arzegs wʋsgo.
A Zezi sẽn yã t'a sũurã sãama wʋsgã, b yeelame: Ad na n yɩɩ toog ne neb nins sẽn tar arzegsã tɩ kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ.
Bala, yʋgemd sẽn na n tũ fu-pĩim yõorẽ n loog yaa naana n yɩɩd arzɛk soab sẽn na n kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ.
Neb nins sẽn da kelgd bãmbã yeelame tɩ rẽ, ãnna n tõe n paam fãagre.
La a Zezi leokame tɩ ninsaalbã sẽn ka tõe bũmb ningã, Wẽnnaam tõeeme.
La a Pɩyɛɛr yeelame yaa: Ade, tõnd basa d sẽn tarã n tũ yãmba.
La a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta yãmba, tɩ ned ka be sẽn na n bas a yiri, a paga, a buudu, wall a kamba, Wẽnnaam soolmã yĩnga,
n ka reeg wʋsg n yɩɩd a woto zamaan kãnga pʋgẽ, la a paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa zamaan ninga sẽn watã pʋgẽ ye.
A Zezi peega karen-biis piig la yiibã kɛɛng n yeel-b yaa: Ade, tõnd dabda Zeruzalɛm, la bũmb ninga fãa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn da gʋls Ninsaal Bi-riblã yell wɛɛngẽ wã na n pidsame.
Bala, b na n yõka bãmb n kõ bu-zẽmsã. Bu-zẽmsã na n yaala bãmba, n gom bãmb wẽnga n tʋbs bãmb kolkoodo.
La b na n pãba bãmb ne kalwaase n yaool n kʋ-ba. La ra-tãtẽ-daare bãmb na n vʋʋgame.
La karen-biisa ka wʋm b gomda võor baa bilfu. Gom-kãensa rag n solga ne bãmba, la b ra ka mi gom kãng sẽn dat n yɛɛlg ye.
A Zezi sẽn kolg Zeriko, zoang a ye n da zĩ sorã kɩreng n bõsdẽ.
Yẽ wʋma kʋʋngã sẽn loogdã rãamde, a sokame n na n bãng sẽn ya bũmb ninga.
La b togsa yẽ tɩ yaa Nazarɛt dao a Zezi n da loogde.
La a kelmame n yeele: Zezi, a Daviid Bi-ribla, zoe-y mam nimbãanega!
Neb sẽn da kẽnd taoorã lenga yẽ n dat t'a sĩndi. La a kelmame n yɩɩd pĩnda n yeel tɩ: Daviid bi-ribla, zoe-y mam nimbãanega.
A Zezi yalsame n yeel tɩ b tall-a n wa. La a sẽn kolge, a Zezi sok-a lame:
Bõe la fo rat tɩ m maan n kõ-fo? Yẽ leokame tɩ: Zu-soaba, m dat n le paama m ninã.
La a Zezi yeela yẽnda: Leb n paam f nini. Fo tẽeb n fãag-fo.
Wakat kãng bala, a ninã pukame t'a tũ a Zezi la a waoogd Wẽnnaam. Neba fãa sẽn yã rẽnda wã, b pẽga Wẽnnaam.
A Zezi kẽe Zeriko, n pɩʋʋgd tẽngã,
la dao a ye n da be be t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Zaase, a yaa arzɛk soaba n ya yaood-dɛɛgdbã naaba.
Yẽ ra baood n yãnda a Zezi n bãng b sẽn ya a soaba, la neb kʋʋngã yĩnga, a rag n ka tõe n yã-b ye, bala yẽ yaa rao-kʋɛɛga.
Dẽ, yẽ wudgame n kẽng taoor n tɩ rʋ wom-sɛɛg n na n ges a Zezi, bala b ra tog n tũu beene n looge.
La a Zezi sẽn ta zĩ-kãnga, bãmb nak n gesame n yeel a Zaase yaa: Zaase, sig tao-tao, bala mam tog n siga fo yirã rũnna.
A Zaase siga tao-tao n deeg a Zezi ne sũ-noogo.
Nebã sẽn yã rẽ, bãmb fãa yẽgmame n yetẽ t'a Zezi tɩ siga yel-wẽn-maand yiri.
La a Zaase yalsa Zu-soabã taoor n yeel-b yaa: Ade, Zu-soaba, mam na n yãka m paoongã pʋɩ-sʋk n kõ naong rãmba. La mam sã n dag n zãmba ned n deeg a bũmbu, m na n lebsa yẽnda naoor a naase.
A Zezi yeela yẽnda yaa: Fãagr waa yi-kãnga pʋg rũndã, tɩ bõe, nin-kãnga me ya a Abraham yagenga.
Bala Ninsaal Bi-ribla waame n na n bao bũmb nins sẽn da menema n fãag-ba.
La neba sẽn kelg gom-kãense, a Zezi leb n wẽe bãmb yel-bũndi, tɩ bõe, bãmb da kolga Zeruzalɛm. La nebã ra tagsdame tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã na n puka wakat kãng bala.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeelame yaa: Na-biig a yembr n da yi n kẽng tẽng sẽn zãr n na n tɩ reeg naam la n wa.
Yẽ boola a tʋmtʋmdb piig n kõ-b min piig n yeel-b tɩ b yõdg n leeb n paam yõod hal tɩ yẽ lebg n wa.
La a soolmã neba ra kisa yẽnda, la b tʋma neb tɩ b pʋgl-a n tɩ yeel yaa: "Tõnd ka rat tɩ rao-kãnga soog tõnd ye."
La yẽ sẽn deeg naama n lebg n wa, a kɩtame tɩ b bool tʋmtʋmdb nins yẽ sẽn da kõ ligdã tɩ b wa, tɩ yẽ bãng ned kam fãa sẽn leeb n paam yõod to-to.
Pipi soabã waa n yeelame yaa: "Zu-soaba yãmb minna paama yõod min piiga."
A yeela yẽ yaa: "Be neere, tʋmtʋmd-sõngo, fo sẽn maan sɩd ne bũmb bilfã yĩnga, bɩ f soog tẽms piiga."
La yiib soabã waame n yeele: "Zu-soaba, yãmb minna doga min a nu."
A yeela yẽ yaa: "Fo me soog tẽms a nu."
A to n waa n yeele: "Zu-soaba, ad yãmb minna! Mam dag n vil-a-la ne peend n bĩngi,
bala, mam da zoeta yãmba, yãmb sẽn ya nin-toaagã yĩnga. Yãmb dɩkda bũmb ninga y sẽn ka rɩgle, la y tigsd bũmb ninga yãmb sẽn ka bʋd ye."

Naabã yeela tʋmtʋmd kãng yaa: "Tʋmtʋmd-wẽnga, mam na n dɩka fo menga goam n kao fo bʋʋdo. Fo ra miime tɩ mam yaa nin-toaaga, tɩ mam dɩkda bũmb ning mam sẽn ka rɩgle, la m tigsd bũmb ning mam sẽn ka bʋd ye,
dẽ, bõe yĩng tɩ fo ka bĩng mam ligdã bãnkẽ tɩ mam sã n lebg n wa bɩ m deeg-a ne yõodo?"
La a yeela neb nins sẽn da be be wã tɩ b reeg min a yembrã a sẽn tarã n kõ ned ning sẽn tar-a min piigã.
Bãmb yeela yẽ yaa: "Zu-soaba, yẽ tara min piiga."
Mam yeta yãmb tɩ b na kõo ned ning sẽn tara, la ned ning sẽn ka tarã, b na n deega baa bũmb bilf ninga yẽ sẽn tarã.
La sẽn keta, tall-y mam bɛɛbã sẽn da ka rat tɩ mam soog-bã n wa ne ka. Kood-y-b mam nifẽ.
A Zezi sẽn gom a woto n sɛ, bãmb lʋɩɩ nebã taoor tɩ b rabd Zeruzalɛm.
La bãmb sẽn kolg Bɛtfaaze ne Betani sẽn be tãng ninga sẽn boond tɩ oliiv tɩɩs tãngã sẽne, a Zezi tʋma b karen-biis a yiibu.
N yeel-b yaa: Kẽng-y tẽng ninga sẽn be taoorã, y sã n ta be, y na n yãnda bõn-bil b sẽn loe, tɩ ned nan ka zomb-a. Lok-y-yã-a, n wa ne ka.
Ned sã n sok yãmb tɩ bõe yĩng tɩ y lokd-a, bɩ y yeel-a tɩ yaa Zu-soabã n dat-a.
Neb nins b sẽn da tʋma kẽngame n tɩ mik tɩ yaa wa a Zezi sẽn da yeel bãmbã bala.
La bãmb sẽn lokd bõn-bilã, a soaalbã soka bãmb tɩ yaa bõe tɩ b lokd bõn-bilã.
B leokame tɩ Zu-soabã dat-a lame.
La b talla bõn-bilã n wa a Zezi nengẽ, n paal b fut a poorã n kɩt t'a Zezi zombe.
La bãmb sã n kẽngdẽ, nebã yɛɛta b futã sorã zugu.
Bãmb sẽn kolgd Zeruzalɛm, oliiv tɩɩs tãngã sigdg sẽne, bãmb karen-bi-kʋʋngã fãa sɩngame n zẽk b koees n pẽg Wẽnnaam ne sũ-noogo, bõn-bãna fãa bãmb sẽn yã wã yĩnga.
Nebã da yetame tɩ yaa: Wẽnd na bark rĩm ninga sẽn wat ne Zu-soabã yʋʋrã! Laafɩ bee arzãna, la ziir bee hal yĩngri.
Fariisẽ-dãmba kẽer sẽn dag n be neb kʋʋngã sʋk yeela a Zezi tɩ b leng b karen-biisã tɩ b sĩndi.
A Zezi leokame yaa: Mam yeta yãmb tɩ b sã n sĩndi, kugã na n kelmame!
Bãmb sẽn kolg Zeruzalɛm, a Zezi sẽn yã tẽngã, b yãba a yĩng n yeele:
Fo me sã n da bãngẽ bũmb ninga sẽn wat ne fo laafɩ wã rũnna! La moasã b solga ne foom.
Wakat n wat tɩ fo bɛɛba na n me bõn-yood n gilg foom. B na n gũbga foom n dɩdg-f zĩiga fãa.
B na n sarma foom ne f kambã sẽn be fo pʋgẽ wã, la b kõn bas kugr baa yembr kugr a to zug fo pʋgẽ ye, fo sẽn ka bãng wakat ninga fo fãagrã sẽn wa wã yĩnga.
A Zezi kẽe wẽnd-doogẽ wã n sɩng n dig koaasdbã,
n yeel-b yaa: A gʋlsame tɩ: "Mam doogã na n yɩɩ pʋʋsg roogo, la yãmba, y maan-a lame t'a lebg wagda geongo."
A Zezi da zãmsda nebã daar fãa wẽnd-doogã pʋgẽ. La maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba ne gʋlsdbã la tẽngã kãsem-dãmb dag n baood n na n kʋʋ bãmba.
La bãmb da ka mi b sẽn na n maan to-to ye, tɩ bõe nebã fãa ra yong n kelgda a Zezi.
Ra-kãense, daar a yembre, a Zezi sẽn zãmsd nebã wẽnd-doogẽ wã la b moond koe-noogã, maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmba, la gʋlsdba ne kãsem-dãmbã waame.
La b yeela a Zezi yaa: Togs-y tõndo: Yaa ne no-bʋg la yãmb maand bõn-kãensã, wall ãnna n kõ yãmb no-kãnga.
A Zezi leok-b lame yaa: Mam me na n soka yãmb sokre.
Togs-y maam: A Zã lisgã yii arzãn bii, bɩ yaa ninsaalb nengẽ?
La bãmb yẽsa ne taab n yeele: Tõnd sã n yeel t'a yii arzãna, b na n yeelame tɩ la yaa bõe tɩ tõnd ka tẽ a Zã,
la tõnd sã n yet t'a yii ninsaalb nengẽ, neba fãa na n loba tõnd kuga, bala neba tẽeda hakɩɩk t'a Zã yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
Dẽ bãmb leokame tɩ b ka mi lis-kãng sẽn yi zĩig ning ye.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Mam me ka na n togs yãmb mam sẽn paam noorã zĩig ninga n maand bõn-kãensã ye.
La a Zezi sɩngame n wẽ neba yel-bũn kãnga n yeele: Dao a ye n da sel nasaar sib pʋʋgo, n dɩk-a n peng nasaar sib koaadba, la a yi n tog sor n na n tɩ kaoose.
La bõn-bɩʋʋng sẽn ta, a tʋma tʋmtʋmd nasaar sib koaadbã nengẽ tɩ b kis-a nasaar sib biis t'a wa n kõ-a. La nasaar sib koaadbã pãba yẽnda n lebs-a t'a kuil nug-zaala.
Yẽ leb n tʋma tʋmtʋmd a to Yɛsa. La koaadbã pãba yẽnda n paoog-a n lebs-a t'a kuil nug-zaala.
Yẽ leb n tʋma tãabẽ soaba, la b pogla yẽnda n dig-a.
La nasaar sib pʋʋgã soab yeelame yaa: "Mam na n maana bõe? Mam na n tʋma m bi-ribl-nongrã tɩ tõeeme tɩ b waoog-a."
La nasaar sib koaadbã sẽn yã biigã, b yẽsa ne taab n yeele: "Yaa yõwã n na n soog a ba wã paoongã."
La b yõka yẽ n yiis nasaar sib pʋʋgẽ wã n kʋ-a. Moasã nasaar sib pʋʋgã soab na n maan-b-la bõe?
A na n waame, n sãam koaadb-kãense, la a rɩk pʋʋgã n peng koaadb a taaba. La nebã sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, b yeelame tɩ: Bɩ ra yɩ a woto ye.
La a Zezi gesa bãmb n yeel yaa: Gʋlsg sõngã sẽn yeel tɩ: "Kugr ning tãn-metbã sẽn zãgsã lebga roogã pãng kugri, a soaka zĩigẽ wã" võor yaa bõe?
Ned ninga sẽn na n lʋɩ-a kug-kãnga zug na n tõtmame, la kug-kãnga sẽn na n lʋɩ ned ninga zugu, a na n beds-a lame.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã baoome tɩ yõk a Zezi wakat kãng bala, la bãmb zoee nebã. B ra bãngame tɩ yaa bãmb yĩng la a Zezi sẽn wẽ yel-bũn kãngã wã.
Bãmb sɩngame n gũusd a Zezi, sẽn na yɩl n paam a Zezi gomd n bẽd-b n yõk n tɩ kɩs pãn-soaadbã ne Gʋvɛrneerã sẽn so noorã.
Nin-kãens soka a Zezi a woto: Karen-saamba, tõnd miime tɩ yãmb gomda tɩrlem la y zãmsd nebã ne tɩrlem, la tɩ yãmb ka tũusd neb ye. La yãmb zãmsda nebã Wẽnnaam sor wa sẽn zems sɩdã.
Tõogã kõta tõnd noor tɩ d yao Sezaar yõor yaood bɩ a ka kõta?
La a Zezi sẽn bãng bãmb sɩlma leok-b lame yaa:
Wilg-y maam lagfo. Maasmã ne gʋlsemã sẽn be a zugã yaa ãnna rẽnda? Tɩ b leok tɩ Sezaar.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Rẽ wã, kõ-y Sezaar bũmb ning sẽn ya Sezaar dẽnda, la y kõ Wẽnnaam bũmb ning sẽn ya Wẽnnaam dẽnda.
Bãmb ka tõog n yõk a Zezi b gomd baa a yen pʋgẽ nebã taoor ye. La a Zezi leokrã yɛɛs-b lame tɩ b sĩndi.
Saduusẽ-dãmba sẽn yet tɩ kũum vʋʋgr ka be wã neb kẽer kolgame n sok a Zezi a woto:
Karen-saamba, a Moyiis dag n gʋlsame n yeel tõnd tɩ: "Ned ba-biig sã n tar pag n ki n bas-a n ka paam biiga, bɩ yẽ peeg pagã n dog kamb a ba-biigã yĩnga."
La raop a yopoe n dag n be n ya ba-biisi. La kãsma peega paga la a kiime n ka paam biig ye.
La yiib soabã reega pʋgkõorã, n ki n bas-a tɩ tãab soaba reeg-a.
La a yɩɩ woto ne bãmb b yopoe wã fãa, b kiime n ka paam kamb ye.
La pagã me yaool n kiime.
Kũum vʋʋgr daare, bãmb sʋkã, yẽ na n yɩɩ ãnna soab paga? Bala yẽnda rag n yɩɩ neb a yopoe wã paga.
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Dũni kãnga nebã peegda pagba tɩ pagba kuiis sɩdba,
la neb nins b sẽn na n mik tɩ b zemsame tɩ zĩnd dũni ning sẽn watã pʋgẽ wã la tɩ vʋʋg n bas kũumã ka na n le peeg pagba, wala kuil sɩdb ye.
Bãmb ka tõe n leb n ki yɛs ye, tɩ bõe, b na n yɩɩ wa malegse, la b na n yɩɩ Wẽnnaam kamba, bãmb sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũumã yĩnga.
Zĩig ning b sẽn gomd tuugã bugma sẽn be a zugã yellã, a Moyiis wilgame tɩ kũum vʋʋgdame, yẽ sẽn boond Zu-soabã t'a Abraham ne a Izak la a Zakob Wẽnnaamã.
La Wẽnnaam ka kũum Wẽnnaam ye, b yaa nin-vɩɩs Wẽnnaam. Bala ne bãmba neba fãa vɩɩme.
Gʋlsdb kẽer leokame yaa: Karen-saamba, yãmb goma sõama.
La bãmb ka saag n le sok a Zezi sokr a to yɛs ye.
A Zezi sok-b lame yaa: B tõe n yɩɩ a wãn n yeel tɩ Kirist yaa a Daviid yagenga?
A Daviid meng yeela yɩɩn-sõamyã sebr pʋgẽ tɩ: "Zu-soaba yeela mam Zu-soaba yaa: Zĩnd mam dɩtgo,
hal tɩ m kɩt f bɛɛba yɩ fo nao roagendga."
Dẽ, a Daviid boonda bãmb tɩ Zu-soaba, woto bãmb na n yɩɩ a wãn n yaa a yagenga?
La nebã fãa sẽn kelgd a Zezi, bãmb yeela b karen-biisã yaa:
Gũus-y y mens ne gʋlsdbã sẽn nong n gõod ne fu-wogdo, n nongẽ tɩ neba pʋʋsd bãmb raasẽ, la b baood n zĩnd waoogr goeels zut karen-dotẽ, la rɩɩb zĩisẽ wã.
Bãmb deesda pʋgkõapã paoong zãnga la b pʋʋsd pʋʋs-wogd nebã nin gesg yĩnga. Bãmb na n paama sɩbgr sẽn ya toog n yɩɩda.
A Zezi zẽka b neng n ges arzegsã rãmb sẽn da ningd b kũunã ligdã ningr zĩigẽ.
Bãmb yãa pʋgkõor a yen me sẽn ya naong soab t'a ningd tãma a yiib beene.
La a Zezi yeelame yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ pʋgkõ-kãngã sẽn ya naong soabã ningame n yɩɩd neb a taabã fãa.
Bala, nin-kãensã ned kam fãa tʋm n yãka a paoong a sẽn tar tɩ loogã pʋgẽ n ning ligdã ningr zĩigẽ, la pʋgkõorã ninga a sẽn tarã fãa, hal baa a rɩɩbã ligd zãnga.
La neb kẽer sẽn dag n gomd wẽnd-doogã yell n wilgd tɩ b nags-a-la ne kug-neebã, la teedã neb sẽn tall n wa n kõ Wẽnnaamã, a Zezi yeelame yaa:
Day n wate, tɩ bũmb ningã yãmb sẽn ne wã, kugr baa a yen kõn pa a to zug b sẽn kõn leeb n lub ye.
Bãmb soka a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, dẽ, bõn-kãens na n waa dabʋre, la bõe bãnd n na n wilg bõn-kãens waoongo?
A Zezi leokame yaa: Gũus-y tɩ ned ra belg yãmb n tõog ye. Bala, neb wʋsg n na n dɩk mam yʋʋr n wa n yeel tɩ bãmb la Kirist, la tɩ wakat kolgame. Da tũ-y-b ye.
La yãmb sã n wa wʋm tɩ b gomd zabre, la tẽn-dãmbg yelle, bɩ y ra zoe rabeem ye. Bala, bõn-kãens tog n deng n waame, la ka dũniyã saab nand ye.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-b lame: Tẽng a yembr na yika zabr ne tẽng a to, la rĩung a yen na n yika ne rĩung a to.
Tẽn-digimdg kãsems na n zĩndame, la bã-longds ne kom na n zĩnda zĩig zĩiga, la yel-kãsems sẽn kẽesd rabeem ne bõn-bãn sẽn yit yĩngr na n zĩndame.

La sẽn deng bõn-kãens fãa, b na n yõga yãmba, n nams-yã. B na n yõga yãmb n tall n kẽng karen-dotẽ, b na n kẽesa yãmb bi-bees roto, b na n tall-y lame n kẽng rĩm-dãmb ne Gʋvɛrneer dãmb taoor mam yʋʋrã yĩnga.
Na n tũu ne rẽnda tɩ yãmb kɩs bãmb mam kaseto.
Dẽ wã, ning-y y yamẽ, n da reng n tags y sẽn na n tɩ gom bũmb ning n fãag y meng ye.
Bala, mam na n ninga goam y noorẽ, la m kõ-y yam, la yãmb bɛɛbã fãa baa a yen kõn tõog n kɩɩs wall b wẽ nokoeemd ye.
Baa yãmb ba-rãmba, la y ba-biisi, la y roagdba, la y zo-rãmb mens na n yõga yãmb n kɩse, la b na n kʋʋ yãmb neb kẽere.
Nebã fãa na n kisga yãmb mam yʋʋrã yĩnga.
La yãmb zug zoobg baa a yen kõn menem ye.
Yãmb sã n yals kãenkãe, y na n fãaga y mense.
Dẽ, yãmb sã n wa n yã sodaas sẽn gũbg Zeruzalɛm, bɩ y bãng t'a sãoongã kolgame.
Dẽ, bɩ neb nins sẽn na n be Zude wã zoe n dʋ tãmse, tɩ neb nins sẽn be Zeruzalɛm tẽngã pʋgẽ wã zoe n yi, la tɩ neb nins sẽn na n be-b wetẽ da kẽ tẽngã pʋgẽ ye.
Bala, ra-kãens na n yɩɩ sũ-dokr rayã, tɩ bũmb nins fãa b sẽn gʋlsã na paam pidsgu.
Pagb nins sẽn tʋtã, la sẽn yẽsemd kamb ra-kãens daarã na n paama toogo. Bala, to-kãseng n na n zĩnd soolmã pʋgẽ, la Wẽnnaam sũ-puugr na n lʋɩɩ nin-kãens zutu.
Zabr sʋʋg n na n kʋ bãmba, la b na n yõga bãmb n maan yemse, n tall n kẽng buudã fãa sʋka. La bu-zẽms na n sooga Zeruzalɛm ne pãng hal tɩ b wakatã pidi.
Bãn na n zĩnda wĩndgẽ, la kiuugẽ, la ãdsẽ, la tẽngã zugu, ko-kãsengã bʋrgã, la a ko-pɛmã na n yɛɛsa buud toay-toayã tɩ b ka mi b sẽn na n maan bũmb ning ye.
Rabeem na n kʋʋ ninsaalba, bãmb sẽn gũud bũmb ning sẽn na n wa dũni zugã yĩngã. Bala, yĩngr pãens na n digimdame.
Dẽ, b na n yãa Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn zao sawadg n wat ne pãnga la ne ziiri.
La bõn-kãens sã n sɩng n watẽ, bɩ y roog la y nak n gese, tɩ bõe, yãmb fãagrã kolgame.
La a Zezi wẽe bãmb yel-bũnd n yeele: Ges-y kankanga, la tɩɩsã fãa.
Yãmb sã n yã b sẽn tobda, yãmb mens miime tɩ sigr zoe n kolgame.
Woto me, yãmb me sã n wa n yã tɩ bũmb kãensã maandame, bɩ y bãng tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã kolgame.
Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta yãmb tɩ neb nins sẽn vɩ moasã wã fãa kõn ki tɩ bõn-kãensã ka pids ye.
Yĩngr la tẽng na looge, la mam goamã kõn tol n loog ye.
Gũus-y y mens tɩ rɩ-n-tɩk wall rã-tɩgre, la vɩɩmã yɛl yɩɩr da wa n zɩsg yãmb sũyã ye, la tɩ ra-kãng ra wa n ling yãmb
wa zĩm-gãmbre, bala, ra-kãng na n waa n linga neb nins fãa sẽn be tẽn-gãongã fãa zugã.
Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ y neend la y pʋʋs wakat fãa tɩ y tõe n paam pãng n põs bũmb nins fãa sẽn tog n wa wã, la y tõog n yals Ninsaal Bi-riblã taoore.
A Zezi da zãmsda nebã wẽnd-doogẽ wã wĩndga, la yʋngo bãmb kẽnd n gãee tãng ning b sẽn boond tɩ oliiv tɩɩs tãnga zugu.
La nebã fãa kẽngda bãmb nengẽ wẽnd-doogẽ wã, sẽn sɩng ne yibeoogo, n na n tɩ kelg bãmba.
Bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll kibsa, b sẽn boond tɩ zʋʋg-n-basã da kolgame.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã dag n baooda b sẽn na n maan to-to n kʋ a Zezi. Bala, b ra zoeta nebã.
La a Sʋtãan kẽe a Zudas, b sẽn boond tɩ Iskaryo, sẽn dag n ya neb piig la a yiibã ned a yembrã.
La a Zudas kẽngame n tɩ yẽs ne maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã la ne wẽnd-doog gũudbã kãsem-dãmbã, n bao a sẽn na n tũ sor ning n yõk a Zezi n kõ-ba.
Bãmb sũyã yɩɩ noogo, tɩ b sar tɩ bãmb na n kõo a Zudas ligdi.
La yẽ sakame, n sɩng n baood weer ning yẽ sẽn na n yõk a Zezi n kõ-ba, tɩ kʋʋngã ka bãng ye.
Bur sẽn ka rã-bɩllã raare, daar ning b sẽn da tog n kʋ zʋʋg-n-basã pe-bilã taame.
La a Zezi tʋma a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã n yeel-b yaa: Kẽng-y n tɩ segl-y Zuif-rãmbã zʋʋg-n-basã rɩɩb tõnd yĩng tɩ d rɩ-a.
Bãmb soka a Zezi tɩ yɛɛne la bãmb dat tɩ b tɩ segl zʋʋg-n-basã.
A Zezi leok-b lame yaa: Ade, yãmb sã n kẽ tẽngã pʋgẽ, yãmb na n sega rao sẽn tʋk koom ne yʋʋre. Tũ-y-yã-a n kẽ yir ning a sẽn na n kẽ wã.
Yeel-y yirã soab yaa: "Karen-saamb sokdame tɩ roog ning bãmb sẽn na n dɩ zʋʋg-n-basã kibs ne b karen-biisã bee yɛ?"
La yẽ na n wilga yãmb do-pʋg sẽn ya yalenga n be roog zugu, tɩ teedã fãa be be, yaa be la y na n segl zʋʋg-n-basã.
Bãmb kẽngame, n tɩ mik tɩ bũmba fãa yaa wa a Zezi sẽn dag n yeel bãmbã, la b segla zʋʋg-n-basã.
Wakat sẽn ta, a Zezi zĩnda ne tẽn-tʋmdbã n na n dɩ.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Mam tʋlga ne m sũur fãa n dɩ zʋʋg-n-bas kãngã ne yãmba, sẽn deng m namsgã.
Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ mam kõn leb n dɩ-a yɛsa, hal t'a pids Wẽnnaam soolem pʋgẽ.
A Zezi rɩka bõn-yũudla n ning bark n yeele: Deeg-y bõn-yũudl-kãngã n pʋɩ ne taaba.
Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ sẽn sɩng ne moasã, mam kõn leb n yũ nasaar sib koom yɛsa, hal tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã wa.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi rɩka bur n ning bark n yaool n kao-a n kõ karen-biisã n yeele: Ada yaa mam yĩnga, b sẽn kõ yãmb yĩnga. Bɩ y maand bõn-kãnga n tẽegd mam yelle.
Woto me, bãmb sẽn dɩ n sɛ, a Zezi rɩka bõn-yũudlã n kõ-b n yeele: Bõn-yũudl kãngã yaa kãab paalga, mam zɩɩmã sẽn daag yãmb yĩngã maasem yĩnga.
Baoosgo, ade, ned ning sẽn zãmbd-a maamã naaga maam ka n dɩtẽ.
Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n kii wa Wẽnnaam sẽn yãk yam to-to wã. La ned ning sẽn na n zãmb-a bãmbã na n paama toogo.
La karen-biisã sɩngame n sokd taab n dat n bãng sẽn ya ned ning bãmb sʋkã n na n maan yel-kãngã.
Karen-biisã wẽe nokoeemd ne taab wʋsg n dat n bãng ned ning b sẽn tog n ges wa kãsem bãmb sʋkã.
A Zezi yeel-b lame: Soolem dĩm-dãmbã soo nebã ne pãnga, la sẽn tar-b noor ne nebã kɩtdame tɩ b boond bãmb tɩ tʋʋm neer maandba.
La a ka a woto ne yãmb ye. Sẽn ya-a kãseng n yɩɩd yãmb sʋka, bɩ a yɩ wa yao-zʋʋga, tɩ ned ning sẽn ya-a taoor soab yɩ wa tʋmtʋmda.
Bala, ned ning sẽn zĩ n dɩtẽ wã la kãseng n yɩɩd bii, bɩ yaa ned ning sẽn kɩt-a rɩɩbã? La baoosgo, mam bee yãmb sʋk wa rɩ-kɩta.
Yãmba, yãmb yaa neb sẽn kell n modg n pa ne maam m makrã pʋgẽ.
Yaa rẽnd n kɩt tɩ mam kõt yãmb soolmã, wa m ba sẽn kõ-a maamã,
tɩ yãmb tõe n zĩnd ne maam m soolmã pʋgẽ n dɩ la y yũ, la y zaoond gɛy zut n kao Israyɛl buud piig la a yiibã bʋʋdo.
Zu-soabã yeelame yaa: Sɩmo! Sɩmo a Sʋtãan kosame n na n yelg yãmb wa b sẽn yelgd koodo.
La mam pʋʋsa fo yĩnga, tɩ f tẽeba ra wa paoog ye. La fo sã n lebg n wa mam nengẽ, bɩ f paas f ba-biisã raoodo.
A Pɩyɛɛr yeelame yaa: Zu-soaba, mam seglame n sɛ tɩ kẽ bi-bees roog ne yãmba, wall tɩ ki ne yãmba.
La a Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Pɩyɛɛr, mam yeta foom tɩ rũnna, no-raoog kõn kelem tɩ fo ka kɩɩs noor a tãab tɩ f ka mi maam ye.
A Zezi leb n yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Mam sẽn tʋm yãmb tɩ y ka zɩ ligdi wall korgo, wall neooda wã, bũmb paooga yãmba? B leokame tɩ baa fɩ.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame: Moasã, ka le yaa a woto ye. Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar ligd korg rɩk-a, tɩ ned ning me sẽn tar korg rɩke. La ned ning sẽn ka tar zabr sʋʋga, bɩ a koos a fuug n da a yen.
