Bala, mam yeta yãmb tɩ bũmb ning b sẽn gʋls n yeel tɩ "b naaga bãmb ne tʋʋm-wẽns maandbã" tog n pidsa mam zugu. La bũmb ning sẽn gʋls n gomd mam yellã kolga pidsgu.
Karen-biisã yeela a Zezi tɩ ad zabr sʋʋs a yiibu. La a Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ rẽ sekame.
A Zezi yiime n kẽng oliiv tɩɩs tãngẽ wã, wa bãmb sẽn minim n maandẽ wã. La karen-biisã tũu bãmba.
Bãmb sẽn ta zĩ-kãnga, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b pʋʋs n da wa n lʋɩ makr pʋgẽ ye.
La bãmb zãag n basa karen-biisã, sẽn zems kugr lobgre, n tɩ yĩgimd n pʋʋs
n yeel yaa: M ba, yãmb sã n data, bɩ y zãag bõn-yũudl kãngã ne maam. Baoosgo, bɩ y ra maan mam sẽn datã ye, maan-y y raabo.
Dẽ, malɛk yii arzãn n puk a meng ne bãmba n paas bãmb pãnga.
La sũ-sãoong-kãseng yõka a Zezi, la bãmb pʋʋsa ne pãng n yɩɩd pĩnda, la b tʋʋlgã lebga wa zɩ-pɛla, n lasd tẽnga.
Bãmb basa b pʋʋsgã n yik n wa b karen-biisã nengẽ n mik tɩ b gõeeme, sũ-sãoongã yĩnga.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb gõe? Yik-y n pʋʋs-y n da wa n lʋɩ makr pʋgẽ ye.
Bãmb sẽn dag n nan ket n gomda, ad neb kʋʋng sẽn be taabẽ! La ned ning b sẽn boond t'a Zudas, n ya karen-biis piig la yiibã ned a yembrã dag n lʋɩɩ bãmb taoore. Yẽ kolga a Zezi n mok-ba.
A Zezi yeela yẽ yaa: Zudas, yaa ne mokr la fo na n yõk Ninsaal Bi-riblã n kõ laa?
Neb nins sẽn dag n be ne a Zezi wã yãa bũmb ning sẽn na n maanã, la b soka a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, d kɛ-b ne sʋʋse?
Karen-biisã ned a yembr kɛɛ maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem tʋmtʋmd n fiuug a dɩtg tʋbre.
La a Zezi gomame n yeel yaa: Bas-y-yã a woto. La a Zezi tika rao wã tʋbr n maag-a.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi yeela maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne wẽnd-doog gũudbã nanamsã la kãsem-dãmbã sẽn dag n na n yõk bãmbã yaa: Yãmb waa mam nengẽ ne sʋʋse la ne rasab wa m yaa fãada.
Mam dag n bee wẽnd-doogẽ wã daar fãa ne yãmba, la y ka yõkd maam ye. La wakat kãngã yaa yãmb rẽnda la likã pãng wakate.
B yõka a Zezi n tall-b n kẽng maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem yiri. A Pɩyɛɛr dag n pʋgda yɩɩg-yɩɩga.
Nebã yõgna bugum zaka sʋka, n zĩndi. La a Pɩyɛɛr zĩnda ne bãmba.
Tʋmtʋmd-poak a yen sẽn yã a Pɩyɛɛr t'a zĩ bugmã vẽenemẽ, a ges-a-la kuii n yeele: Rao-kãnga me rag n bee ne a Zezi.
La a Pɩyɛɛr kɩɩsame n yeele: Paga, mam ka mi a Zezi ye.
Sẽn yɩ bilfu, ned a to yãa a Pɩyɛɛr n yeele: Fo me yaa bãmb ned a yembre. La a Pɩyɛɛr yeela rao wã yaa: Mam ka bãmb ned ye.
Sẽn zems lɛɛr a yembr rẽ zugẽ, ned a to leb n yeelame: Hakɩɩka! Rao-kãngã rag n bee ne bãmba. Bala, yẽ yaa Galile neda.
A Pɩyɛɛr leokame: Hey! Mam ka mi bũmb ninga fo sẽn gomd a yellã ye. Wakat kãng bala, yẽ sẽn ket n gomda, no-raoog kelmame.
Zu-soaba wẽnemdame n ges a Pɩyɛɛr. La a Pɩyɛɛr tẽega gomd ning bãmb sẽn dag n yeel yẽnda wã: Sẽn deng no-raoog sẽn na n kelem rũnna, fo na n kɩɩsa naoor a tãab tɩ f ka mi maam ye.
A Pɩyɛɛr yii yɩng n yãb ne sũ-sãoong wʋsgo.
Raop nins sẽn da gũud a Zezi wã yaala bãmba, n pãb-ba.
Bãmb da loeta a Zezi nengã ne peend n yet-b yaa: Bãng-bãnge, ãnna n wẽ yãmbã?
La bãmb tʋʋ a Zezi ne tʋɩy a taab wʋsgo.
La beoogã sẽn vẽege, tẽngã nin-kẽembã sull ne maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb la tõog karen-saam-dãmbã tigma taab n kɩt tɩ b tall a Zezi n wa bãmb kaoreng yɛl bʋ-bʋʋdbã taoore.
B yeela a Zezi yaa: Yãmb sã n yaa Kiristã, bɩ y yeel tõndo. A Zezi leok-b lame n yeele: Mam sã n yeel yãmba, y kõn tẽ maam ye.
La m sã n sok yãmb bũmbu, y kõn leok-m ye.
Sẽn sɩng moasã, Ninsaal Bi-riblã na n zĩnda pãng soab a Wẽnnaam rɩtgo.
Bãmb fãa sokame: Rẽnd yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam biig wɛ? La a Zezi leok-b lame: Yaa wa yãmb sẽn yeelã: "Mam yaa woto."
Dẽ, bãmb yeelame: Yaa bõe kaset la tõnd leb n baoodẽ? Tõnd mens wʋma bãmb noor goama.
Bãmb fãa yikame n tall a Zezi n kẽng a Pilat taoore.
B sɩngame n dõd a Zezi n yeel yaa: Tõnd yãa rao-kãnga t'a rãmbd tõnd tẽngã n yetẽ tɩ b ra yao a Sezaar yõor yaood ye. La a yetẽ tɩ yẽ menga yaa Kiristã, la rĩma.
A Pilat soka a Zezi a woto: Yãmb yaa Zuif-rãmba rĩma? T'a Zezi leok-a: Yaa wa yãmb sẽn yeelã.
A Pilat yeela maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmb ne neb kʋʋngã tɩ yẽ ka yã bõn-wẽng ne rao-kãngã sẽn na kɩt tɩ b sɩbg-a ye.
La nebã kẽnga taoor n kell n yeel yaa: Zãmsgã bãmb sẽn sɩng Galile n Zãms nebã Zude fãa hal tɩ ta ka wã wata ne rãmbg nebã sʋka.
A Pilat sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, yẽ sokame n dat n bãng rao wã sã n yaa Galile neda.
La a Pilat sẽn wʋm t'a Zezi yaa Herood soolma neda, a tʋma bãmb a nengẽ. A Herood me rag n bee Zeruzalɛm wakat kãnga.

Herood sẽn yãnd a Zezi, a paama sũ-no-kãsenga, bala, yẽ rag n wʋmame tɩ b gomd b yelle, la hal daar zãra, yẽ rag n dat n yãa a Zezi. La a rag n tẽedame t'a Zezi na n maana bõn-bãnd t'a yãnde.
Herood soka bãmb bũmb wʋsgo, la a Zezi ka leok yẽ tɩ bũmb ye.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne tõog karen-saam-dãmba yalsa be n dõd a Zezi b pãng tɛka.
Herood ne a sodaasã paooga a Zezi, n yaal-ba, n yeelg-b fu-neere la a lebs-b a Pilat nengẽ.
Badaar bala, a Pilat ne Herood sẽn dag n ya beemã lebga zoodo.
A Pilat tigma maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmba la nanamse ne nebã
n yeel-b yaa: Yãmb talla rao-kãnga n wa mam nengẽ n yeel t'a yaa tẽn-dãmbda. Ade, mam sok-a-la yãmb taoore la mam ka yã t'a maana tʋʋm-wẽns nins yãmb sẽn dõt-a wã ba a yembr ye.
Herood me ka yã bõn-wẽng ne-a ye, bala, bãmb lebs n tʋm-a-la tõnd nengẽ. Ade, rao-kãnga ka maan bũmb sẽn tog ne kũum ye.
Dẽ, mam na n kɩtame tɩ b sɩbg-a-la m bas-a.
Kibs fãa, rag n yaa tɩlɛ t'a Pilat yiis bi-bɛɛg a ye n bas n kõ nebã.
Bãmb fãa naaga taab n kelem n yeel tɩ b kʋ rao-kãnga la b yiis a Barabas n kõ-ba.
B ra kẽesa a Barabas bi-bees roogẽ tẽn-dãmbg sẽn dag n zĩnd tẽngã pʋgẽ wã poorẽ, la a sẽn kʋ ned yĩnga.
A Pilat leb n goma ne nebã, n dat n bas a Zezi.
La nebã ra kelemdame n yetẽ: Ka-y-b da-pɩk zugu! Ka-y bãmb da-pɩk zugu!
A Pilat leb n yeela bãmb naoor a tãab soab yaa: La bãmb maana bõe sẽn ya wẽnga? Mam ka yã bũmb b sẽn maane, n tog kʋʋb ye. Dẽ wã mam na n kɩtame tɩ b sɩbg-ba la m bas-ba.
La neba zẽka b koees wʋsg n kos tɩ b ka a Zezi da-pɩk zugu. La b kelemsã tõogame t'a Pilat tũ b sẽn datã.
A Pilat kaoo bʋʋdã tɩ yɩ wa nebã sẽn kosã.
Yẽ basa ned ninga nebã sẽn kosã, a soab b sẽn dag n kẽes bi-bees roog tẽn-dãmbgo, la nin-kʋʋr yĩngã. La a rɩk a Zezi n kɩs-b tɩ b maan b sẽn dat ne-ba.
La bãmb sẽn tall a Zezi n loogdẽ, bãmb yõka dao a yen sẽn yi weoogẽ n kuiisẽ. A yʋʋr la Sɩmo. B kɩtame t'a tʋk da-pɩkã n pʋg a Zezi.
Neb kʋʋng wʋsgo, raop la pagb dag n pʋgda a Zezi. La pagbã da yãbdame, n wiisdẽ, n pĩisd b gɛy a Zezi yĩnga.
A Zezi wẽnegame n yeel pagbã yaa: Zeruzalɛm pagba, da yãb-y mam yĩng ye. Yãb-y y mense, la y kamb yĩnga.
Bala, bãng-y tɩ ray n wate, tɩ b na n yeel tɩ pʋg-kiyã la sẽn ka tol n dog-bã, la sẽn ka yẽsem-b kambã n tar sũ-noogo.
La nebã na n sɩng n yeela tãmsa tɩ b sirg n põd-ba, la b yeel kũnkuba tɩ b lill bãmba.
Bala, b sã n maand ra-maas a woto, b na n maana ra-koeemsã wãn-wãna?
B rag tara nin-wẽns a yiib n kẽnd n na tɩ lagem ne a Zezi n kʋ.
La bãmb sẽn ta zĩig ninga b sẽn boond tɩ zu-wangã, b kaa a Zezi da-pɩkã zug be, ne nin-wẽns a yiibã: A yembr b rɩtgo a to wã b goabga.
A Zezi yeelame yaa: M ba, kõ-y-b sugri, tɩ b ka mi bũmb ninga b sẽn maandã ye. La bãmb maana bãnd n pʋɩ a Zezi futã ne taaba.
Nebã rag yasa be n getẽ. La tẽnga nanamsa ra yaanda a Zezi n yetẽ: B fãaga neb a taaba, bãmb sã n yaa Kiristã, Wẽnnaam sẽn yãk a soabã, bɩ b fãag b menga.
Sodaasã me kolgame n yaal a Zezi, la b kõ-b divẽ miisga,
n yeel a Zezi yaa: Yãmb sã n yaa Zuif-rãmbã rĩma, bɩ y fãag y meng y toore.
B ra gʋlsa a woto bãmb zugẽ: Nin-kãnga yaa Zuif-rãmbã rĩma.
Nin-wẽnsã sẽn dag n be da-pɩgsã zutã ned a yen tʋʋsa a Zezi n yeel-b tɩ ka bãmb la Kiristã laa? Tɩ b fãag b meng la b fãag bãmba.
La a to wã lenga yẽnda n yeel-a yaa: Fo ka zoet Wẽnnaam laa? Fo sɩbgrã sẽn ya yembr ne bãmb sɩbgrã?
Tõnd yẽ sɩbgrã zemsame. Bala, tõnd deegda sẽn zems d tʋʋma. La nin-kãngã ka maan bũmb sẽn ya wẽng ye.
La a yeela a Zezi yaa: Yãmb sã n wa n deeg y naamã, bɩ y tẽeg mam yelle.
A Zezi leok-a lame yaa: "Mam yeta foo sɩd-sɩd tɩ rũnna bala, fo na n zĩnda ne maam Paradi pʋga."
Rẽ tɩ ra zoe n kolga wĩnto-sʋka, la zĩiga fãa lebga lik bida hal tɩ ta wẽn-kaoore.
Wĩntoogã sobgame, la fu-lillidgã sẽn be wẽnd-doogẽ wã pãrga pʋɩ-sʋka.
La a Zezi zẽka b koɛɛg n yeel yaa: M ba, m basda m sɩɩgã yãmb nugẽ. La a Zezi sẽn gom a woto n sɛ, b kiime.
Sodaas koabg naabã sẽn yã bũmb ninga sẽn maana, a waooga Wẽnnaam n yeel tɩ: Hakɩɩka rao-kãnga ra yaa nin-tɩrga.
La neb kʋʋngã sẽn da wa n na ges bõn-kãngã sẽn yã bũmb nins sẽn maana, b lebgdame la b pĩisd b yãoodo.
Neb nins fãa sẽn dag n mi a Zezi wã, ne pagb nins sẽn yi Galile n yãag bãmbã dag n yasa yɩɩg n get bũmb nins sẽn maandã.
Kaorengã yɛl-bʋ-kaood a ye n da be t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Zozɛf n ya nin-sõngo la nin-tɩrga.
A rag n ka lagem ne bʋ-kaoodb a taabã n yãk yama la a maan b sẽn maan bũmb ningã ye. A rag n yaa Arimate sẽn ya Zuif-rãmba tẽng neda. La a ra gũuda Wẽnnaam soolmã waoongo.
A kẽnga a pilat nengẽ n tɩ kos a Zezi kũumã.
Yẽ sika kũumã, da-pɩkã zugu, n vil-a ne lẽ peend n tɩ gãneg yaoogẽ sẽn tu kugr zugu, kũum sẽn nan ka mumẽ ye.
Badaar dag n yaa seglg daare, la vʋʋsg daarã da rat n sɩngame.
La pagbã sẽn da yi Galile n yãag a Zezi wã tũu a Zozɛf n wa yã yaoogã la b sẽn gãneg a Zezi kũuma be to-to.
La b lebgame n tɩ to tɩdar zom la b maan tɩdar kaam. La bãmb vʋʋsa vʋʋsg daarã wa sẽn zems a Moyiis toogã. Yaoog sẽn tuk pĩigẽ (23.53)
Dimaas daar yibeoog pĩnda, pagbã talla ka-rambã b sẽn da seglã n kẽng yaoogẽ wã.
B mikame tɩ b bilga kugrã n bas yaoogã noore.
Bãmb kẽeme la b ka yã Zu-soab a Zezi kũumã ye
Bãmb sẽn da ka mi b sẽn tagsd tɩ bũmb ningã, ade, raop a yiib sẽn yer fut sẽn pɩnd puka b meng ne bãmba.
Rabeem yõka bãmb tɩ b yĩgimd n sulg b nens tẽnga. La raopã yeel-b lame yaa: Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb baood nin-vɩɩg kũum sʋka?
Bãmb ka be ka ye, b vʋʋgame. Tẽeg-y bũmb ning bãmb sẽn da gom ne yãmb b sẽn da ket n be Galile wã.
B yeelame tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ b zãmb Ninsaal Bi-riblã n yõk n kõ yel-wẽn maandbã tɩ b ka-b da-pɩk zugu, la tɩ rasem a tãab daare bãmb na n vʋʋgame.
La pagbã tẽega a Zezi goama.
La bãmb yii yaoogẽ wã n kẽng n tɩ togs karen-biis piig la a yembrã ne neb a taabã fãa bõn-kãens fãa.
Da yaa a Maari sẽn yit Magdala, ne a Zan la a Zak ma a Maari, n paas pagb a taab sẽn da be ne bãmbã n tɩ togs tʋmtʋmdbã bõn-kãnga.
La tʋmtʋmdbã tagsame tɩ pagbã sẽn da gomdã yaa zʋbsgo la b ka tẽ-b ye.
La a Pɩyɛɛr yikame n wudg n kẽng yaoogẽ wã. Yẽ sẽn zõonde, a ka yã bũmb tɩ sã n ka pɛɛlã sẽn dʋr tẽngã. La bũmb ninga sẽn maana yɛɛsa yẽ, la a lebg n leba a yiri.
La mikame tɩ badaare, karen-biis a yiib n da rabd tẽn-bil a yen sẽn boond tɩ Emayus, n zems kɩlometr piig la a yembr ne Zeruzalɛm.
Bãmb da gomda bũmb nins fãa sẽn maanã yell ne taaba.
La bãmb sẽn gomd n kɩɩsd taaba, a Zezi meng waame n kẽn ne bãmba.
La bãmb yam ludame tɩ b ka bãng a Zezi ye.
A Zezi soka bãmb tɩ yaa bõe yell la b gomd ne taab la b kẽnda. La b yalsame tɩ b nensã gãnem.
La bãmb ned a yen sẽn boond t'a Keleopaas soka a Zezi yaa: Yãmb y yen bal n be Zeruzalɛm n ka bãng bũmb ninga sẽn maan be rasmã noorã?

A Zezi soka bãmb tɩ yaa bõe yelle. La b leoka bãmb yaa: Yell ning sẽn paam Nazarɛt dao a Zezi wã. Sẽn da yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs sẽn tar pãng ne b tʋʋma la b goama, Wẽnnaam la nebã fãa taoorã.
Tɩ tõnd maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb ne tõnd nanamsã sẽn yɩ to-to n yõk bãmb n kɩs tɩ b kao b bʋʋd n yeel tɩ b zemsa kũuma, n ka-b da-pɩk zugã.
Tõnd da tẽedame tɩ yaa bãmb n na n fãag Israyɛl, la sẽn paas rẽ fãa, ad yaa rasem a tãab rũnna la bõn-kãens maan-yã.
Yaa sɩd tɩ pagb kẽer sẽn be tõnd sʋk yɛɛsa tõnd wʋsgo. B kẽnga yaoogẽ wã yibeoogẽ pĩnda,
n tɩ ka yã a Zezi kũuma ye. B waa n yeelame tɩ malegs n puk b mens ne bãmba, n yeel bãmb t'a Zezi vɩɩme.
La neb kẽer sẽn da be ne tõndã kẽnga yaoogẽ wã n tɩ mik tɩ bũmba fãa yaa wa pagbã sẽn dag togsã bala. La bãmb ka yãnd a Zezi ye.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Neb yam sẽn ka weke, yãmb ka tẽed bũmb nins fãa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn togsã tao-tao ye!
Dẽ yĩnga, Kirist dag n ka tog n nams a woto n yaool n deeg b naamã sɩda?
A Zezi bilga bãmb bũmb nins sẽn be gʋls-sõamyã fãa pʋgẽ n gomd bãmb yellã, sẽn sɩng ne a Moyiis tɩ ta Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã fãa.
La b sẽn kolg tẽn-bil ninga bãmb sẽn da rabdã, a Zezi maana wa bãmb dat n taa taoore.
La karen-biis a yiibã pẽdga bãmb n yeel tɩ b pa ne bãmba, bala, yʋng kolgame la wĩndgã dat n kẽeme. A Zezi kẽe n siga ne bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn zĩ ne bãmb n na n dɩ, b rɩka burã n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam bark n kao-a n kõ bãmba.
Dẽ, karen-biisã yama vẽnegame tɩ b bãng tɩ yaa a Zezi, la a Zezi menema bãmb taoor bala.
La bãmb goma ne taab n yeel yaa: Bãmb sẽn da gomd ne tõnd sorã zug la b bilgid tõnd gʋls-sõamyã, tõnd ka paam sũ-no-kãseng sɩda?
La bãmb yika wakat kãng bal n leb Zeruzalɛm n tɩ yã karen-biis piig la a yembrã ne b tũud-n-taas sẽn tigim taaba,
la b yeela bãmb tɩ hakɩɩka! Zu-soaba vʋʋgame la b vẽnega b meng ne a Sɩmo.
Bãmb me togsa bũmb ning sẽn maan bãmb sorã zugã, la bãmb sẽn bãng a Zezi to-to b sẽn wa n kaood burã.
Bãmb sẽn da ket n gomd a woto, a Zezi meng puka bãmb sʋk n yeel-b yaa: Bɩ laafɩ zĩnd ne yãmba.
Dabeem yõka bãmb la b yɛɛsame n tẽed tɩ b yãa kɩɩma.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb yɛɛsdẽ, la yaa bõe tɩ y sãmbd y sũyã pʋsẽ a woto?
Ges-y mam nusã la m nao wã. Yaa maam bala, Sɩɩs-y maam n gese. Kɩɩm ka tar nemd wall kõab wa mam sẽn tarã ye.
A Zezi sẽn gom a woto, b wilga karen-biisã b nusã la b nao wã.
Karen-biisã sẽn ket n ka tẽeda, b sũ-nooga yĩnga, la sẽn ya lingr ne bãmbã, a Zezi sok-b lame b sã n tara rɩɩb be sẽn na rɩ.
Bãmb kõo a Zezi zĩm-sẽedgo ne sɩɩd bilfu.
A Zezi reeg-a lame n dɩ bãmb nifẽ.

Dẽ poore, a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Bũmb ninga mam sẽn da togs yãmb mam sẽn dag n ket n be ne yãmba la woto: Ra yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bũmb nins fãa sẽn gʋls a Moyiis tõoga pʋgẽ la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sɛb pʋsã la yɩɩn-sõamyã pʋgẽ n gomd mam yellã paam pidsgu.
Dẽ, a Zezi vẽnega b yamã tɩ b tõog wʋm Wẽnnaam gʋls sõamyã võore.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Woto b gʋlsame n yeel tɩ Kiristã tog n namsame la tɩ b na n vʋʋg n basa kũum rasem a tãab daare.
La tɩ sẽn sɩng ne Zeruzalɛm, b na n moona yam tekr koɛɛg buuda fãa sʋk ne bãmb yʋʋr tɩ b tõe n paam yel-wẽna sʋgri.
Yãmb yaa bõn-kãng kaset-dãmba.
La ade, mam na n tʋma yãmb bũmb ninga m ba sẽn dag n kãabã, t'a wa yãmb zutu. Pa-y Zeruzalɛm hal tɩ y deeg pãng sẽn yit yĩngri.
La a Zezi peega bãmb n kẽng Betani sẽne, la b zẽka b nus n ning karen-biisã zut barka.
La barkã ningr wakate, a Zezi basa karen-biisã n zẽk n kẽng arzãna.
La karen-biisã waooga a Zezi, la b leb Zeruzalɛm ne sũ-no-kãsenga.
La bãmb bee wẽnd-doogã pʋg wakat fãa n pẽgd Wẽnnaam.
Hal sɩngr wẽndẽ, gomdã dag n beeme, la gomdã dag n bee ne Wẽnnaam, la gomdã yaa Wẽnnaam.
Bãmb dag n bee ne Wẽnnaam hal sɩngr wẽndẽ.
B naana bũmb fãa ne bãmba, la bũmb ka be sẽn naane, tɩ ka yɩ ne bãmb ye.
Vɩɩm dag n bee bãmb pʋgẽ, la vɩɩmã dag n yaa vẽenem ninsaalbã yĩnga.
Vẽenemã yãga lik pʋgẽ, la likã ka reeg-a ye.
Dao a yembr la Wẽnnaam tʋm t'a wa. A yʋʋr la a Zã.
Dao kãng waame n ya kaset kɩta, n na n kɩs vẽenemã kaseto, tɩ neba fãa tõe n tẽ yẽ yĩnga.
Dag n ka yẽ la vẽenemã ye, la a waame n na n kɩs vẽenemã kaseto.
Vẽen-kãng yaa sɩd vẽenem, n wa dũni pʋgẽ n vẽnegd ned fãa.
Gomdã dag n bee dũni pʋgẽ. B naana dũni wã ne bãmba, la dũni ka bãng bãmb ye.
Bãmb waa b meng nebẽ, la b nebã ka reeg bãmb ye.
La b kõo neb nins fãa sẽn deeg bãmba, la neb nins sẽn tẽed bãmb yʋʋrã noor tɩ b lebg Wẽnnaam kamba.
Ka kamb b sẽn dog ne zɩɩm, wall ne yĩng ratem, wall ne ninsaal datem ye, yaa Wẽnnaam sẽn doge.
B kɩtame tɩ gomdã rɩk yĩng n zĩnd tõnd sʋka. Tõnd gesa bãmb ziiri, Bi-ribl sẽn ka to ziir a sẽn deeg a ba wã nengẽ, la b pida ne bark la sɩda.
A Zã kɩsa bãmb kaset n yeele: Yaa soab ning mam sẽn gom a yell n yeel tɩ ned ning sẽn pʋgend maam n watẽ wã yɩɩda maam, bala, b renga maam n beẽ wã.
La tõnd fãa paama bãmb yalẽ wã, n deegd bãmb barkã n paasd wakat fãa.
Bala, b tũnuga a Moyiis n kõ tõogã, la barkã ne sɩdã tũnuga a Zezi Kirist n wa.
Ned baa a yen nan ka yã Wẽnnaam ye. Wẽnnaam sẽn ya Bi-ribl yend sẽn ka to, n be ba a Wẽnnaam nengẽ kɩtame tɩ nebã bãng bãmba.
Ad kaset ning a Zã sẽn kɩs wakat ning Zuif-rãmbã sẽn tʋm maan-kʋʋdb ne Levit-rãmb tɩ b yi Zeruzalɛm n wa n sok yẽnda a sẽn yaa a soabã.
Yẽ vẽnegame n togs n ka kɩɩs ye. A vẽnegame n togs tɩ yẽ ka Kiristã ye.
B leb n sok-a lame tɩ rẽ wã, yẽ yaa ãnna? Yẽ yaa a Eli? T'a leok tɩ yẽ ka a Eli ye. La b sok-a lame tɩ la yaa yẽ la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã? T'a leok tɩ ayo.
La b leb n yeelame yaa: Foo la ãnna, tɩ tõnd tõe n tɩ leok neb nins sẽn tʋm-b tõndã? Fo mengã yetame tɩ fo yaa ãnna?
A Zã yeelame yaa: "Mam yaa soab ning sẽn kelemd we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ n yetẽ tɩ b rems Zu-soabã sor tɩ yɩ tɩrgã koɛɛga," wa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sẽn yeelã.
B sẽn dag n tʋm b rãmbã yaa Fariisẽ-dãmba.
B sok-a lame yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ fo lisd neba, fo sã n ka Kirist bɩ a Eli bɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã?
A Zã leokame n yeele: Maam, mam lisda yãmb koomẽ. La yãmb sʋkã, ned a yen n be be yãmb sẽn ka mi ye.
Soab kãng pʋgenda maam, la mam ka zems tɩ lood bãmb neooda loets ye.
Gom-kãens goma Betani, Zʋrdẽ rʋʋnde, zĩig ning a Zã sẽn dag n lisd nebã.
Vẽkembeoogo, a Zã yãa a Zezi sẽn wat yẽ nengẽ, n yeele: Ad Wẽnnaam pe-bilã, sẽn yiisd-a dũni yel-wẽnã.
Yaa bãmb yell la mam dag n gom ne yãmb n yeel tɩ dao n pʋgend maam, la b yɩɩda maam, bala, b renga maam n beẽ wã.
La mam dag n ka mi bãmb ye, la mam waa n lisda nebã koomẽ tɩ bãmb tõe n vẽneg b meng ne Israyɛll nebã.
A Zã leb n kɩsa kaset n yeele: Mam yãa Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn yi arzãn n sig wa wall n pa bãmb zugu.

La mam dag n ka mi bãmb ye. La sẽn tʋm-a maam tɩ m wa n lis nebã koomẽ wã yeela maam tɩ mam sẽn na n yã ned ning tɩ Sɩɩg-sõng sig n pa a soab zugã, bɩ m bãng tɩ yaa yẽnda n lisd nebã Sɩɩg-sõng pʋgẽ wã.
Maam, mam yãame, la mam kɩsa kaset tɩ yaa bãmb la Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã.
Vẽkembeoogo, a Zã ra leb n bee be ne a karen-biis a yiibu.
A dag n geta a Zezi sẽn loogd n yeele: Ad Wẽnnaam pe-bilã.
Karen-biis a yiibã wʋma gom-kãense, la b pʋgla a Zezi.
A Zezi wẽnegame n mik tɩ b pʋgda bãmba, la b sok-b lame tɩ b baooda bõe? B leoka a Zezi n yeele: Rabbi, sẽn dat n yeel tɩ karen-saamba, yãmb yir yaa yɛ?
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Wa-y tɩ y na yã. B kẽngame n tɩ yã zĩig ning a Zezi sẽn be wã, la b paa ne bãmb da-kãnga. Dag n yaa zaabr wakat a naas sẽne.
Neb a yiibã sẽn wʋm a Zã goam n pʋgl a Zezi wã, a yembr bãmb sʋk la a Ãndre, a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr ba-biiga.
A Ãndre reng n yãnda a meng ba-biig a Sɩmo n yeel-a: Tõnd yãa Mesi, sẽn dat n togs tɩ "Kiristã."
A talla a Sɩmo n wa a Zezi nengẽ. A Zezi ges-a lame n yeele: Foo la a Sɩmo, a Zonaas bi-ribla. B na n boonda foom t'a Sefas, sẽn dat n yeel tɩ Pɩyɛɛr (wall kugri).
Vẽkembeoogo, a Zezi yãka yam n na n kẽng Galile. Bãmb yãnda a Filip n yeel-a t'a tũ bãmba.
A Filip dag n yaa Betsayida sẽn yaa a Ãndre ne a Pɩyɛɛr tẽngã neda.
A Filip yãnda a Natanayɛl n yeel-a yaa: Dao ning a Moyiis tõogã ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn gom a yellã, tõnd yãa-a lame. Yaa Nazarɛt dao a Zezi, a Zozɛf bi-riblã.
A Natanayɛl soka yẽ yaa: Dẽ yĩnga, bõn-sõng tõe n yii Nazarɛt sɩda?
A Filip yeel-a lame t'a wa n gese. A Zezi yãa a Natanayɛl sẽn wat bãmb nengẽ, n gom a yell n yeele: Ad Israyɛll ned sɩda, zãmb sẽn ka be a pʋgẽ ye.
A Natanayɛl soka bãmb yaa: Yãmb bãnga maam yɛɛne? A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Sẽn deng a Filip sẽn na n bool foomã, fo sẽn dag n be kankangã tẽngrã, mam yãa foom.
Dẽ, a Natanayɛl yeelame yaa: Karen-saamba, yãmb la Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã! Yãmb la Israyɛll Rĩmã!
A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Mam sẽn yeel tɩ mam yãa foom kankangã tẽngrã yĩnga, fo tẽedame. La fo na n yãa bõn-kãsems sẽn yɩɩd a woto.
Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb na n yãa arzãn sẽn pake, la Wẽnnaam malegs sẽn dʋʋd la b sigd ninsaal Bi-riblã zugẽ.
Dasem a tãab rẽnda zugẽ, yi-kãadem n zĩnd Galile Kana. A Zezi ma ra bee be.
B boola a Zezi me ne b karen-biisã tɩ b wa yi-kãadmã.
La divẽ sẽn paooge, a Zezi ma yeela a Zezi tɩ nebã ka leb n tar divẽ ye.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Paga, bõe n be maam ne fo sʋka? Mam wakatã nan ka ta ye.
Bãmb ma wã yeela tʋmtʋmdbã tɩ b maan bũmb ning fãa a Zezi sẽn na n yeel-b tɩ b maane.
Sĩms a yoob sẽn pees ne kug n dag n be be, tɩ b ningd koom tɩ Zuif-rãmbã tar n waasd b mens wa sẽn zems bãmb miningu, la a yen fãa tõe deega ko-yʋy a naas bɩ a nu koom.
A Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ b pids sĩmsã ne koom, la b pids-b la pal-pale.
T'a Zezi yeel-b tɩ b toog moasã n tɩ kõ ned ning sẽn get-a rɩɩbã pʋɩɩb yellã. La b tallame n tɩ kɩs-a.
Sẽn get-a rɩɩbã pʋɩɩb yellã fʋrga koomã sẽn tedg n lebg divẽ wã. Yẽ dag n ka mi divẽ kãng sẽn yitẽ ye, la tʋmtʋmdb nins sẽn wi-b koomã rag n miime.

A boola pʋg-paalã sɩd n yeel-a: Ned fãa rengd n kõo nebã divẽ sõngã, tɩ nebã nens sã n wa n yuusdẽ, bɩ a yaool n kõ-b divẽ ning sẽn ka-a sõama zãngã. La foom, fo bĩnga divẽ sõngã hal tɩ ta moasã.
Bõn-bãnã a Zezi sẽn maanã sɩnga a woto Galile Kana. Bãmb wilga b ziiri, la bãmb karen-biisã tẽe bãmba.
Rẽ poore, bãmb kẽnga Kapɛrnawom ne b ma la b ma-bi-raopa, la b karen-biisã, tɩ b tɩ zĩnd be rasem bilf bala.
Zuif-rãmbã zʋʋg-n-basã kibs dag n kolgame, la a Zezi kẽnga Zeruzalɛm.
Bãmb tɩ yãame tɩ nag-koaasdba, la pe-koaasdba, la man-wall koaasdba, la ligd tɛkdb tara zĩis wẽnd-doogã zakẽ n koosd b koosem.
A Zezi dɩka wĩ n maan sãbsga, n dig bãmb fãa tɩ b yi wẽnd-doogã zakẽ, la b riga piisã ne niisã, la b sãeeg ligd tɛkdbã ligdi, la b leeb taabl-dãmbã,
la b yeel mol-wan koaasdbã yaa: Yiis-y yõwã kaane. Da maan-y mam ba wã roog tɩ yɩ leebg zĩig ye.
Bãmb karen-biisã tẽegame t'a gʋlsame tɩ: Yãmb roogã nonglem na n sooga maam zãnga.
Zuif-rãmbã goma ne a Zezi n yeele: Bõe bãnd la yãmb na n wilg tõndo, n wilg tɩ yãmb tara noor tɩ maan bõn-kãnga?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Sãam-y wẽnd-do-kãngã, la rasem a tãab pʋgẽ, mam na lebs-a n me.
Dẽ, Zuif-rãmbã yeela bãmb yaa: Yɩɩ tɩlɛ tɩ b tʋm yʋʋm pis-naas la a yoob n yaool n me wẽnd-do-kãngã n sa, tɩ fo na n wa n lebs-a n me rasem a tãab pʋgẽ?
La a Zezi dag n gomda b yĩngã sẽn ya wẽnd-doogã yelle.
Bãmb sẽn wa n vʋʋg n bas kũumã, b karen-biisã tẽegame t'a Zezi dag n yeela a woto, la b tẽe Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã ne gomd ning a Zezi sẽn dag n gomã.
Bãmb sẽn dag n be Zeruzalɛm zʋʋg-n-basã kibsã wakatã, neb wʋsg tẽe bãmb yʋʋrã, b sẽn yã bãnã bãmb sẽn dag n maandã yĩnga,
la a Zezi yẽ ka bas yard ne-b ye, bala, bãmb dag n mi-b-la fãa,
la tɩ bãmb ka baood tɩ ned kɩs a to kaset ye, bala, bãmb mengã mii bũmb ning sẽn be ninsaal pʋgẽ.
Rao a yen n dag n be Fariisẽ-dãmba sʋka, n ya Zuif-rãmbã naaba, t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Nikodɛm.

Yẽ waa a Zezi nengẽ ne yʋng n yeel-b yaa: Karen-saamba, tõnd miime tɩ yãmb yaa karen-saamb Wẽnnaam sẽn tʋme. Bala, ned ka tõe n maan bõn-bãn nins yãmb sẽn maandã, tɩ sã n ka Wẽnnaam n be ne-a ye.
A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Mam yeta foom sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned sã n ka paam tɩ b leb n dog-a, a ka tõe n yã Wẽnnaam soolmã ye.
A Nikodɛm yeela bãmba: Ned sẽn kʋʋl na n yɩɩ a wãn n leb n doge? A tõe n leb n kẽe a ma pʋgẽ yɛs n dog sɩda?
A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Mam yeta foom sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned sã n ka rog ne koom la ne Sɩɩg-sõngo, a ka tõe n kẽ Wẽnnaam soolmẽ wã ye.
Bũmb ning yĩng sẽn dog yaa yĩnga, la bũmb ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn dog yaa sɩɩga.
Da sak tɩ mam sẽn yeel tɩ fo tog n leb n dogame wã yɛɛs foom ye.
Sobg fugd n teesd a sẽn datẽ. Fo wʋmda a rãamdã, la fo ka mi a sẽn yitẽ, la a sẽn dabdẽ me ye. Yaa woto me ne ned ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn doge.
A Nikodɛm leb n gomame n yeele: Bõn-kãng tõe n yɩɩ a wãn n yɩ?
Fo yaa Israyɛll karen-saam-kãsenga, la fo ka mi rẽnda?
Mam yeta foom sɩd-sɩda, tɩ tõnd yeta d sẽn mi, la tõnd kɩta bũmb nins d sẽn yã kaseto, la yãmb ka tẽ tõnd kasetã ye.
Mam sã n gom ne yãmb dũni bũmb yɛl tɩ yãmb ka tẽeda, yãmb na n yɩɩ a wãn n tẽ, mam sã n gom ne yãmb saasẽ yɛl yelle?
Ned baa a yen ka dʋ saasẽ ye, sã n ka sẽn yi-a arzãn n wa wã: yaa Ninsaal Bi-riblã.
A wa a Moyiis sẽn zẽk waafã ne ra-yak we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ wã, na n yɩɩ tɩlɛ tɩ b zẽk Ninsaal Bi-riblã me,
tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn na tẽ bãmb na paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Bala, Wẽnnaam nonga dũni wã hal wʋsgo, n kõ b Bi-ribl yen tãa wã, tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn na tẽ n bãmb kõn sãam ye, la a na paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Sɩd me, Wẽnnaam ka tʋm b Bi-riblã dũni ka tɩ b kao nebã bʋʋd n sɩbg-b ye, la yaa tɩ nebã na paam fãagr bãmb maasem yĩnga.
B ka na n kao ned ning sẽn tẽedã bʋʋd n sɩbg-a ye. La ned ning sẽn ka tẽedã, a sɩbgr zoe n beeme, a sẽn ka tẽ Wẽnnaam Bi-ribl yen tãa wã yʋʋrã yĩnga.
Bũmb ning sẽn wat ne sɩbgrã la a woto: vẽenem waa dũni pʋgẽ, la ninsaalbã nonga likã n yɩɩd vẽenemã, b tʋʋmã sẽn ya wẽnsã yĩnga.
Bala, ned ning fãa sẽn maand wẽng kisa vẽenem, n ka wat vẽenemẽ wã ye, tɩ vẽenemã na n wa n wilg t'a tʋʋmã ka sõama ye.
La ned ning sẽn maand sɩd wata vẽenemẽ, tɩ nebã tõe n bãng t'a tʋʋmã tʋmda Wẽnnaam sakr pʋgẽ.
Rẽ poore, a Zezi kẽnga Zude soolmẽ ne b karen-biisã, n pa be rasem bilf ne bãmba, la b lisd neba.
A Zã me dag n bee Eno, zĩig sẽn pẽ ne Salim n lisd neba, bala, koom dag n bee be wʋsgo. Nebã dag n kẽnda be t'a lisd-ba.
Bala, b dag nan ka sui a Zã bi-bees doogẽ ye.
La a Zã karen-biis kẽer wẽe nokoeemd ne Zuif a yembr yɩlg-m-mengã poorẽ.
B kẽnga a Zã nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a: Karen-saamba, ned ning sẽn dag n be ne yãmb Zʋrdẽ rʋʋndã, tɩ yãmb kɩs a kasetã, ad a lisda neba, la nebã fãa dabda a nengẽ.
A Zã leokame n yeele: Ninsaal ka tõe n deeg bũmb baa fʋɩ, tɩ sã n ka sẽn yi arzãn n kõ-a ye.
Yãmb mens yaa kaset dãmb tɩ mam yeelame tɩ mam ka Kiristã ye, la tɩ yaa bãmb n tʋm maam tɩ m deng b taoore.
Yaa pag sɩd n so-a. La pʋg-sɩdã zoa bee ne-a n kelgd-a, la a sã n wʋm pʋg-sɩdã koɛɛga, a sũur yaa noogo. Sũ-no-kãng la mam dẽndã, la a pida moasã.
Bãmb tʋʋmd nebã sʋk tog n tara paoosg tɩ mam dẽndã tar boogre.
Sẽn yi-a yĩngr n wa wã yɩɩda nebã fãa. Sẽn yaa-a tẽng zug ka ned yaa tẽng bũmbu, la a gomda tẽng bũmb yɛla. Sẽn yi-a arzãnã yɩɩda nebã fãa.
Bãmb togsda bũmb nins b sẽn yã la b wʋme, la ned baa a yen tãa ka tẽed bãmb kasetã ye.
Ned sã n deeg bãmb kasetã, a soabã wilgdame tɩ Wẽnnaam yeta sɩda.
Soab ning Wẽnnaam sẽn tʋmã togsda Wẽnnaam goama, bala, Wẽnnaam kõta a soab bãmb Sɩɩgã tɩ seke.
Ba wã nonga Bi-riblã, n dɩk bũmba fãa n ning a nugẽ.
Ned ning sẽn tẽed-a Bi-riblã tara vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa. La ned ning sẽn kɩɩsd-a Bi-riblã kõn paam vɩ-kãng ye, la Wẽnnaam sũ-puugrã na n ta-a lame.
Zu-soabã bãngame tɩ Fariisẽ-dãmbã wʋmame tɩ bãmb paama karen-biis n yɩɩd a Zã, la b lisd-ba.
Baoosgo, a Zezi dag n ka lisd nebã b toor ye, dag n yaa b karen-biisã.
Dẽ, bãmb yii Zude n na n kẽng Galile.
Yaool n dag n yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bãmb pɩʋʋg Samari soolem.
Dẽ, bãmb taa Samari tẽng a yembr sẽn boond tɩ Sɩkaar, pʋʋg ning a Zakob sẽn dag n kõ a bi-ribl a Zozɛfã sɛɛgẽ.
A Zakob bulgã dag n bee be. Kẽndã yaams yĩnga, a Zezi zĩnda bulgã noore. Dẽ tɩ yaa wĩnto-sʋk sẽne.
Samari pag a yen n wa n na n yãk koom. A Zezi kos-a lame t'a kõ-b koom tɩ b yũ.
Bala, bãmb karen-biisã dag n kẽnga tẽngã pʋgẽ n na n tɩ ra rɩɩbo.
Samari pagã yeela bãmb yaa: Yɩta a wãn tɩ yãmb sẽn ya Zuifã kot maam, koom n na n yũ? Tɩ mam yaool n ya Samari paga. (Sɩd me, Zuif-rãmbã dag n ka tar lagem-n-taar ne Samari rãmbã ye.)

A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Fo sã n dag n miẽ bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn kõtã, la f mi ned ning sẽn kot-a foom koomã n na n yũ wã, yaa foom n dag n na n kos-a, la a dag n na n kõo foom ko-bundga.
La pagã yeela bãmb yaa: M kẽem sõngo, yãmb ka tar baa fɩ n na n toog koomã bulgẽ wã ye, tɩ bulgã yaool n zulmẽ. Dẽ, yãmb na n yãa ko-bund-kãng yɛɛne?
Yãmb yɩɩda tõnd yaab a Zakob, sẽn kõ-a tõnd bulgã laa? Bãmb meng yũu a koom, tɩ b kom-dibli ne b rũm-bãgã me yũ.
A Zezi leok-a lame n yeele: Ko-yũud na n leb n yõka ned ning fãa sẽn yũud ko-kãngã.

La ko-yũud kõn leb n yõk ned ning fãa sẽn na n yũ koom ning mam sẽn na n kõ-a wã ye, la koom ning mam sẽn na n kõ-a wã na n lebga ko-bundg sẽn na n buli, hal tɩ ta vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã pʋgẽ.
Pagã yeela bãmba: M kẽem sõngo, kõ-y maam ko-kãnga, tɩ ko-yũud da leb n yõk maam, tɩ m leb n wat ka n yãkd koomã ye.
A Zezi yeel-a lame t'a kẽng n tɩ bool a sɩdã, la a lebg n wa be.
La pagã leokame t'a ka tar sɩd ye. A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Fo maana neere, fo sẽn yeel tɩ f ka tar sɩdã.
Bala, fo talla sɩdb a nu, la fo sẽn tar a soab moasã wã ka fo sɩd ye. Fo togsa sɩd yellã pʋgẽ.
Pagã yeela bãmb yaa: M kẽem sõngo, mam neeme tɩ yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
Tõnd ba-rãmbã dag n pʋʋsda tãn-kãngã zugu. La yãmb zuif-rãmbã yetame tɩ zĩig ning b sẽn tog n pʋʋsã yaa Zeruzalɛm.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Paga, tẽ mam goamã! Wakat n wat tɩ ka tãn-kãngã zug wall Zeruzalɛm la yãmb na n pʋʋs y ba wã ye.
Yãmb pʋʋsda y sẽn ka mi. Tõnd pʋʋsda d sẽn mi, bala, Wẽnnaam tũnuga Zuif-rãmbã n na n fãag nebã.
La wakat watame - la yaa moasã - tɩ tõnd ba wã waoogdb sɩd-sɩdã na n waoog bãmb ne b sɩɩse la ne sɩda. Bala, yaa waoogdb a woto buud la tõnd ba wã baooda.
Wẽnnaam yaa Sɩɩga, la yaa tɩlɛ tɩ neb nins sẽn pʋʋsd bãmbã na pʋʋs ne b sɩɩse, la ne sɩda.
Pagã yeela bãmb yaa: Mam miime tɩ Mesi wã, soab ning b sẽn boond tɩ Kiristã na n waame. B sã n wa, b na n wilga tõnd bũmba fãa.
A Zezi yeela yẽnda: Maam, soab ning sẽn gomd ne fooma, yaa maam la bãmba.
Karen-biisã taa wakat kãnga, la a yɛɛsa bãmb tɩ yã a Zezi sẽn gomd ne paga, la bãmb ned baa a yen ka sok bãmb b sẽn kot pagã bũmb ninga, wall b sẽn gomd ne-a bũmb ning yell ye.
Dẽ, pagã basa a yʋʋrã be, n kẽng tẽngã pʋgẽ n tɩ yeel nebã yaa:
Wa-y n ges-y rao sẽn togs maam bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn maanã! Dẽ yĩnga, ka na n yɩ Kiristã?
Nebã yii tẽngã n kẽng a Zezi nengẽ.
Wakat kãnga, a Zezi karen-biisã dag n bõosda bãmb n yetẽ tɩ: Karen-saamba, dɩ-y-yã.
La a Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: Mam tara rɩɩb yãmb sẽn ka mi, n dɩtẽ.
Dẽ, karen-biisã goma ne taab n yeel tɩ daar ninga ned n tall rɩɩb n wa n kõ-ba.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Mam rɩɩba, yaa tɩ maan sẽn tʋm-a maamã raabo, la m baas tʋʋmd ning b sẽn kõ maam tɩ m maanã.
Yãmb ka mi n yetẽ tɩ keta kiis a naas tɩ tigsg wakat ta wɛ? Ad-y, mam yeta yãmb tɩ y zẽk y nens n ges pʋtã sẽn pelg n dat tigsgã.
Sẽn tigsd-a wã zoe n deegda a tʋʋm yaoodo, la a tigsda koodã wakat sẽn kõn sa yĩnga. Woto, sẽn bʋt-a wã ne sẽn tigsd-a wã naagda taab n kɩdme.
Yel-bũnd ning sẽn yet tɩ ned a yen n bʋt tɩ ned a to tigsã, yaa sɩda.
Mam tʋma yãmb tɩ y tʋg n tigs pʋʋg yãmb sẽn ka tʋmẽ ye. Neb a taab n tʋme, tɩ yãmb wa n kẽ n dɩt a yõodo.
Samari tẽn-kãng neb wʋsg tẽe a Zezi, pagã kaset yĩnga, a sẽn yeel t'a Zezi togsa yẽnda bũmb nins fãa yẽ sẽn maanã yĩnga.
La Samari nebã sẽn yã a Zezi, b kos-b lame tɩ b pa ne bãmba. La a Zezi paa be rasem a yiibu.
Neb nins sẽn tẽ a Zezi b goamã yĩngã sõor n yɩɩda, la b yeela pagã yaa:
Ka leb n ya fo goamã yĩng la tõnd sẽn tẽed a Zezi wã ye. Bala, tõnd mensã wʋma b goamã, la tõnd miime tɩ sɩd yaa bãmb la dũni fãagdã.
Dasem a yiib kãens zugẽ, a Zezi yii be n na n kẽng Galile,
bala, bãmb mengã dag n kɩsa kaset tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs ka paamd waoogr a meng ba-yirẽ ye.
Bãmb sẽn ta Galile, Galile nebã reega bãmba, b sẽn dag n yã bũmb nins fãa bãmb sẽn maan Zeruzalɛm, kibsã wakatã yĩngã. Bala, bãmb me dag n kẽnga kibsã.
Dẽ, a Zezi leba Galile Kana, tẽng ning bãmb sẽn dag n tek koom tɩ lebg divẽ wã. Rĩma tʋmtʋmd kãseng a yembr n dag n be Kapɛrnawom, t'a bi-ribl ka keem ye.
A wʋmame t'a Zezi yii Zude n wa Galile, la a kẽnga bãmb nengẽ n tɩ bõos-b tɩ b wa n maag a biigã sẽn dag n kolg kũum.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Dẽ, yãmb sã n ka yãt bõn-bãn la bõn-yɛɛsdse, yãmb ka na n tẽ ye.
Rĩmã tʋmtʋmd kãsengã yeela a Zezi tɩ b wa tao-tao t'a bi-bilfã da wa ki ye.
A Zezi yeel-a lame t'a kẽng t'a biigã sãoogame. Daowã tẽe gomd ning a Zezi sẽn yeelã, la a loogame.
A sẽn be sorẽ n kuiisẽ, a tʋmtʋmdbã seg-a lame n yeel-a t'a biigã sãoogame.
Tʋmtʋmd-kãsengã soka bãmb n na n bãng wakat ning biigã sẽn sɩng n sãoogã. La b yeel-a lame tɩ yaa zaame wĩnto-sʋk sẽn loog lɛɛr a yembr la a yĩn-wɩngrã sig-yã.
Biigã baaba bãngame tɩ yaa wakat kãng bal la a Zezi yeel yẽnda t'a bi-riblã sãoogame wã. La yẽ ne a yirã rãmb fãa tẽe a Zezi.
A Zezi leb n maana bõn-bãn kãnga, a yiib soaba, b sẽn yi Zude n wa Galile wã poorẽ.
Dẽ poore, Zuif-rãmbã kibs n zĩndi, la a Zezi kẽnga Zeruzalɛm.
Mik bãk n dag n be Zeruzalɛm, piisã dignoor sɛɛgẽ, tɩ b boond ne hebre goam tɩ Betɛsda, la zãn a nu n dag n be be.
Bãad-dãmb wʋsg n dag n gãe zãnã tẽngre: zoense, wobse, ki-boaga. B dag n bee be n gũud koomã rãmbgo.
Bala, malɛk n sigd bãkã pʋgẽ wakat wakat n dãmbd koomã. La koomã sã n dãmb n sa, ned ning sẽn yɩ-a pipi n lʋɩ koomẽ wã paamda maagre, baa bãagã sẽn ya bũmb ninga.
Dao a yen n dag n be be n ka keemẽ, la a bãagã taa yʋʋm pis-tã la a nii.
A Zezi yãa a sẽn gãe, la b sẽn mi t'a bee be hal daar zãrã, b sok-a lame yaa: Fo rat n paama laafɩ?
Bãadã leoka bãmb yaa: M kẽem sõngo, mam ka tar ned sẽn na n lob maam bãkẽ wã koomã lengr wakat ye. La mam sã n dabd be, ned n dengd maam n lʋɩ be.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Yik n dɩk f gãagã n kẽne.
Wakat kãng bala, daowã paama laafɩ. A rɩka a gãag n sɩng kẽna.
Badaar dag n yaa Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daare. Dẽ, Zuif-rãmbã yeela rao ning sẽn paam-a maagrã tɩ daarã dag n yaa vʋʋsg daare, tɩ la a ka tar noor tɩ tʋk a gãagã ye.
La a leoka bãmb tɩ ned ning sẽn kõ-a yẽ laafɩ wã yeela yẽnda t'a rɩk a gãagã n kẽne.
Zuif-rãmbã soka daowã tɩ yaa ãnna soab n yeel yẽ t'a rɩk n kẽna?
La rao ning sẽn paam-a maagrã dag n ka mi sẽn ya ned ning ye, bala, a Zezi dag n kẽe nebã sẽn dag n be be wã sʋk n meneme.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi yãa rao wã wẽnd-doogẽ wã n yeel-a: Gese, fo paama laafɩ. Da leb n maan yel-wẽn ye, tɩ yell sẽn yɩɩd a woto da wa n paam foom ye.
Rao wã kẽngame n tɩ yeel Zuif-rãmbã tɩ yaa a Zezi la sẽn maag yẽ wã.
Rẽnda n kɩt tɩ Zuif-rãmbã dag n namsd a Zezi, b sẽn maand bõn-kãng vʋʋsg daarã yĩngã.
La a Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: M baaba tʋmda hal tɩ ta moasã. Mam me tʋmdame.

Gom-kãng yĩnga, Zuif-rãmbã baooda a Zezi n yɩɩd pĩnd n dat n kʋ. Ka b sẽn kɩɩs bãmb vʋʋsg daar tõogã yĩng bal ye, la yaa b sẽn boond Wẽnnaam tɩ b meng ba, n wilgd tɩ bãmb ne Wẽnnaam yaa yembrã yĩnga.

Dẽ, a Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ Bi-riblã ka tõe n maan baa fɩ a toor ye, yaa bũmb nins a ba sẽn maand t'a yãtẽ wã bal la a maanda. Bũmb nins fãa ba wã sẽn maanda, Bi-riblã me maanda rẽ me.
Bala, ba wã nonga Bi-riblã, n wilgd-a bũmb nins fãa b sẽn maandã, la b na n le wilg-a-la tʋʋm sẽn ya kãsems n yɩɩd a woto, tɩ yãmb yɛɛse.
Sɩd me, a wa ba wã sẽn vʋʋgd kũum, n kɩtdẽ tɩ b leb n vɩ wã, woto me, Bi-riblã kɩtdame tɩ bãmb sẽn dat t'a soab vɩɩmdã vɩɩmde.
Sẽn paase, ba wã ka kaood ned baa a yembr bʋʋd ye, b basa bʋʋdã fãa ne Bi-riblã,
tɩ neba fãa na waoog-a wa b sẽn waoogd ba wã. Ned ning sẽn ka waoogd Bi-riblã ka waoogd ned ning sẽn tʋm-a wã me ye.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn kelgd mam goama, la a tẽed sẽn tʋm-a maamã a tara vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa. B ka na n sɩbg-a ye. A yii kũumẽ n kẽ vɩɩmẽ.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ wakat watame - la yaa moasã bala - tɩ sẽn ki-bã na n wʋm Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã koɛɛga. La neb nins sẽn wʋm-bã na n vɩɩmdame.
Sɩd me, a wa vɩɩmã sẽn be ba wã nugẽ wã, ba wã kõo Bi-riblã pãn-tõog tɩ b tar vɩɩmã b nugẽ,
la b kõ-a-la noor tɩ kao bʋʋdo, bala, a yaa Ninsaal Bi-ribla.
Da sak-y tɩ rẽ yɛɛs yãmb ye, bala, wakat n wat tɩ neb nins fãa sẽn be yaadẽ na n wʋm bãmb koɛɛga.
Neb nins sẽn maan neerã na n yiime n paam vʋʋgr la vɩɩm. Neb nins sẽn maan wẽngã na n yiime n paam vʋʋgr la bʋʋdo.
Mam ka tõe n maan baa fɩ m toor ye. Mam bʋʋda bʋʋdã n zemsed m sẽn wʋmdã, la mam bʋʋdã yaa tɩrga, bala, mam ka baood tɩ maan m daab ye, la yaa sẽn tʋm-a maamã raabo.
Sã n yaa maam n kɩt m meng kaseto, mam kasetã ka sɩd ye.
Yaa ned a to n kɩt mam kaseto, la mam miime tɩ kaset ning a soab sẽn kɩt mam wɛɛngẽ wã yaa sɩda.
Yãmb tʋma koe-toagsedb a Zã nengẽ, la a Zã kɩsa sɩdã kaseto.
Ne maam, mam kasetã ka yit ninsaal nengẽ ye, la mam gomda a woto tɩ yãmb tõe n paam fãagre.
A Zã dag n yaa fɩtl sẽn wita, n yãgda, la yãmb tʋlgame n maan sũ-noog wakat bilf bal yẽ vẽenemẽ wã.
La maam, mam tara kaset sẽn yɩɩd a Zã rẽndã. Bala, tʋʋm nins m ba sẽn kɩt tɩ mam maandẽ wã, tʋʋm kãens meng mam sẽn maandã kɩta mam kaseto, n wilgdẽ tɩ m ba n tʋm maam.
La m ba sẽn tʋm maamã, bãmb meng kɩsa mam kaseto. Yãmb zɩ n wʋm b koɛɛga, wall y yãnd b neng ye,
la bãmb goamã ka be yãmb pʋgẽ, yãmb sẽn ka tẽed bãmb sẽn tʋm a soabã yĩnga.
Yãmb lɩkd n geta Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã pʋse, yãmb sẽn tẽed tɩ yãmb na n paama vɩɩm sẽn kõn sɛ, b maasem yĩngã. Yaa gʋls-sõamy kãens n kɩt mam kaseto.
La yãmb yaool n ka rat n wa mam nengẽ n paam vɩɩmã ye.
Mam ka reegd ziir sẽn yit ninsaalb nengẽ ye...
La mam mii yãmba: Wẽnnaam nonglemã ka be yãmb pʋsẽ ye.
Mam waa m ba yʋʋr yĩnga, la yãmb ka reegd maam ye. Ned a to sã n wa ne a meng yʋʋre, yãmb deegda yẽnda.
Yãmb sẽn paamd pẽgr taab nengẽ, la y ka baood pẽgr sẽn yit Wẽnnaam b yen tãa nengẽ wã, yãmb tõee n yɩɩ wãn n tẽ?
Da tags-y tɩ mam na n yeela m ba tɩ yãmb ka maan neer ye. Sẽn na n yeel-a tɩ yãmb beegame wã, yaa a Moyiis, yãmb teegr sẽn be ne a soabã.
Bala, yãmb sã n dag n tẽedẽ a Moyiisi, yãmb dag n na tẽ maam, bala, a gʋlsame n gom mam yelle.
La yãmb sã n ka tẽed bũmb nins a sẽn gʋlsã, yãmb na n tẽe mam goama wãn-wãna?
Rẽnda poore, a Zezi kẽnga Galile bɩ Tiberyaad ko-kãsengã rʋʋnde.
Neb kʋʋng wʋsg dag n pʋgda bãmba, b sẽn yãt bõn-bãn nins a Zezi sẽn maand n maagd bãad-dãmbã yĩnga.
A Zezi dʋʋ tãngã n zĩnd be ne b karen-biisã.
Zuif-rãmbã kibs sẽn boond tɩ zʋʋg-n-basã dag n kolgame.
A Zezi zẽka b nenga, la b yãa neb kʋʋng wʋsg sẽn wat bãmb nengẽ, la b yeela a Filip yaa: Tõnd na n daa bur yɛɛne tɩ nin-kãensã paam rɩɩbo?
A Zezi goma a woto n na n mak a Filip n gese. Bala, b meng rag n mii b sẽn na n maan bũmb ninga.
A Filip leoka bãmb n yeel tɩ deniye kobsi bur ka tõe n sek tɩ ned fãa paam gɩrg ye.
A Zezi karen-biig a yembre, a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr ba-biig a Ãndre yeela bãmb yaa:
Bi-ribl bil n be ka n tar orz bur a nu ne zĩm a yiibu. La rẽnda yaa bõe ne neb sõor a woto?
A Zezi yeelame yaa: Kɩt-y tɩ nebã zĩndi. Mood n dag n be zĩ-kãng wʋsgo. Dẽ, nebã zĩndame, la raopã sõor tata tus a nu.
A Zezi deega burã, n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam barka, n pʋɩ neb nins sẽn dag n be-b be wã. B maana a woto me ne zĩmã, tɩ ned fãa deeg a sẽn dat tɛka.
Nebã sẽn dɩ n tɩge, a Zezi yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b wʋk rɩ-zersã sẽn kellã, tɩ bũmb baa a yen da pa n sãam ye.
Dẽ, b wʋka orz bur a nu wã pedsã, nebã sẽn dɩ tɩ kellã, n pids pet piig la a yiibu.
Nin-kãens sẽn yã bõn-bãn nins a Zezi sẽn maanã, b yeelame yaa: Sɩd yaa bãmb la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs ning sẽn da tog n wa-a dũni pʋgẽ wã.
A Zezi sẽn mi tɩ nebã na n waa n yõka bãmb n tɩ maan b rĩmã yĩnga, b yii be n leb n dʋ tãngã zug b yembre.
Zaabr sẽn ta, a Zezi karen-biisã sigame n ta ko-kãsengã noore.
Bãmb kẽe koom-koglgẽ n na n kẽng Kapɛrnawom, ko-kãsengã rʋʋnd a to wã. Zĩigã ra zoe n sobga zãnga, la a Zezi dag n ka wa b nengẽ ye.
Sobg n dag n fugd ne pãng hal wʋsgo, la ko-pɛmã dag n zẽkdame.
Karen-biisã sẽn dugs koglgã n zãag sẽn zems kɩlo a nu bɩ a yoobe, b yãnda a Zezi sẽn kẽnd ko-kãsengã zug n kolgd koom-koglgã. La rabeem yõk-b lame.
La a Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ b ra maan dabeem tɩ yaa bãmba.
Karen-biisã dag n dat n dɩka a Zezi ne koom-koglgã, la tao-tao bala, koom-koglgã rʋʋga tẽnga. Bala, b taa b sẽn dag n dabdẽ wã. Koom-koglg sobg sẽn lengda (6.16)

Vẽkembeoogo, neb kʋʋngã sẽn dag n yals ko-kãsengã rʋʋndã tẽegame tɩ dag n yaa koom-koglg a yen tãa n dag n be be, la t'a Zezi dag n ka kẽ kogl-kãng ne b karen-biisã ye, la tɩ karen-biisã b yen-yen n looge.
La koom-kogend a taab yii Tiberyaad n wa n yals zĩig sẽn pẽ ne zĩig ning a Zezi sẽn ning burã bark n kõ neb kʋʋngã tɩ b wãbã.
La kʋʋngã sẽn yã t'a Zezi bɩ b karen-biisã ka be be wã, b mensã kẽe koom-kogendẽ wã n kẽng Kapɛrnawom n na n tɩ bao a Zezi.
B yãnda a Zezi ko-kãsengã rʋʋnd a to wã, n sok-b yaa: Karen-saamba, yãmb waa ka rabʋre?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ yãmb sẽn baood maamã, ka bõn-bãnã yãmb sẽn yã wã yĩng ye, la yaa yãmb sẽn wãb burã n tɩgã yĩnga.
Da tʋm-y dɩɩb sẽn sãamdã yĩng ye. Tʋm-y rɩɩb ning sẽn paad vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã yĩnga: Ninsaal Bi-riblã n na n kõ-a yãmba. Bala, yaa yẽnda la m ba a Wẽnnaam kõ noore.
Nebã soka a Zezi yaa: Bõe la tõnd na n maan n tʋm Wẽnnaam tʋʋmdã?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Wẽnnaam tʋʋmde, yaa tɩ yãmb tẽ a soab ning bãmb sẽn tʋmã.
La b yeela a Zezi yaa: Bõe bõn-bãnd la yãmb maand tɩ tõnd na n yã n tẽ yãmba? Bõe tʋʋm la yãmb tʋmda?
Tõnd ba-rãmbã dɩɩ man we-rasempʋɩɩgã pʋgẽ wa b sẽn gʋls n yeel tɩ: "A Moyiis kõo bãmb bur sẽn yit arzãn tɩ b wãbe."
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ka a Moyiis n kõ yãmb bur sẽn yi arzãnã ye, la yaa m baaba n kõt yãmb bur sɩd-sɩd sẽn yi arzãnã.
Bala, Wẽnnaam burã, yaa soab ning sẽn yit-a arzãn n sigda, n kõt dũni neb vɩɩmã.
La nebã yeela a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, kõt-y tõnd bur kãng daar fãa.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Maam la bur sẽn kõt vɩɩmã. Kom kõn leb n yõk ned ning sẽn wat-a mam nengẽ ye, la ko-yũud kõn leb n yõk ned ning sẽn tẽed-a maamã abada.
La mam yeela yãmb tɩ yãmb yãa maam la y ka tẽed ye.
Neb nins fãa m ba sẽn kõt maamã na n waa mam nengẽ, la mam kõn dig ned baa a yen sẽn wat mam nengẽ ye.
Bala, mam sẽn yi arzãn n sigã, ka tɩ maan m sẽn dat ye, la yaa tɩ maan sẽn tʋm-a maamã raabo.
La sẽn tʋm-a maamã raab la woto: yaa tɩ m da bas ned baa a yen bãmb sẽn kõ maamã tɩ menem ye, la mam na n vʋʋg-a-la yaoolem daarã.
Sɩd me, ad m baaba raabo: yaa tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn yã Bi-riblã n tẽ bãmb na paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa. La mam na n vʋʋg-a-la yaoolem daarã.
Zuif-rãmbã dag n yẽgemda ne taab a Zezi poorẽ, bala, a Zezi yeelame tɩ bãmb la bur sẽn yi arzãn n sigã.
Nebã yeelame yaa: Ka yẽnda la a Zezi wɛɛ, a Zozɛf bi-riblã, tɩ tõnd mi a ba ne a ma wã laa? La yaa a wãn t'a yetẽ tɩ yẽ yii arzãn n sigi?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Da yẽgem-y ne taab ye.
Ned baa a yen ka tõe n wa mam nengẽ, tɩ sã n ka m ba, sẽn tʋm-a maamã n tak a soab n wa-ne ye. La mam na n vʋʋg-a-la yaoolem daarã.
A Gʋlsa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sɛbẽ tɩ: "B fãa na n deega zãmsg Wẽnnaam nengẽ." Ned ning fãa sẽn wʋm m ba koɛɛg la a reeg bãmb zãmsgã wata mam nengẽ.
Ka rat n yeel tɩ ned n zoe n yã d baaba ye, sã n ka soab ning sẽn yi-a Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã. Soab kãng yẽ yãa d ba wã.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned ning sẽn tẽedã tara vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Mam yaa bur sẽn kõt vɩɩm.
Yãmb yaab-rãmbã dɩɩ mann we-rasempʋɩɩgẽ wã, la b kiime.
Bur ning sẽn yit-a yĩngrã yell la woto: Ned ning sẽn dɩt-a kõn ki ye.
Maam, mam yaa bur-vɩɩg sẽn yi arzãn n sigi. Ned sã n dɩ bur kãngã, a na n vɩɩmda wakat sẽn kõn sa. La bur ning mam sẽn na n kõ dũni wã vɩɩm yĩngã, yaa mam yĩngã.
Gom-kãng poorẽ, Zuif-rãmbã wẽe nokoeemd ne taab wʋsg n yeele: Nin-kãngã na n yɩɩ wãn n kõ tõnd a yĩngã tɩ d wãbe?
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ yãmb sã n ka wãb Ninsaal Bi-riblã nemdo,la yãmb sã n ka yũ a zɩɩmã, yãmb ka tar vɩɩm y pʋsẽ ye.
Ned ning sẽn wãbd mam nemd la a yũud mam zɩɩm tara vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa, la mam na n vʋʋg-a-la yaoolem daarã.
Bala, mam nemdã yaa rɩɩb sɩd-sɩda, la mam zɩɩmã yaa bõn-yũudl sɩd-sɩda.
Sẽn wãbd-a mam nemd la a yũud mam zɩɩmã paada mam pʋgẽ, tɩ mam paad yẽ pʋgẽ.
A wa m ba wã sẽn vɩ, n tʋm maam, tɩ mam vɩ d ba wã maasem yĩngã, woto me, ned ning sẽn dɩt maam na n vɩɩ mam maasem yĩnga.
Ada la bur sẽn yi arzãn n sigi. A ka wẽnd bur ning yãmb ba-rãmbã sẽn wãbã ye: Bãmb kiime. Sẽn dɩt-a bur kãngã wã na n vɩɩmda wakat sẽn kõn sa.
Yaa woto la a Zezi gom wakat ning b sẽn dag n zãmsd nebã Kapɛrnawom karen-doogẽ wã.
A Zezi karen-biisã sẽn wʋm bãmb goamã, wʋsg yeelame yaa: Zãms-kãngã deegr yaa toogo. Ãnna n tõe n sak-a?
A Zezi sẽn mi b yamẽ tɩ b karen-biisã yẽgemda gomdã poorẽ, b yeela bãmb yaa: Yõwã tuka yãmb sũur laa?
La yãmb sã n yã Ninsaal Bi-riblã t'a zẽkd n lebd a sẽn dag n beẽ wã, na n yɩɩ a wãna?
Yaa Sɩɩg-sõng n kõt vɩɩm. Yĩngã ka sõngd ne baa fɩ. Goam nins mam sẽn togs yãmbã wata ne Sɩɩg-sõng la vɩɩm.
La neb kẽer n be yãmb sʋkã n ka tẽed ye. Bala, hal sɩngr wẽndẽ bala, a Zezi dag n mii neb nins sẽn ka tẽed bãmba, la ned ning sẽn na n zãmb-a bãmb n yõk n kõ wã.
A Zezi gomame n paas n yeele: Dẽ n kɩt tɩ mam yeel yãmb tɩ ned baa a yen ka tõe n wa mam nengẽ, tɩ sã n ka m ba n kõ-a tõogr ye.
Sẽn sɩng ne wakat kãnga, bãmb karen-biis wʋsg leba poorẽ, n bas n ka leb n tũud a Zezi ye.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela b karen-biis piig la a yiibã yaa: La yãmb yẽ, yãmb ka rat n loog laa?
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr leoka bãmb n yeele: Zu-soaba, tõnd na n kẽnga ãnna soab nengẽ? Yãmb tara vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã goama.
La tõnd tẽeme, la tõnd bãngame tɩ yãmb yaa sõmblem soab sẽn yi Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Ka maam n tũus yãmb piig la a yiibã wɛ? La yãmb ned a ye n ya zĩna.
Bãmb dag n gomda a Sɩmo Iskaryo biig a Zudas yelle. Bala, yaa yẽnda, bãmb piig la a yiibã sʋk ned ning sẽn da na n zãmb-a bãmbã.
Rẽ poore, a Zezi dag n saagda Galile, bala, b dag n ka rat n saag Zude ye. Tɩ bõe, Zuif-rãmbã dag n baooda bãmb n na n kʋ.
Rẽ tɩ zãnã kibsa, sẽn ya Zuif-rãmbã kibs dag n kolgame.
A Zezi ma-biisã yeela bãmb yaa: Yi ka n kẽng Zude tɩ f karen-biisã me paam n yã tʋʋm nins fo sẽn maandã.
Ned sã n dat tɩ nebã yã-a, a ka soosd n tʋmd a tʋʋmã ye. Fo sẽn maand bõn-kãensã, maan tɩ dũni neb bãng-fo.
Sɩda, a Zezi ma-biisã me dag n ka tẽed bãmb ye.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Ne maam, wakatã nan ka ta ye, la ne yãmba, wakat fãa zemsame.
Dũni wã ka tõe n kisg yãmb ye. B kisa maam, tɩ bõe, mam kɩta kaset tɩ b tʋʋmã yaa wẽnse.
Kẽng-y kibsã. Mam nan ka na n kẽng kibs kãngã ye, tɩ bõe, mam wakatã nan ka pid ye.
A Zezi sẽn gom ne bãmb woto n sa, a Zezi kell n paa Galile.
A Zezi ma-bi-raopã sẽn kẽng kibsã, bãmb mengã me yaool n kẽngame. B soosame n kẽng tɩ nebã ka yã bãmb ye.
Zuif-rãmbã dag n baooda a Zezi kibsã wakat n sokdẽ tɩ b bee yɛ?
La vũn-vũn n dag n be kʋʋngã sʋk wʋsg bãmb poorẽ. Neb kẽer yetame tɩ bãmb yaa nin-sõngo, tɩ kẽer yetẽ tɩ ayo, bãmb kẽesda nebã moogo.
Ned baa a yen ka saagd n gom bãmb yellã vẽeneg ye, b sẽn zoet Zuif-rãmbã yĩnga.
Kibsã da zoe n taa pʋɩ-sʋka, t'a Zezi kẽng wẽnd-doogẽ wã, n sɩng n zãmsd nebã.
Linga Zuif-rãmbã, la b sokame yaa: Rao wã yɩɩ wãn n mi Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamy wã n yaool n ka paam zãmsgo?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Zãmsg ning mam sẽn zãmsd nebã ka yit mam nengẽ ye, a yita sẽn tʋm-a maamã nengẽ.
Ned ning fãa sẽn dat n tũ Wẽnnaam daabã na bãng zãms-kãng sã n yita bãmb nengẽ, wall mam goamã sã n yita mam meng nengẽ.
Ned ning goam sẽn yit a meng nengẽ baooda a meng waoogre. La ned ning sẽn baood sẽn tʋm-a yẽ wã waoogr yaa sɩd soaba, la ka-tɩrlem ka be yẽ pʋgẽ ye.
A Moyiis ka kõ yãmb tõogã sɩda? La yãmb ned baa a yen ka maand tõogã sẽn yetã ye. Yaa bõe tɩ yãmb baood n na n kʋ maam?
Neb kʋʋngã leokame tɩ zĩn n tar a Zezi, la tɩ ãnna n baood n na n kʋ bãmba?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam tʋma tʋʋmd a yen, la a yɛɛsa yãmb fãa.
A Moyiis n yeel yãmb tɩ y kẽes kom-dibli wã bãongo (bãongã ka sɩng ne a Moyiis ye, yaa yaab-rãmbã n sɩng-a), la yãmb kẽesda kambã bãongo, baa ne vʋʋsg daare.
Yãmb sã n tõe n kẽes ned bãong vʋʋsg daare, n da kɩɩs a Moyiis tõogã, bõe tɩ yãmb sũyã yĩigd ne maam, mam sẽn kõ yĩn-tõr laafɩ vʋʋsg daarã yĩnga?
Da bʋ-y bʋʋdã tɩ zems ne nin sẽn yãtã ya, bʋ-y bʋ-tɩrga.
Zeruzalɛm neb kẽer yeelame yaa: Ka rao kãngã la b sẽn baood n na n kʋ wã wɛ?
Ad a sẽn yɛs nebã sʋk n gomd tɩ b ka yet-a tɩ bũmbu! Rẽ yĩnga, kãsem-dãmbã sɩd reegame tɩ yaa bãmb la Kiristã laa?
Tõnd yaool n mii rao kãngã sẽn yitẽ. La Kirist sã n wa, ned baa a yen ka na n bãng b sẽn yitẽ ye.

Dẽ, a Zezi zẽka b koɛɛg wakat ning b sẽn zãmsd nebã wẽnd-doogẽ wã n yeele: Yãmb mii maam, la y mii mam sẽn yitẽ. Baoosgo, mam ka wa m toor ye. La sẽn tʋm-a maamã yaa sɩd soaba, la yãmb ka mi-b ye.
Mam mii bãmba, bala, yaa bãmb yʋʋr yĩng la mam sẽn be ka wã, la yaa bãmb n tʋm maam.
Nebã da rat n yõka a Zezi, la ned baa a yen ka sɩɩs bãmb ye, bãmb wakatã sẽn dag n nan ka ta wã yĩnga.
Neb kʋʋngã sʋka, wʋsg tẽe a Zezi n yetẽ: Dẽ yĩnga, Kirist sã n wa, b na n maana bõn-bãn n yɩɩd dao kãngã sẽn maandã sɩda?
Fariisẽ-dãmbã wʋma neb kʋʋngã sẽn dag n gomd a Zezi yell vũn-vũnã. Dẽ, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã tʋma gũudb tɩ b tɩ yõk a Zezi.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Mam ket n bee ne yãmb wakat bilf yĩng bala, la m na n leba sẽn tʋm-a maamã nengẽ.
Yãmb na n baoo maam, la y ka na n yã maam ye, la mam sẽn na n zĩnd zĩig ningã, yãmb ka tõe n wa be ye.
Zuif-rãmbã goma ne taab n yeele: A na n kẽe yɛ tɩ tõnd da yã-a? A na n kẽnga Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn sãeeg n be Gɛrk-rãmbã sʋka nengẽ n tɩ zãms Gɛrk-rãmbã bi?
A sẽn yeel tɩ tõnd na n baoo-a lame n ka yã, la tɩ tõnd ka tõe n wa zĩig ning a sẽn na n zĩndẽ wã, gom kãng võor yaa bõe?
Kibsã yaoolem daare, daar ning sẽn ya-a kãseng n yɩɩdã, a Zezi yalsa yĩngr n zẽk b koɛɛg n yeele: Bɩ Ko-yũud sẽn tar ned ning wa mam nengẽ n yũ.
Kʋɩlse, b koom sẽn kõt vɩɩm na n yii ned ning sẽn tẽed maamã pʋgẽ, wa Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yetã.
A Zezi dag n goma Sɩɩg-sõngã neb nins sẽn tẽed bãmbã sẽn na n deegã yelle. Bala, b dag n nan ka kõ nebã Sɩɩg-sõngã ye, a Zezi sẽn dag n nan ka paam waoogrã yĩnga.
Nebã sẽn wʋm gom kãensã, neb n zĩnd kʋʋngã sʋk n yeel tɩ dao kãngã sɩd yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
Kẽer da yetame tɩ dao-kãngã yaa Kiristã. La neb a taab yetame yaa: Dẽ yĩnga, sɩd yaa Galile la Kiristã tog n yi sɩda?
Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã ka yeel tɩ "Kiristã na n yɩɩ a Daviid yagenga, n dog Betlehɛm sẽn yaa a Daviid tẽngã" sɩda?
Dẽ, welgr zĩnda nebã sʋk a Zezi poorẽ.
Neb kẽer bãmb sʋk dag n dat n yõka a Zezi, la ned baa a yembr ka sɩɩs bãmb ye.
Gũudbã leba maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã nengẽ, la b sok-b lame tɩ yaa bõe tɩ b ka tall a Zezi n wa?
Gũudbã leokame n yeele: Ned nan ka gom wa rao-kãngã ye.
Tɩ Fariisẽ-dãmbã le sok-ba: "A tõog n belga yãmb me n tõog laa?
Dẽ yĩnga, naab bɩ Fariisẽ baa a yen tãa beeme n tẽ bãmb sɩda?
La neb kʋʋngã sẽn ka mi tõogã, b yaa neba, kãab-wẽng sẽn be b zutu.
Bãmb ned a yembre, a Nikodɛm, sẽn dag n wa-a a Zezi nengẽ pĩndã yeel-b lame yaa:
Dẽ yĩnga, tõnd tõodã kaooda ned bʋʋd tɩ d ka reng n kelg-a, la d bãng bũmb ning a sẽn maanã sɩda?
B leoka yẽnda n yeele: Fo me yaa Galile ned laa? Vɛɛs sõama n gese, la f na yã tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs ka yit Galile ye.
Rẽ poore, ned fãa kuila a yiri.
A Zezi kẽnga oliiv tɩɩs tãngẽ wã.
La yibeoog bala, b leb n kẽnga wẽnd-doogẽ wã, la nebã fãa waa bãmb nengẽ. Bãmb zĩndame n zãmsd nebã.
Dẽ, tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã talla pag b sẽn yõk yoodem zug n wa ne-a
a Zezi taoore, n yals-a nebã fãa sʋk n yeel a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, b linga pʋg-kãngã t'a maand yoobo.
A Moyiis yeela tõnd a tõogã pʋgẽ tɩ d lob pagb a woto kuga. La yãmba, yãmb yetame tɩ bõe?
B goma a woto n na n bẽd a Zezi n paam n dõd-ba. La a Zezi zõondame n sɩng n gʋls tomã pʋgẽ ne b nug-bila.
La nebã sẽn dag n ket n pẽdgd bãmb ne b sokrã, b roogame n yeel-b yaa: Sẽn be-a yãmb sʋk n ka tar yel-wẽnde, bɩ a deng n lobg pagã kugri.
A Zezi leb n zõondame n gʋlsd tomẽ wã.

Tõog karen-saam-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn wʋm gom-kõngo, tɩ b sũyã kaset kao b bʋʋdo, b yii yembr yembre, sẽn sɩng ne kãsem hal tɩ ta yaoolem soaba. La a Zezi paa b yembr ne pagã sẽn dag n yɛs nebã sʋkã.
Dẽ, a Zezi roogame n yeel pagã yaa: Paga, sẽn dõt-b foomã bee yɛ? Baa a yen ka kao fo bʋʋd laa?
Pagã leokame tɩ: Zu-soaba, ned baa a yen. La a Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Mam me ka kaood fo bʋʋd ye. Kẽnge, la f ra le saag n maan yel-wẽn ye.
A Zezi leb n goma ne bãmb n yeele: Mam yaa dũni vẽenem. Ned ning sẽn tũud maam kõn kẽn lik pʋgẽ ye, la a na n paama vɩɩm vẽenem.
Dẽ, Fariisẽ-dãmbã yeela bãmb yaa: Fo kɩta f meng kaseto, fo kaset ka sɩd ye.
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Baa ne mam sẽn kɩt m meng kasetã, mam kasetã yaa sɩda. Bala, mam mii m sẽn yiẽ, la m sẽn dabdẽ. La yãmb ka mi mam sẽn yiẽ, wall m sẽn dabdẽ ye.
Yãmb bʋʋda wa ninsaalb sẽn data. La maam, mam ka bʋʋd ned baa a yen bʋʋd ye.
La mam sã n bʋʋdẽ me, mam bʋʋdã tũuda sɩda, bala mam ka m yembr ye. M ba, sẽn tʋm-a maamã bee ne maam.
B gʋlsa yãmb tõogã pʋgẽ tɩ neb a yiib kaset yaa sɩda.
Mam kɩta m meng kaseto, la m ba, sẽn tʋm-a maamã kɩta mam kaseto.
Dẽ, b yeela a Zezi yaa: F baaba bee yɛ? A Zezi leokame n yeele: Yãmb zɩ mam sẽn yaa a soaba, la y zɩ m ba sẽn yaa a soab me. Yãmb sã n da miiẽ-la maam, y dag n na bãng m baaba me.
A Zezi goma woto, wakat ning b sẽn dag n zãmsd nebã wẽnd-doogẽ wã, ligd lobrã koglg sɛɛgẽ, la ned baa a yen ka yõk bãmb ye, bãmb wakatã sẽn ket n nan ka ta wã yĩnga.
A Zezi leb n yeela bãmb yaa: Mam loogdame, la yãmb na n baoo maam, la yãmb na n kii y yel-wẽndã pʋgẽ. Yãmb ka tõe n wa mam sẽn kẽndẽ wã ye.
Zuif-rãmbã yeelame yaa: A sẽn yet tɩ tõnd ka tõe n wa zĩig ning a sẽn kẽndẽ wã, a na n kʋʋ a meng laa?
La a Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Yãmb yaa tẽngr ka neba, la mam yaa yĩngr neda. Yãmb yaa dũni kãngã neba, la mam ka dũni kãngã ned ye.
Dẽnda n kɩt tɩ mam yeel yãmb tɩ y na n kii y yel-wẽnã pʋgẽ wã. Bala, yãmb sã n ka tẽed tɩ mam yaa m sẽn yaa a soabã, yãmb na n kii y yel-wẽnã pʋgẽ.
B soka a Zezi b sẽn ya a soaba. A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Pipi, bõe yĩng tɩ m na n gom ne yãmba?
Mam tara bũmb wʋsg n na n gome, sẽn kẽed ne yãmb yelle, la m bʋ b bʋʋdo. La sẽn tʋm-a maamã yaa sɩd soaba, la mam togsda dũni wã bũmb ning m sẽn wʋm bãmb nengẽ.
Nebã ka wʋm tɩ yaa b ba a Wẽnnaam yell la a Zezi sẽn gomd ne bãmbã ye.

Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb sã n wa n zẽk Ninsaal Bi-riblã n sa, y na yaool n bãng tɩ mam yaa m sẽn ya a soaba, la tɩ mam ka maand baa fɩ m toor ye, la tɩ mam gomda wa m ba sẽn zãms maamã.
Sẽn tʋm-a maamã bee ne maam. B ka bas maam m yembr ye, tɩ bõe, wakat fãa, mam maanda sẽn noom bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn gom a woto wã, neb wʋsg tẽe bãmba.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeela Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn tẽ bãmbã yaa: Yãmb sã n sak mam goama neere,
yãmb sɩd yaa mam karen-biisi. Yãmb na bãng sɩdã, la sɩdã na kɩt tɩ yãmb lebg burkĩmba.
Nebã leoka a Zezi n yeele: Tõnd yaa a Abraham yagense, la tõnd zɩ n yɩ ned yems ye. Bõe tɩ yãmb yetẽ tɩ tõnd na n lebga burkĩmba?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn maand yel-wẽnd yaa yel-wẽn yamba.
La yamb ka paad yir wakat fãa ye. La yirã bi-ribl paada be wakat fãa.
Dẽ, Bi-riblã sã n yols yãmba, yãmb na n yɩɩ burkĩmb meng-menga.
Mam miime tɩ yãmb yaa a Abraham yagense. La yãmb yaool n dat n kʋʋ maam, yãmb sẽn ka reegd mam goamã yĩnga.
Mam togsda bũmb ning m sẽn yã m ba wã nengẽ wã. La yãmba, yãmb maanda bũmb ning y sẽn wʋm y ba wã nengẽ.
Nebã leoka a Zezi n yeel tɩ bãmb ba la a Abraham. A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Yãmb sã n yaa a Abraham kamba, bɩ y tʋm y ba a Abraham tʋʋmã.
La moasã, maam, soab ning sẽn togs yãmb sɩd m sẽn wʋm Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã, yãmb baooda maam n na n kʋ. A Abraham zɩ n maan bõn-kãngã buudu.
Yãmb tʋmda y ba tʋʋma. Bãmb yeela a Zezi yaa: Tõnd ka tãmpĩib ye. Tõnd ba yaa a yen tãa: Yaa Wẽnnaam.
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Wẽnnaam sã n dag n yaẽ yãmb ba, yãmb dag n na n nongẽ-la maam, bala, mam yii Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ, la m yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ n wa. Mam ka wa m toor ye, la yaa bãmb n tʋm maam.
Bõe tɩ yãmb ka wʋmd mam goamã võore? Yaa tɩ yãmb ka tõe n kelg mam gomd ye.

Yãmb ba la Sʋtãanã, la yãmb dat n pidsa y ba wã raabo. A yɩɩ nin-kʋʋd hal sɩngr wẽndẽ tɩ ta moasã, la a ka pa sɩd pʋgẽ ye, sɩd sẽn ka be yẽ pʋgẽ wã yĩnga. A sã n yagd zĩrĩ, yaa a pʋga fãa la rẽnda, bala, a yaa zĩrĩ yagda, la zĩrĩ wã ba.
La mam sẽn togsd sɩdã, yãmb ka tẽed maam ye.
Ãnna yãmb sʋkã n na n wilg maam tɩ m maana yel-wẽnde? Mam sã n togsda sɩda, bõe tɩ yãmb ka tẽed maam?
Wẽnnaam biig kelgda Wẽnnaam goama. Yãmb ka kelgda, yãmb sẽn ka Wẽnnaam kambã yĩnga.
Zuif-rãmbã leoka a Zezi n yeele: Tõnd ka tar bʋʋm tɩ yeel tɩ fo yaa Samari neda, la tɩ zĩn n tar foom sɩda?
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Zĩn ka tar maam ye. Mam waoogda m ba, la yãmb paoogda maam.
Mam yẽ ka baood m meng waoogr ye. Ned a yen tãa n baood waoogrã, la a bʋʋd bʋʋdã.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned sã n tall mam gomdã, a kõn tol n ki ye.
Zuif-rãmbã yeela bãmb yaa: Moasã wã yẽ, tõnd miime tɩ zĩn n tar foom. A Abraham kiime, Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã me kiime, tɩ fo yaool n yetẽ tɩ ned sã n tall fo goama a kõn tol n ki ye.
Dẽ yĩnga, fo yɩɩda tõnd ba a Abraham, sẽn ki-a wã laa? Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã me kiime. Fo tẽedame tɩ fo yaa ãnna?
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Mam sã n waoogd m menga, mam waoogrã ka fɩ. Yaa m ba, soab ning yãmb sẽn boond tɩ y Wẽnnaamã n waoogd maam.
La yãmb ka mi bãmb ye. Mam yẽ mii bãmba. Mam sã n yeel tɩ m ka mi bãmba, mam na n yɩɩ zĩrĩ yagd wa yãmba. La mam mii bãmba, n sakd bãmb noore.
Yãmb ba a Abraham dag n kɩdma ne sũ-noogo, a sẽn dag n tagsd t'a na n yãa mam daarã yĩnga. A yãa-a lame, n maan sũ-noogo.
Zuif-rãmbã yeela a Zezi yaa: Fo nan ka ta yʋʋm pis-nu, n yaool n yã a Abraham?
A Zezi yeela bãmb yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ sẽn deng a Abraham dogem, mam dag n beeme.
Gom-kãng poorẽ, Zuif-rãmbã wʋka kug n na n lob a Zezi, la a Zezi soondame, la b yii wẽnd-doogẽ wã.
A Zezi sẽn loogda, b yãa dao a yen sẽn dog ne zondo.
Bãmb karen-biisã soka bãmb yaa: Karen-saamba, yaa ãnna soab n maan yel-wẽnd tɩ rao wã rog ne zondo? Yaa yẽ meng bii, bɩ yaa a ba-rãmbã?
A Zezi leokame n yeele: "Ka tɩ yaa yẽnda bɩ a ba-rãmbã n maan yel-wẽnd ye, la yaa tɩ Wẽnnaam tʋʋmã na tũnug yẽnda n puki.
Tõnd tog n tʋma sẽn tʋm-a maamã tʋʋma, wĩndg sẽn ket n be. Yʋng n wat tɩ ned baa a yen ka tõe n tʋm ye.
Mam sẽn be dũni pʋgẽ wakate, maam la dũni wã vẽenem."
A Zezi sẽn gom woto n sa, b tʋbsa tẽnga, n kalem tãndã ne kolkoodã tɩ lebg begdo, n dɩk n bɛ zoangã nini
n yeel-a t'a kẽng Siloe bãkẽ wã n tɩ widg a nenga (Siloe dat n yeelame t'a soab b sẽn tʋme). Zoangã kẽnga be n tɩ widg a nengã, la a sẽn lebg n watẽ wã, a ra neeme.
A yags-rãmbã ne neb nins sẽn dag n yã t'a yaa bõasã yetame yaa: Ka rao ning sẽn dag n zĩ n bõosdẽ wã la woto?
Neb kẽer yetame tɩ yaa yẽnda, tɩ kẽer yetẽ tɩ ayo, tɩ yaa a wẽnego. La yẽ mengã ra yetame tɩ yaa yẽnda vã.
Dẽ, b sok-a lame t'a ninã maana a wãn n puki?
A leokame n yeele: Dao ning b sẽn boond t'a Zezi wã n bui tom n bɛ mam ninã, la b yeel maam tɩ m kẽng Siloe bãkẽ wã n tɩ widg m nenga. Mam kẽngame n tɩ widg m nenga, la m ninã pukame.
La nebã soka rao wã yaa: Rao-kãng bee yɛ? La a leokame t'a ka mi ye.
Nebã talla ned ning sẽn dag n ya-a zoangã n kẽng Fariisẽ-dãmbã nengẽ.
Yaool n dag n yaa Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsg daar la a Zezi bui tomã n puk rao wã ninã.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã me soka daowã a ninã sẽn maan to-to n puki. La a yeela bãmb tɩ sẽn maag-a yẽ wã bɛɛ yẽ ninã ne tãndo, tɩ yẽ tɩ widg a nenga, la yẽ neeme.

Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn wʋm woto, kẽer yeelame tɩ rao-kãngã ka yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ ye. Bala, a ka sakd vʋʋsg daar tõodã ye. Neb a taab yeelame tɩ yel-wẽn maand tõe n yɩɩ a wãn n maan bõn-bãn a woto?
La welgr kẽe bãmb sʋka. B leb n soka zoangã yaa: Fo kaset yaa bõe ne ned ning sẽn puk-a fo ninã? A leokame t'a yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa.
Sẽn deng b sẽn na n bool daowã ba-rãmba, Zuif-rãmbã ka tẽ tɩ rao wã dag n yɩɩ zoang t'a ninã yaool n puk ye.
B soka a ba-rãmbã yaa: Yaa yãmb bi-ribl la woto, tɩ yãmb yet t'a roga ne zondã? Maana a wãn t'a yãtẽ moasã?
A ba-rãmbã leokame n yeele: Tõnd miime t'a yaa tõnd bi-ribla, la t'a roga ne zondo.
La sẽn yɩ to-to t'a yãt moasã wã, tõnd ka mi ye. Tõnd ka mi ned ning sẽn puk-a a ninã me ye. Sok-y-yã-a t'a yʋʋmã seka a sẽn na gom a mengã yelle.
Rao wã ba-rãmbã goma a woto, tɩ bõe, b rag n zoeta Zuif-rãmbã. Bala, Zuif-rãmbã dag n seda ne taab n yeel tɩ ned sã n yeel t'a Zezi yaa Kiristã, bɩ b rig-a n yiis karen-doogẽ wã.
Rẽnda n kɩt t'a ba-rãmbã yeel t'a yʋʋmã waoogame la b sok-a wã.
Fariisẽ-dãmbã leb n boola rao ning sẽn dag n yaa-a zoangã n yeel-a: Togs sɩd Wẽnnaam waoogr yĩnga. Tõnd yẽ miime tɩ rao-kãngã yaa yel-wẽn maanda.
A leokame n yeele: A sã n yaa yel-wẽn maanda, mam ka mi ye. Bũmb a yen la mam mi: yaa tɩ mam dag n yaa zoanga, la tɩ moasã mam neeme.
B soka yẽnda yaa: A maana foom bõe? A puka fo ninã wãn-wãna?
Sẽn dag n yaa-a zoangã leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam zoe n togsa yãmba, la yãmb ka kelg maam ye. Bõe tɩ yãmb dat tɩ mam leb n togs yãmb yɛs tɩ y kelge? Yãmb me dat n lebga bãmb karen-biis laa?
Fariisẽ-dãmbã tʋʋ rao wã n yeel-a yaa: Foo la bãmb karen-biiga. Tõnd yẽ yaa a Moyiis karen-biisi.
Tõnd miime tɩ Wẽnnaam goma ne a Moyiis, la yõwã soaba, tõnd ka mi a sẽn yitẽ ye.
Rao wã leoka bãmb yaa: Sẽn lingd maam yaa tɩ yãmb ka mi a sẽn yitẽ ye. B puka mam nini.
Tõnd miime tɩ Wẽnnaam ka leokd yel-wẽn maandb pʋʋsg ye. La ned sã n waoogd Wẽnnaam la a tũud bãmb daabã, Wẽnnaam leokda yẽnda soaba.
Ned nan ka wʋm tɩ ned n puk zoang sẽn dog ne zond nin ye.
Dao-kãngã sã n dag n ka yitẽ Wẽnnaam nengẽ, a dag n kõn tõog n maan baa fɩ.
B leok-a lame n yeele: Fo yĩngã tõr bee yel-wẽn pʋgẽ, hal f rogem wakat tɩ ta moasã, tɩ fo wa yɛs n na n zãms tõndo? La b rig-a lame n yiis yɩnga.
A Zezi wʋmame tɩ b riga rao wã n yiis karen-doogẽ wã. A Zezi yãnd-a lame n yeel-a yaa: Dẽ yĩnga, fo tẽeda Ninsaal Bi-riblã?
A leokame n yeele: Zu-soaba, bãmb yaa ãnna, tɩ mam na tẽ bãmba?
A Zezi yeel-a lame tɩ: Fo yãa-a lame, yaa sẽn gomd-a ne foomã, yaa yẽnda.
Dẽ, dao wã yeelame yaa: Zu-soaba, mam tẽedame. La a wõgemdame n waoog bãmba.
Dẽ poore, a Zezi yeela rao wã yaa: Mam waa dũni kãngã pʋgẽ bʋʋd yĩnga, tɩ neb nins sẽn ka yãtã na yã, tɩ neb nins sẽn yãtã na lebg zoense.
Fariisẽ-dãmb kẽer sẽn dag n be be ne a Zezi, n wʋm gom-kãensã soka bãmb yaa: Dẽ yĩnga, tõnd me yaa zoense?
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Yãmb sã n dag n yaẽ zoense, yãmb yel-wẽnã dag n kõn beẽ yãmb pʋsẽ ye. Moasã, yãmb yetame tɩ y yãtame. Woto, yãmb yel-wẽnã paada ne-yã.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned ning sẽn ka tũud piisã yãgr noor n kẽedẽ, n gãndgd zĩig a to n kẽedẽ, a yaa wagdr la fãada.
La ned ning sẽn tũud-a yãgrã noor n kẽedẽ wã, yẽ soab la piisã pe-kɩɩma.
Zag-no-gũudã pakda yãgrã noor n kõ-a, la piisã wʋmda a koɛɛgã. A sẽn so piis ninsã, a boonda ned fãa ne a yʋʋre, n tall-b n yi yɩnga.
A sã n yiis piis nins a sẽn so wã zãnga, a lʋɩta b taoore, la piisã pʋgd-a lame, b sẽn mi a koɛɛgã yĩnga.
Piisã kõn tol n pʋg sãan ye, la b na n zoe n zãaga ne-a, tɩ bõe, b ka mi sãambã koees ye.
A Zezi wẽe yel-bũn kãngã, la b ka wʋm a võor ye.
A Zezi leb n yeela bãmb yaa: Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ yaa maam la piisã zag-noore.
Neb nins fãa sẽn deng maam n wa wã yaa wagda la fãadba. La piisã ka kelg-b ye.
Maam la zag-noorã. Sẽn tũ-a maam n kẽ na n paama fãagre. A na n kẽedame la yita, la a na n paama yamdo.
Wagdr sã n wa n watẽ, yaa tɩ zu, n kʋ, la a sãame. La mam waame tɩ piisã na paam vɩɩm, la tɩ b na paam-a sõama.
Maam la pe-kɩɩm-sõngã. Pe-kɩɩm-sõng gẽnegda a yõor a piis yĩnga.
La ned ning b sẽn dɩk t'a gũud piisã, n ka pe-kɩɩmã la a ka so piisã, a sã n yã we-baag sẽn wata, a basda piisã n zoe. We-baagã kẽeda piisã n yõg-ba, la a sãeeg-ba.
A sẽn zoetã, yaa tɩ yaa yaood yĩng la a gũud piisã, la b yellã ka pak-a ye. Maam la pe-kɩɩm-sõngã.
Mam mii m piisã, la m piisã mii maam,
wa m ba wã sẽn mi maam tɩ mam me mi m ba wã, la mam kõta m vɩɩmã m piisã yĩnga.
Mam tara piis a taab sẽn ket n nan ka be yãg-kãngã pʋgẽ ye. Kal mam tall bãmb me n wa. B na n wʋma mam koɛɛga, na n yɩɩ bãgr a yembre, la pe-kɩɩm yɛnga.
M baaba nonga maam, tɩ bõe, mam kɩta m vɩɩma n na n leb n deeg-a.
Ned ka yiisd mam vɩɩmã ye, la yaa maam n kɩt-a m toore. Mam tara pãn-tõog tɩ kɩs-a, la m tara pãn-tõog me tɩ leb n deeg-a yɛsa. Noor ning m ba sẽn yeel maamã la woto.
Gom-kãens yĩnga, welgr leb n kẽe Zuif-rãmbã sʋka.
Wʋsg bãmb sʋkã yeelame yaa: Zĩn n tar a Zezi! A yaa gãeenga! Bõe tɩ yãmb kelgd-a?
Neb a taab yeelame yaa: Gom-kãensã ka ned zĩn sẽn tar goam ye. Dẽ yĩnga, zĩn tõe n puka zoens nini?
Wakat kãng tɩ b dag n maanda bark ningr kibs Zeruzalɛm. Dag n yaa waood wẽnde.
A Zezi dag n bee a Salomo zãndẽ wã n kẽnda.
Zuif-rãmbã gũbga bãmba n yeele: Hal tɩ ta dabʋr la yãmb na n bas tõnd tɩ d yamã gõodẽ? Yãmb sã n yaa Kiristã, bɩ y togs tõnd vẽenega.
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam togsa yãmba, la yãmb ka tẽed ye. Tʋʋm nins mam sẽn maand ne m ba wã yʋʋrã kɩta mam kaseto.
La yãmb ka tẽed ye, tɩ bõe, yãmb ka mam piis ye.
Mam piisã wʋmda mam koɛɛga. Mam mi-b lame, la b pʋgda maam.
Mam kõt-b-la vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa. B kõn tol n sãam ye, la ned baa a yen kõn yiis-b mam nugẽ ye.
Mam ba sẽn kõ-a maam piisã yɩɩda fãa, la ned baa a yen ka tõe n yiis-b m baaba nugẽ ye.
Maam ne m ba, tõnd yaa yembre.
Zuif-rãmbã leb n wʋka kug n na n lob a Zezi.
A Zezi leb n goma ne bãmb n yeele: Mam wilga yãmb tʋʋm sõamy wʋsg sẽn yit m ba nengẽ tɩ y yãnde. Tʋʋm-sõng bʋg poorẽ la yãmb dat n lob maam kugã?
Zuif-rãmbã leoka bãmb n yeele: Ka tʋʋm-sõng yĩng la tõnd dat n lob yãmb kug ye, yaa Wẽnnaam tʋʋsg yĩnga. Sẽn paase, yãmb sẽn ya ninsaalã, yãmb geenda y meng wa Wẽnnaam.
A Zezi leoka bãmb yaa: B ka gʋls yãmb tõogã sebr pʋgẽ tɩ: "Mam yetame tɩ yãmb yaa wẽnnaam dãmb" sɩda?
Sã n yaa tɩ tõogã boola Wẽnnaam sẽn gom ne neb ninsã tɩ wẽnnaam dãmba (tõnd d miime tɩ ned ka tõe n sãam Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõngã ye),
yãmb yeta ned ning d ba wã sẽn welg toor la b tʋm-a wã t'a tʋʋsda Wẽnnaam, mam sẽn yeel tɩ m yaa Wẽnnaam bi-riblã yĩnga.
Mam sã n ka tʋmd m ba wã tʋʋmd bɩ y ra tẽ maam ye.
La mam sã n tʋmdame, baa yãmb sã n ka tẽed maam me, bɩ y tẽ tʋʋm-kãense, tɩ y tõe n bãng la y reeg tɩ d ba wã bee mam pʋgẽ, tɩ mam be bãmb pʋgẽ.
Nebã leb n baoome n na n yõk a Zezi, la a Zezi põsg-b lame.
A Zezi leb n leba Zʋrdẽ rʋʋndã, zĩig ning a Zã sẽn deng n lis nebã, la b paa be.
Neb wʋsg waa bãmb nengẽ n yetẽ: A Zã ka maan bõn-bãnd baa a yembr ye. La bũmb nins fãa a Zã sẽn togs ne rao-kãngã yellã yaa sɩda.
Neb wʋsg tẽe bãmb beene.
Dao a yembr n lʋɩ bãaga. A yʋʋr la a Lazaar, n be Betani. A Maari ne a ma-bi-poak a Mart dag n vɩɩ tẽn-kãnga.
Yaa Maari kãng n dag n kiig tɩdar kaam a Zezi zug la a yẽes bãmb nao ne a zoobdã. Yaa yẽ tão a Lazaar n lʋɩ ka-keemã.
Ma-bi-pogs a yiibã tʋmame tɩ b tɩ yeel a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, ad ned ning yãmb sẽn nongã bẽedame.
A Zezi sẽn wʋm woto, b yeelame tɩ bã-kãngã ka kũum bãag ye, yaa Wẽnnaam waoogr yĩnga, la tɩ Wẽnnaam bi-riblã me na n tũnuga rẽnda n paam waoogre.
La a Zezi yaool n dag n nonga a Mart ne a ma-bi-poakã, la a Lazaare.
A Zezi sẽn wʋm t'a Lazaar ka laafɩ, b kell n paa zĩig ning b sẽn dag n be wã rasem a yiib yɛsa.
Rẽ poore, b yeela b karen-biisã tɩ b wa tɩ b leb Zude.
Karen-biisã yeela a Zezi yaa: Karen-saamba, nindaarẽ ka bal la Zuif-rãmbã dag n dat n lob yãmb ne kuga, tɩ yãmb le lebd be?
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Yibeoog tɩ ta zaabr ka lɛɛr-dãmb piig la a yiibu? Ned sã n kẽnd wĩndga, a ka lagsd ye, bala, a nee dũni kãngã vẽenemã.
La ned sã n kẽnd yʋngo, a lagsdame, bala, vẽenem ka be yẽ pʋgẽ ye.
A Zezi sẽn gom a woto n sa, b yeela b karen-biisã yaa: Tõnd zoa a Lazaar gũsame, la mam na n kẽng n tɩ nek-a lame.
Karen-biisã yeela bãmb yaa: A sã n gũsame, rẽnda a na n paama a menga.
A Zezi dag n gomda a Lazaar kũumã yelle, la b karen-biisã dag n tẽedame tɩ yaa gõeem meng-menga.
Dẽ, a Zezi yeel-b-la vẽeneg yaa: A Lazaar maana kaalem.
La mam sũur nooma m sẽn ka zĩnd be wã yĩnga, tɩ yãmb tõe n tẽ. Wa-y tɩ d kẽng a nengẽ.
Dẽ, a Toma b sẽn boond tɩ Didim yeela karen-biis a taabã yaa: Wa-y tɩ d me tũ bãmb n tɩ naag n ki.
A Zezi sẽn na n ta wã, rẽ tɩ b sẽn mum a Lazaar yaa tɩ rab-naaslẽ.
Betani yaool n dag n pẽe ne Zeruzalɛm sẽn zems kɩlo a tãab bala.
Zuif-rãmb wʋsg waa a Maari ne a Mart nengẽ n na n bels-ba, b tão wã kũum yĩnga.
A Mart sẽn wʋm t'a Zezi watame, a yiime n seg bãmba, la a Maari paa yir n zĩẽ.
A Mart yeela a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, yãmb sã n dag n beẽ ka, mam tão wã dag n ka na n ki ye.
La baa ne moasã, mam miime tɩ Wẽnnaam na n kõo yãmb bũmb ning fãa yãmb sẽn na kos bãmba.
A Zezi yeel-a lame t'a tão wã na n vʋʋgame.
A Mart leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam miime t'a na n vʋʋga vʋʋgrã wakate, yaoolem daarã.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Yaa maam la vʋʋgrã soaba, la vɩɩm. Ned ning fãa sẽn tẽed maam na vɩɩmde, baa a sã n zoe n kiime.
La ned ning fãa sẽn vɩ n tẽed maam kõn tol n ki ye. Dẽ yĩnga, fo tẽeda yõwã?
A Mart yeela a Zezi yaa: N-ye, Zu-soaba, mam tẽedame tɩ yãmb yaa Kirist, Wẽnnaam bi-riblã, soab sẽn tog n wa-a dũni pʋgẽ wã.
A Mart sẽn gom woto n sa, a loogame. La a boola a ma-bi-poak a Maari n soos n yeel-a tɩ Karen-saamb waame la b boond-a lame.
A Maari sẽn wʋm a woto, a yika tao-tao n babs a Zezi,
bala, a Zezi dag n nan n ka kẽ tẽngã pʋgẽ ye, b rag n ket n bee zĩig ning a Mart sẽn seg bãmbã.
Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn dag n be yir n belsd a Maari wã sẽn yã t'a yika tao-tao n yi wã, b pʋg-a lame, n tẽed t'a kẽnda yaoogẽ wã n na n tɩ yãbe.
A Maari sẽn ta zĩig ning a Zezi sẽn be wã, n yãnd bãmba, a wõgemda bãmb taoor n yeel bãmba: Zu-soaba, yãmb sã n dag n zĩndẽ ka, mam tão wã dag n ka na n ki ye.
A Zezi sẽn yã t'a Maari yãbdame, la tɩ Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn tũ yẽ wã me yãbdame, bãmb yĩngã sidgame, la b sũurã bõdmame.
A Zezi sokame ya: Yãmb ning-a-la yɛ? La b leoka a Zezi n yeele: Zu-soaba, wa n ges-y-yã.
A Zezi yãbame.
Dẽ, Zuif-rãmbã yeelame yaa: Ges-y-yã a sẽn dag n nong-a to-to!
Bãmb neb kẽer yeelame yaa: Bãmb sẽn puk zoangã ninã, bãmb dag n ka tõe n maan tɩ rao-kãngã ka ki laa?
A Zezi yĩngã leb n sidgame, la b kẽnga yaoogẽ wã. Dag n yaa tãn-yokẽ, tɩ b bilim kugr n yẽd a noorã.
A Zezi yeelame tɩ b lak kugrã. Kiidã tão a Mart yeela a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, a zoe n lebga yũugu, bala, a kũumã rasem a naas la rũnna.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Mam ka yeel foom tɩ fo sã n tẽ, fo na n yãa Wẽnnaam ziir sɩda?
Dẽ, nebã laka kugrã, la a Zezi nak n gesa yĩngr n yeele: M ba, mam pʋʋsda yãmb barka, y sẽn leok mam kosgã yĩnga.
Mam yẽ miime tɩ yãmb leokda mam kosg wakat fãa, la yaa neb kʋʋngã sẽn be ka wã yĩng la mam gomda, tɩ b na tẽ tɩ yaa yãmb n tʋm maam.
A Zezi sẽn gom woto n sɛ, b goma ne pãng n yeele: Lazaar, wa yi ka!
La sẽn dag n ki-a wã yiime, la a nao wã ne a nusã vila ne pɛɛla, la a nengã dag n luda ne peende. A Zezi yeela nebã tɩ b lood a pɛɛlã, la b bas-a t'a looge.
Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn dag n wa a Maari nengẽ, n yã bũmb nins a Zezi sẽn maanã, wʋsg tẽe bãmba.
La neb kẽer kẽngame n tɩ yã Fariisẽ-dãmbã n togs-b bũmb ning a Zezi sẽn maanã.
Dẽ, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmba, la Faariisẽ-dãmbã tigsa kaorengã yɛl bʋ-bʋʋdbã n yeele: Tõnd na n maana a wãna? Rao wã maanda bõn-bãn wʋsgo.
Tõnd sã n bas-a t'a ket n maandẽ, nebã fãa na n tẽe-a lame, la Rome dãmbã na n waa n sãama tõnd wẽnd-doogã ne d soolmã.
Bãmb ned a yembre, a Kayif, sẽn dag n ya-a maan-kʋʋd kãsem yʋʋm kãngã yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb ka wʋmd yellã baa fɩ.
Yãmb ka ne tɩ ned a yen sã n ki nebã fãa yĩng tɩ soolmã tõr da sãam n são?
Mik ka ne a mengã yam la a gom a woto ye. A sẽn dag n ya maan-kʋʋd kãsem yʋʋm kãngã, a togsa bãngr gomd n wilg t'a Zezi tog n kii bãmb soolmã yĩnga.
La ka bãmb soolmã yĩng bal ye, la yaa sẽn na yɩlẽ me n tigim Wẽnnaam kambã sẽn sãeegã, tɩ b lebg yĩng a yembre.
Sẽn sɩng ne da-kãnga, Zuif-rãmbã yãka yam tɩ kʋ a Zezi.
Dẽ, a Zezi da ka leb n pukd b meng n kẽnd Zuif-rãmbã sʋk ye. La bãmb yii be n kẽng zĩig sẽn pẽ ne we-rasempʋɩɩgã, tẽng b sẽn boond tɩ Efrayim pʋgẽ. Bãmb zĩnda be ne b karen-biisã.
Zuif-rãmbã zʋʋg-n-bas kibsa dag n kolgame, la tẽngã neb wʋsg kẽnga Zeruzalɛm, sẽn deng kibsã, n na n tɩ yɩlg b mense.
B dag n baooda a Zezi la b yet taab wẽnd-doogẽ wã yaa: Yãmb tagsg yaa bõe ne b yellã? B na n kell n paame n ka wa kibsã?
Mik maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã dag n yeela nebã tɩ ned sã n bãng a Zezi zĩiga, bɩ a wa n wilg tɩ b tɩ yõk-ba.
Zʋʋg-n-basã kibs sẽn ket tɩ rasem a yoobe, a Zezi waa Betani, tẽng ning a Lazaar bãmb sẽn vʋʋg-a t'a yi n bas kũumã sẽn be wã.
La b segla rɩɩb be bãmb yĩnga. A Mart dag n pʋɩta rɩɩbã, la a Lazaar dag n naaga ne neb nins sẽn zĩ ne a Zezi n dɩtẽ wã.
A Maari dɩka tɩdar sẽn maan ne naar halaale, n tat litr pʋɩ-sʋka, t'a ligd ya wʋsgo, n waal a Zezi nao wã, n yẽes-b ne a zoobdo. La doogã fãa lebga tɩdarã yũugu.
A Zezi karen-biig a yembre, a Zudas Iskaryo, soab ning sẽn na n zãmb-a bãmbã yeelame yaa:
Bõe tɩ b ka koos tɩdarã deniye kobs-tã n kõ naong rãmba?
A sẽn gom woto wã, ka t'a kʋmda naong rãmbã ye. Yaa t'a dag n yaa wagdre, la yẽ sẽn zãad ligdã korgã, b sã n ning bũmb be fãa, a vaagd-a lame.
La a Zezi yeelame yaa: Bas-y pagã t'a bĩng tɩdar-kãngã mam mumb yĩnga.
Naong rãmbã bee ne yãmb wakat fãa, la yãmb kõn paam tɩ mam be ne yãmb wakat fãa ye.
Zuif-rãmbã wʋsg wʋmame t'a Zezi bee Betani, la neb kʋʋng waa be. B sẽn wa wã, ka a Zezi yĩng bal ye, la yaa tɩ yã a Lazaar a Zezi sẽn vʋʋg t'a yi kũum sʋkã.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb yẽsa ne taab n na n kell n kʋ a Lazaar me,
bala, Zuif-rãmbã wʋsg basda bãmba n tẽed a Zezi, a Lazaar yĩnga.
Vẽkembeoogo, neb kʋʋng wʋsgã sẽn wa Zeruzalɛm kibsã yĩngã wʋmame t'a Zezi kẽeda Zeruzalɛm.
B kaoo koms vãad n yi n seg bãmba, n kelemdẽ n yetẽ tɩ: Hozaana, bark bee ned ning sẽn wat ne Zu-soabã yʋʋre, Israyɛll Rĩmã zugu.
A Zezi yãa bõn-bila, n zomb-a wa b sẽn gʋlsã. B gʋlsame n yeele:
Siyõ neba, da maan-y rabeem ye. Ad yãmb Rĩma zomba bõan-bil n watẽ.
Bãmb karen-biisã ka wʋm ada võor sɩngrẽ wã ye. La a Zezi sẽn wa n paam waoogrã, karen-biisã yaool n tẽegame tɩ b dag n gʋlsa yel-kãens yell a Zezi wɛɛngẽ, la tɩ nebã pidsa sẽn gʋlsã.
Neb kʋʋngã sẽn dag n be ne a Zezi wakat ning bãmb sẽn bool a Lazaar yaoogẽ wã, n vʋʋg-a t'a yi kũumẽ wã kɩsa a Zezi kaseto.
Rẽ n kɩt tɩ nebã yi n seg bãmbã, bala, b wʋmame t'a Zezi maana bõn-bãn kãnga.
Dẽ, Fariisẽ-dãmbã yeela taab yaa: Yãmb neeme tɩ y ka tõogd baa bilf ye. Nebã fãa pʋgda bãmba.
Gɛrk-rãmb n dag n be neb nins sẽn wa Zeruzalɛm n na n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam kibsã wakatã sʋka.
Bãmb kolga Galile Betsayida ned a Filip n kos-a n yeele: Kãsma, tõnd dat n yãa a Zezi.
A Filip kẽngame n tɩ togs a Ãndre, la bãmb b yiibã kẽngame n tɩ togs a Zezi.
A Zezi leoka bãmb a woto: Wakat taame tɩ ninsaal Bi-riblã tog n paam waoogre.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ka-buug sã n ka kẽ tãndẽ n pa be n ki, a paada a yembre. La a sã n ki, a womda biis wʋsgo.
Ned ning sẽn nong a vɩɩm menesd-a lame. La ned ning sẽn na kisg a vɩɩm dũni kãngã pʋgẽ, a na n bĩng-a lame wakat sẽn kõn sa wã yĩnga.
Ned sã n dat n tʋm mam yĩnga, a tog n tũu maam. La mam sẽn be zĩig ninga, mam tʋmtʋmd me na n bee be. Ned sã n tʋmd mam yĩnga, m ba na n waooga a soaba.
Moas-moasã wã, sũ-bõdem n tar maam. La mam na n yeelame tɩ bõe? Mam na n kosa m ba tɩ b kɩt tɩ m põs to-kãngã? La hal tɩ ta moasã, yaa rẽnda yĩng la mam wa-yã.
M ba, waoog-y y yʋʋrã! Dẽ, koɛɛg zĩnda yĩngr n yeele: Mam waooga m yʋʋrã, la m na n le waoog-a lame yɛsa.
Neb kʋʋngã sẽn dag n yas be, n wʋm koɛɛgã dag n yetame tɩ yaa sa-tãsga. Neb a taab dag n yetame tɩ malɛk n gom ne a Zezi.
A Zezi leb n gomame n yeele: Ka mam yĩng la koɛɛgã sẽn gom tɩ yãmb wʋmã ye, yaa yãmb yĩnga.
Moasã yaa dũni kãngã bʋʋd wakate. Moasã, b na n yiisa dũni kãngã naabã n bas yɩnga.
La b sã n wa n zẽk maam tɩ m bas tẽn-gãongã, mam na n taka nebã fãa tɩ b wa m nengẽ.
A Zezi goma a woto n na n wilg kũum ninga buud bãmb sẽn na n ki wã.
Kʋʋngã leoka bãmb n yeele: A Moyiis tõogã wilga tõnd tɩ Kiristã paada wakat sẽn kõn sa. Bõe tɩ yãmb yetẽ tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ b zẽk Ninsaal Bi-ribla? Ninsaal Bi-ribl kãng yaa ãnna?

A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Vẽenemã ket n bee yãmb sʋk wakat bilf yĩnga. Yãmb sẽn tar vẽenemã wakate, bɩ y kẽne, tɩ lik bida da wa n ling yãmb ye. Sẽn kẽnd-a lik bida pʋgẽ ka mi a sẽn dabdẽ ye.
Wakat ning yãmb sẽn tar vẽenemã, bɩ y tẽ-a, tɩ y na lebg vẽenem kamba. A Zezi yeela rẽnda, la b loog n zãag ne nebã n tɩ soonde.
Baa ne a Zezi sẽn maan bõn-bãn wʋsg a woto nebã taoorã, b ka tẽ bãmb ye,
tɩ gomd ning Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sẽn yeelã pidi. A yeelame yaa: Zu-soaba, ãnna n tẽ koɛɛg ning tõnd sẽn moonã? La Zu-soabã pãng puka ne ãnna?
Sẽn paase, b ka tõe n tẽ ye, tɩ bõe, a Ezayi leb n yeela a woto:
Wẽnnaam luda b ninã, la b keng b sũyã, tɩ b da wa n yã ne b ninã, tɩ b da tags n wʋm a võore, la tɩ b da wa n tek yam, tɩ mam maag-b ye.
Yaa woto la a Ezayi gom wakat ning a sẽn yãnd a Zezi ziirã n gom bãmb yellã.
Baoosgo, baa nanamsã sʋka, wʋsg tẽe a Zezi, la Fariisẽ-dãmbã yĩnga, b ka sak n togs tɩ b tẽedame ye, tɩ b da wa n dig-b n yiis karen-doogẽ wã ye.
Bala, b dag n nonga ninsaalbã waoogr n yɩɩd Wẽnnaam sẽn na n waoog bãmbã.
A Zezi zẽka b koɛɛg n yeele: Sẽn tẽed-a maam ka tẽed maam ye, yaa sẽn tʋm-a maamã la a tẽeda,
la sẽn yãt-a maam yãta sẽn tʋm-a maamã.
Mam sẽn ya vẽenemã, mam waa dũni pʋgẽ, tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn tẽed maam kõn pa lik pʋgẽ ye.
