Ned sã n wʋm mam goamã n ka reege, ka maam n bʋʋd a soabã bʋʋd ye: Bala, mam sẽn wa wã, ka tɩ bʋ dũni nebã bʋʋd ye, la yaa tɩ fãag-ba.
Sẽn tõdg-a maam la a ka reegd mam goamã, a tara a bʋ-kaooda: goam nins mam sẽn goma n na n kao yẽ bʋʋd yaoolem daare.
Bala, mam goamã ka yit mam nengẽ ye. La m ba, sẽn tʋm-a maamã, bãmb b toor n wilg maam m sẽn tog n yeel la m gome.
La mam miime tɩ bãmb noorã yaa vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa. Woto, bũmb nins mam sẽn gomdã, yaa wa m ba sẽn yeel maamã.

Sẽn deng zʋʋg-n-basã kibsã, a Zezi sẽn mi tɩ bãmb wakat taame tɩ yi dũni kãngã n kẽng b ba nengẽ wã, bãmb nonga b nebã sẽn dag n be dũni pʋgẽ tɩ bãmb nongẽ wã, hal ne nonglem tɛkẽ.
Rɩɩbã wakate, rẽ tɩ Sʋtãanã dag n ninga a Sɩmo biig a Zudas sũurẽ t'a zãmb a Zezi n yõk n kõ.
A Zezi sẽn mi tɩ b ba wã ninga bũmb fãa bãmb nugẽ, la b mi tɩ bãmb yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ n wa, la tɩ b le lebda beene wã,
b yik n basa rɩɩbã, n yees b futã, la b rɩk peend n sẽbg b sɛɛga.
Rẽ poore, b pʋdga koom laagẽ, n sɩng n waasd b karen-biisã nao la b yẽesd-b ne peendã sẽn sẽbg bãmb sɛɛgã.
Bãmb taa a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr, la a yeela bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, yãmb n na n waas mam nao wã?
A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Fo ka wʋmd mam sẽn maandã võor moasã ye, la sã n yɩ bilfu, f na yaool n wʋme.
A Pɩyɛɛr yeela a Zezi yaa: Ayo! Yãmb kõn waas mam nao abada! A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Mam sã n ka waas foom, fo kõn le paam baa fɩ mam nengẽ ye.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr yeela bãmb yaa: Ka mam nao wã bal la y na n waas ye, yaa ne m nusã la m zugã me.
A Zezi yeela a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Sẽn so-a koom ka le baood soobo, sã n ka nao wã waoosg bal ye. Bala, a yĩngã tõr yaa yolgemde. Yãmb yaa yoalgema, la ka yãmb fãa ye.
Sɩd me, bãmb dag n mii ned ning sẽn na n zãmb-a bãmbã. Dẽnda n kɩt tɩ bãmb yeel tɩ ka karen-biisã fãa n ya yoalgem ye.
A Zezi sẽn waas b karen-biisã nao n sa, la b lebs n yeelg b futã, b leb n zĩnda rɩɩbẽ wã n yeel b karen-biisã yaa: Yãmb wʋma mam sẽn maan yãmbã võore?
Yãmb boonda maam tɩ karen-saamba la Zu-soaba, la yãmb sẽn yetã zemsame, bala, mam sɩd yaa a boto.
Dẽ, mam sẽn ya Zu-soab la Karen-saambã sa n waasa yãmb nao wã, yãmb me tog n waasa taab nao wã.
Bala, yaa mamsg la mam kõ yãmba, tɩ yãmb me na maan wa mam sẽn maan yãmbã.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ tʋmtʋmd ka yɩɩd a zu-soab ye, la tẽn-tʋmd me ka yɩɩd sẽn tʋm-a yẽ wã ye.
Yãmb sã n mi rẽnda, yãmb yaa sũ-noog rãmba, yãmb sã n maand a woto.

Ka yãmb fãa yell la mam sẽn gomdã ye. Mam mii neb nins mam sẽn tũusã. La yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bũmb ning sẽn gʋls Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã pʋgẽ wã pidsi. B yeela be tɩ: "Ned ning sẽn wãbd-a bur ne maamã wẽneg n zabda ne maam."
Mam pĩnd n togsa yãmb moasã, sẽn deng a pidsgu, t'a sã n wa n pidsi, bɩ yãmb tẽ tɩ mam yaa m sẽn ya.
Mam yeta yãmb sɩd-sɩd tɩ ned sã n deeg mam sẽn tʋm a soaba, a reega maam, la sẽn deeg-a maam deega sẽn tʋm-a maamã.
A Zezi sẽn gom woto n sa, sũ-sãoong yõka bãmba, la b yeelame yaa: Sɩd-sɩda, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb ned a yembr n na n yõk maam n kõ.
Bãmb karen-biisã dag n geta taab n sokd a Zezi sẽn gomd ned ningã yelle.
A Zezi karen-biig a yembre, soab ning bãmb sẽn dag n nongã dag n kɩɩ kãntɩɩg rɩɩbã zĩigẽ n yegl a Zezi.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr kamsa yẽnda n yeel-a t'a sok a Zezi tɩ yaa ãnna yell la bãmb sẽn gomdã.
Karen-bi-kãng kɩlla a Zezi yãoogẽ n yeel-b yaa: Zu-soaba, yaa ãnna?
A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Yaa ned ning mam sẽn na n suk bur-gɩrg n kõ-a wã. Bãmb suka bur-gɩrgã n kõ Iskaryo Sɩmo biig a Zudas.
A Zudas sẽn deeg burã bal la Sʋtãanã sẽn kẽ yẽnda. A Zezi yeel-a lame: Fo sẽn na n maan bũmb ningã, maan-a tao-tao.
La neb nins sẽn dag n zĩ be n dɩtẽ wa, baa a yen ka wʋm a Zezi sẽn yeel a Zudas woto wã võor ye.
Sɩd me, sẽn dag n ya a Zudas n zãad bãmb ligdã, kẽer tagsame t'a Zezi yet-a lame t'a ra bũmb nins bãmb sẽn tog n paam kibsã yĩnga, wall t'a kõ naong rãmbã bũmbu.
A Zudas deega bur-gɩrgã n kell n yik n yi. Dag n yaa yʋngo.
A Zudas sẽn yi, a Zezi yeelame yaa: Ninsaal bi-riblã paama waoogr moasã, la Wẽnnaam paama waoogr bãmb pʋgẽ.
Wẽnnaam sã n paam waoogr bãmb pʋgẽ, Wẽnnaam me na n waooga bãmb b mengã pʋgẽ, la keta bilf bal tɩ b waoog-ba.

M kom-bõonego, mam sẽn ket n be ne yãmbã, yaa wakat bilf bal yĩnga. Yãmb na n baoo maam, la a wa mam sẽn dag n yeel Zuif-rãmbã tɩ bãmb ka na n tõog n wa mam sẽn dabdẽ wã, mam yeta yãmb woto me moasã.
Mam kõta yãmb tõ-paalga: Nong-y taaba. Nong-y taab me wa mam sẽn nong yãmbã.
Yãmb sã n tall nonglem taab yĩnga, nebã fãa na bãng tɩ yãmb yaa mam karen-biisi.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr yeela bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, yãmb dabda yɛ? A Zezi leokame n yeele: Fo ka tõe n pʋgl maam n kẽng m sẽn dabdẽ wã moasã ye, la kaoosg pʋgẽ, fo na pʋgl n wa.
A Pɩyɛɛr yeela bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, bõe yĩng tɩ mam ka tõe n pʋgl yãmb moasã? Mam na n saka kũum yãmb yĩnga.
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Fo na n saka kũum mam yĩnga. Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta foom tɩ no-raoog kõn kelem tɩ fo ka kɩɩs naoor a tãab tɩ f ka mi maam ye.
Da sak-y tɩ y sũyã sãam ye. Tẽ-y Wẽnnaam, la y tẽ maam me.
Zĩnd-zĩis yaa wʋsg m ba wã yiri, sã kaẽ dẽ, mam dag n na n yeela yãmba. Bala, mam dabdame n na n tɩ segl zĩig yãmb yĩnga.
Dẽ, mam sã n kẽng n tɩ segl zĩig yãmb yĩnga, mam na n lebg n waa n peega yãmba, tɩ yãmb na be ne maam zĩig ning mam sẽn na n zĩndã.
Yãmb mii mam sẽn dabd zĩig ningã sore.
A Toma yeela bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, tõnd ka mi yãmb sẽn dabdẽ ye. Dẽ, tõnd na n yɩɩ a wãn n bãng a sore?
A Zezi yeela yẽ yaa: Maam la sore, la sɩda, la vɩɩm. Ned baa a yen ka tõe n wa m baaba nengẽ tɩ ka tũ ne maam ye.
Yãmb sã n dag n miẽ maam, yãmb dag n na miẽ m baaba me. La sẽn sɩng ne moasã, yãmb mii bãmba, la yãmb yãa bãmba.
A Filip yeela bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, wilg-y tõnd y ba wã, la rẽ na sek tõndo.
A Zezi yeela yẽ yaa: Filip, mam sẽn be ne yãmb kaoosa wʋsgo, tɩ fo ket n nan ka bãng maam? Sẽn yã-a maam yãnda m baaba. Yɩta a wãn tɩ fo yet maam tɩ m wilg yãmb m baaba?
Fo ka tẽed tɩ mam bee m ba wã pʋgẽ, tɩ m ba wã be mam pʋgẽ laa? Goam nins mam sẽn gomd ne yãmbã ka yit mam meng nengẽ ye. M ba sẽn be mam pʋgẽ wã n maand b tʋʋma.
Mam sẽn yet tɩ mam bee m ba pʋgẽ, tɩ m ba wã be mam pʋgẽ wã, tẽ-y rẽnda, wall n tẽ maam tʋʋm kãsems kãensã yĩnga.
Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta yãmb tɩ ned ning sẽn tẽed maam me na n tʋma tʋʋm nins mam sẽn tʋmdã, la a na n tʋma tʋʋm kãsems n yɩɩda, tɩ bõe, mam dabda m ba nengẽ,
la bũmb nins fãa yãmb sẽn na kos ne mam yʋʋre, mam na n maan-b lame, tɩ m ba wã paam ziir b biigã pʋgẽ.
Yãmb sã n kos maam bũmbu, mam na maane.
Yãmb sã n nong maam, y na n saka mam tõodã,
la maam, mam na n bõosa m baaba, la b na n kõo yãmb sõangd a to tɩ b pa ne yãmb wakat sẽn kõn sa.
Sõangd kãng yaa sɩd Sɩɩg dũni sẽn ka tõe n deege, a sẽn ka ne bãmba la a ka mi-bã yĩnga. La yãmba, yãmb mii bãmba, bala, b bee ne yãmba, la b na n zĩnda yãmb pʋsẽ.
Mam ka na n bas yãmb kɩɩbd ye, mam na n waa yãmb nengẽ.
Bilf bal sã n paase, dũni kõn leb n yã maam ye. La yãmb yẽ na yã maam. Bala, mam vɩɩme, la yãmb me na n vɩɩme.
Badaare, yãmb na bãng tɩ mam bee m ba pʋgẽ, tɩ yãmb be mam pʋgẽ, tɩ mam be yãmb pʋsẽ.
Ned ning sẽn talld-a mam tõodã n sakd-ba, yaa yẽ soab n nong maam. M ba na n nonga ned ning sẽn nong-a maam, la mam me na n nong-a lame, la m na n puka m meng ne-a.
A Zuud, sẽn ka a Iskaryo yeela bãmb yaa: Zu-soaba, yɩta a wãn tɩ yaa ne tõnd la yãmb tog n puk y menga, la ka ne dũni wã?
A Zezi leoka yẽ yaa: Ned sã n nong maam, a na n saka mam gomde, la m baaba na n nonga a soaba. Tõnd na n waa yẽ nengẽ, n zĩnd yẽ pʋgẽ.
Ned ning sẽn ka nong-a maam ka sakd mam goam ye. La gomd ning yãmb sẽn wʋmdã ka mam gomd ye, la yaa m ba, sẽn tʋm-a maamã gomde.
Mam goma ne yãmb bõn-kãng yelle, mam sẽn ket n be ne yãmb wakate.
La sõangdã, Sɩɩg-sõngã m ba sẽn na n tʋm ne mam yʋʋrã, yaa bãmb n na n zãms yãmb bũmb fãa, la b tẽeg yãmb bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn yeel yãmbã.
Mam basda laafɩ ne yãmba. Mam kõta yãmb m laafɩ. Mam ka kõt yãmb wa dũni wã sẽn kõtã ye. Bɩ y ra maan yɩɩr wall y yɛɛs ye.

Yãmb wʋma mam sẽn yeel yãmb tɩ m na n loogame la m na n lebg n waa yãmb nengẽ wã. Yãmb sã n da nongẽ maam, y dag n na maanẽ sũ-noogo, mam sẽn dabd m ba nengẽ wã yĩnga. Bala, m baaba yɩɩda maam.
Mam togsa yãmb bõn-kãens tɩ b nan ka ta ye, tɩ b sã n wa n pidsi, bɩ y tẽ.
Mam ka na n tol n leb n gom ne yãmb yɛs ye, bala, dũni naabã watame. A baa fɩ ka be mam pʋgẽ ye.
La yaa tɩ dũni na bãng tɩ mam nonga m ba, la tɩ mam maanda wa m ba sẽn yeel maamã. Yik-y tɩ d loog ka.
Mam yaa nasaar sib tɩɩg sɛɛg meng-menga, la m baaba yaa nasaar sib pʋ-koaada.
Will ning fãa sẽn tão mam zug n yaool n ka womd biisi, m baaba kʋrgd-a lame. La b na n yosa will ning fãa sẽn womd biisi, t'a tõe n wom n paase.
B zoe n yosa yãmba, gomd ning mam sẽn togs yãmbã yĩnga.

Pa-y mam pʋgẽ, wa mam sẽn paad yãmb pʋsẽ wã. A wa nasaar sib tɩɩg will sẽn ka tõe n wom biis a toore, a sã n ka kell n tong ne tɩɩgã sɛɛgã, woto me, yãmb ka tõe n wom biisi, y sã n ka pa mam pʋgẽ ye.
Maam la nasaar sib tɩɩgã sɛɛga, tɩ yãmb ya wilã. Ned ning sẽn paad mam pʋgẽ, tɩ mam paad a soab pʋgẽ womda biis wʋsgo. Bala, sã n ka ne maam, yãmb ka tõe n maan baa fɩ ye.
Ned sã n ka paad mam pʋgẽ, b na n lob-a-la yɩng wa nasaar sib tɩɩg willã, la a na n kʋɩɩme. La b wʋkda wilã n tugund bugum, la bugmã rɩt-b lame.
Yãmb sã n pa mam pʋgẽ, tɩ mam goamã pa yãmb pʋgẽ, bɩ y kos bũmb ning fãa y sẽn data, la b na kõ yãmba.
Yãmb sã n wom biis wʋsgo, m baaba na n paama waoogre, la yãmb na n yɩɩ mam karen-biisi. Nasaar sib ne a tɩɩga (15.1)
Mam me nonga yãmb wa m ba sẽn nong maamã. Pa-y mam nonglemã pʋgẽ.
Yãmb sã n tall mam tõodã, yãmb na n paa mam nonglemã pʋgẽ, wa mam me sẽn tall m baaba tõod n be bãmb nonglem pʋgẽ wã.
Mam goma ne yãmb a woto, tɩ mam sũ-noogã na zĩnd yãmb pʋgẽ, la tɩ y sũ-noogã na pidi.
Ad mam tõogo: Nong-y taab wa mam sẽn nong yãmbã.
Nonglem ka be ninsaal yĩnga, n yɩɩd tɩ kõ f vɩɩm f zo-rãmb yĩng ye.
Yãmb sã n maan bũmb nins mam sẽn yet yãmbã, yãmb yaa mam zo-rãmba.
Mam ka boond yãmb tɩ tʋmtʋmdb ye, tɩ bõe, tʋmtʋmd ka mi a zu-soab sẽn maand ye. Mam boola yãmb tɩ m zo-rãmba, tɩ bõe, mam kɩtame tɩ yãmb bãng bũmb nins fãa m ba sẽn togs maamã.

Ka yãmb n yãk maam ye, yaa maam n yãk yãmba, n ning m tʋʋmd yãmb zutu, tɩ yãmb na kẽng n wom biisi, la tɩ yãmb biisã na pa wakat fãa. Woto, bũmb ning fãa yãmb sẽn na kos m baaba ne mam yʋʋre, b na kõ yãmba.
Bũmb ning mam sẽn yet yãmb tɩ y maane, yaa tɩ y nong taaba.
Dũni neb sã n kis yãmba, bãng-y tɩ b reng n kisga maam.
Yãmb sã n dag n ya dũni rẽnda, dũni neb dag n na nong bũmb nins dũni sẽn so. La yãmb sẽn ka dũni rẽnda, n paas mam sẽn tũus yãmb n yiis dũni neb sʋkã yĩnga, dũni rãmb kisa yãmba.
Tẽeg-y gomd ning mam sẽn yeel yãmbã. Mam yeela yãmb tɩ tʋmtʋmd ka yɩɩd a zu-soab ye. B sã n namsa maam, b na n namsa yãmb me. B sã n deega mam goama, b na n deega yãmb goam me.
La b na n maana yãmb bõn-kãensã fãa mam yʋʋrã yĩnga, tɩ bõe, b ka mi sẽn tʋm-a maamã ye.
Mam sã n dag n ka waẽ, la m dag n ka gomẽ ne-ba, beegr dag n kõn zĩnd b zut ye. La moasã, b ka tar padeng sẽn na n padem b yel-wẽnã yĩng ye.
Sẽn kis-a maam kisa m baaba me.
Mam sã n dag n ka maanẽ tʋʋm nins ned baa a yen sẽn nan ka maan bãmb sʋkã, beegr dag n kõn zĩnd b zut ye. Moasã, b yãa mam tʋʋmã, la b kisga maam ne m ba wã fãa.
La beemã kẽeme, tɩ bũmb ning sẽn gʋls bãmb tõogã pʋgẽ wã pidsi. A yeela be yaa: "Bãmb kisga maam zaalem bala."
Sõangdã mam sẽn na n deeg m ba nengẽ n tʋm yãmbã, sɩd Sɩɩgã sẽn yit m ba pʋgẽ wã sã n wa, b na n kɩsa mam kaseto,
la yãmb me na n kɩsa mam kaseto, yãmb sẽn be ne maam hal sɩngr wẽndẽ wã yĩnga.
Mam goma ne yãmb a woto tɩ bũmb da wa kɩt tɩ yãmb lʋɩ ye.
B na n diga yãmb n yiis karen-dotẽ wã, la wakat pʋs n watame tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn na n kʋ-a yãmb na tẽ tɩ yẽ maanda Wẽnnaam tʋʋmde.
B na n maana a woto, tɩ bõe, b ka bãng m baaba, wall maam ye.
Mam goma ne yãmb a woto, tɩ wakat sã n wa ta, bɩ yãmb tẽeg tɩ mam dag n yeela yãmba. Mam ka yeel yãmb ada hal sɩngrẽ ye, tɩ bõe, mam dag n bee ne yãmba.
Moasã, mam lebda sẽn tʋm-a maamã nengẽ, la yãmb ned baa a yen ka sokd maam tɩ mam dabda yɛɛne ye.
La mam sẽn gom ne yãmb bõn-kãng yellã yĩnga, sũ-sãoong n pid yãmba.
Baoosgo, mam yeta yãmb sɩd tɩ mam loogr n são yãmb yĩnga. Bala, mam sã n ka kẽnge, sõangdã ka na n wa yãmb nengẽ ye. La mam sã n kẽnge, mam na n tʋm-b lame n kõ-yã.
La b sã n wa, b na n kɩtame tɩ dũni neb sak n deeg yel-wẽnã yelle, la tɩrlem yelle, la bʋʋd yelle.
B na n sak n deega yel-wẽnã yellã, tɩ bõe, b ka tẽed maam ye.
B na n deega tɩrlmã yellã, tɩ bõe, mam dabda m baaba nengẽ, la tɩ yãmb ka na n leb n yã maam yɛs ye.
B na n deega bʋʋdã yellã, tɩ bõe, dũni-kãngã naabã bʋʋd kaoome.
Bũmb wʋsg la mam ket n tar n na n togs yãmba, la yãmb ka tõe n wʋm-b moasã ye.
La sɩd Sɩɩgã sã n wa, b na n tɛɛ yãmb sɩdã fãa pʋgẽ. Bala, b ka na n gom b sẽn dat ye, b na n togsa yãmb bũmb nins b sẽn wʋme, la b na n togsa yãmb bũmb sẽn be taoor n watẽ.
Bãmb na n waooga maam, tɩ bõe, b na n dɩka bũmb nins sẽn ya mam deng n togs yãmba.
M ba sẽn tar fãa yaa maam n so. Dẽ n kɩt tɩ mam yeel tɩ sɩd Sɩɩgã na n dɩka bũmb nins sẽn ya mam dend n togs yãmbã.
Sã n yɩ bilfu, yãmb ka na n leb n yã maam ye, la sã n leb n yɩ bilf n paase, yãmb na n le yãa maam, tɩ bõe, mam dabda m ba nengẽ.

Dẽ, bãmb karen-biisã yeela taab yaa: Bãmb sẽn yeel tɩ sã n yɩ bilfu tõnd ka na n leb n yã bãmba, la sã n leb n yɩ bilf n paase tõnd na n leb n yãa bãmbã, n leb n yeel tɩ b dabda b ba nengẽ wã, a võorã yaa bõe?
Dẽ, karen-biisã yeelame yaa: Bõe gomd la b sẽn gomdã? "Sã n yɩ bilfu?" Tõnd ka mi b sẽn gomd bũmb ning yell ye.

A Zezi sẽn dag n mi tɩ b karen-biisã na n soka bãmbã, b yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb sogsda taab ne mam sẽn yeel tɩ bilf sã n paase yãmb ka na leb n yã maam ye, la sã n leb n yɩ bilf n paase, yãmb na n leb n yãa maamã.
Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta yãmb tɩ yãmb na n yãbame n wiisi, la dũni neb sũy na n yɩɩ noogo. Yãmb na n yãa sũ-sãoongo, la yãmb sũ-sãoongã na n tekame n lebg sũ-noogo.
Pag rogem sã n ta, sũ-sãams n tar-a, tɩ bõe, a wakatã taame. La a sã n dog biigã n sa, a ka leb n tẽr a toogã ye, a sũur sẽn noom ne ned sẽn dogã yĩngã.
Moasã, yãmb tara sũ-sãamse, la mam na n leb n yãa yãmba, y sũyã na n yɩɩ noodo, la ned baa a yen kõn yiis yãmb sũ-noogã ye.
Da-kãng daare, yãmb kõn leb n sok maam bũmb baa a yembr yell ye. Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta yãmb tɩ bũmb ning yãmb sẽn na n kos m baaba, b na n kõo yãmb mam yʋʋrã yĩnga.
Hal tɩ ta moasã, yãmb nan ka kos bũmb ne mam yʋʋr ye. Kos-y tɩ y na n deegame, tɩ y sũ-noogã tõe n pid zãnga.
Mam goma ne yãmb a woto ne yel-bũna. Wakat n wat tɩ mam ka na n leb n gom ne yãmb ne yel-bũn ye, la mam na n togsa yãmb m ba wã yell vẽenega.
Badaare, yãmb na n kosa ne mam yʋʋre, la mam ka yet tɩ m na n bõosa m ba yãmb yĩng ye.
Bala, m ba wã meng nonga yãmba, tɩ bõe, yãmb nonga maam, la y tẽeme tɩ mam yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
Mam yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ n wa dũni pʋgẽ. Moasã, mam yita dũni wã, la mam dabda m ba nengẽ.
Bãmb karen-biisã yeela bãmb yaa: Ges-y-yã, yãmb gomda ne tõnd vẽeneg moasã, n ka leb n gomd baa fɩ yell ne yel-bũn ye.
Moasã, tõnd miime tɩ yãmb mii bũmb fãa, la tɩ yãmb ka baood tɩ ned sok yãmb ye. Yaa rẽnda yĩng la tõnd sẽn tẽed tɩ yãmb yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã.
A Zezi leoka bãmb n yeele: Yãmb tẽeda moasã...?
Ad wakat n wate, la a zoe n waame, tɩ b na n sãeeg yãmb fãa yembr-yembre, la yãmb na n basa maam m yembre. La mam ka m yembr ye, bala, m baaba bee ne maam.
Mam goma ne yãmb a woto tɩ yãmb tõe n paam sũur laafɩ mam pʋgẽ. Yãmb na n paama namsg dũni pʋgẽ. La bɩ y keng y sũyã, tɩ mam tõoga dũni wã.
A Zezi sẽn gom woto n sɛ, bãmb nak n gesa yĩngr n yeele: M ba, wakat taame. Waoog-y y bi-riblã, tɩ yẽ me na waoog yãmb
wa sẽn zems noor ning yãmb sẽn kõ-a ne Ninsaal buud fãa, t'a tõe n kõ neb nins fãa yãmb sẽn kõ yẽ wã vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
La vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã yaa tɩ nebã na bãng yãmb sẽn ya y yen, n ya sɩd Wẽnnaamã, la b bãng a Zezi Kirist, yãmb sẽn tʋm a soabã.
Mam kɩtame tɩ yãmb paam waoogr tẽng zugu. Mam sɛɛsa tʋʋmd ning yãmb sẽn kõ maam tɩ m maanã.
Dẽ, moasã, m ba, waoog-y maam y meng nengẽ ne ziir ning mam sẽn dag n tar yãmb nengẽ sẽn deng dũni belmã.
Mam puka yãmb yʋʋrã neb nins yãmb sẽn yiis dũni pʋgẽ n kõ maamã sʋka. Yãmb n dag n so-ba, la yãmb kõ-b-la maam, la b reega yãmb goamã.
Moasã, b bãngame tɩ bũmb nins fãa yãmb sẽn kõ maamã yita yãmb nengẽ.
Bala, mam togs-b-la goam nins yãmb sẽn kõ maamã. B reega goamã, la b bãnga sɩd-sɩd tɩ mam yii yãmb nengẽ, la b tẽeme tɩ yãmb n tʋm maam.
Yaa bãmb yĩng la mam sẽn pʋʋsdã. Mam ka pʋʋsd dũni nebã yĩng ye, yaa neb nins yãmb sẽn kõ maamã yĩnga, tɩ bõe, bãmb yaa yãmb neba
la tɩ bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn so yaa yãmb n so, la yãmb sẽn so yaa maam n so. La mam paamda waoogr bãmb pʋgẽ.

Mam ka leb n be dũni kãngã pʋgẽ ye, la bãmb ket n bee a pʋgẽ, tɩ mam wat yãmb nengẽ. M ba sẽn ya sõmblem soaba, tall-y-b yãmb yʋʋrã yĩnga, yʋʋr ning yãmb sẽn kõ maamã, tɩ bãmb na lebg yembr wa tõnd sẽn ya yembrã.

Mam sẽn dag n be ne bãmbã wakate, mam dag n gũuda neb nins yãmb sẽn kõ maamã ne yãmb yʋʋre. Mam kogl-b lame tɩ ned baa a yembr ka menem ye, sã n ka sẽn da tog n sãam-a wã, tɩ yãmb gʋls-sõamyã paam pidsgã.
Moasã, mam wata yãmb nengẽ, la mam gomda a woto dũni pʋgẽ, tɩ nebã na paam mam sũ-noog sẽn zems zãngã.
Mam kõo bãmb yãmb goamã, la dũni neb kisga bãmba, tɩ bõe, bãmb ka dũni neb wa mam me sẽn ka dũni nedã.
Mam ka kot yãmb tɩ y yiis-b dũni ye, la yaa tɩ yãmb na gũ-b ne wẽng soabã.
Bãmb ka dũni neb ye, wa mam me sẽn ka dũni nedã.
Kɩt-y tɩ yãmb sɩdã kɩt tɩ b welg toor yãmb yĩnga. Yaa yãmb goamã la sɩdã.
Mam tʋma bãmb dũni pʋgẽ wa yãmb sẽn tʋm maam dũni pʋgẽ wã me.
Mam welga m meng toor bãmb yĩnga, tɩ bãmb me na welg toor sɩdã pʋgẽ.
Ka bãmb yĩng bal la mam pʋʋsd ye. Yaa neb nins sẽn na tẽ maam bãmb goam yĩngã yĩng me,
tɩ bãmb fãa na lebg yembre, wa yãmba, m ba sẽn be mam pʋgẽ, tɩ mam be yãmb pʋgẽ wã. Bɩ bãmb me lebg yembr tõnd pʋgẽ, tɩ dũni nebã na tẽ tɩ yaa yãmb n tʋm maam.
La mam kõo bãmb ziir ning yãmb sẽn kõ maamã, tɩ bãmb na lebg yembr wa tõnd sẽn ya yembrã,
tɩ mam be bãmb pʋgẽ, tɩ yãmb be mam pʋgẽ, tɩ b na lebg yembr fasɩ, la tɩ dũni neb na bãng tɩ yaa yãmb n tʋm maam, la tɩ yãmb nonga bãmb wa yãmb sẽn nong maamã.

M ba, mam datame tɩ neb nins yãmb sẽn kõ maamã me na zĩnd ne maam zĩig ning mam sẽn be, tɩ b na get mam ziirã, ziir ning yãmb sẽn kõ maam, yãmb sẽn nong maam hal sẽn deng dũni yẽbgrã yĩnga.
M ba sẽn ya tɩrga, dũni neb ka bãng yãmb ye, la maam yẽ, mam bãnga yãmba, la nin-bãmba bãngame tɩ yaa yãmb n tʋm maam.
Mam kɩtame tɩ b bãng yãmb yʋʋrã, la mam na n kɩtame tɩ b bãng-a, tɩ nonglem ning yãmb sẽn nong maamã na zĩnd bãmb pʋse, la tɩ mam na zĩnd bãmb pʋse.
A Zezi sẽn gom woto n sa, b yii ne b karen-biisã n kẽng Sedrõ kʋɩl-bilã rʋʋnd a to wã. Zẽed zĩig n be be, la a Zezi kẽe be ne b karen-biisã.
A Zudas, soab ning sẽn da zãmbd-a bãmb n na n yõk n kõ wã rag n mii zĩ-kãng sõama, tɩ bõe, a Zezi ne b karen-biisã dag n tigma taab be naoor wʋsgo.
Dẽ, a Zudas peega sodaas sulli, ne gũudbã maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne Fariisẽ-dãmbã sẽn tʋmã, tɩ b zãad bug-vɩlemse, la fɩtɩl-dãmba, la zab-teedo, n kẽng zĩigẽ wã.
A Zezi sẽn mi bũmb nins fãa sẽn na n paam bãmbã, b kolga nebã n yeel-b yaa: Yãmb baooda ãnna?
La b leoka bãmb tɩ yaa Nazarɛt Zezi wã. La a Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Yaa maam! A Zudas, soab ning sẽn yõkd bãmb n na n kõ wã dag n bee ne nebã.
Wakat ning a Zezi sẽn yeel tɩ: Yaa maamã, nebã tarame n lʋɩ tẽnga.
A Zezi leb n sok-b lame yaa: Ãnna la yãmb baooda? La b yeelame tɩ yaa Nazarɛt Zezi wã.
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Mam yeela yãmb tɩ yaa maam. Dẽ, sã n yaa maam la yãmb baooda, bɩ y bas nin-kãensã tɩ b looge.
Yaa sẽn na yɩl tɩ bãmb sẽn dag n yeelã pidsi: Neb nins yãmb sẽn kõ maamã, ned baa a yen ka menem ye.
A Pɩyɛɛr dag n tara zabr sʋʋga, la a wõog-a lame n kɛ maan-kʋʋd kãsmã tʋmtʋmd n fiuug a rɩtg tʋbre. Tʋmtʋmdã yʋʋr la a Malkus.
A Zezi yeela a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Lebs f zabr sʋʋgã a wʋʋgẽ. Mam ka na n yũ bõn-yũudl ning m ba sẽn kõ maamã laa?
Dẽ, sodaasã sull ne b sodaas naabã, la Zuif-rãmbã gũudbã yõka a Zezi n sẽbe.
B deng n talla bãmb n kẽng a Ann yiri, bala, yẽ dag n yaa a Kayif sẽn ya maan-kʋʋd kãsem yʋʋm kãngã rɛɛmba.
Yaa a Kayif n dag n sagl Zuif-rãmbã tɩ ned a yen tãa sã n ki soolmã nebã yĩng n são wã.
Mik t'a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zezi karen-biig a to dag n pʋgda a Zezi. Maan-kʋʋd kãsmã dag n mii karen-bi-kãnga, la karen-biiga tũu a Zezi n kẽ maan-kʋʋd kãsmã zakẽ,
la a Pɩyɛɛr paa yɩnga, zag-noorã sɛɛga. Karen-biig a to wã maan-kʋʋd kãsmã sẽn mi wã yiime n gom ne pag ning sẽn gũud zakã noorã, n kɩt t'a Pɩyɛɛr kẽ.
Dẽ, tʋmtʋmd poakã, zag-no-gũudã yeela a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Fo ka rao-kãngã karen-biig a yen sɩda? La a Pɩyɛɛr yeelame tɩ yẽ ka bãmb karen-biig ye.
Tʋmtʋmdbã ne gũudbã dag n yasa be. La waood yĩnga, b dag n yõgna saal bugum n wootẽ. A Pɩyɛɛr me dag n bee ne bãmb n woot bugmã.
Maan-kʋʋd kãsmã soka a Zezi b karen-biisã yelle, la bũmb nins b sẽn zãmsd nebã yelle.
A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Mam goma nebã fãa taoor wakat fãa, mam zãmsa nebã karen-doogẽ la wẽnd-doogẽ wã, zĩig ning Zuif-rãmbã sẽn tigimd taabã, la mam ka soos n gom baa fɩ.
Bõe tɩ fo sokd maam? Sok neb nins sẽn wʋm-b maamã bũmb nins mam sẽn gomã. Ad mam mii bũmb nins fãa mam sẽn gomã.
A Zezi sẽn gom woto wã, gũud a yen sẽn dag n be be wẽe a Zezi pɛk n yeele: Yaa woto la fo leokd maan-kʋʋd kãsmã?
A Zezi leoka yẽnda n yeele: Mam goamã sã n ka yɩ sõama, wilg a sẽn ka sõama zĩig ninga. La mam sã n goma sõama, bõe tɩ f wẽed-ma?
Dẽ, a Ann kɩtame tɩ b tall a Zezi b sẽn sẽbã n kẽng maan-kʋʋd a Kayif yiri.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr dag n bee be n woot bugum. Ned n yeel-a yaa: Fo me ka bãmb karen-biiga? A kɩɩsame n yeel yaa: Mam ka bãmb karen-biig ye.
Maan-kʋʋd kãsmã tʋmtʋmd a yembre, sẽn ya rogem ne ned ning a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn dag n kɛ a tʋbr n fiuugã yeelame yaa: Mam ka yã foom zẽedã zĩigẽ ne bãmb sɩda?
A Pɩyɛɛr leb n kɩɩsame. La wakat kãng bala, no-raoog kelmame.
B yii ne a Zezi a Kayif zakẽ wã n tall-b n kẽng gʋvɛrneerã zakẽ. Dag n yaa yibeoogo. Bãmb mensã ka kẽ zakẽ wã ye, sẽn na yɩl n da rẽgem b mense, n paam n dɩ zʋʋg-n-bas kibsã.
Dẽ, a Pilat yiime n wa nebã nengẽ n yeel-ba: Bõe rõadg la yãmb tar ne rao-kãngã?
B leokame n yeele: A sã n dag n ka maanẽ wẽnga, tõnd dag n kõn tall-a n wa n kõ yãmb ye.
Dẽ, a Pilat yeel-b lame yaa: Bɩ yãmb mensã deeg-a n bʋ a bʋʋdã wa sẽn zems yãmb tõogã. Zuif-rãmbã yeela a Pilat tɩ bãmb ka tar noor tɩ kʋ ned ye.
Yaa sẽn na yɩl la gomd ning a Zezi sẽn gom n na n wilg kũum ning buud bãmb sẽn na n ki wã pidsi.
A Pilat kẽe a zakẽ wã n bool a Zezi n yeel-ba: Yaa yãmb la Zuif-rãmbã dĩma?
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Yãmb meng n tags a woto n sokdẽ bii, bɩ yaa neb a taab n gom mam yell a woto?
A Pilat leokame n yeele: Dẽ yĩnga, mam yaa Zuif laa? Fo soolmã neb ne maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã n tall foom n wa n kõ maam. Bõe la f maan-yã?

A Zezi leokame n yeele: Mam soolmã ka dũni ka rẽnd ye. Mam soolmã sã n dag n yaẽ dũni ka rẽnda, mam tʋmtʋmdbã dag n na zab n sõng maam, tɩ b ra yõk maam n kõ Zuif-rãmbã ye. La moasã, mam soolmã ka tẽng zug ka rẽnd ye.

A Pilat yeelame: Dẽnd fo yaa dĩm wɛ? A Zezi leokame n yeele: Ya wa yãmb sẽn yeelã, mam yaa rĩma. Ad bũmb ning yĩng mam sẽn dogã, la bũmb ning yĩng mam sẽn wa dũni wã: Yaa tɩ kɩs sɩdã kaseto. Ned ning fãa sɩd sẽn so kelgda mam koɛɛga.
A Pilat sokame yaa: Sɩd yaa bõe?
La yãmb tara mining sẽn yaa tɩ mam yiis bi-bɛɛg a yembr y zʋʋg-n-basã kibs wakat n base. Yãmb datame tɩ mam bas Zuif-rãmbã rĩmã y yĩnga?
Nebã leb n kaasame n yeele: Ayo! Da bas-y yẽ ye, bas-y-yã a Barabas. A Barabas yaool n dag n yɩɩ fãada.
Dẽ, a Pilat kɩtame tɩ b tall a Zezi n tɩ pãb-b ne kalwaase.
Sodaasã wʋga maanf ne gõos n fõgen a Zezi zugu, la b yeelg bãmb ne fu-bed miuugu,
n yaool n kolg bãmb n yetẽ yaa: Zuif-rãmbã dĩma, tõnd pʋʋsda yãmba. La b dag n laanda bãmb pegse. Gõos maanfo (19.2)
A Pilate leb n yiime n yeel Zuif-rãmbã yaa: Ad-y, mam yiisda rao wã yɩnga, tɩ yãmb na bãng tɩ mam ka yã bũmb baa a yembr ne-a sẽn sekd m na yeel t'a toga kʋʋb ye.
Dẽ, a Zezi yii yɩng ne gõos maanfã, la fu-bed-miuugã, la a Pilat yeela nebã yaa: Ad daowã!

Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã ne gũudbã sẽn yã a Zezi, b kaasame n yeele: Ka-a da-pɩk zugu! Ka-a da-pɩk zugu. A Pilat yeel-b lame yaa: Deeg-y-yã-a n ka-a y toore, bala, mam ka yã bũmb ne-a sẽn sek m na yeel t'a toga kʋʋb ye.
Zuif-rãmbã leoka a Pilat n yeele: Tõnd tara tõogo, la ne tõogã, a segda kʋʋbo, tɩ bõe, a maana a meng Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
A Pilat sẽn wʋm gom-kãnga, a rabeemã paasame.
A leb n kẽe zakẽ wã n sok a Zezi tɩ b yaa yɛ neda? La a Zezi ka leok-a ye. Dẽ, a Pilat yeela bãmb yaa:
Maam la fo sĩnd n ka gomd-ne? Fo ka mi tɩ mam tara noor tɩ kɩt tɩ b bas foom, la m tar noor tɩ kɩt tɩ b ka foom da-pɩk zug laa?
A Zezi leokame n yeele: Sã n ka noorã sẽn yi yĩngrã, yãmb da ka tarẽ noor tɩ maan maam baa fɩ. Rẽnda n kɩt tɩ ned ning sẽn tall maam n wa n kõ yãmbã yel-wẽnd yɩɩd yãmb dẽndã.

Sẽn sɩng ne wakat kãnga, a Pilat baoome n na n bas a Zezi. La Zuif-rãmbã kaasame n yeele: Yãmb sã n bas rao wã, rẽnd yãmb ka Sezaar zoa ye. Ned ning fãa sẽn maand a meng rĩm wilgdame t'a kisa Sezaar.
A Pilat sẽn wʋm gom-kãensã, a talla a Zezi n yi yɩnga, n zĩnd bʋʋdã zĩigẽ, b sẽn boond tɩ kug sẽn gãneg zĩiga, la Gabata ne hebre goama.
Dag n yaa zʋʋg-n-basã kibs seglg daare, sẽn kolg wĩnto-sʋka. A Pilat yeela Zuif-rãmbã yaa: Ad-y y rĩma!

La b kaasame n yeele: Kʋ-y-yã-a! Kʋ-y-yã-a! Ka-y-yã-a da-pɩk zugu! A Pilat yeel-b lame yaa: M ka y dĩmã da-pɩk zugu? Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb leokame n yeele: Tõnd ka tar dĩm a to, tɩ ka Sezaar ye.
Dẽ, a Pilat kõ-b-la a Zezi tɩ b tɩ ka da-pɩk zugu. Dẽ, b deega a Zezi n tall n looge.
A Zezi tʋka b ra-pɩkã n yi tẽngã, n tees zĩig sẽn boond tɩ zu-wang zĩiga, la Golgota ne hebre goama.
Yaa be la b ka a Zezi ne neb a yiib a taaba, da-pɩgs zutu, a yen goabga la a yen dɩtgo, t'a Zezi be sʋka.
A Pilat gʋlsa da-peok zug n tabl da-pɩkã. A gʋlsa be tɩ: Nazarɛt dao a Zezi, Zuif-rãmbã dĩma.
Zuif-rãmbã wʋsg karma gʋlsmã, tɩ bõe, zĩig ning b sẽn ka a Zezi da-pɩk zugã pẽe ne tẽngã. B dag n gʋlsa gomdã ne Hebre, la Latẽ, la Gɛrk.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmbã yeela a Pilat yaa: Da gʋls-y tɩ Zuif-rãmbã dĩm ye, gʋls-y t'a yeelame t'a yaa Zuif-rãmbã dĩma.
A Pilat leokame n yeele: Bũmb ning mam sẽn gʋlse, mam gʋlsame.

Sodaasã sẽn ka a Zezi n sa, b wʋka bãmb futã n pʋɩ zĩis a naase, tɩ sodaag fãa dɩk pʋɩɩr a yembre. B rɩka a Zezi fu-wokã me. A ka tar sẽnesem ye, yaa peen yend bala, yĩngr tɩ ta tẽngre. B goma ne taab n yeele:

Wa-y tɩ d da pãrs fuugã ye. D maan bãnde, tɩ bãndã wilg ned ning sẽn na n soog-a fuugã. Yɩɩ woto tɩ Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõngã pidsi. A yeelame: B pʋɩɩ mam futã ne taaba, la b maana bãnd mam fu-wokã yĩnga. Ad bũmb ning sodaasã sẽn maanã.
A Zezi ma wã ne a ma-bi-poaka, a Kolopas pag a Maari ne a Maari Madelɛn dag n yɛsa da-pɩkã sɛɛgẽ.
A Zezi sẽn yã b ma wã, la karen-biig ning bãmb sẽn nongã, t'a yɛs b ma wã sɛɛgẽ, b yeela b ma yaa: Paga, ad f bi-ribla.
La b yeela karen-biigã yaa: Ad f ma. La sẽn sɩng ne wakat kãnga, karen-biigã deega a Zezi ma wã a zakẽ.
Rẽ poore, a Zezi sẽn mi tɩ bũmb fãa zoe n maan n saame wã, b yeelame tɩ ko-yũud n tar bãmba, tɩ Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõngã pidsi.
Laok n dag n dɩg be n pid ne divẽ miisga. B rɩka neoodg n los divẽ miisgẽ wã, n vil kãnkãre, n zẽk n tees a Zezi noorã.
La a Zezi sẽn fõos divẽ miisgã n sa, b yeelame yaa: Bũmb fãa maan n saame. La b sulga b zugu, la b kiime.

Dag n yaa zʋʋg-n-basã kibs seglg daare. La Zuif-rãmbã sẽn ka rat n bas nebã tɩ b pa ra-pɩgsã zut bãmb vʋʋsg daarã yĩnga, "Vʋʋsg da-kãng dag n yaa da-kãsenga," b kosa a Pilat t'a kɩt tɩ b kao b gɛy wã la b sigs-ba.
Dẽ, sodaasã waame, n kao pipi ned ning sẽn dag n ka da-pɩk zug a Zezi sɛɛgẽ wã gɛy, la b kao ned a to wã me gɛya.
B sẽn ta a Zezi, n mik tɩ b zoe n kiime wã, b ka kao bãmb gɛyã ye.
La sodaag a yembr kõsa bãmb lʋgr ne kãnde, la tao-tao bala, koom ne zɩɩm n yi be.
Ned ning sẽn yã bõn-kãngã kɩsa a kaseto, la a kasetã yaa sɩda. La a miime t'a togsa sɩda, tɩ yãmb me na tẽ.
Yɩɩ woto tɩ Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõngã pidsi. A yeelame yaa: Bãmb kõbr baa a yembr ka na n kaoog ye.
Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõngã yeela zĩig a to yaa: Bãmb na n gesa ned ning bãmb sẽn kõsã.

Rẽ poore, Arimate dao a Zozɛf sẽn dag n soos n ya a Zezi karen-biiga, a sẽn zoet Zuif-rãmbã yĩngã kosa a Pilat noor n na n dɩk a Zezi kũumã. La a Pilat kõ-a-la noore. Dẽ, a waa n sika kũumã n tall n looge.
A Nikodɛm, sẽn dag n wa-a a Zezi nengẽ ne yʋngã me talla miir ne alowɛs sẽn kalem taaba, sẽn tar yũ-noogo, sẽn tat kɩlo pis-naas la a nu n wa.
Dẽ, b dɩka a Zezi kũuma, n ning-a bõn-yũugã, n vil ne pɛɛla, wa sẽn zems Zuif-rãmbã sẽn minim n mumd kũum to-to wã.
La tɩɩs zĩig n dag n be zĩig ning b sẽn ka a Zezi da-pɩkã zugã, la zĩigã pʋgẽ, yao-paall n dag n be be b sẽn da nan ka mum ned a pʋgẽ ye.
Yɩɩ be la b gãneg a Zezi kũumã, Zuif-rãmbã seglg yĩnga, tɩ bõe, yaoogã dag n pẽeme.
Dimaasã daar yibeoog pĩnda, a Maari Madelɛn kẽnga yaoogẽ wã, rẽ tɩ zĩigã ket n yaa libsgu. La a mikame tɩ b bilga kugrã n bas yaoogã.
Yẽ zoeeme n tɩ yãnd a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr ne karen-biig a to wã a Zezi sẽn dag n nongã, n yeel-b tɩ yaa: B yiisa Zu-soabã yaoogẽ wã, la tõnd ka mi b sẽn tɩ bĩng-b zĩig ning ye.
A Pɩyɛɛr ne karen-biig a to wã yiime n na n kẽng yaoogẽ wã.
Bãmb b yiibã ra zoetame, la karen-biig a to wã zoee tao-tao n yɩɩg a Pɩyɛɛr, n deng-a n ta yaoogẽ wã.
A sulgame n gese, n yã pɛɛlã sẽn be be wã, la a yaool n ka kẽ ye.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr sẽn dag n pʋgd yẽ wã taame. A kẽe yaoogẽ wã, n mik tɩ pɛɛlã bee be.
Peend ning b sẽn dag n lud a Zezi zug ne-wã me dag n bee be, la a ka naag ne a taabã ye, la b gil-a lame n dɩgl toor.
Dẽ, karen-biig a to wã, sẽn deng-a n ta wã me kẽe yaoogẽ wã n yã bũmb nins sẽn be be wã, la a tẽeme.
Bala, a dag n nan ka wʋm Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõngã sẽn yet t'a Zezi tog n vʋʋgame wã võor ye.
La karen-biisã lebg n kuila b yiya.
A Maari yaool n dag n yasa yɩng yaoogã sɛɛgẽ n yãbda. A yãbdame, la a sulgame n na n ges yaoogã pʋgẽ,
la a yãa malegs a yiib sẽn yer fu-peelse, n zĩ zĩig ning b sẽn dag n gãneg a Zezi wã. A yen dag n zĩi zugã zĩigẽ, t'a yen zĩ nao wã zĩigẽ.
Malegsã yeela pagã yaa: Paga, yaa wãn tɩ fo yãbda? La a leokame tɩ yaa b sẽn dɩk a Zu-soabã t'a ka mi b sẽn ning-b zĩig ningã yĩnga.
Pagã sẽn gomd a woto wã, a wẽnegame n yãnd a Zezi sẽn yɛs yĩngri, la a dag n ka mi tɩ yaa bãmb ye.

A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Paga, bõe tɩ fo yãbda? Ãnna la fo baooda? La pagã sẽn tẽed tɩ yaa tɩɩsã soab la sẽn gomd ne yẽ wã, a yeelame yaa: M kẽema, sã n yaa yãmb n dɩk-b bɩ y togs maam yãmb sẽn bĩng-b zĩig ning tɩ m na tɩ rɩk-ba.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Maari! A Maari wẽnemdame n yeel ne hebre goam tɩ rabuni, sẽn dat n togs tɩ karen-saamba.
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Ra sɩɩs-m ye. Mam nan ka rʋ m ba nengẽ ye. Kẽng m ba-biisã nengẽ n tɩ yeel-b tɩ mam dʋʋda m ba sẽn ya yãmb ba wã nengẽ, mam Wẽnnaam sẽn ya yãmb Wẽnnaamã nengẽ.
A Maari Madelɛn waa n togsa karen-biisã t'a yãnda Zu-soabã, la tɩ b yeela yẽnda bõn-kãense.

Da-kãng sẽn ya dimaas daarã yʋngo, doog ning a Zezi karen-biisã sẽn dag n be wã noy dag n pagame, bãmb sẽn zoet Zuif-rãmbã yĩnga. A Zezi waame n yals bãmb sʋk n yeel-b yaa: Bɩ laafɩ zĩnd ne yãmba!
A Zezi sẽn yeel woto, b wilga b karen-biisã b nusã ne b lʋgrã. Karen-biisã sẽn yãnd Zu-soabã, b kɩdmame.
A Zezi leb n yeel-b lame yaa: Bɩ laafɩ zĩnd ne yãmba! Mam me tʋmda yãmb wa m ba sẽn tʋm maamã.
Gom-kãens zugẽ, a Zezi fʋʋsa bãmb zug n yeel-ba: Reeg-y Sɩɩg-sõngo.
Neb nins yãmb sẽn na n kõ sugrã na n paama sugri, la neb nins yãmb sẽn na tõdg sugrã kõn paam sugr ye.
Karen-biisã piig la a yiibã ned a yembre, a Toma b sẽn boond tɩ Didimã dag n ka be ne a taabã wakat ning a Zezi sẽn wa wã ye.

Dẽ, karen-biis a taabã yeela yẽnda yaa: Tõnd yãnda Zu-soabã! La a yeela bãmb yaa: Mam sã n ka yãnd kutã bãn b nusẽ wã, mam sã n ka tʋm m nug-bil kutã bogdẽ wã, la m sã n ka tʋm m nug bãmb lʋgrẽ wã, mam kõn tol n tẽ ye.

Rasem a nii rẽ zugẽ, a Zezi karen-biisã da leb n tigma taab roogẽ wã, la a Toma dag n bee ne bãmba. Kʋɩlemsã dag n pagame, la a Zezi waa n yalsa bãmb sʋk n yeel-b yaa: Bɩ laafɩ zĩnd ne yãmba!
La b yeela a Toma yaa: Tẽeg f nug-bilã ka. Ges mam nusã. Tẽeg f nugã n tʋm mam lʋgrẽ wã me, la f tẽ n da yɩ ka-tẽeb soab ye.
A Toma leoka bãmb n yeele: Mam Zu-soaba la mam Wẽnnaam!
A Zezi yeela yẽnda yaa: Yaa fo sẽn yã maamã yĩng la fo tẽeda. Bark bee neb nins sẽn ka yã n yaool n tẽedã zutu.
Bõn-bãn wʋsg a taab la a Zezi maan b karen-biisã taoor tɩ ka gʋls seb-kãngã pʋgẽ ye.
La bãmbã sẽn gʋlsã, yaa tɩ yãmb na tẽ t'a Zezi yaa Kirist, Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, la tɩ yãmb na paam vɩɩm bãmb yʋʋrã yĩnga, yãmb sẽn tẽ wã yĩnga.
Rẽ zugẽ, a Zezi puka b meng ne karen-biisã Tiberyaad ko-kãsengã noore. Ad b sẽn puk b meng to-to:
A Zezi karen-biisã rag n bee ne taaba: A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr ne a Toma b sẽn boond tɩ Didim, la a Natanayɛl sẽn yit Galile Kana wã, la a Zebde kom-dibli wã ne a Zezi karen-biis a taab a yiibu.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr yeelame t'a na n tɩ yõga zĩma, la neb a taabã yeel-a lame tɩ bãmb me na n tũu yẽnda. B yiime n tɩ kẽ koom koglgo. B ka yõk fɩ yʋn-kãng ye.
Yibeoog sẽn ta, a Zezi dag n bee kʋɩl-koakẽ wã, la karen-biisã dag n ka mi tɩ yaa a Zezi ye.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: M kamba, yãmb ka tar sẽn na rɩ laa? B leoka a Zezi tɩ ayo.
A Zezi yeel-b lame yaa: Lob-y zĩm-gãmbrã koglgã rɩtgo, la y na paame. Dẽ, b loba zĩm-gãmbrã, la b dag n ka le tõe n tak-a ye, zĩmã waooglem yĩnga.
Dẽ, karen-biig ning a Zezi sẽn dag n nongã yeela a Pɩyɛɛr yaa: Yaa Zu-soabã! A Sɩmo sẽn wʋm tɩ yaa Zu-soaba yee, la a yeelg a fuugu, bala, a dag n yaa beelle, la a yɩk n lʋɩ koomẽ wã.
Karen-biis a taabã taee zĩm-gãmbrã sẽn pid ne zĩmã ne koom-koglgã n wa, bala, b ne tẽngã dag n ka yɩɩd nao-yakem koabg la pis-nu ye.
Bãmb sẽn yi koomẽ wã n ta tẽnga, bãmb yãa bug-saal sẽn wit tɩ zĩm be a zugu, n paas buri.
A Zezi yeel-b lame tɩ b wa ne zĩmã b sẽn yõg paalmã.
A Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr kẽe koom-koglgẽ wã n vuug zĩm-gãmbrã n yiisi, la a dag n pida ne zĩm-bɛd koabg la pis-nu la a tãabo. La baa ne zĩmã sẽn dag n waoog a woto wã, zĩm-gãmbrã ka kẽeg ye.
A Zezi yeel-b lame: Wa n dɩ-y-yã. La karen-biisã ned baa a yen ka saag n sok-b bãmb sẽn yaa a soab ye, bala, b dag n miime tɩ yaa Zu-soabã.
A Zezi kolgame n dɩk burã n kõ-ba, la b kõ-b zĩmã me.
A Zezi sẽn vʋʋg n yi kũum sʋkã tɛka, naoor a tãab moasã la b puk b meng ne b karen-biisã.

Bãmb sẽn dɩ n sa, a Zezi yeela a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr yaa: A Zonaas biig a Sɩmo, dẽ yĩnga fo nonga maam n yɩɩd bãmbã sẽn nong maamã? A leoka bãmb yaa: N-ye, Zu-soaba! Yãmb miime tɩ mam nonga yãmba. A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Ges mam pe-bi wã yelle.

B leb n yeel-a-la naoor a yiib soab yaa: A Zonaas biig a Sɩmo, dẽ yĩnga, fo nonga maam? A Pɩyɛɛr leoka bãmb n yeele: N-ye, Zu-soaba! Yãmb mi tɩ mam nonga yãmba. A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Yɩ mam piisã pe-kɩɩma.

B yeela yẽnda naoor a tãab soab yaa: A Zonaas biig a Sɩmo, dẽ yĩnga fo nonga maam? A Pɩyɛɛr sũur sãamame, a Zezi sẽn sok yẽnda naoor a tãab moasã tɩ rẽnda yĩnga yẽ nonga bãmbã yĩnga. La a leoka bãmb n yeele: Zu-soaba, yãmb mii bũmb fãa. Yãmb miime tɩ mam nonga yãmba. A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Ges m piisã yelle.

Sɩd-sɩdã, mam yeta foom tɩ fo sẽn dag n ya bi-bɩɩgã, fo dag n sẽbgda f sɛɛg sẽbdga, n dabd f sẽn datẽ. La fo sã n wa n kʋʋle, fo na n zẽka f bãgdo, tɩ ned a to sẽb foom f sẽbdgã, n tall foom n kẽng f sẽn ka ratẽ ye.
A Zezi goma a woto n na n wilg kũum ning buud a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn na n ki n kõ Wẽnnaam waoogrã. A Zezi sẽn gom a woto n sa, b yeel-a lame yaa: Wa n tũ maam!

A Pɩyɛɛr wẽnegame n yã karen-biig ning a Zezi sẽn nongã t'a wat bãmb nengẽ. Yaa soab kãng n kɩll a Zezi yãoogẽ dɩɩbã wakat n sok bãmb tɩ: Zu-soaba, yaa ãnna n na n zãmb yãmb n yõk n kõ wã?
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn yã yẽ, a soka a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, la bõe n na n paam rao-kãngã?
A Zezi yeel-a lame yaa: Mam sã n dat t'a vɩɩmd hal tɩ mam wa, bʋg n pak foom? Fo yẽ ye n wa n tũ maam.

Gom-kãng zugẽ, gomd n saag ba-biisã sʋk n yetẽ tɩ karen-bi-kãng ka na n ki ye. A Zezi yaool n ka yeel t'a ka na n ki ye. B yeelame tɩ bãmb sã n dat t'a vɩɩmd hal tɩ bãmb wa, bʋg n pak a Pɩyɛɛre?
Yaa karen-bi-kãng n kɩt bõn-kãens kaseto, la a gʋls-ba. La tõnd miime t'a kasetã yaa sɩda.
A Zezi maana bũmb wʋsg a taaba. Ned sã n dag n na n gʋlsẽ yɛla fãa yembr-yembre, mam ka tẽed tɩ dũni meng dag n na tõog n deegẽ sɛbã b sẽn na n gʋlsã ye.
Teofill, mam dẽenem sebrã pʋgẽ, mam wilga bũmb nins fãa a Zezi sẽn sɩng n maan la b zãms nebã,
hal tɩ ta daar ning bãmb sẽn zẽk n kẽng arzãna. Sẽn deng a Zezi sẽn na n zẽke, b kõo b tõodã tẽn-tʋmdb nins bãmb sẽn tũusã, ne Sɩɩg-sõng pãnga.
A Zezi namsgã zugẽ, b maana bũmb wʋsg n na n wilg b karen-biisã tɩ b vɩɩme. A Zezi puka b meng ne tẽn-tʋmdbã rasem pis-naase, n gom ne bãmb Wẽnnaam soolmã yelle.
Daar a yembre, a Zezi da zĩ ne tẽn-tʋmdbã n dɩtẽ, la b yeel-b lame yaa: Da zãag-y ne Zeruzalɛm ye. Pa-y be n gũ bũmb ning m ba sẽn da kãabã, kũun ning mam sẽn da gom ne yãmb a yellã.
Bala, a Zã ra lisa nebã koomẽ. La yãmba, rasem bilf sã n paase, yãmb na n paama lisg Sɩɩg-sõng pʋgẽ.
La tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn da tigim taabã soka a Zezi yaa: Zu-soaba, yaa moasã la y na n deeg Israyɛl soolmã n lebs-ba?
A Zezi leok-b lame yaa: Ka be ne yãmb tɩ bãng wakate la sasa ning m ba sẽn yãk ne noor ning b sẽn tarã ye.
La Sɩɩg-sõng sã n wa yãmb zutu, y na n deega pãnga, la yãmb na n yɩɩ mam kaset dãmb Zeruzalɛm, la Zude soolmã fãa, la Samari, la hal tɩ ta dũni tɛk fãa.
A Zezi sẽn gom a woto n sɛ, b zẽkame tɩ nebã get-ba. La sawadg lilla a Zezi tɩ nebã ka le ne-b ye.
La bãmb sẽn da ket n get yĩngr wakat ning a Zezi sẽn zẽkdã, haya! Raop a yiib sẽn yer fu-peels waa n yalsa bãmb sɛɛgẽ
n yeel-b yaa: Galile neba, yaa bõe tɩ y yas n get yĩngri? Zezi kãngã Wẽnnaam sẽn zẽk tɩ b yi yãmb sʋk to-to n kẽng arzãn tɩ yãmb yã wã, b na n lebg n waa a woto bala.
Dẽ, tẽn-tʋmdba yii tãng ning sẽn boond tɩ Oliiv tɩɩs tãngã n sig n leb Zeruzalɛm. Tãngã zãrem ne Zeruzalɛm zemsa vʋʋsg daar kẽnd bala.

La bãmb sẽn ta Zeruzalɛm, b rʋʋ yĩngr doogã, zĩig ning bãmb sẽn minim n sigdã. Dag n yaa a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã la a Zak la a Ãndre la a Filip la a Toma la a Bartelemi la a Matye la a Alfe biig a Zak la a Sɩmo sẽn ya Zelot ne a Zak biig a Zuud.
Bãmb fãa lagma taab ne yam a yembr n kẽngd taoor n pʋʋsd daar fãa, ne pagbã, la a Zezi ma a Maari ne a Zezi ma-biisã.
Badaare, a Pɩyɛɛr yika a ba-biis a taabã sʋka, la b sõorã da taa neb koabg la pisi, n yeel yaa:
M saam-biisi, ra yaa tɩlɛ tɩ bũmb ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn da gom ne a Daviid noor tɩ b gʋls gʋls-sõamyã pʋsẽ, n deng n togs t'a Zudaas na n lʋɩɩ neb taoor tɩ b wa n yõk a Zezi wã paam pidsgu.
A Zudaas ra yaa tõnd sullã ned a yen, la a ra paama a pʋɩɩr ne tõnd tʋʋmdã.
La rao-kãng rɩka ligd ning a sẽn paam a yel-wẽndã poorẽ wã n da pʋʋgo, la a lʋɩɩme t'a zugã reng taoore, t'a pʋgã pusg t'a yãadã yʋlʋm.
La Zeruzalɛm tẽngã neba fãa wʋma bõn-kãnga. Rẽ n kɩt tɩ b pʋd pʋʋgã yʋʋr ne b buudã goam tɩ "Hakeldama" sẽn dat n togs tɩ zɩɩm pʋʋgo.

Mik b gʋlsa yɩɩn-sõamyã sebr pʋgẽ n yeel yaa: Bɩ a yirã lebg raboogo, tɩ ned ra zĩnd be ye. La tɩ ned a to reeg yẽ tʋʋmdã. 21-22 Rẽ wã, tɩ d gẽes neb nins sẽn zĩnd-b ne tõnd wakat ning Zu-soab a Zezi sẽn dag n tar tõnd n kẽnd la b watẽ, sẽn sɩng ne wakat ning a Zã sẽn lis bãmbã n tãag daar ning Wẽnnaam sẽn zẽk bãmb n bas tõndã sʋka, n yãk ned a yembr t'a naag tõnd n kɩs a Zezi vʋʋgrã kaseto.
Bãmb wilga neb a yiibu: A Zozɛf b sẽn boond t'a Barsabas la b boondẽ me t'a Zustus ne a Matyaas.
Dẽ, bãmb fãa pʋʋsa a woto: Zu-soaba, yãmb sẽn mi neba fãa sũyã, wilg-y ned ning yãmb sẽn yãk bãmb b yiibã sʋka,
t'a kẽ tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ, n yɩ tẽn-tʋmd n led a Zudaas zĩigẽ, t'a basame n kẽng zĩig ning sẽn segd ne-a.
Bãmb maana bãnde n na n yãk ned a yembre, la bãndã yõka a Matyaas. La yẽ naaga tẽn-tʋmdb piig la a yembrã sullẽ.
Pãntekotã daar sẽn ta, bãmb fãa ra tigma taab zĩig a yembre.
La tao-tao bala, bʋrg sẽn wẽnd sob-kãseng sẽn fugd bʋrg yii arzãn n wa n pid roog ning pʋg bãmb sẽn da zĩ wã.
La bãmb yãa bũmb sẽn wẽnd wa zɛlma, n ya wa bug-witim, n welg taab n sig ned kam fãa zugu.
Bãmb fãa pida ne Sɩɩg-sõngo. La b sɩngame n gom gom-zẽn wa sẽn zems Sɩɩgã sẽn kõ-b tɩ b goma.
Mik tɩ Zuif-rãmb sẽn sakd tẽebã sõama, sẽn yi soolem nins fãa sẽn be dũniyã tɛkã, n wa n be Zeruzalɛm.
Bʋrgã sẽn maanã, neb kʋʋng wʋsg tigma taaba. La bãmb fãa yɛɛsa wʋsgo, ned kam fãa sẽn da wʋmd tẽedbã sẽn gomd ne yẽ meng goama yĩnga.
La a linga bãmb tɩ b yɛɛs n yetẽ yaa: Nin-kãensa fãa sẽn gomdã, b ka Galile neb wɛ?
La yɩɩ a wãn tɩ tõnd ned kam fãa wʋmd bãmb sẽn gomd tõnd mens goam d sẽn dog ne a wã?
Neb sẽn yit Part la Meed ne Elam dãmba, ne neb nins sẽn yi Mezopotami la Zude la Kapados la Põ ne Azi soolem,
la Firzi la Pamfili ne Ezipt la Libi soolem toadgã sẽn pẽ Sirɛn.

La neb nins sẽn yi Rom n ya Zuif-rãmba la bu-zẽms sẽn sakd Zuif-rãmba kaorengo, la Kɛrɛt neba ne Arabi neb bee tõnd sʋka. La baoosgo tõnd wʋmda b sẽn gomd Wẽnnaam tʋʋm kãsmsã ne tõnd mens goama!
Bãmb fãa yɛɛsame n da ka mi b sẽn na tags tɩ bũmb ning ye. La b goma ne taab n yeel tɩ bõn-kãngã võor yaa bõe.
La neb a taab ra yaanda tẽedbã n yetẽ tɩ b yũu rã-toose n tɩge.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr yika yĩngr ne neb piig la a yembrã n zẽk a koɛɛg n gom ne neb kʋʋngã a woto: Yãmb Zuif-rãmba, la yãmb fãa sẽn be-b Zeruzalɛm, bãng-y bõn-kãnga la y kelg mam goama neere.
Nin-kãensã ka yũ rãam wala yãmb sẽn tẽedã ye. Bala, nan ket n yaa yibeoogo, wakat a wɛ bala.
La yaa bũmb ning Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Zowɛl sẽn da togsã:

"Wẽnnaam yeelame yaa: Yaoolem wakate, mam na n pʋdga m Sɩɩgã ninsaalbã buud fãa zutu. Yãmb kom-dibli la y kom-pugli na n togsa bãngr goama. Yãmb kom-bɩɩs na n yãa vẽnegre, la yãmb nin-kẽemb na n paama zãmsdo.
N ye! Ra-kãens daare, mam na n pʋdga m Sɩɩgã m tʋmtʋmd-raopa la m tʋmtʋmd-pogs zutu, la b na n togsa bãngr goama.
Mam na n maana bõn-yɛɛsds yĩngri, saasẽ, la bõn-bãn dũniyã zugu, zɩɩm, la bugum, la bug-zõos na n zĩndame.
Wĩndgã na n lebga lik bida, la kiuugã na n lebga wa zɩɩm, tɩ Zu-soabã daarã sẽn ya ra-kãseng la sẽn be ziirã yaool n wa.
La ned ning fãa sẽn na n pʋʋs ne Zu-soaba yʋʋr na n paama fãagre."
Yãmb Israyɛl neba, kelg-y gom-kãensã. Yãmb mens miime tɩ yaa Nazarɛt dao a Zezi la Wẽnnaam tall n maan bõn-bãnã la bõn-yɛɛsds la bãn yãmb sʋka, n wilg tɩ yaa bãmb n tʋm-ba.
B zãmba rao-kãnga, n yõk n kõ yãmb wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam yam-yãkrã, la bãmb sẽn da pĩnd n yeelã. Yãmb kɩtame tɩ yel-wẽn maandb ka a Zezi da-pɩk zug n kʋ-ba.
La Wẽnnaam vʋʋga bãmb n fãag-b kũum pãng nugẽ. Tɩ bõe, kũumã pãng ra ka tõe n tall bãmb ye.
Bala, a Daviid dag n goma b yell n yeel yaa: "Mam dag n yãta Zu-soaba mam taoor wakat fãa. Bala, bãmb bee ne maam, sẽn na n yɩl tɩ bũmb da wa n miim maam ye.
Woto yĩnga, mam sũur pida ne sũ-noogo, la mam zelemd kɩdemdame. La baa mam yĩngã na n vʋʋsa tẽeb pidsg gũudem pʋgẽ.
Tɩ bõe, yãmb ka na n bas maam kɩɩm-kulg pʋgẽ ye, la yãmb kõn bas y sõmblem soabã t'a pa yaoogẽ n põog ye.
Yãmb wilga maam vɩɩm soaya: Yãmb na n pida maam ne sũ-noog y nengẽ."
M saam-biisi, kõ-y maam noor tɩ m gom ne yãmb tõnd yaab a Daviid yell vẽenega: Bãmb kiime, tɩ b mum-ba, la b yaoog ket n bee tõnd sʋk hal tɩ ta rũnna.
La bãmb da yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa, n mi tɩ Wẽnnaam dag n wẽename n kãab bãmb n yeel tɩ b na n kɩtame tɩ b yagensa sʋka, a yembr sẽn yit bãmb buud pʋgẽ zaoond b naama geer zugu.
A Daviid da reng n goma Kiristã vʋʋgr yell n yeel tɩ b ka bas Kirist kɩɩm-kulg ye, la b yĩngã ka pa yaoogẽ n põog ye.
Yaa Zezi kãng la Wẽnnaam sẽn vʋʋgã, la tõnd fãa yaa bõn-kãng kaset dãmba.
A Zezi zẽkame n be Wẽnnaam dɩtgo, la bãmb deega Sɩɩg-sõngã b sẽn da kãabã, b ba wã nengẽ, n pʋdg-a tõnd zutu. La yaa bõn-kãng la yãmb sẽn yãt la y wʋmd moasã wã.
Tɩ bõe, a Daviid meng ka rʋ arzãn ye, la a yeelame tɩ Zu-soab a Wẽnd yeela yẽ Zu-soaba yaa: "Wa n zĩnd mam dɩtgo,
hal tɩ m kɩt tɩ f tab f bɛɛbã."
Dẽ yĩngã, Israyɛl buudã fãa, bãng-y sɩd-sɩd tɩ Zezi kãng yãmb sẽn ka da-pɩkã zugã, Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ bãmb lebg Zu-soaba la Kirist.
La nebã sẽn wʋm gom-kãnga, a sɩɩsa bãmb sũyã. La b soka a Pɩyɛɛr ne tẽn-tʋmdba a taabã yaa: D saam-biisi, tõnd tog n maana bõe?

A Pɩyɛɛr yeel-b lame yaa: Tek-y yam n kos sugri, la bɩ ned kam fãa sak n deeg koom lisg ne a Zezi Kirist yʋʋr a yel-wẽna sugr kũun yĩnga. Dẽ, y na yaool n deeg Wẽnnaam kũuna sẽn ya Sɩɩg-sõngã.
Tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam kãabgã yaa yãmb ne y kamb yĩnga, la neb nins fãa sẽn be zĩ-zãrgã yĩnga, la neb nins fãa tõnd Wẽnnaam sẽn na n boolã me yĩnga.
A Pɩyɛɛr leb n goma goam a taab n kɩs kaset n sagl-b ne pẽdgr n yeel-b tɩ b fãag b mens n yi zamaan kãnga sẽn ya wẽngã pʋgẽ.
Neb nins sẽn sak a Pɩyɛɛr goama paama koom lisgu. La badaare, karen-biis sõor sẽn kolg tus a tãab n paase.
Bãmb da sakda tẽn-tʋmdba zãmsga neere, n vɩ ba-biis lagem-n-taar pʋgẽ, la b kaood burã n dɩt ne taaba, la b pʋʋsd ne taaba.
La yɛɛsg ra tara neba fãa, tɩ bõe, tẽn-tʋmdbã ra maanda bõn-yɛɛsds ne bõn-bãn wʋsgo.
Tẽedba fãa ra naaga taaba zĩ-yende, n dɩk b paoongã fãa n naag taaba.
B ra koosda b paoongã ne b sẽn tarã n pʋɩt ligdã tɩ tat neba fãa, tɩ ned kam fãa paamd sẽn zemsd sẽn tõe sõng-a.
Daar fãa, bãmb da naagda taab noor a yembr n be wẽnd-doogẽ wã. Bãmb da naagda taab n dɩt rɩɩbã b yiyã pʋse, la b dag n dɩta b rɩɩbã ne sũ-noogo, la ne sũy sẽn ya sõama.
Bãmb da pẽgda Wẽnnaam. La neba fãa ra nong-b lame. La daar fãa, Zu-soabã da fãagda neb n paasd wẽnd-doogẽ wã.
Zaabr lɛɛr a tãab sẽn ya pʋʋsgã wakat sẽn ta, a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã da tũu taab n kẽng wẽnd-doogẽ wã.
La rao a ye sẽn dog ne komsem n da be be. La b ra rɩkda yẽ daar fãa n wat n zĩndgd-a wẽnd-doogã noor ninga b sẽn boond tɩ rigno-neerã t'a bõosd neb nins sẽn da kẽed wẽnd-doogẽ wã.
La rao wã sẽn yã a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã sẽn dat n kẽ wẽnd-doogẽ wã, yẽ bõos-b lame.
A Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã gesa yẽnda n yeel-a t'a ges bãmba.
La rao wã gesa a Pɩyɛɛr ne a zã n tẽed tɩ bãmb na n kõ-a-la bũmbu.
La a Pɩyɛɛr yeel-a lame yaa: Mam ka tar wanzuri wala sãnem ye, la mam kõta foo bũmb ninga mam sẽn tarã, ne a Zezi Kirist sẽn yi Nazarɛt yʋʋre, yik n kẽne!
La a Pɩyɛɛr gãda rao wã nug-rɩtgo, n kɩt t'a yiki. La wakat kãng bala koamsã nao wã ne a nao-sẽbã lebga kãenkãe.
La yẽ yika wʋgʋp n yals yĩngr n sɩng kẽna. La yẽ kẽname n tũ bãmb n kẽ wẽnd-doogẽ wã n yɩgd n tiimsid n pẽgd Wẽnnaam.
Nebã fãa yãnda yẽ sẽn kẽnd la a pẽgd Wẽnnaamã.
La bãmb bãngame tɩ yaa rao ninga sẽn da zĩ wẽnd-doogã rignoor ninga sẽn boond tɩ neerã n bõosdẽ wã, la b sẽn yã bũmb ninga sẽn maan rao wã, dabeem yõk-b lame tɩ b yɛɛs wʋsgo.
La rao wã sẽn da pʋgd a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã wã, neba fãa yɛɛsame n zoe n kẽng bãmb nengẽ, zĩig sẽn boond t'a Salmo veranda wã.

A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn yã woto, a yeela nebã yaa: Yãmb Israyɛl neba, yaa bõe tɩ bõn-kãnga yɛɛs yãmba? La yaa bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb get tõnd a woto wala yaa ne tõnd pãng wala d sõmblem yĩng la d tõog n kɩt rao-kãnga kẽnda?

Yaa Abraham ne Izak la a Zakob Wẽnnaam sẽn ya tõnd yaab-rãmba Wẽnnaamã n waoog b tẽn-tʋmd a Zezi. Yaa bãmb la yãmb sẽn da zãmb n yõk n kɩs a Pilat, t'a Pilat da tags n dat n bas-b tɩ yãmb tõdg yẽnda taoorã.
Yãmb tõdga sõmblem la tɩrlem soabã, n kos tɩ b bas nin-kʋʋdã n kõ-yã.
La y yaool n kɩt tɩ b kʋ vɩɩm-naabã. La Wẽnnaam vʋʋg-b lame tɩ b yi kũum sʋk n vɩ. Tõnd yaa bõn-kãng kaset dãmba.
Yaa ne tẽeb la a Zezi yʋʋrã n kõ dao kãngã yãmb sẽn ne la y miẽ wã pãnga tõnd sẽn tẽe bãmb yʋʋrã yĩnga. Yaa tẽeb ne a Zezi n maag rao-kãnga zãng fasɩ yãmb fãa nifẽ.
La moasã, m saam-biisi, mam miime tɩ yaa yãmb ne y nanamsa zɩɩlma yĩng n kɩt tɩ y maan a Zezi a woto.
La Wẽnnaam maana a woto n pids bũmb ninga b sẽn da pĩnd n togs ne b no-rɛɛsdbã fãa noy tɩ bãmb Kiristã na n namsame wã.
Dẽ, tek-y yam n kos sugri tɩ Wẽnnaam tõe n yẽes y yel-wẽna,
woto, Zu-soaba na n kɩtame tɩ yolsg wakat wa. La b na n tʋma Kirist a Zezi bãmb sẽn da yãk yãmb yĩngã.
A Zezi tog zĩnda arzãn nanda hal tɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn da togs bũmb ningã fãa wakat sẽn loogã ne b no-rɛɛs sõamyã noyã manegre wakat ta.
A Moyiis ra yeelame: "Zu-soaba sẽn ya yãmb Wẽnnaam na n yãka b no-rɛɛs sẽn ya wa maam yãmb buudã sʋk n kõ-yã. Yãmb na n kelga bũmb nins fãa yẽ sẽn na n togs yãmbã.
La ned ning sẽn ka kelgd-a Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs kãnga, b na n menes-a-la Wẽnnaam nebã sʋka."
La Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã fãa sẽn sɩng ne a Sãmwɛll la sẽn pʋgl-b bãmba me goma ra-kãens yelle.
Yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba kamba, la kaool ninga Wẽnnaam sẽn maan ne tõnd yaab-rãmbã kamba, Wẽnnaam sẽn yeela Abraham tɩ dũniyã buud fãa na n paama bark bãmb yagensã maasem yĩngã.
Yaa yãmb yĩng pipi la Wẽnnaam yãk b tẽn-tʋmd n tʋm-b yãmb nengẽ, tɩ ned kam fãa yãmb sʋkã sã n wẽnemd n bas a yel-wẽna bɩ b ning-a barka.
A Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã sẽn da ket n gomd ne nebã, maan-kʋʋdbã ne wẽnd-doog gũudba naab la Saduusẽ-dãmba waame.
Bãmb sũyã puuga wʋsg ne tẽn-tʋmdba yiibã sẽn da zãmsd nebã la b moondẽ n yetẽ tɩ neb nins sẽn tũud a Zezi wã na n vʋʋg n bas a kũum wala a Zezi sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũuma.
La b yõga tẽn-tʋmdbã n kɩs gũudbã tɩ b gũ-b hal tɩ beoog vẽege, bala wĩndga da zoe n kẽeme.
Baoosgo, neb nins sẽn da wʋm koe-moonegã, wʋsg tẽeme. Neba sẽn tẽ wã sõor kolga tus a nu.
La vẽkembeoogo, Zuif-rãmba nanamse la kãsem-dãmba ne tõog karen-saam-dãmbã,
la maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem a Ãnn ne a Kayif, la a Zã la a Alegsãndr la neb nins fãa sẽn da ya maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmb buudã tigma taab Zeruzalɛm.
Bãmb talla a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã n wa n yals bãmb sʋk n sok-b tɩ yaa ne pãng bʋg wala yaa ne ãnna yʋʋr la b maan bõn-kãnga.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn pid ne Sɩɩg-sõngo, yẽ yeel-b lame yaa:
Zuif-rãmba nanamse ne kãsem-dãmba, b sẽn sokd tõnd rũnna n dat bãng maan-neerã tõnd sẽn maan koamsã, la sẽn yɩ to-to tɩ rao-kãng paam maagrã.

Yãmb fãa ne Israyɛl neba fãa bãng-y neere, tɩ yaa ne Nazarɛt dao a Zezi Kirist yãmb sẽn ka da-pɩk zug tɩ Wẽnnaam vʋʋg-b n bas kũuma yʋʋre, n kɩt tɩ rao-kãnga paam laafɩ zãng n yas yãmb fãa taoore.
Wa gʋls sõamyã sẽn yetã, a Zezi yaa: "Kugr ninga yãmb a tãn-metbã sẽn da zagsã, la kug-kãng n lebg roogã pãng kugri."
Fãagr ka be ne ned a to sã ka a Zezi ye. Tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam ka kõ ned yʋʋr a to ninsaalba sʋk dũniyã zug tɩ tõnd tõe n tũ m paam fãagr ye.
La bãmb sẽn yã a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã pɛl-kɛgengã, b yɛɛsame, tɩ bõe, b ra bãngame t'a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã yaa nin-zaals sẽn ka paam zãmsgo. La b ra bãngame t'a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã ra tũuda a Zezi.
Kaorengã yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã sẽn yã rao ningã sẽn paam maagrã t'a yik n yas a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã sɛɛgẽ wã, b ra ka tar sẽn na leok ye.
La b kõo a Pɩyɛɛr dãmb noor tɩ b yi kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodba roogẽ. La kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã yẽsa ne taab n yeel yaa: Tõnd na n maana nin-kãensa bõe?
Bala, Zeruzalɛm neba fãa bãnga vẽeneg tɩ nin-kãensa maana bõn-bãn-kãsenga, la tõnd ka tõe n kɩɩs bõn-kãng ye.
La sẽn na n yɩl tɩ yel-kãnga ra saag neba sʋk n paase, wa-y tɩ d gɩdg-b tɩ b ra leb n gom ne ned ba a yen a Zezi yʋʋrã yell ye.
Dẽ, b boola a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã n yeel-b tɩ b ra leb n tol n gom la b zãms nebã ne a Zezi yʋʋr ye.
La a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã leok-b lame yaa: Yaa tɩrg Wẽnnaam nifẽ tɩ tõnd sak yãmb n yaool n bas Wẽnnaam? Bɩ yãmb mens togse.
Bala, tõnd ka tõe n ka gom bũmb ninga tõnd sẽn yã la d wʋma yell ye.

La kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodba leb n lenga a Pɩyɛɛr dãmb n leb n bas-b n ka tõog n paam bũmb sẽn na n sɩbg-b ye, b sẽn zoet nebã yĩnga. Tɩ bõe, neba fãa ra pẽgda Wẽnnaam bũmb ninga sẽn maana yĩnga.
Bala, rao ninga maagrã sẽn yɩ bõn-bãndã da tara sẽn yɩɩd yʋʋm pis-naase.
La b sẽn yiis a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã n base, bãmb kẽnga b ba-biis a taaba nengẽ, n tɩ togs-b bũmb ning fãa maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmba ne kãsem-dãmba sẽn da yeel bãmbã.
Tẽedba sẽn wʋm yõwã, b lagma taab n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam n yeel yaa: Zu-soaba, yãmb n naan yĩngr la tẽnga, la ko-kãsengã, la bũmb nins fãa sẽn be b pʋsẽ wã,
yãmb n kɩt tɩ tõnd yaab a Daviid sẽn ya yãmb tʋmtʋmda gom ne Sɩɩg-sõng pãnga, n yeel tɩ: "Yaa bõe yĩng tɩ buud toay-toayã sũy puudẽ, la yaa bõe tɩ nebã set sedb sẽn ka võore.
Dũniyã rĩm-dãmba segla b mens zabr yĩnga, la nanamsã lagma taaba, n na n zab ne Zu-soabã la ne bãmb Kiristã."
Tɩ bõe, Herood ne a Põns Pilat sɩd lagma taab Zeruzalɛm ka, ne bʋ-zẽmsã la ne Israyɛl nebã n zab ne yãmb tẽn-tʋmd-sõng a Zezi yãmb sẽn yãkã.
Woto, bãmb pidsa bũmb ninga fãa sẽn zems yãmb sẽn da pĩnd n yãk ne y pãnga la y ratma.
La moasã, Zu-soaba, kelg-y b zabr goama. La y kõ y tẽn-tʋmdbã raood kãseng tɩ b moon yãmb koɛɛgã.
Tẽeg-y y nug n kɩt tɩ neb paam maagre, tɩ bõn-bãna la bãna maan ne y tẽn-tʋmd-sõng a Zezi yʋʋre.
La bãmb sẽn pʋʋs n sɛ, bãmb sẽn da tigim taab roog ningã rigmdame. La b fãa pida ne Sɩɩg-sõngo. La b moona Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã ne raoodo.
Neb wʋsgã sẽn ya tẽedbã sũyã la b yama fãa ra yaa a yembre. Bãmb ned ba a yen dag n ka yet tɩ bũmb nins yẽ sẽn so wã yaa a meng rẽnd ye. La paoongã fãa ra yaa bãmb fãa n so.
La tẽn-tʋmdbã ra kɩta Zu-soaba a Zezi vʋʋgrã kaset ne pãn-kãsenga. La bark kãseng ra sigda bãmb fãa zutu.
La bãmb sʋka ned ba a yen da ka naong soab ye, bala, neb nins fãa sẽn da tar pʋto, wall rotã koosa bãmb fãa, n dɩk b sẽn koosã ligd n tall n wa.
La b kɩta tẽn-tʋmdba ligdã, la b pʋɩta ligdã tɩ ned kam fãa paam sẽn zems a sõngre.
La a Zozɛf, tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn pʋd a soab yʋʋr t'a Barnabas sẽn dat n togs tɩ ned sẽn belsd a taaba. Yẽ yaa Levi buudu la a yita Sɩpr.
Yẽ koosa a pʋʋg n tall ligdã n wa rɩgl tẽn-tʋmdba taoore.
La rao a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Ananiyas ne a paga a Safɩra me koosa b pʋʋgo.
La a Ananiyas ne a paga seda ne taab n yãk ligdã n bĩng b mens yĩnga. La a rɩk sẽn kellã n tɩ kɩs tẽn-tʋmdbã.
La a Pɩyɛɛr sok-a lame yaa: Ananiyas, yaa bõe tɩ Sʋtãana soog fo sũurã hal n kɩt tɩ f yag zĩrĩ ne Sɩɩg-sõng n yãk pʋʋgã ligd fo sẽn koosã?

Fo sẽn dag n nan ka koos pʋʋgã, a ka foom n so laa? La fo sẽn koos-a wã ligdã ka fo rẽnd sɩda? La yɩɩ a wãn tɩ fo tags f sũurẽ tɩ maan bõn-kãnga? Fo ka yag zĩrĩ wã ne ninsaalb ye, la yaa ne Wẽnnaam la f yag-yã.
A Ananiyas sẽn wʋm gom-kãense a lʋɩɩ tẽng n ki. La rabeem kãseng yõka neb nins fãa sẽn wʋm yel-kãnga
La kom-bɩɩsa yikame n dɩk-a n vil ne pɛɛl n tɩ mumi.
La sẽn kaoos bilf n kolg lɛɛr a tãabo, a Ananiyas pagã me kẽeme la yẽ ka bãng bũmb ninga sẽn da maana ye.
A Pɩyɛɛr sok-a lame yaa: Togs maam yãmb sã n koosa y pʋʋgã a woto tɛka. La a leokame tɩ n-ye, tɩ yaa woto tɛka.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr yeela yẽ yaa: Yɩɩ a wãn tɩ yãmb sed ne taab n na n mak Zu-soabã Sɩɩga? Gese, neb nins sẽn mum fo sɩdã bee rignoorẽ, la bãmb na n dɩka foom me n looge.
La wakat kãng bala, yẽ lʋɩɩ tẽng a Pɩyɛɛr taoor n ki. La kom-bɩɩsã kẽeme n mik t'a Safɩra kiime. La b rɩk-a lame n tɩ mum n yegl a sɩdã.
Rabeem kãseng yõka tẽedba fãa ne neb nins fãa sẽn wʋm bõn-kãensa.
Tẽn-tʋmdba maana bãna la bõn-yɛɛsds wʋsg nebã sʋka. Tẽedba fãa tigma taab zĩig ning sẽn boond tɩ Salmo zãndã.
La neb a taabã sʋk ned ba a yen da ka saagd n dat n naag-b ye. La nebã ra pẽgda tẽedba wʋsgo.
Raop la pagb wʋsg sẽn da tẽed Zu-soaba tara paasg daar fãa.
B ra tallda bãad-dãmb ne gãas wala pãnday n wat n gãnegd-b soaya zut tɩ daar ninga a Pɩyɛɛr sã n wa n loogdẽ, bɩ a maasma tõe n bui bãad-dãmb kẽere.
La neb wʋsg-wʋsg yii tẽns sẽn yeg Zeruzalɛm n tall bãad-dãmb la neb zĩn-dẽgd sẽn namsd n wa. La bãmb fãa paama maagre.
La maan-kʋʋdba kãsem ne neb nins fãa sẽn da be ne yẽnda wã, sẽn dat n togs tɩ Saduusẽ-dãmbã, yik n pida ne sũ-kiiri.
Bãmb yõga tẽn-tʋmdbã n kẽes bi-bees roogẽ.
La Zu-soabã malɛk waa ne yʋng n pak bi-bees roogã kʋɩleng n yiis tẽn-tʋmdbã n yeel-b yaa:
Kẽng-y n tɩ yals-y wẽnd-doogã pʋg n togs nebã vɩɩm kãnga koɛɛga fãa.

La bãmb sẽn wʋm woto, bãmb kẽe wẽnd-doogẽ wã yibeoog pĩnd n sɩng n zãmsd nebã. La maan-kʋʋdba kãsem ne neb nins sẽn da be ne yẽ wã waame n tigim kaorengã yɛl-bʋ-kaoodba la Israyɛl kãsem-dãmbã, La b tʋmame tɩ b tall tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn be bi-bees roogẽ wã n wa.
La gũudba sẽn ta bi-bees roogẽ wã, b ka yãnd tẽn-tʋmdbã be ye. La b lebgame n tɩ yeel yaa:
Tõnd yãa bi-bees roogã sẽn pag sõama, tɩ gũudbã yas noyẽ wã n gũudẽ. La tõnd sẽn pake d ka yã ned doogã pʋgẽ ye.

La bãmb sẽn wʋm gom-kãensã, wẽnd-doog gũudbã kãsem ne maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmb dag n ka mi b sẽn na n tags bũmb ninga tẽn-tʋmdbã wɛɛngẽ ye, la b ra sokda b mens tɩ yel-kãnga na n yɩɩ a wãna.
La ned n wa n yeel-b tɩ neb nins bãmb sẽn dag n kẽes bi-bees roogã bee wẽnd-doogẽ wã n zãmsd nebã.
La wẽnd-doog gũudbã kãsem ne gũudba kẽngame n tɩ tall tẽn-tʋmdbã n wa n ka maan-b pãng ye. Tɩ bõe, gũudba ra yɛɛsdame tɩ nebã na n wa lob bãmb kuga.
La b sẽn tall tẽn-tʋmdbã n leb n wa, b kɩtame tɩ b yals kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã taoore. La maan-kʋʋdba kãsem yeel-b lame yaa:
Tõnd dag n yeela yãmb tɩ y ra le saag n zãms nebã ne yʋ-kãngã ye. La ade, yãmb pidsa Zeruzalɛm ne y zãmsgã. La y rat n dɩk raowã kũum yell n dogl tõnd zutu!
A Pɩyɛɛr ne tẽn-tʋmdbã leokame yaa: Tõnd tog n saka Wẽnnaam n yɩɩd ninsaalbã.
Tõnd yaab-rãmba Wẽnnaam vʋʋga a Zezi yãmb sẽn dag n ka a soab da-pɩkã zug tɩ b ki wã.
Wẽnnaam zẽka a Zezi tɩ b be bãmb rɩtgo n ya rĩma la fãagda n na n kõ Israyɛl nebã yam tekre la yel-wẽna sugri.
Tõnd yaa bõn-kãens kaset dãmba. La Sɩɩg-sõng Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ neb nins sẽn sak bãmbã me yaa kaset soaba.
La kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã sẽn wʋm gom-kãense, b sũyã puugame tɩ b ra baood tẽn-tʋmdbã n dat n kʋ.

La tõog karen-saamb a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Gamalyɛll n ya Fariisẽ ned n dag be b sʋka. La neba ra waoogda yẽnda la a yika kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã taoor n kõ noor tɩ yiis tẽn-tʋmdbã tɩ yɩ bilfu.
La yẽ yeela nebã yaa: Israyɛl neba, gũus-y ne bũmb ningã yãmb sẽn dat n maan nin-bãmba wã.

Tɩ bõe, a Tedaas yika wakat sẽn ka zãra n yetẽ tɩ yẽ yaa nin-kãsenga. La neb sẽn kolg kobs naas da tũuda yẽnda. La b kʋ-a lame, la neb nins fãa sẽn da tũud yẽ wã zoe n sãeegame, la b tũudma yɩɩ zaalem.
La yẽ sẽn looge, Galile dao a Zudas me yika sõdbã wakat n kɩt tɩ neb wʋsg tũ yẽnda. La b kʋʋ yẽ me, la neb nins fãa sẽn da tũud yẽ wã sãeegame.
Dẽ, moasã, mam yeta yãmb tɩ y bas nin-bãmba tɩ b loog la y ra le bao tɩ maan bãmb bũmb ye. Tɩ bõe, bãmb sẽn maanda, wala b tʋʋma sã yaa ninsaalb rẽnda, b na n sãama b toore.
La b sã n yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ, yãmb kõn tõog n sãam-b ye. Gũus-y y mens n da wa n zab ne Wẽnnaam ye.
Bãmb saka a Gamalyɛl goama. La b leb n boola tẽn-tʋmdbã n kɩt tɩ b pãb-b ne kalwaase n yeel-b tɩ b ra le saag n gom ne a Zezi yʋʋr ye. La b bas-ba.
Tẽn-tʋmdbã yii kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã taoor ne sũ-noogo b sẽn ges tɩ bãmb zemsame tɩ paam namsg a Zezi yʋʋrã yĩnga.
Bãmb dag n zãmsda nebã la b moond Kirist Zezi koe-noogã wẽnd-doogẽ wã la zagsã pʋs daar fãa n ka basdẽ ye.

Wakat kãnga, karen-biisã ra lebgda wʋsgo. Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn vɩ-b tẽn-taasã yẽgma ne Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn vɩ-b Zeruzalɛma, b sẽn da ka kõt bãmb pʋgkõapã b daar fãa pʋɩɩrã wa sẽn zemsã yĩnga.
Dẽ, tẽn-tʋmdba piig la a yiibã tigma karen-biisa fãa n yeel-b yaa: A ka zems tɩ tõnd bas Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã mooneg n pʋɩt neb rɩɩb ye.
Ba-biisi, woto yĩngã, bɩ y yãk raop a yopoe yãmb sʋkã sẽn tar kaset sõngo, n pid ne Sɩɩg-sõng la yam, tɩ tõnd ning tʋʋm-kãngã bãmb zutu.
La tõnd na n kell n kẽnga taoor ne pʋʋsgo la Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã moonego.

La neb kʋʋngã fãa sũur yɩɩ noog ne koe-kãnga. Dẽ, bãmb yãka a Etɛn sẽn pid ne tẽeb la Sɩɩg-sõngo la a Filip la a Porkoor la a Nikanoor la a Tɩmo la a Parmenaas ne a Nikola sẽn yit Ãntiyos n dag n kẽ Zuif-rãmba kaorengo.
B talla bãmb n wa tẽn-tʋmdba nengẽ la b pʋʋsame n tik-b ne b nusi.
La Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã ra saagdame n yɩɩd pĩnda, la karen-biisã sõor dag n paasda wʋsg Zeruzalɛm. La maan-kʋʋdb wʋsg ra sakda tẽebã.
A Etɛn sẽn pid ne bark la pãnga, a maana bõn-yɛɛsds kãsemse la bãn neba sʋka.
La karen-doog ning sẽn boond tɩ neb sẽn paam lohorem karen-doogã neb kẽere sẽn yit Sirɛn la Alegsãndri n paas ne Zuif-rãmb sẽn yit Silisi la Azi soolem sɩngame n wẽ nokoeemd ne a Etɛn.
La a Etɛn sẽn da gomd ne yam la Sɩɩg-sõng pãngã, b ka tõog n leok yẽ ye.
Dẽ, b maana Zãmb n paam neb tɩ b yeel tɩ bãmb wʋmame t'a Etɛn tʋʋd a Moyiis ne Wẽnnaam.
La b rãmba nebã ne kãsem-dãmba la ne gʋlsdbã. La b waame n yõk a Etɛn ne pãng n tall-a n kẽng Kaoreng-yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã taoore.
Bãmb waa ne zĩri kaset dãmb tɩ b yet t'a Etɛn tʋʋda zĩ-sõngã la tõogã n ka basdẽ ye.
Bala, bãmb wʋma a Etɛn sẽn yeel tɩ Nazarɛt dao a Zezi na n sãama zĩ-kãnga la b tek minind nins a Moyiis sẽn da kõ bãmbã.
Neb nins sẽn da zĩ bʋ-kaoorã zĩigẽ wã fãa ra geta a Etɛn la b yãame tɩ yẽ nengã wẽnda wa malɛk nenga.
La maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem soka a Etɛn tɩ sɩd yaa a woto laa?

A Etɛn leokame n yeel yaa: Raopa, la ba-biisi la m ba-rãmba, kelg-y-yã. Tõnd yaab a Abraham sẽn dag n be Mezopotami n nan ka kẽng kaarã nandã, Wẽnnaam sẽn tar zĩirã vẽnega b meng ne bãmba.
La Wẽnnaam yeel-b lame tɩ: "Yi n bas f tẽngã ne f buudã n kẽng tẽng ning mam sẽn na n wilg foomã."
Dẽ, a Abraham yi n basa Kalde-rãmba tẽng n kẽng n tɩ zĩnd kaarã. La bãmb ba wã kũum poore, Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ b yi be n wa tẽn-kãnga yãmb sẽn be moasã wã pʋgẽ.

La Wẽnnaam ka kõ a Abraham zĩig ba sẽn sekd naoor rɩglog tɩ yɩ a pʋɩɩr tẽng kãngã pʋgẽ ye. La Wẽnnaam kãabame tɩ b na n kõo bãmb ne b yagensã tẽngã tɩ b soog-a, a Abraham loogr poore. La rẽ t'a Abraham nan ka tar biig ye. Wẽnnaam da gomame n yeel a Abraham a woto:
"Fo yagensã na n zĩnda tẽng a to, tɩ b kẽes-b yembdo, la b na n namsa bãmb hal tɩ ta yʋʋm kobs naase."
Wẽnnaam yeelame yaa: "La mam na n sɩbga buud ninga sẽn na n kẽes-b yembdã, la bõn-kãng zugẽ b na n yaool n yii be n waoog maam tẽn-kãnga pʋgẽ."

Dẽ, Wẽnnaam maaana zood lagem-n-taar ne a Abraham n kõ-a bãong kẽesg tɩ yɩ bãnde. La a Abraham doga a Izake. La rasem a nii sẽn ta, b kẽesa a Izak bãongo, la a Izak sẽn dog a Zakobe, a kẽesa yẽ me bãongo. La a Zakob sẽn dog Zuif-rãmba yaab-rãmb piig la a yiibã, a kẽes-b la bãongo.
La Zuif-rãmba yaab-rãmb maana sũ-kiir ne a Zozɛf n koos-a tɩ b tall-a n kẽng Ezipt.

La Wẽnnaam dag n bee ne a Zozɛf, la b fãaga yẽ namsgã fãa pʋgẽ. La Wẽnnaam kɩtame t'a Zozɛf tar yam la bark Ezipt rĩm a Farõ nifẽ. La Farõ kɩtame t'a Zozɛf lebg Ezipt Gʋvɛrneer ne na-yirã fãa.
La kom-kãseng n kẽ Ezipt soolma fãa ne Kana tẽng gilli, la namsgã yɩɩ wʋsgo la tõnd yaab-rãmba ra ka tar dɩɩb sẽn na rɩ ye.
A Zakob sẽn wʋm tɩ kood bee Ezipt tẽnga, b tʋma tõnd yaab-rãmba be dẽenem.
La a Zakob sẽn tʋm-b naoor a yiib soaba, a Zozɛf vẽnega a meng ne a ba-biisã. La Farõ bãnga a Zozɛf sẽn ya buud ninga.
Dẽ, a Zozɛf tʋmame tɩ b tɩ peeg a ba a Zakob ne b yirã rãmb fãa, b sõora taa bãmb pis-yopoe la a nu.
A Zakob kẽnga Ezipt la b kii be. La tõnd yaab-rãmba me kii be.
La b tʋka b kũuma n kẽng Sɩsɛm n tɩ mum yaoog ninga a Abraham sẽn dag n da ne ligd a Hamoor kamba nengẽ sẽn be Sɩsɛma pʋgẽ.
La wakatã sẽn kolgd tɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n maan kãabg ninga ne a Abrahamã tog n pidsi, neba fɩɩgame n lebg wʋsg Ezipt tẽngã pʋgẽ,
hal tɩ Ezipt rĩm a to sẽn ka bãng a Zozɛf reeg naam.
Rĩm kãng maana sɩlem n zãmb tõnd buudã n maan tõnd yaab-rãmbã pãng n kɩt tɩ b bas b kom-peels tɩ b ki.
La yaa wakat kãng la b rog a Moyiis. A rag n yaa bi-neere n ta Wẽnnaam yam. La yẽ zĩnda a ba wã zakẽ kiis a tãabo.
La b sẽn yiis a Moyiis n base, Farõ bi-pugla rɩka yẽ n wub-a wa a biiga.
B zãmsa a Moyiis Ezipt-rãmba yama fãa. La a goama ne a tʋʋma ra tara pãnga.
La a Moyiis sẽn ta yʋʋm pis naase, a tags a sũurẽ n dat n gesa a ba-biisã sẽn ya Israyɛl yagensã.
A Moyiis yãa b sẽn maand Israyɛl ned a yen pãnga, la a sõnga Israyɛl nedã n dok a sũur n kʋ Ezipt nedã.
A Moyiis ra tẽedame t'a ba-biisã na n bãngame tɩ Wẽnnaam na n talla yẽnda n fãag ba. La b ka bãng ye.
La vẽkembeoogo, a Moyiis yãa Israyɛl neb a yiib sẽn zabd taaba. La yẽ rat paas a zabrã n yeel yaa: "Yaa bõe tɩ y maan taab pãnga? Yãmb yaa ba-biisi."
Ned ninga sẽn maand a to wã pãngã tusa yẽ n yeel-a tɩ ãnna n yãk-a t'a yɩ bãmb naab la b bʋ-kaooda,
t'a Moyiis rat kʋʋ yẽ wala a sẽn kʋ Ezipt nedã zaame wã laa?
A Moyiis sẽn wʋm gom-kãngã, a Zoeeme n kẽng n tɩ zĩnd Madiyã tẽng n dog kom-dibli a yiib beene.
La yʋʋm pis naas rẽ zugẽ, malɛk puka a meng ne a Moyiis tuug sẽn wit bugum pʋgẽ weoog sẽn pẽ Sinayi tãngã.
A Moyiis sẽn yã tuugã sẽn wit bugmã b yɛɛsame. La b sẽn kolgd n na n gese, bãmb wʋma Zu-soaba koɛɛg sẽn yeel yaa:
"Mam yaa fo yaab-rãmba Wẽnnaam. A Abraham la a Izak ne a Zakob Wẽnnaam." La rabeem yõka a Moyiis t'a sɩng n digda, n ka saag n na n ges ye.
La Zu-soaba yeela a Moyiis yaa: "Piid f neooda wã, bala fo sẽn be zĩig ningã yaa zĩ-sõngo.
Mam yãa m nebã sẽn be Eziptã namsgã, la m wʋma b wõosgã. La m sigame n na n fãag-ba. Moasã, wa tɩ m na n tʋm-f la Ezipt."

Moyiis ninga Israyɛl kamba sẽn dag yeel tɩ ãnna yãk-a t'a yɩ bãmb naab la b bʋ-kaoodã, yaa Moyiis kãng la Wẽnnaam tʋmy t'a yɩ naaba la fãagda, ne malɛk ninga sẽn dag n puk a meng ne bãmb tuugã pʋgẽ wã sõngre.
Yaa a Moyiis n maan bõn-yɛɛsds la bãna Ezipt tẽngã n yiis Israyɛl kambã Ezipt soolma pʋgẽ la mog-miuugã ne weoogã pʋgẽ yʋʋm pis-naasã.
Leb n ya a Moyiis kãng n dag n yeel Israyɛl kambã yaa: "Wẽnnaam na n yãka b no-rɛɛs sẽn wẽnd maam yãmb ba-biisã sʋk n kõ yãmba."
La yaa yẽnda n zĩnd ne Israyɛl nebã weoogẽ wã, n dag n be ne malɛkã sẽn gomd ne yẽnda Sinayi tãngã. La a zĩnda ne tõnd yaab-rãmbã n deeg tõog sẽn kõt vɩɩmã n kõ yãmba.
Tõnd yaab-rãmbã rag n ka tʋlg n na n sak a Moyiis ye. Bãmb basa a Moyiis kɛɛnga n baood n lebg n leb Ezipt.
B yeela a Aarõ yaa: "Maan wẽnnaam-dãmb n kõ tõnd tɩ b lʋɩ d taoore. Tɩ bõe, a Moyiisi, soab ning sẽn yiis-a tõnd Ezipt tẽngã, tõnd ka mi bũmb ning sẽn maan-a ye."
Dẽ, badaare b maana nag-bila, n maan maoong n kõ wẽnd-naandgã, la b maana sũ-noog ne bũmb ninga b mens nus sẽn maana.

La Wẽnnaam wẽnemda b neng n bas-b tɩ b pʋʋs yĩngr ãds wa sẽn gʋls Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sebr pʋgẽ wã: "Israyɛl neba, yãmb sẽn zĩnd weoogã pʋgẽ yʋʋm pis-naasã, yãmb kʋʋ rũms la y maan maand n kõ maam sɩda?
La yãmb zẽka wẽnnaam a molok fu-roogo ne wẽnnaam a Ramfã ãdga. Yãmb maana wẽnd-naands kãens n na n waoogd-ba. Woto yĩnga, mam na n yiisa yãmb tɩ y kẽng hal n zãag ne Babilon."
Weoogẽ wã tõnd yaab-rãmba da tara kaset fu-roogã. Fu-roogã wẽnda mamsg ninga a Moyiis sẽn dag n yãndã, tɩ sẽn gomd-a ne yẽ wã yeel-a t'a ti n wẽneg a woto wã.

Rẽ zugẽ, tõnd yaab-rãmba reega fu-ro-kãng n tall-a n kẽ tẽng ninga pʋg a Zozoe sẽn lʋɩ bãmb taoor n zab tɩ Wẽnnaam dig buud a taabã tɩ b reeg n soogã, la fu-roogã paa be hal tɩ ta a Daviid zamaane.
A Daviid paama bark Wẽnnaam nifẽ, n kos bãmb noor n dat n me roog n kõ a Zakob Wẽnnaam.
La baoosgo yɩɩ a Salmo n me roogã n kõ Wẽnnaam.
La Wẽnnaam sẽn-ka-to ka kẽed rot sẽn me ne ninsaalb nus ye. Wala Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa sẽn yeelã:
Zu-soaba yeelame: "Arzãn yaa mam geere la dũniyã yaa mam nao-raogendga. Ro-bʋg buud la yãmb na n me n kõ maam? La mam vʋʋsg zĩig bee yɛ?
Ka mam meng n naan bõn-kãens fãa laa?"
Yãmb yaa kɩɩsdba. La yãmb sũyã ne y tʋba pagame n ka wʋmd Wẽnnaam boaalã ye. Yãmb kɩɩsda Sɩɩg-sõng daar fãa wala y yaab-rãmbã sẽn da maana.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs bʋg la y yaab-rãmbã ka namse? B kʋʋ neb nins sẽn da pĩnd n togs tɩrlem soaba waoongã. La moasã, yaa yãmb n zãmb tɩrlem soabã n kʋ-a.
Malɛk-rãmba kõo yãmb Wẽnnaam tõogã la yãmb ka sak-a ye.
Kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã sẽn wʋm gom-kãensã, b sũyã yika ne a Etɛn tɩ b wãb b yẽna.
La a Etɛn sẽn pid ne Sɩɩg-sõngo, yẽ gesa yĩngri la a yãnda Wẽnnaam ziirã, la a Zezi sẽn yas Wẽnnaam dɩtgo.
La a Etɛn yeelame yaa: Kelg-y yã, mam nee yĩngr sẽn pake la Ninsaal Bi-riblã sẽn yas Wẽnnaam dɩtgo.
Dẽ, bãmb kelma ne pãng n yẽd b tʋba. La b fãa wudgame n yõk a Etɛn.
La b talla yẽnda n yi tẽngã n sɩng n lob-a ne kug n na n kʋ. La kaset dãmba rʋʋga b fut bi-bɩɩg a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Soll taoore.
La b sẽn da lobd a Etɛn ne kugã, a ra pʋʋsdame n yetẽ: Zu-soab a Zezi, reeg-y m sɩɩgã.
Dẽ, a Etɛn yĩgimda a rũm zug n kelem ne pãng n yeel yaa: Zu-soaba da ning-y b taal yel-wẽn-kãnga yĩng ye. La a sẽn yeel a woto n sɛ, a gũsame.
La a Soll da gesame t'a Etɛn kʋʋbã zemsame.
Nin-sõamyã rɩka a Etɛn n mum la b yãba wʋsg yẽ kũuma yĩnga.
La a Soll da namsda tẽedbã wʋsgo. Yẽ ra kẽeda rot pʋs fãa n yõgd raop la pagb n kẽesd-b bi-bees roogẽ.
Dẽ, b sẽn sãeeg neb ninsã da kẽngda zĩig zĩig n moond koe-noogã.
A Filip kẽnga Samari na-tẽngã n tɩ moon Kirist koɛɛgã be.
Neb kʋʋngã sẽn wʋmd la b yãt a Filip sẽn maand bõn-bãna, bãmb naaga taab n kelgd bũmb ninga yẽ sẽn togsdã neer neere.
Tɩ bõe, zin-dẽgd wʋsg ra kelemda ne pãng n yit n basd neb nins b sẽn da tarã. La koms-rãmb wʋsg ne wobs me ra paamda maagre.
La sũ-no-kãseng zĩnda tẽn-kãng pʋga.
Dao a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Sɩmo n da zoe n deng n be tẽn-kãng me pʋga n maand tɩt n yɛɛsd Samari nebã. A ra yeta a meng tɩ nin-kãsenga.
La sẽn sɩng ne nin-tals la nin-kãsems fãa ra kelgda yẽnda neere n yetẽ tɩ rao-kãng yaa Wẽnnaam pãnga. Tɩ yaa pãng ninga b sẽn boond tɩ pãn-kãsengã.
Nebã ra kelgda yẽ neere, tɩ bõe, yaa daar zãr la a maand a tɩɩmã n yɛɛsd bãmba.
La neba sẽn tẽ a Filip sẽn moond Wẽnnaam soolem koe-noogã la a Zezi Kirist yʋʋrã, b raop la b pagb sak n deega koom lisgu.
A Sɩmo menga tẽeme n deeg koom lisg n kell n pa ne a Filip la a sẽn yãt bõn-yɛɛsdsã ne bõn-bãn kãsemsã sẽn maandã, a yɛɛsame.
Tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn be Zeruzalɛmã sẽn wʋm tɩ Samari nebã reega Wẽnnaam goama, b tʋma a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã bãmb nengẽ.
A Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã sẽn ta Samari b pʋʋsa tẽedbã yĩng tɩ b reeg Sɩɩg-sõngo.
Bala, Sɩɩg-sõng nan zɩɩ n sig bãmb ned ba a yen zug ye. Bãmb da paama koom lisg bal ne zu-soab a Zezi yʋʋre.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã tika tẽedba ne b nusi, la b reega Sɩɩg-sõngo.
A Sɩmo sẽn yã tɩ wakat ning tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn tikd tẽedbã ne b nusã b reegda Sɩɩg-sõngo, yẽ waa ne ligd n na n kõ a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã.
Yẽ yeel-b lame yaa: Kõ-y maam me pãn-kãnga tɩ mam sẽn na n tik ned ning fãa ne m nusi, bɩ a reeg Sɩɩg-sõngo.
La a Pɩyɛɛr yeela yẽnda yaa: Bɩ f ligdã naag foom n sãam, fo sẽn tẽed tɩ ligd tõe n daa Wẽnnaam kũunã yĩnga.
Fo ka tar pʋɩɩr yel-kãnga pʋgẽ ye. Tɩ bõe fo sũurã ka tɩrg Wẽnnaam taoor ye.
Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ f tek yam n bas f tags wẽnsã n pʋʋs Zu-soabã tɩ sã n tõe bɩ f paam sugr kũun tags kãnga sẽn be fo sũurẽ wã yĩnga.
Tɩ bõe, mam neeme tɩ sũ-toog n tar foo tɩ f ya yel-wẽna yamba.
A Sɩmo yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb mens pʋʋs Zu-soabã mam yĩnga, tɩ bũmb nins yãmb sẽn yeelã ba a yen da paam maam ye.
La a Pɩyɛɛr ne a Zã sẽn kɩs kaset la b moon Zu-soabã koɛɛg n sa, b lebg n leba Zeruzalɛm. La b sẽn wa n dabdã, b moona koe-noogã Samari tẽn-bõones wʋsg pʋse.
La Zu-soabã malɛk goma ne a Filip n yeel-a t'a yik n kẽng wĩndgã goabg n tũ sor ningã sẽn yit Zeruzalɛm n dabd Gaza, n ya weoog sorã.
A Filip yikame kẽng tao-tao. La rao a yen sẽn ya zu-soab n yit Etiyopi sega yẽ sorã zugu. Rao-kãng yaa Etiyopi rĩm-poaka, Kãndaas ligd gũuda, yẽ ra waa Zeruzalɛm n na n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam.
La yẽ ra lebg n kuiisame, a ra zĩi a wiid voatɩɩr pʋg n karemd Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sebre.
La Sɩɩg-sõng yeela a Filip t'a kẽng n kolg voatɩɩrã.
Yẽ wudg n kolgame, la a wʋma Etiyopi rao wã sẽn da karemd Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi sebre, t'a Filip sok-a t'a wʋmda a sẽn karemda võor sɩda?
Tɩ raowã leok tɩ yẽ na n yɩɩ wãn n tõog n wʋm a võor tɩ sã n ka ned n bilg n kõ-a. La a boola a Filip t'a wa kẽ voatɩɩrã pʋg n zĩnd ne yẽnda.
Rao wã sẽn da karemd zĩig ninga gʋls-sõngã pʋgẽ wã ra yeta a woto: B waa ne bãmb wala b sẽn wat ne pesg kʋʋb zĩigẽ, la wala pe-bil sẽn ka yaagd a noor a wõrsdã ye.
B sẽn paoog bãmba pʋgẽ, b ka kao b bʋʋd tɩrg ye. Ãnna n na n tõog n wilg bãmb sẽn bas b poorẽ? Bala, b yiisa bãmb vɩɩm dũniyã zug ka.
Ligd-gũudã yeela a Filip yaa: M Bõosdame tɩ y togs maam. Yaa ãnna yell la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsã sẽn gomd a woto wã? Yaa b meng yell bii, bɩ yaa ned a to yelle?
Dẽ, a Filip sɩnga ne gʋls-sõngã zĩ-kãng n moon yẽnda a Zezi koe-noogã.
La bãmb sẽn ket n kẽnda, b waa n taa koom zĩigẽ. La ligd-gũudã yeelame yaa: Ad koom, bõe n gɩdg maam ne koom lisgu?
A Filip yeel-a lame t'a sã n tẽ ne a sũurã fãa, a tõe n paama koom lisgu. La a leokame tɩ yẽ tẽedame t'a Zezi Kirist yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.
Dẽ, a kɩtame tɩ voatɩɩrã yalse. La a Filip ne ligd-gũudã tũu taab n sig n kẽ koome wã. La a Filip lisa yẽnda.
La bãmb sẽn lebg n yi koomã pʋgẽ, Zu-soabã Sɩɩg rɩka a Filip n looge, la ligd-gũudã ka le yãnd-a ye. La a leb n dɩka a sor ne sũ-noogo.
La b yãa a Filip Azot. La yẽ moona koe-noogã tẽns nins fãa yẽ sẽn tũ wã, halɩ n tɩ ta Sezaare.
Baoosgo, a Soll sẽn dag n ket n namsd Zu-soaba karen-biis n dat kʋ-bã, a kẽnga maan-kʋʋdba kãsem nengẽ
n tɩ kos-a t'a gʋls sɛb n tʋm karen-dot nins sẽn be Damasã tɩ yẽ sã tɩ n yã neb beene sẽn tũud Zu-soaba sore, sã n ya raop wala pagba, bɩ yẽ yõg-b n tall n wa Zeruzalɛm.
La yẽ sẽn wa n be sorẽ n kolg Damase, tao-tao bala, vẽenem n yi arzãn n yãg n gũbg yẽnda.
La a Soll lʋɩɩ tẽnga. La a wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yet yẽnda yaa: Solle, Solle, yaa bõe tɩ fo namsd maam?

A Soll leokame tɩ Zu-soaba, yãmb yaa ãnna: La Zu-soaba yeelame yaa: Mam yaa a Zezi fo sẽn namsd a soabã. Na n yɩɩ toog ne foom, fo sẽn kɩɩsda yĩnga. La yẽ ra yɛɛsame n digd n sok Zu-soaba tɩ bãmb datame tɩ yẽ maan bõe. Dẽ Zu-soaba yeela yẽnda
Yik n kẽ tẽngã pʋgẽ, la beene b na n yeela foom bũmb ninga f sẽn tog n maane.
La raop nins sẽn da tũud a Sollã yɛɛsame n yas n ka tõe n gom ye. B dag n wʋmda koɛɛgã la b ka ne ned ye.
A Soll yikame, la baa yẽ nina sẽn pukã, a ra ka tõe n yã baa fʋɩ. B gãda a nug n tae-a n kẽng Damase.
Yẽ maana rasem a tãab n ka tõe n yã ye. La a ka rɩ wala a yũ bũmb ye.
Karen-biig a ye n dag n be Damas t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Ananiyas. Zu-soaba puka b meng ne yẽnda vẽnegr pʋgẽ n yeel-a tɩ Ananiyas! T'a leok yaa: Ad mam Zu-soaba.
Zu-soaba yeela a Ananiyas yaa: Yik n kẽng sor ning sẽn boond tɩ tɩrgã n ta a Zudas zakẽ n bao ned yen sẽn yit Tars t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Solle.
Tɩ bõe yẽ pʋʋsdame n yã vẽnegr pʋgẽ tɩ ned a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Ananiyas waa n tik yẽ ne a a nus tɩ yẽnda leb n paam a nini.
A Ananiyas leokame n yeel yaa: Zu-soaba, mam wʋma neb wʋsg sẽn gomd rao-kãnga sẽn maan yãmb nebã sẽn be Zeruzalɛma wẽng wʋsga yelle.
La maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmb kõo yẽ noor t'a wa ka n yõg neb nins fãa sẽn pʋʋsd ne yãmb yʋʋrã.
La Zu-soab yeela a Ananiyas yaa: Kẽnge. Tɩ bõe, mam yãka rao-kãnga n na n kɩt t'a tall mam yʋʋrã n wilg bu-zẽmse la rĩm-dãmba la Israyɛl nebã.
La mam meng n na n wilg yẽnda namsg nins fãa yẽ sẽn tog n nams yʋʋrã yĩngã.

La a Ananiyas kẽngame. La yẽ taa n kẽe roogẽ wã n tik a Soll ne a nus n yeel-a yaa: Ba-biig a Solle, Zu-soab a Zezi sẽn puk b meng ne yãmb y sẽn wa n be sorã zug n watẽ wã tʋma maan tɩ m wa tɩ y tõe n leb n paam y nini, la y pid ne Sɩɩg-sõngo.
La tao-tao bala, bũmb sẽn wẽnd wa nod-pags yi a Soll nini wã n lʋɩ. La yẽ leb n paama a nini. La yẽ yikame n deeg koom lisgu.
Dẽ, a Soll deega rɩɩb n dɩ la a pãnga leb n waame.
La a Soll paa ne karen-biisã sẽn be Damasã rasem bilfu. La tao-tao bala, yẽ sɩngame n moond koɛɛga karen-dot pʋs n yẽte t'a Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla.

Neb nins fãa sẽn wʋm yẽnda wã yɛɛsame n sokdẽ tɩ rao-kãnga n dag n namsd neb nins sẽn be Zeruzalɛm n pʋʋsd ne a Zezi yʋʋra wɛ! Tɩ la yẽ ka wa ka n na n yõg neb nins sẽn pʋʋsd ne a Zezi yʋʋrã n tall-b n kẽng n tɩ ko maan-kʋʋdba kãsem-dãmba wɛ?
La a Soll koe-moonegã pãng ra paasdame daar fãa la yẽ ra tõogda Zuif-rãmbã sẽn be Damasã n wilgd-b t'a Zezi sɩd yaa Kiristã.
La sẽn kaoos bilfu, Zuif-rãmba naaga taab n yãk yam n dat n kʋ a Solle.
La a Soll bãnga b yam-wẽngã. Bãmb dag n gũusda tẽnga noyã wĩndg la yʋngo, sẽn na n yɩl n kɩt tɩ b kʋ a Solle.
Dẽ, karen-biisa kẽesa a Soll peoogẽ ne yʋng n gãndg n sik yẽ lalgã poore.
A Soll sẽn ta Zeruzalɛm, yẽ makame n dat n lagem ne karen-biisã, la bãmb fãa ra zoeta a Solle. Tɩ bõe, b ra ka tẽed t'a Soll sɩd lebga a Zezi karen-biig ye.

Dẽ, a Barnabas peega a Soll n tall-a n kẽng tʋmtʋmdba nengẽ, n togs bãmb a Soll sẽn yã Zu-soaba sorã zugã, la Zu-soaba sẽn gom ne-a to-to wã. La yẽ togsa bãmb a Soll sẽn moon koɛɛgã ne pɛl-kɛgeng Damas tẽngã pʋgẽ ne a Zezi yʋʋrã.
La a Soll dag n tũuda bãmb n gõod la a wat Zeruzalɛm la a moond koɛɛga ne Zu-soaba yʋʋr ne raoodo.
A Soll ra gomda ne Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn gomd Gɛrk goama la a wẽed nokoɛɛm ne-ba. La b ra baood n na n kɩtame tɩ b kʋ a Solle.
La ba-biisã sẽn bãng bõn-kãnga, b talla a Soll n ta Sezaare n kɩt t'a kẽng Tars:
A Zezi tẽedba sẽn be zuude la Galile ne Samari wã fãa dag n bee laafɩ, b pãnga ra paasdame la b ra sakda Zu-soabã la Sɩɩg-sõng ra sõngd-b lame tɩ b lebgd wʋsgo.
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn da saagd zĩiga fãa n get nin-tũusdsã, a kẽnga a Zezi tẽedba sẽn da be lida wã nengẽ.
La yẽnda yaa rao a yen beene t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Ene n ya ki-bogre n gãe gãag zug hal yʋʋm a nii.
