A Pɩyɛɛr yeel-a lame yaa: Ene, a Zezi maagda foo, yik n maneg f gãagã f toore. La tao-tao bala a Ene yikame
Lida ne Saarõ tẽnga neba fãa yãa a Ene la b saka Zu-soabã.
Tẽed-poak a ye n da be Zope t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Tabita sẽn dat n togs tɩ Dorkas ne Gɛrk goama. A yʋʋra võor yaa yãka: Pʋg-kãng ra maanda tʋʋm-sõamyã wʋsgo, la a sõngd naong rãmba.
Ra-kãense, a Dorkas lʋɩɩ bãag n ki. La b sẽn so yẽ koom n sɛ, b rɩk-a lame n gãneg yĩngr doog pʋgẽ.
La Lida dag n ka zãr ne Zope ye. Dẽ, karen-biisã sẽn wʋm t'a Pɩyɛɛr bee Lida, b tʋma raop a yiib ye nengẽ tɩ b tɩ bõos-a t'a wa bãmb nengẽ n da kaoos ye.

La a Pɩyɛɛr yikame n tũ-b n looge. La yẽnda sẽn ta, b talla yẽ n dʋ yĩngr dooga pʋgẽ. La pʋgkõapa fãa kolga a Pɩyɛɛr n yãbd la b wilgd yẽndã fu-yerd ninsi la fut nins a Dorkas sẽn dag n sẽ a sẽn wa n ket n vɩ wã.
A Pɩyɛɛr kɩtame tɩ neba fãa yi. La yẽ yĩgimdame n pʋʋse. Dẽ a wẽnemdame n ges kũuma n yeel-a tɩ Tabita yiki. La a puka a nini. La a sẽn yãa a Pɩyɛɛr, a yikame n zĩndi.
La a Pɩyɛɛr gãda a nug n sõng-a t'a yik yĩngri. A Pɩyɛɛr boola nin-sõamyã ne pʋgkõapã n wilg-b t'a Dorkas vʋʋgame.
Zope tẽnga fãa wʋma bõn-kãnga, la neb wʋsg suk tẽe Zu-soabã.
A Pɩyɛɛr paa Zope n kaoos bilfu, yẽ siga zapa a sɩmo yiri.
Dao a ye n da be Sezaare t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Korney n ya sodaas koabg naab n be soda-kʋʋngã b sẽn boond tɩ Itali-rãmba sʋka.
Rao-kãng ra yaa wẽn-tũuda, la yẽ ne a yirã rãmb ra zoeta wẽnnaam. Yẽ ra sõngda neb wʋsg sẽn ya naong rãmba, la a ra pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam wakat fãa.
Sẽn zems zaabr lɛɛr a tãab sasa, yẽ yãa Wẽnnaam malɛk vẽeneg vẽnegr pʋgẽ t'a kẽ n yeel yẽ tɩ Korney.
La yẽ gesa malɛk ne rabeem n yeel-a yaa: Yaa a wãna m Zu-soaba? Malɛk yeel-a lame yaa: Wẽnnaam tẽra fo pʋʋsgã la f sẽn sõngd naong rãmba yelle, la b ka yĩnd f yell ye.
Dẽ moasã, bɩ f tʋm neb Zope tɩ b tɩ bool ned a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr t'a wa.
Yẽ siga zap a Sɩmo zakẽ, yirã bee ko-kãsenga noore.
La malɛk ning sẽn gom ne yẽ wã looge, a Korney boola a tʋmtʋmdb a yiib ne a sodaag a yen sẽn ya nin-sõng sodaas nins yẽ sẽn so wã sʋka.
A Korney togsa bãmb bũmb nins fãa sẽn maana la a tʋm-b Zope.
Vẽkembeoogo, bãmb sẽn waa n be sorẽ n kolgd Zope, sẽn zems wĩnto-sʋka, a Pɩyɛɛr dʋʋ roogã zug n na n pʋʋse.
La kom yõka a Pɩyɛɛr t'a rat rɩɩb n dɩ. La b sẽn segend rɩɩbã n na n kõ-a wakate, yẽ paama vẽnegre.
A Pɩyɛɛr yãnda arzãn sẽn pake, la bũmb sẽn wẽnd wa peen-bedr b sẽn loe a noy a naasã t'a sigd n sigd tẽnga.
La rũms buud fãa sẽn tar nao a naase, la bõn-vuudsã la bõn-pɩgs buud fãa n dag n be a pʋgẽ.
La koɛɛg n yeel a Pɩyɛɛr t'a yik n kʋ ne dɩ.
La a Pɩyɛɛr leokame yaa: Ayo, Zu-soaba, tɩ bõe mam zɩɩ n dɩ bũmb sẽn ka zems wala sẽn ya rẽgd ye.
La yẽ leb n wʋma koɛɛg sẽn gomd ne yẽnda n yetẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn yeel tɩ bũmb ning yaa yɩlgemdã bɩ a ra bool bõn-kãng tɩ yaa rẽgd ye.
Bõn-kãng maana naoor a tãabo. La tao-tao bal rẽ zugẽ bõn-kãng leb n zẽk leba arzãn pʋgẽ.
Wakate ninga a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn nan tagsd a sũurẽ n dat n bãng vẽnegr ninga yẽ sẽn yã wã võore, rẽ t'a Korney sẽn tʋm neb ninsã sok n bãnga a Sɩmo yirã zĩig n wa n be zaka noore.
Bãmb boolame n sok tɩ yaa ka la a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr sẽn be wã?
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn da ket n tagsd n baood vẽnegra võore, sɩɩgã yeela yẽnda tɩ ad neb a
tãab n be be n baood-a. T'a yik n sig n tũ la a ra sãmb ye tɩ bala yaa bãmb n tʋmba.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr sigame n kẽng ra-kãens nengẽ n yeel yaa: Yaa maam la ned ninga yãmb sẽn baoodã, yaa bõe yell n wa ne yãmb ka?

Bãmb leokame yaa: Sodaas koabg naab a Korney n tʋm tõndo. Bãmb yaa nin-tɩrga n zoet Wẽnnaam, la Zuif-rãmba fãa kɩta bãmb kaset sõngo. Wẽnnaam malɛk n sagl-b tɩ b kɩt yãmb wa b yirã tɩ b kelg bũmb ninga y sẽn tar n na n gom ne-bã.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr kɩtame tɩ b kẽ, la yẽ reeg-b-la sãando. Vẽkembeoogo, a Pɩyɛɛr yikame n tũ-b n looge. La ba-biisã sẽn be Zope wã neb kẽer yãaga bãmba.
La ra-yɩt-n-daare, bãmb taa Sezaare. A Korney ra gũudb lame, la yẽ ra boola a roagdba la a zo-nongds tɩ b tigim yẽ yirã.
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn wa n kẽedẽ wã, a Korney wa n sega yẽnda n lʋɩ n wõgemd a taoore, n na n pʋʋs-a ne waoogre.
La a Pɩyɛɛr roog-a lame n yeel-a yaa: Yiki, bala mam me yaa ninsaal bala.
Dẽ, yẽ kell n sõsda ne a Korney. La a kẽe roogẽ wã n mik neb wʋsg sẽn tigim be.

A Pɩyɛɛr yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb miime t'a ka zems ne Zuif-rãmba tõog tɩ ned sẽn ya Zuif lagem ne buud sẽn ka Zuif wala kẽ a zakẽ ye. La Wẽnnaam wilga maam tɩ mam ka tog n yeel ned ba yen tɩ sẽn ka zemse, wala rẽgd ye.
Yaa woto yĩng n kɩt tɩ yãmb sẽn bool maama, m waame n ka kɩɩs ye. Dẽ, mam dat n bãnga bũmb ninga sẽn kɩt tɩ yãmb tʋm n bool maama.
A Korney leokame yaa: Rab-tatẽ sẽn zems wakat kãnga, mam dag n bee m doogẽ zaabr lɛɛr a tãab wakat n pʋʋsdẽ. Tao-tao bala, rao sẽn da yer fut sẽn pɩnd n yals mam taoorã,
n yeel yaa: Korney! Wẽnnaam wʋma fo pʋʋsgã, la b ka yĩmd sõngr ninga fo sẽn sõngd naong rãmbã yell ye.
Dẽ, bɩ f tʋm neb Zope tɩ b tɩ bool a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr t'a wa. Yẽ siga a Sɩmo sẽn ya zapã zakẽ sẽn be ko-kãsengã sɛɛgã.
La tao-tao bala mam tʋma neb tɩ b bool yãmba. La yãmb maana neer n sak n wa. Moasã, tõnd fãa bee Wẽnnaam taoor ka n na n kelg bũmb nins fãa Zu-soabã sẽn yeel yãmb tɩ y togs tõndã.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr gomame n yeel yaa: Moasã, mam sɩd bãngame tɩ Wẽnnaam ka tũusd neb ye.
Ned ning fãa, sẽn ya buud ninga fãa sẽn zoet Wẽnnaam la a maand tɩrlem, yẽnda soab tata bãmb yam.
Wẽnnaam tʋma b koɛɛga Israyɛl yagensa nengẽ n togs-b tɩ laafɩ koe-noog wata a Zezi sẽn ya neba fãa Zu-soabã maasem yĩnga.
Yãmb mii bũmb ninga sẽn sɩng n maan Galile la Zude soolma fãa a Zã sẽn dag n moond neba koom lisg koɛɛg zugẽ.

Yãmb bãnga sẽn yɩ to-to tɩ Wẽnnaam sik b Sɩɩg-sõng pãngã Nazarɛt dao a Zezi zugã. La sẽn yɩ to-to me t'a Zezi saag tẽngã n maan neer n maag neb nins fãa sẽn dag n be Sʋtãana yembd pʋgẽ wã, tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam bee ne bãmba.
A Zezi sẽn maan bũmb nins fãa Zuif-rãmbã tẽngẽ wã la Zeruzalɛm pʋgẽ, tõnd yaa kaset dãmba. Bãmb ka a Zezi da-pɩk zug n kʋ-ba,
la rasem a tãab daare, Wẽnnaam vʋʋga bãmb n kõ-b noor tɩ b vẽneg b menga.
La b ka vẽneg b meng ne neba fãa ye. La yaa ne tõndo, Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n pĩnd n yãk tɩ ya kaset dãmbã tõnd dɩɩme la d yũ ne bãmb b vʋʋgrã zugẽ.
La a Zezi kõo tõnd noor tɩ d moon neba sʋk n kɩs kaset n yeel tɩ Wẽnnaam yãka bãmb tɩ b na n kao nin-vɩɩse la kũum bʋʋdo.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã fãa goma Zezi yell n yeel tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn tẽeda bãmb na n paama a yel-wẽn sugr kũun ne bãmb yʋʋre.
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn ket n gomda, Sɩɩg-sõng siga neb nins fãa sẽn dag n kelgd yẽ goama zutu.
Tẽedb nins sẽn ya Zuif buud n tũ a Pɩyɛɛr n wa wã yɛɛs wʋsg ne Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn ya Wẽnnaam kũuna sẽn sigd neb nins me sẽn ka Zuif-rãmba zutã.
Tɩ bõe, b da wʋmda b sẽn gom-zẽn n waoogd Wẽnnaam.
Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr leb yeelame yaa: Nin-bãmba sẽn paam Sɩɩg-sõng pidb wala tõndã, moasã b tõe n gɩdga bãmb tɩ b ka paam koom lisg sɩda?
A Pɩyɛɛr kõo noor tɩ b lis-b ne a Zezi Kirist yʋʋre. Dẽ, bãmb kosa a Pɩyɛɛr t'a pa ne-b rasem bilfu.
Tʋmtʋmdba la b ba-biisã sẽn da be Zude wã wʋmame tɩ bu-zẽmsã me reega Wẽnnaam goama.
La a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn lebg n wa Zeruzalɛm tẽedb nins sẽn ya Zuif buudã wẽe nokoeemd ne yẽnda.
N yeel-a yaa: Yãmb kẽe neb sẽn ka kẽ bãong zakẽ n dɩ ne-ba!
La a Pɩyɛɛr togsa bãmb ball-ball yellã fãa sẽn maana, n yeel-b yaa:

Mam dag n bee Zope tẽngã pʋgẽ, La mam sẽn wa n pʋʋsdẽ, mam paama vẽnegre. Mam yãa bũmb sẽn wẽnd wa peen-bedr sẽn yi arzãn n sigd mam nengẽ t'a noy a naasa loe. La a sulgame n pẽneg maam.
Mam maaga m meng n gese la m yãa rũms sẽn tar nao a naase, we-rũmsi, baa bõn-vuuds ne bõn-pɩgs sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã.
Dẽ mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yeel tɩɩyɛɛr yik n kʋ n dɩ.
La mam leokame yaa: Ayo, Zu-soaba, tɩ bõe bũmb sẽn ka zems wala sẽn ya rẽgd na n zɩɩ n kẽ mam noorẽ ye.
La koɛɛga yii arzãn naoor a yiib soab n yeel maam yaa: Wẽnnaam sẽn yeel tɩ bũmb ninga yaa yɩlemdã, bɩ f ra bool-a tɩ rẽgd ye.
Bõn-kãng maana hal naoor a tãabo, dẽ, a fãa lebg n dʋʋ arzãna.
La wakat kãng bala, raop a tãab sẽn yi Sezaare b sẽn tʋm-b mam nengẽ waa n taa zak ninga mam sẽn da be wã noore.
Sɩɩg-sõng yeela maam tɩ m tũ-b n loog la m da sãmb ye. Ba-biisã yoobã sẽn be ka wã yãaga maam n ta Sezaare. La tõnd kẽ a Korney zakẽ wã.
La a Korney togsa tõnd sẽn yɩ to-to tɩ yẽnda yã malɛkã sẽn wa yẽ rooga pʋgẽ n yeel yẽ t'a tʋm neb Zope tɩ b tɩ bool a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr t'a wa.
T'a Pɩyɛɛr na n togsa yẽ koees sẽn na n kɩt tɩ yẽnda ne a yirã rãmb fãa paam fãagre.
La mam sẽn sɩng n gomdã, Sɩɩg-sõng siga bãmb zut wala b sẽn dag sig tõnd zut sɩngrẽ wã.
Dẽ, mam tẽega Zu-soabã goamã b sẽn dag n yeelã: A Zã lisa ne koom la b na n lisa yãmb Sɩɩg-sõng pʋga.
Rẽ wã yĩnga, Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ-b kũun ninga b sẽn dag n kõ tõnd d sẽn tẽ Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist yĩngã, dẽ mam yaa ãnna soab n tõe n kɩɩs Wẽnnaam?
Bãmb sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, b sĩnda b noore. La b pẽga Wẽnnaam n yeel yaa: Rẽnd Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ bu-zẽmsã me tek yam n kos sugr n na paam vɩɩm.
Namsg ninga sẽn paam tẽedba a Etɛn kũuma poorẽ wã kɩtame tɩ b sãeeg n kẽng hal Fenisi, la Sɩpr ne Ãntiyos la b ka moon ned a to Wẽnnaam koɛɛga sã ka Zuif-rãmba bal ye.
Baoosgo tẽedb kẽer sẽn yi Sɩpr la Sirɛn waa Ãntiyos la b goma ne neb a taabã me n moon-b Zu-soab a Zezi koe-noogã.
Zu-soaba pãng da bee ne bãmba la neb wʋsg tẽe Zu-soabã n kos sugri.
A Zezi tẽedba sẽn be Zeruzalɛma wʋma koe-kãnga, la b tʋma a Barnabas Ãntiyos.
La yẽnda sẽn ta n yãnd Wẽnnaam sẽn ning tẽedba bark to-to wã, a sũurã yɩɩ noogo. La a paasa b fãa raood n yet tɩ b kell n tũ Zu-soabã ne b sũyã fãa n da bas ye.
Tɩ bõe, a Barnabas yaa nin-sõngo, n pid ne Sɩɩg-sõngo n tar tẽebo. La neb wʋsg tẽe Zu-soabã.
Dẽ poore,a Barnabas kẽnga Tars n na n tɩ bao a Solle.
La yẽ sẽn yãnd-a Soll be a peeg-a lame n wa Ãntiyos. Bãmb paa be ne a Zezi tẽedba yʋʋmd tõre n zãms neb kʋʋng wʋsgo. Yaa Ãntiyos la b sɩng n bool a Zezi karen-biisã tɩ Kirist neba.
La ra-kãense, Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb yii Zeruzalɛm n wa Ãntiyos.

La bãmb ned a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Agabus yikame n togs ne Sɩɩg-sõng pãng tɩ wakat n wat tɩ kom-kãseng na n zĩnd dũniyã tɛk fãa. La komã sɩd zĩnda a Sezaar kolood sẽn wa n dɩt naam wakate.
Dẽ karen-biisã yãka yam tɩned kam fãa kɩs sõngr ning sẽn zems a pãng tɩ b tʋm n sõng ba-biisã sẽn dag n be Zude soolma.
La b maana a woto n dɩk n ning a Barnabas ne a Soll nusẽ tɩ b tɩ kɩs kãsem-dãmba sẽn be Zude wã.
La wakat kãng sasa, rĩm a Herood sɩngame n nams a Zezi tẽedba kẽere.
Yẽnda kɩtame tɩ b kʋ a Zã ba-biig a Zak ne sʋʋga.
La yẽ sẽn yã tɩ bõn-kãng taa Zuif-rãmba yam, a kell n kɩtame tɩ b yõk a Pɩyɛɛr. Rag n yaa bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll kibs daare.

Herood sẽn yõk a Pɩyɛɛr n kẽes bi-bees roogẽ, a kɩtame tɩ sodaas piig la a yoob gũ a Pɩyɛɛr n dees taab naas-naase, n dag n tagsdẽ tɩ zʋʋg-n-basã kibs sã n loog bɩ a yiis-a n kao a bʋʋd neba nifẽ.
Dẽ, bi-bees roogã pʋgẽ b ra gũuda a Pɩyɛɛre. La a Zezi tẽedba rag n pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam ne b sũur fãa a Pɩyɛɛr yĩnga.
Yʋng ninga sẽn deng a Herood sẽn na n yiis a Pɩyɛɛr n kao a bʋʋdã, gũudba rag n bee bi-bees rooga noor n gũudẽ la b ra balga a Pɩyɛɛr ne bãens a yiib t'a gãe pʋgẽ. Sodaas a yiib tẽn-sʋka.
Tao-tao bala, Zu-soaba malɛk puka a menga la vẽenem n yãg bi-bees roogã pʋgẽ. Malɛkã wẽe a Pɩyɛɛr lʋgr n nek-a n yeel-a yaa: Yik tao-tao. La bãensa lʋɩɩme n bas a Pɩyɛɛr nusã.
Dẽ, malɛka yeela a yẽnda t'a sẽb a sẽbdgã la a wid a neooda. A Pɩyɛɛr maana a woto. La malɛkã yeel-a lame t'a rɩk a fuugã n yeelg n tũ yẽnda.
A Pɩyɛɛr tũu malɛkã n yi, la a ra ka tagsd tɩ bũmb ninga malɛkã sẽn moonda yaa sɩd ye. A ra tagsdame tɩ yẽ yãa vẽnegre.

La bãmb sẽn loog pipi gũudã ne yiib soabã n ta kʋleng ninga sẽn teesd tẽngã n pag ne kutã, kʋɩlen-kãng paka a toor bãmb taoore. La b yiime n kẽng n dɩk sorã, la tao-tao bala, malɛkã loog n bas yẽnda.

Dẽ, a Pɩyɛɛr yam vẽnegame t'a bãng bũmb ning sẽn maana. La a yeelame yaa: Moasã, mam bãnga sɩd-sɩd tɩ yaa Zu-soabã n tʋm malɛk t'a fãag maam Herood nugẽ la na bũmb ning fãa Zuif-rãmba sẽn da rat n maan maama.
A Pɩyɛɛr sẽn tagse, a kẽnga a Maari yiri. Yaa a Zã b sẽn boond t'a markã ma. La neb wʋsg n dag n tigim taab beene n pʋʋsdẽ.
A Pɩyɛɛr wẽe rignoor ninga b sẽn kẽeda kʋɩlengã, la tʋmtʋmd poak a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Rood kolgame n na n kelge.
La yẽnda bãnga a Pɩyɛɛr koɛɛgã la a sũurã yɩɩ noog t'a bas kʋɩlengã pakr n wudg n leb pʋgẽ n tɩ togs t'a Pɩyɛɛr n wa n be rignoorẽ wã.
Bãmb yeela yẽnda t'a lebgame. La tʋmtʋmd-poakã kell n baas n yeelame tɩ yẽ sẽn yetã yaa sɩda.
Dẽ, b yeelame tɩ yaa a Pɩyɛɛr malɛka. La wakat kãnga, a Pɩyɛɛr dag n ket wẽeda kʋɩlengã. La b sẽn yaool n pake, b yãa a Pɩyɛɛr la b yɛɛsame.

A Pɩyɛɛr Zãasa bãmb ne nug n na n kɩt tɩ b sĩndi. La a Pɩyɛɛr togs-b-la Zu-soabã sẽn maan to-to n yiis yẽnda bi-beesa roog pʋgẽ. La a yeel tɩ b tɩ togs a zak ne ba-biis a taabã bõn-kãnga. Dẽ, yẽ yiime n kẽng zĩig a to.
La beoogã sẽn vẽege, rãmbg kãseng n yik sodaasã sʋka, b sẽn dag n dat n bãng a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn be zĩig ninga yĩnga.
Herood kɩtame tɩ bao a Pɩyɛɛr, la b ka yãnd-a ye. A kɩtame tɩ b kao gũudba bʋʋdo, la a kõ noor tɩ b kʋ-ba. Rẽ zugẽ, Herood yii Zude n kẽng Sezaare n tɩ pa be wakat bilfu.

Herood sũur puuga wʋsg ne Tɩɩr la Sɩdõ nebã. Nin-kãensa zemsa taab n na n kẽng Herood nengẽ bãmb yãga zood ne sõgen ning sẽn manegd rĩma roogã, la b waa Herood nengẽ n na n bao tɩ laafɩ zĩnd bãmb ne rĩma sʋka, sʋka, bala rĩma soolma n dag n dɩlg bãmb tẽngã.
Daar ninga Herood sẽn yãkã sẽn ta, a yeelga a naam fut n zaoond a naam geer zug n gom gom-bɛd neba taoore.
La neba kelmame n yeel tɩ yaa wẽnd n gom, tɩ ka ninsaal n goma ye.
La wakat kãng bala, Zu-soaba malɛk wẽe Herood yẽ sẽn dɩk Wẽnnaam waoogrã n kõ a mengã yĩnga. La zũnzũi n dɩ-a t'a ki.
Wẽnnaam koɛɛga ra saagdame n yɩɩd pĩnda.
La barnabas ne a Soll sẽn maan b tʋʋmd Zeruzalɛm n sɛ, b peega a Zã b sẽn boond t'a Mark n lebg n wa Ãntiyos.

Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb la karen-saam-dãmb n dag n be a Zezi tẽedba sẽn be Ãntiyosã sʋka. Yaa a Barnabas ne a Sɩmyõ b sẽn boond t'a Nizɛɛr ne a lisiyus sẽn yit Sirɛn la a Manayɛn sẽn wub rĩma Herood ba wã Zakẽ la a Solle.
Bãmb sẽn da maand Zu-soaba tʋʋmd la b loet noore, Sɩɩg-sõng yeel-b lame tɩ b yãk a Barnabas ne a Soll n welg-b toore, tɩ b maan tʋʋmd ninga b sẽn bool-b tɩ b maana.
Dẽ, bãmb loee noor n pʋʋs la yaool n tik a Barnabas ne Soll ne b nus pʋʋs b yĩng n bas-b tɩ b kẽnge.
La Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn tʋm a Barnabas ne Solle, b kẽnga Selesi, la b kẽe koom-koglg be n kẽng Sɩpr.
Bãmb sẽn ta tẽng sẽn boond tɩ Salamin, b sɩng n moona Wẽnnaam koɛɛga Zuif-rãmba karen-dot pʋse. A Zã-Mark ra bee ne bãmb n sõngd-ba.

Bãmb pɩʋʋga tẽng ninga koomã sẽn gũbgã fãa hal n ta tẽng sẽn boond tɩ Pafos, la b yãa bag a yen be sẽn ya zãmb-no-rɛɛsa, yẽ yaa Zuif t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Bar-Zezi sẽn dat n togs t'a zezi biiga.
Yẽnda ra bee ne tẽn-kãng Gʋvɛrneer a Sergiyus Polus sẽn da ya ned sẽn tar yam wʋsgã. Gʋvɛrneerã kɩtame tɩ b bool a Barnabas ne a Solle, bala a rag n dat wʋma Wẽnnaam goama.
La a Elimas sẽn ya bagã yʋʋr ne Gɛrk goama kɩɩsa a Barnabas ne a Soll n baood n sãam Gʋvɛrneerã tẽebo.
Dẽ, a Soll b sẽn boond me t'a Poll pida ne Sɩɩg-sõng n ges bagã,
n yeel-a yaa: Sɩlem-wẽng soaba fo pida ne wẽnem Sʋtãan biiga, f yaa tɩrlem fãa bɛyã. F ka na n bas Zu-soab so-tɩrsã sãoongo?

Moasã, gese, Zu-soaba na n wẽe foo ta f leg Zoang, n kaooswakat bilfu f kõn tol n leb n yã wĩntoogã vẽenem ye. La tao-tao bala, a Elimas nina sɩnga mumbu la lebga lik bida ne yẽnda. Yẽnda Wẽnnaam zĩiga fãa n baood ned sẽn na n gãd a nug n tɛ-a.
Dẽ, guvɛrneerã sẽn yã bũmb ninga sẽn maana, a tẽeme. Bala, Zu-soaba zãmsgã wɛɛngẽ wã yɛɛsa yẽnda.
A Poll ne a tũud-n-taasa kẽe koom-koglg Pafos n yi be n kẽng Pɛrz sẽn be Paamfili soolma. A Zã-Mark basa bãmb be n lebg n leb Zeruzalɛm.
A Poll dãmb yii Pɛrz n kell n kẽng n ta Ãntiyos sẽn be Pisidi soolem. La Zuif-rãmba vʋʋsg daare, a Poll dãmb kẽ karen-doogẽ wã n zĩndi.

La sẽn karem tõogã ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sɛbã n sɛ, karen-doogã nanams tʋma neb tɩ b yeel a Poll dãmb yaa: Ba-biisi, yãmb sã n tara koɛɛg n na n gom ne nebã n paas-b raoodo, yãmb tõee n gomame moasã.
A Poll yikame n zãas a nug n yeel yaa: Yãmb Israyɛl neba, la yãmb dãmb sẽn zoet Wẽnnaamã, kelg-y yã!
Wẽnnaam ninga sẽn ya Israyɛl nin-kãensa Wẽnnaam tũusa tõnd yaab-rãmbã n kɩt tɩ bu-kãng bɩ a sẽn wa n be sãand weoog Ezipt tẽngã wakate. La Wẽnnaam yiisa bãmb be ne pãn-kãsenga.
La b sõnga bãmb sẽn kolg yʋʋm pis-naas weooga pʋga.
La Wẽnnaam sãama buud a yopoe Kana n dɩk b soolma n kõ b nebã tɩ b sooge.
La bõn-kãens fãa kolga yʋʋm kobs-naas la pis-nu. Dẽ poorẽ, Wẽnnaam kõo tõnd yaab-rãmba bʋ-kaoodba hal tɩ ta Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Sãmwɛll zamaane.
Rẽ zugẽ, bãmb kosa rĩma, la Wẽnnaam kõ b la a Sayull sẽn ya rao a kiis biiga n ya Bɛnzame buudu. Yẽ rɩɩ naam yʋʋm pis-naase (40).

Wẽnnaam sẽn yiis a Sayull naame wã b yãka a David t'a yɩ Israyɛl dãmba rĩma. La Wẽnnaam kɩsa a David kaset n yeel a woto: "Mam yãame t'a Izayi biig a Daviid yaa rao sẽn ta mam yam. Yẽnda n na n pids mam datmã fãa zãnga."
Yaa a Daviid yagensã sʋk la Wẽnnaam kɩtɩ t'a Zezi rog n yɩɩ fãagd Israyɛl neba yĩnga wa sẽn zems bãmb sẽn dag n kãabã.
Sẽn deng a Zezi waoongo, a Zã dag n mooname n yeel Israyɛl neba fãa tɩ b tek yam n sak lisgu.

La a Zã tʋʋmd sẽn wa n kolgd sɛɛbo, a rag n yetame yaa: Yãmb tagsdame tɩ mam yaa ãnna? Mam ka ned ninga yãmb sẽn gũud a soaba ye. La kelg-y yã: Bãmb na n pʋgla maam n waa, la mam sõmblem pʋs n ka sek tɩ m lok b neooda sẽbds ye.
M ba-biisi, yãmb sẽn ya a Abraham yagensã la neb nins sẽn be yãmb sʋk n zoet Wẽnnaamã, yaa yãmb yĩng la b tʋm fãagrã koe-no-kãngã.

Tɩ bõe, Zeruzalɛm neba ne b nanamsa ka bãng a Zezi sẽn ya ned ning ye. La b ka wʋm Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba goama b sẽn karemd vʋʋsg daar fãa wã võor ye. La b kaoo a Zezi bʋʋd n pids Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba gom-kãense.
Baa b sẽn ka yã bũmb ne bãmb sẽn zems kũuma, b kosa a Pilat t'a kɩt tɩ b kʋ a Zezi.
La b sẽn pids bũmb nins fãa gʋls-sõamyã sẽn da togs bãmb wɛɛngẽ wã, b sik-b-la da-pɩkã zug n tɩ gãneg yaoogẽ.
La Wẽnnaam vʋʋga a Zezi n bas kũum.
La neb nins sẽn dag n tũ a Zezi n yi Galile n kẽng Zeruzalɛm yãa bãmb rasem wʋsgo. La moasã b yaa a Zezi kaset dãmb Israyɛl nebã sʋka.
La tõnd togsda yãmb koe-no-kãnga, n wilgd yãmb kãabg ninga Wẽnnaam sẽn da kãab tõnd yaab-rãmbã,

moasã, Wẽnnaam pids-a lame n kõ tõnd sẽn ya bãmb yagensã n vʋʋg a Zezi n bas kũum wa sẽn gʋls yɩɩn-sõng a yiib soaba pʋgẽ wã: "Rũnna, mam yaa fo ba, la fo yaa mam biiga, maam n dog foom."

Wẽnnaam dag n yeelame tɩ b na n vʋʋg-b lame n bas kũuma tɩ b yĩngã ra põog ye. Yaa bũmb ninga Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n gom la a woto: "Mam na n kõo yãmb a David bõn-sõamyã. Bũmb nins sẽn sõama la sɩdã."
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ b leb n yeel zĩig a to yaa: "Yãmb kõn bas y sõmblem soaba t'a põog ye."
La a Daviid sẽn maan sẽn tat Wẽnnaam yam bãmb wakatẽ wã, b yaool n kiime n paam b saam-dãmba, la b yĩnga põogame.
La Wẽnnaam sẽn vʋʋg ned ninga n bas kũuma ka põog ye.
Dẽ, ba-biisi, bɩ y bãng tɩ yaa a Zezi maasem yĩng la b moond yãmb yel-wẽma sugr kũun koɛɛga.
La ned ninga fãõa sẽn tẽed bãmba, b basda yẽnda taal ne bũmb ninga fãa a Moyiis tõogã sẽn dag n ka tõe n bas-y taalã.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ y gũus tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba sẽn yeel bũmb ninga b sɛbã pʋsã ra paam yãmb ye.
"Nin-kɩɩsdba, ges-y-yã la y yɛɛs n menem, tɩ bõe mam na n maana tʋʋmd yãmb belma wakate. Yaa tʋʋmde, tɩ b sã n dag n togs-a yãmb bɩ y ka tõe n tẽ ye."
La a Poll ne a Barnabas sẽn yi karen-doogẽ wã, neba kosa bãmb tɩ vʋʋsg daar sẽn watã bɩ b leb n wa n moon koe-kãnga yɛsa.
La kaorengã sẽn sɛ, Zuif-rãmb ne neb nins sẽn tẽed Zuif-rãmba kaoreng wʋsg tũu a Poll ne a Barnabas tɩ b sõs ne-b n sagl-b tɩ kell n pa Wẽnnaam barkã pʋgẽ.
La vʋʋsg daar sẽn leb n ta, sẽn kolg tẽnga neba fãa tigma taab n na n kelg Wẽnnaam goama.
Zuif-rãmba sẽn yã neb kʋʋgã, sũ-kiir yõk-b lame tɩ b kɩɩs a Poll goama la b tʋ yẽnda.

A Poll ne a Barnabas yeela bãmb vẽeneg yaa: yaa yãmb la b rag n tog n deng n togs Wẽnnaam goama pipi. La y sẽn zãgs Wẽnnaam goma, yãmb kao y mens bʋʋd n yet tɩ yãmb ka zems tɩ paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sɛ wã ye. Rẽ wã tõnd na n kẽnga bu-zẽmsã nengẽ moasã.
Tɩ bõe, Zu-soaba yeela tõnd a woto yaa: "Mam yãka foom tɩ f yɩ vẽenem bu-zẽmsã yĩnga, n tall fãagrã n ta hal dũniyã tɛk fãa."
La bu-zẽmsa sẽn wʋm woto, b sũyã yɩɩ noodo, la b pẽga Zu-soaba goamã. La neb nins fãa sẽn da na n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sɛ wã lebga tẽedba.
La Zu-soabas koɛɛg ra saagda soolem kãng fãa.
La Zuif-rãmba pagb nins sẽn sakd tẽebã yell neerã la ne tẽnga nin-kãsems tɩ b nams a Poll la a Barnabas n dig-b tɩ b yi bãmb soolmẽ.
A Poll ne a Barnabas pĩmsa b nao wã tom nin-bãmb yĩnga, la b yɩ n kẽng Ikoniyom.
La karen-biisã sẽn be Ãntiyosã ra pida ne sũ-no-kãsenga la ne Sɩɩg-sõngo.
A Poll ne a Barnabas tũu taab n kẽ Zuif-rãmba karen-doog a yen pʋg sẽn be Ikoniyom, la b gomame n tõog tɩ Zuif-rãmba wʋsg ne Gɛrk-rãmba lebg tẽedba.
La Zuif-rãmb nins ka tẽ wã rãmba bu-zẽmsã n kɩt tɩ b sũyã sãam ne karen-biisã.

A Poll ne a Barnabas paa Ikoniyom n kaoose. A Poll dãmb daag n kɩsa sɩd ne Zu-soabã n gomd ne pɛl-kɛgenga. La Zu-soaba kɩsa bãmb bark goama a Poll dãmb sẽn moondã kaseto n kõ bãmb pãn-tõog tɩ b maan bãna la bõn-yɛɛsds ne b nusi.
La tẽnga neba welga taaba, tɩ kẽer ra be Zuif-rãmba poorẽ la kẽer ra bee tʋmtʋmdba poorẽ.
La bu-zẽmsa ne Zuif-rãmba la b nanamsa sɩngame n segl b mens n na n maan a Poll dãmb wẽnga, n dat lob bãmb kug n kʋ.
La a Poll ne a Barnabas sẽn bãnge, b zoeeme n kẽng Listr ne Dɛrb tẽnsã, sẽn be Likaoni soolma, la tẽns a taab sẽn pẽ be.
La b moona koe-noogã beene.
Dao a ye n da be Listr t'a nao ki t'a ka tõe n yik ye. Yẽ sẽn dogã tɛka, a yaa põore la a zɩ n tõog n kẽn ye.
Yẽ ra kelgda bũmb ninga a Poll sẽn togsdã. La a Poll ges-a lame n bãng t'a tara tẽeb n tõe n paam maagre.
A Poll Zẽka a Koɛɛg n yeel rao wã t'a yik n yals a nao wã zugu. La rao wã yɩɩ yagbgo n yik n sɩng kẽna.
Neb kʋʋnga sẽn yã bũmb ninga a Poll sẽn maana, b zẽka b koees n yeel ne Likaoni-rãmba goam tɩ yaa Wẽnnaam dãmb n dɩk yĩns n sig n wa bãmb sʋka.
B pʋda a Barnabas yʋʋr t'a Zees la b pʋd a Poll t'a Hɛrmes sẽn dag n ya yẽnda n gomda yĩnga.

Wẽnnaam ning sẽn boond tɩ Zeesã pʋʋgã roog rag n bee tẽnga noore, la zees maan-kʋʋdã baoo tɩ-puud n wʋg n pid lols yubli n tall-b n wa tẽnga yoy n dat tɩ neb kʋʋngã lagem yẽnda tɩ b maan maoong n kõ a Poll ne Barnabas.
La tʋmtʋmdb a yiibã sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, b kẽesa b fut n wudg n kẽ kʋʋngã sʋk n kelem n yeel yaa:

Daopa, yaa bõe tɩ y maand a woto? Tõnd me yaa ninsaalb wa yãmb bala. Tõnd moonda yãmb koe-noog n yet-y tɩ y bas wẽnd-naands-kãens sẽn ka tar yõoda la y wẽnemd n sak Wẽnnaam ninga sẽn vɩ wã la sẽn naan yĩngr la tẽnga la ko-kãsenga ne bũmb nins fãa sẽn be b pʋgẽ wã.
Yʋʋm sẽn looge, Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ wã basa buudã fãa tɩ b maan b yam daabo.
La baoosgo, Wẽnnaam maana kaset n wilg-b tɩ bãmb beene n mam neer n kõ yãmb saaga t'a niid tɩ sẽoog ne bõn-bɩʋʋng beẽ tɩ rɩɩb sekd yãmb n pids y sũyã ne sũ-noogo.
Baa ne gom-kãensã, yɩɩ toog ne tʋmtʋmdbã tɩ b tõog tɩ neba ra maan maoong n waoog-ba.
La Zuif-rãmb n yi Ãntiyos ne Ikoniyom n wa n rãmb nebã tɩ b lob a Poll kuga. La b sẽn tẽed t'a kiime wã, b vuuga yẽnda n yiis tẽngã pʋga.
La tẽedba gũbga a Poll la a leb n yikame n kẽ tẽnga pʋga. La vẽkembeoogo, a Poll ne a Barnabas kẽnga tẽnga a yen sẽn boond tɩ Dɛrb.
La bãmb sẽn moon koe-noogã tẽng pʋga, b paamame tɩ neb wʋsg lebg karen-biisi. La a Poll ne a Barnabas lebg n leba Listr ne Ikoniyom la Ãntiyos yɛsa.
Bãmb belsa tẽedba sũyã n paas-b raood n sagl-b tɩ b yals tẽeba pʋg kãenkãe n yeel-b yaa: Yaa tɩlɛ tɩ tõnd paam namsg wʋsg n yaool n tõog n kẽ Wẽnnaam soolme wã.
A Zezi tẽedba sẽn be zĩig ninsã fãa, a Poll dãmb yãka kãsem-dãmb n kõ-ba. La bãmb loee noor n Pʋʋs n dɩk-b n bas Zu-soab ninga bãmb sẽn tẽ a soaba nugẽ.
La a Poll ne a Barnabas pɩʋʋga Pisidi soolem n kẽng Paamfili soolem.
Bãmb moona Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã Pɛrz n yaool n kẽng Atali.
Bãmb kẽ koom-koglg tẽn-kãng n leb Ãntiyos, yaa tẽng ninga b sẽn dag n ning b zut bark tɩ b maan tʋʋmd ning bãmb sẽn maana.
La b sẽn ta Ãntiyos b tigma a Zezi tẽedba fãa n togs-b Wẽnnaam sẽn tall bãmb n maan bãmb bũmb nins fãa wã. La sẽn yɩ to-to tɩ Wẽnnaam pak sor tɩ bu-zẽmsa me tõe n tẽ wã.
La a Poll dãmb paa be ne tẽedbã n kaoose.
Neb kẽer yii Zude n wa Ãntiyos n sɩng n zãmsd ba-biisã n yetẽ tɩ b sã n ka kẽ bãong wa sẽn zems a Moyiis tõogã, b ka tõe n paam fãagr ye.

A Poll ne a Barnabas kɩɩs-b lame n wẽ nokoeem-kãseng ne-b bõn-kãng wɛɛngẽ. Rẽ, ba-biisã yãka yam t'a Poll ne a Barnabas ne bãmb sʋkã neb kẽer na n kẽnga tẽn-tʋmdbã ne kãsem-dãmba nengẽ Zeruzalɛm n tɩ ges yel-kãng yelle.

Dẽ, a Zezi tẽedbã sẽn be Ãntiyosã yãag-b lame. A Poll dãmb pɩʋʋga Fenisi la Samari soolem la b togsda sẽn yɩ to-to tɩ bu-zẽmsã me sak Wẽnnaamã. La bõn-kãng kõo ba-biisã fãa sũ-no-kãsenga.
La a Poll dãmb sẽn ta Zeruzalɛm, a Zezi tẽedba ne tẽn-tʋmdbã ne kãsem-dãmbã reeg-b lame. La a Poll dãmb togs-b la bũmb nins fãa Wẽnnaam sẽn tall bãmb n maana.
La Fariisẽ-dãmba neb kẽer sẽn ya tẽedbã yikame n yeel tɩ yaa tɩlɛ tɩ b kẽes bu-zẽmsã bãongo la b kɩt tɩ b sak a Moyiis tõogã.
Tẽn-tʋmdbã ne kãsem-dãmba tigma taab n na n ges yel-kãng yelle.
Bãmb sẽn wẽ nokoɛɛma wʋsg n kaoose, a Pɩyɛɛr yikame n yeel yaa: M ba-biisi, hal pipi wakat bala, Wẽnnaam yãka maam yãmb sʋk tɩ m moon koe-noogã bu-zẽmsa me tɩ b wʋme la b tẽ.
La Wẽnnaam sẽn mi ninsaalbã fãa sũyã, b kõ-b la Sɩɩg-sõng wa b sẽn dag n kõ tõndã, tɩ yɩ kaset tɩ b sak n deeg-b lame.
Wẽnnaam ka welg tõnd toor ne bu-zẽmsã ye, bala b sẽn tẽ wã yĩnga, Wẽnnaam yɩlga b sũyã.
Dẽ moasã, yaa bõe tɩ y baood Wẽnnaam noor n zɩlgd karen-biisã zɩɩb tõnd yaab-rãmba wala tõnd mens sẽn ka tõog n tʋke?
La tõnd tẽedame tɩ yaa Zu-soab a Zezi barkã yĩng n kɩt tɩ tõnd paam fãagr wala bãmb me sẽn paam to-to wã.
Nebã sẽn tigma fãa sĩndame n kelg a Barnabas na a Poll sẽn togsd Wẽnnaam sẽn tall bãmb n maan bõn-bãna la bõn-yɛɛsdsã fãa bu-zẽmsã sʋkã.
Bãmb sẽn gom n sɛ, a Zak gomame n yeel yaa:
M ba-biisi, kelg-y maam. A Sɩmo wilga yãmb Wẽnnaam sẽn geelg bu-zẽmsã to-to n sɩng n yãk neb be n maan b rẽndã.
La bõn-kãng zemsa ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn goma. B gʋlsame n yeel yaa:
"Zu-soabã yetame yaa: Rẽ poore, mam na n lebgame n wa n me a Daviid doogã sẽn dag n lʋɩ wã. Mam na n leb n manega yẽ raboogã n me, la m na yik-a lame n yalse,
tɩ neb a taabã sẽn ketã bao Zu-soabã. La buud nins fãa sẽn pʋʋsd ne mam yʋʋrã me na n baoo maam.
Ade, yaa Zu-soabã sẽn wilg bõn-kãens hal yʋʋm zãrã n yeel a woto."
Yaa woto yĩng n kɩt tɩ mam togsdẽ t'a zemsame tɩ d da bao yell n kõ bu-zẽmsã sẽn sakd Wẽnnaamã ye.
La bɩ d gʋls-b n yeel-b tɩ b lak b mens ne wẽn-naandsã maand nemdo la wɩɩbdo, la b ra wãb rũng sẽn sãrg nemdo, la b ra rɩ zɩɩm ye.
Tɩ bõe, hal kʋdem wẽndẽ tɩ ta moasã, b moonda a Moyiis tõogã tẽnsã pʋse, la b karemd-a karen-dotã pʋs vʋʋsg daar fãa.

Dẽ, tẽn-tʋmdbã ne kãsem-dãmbã la tẽedba fãa yãka yam n na n tũus neb kẽer bãmb sʋkã n tʋm-b tɩ b tũ a Poll ne Barnabas n kẽng Ãntiyos. Bãmb yãka a Zud b sẽn boond t'a Barsabas la a Sɩlaas. Bãmb b yiibã fãa yaa neb ba-biisã sẽn waoogda.
B kɩs b la sebrã, la b sẽn gʋlsã yeelame yaa: Tẽn-tʋmdbã ne kãsem-dãmbã, la ba-biisã pʋʋsda ba-biis nins sẽn be bu-zẽmsã sʋk n be Ãntiyos la Siri ne Silisi soolma.
Tõnd wʋmame tɩ neb kẽer n yi tõnd nengẽ n wa n dãmbd yãmb la b yuusd yãmb yam ne b goama. La ka tõnd n kõ-b noor ye.
Yaa woto yĩnga, tɩ tõnd tigim taab n yãk yam a yembr n yãk neb n tʋm-b tɩ b na n yãag d zo-nongds a Poll ne a Barnabas n wa yãmb nengẽ.
A Poll dãmb ra gẽnega b yõe tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist tʋʋmdã yĩnga.
Rẽnda yĩng la d tʋm a Zud ne a Sɩlaas yãmb nengẽ. La b mens na n togs-y la bõn-kãense.
Tɩ bõe, Sɩɩg-sõng ne tõnd me gesame tɩ yaa neere tɩ d da zɩlg-y zɩɩb sã n ka bũmb nins sẽn ya tɩlɛ wã ye. La yaa tɩ yãmb ka tog n wãb nemd

b sẽn maan maoong n kõ wẽn-naands ye, la y ka tog n dɩ rũng sẽn sãrg ye, la y da rɩ zɩɩm ye, la y ra maan wɩɩbd ye. Yãmb sã n lak y mens ne bõn-kãense, y maana sẽn ya neere. Wẽnd na sõng yãmba.
Dẽ, b basa b sẽn tʋm-b rãmbã tɩ b loog n kẽng Ãntiyos. La b tigma tẽedbã fãa beene n kɩs-b sebrã.
B sẽn kɩt tɩ b karem sebrã n sɛ, b fãa sũyã yɩɩ noogo, b sẽn paas bãmb raoodã yĩnga.
A Zud ne a Sɩlaas mens sẽn da ya Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã, b goma ne ba-biisã n kaoose, n paas-b raoodo la pãnga.
La b sẽn pa Ãntiyos n kaoos bilfu, ba-biisã pʋʋs-b lame tɩ wẽnd na kuils-b laafɩ, n bas-b tɩ b lebg n leb neb nins sẽn tʋm-b bãmbã nengẽ.
La a Sɩlaas yãka yam n na n pa Ãntiyos.
La baoosgo, a Poll ne a Barnabas paa Ãntiyos. La bãmb ne neb a taab wʋsg ra zãmsda nebã la b moond-b koe-noogã sẽn ya Zu-soabã goama.
Rasem bilf sẽn paase, a Poll yeela a Barnabas t'a wa tɩ b leb n kẽng tẽns nins fãa bãmb sẽn dag n moon Zu-soabã koɛɛgã n tɩ ges ba-biisã n bãng b kibar sẽn ya to-to.
A Barnabas rag n dat n peega a Zã b sẽn boond t'a Mark t'a tũ-ba.
La a Poll tagsame tɩ yaa neer tɩ b ra peeg-a Zã-Mark ye. Tɩ bala, a rag n lebg n basa bãmb Paamfili soolem n ka le yãag-b n maan tʋʋmdã ye.
La b kɩɩsa taab wʋsg yel-kãng wɛɛngẽ hal n welg taaba. La a Barnabas peega a Mark n kẽ koom-koglg n na n kẽng Sɩpr.
La a Poll yãka a Sɩlaas, la ba-biisã pʋʋsame tɩ Zu-soabã ning-b barka, la b loogame.
A Poll pɩʋʋga Siri ne Silisi soolem n paas a Zezi tẽedbã pãnga.
A Poll taa Dɛrb ne Listri. Karen-biig a ye n dag n be beene t'a yʋʋr la a Tɩmote. A ma yaa Zuif poak sẽn ya tẽeda, la ba wã yaa Gɛrk buudu.
Ba-biisã sẽn be Listr ne Ikoniyomã ra kɩta yẽ kaset sõngo.
A Poll dag n datame n peeg a Tɩmote, la tall-a lame n tɩ kẽes bãongo, Zuif-rãmbã sẽn dag n be tẽn-kãensã yĩnga. Bala, b fãa ra miime t'a Tɩmote ba wã yaa Gɛrka.
A Poll dãmb sã n ta tẽngẽ fãa, b togsda tẽedbã yam-yãkr nins tẽn-tʋmdbã ne kãsem-dãmbã sẽn be Zeruzalɛmã sẽn yãkã, sẽn na yɩlg tɩ b sak yam-yãk kãense.
A Zezi tẽedba tẽeb pãng da paasdame, la b sõorã ra paasda daar o daare.
La Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn gɩdg a Poll dãmb tɩ b ra moon Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã Azi soolem yĩnga, b pɩʋʋga Firzi ne Galasi soolem.
Bãmb sẽn kolg Mizi soolem, b makame n na n kẽng Bitini soolem, la a Zezi Sɩɩgã ka sak tɩ b kẽng ye.
Dẽ, bãmb pɩʋʋga Mizi soolmã, n kẽng n ta Torwas.
Yʋngo, a Poll paama vẽnegre. A yãa Masedoan ned sẽn yas n bõosd yẽ n yetẽ yaa: Wa-y Masedoan, n wa n sõng-do.
Vẽneg kãngã a Poll sẽn paamã zugẽ, tao-tao bala, tõnd baoome tɩ kẽng Masedoan. Tɩ bõe, tõnd yeela tɩ yaa Wẽnnaam n boond tõnd tɩ d tɩ moon koe-noogã soolem kãng pʋga.
Tõnd kẽe koom-koglg Torwas n kẽng Samotars tɩrga. La vẽkembeoogo, tõnd kẽnga Neyapolis.
La tõnd yii beene n kẽng Filip. Filip yaa Masedoan soolem na-tẽnga la ra yaa Rom nebã n so-a. Tõnd paa tẽn-kãng rasem bilfu.

Zuif-rãmbã vʋʋsgã daare, tõnd yii tẽngã n kẽng kʋɩlg noore, tõnd sẽn dag n tagsd tɩ d na n yãa pʋʋsg zĩig beene wã yĩnga. Tõnd zĩnda tẽnga, n gom ne pagb nins sẽn da tigim taab be wã.

Pag a yembr n dag n be be n zoet Wẽnnaam, t'a yʋʋr ya a Lidi. A yita Tɩyatɩɩr, la a koosda peen-miid sẽn be neer wʋsgo. Pʋg-kãng ra kelgdame, la Zu-soabã sɩɩsa a sũurã t'a sak n deeg bũmb nins a Poll sẽn da togsdã.
La yẽnda ne a yirã rãmb sẽn paam lisgu, a kosa tõnd a woto: Yãmb sã n tẽed tɩ mam tũuda Zu-soabã sɩd-sɩda, bɩ y wa n sig mam yirã n zĩnd be. La a pẽdga tõnd wʋsg n tõoge.
Tõnd wa n dag n dabda pʋʋsg zĩigẽ, la tʋmtʋmd-poak a yen sẽn ya kĩnkir bag n wa n seg tõndo. A zu-soben-dãmbã ra paamda ligd wʋsg a bagrã bʋgb yĩnga.
Yẽ sɩngame n pʋgd a Poll ne tõnd poor n yetẽ yaa: Nin-bãmba yaa Wẽnnaam sẽn-ka-to tʋmtʋmdba, la b wilgd-y la fãagr sore.
A maana a woto n kaoos rasem wʋsgo. La a Poll yam yii ne yẽnda t'a wẽnemd n yeel zĩna yaa: Mam yeta foom ne a Zezi Kirist yʋʋre tɩ f yi n bas bi-puglã. La wakat kãng bala, zĩna yiime n bas-a.
Tʋmtʋmd-poakã zu-soben-dãmbã sẽn yã tɩ b ka na n leb n paam ligd bi-puglã yĩnga, b yõka a Poll ne a Sɩlaas n tɛ-b n kẽng raagẽ wã, taoor dãmbã nengẽ.
B talla a Poll dãmb n kẽng bʋ-kaoodba nengẽ n tɩ yeel yaa: Nin-bãmba sẽn ya Zuif-rãmbã rãmbda tõnd tẽngã,
n zãmsd nebã minindu, tõnd sẽn ya Rome nebã sẽn ka tar noor tɩ reeg-b wall d tũ-b ye.
Neb kʋʋngã yika zabr ne a Poll dãmba. La bʋ-kaoodbã kɩtame tɩ b pãrs a Poll ne a Sɩlaas futã la b yeel tɩ b pãb-b ne kalwaase.
B sẽn pãb a Poll dãmb sõama n sɛ, b kẽes-b-la bi-bees roogo, la b yeel bi-bees roog gũudã t'a gũ-b neere.
B sẽn yeel gũudã a woto n sɛ, a kẽesa bãmb roog sẽn be roog a to pʋgẽ n balg-b ra-bãongo.
La sẽn kolg yʋʋn-sʋka, a Poll ne a Sɩlaas ra pʋʋsdame, la b yɩɩnd n waoogd Wẽnnaam. La bi-beesã ra kelgd-b lame.
Tao-tao bala, tẽn-digemd kãseng n zĩndi, hal tɩ bi-bees roogã yẽbgr rigimdi. Wakat kãng bala, kʋɩlemsã fãa pagsame, la bi-beesã fãa bãens sogsame.
Bi-bees roog gũuda nekame. La a sẽn yã tɩ bi-bees roogã kʋɩlems pagsame, a wõoga a sʋʋg n na n kʋ a menga, a sẽn tagsd tɩ bi-beesã zoeeme wã yĩnga.
La a Poll zẽka a koɛɛg n yeel yaa: Da maan-y y meng bũmb ye! Tõnd fãa bee ka.
Dẽ, bi-bees roog gũudã kosame tɩ b wa ne bugum, la a wudga tao-tao n kẽ bi-beesã roogẽ, n lʋɩ a Poll ne a Sɩlaas taoor ne rigbu.
La yẽ yiisa a Poll ne a Sɩlaas yɩnga, n sok-b yaa: M neb sõamyã, bõe la mam tog n maan n paam fãagre?
La b leokame n yeele: Tẽ-y Zu-soab a Zezi, la yãmb ne y yirã rãmb na n paama fãagre.
La a Poll dãmb moona yẽnda ne neb nins fãa sẽn dag n be yẽ zakẽ wã Zu-soabã koɛɛga.
Gũudã talla bãmb wakat kãng bala, ne yʋngã, n tɩ pegs b noadã. La tao-tao bala, yẽnda ne a zaka rãmb fãa paama koom lisgu.
A talla a Poll dãmb n kẽ a zakẽ, n kõ-b rɩɩbo, la yẽ ne a yirã rãmb fãa paama sũ-noogo, b sẽn tẽ Wẽnnaamã yĩnga.
La beoog sẽn vẽege, bʋ-kaoodbã tʋma gũudb tɩ b tɩ yeel bi-bees roogã gũud yaa: yiis nin-bãmbã n base.
Bi-bees roogã gũud tɩ togsa a Poll gom kãens n yeele: Bʋ-kaoodbã tʋma koɛɛg n yeel tɩ m yiis-y n base. Rẽ wã, yi-y n loog-y ne laafɩ.

La a Poll yeela gũudbã yaa: Bãmb kɩtame tɩ b pãb tõnd neba fãa taoore, tɩ tõnd bʋʋd nan ka kao ye, la b kẽes tõnd bi-bees roogo. Tõnd yaool n yaa Rom neba. Tɩ moasã, bãmb rat n soos n yiis tõndo? Bada! B wa b toor n wa n yiis tõndo.
Gũudbã tɩ togsa bʋ-kaoodbã gom kãense. La b sẽn wʋm t'a Poll ne a Sɩlaas yaa Rom nebã, rabeem yõk-b lame.
Dẽ, b waa n kosa a Poll dãmb sugri, n yiis-ba, la b bõos-b tɩ b yi tẽngã.
Bãmb sẽn yi bi-bees roogã, b kẽnga a Lidi yiri. La b sẽn yã ba-biisã, b sagl-b lame la b looge.
A Poll dãmb tũu Amfipolis ne Apoloni n ta Tesalonik. Zuif-rãmbã karen-doog n da be be.
A Poll kẽe karen-doogẽ wã wa a sẽn minim n maandẽ wã, La a sõsa ne bãmb gʋlsg sõamyã wɛɛngẽ, vʋʋsg ray a taab n pʋgl taaba.
Yẽ ra bilgda bãmb la a wilgd-b tɩ Kirist da tog n namsame, la tɩ b na n vʋʋgame n bas kũum. A Poll yeel-b lame yaa: Zezi ning mam sẽn gomd ne yãmb b yellã, yaa bãmb la Kiristã.
La Zuif-rãmbã kẽer tẽe a Poll sẽn yeelã, la bãmb ne Gɛrk-rãmb kʋʋng wʋsgo, la pagb wʋsg me nebã sẽn waoogd naaga ne a Poll la a Sɩlaas.
La sũ-kiir yõka Zuif-rãmbã tɩ b kams ninsaan-faad neba sʋka, n kɩt tɩ b gũm taaba, n dambd tẽngã. B kẽnga a Zaazõ yirã n na n tɩ bao a Poll ne a Sɩlaas n tall-b n kẽng nebã taoore.

La b sẽn ka yãnd a Poll rãmba, b yõga a Zaazõ ne ba-biis kẽer n tall-b n kẽng tẽn-soaadbã taoore, n kelemd n yetẽ yaa: Nin bãmbã, sẽn dãmb-b dũni fãa wã waa ka me, la a Zaazõ reeg-b-la a yiri.
B fãa tʋʋmã kɩɩsda Sezaar noorã, la b yetame tɩ rĩm a to n be: a Zezi.
Gom-kãens namsa neb kʋʋngã ne tẽn-soaadbã.
La b kɩtame t'a Zaazõ ne neb a taabã gãneg yaood tɩ b yaool n bas-b tɩ b looge.
Tao-tao bala, ba-biisã kɩtame t'a Poll ne a Sɩlaas loog Beere ne yʋngã. La b sẽn ta beene bala, b kẽe Zuif-rãmba karen-doogẽ.

Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn dag n be Beere wã da tara yam sõng n yɩɩd sẽn be-b Tesalonikã. Bãmb deega Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã ne b sũyã fãa. La daar fãa, bãmb da vɛɛsda gʋls sõamyã n dat n bãng bũmb nins b sẽn yet bãmbã sã n yaa a sɩda.
Neb wʋsg bãmb sʋkã tẽeme, la Gɛrk-rãmba sʋk me, pagb wʋsg nebã sẽn nande, ne raop wʋsg tẽeme.
La Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn be Tesalonikã sẽn bãng t'a Poll da moonda Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã Beere me, b waa beene, n pirs nebã, n dãmb-ba.
Dẽ, tao-tao bala, ba-biisã kɩtame t'a Poll zãag n kẽng ko-kãsengã noore. La a Sɩlaas ne a Tɩmote paa Beere.
Neb nins sẽn yãag a Pollã talla yẽnda n ta Atɛn. La a Poll yeel-b lame tɩ b sã n leb bɩ b tɩ yeel a Sɩlaas ne a Tɩmote tɩ b babs-a n wa tao-tao. Dẽ, b lebgame.
A Poll sẽn be Atɛn n gũud a Sɩlaas ne a Tɩmote waoongã, yẽ sũurã sãama wʋsgo, a sẽn yã tɩ tẽngã pida ne wẽn-naandsã yĩnga.
Dẽ, a Poll dag n sõsda ne Zuif-rãmbã, la ne buud a taabã neb sẽn zoet Wẽnnaamã karen-doogẽ wã. La daar fãa, raagã pʋga, a ra sõsda ne neb nins sẽn wat be wã.

Epikuryẽ-rãmba ne Ɛstoyisẽ-dãmba karen-saam-dãmb kẽer me sɩngame n gom ne a Polle. La kẽer sokame tɩ gom-to-nedã rat n yeelame tɩ bõe? La neb a taab yetame tɩ yaa wa a Poll yaa wẽn-zẽms koe-toagsda, bala, a dag n gomda a Zezi la kũum vʋʋgr yelle.
La b talla a Poll n kẽng Areopaazã kãsem-dãmbã taoor n sok-a yaa: Dẽ yĩnga, fo tõe n togsa tõnd zãms-paalgã fo sẽn tarã võor tɩ d bãnge?
Bala, bũmb nins fo sẽn togsd tõndã yaa bõn-sãams ne tõndo, la tõnd dat n bãnga b võore.
Tɩ bõe, Atɛn neba fãa ne sãambã sẽn be bãmb sʋkã da ka rɩkd b weerã n maand bũmb a to tɩ sã n ka tɩ gom, wall tɩ kelg koe-paals ye.
A Poll yik n yalsa Areopaazã sʋk n yeel yaa: Atɛn neba, bũmb fãa pʋgẽ, mam mikame tɩ yãmb yaa wẽn-pʋʋsdb meng-menga.

Tɩ bõe, mam sẽn wa n kẽnd la m get bũmb nins yãmb sẽn dond n pʋʋsdã, mam pʋs n yãa tẽn-kugr a yen tɩ b gʋls a zug tɩ "wẽnnaam ning d sẽn ka mi wã rẽnda". Wẽnnaam ning yãmb sẽn waoogd n yaool n ka mi-bã, yaa Wẽnnaam kãng yell la mam sẽn gomd ne yãmbã.
Wẽnnaam ning sẽn naan-a dũni wã ne bũmb nins fãa sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã, bãmb yaa yĩngr la tẽng Zu-soaba, la b ka kẽed pʋʋsg rot ninsaalb nus sẽn me pʋsẽ,
la b ka baood me tɩ ninsaalb tʋm ne b nus n sõng-b wa bũmb n paoog-b ye. Tɩ bõe, yaa bãmb n kõt ninsaalbã vɩɩm, la vʋʋsem, la bũmbã fãa.
Wẽnnaam talla nin-yend n kɩt tɩ ninsaalbã buud fãa zĩnd dũni zug tɛk fãa, la b welga wakat n kõ ninsaalbã, la b ning b soolmã tods n kõ-ba.
Wẽnnaam maana bõn-kãnga, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ ninsaalba bao bãmba, la tɩ b sẽn maood n dat n yãnd Wẽnnaamã, bɩ tõe tɩ b yãnd-ba. Tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam ka zãr ne tõnd ned ba a yen ye,
bala, yaa bãmb pʋg la d tar vɩɩm, la d tõe n kẽne la d beẽ. Yaa wala yãmb yʋʋmba kẽer sẽn dag n yeel me tɩ tõnd yaa Wẽnnaam koãmbã.
Rẽ, wã yĩnga, tõnd sẽn ya Wẽnnaam kambã, d ka tog n tags tɩ Wẽnnaam wẽnda sãnem, wala wanzuri, wala kugr sẽn peese wa sẽn zems ninsaalb minim la b tagsg ye.
Neba sẽn ka mi b sẽn maanda wakate, Wẽnnaam ka maand bũmb ye, La moasã, b yeta nebã fãa sẽn be zĩiga fãa tɩ b tek yam n kos sugri.
Tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam yãka raare tɩ rao ning bãmb sẽn yãkã na n kao dũniyã fãa bʋʋd ne tɩrlem. La Wẽnnaam kõo neba fãa bãnde n vʋʋg rao-kãng n bas kũum n wilg tɩ yaa sɩda.
La b sẽn wʋm a Poll sẽn gomd kũum vʋʋgr yellã, kẽer yaala yẽnda, la kẽer yeelame tɩ b na n leb n kelga a Poll koe-kãnga nindaare.
Dẽ, a Poll yii bãmb sʋka.
La baoosgo neb kẽer lagma a Poll n tẽ. A Denis sẽn ya bʋ-kaoodba sʋk ned a yen dag n naaga be, ne pag a yembr yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Damaris n leb n paas neb a taaba.
Rẽ poore, a Poll basa Atɛn n kẽng Korẽnt.

Yẽnda yãnda Zuif a yen beene t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Akilas, yẽ yaa soolem a yen sẽn boond tɩ Põ neda. La yẽnda ne a pag a Pirsill yii Itali soolem n nan wa be paalem, naab a Kolood sẽn dag n yiis tõog n yet tɩ Zuif-rãmba fãa yi Rom tẽnga yĩnga. A Poll kẽnga bãmb nengẽ.
La a Poll nug-tʋʋmdã ne bãmb dẽndã sẽn dag n ya bũmb a yembrã, yẽ zĩnda bãmb yirã n naag taab n tʋmdẽ. Bãmb dag n sẽta fu-roto.
Vʋʋsg daar fãa a Poll moonda koɛɛg karen-doogã pʋgẽ n maoodẽ tɩ Zuif-rãmba ne Gɛrk-rãmba tẽ-a.
La a Sɩlaas ne a Tɩmote sẽn yi Masedoan a wa, a Poll rɩka a weerã zãng n moon koe-noogã n yeel Zuif-rãmba tɩ yaa a Zezi la Kiristã.

La Zuif-rãmba ra kɩɩsda a Poll la b tʋʋd-a. Dẽ, yẽnda fugsa a fut n yeel-b yaa: Yãmb sã n sãame, a taala bee ne yãmba la a ka be ne maam ye. La sẽn sɩng ne moasã, mam na n kẽnga bu-zẽmsã nengẽ.
Dẽ, a Poll yii be n kẽng ned a yembr yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Titiyuus Zustus yiri, yẽ yaa ned sẽn zoet Wẽnnaam dabeem, la a zakã ra pẽe ne karen-doogã.
La a Kirspus sẽn ya karen-doog naaba ne a yirã rãmb fãa tẽe Zu-soabã. La Korẽntẽ neb wʋsg sẽn wʋm a Poll koe-moonegã bãmb me tẽeme n paam koom lisgu.
La yʋngo, Zu-soaba goma ne a Poll vẽnegr pʋg n yeel-a yaa: Da zoe rabeem ye, kẽng taoor n gom la f ra sĩnd ye.
Tɩ bõe, mam bee ne foom, la ned ba a yen kõn tõog n yõk foom n maan-f wẽng ye, bala, neb wʋsg n be tẽn-kãnga pʋg n ya mam neba.
A Poll zĩnda Korẽnt yʋʋmd la kiis a yoobe, n zãms nebã Wẽnnaam goama beene.
La wakat ninga a Galiyõ sẽn dag n ya Akayi soolem Gʋvɛrneerã, Zuif-rãmba lagma taab n dõd a Poll n tall a n kẽng bʋʋd zĩigẽ.
B tɩ yeelame yaa: Rao-kãnga sẽn baood n kɩt tɩ nebã waoog Wẽnnaam to-to wã ka zemsd ne tõogã ye.
A Poll sẽn yet t'a na n gome, la a Galiyõ sẽn yeel Zuif-rãmba yaa: Zuif-rãmba, sã n dag ya bũmb sẽn ka tɩrg wala tʋʋm wẽng poorẽ, mam dag n na n maaga m meng n kelg yãmba.
La sã n yaa nokoɛɛma, goam poorẽ, la yʋy la yãmb mens tõogã poorẽ, yõwã yaa yãmb la pak-yã. Mam ka na n yɩ bõn-kãens bʋ-kaood ye.
La a Galiyõ riga bãmb tɩ b yi bʋʋda zĩigẽ.
Dẽ, b naaga taab n yõk a Sostɛn sẽn ya karen-doog naabã n sɩng n pãbd-a bʋʋda zĩig noore. La a Galiyõ dag n ka maand yɩɩr ne yel-kãng ye.

A Poll kell n paa Korẽnt n kaoose. Dẽ, a yaool n basa ba-biisã n kẽ koom-koglg n kẽng Siri la a Pirsill ne a Akilas tũu yẽnda. La sẽn deng a Poll sẽn na n kẽ koom-koglgã, a kɩtame tɩ b põng a zugã Sãnkre, bala yẽ rag n pʋlma Wẽnnaam.
Bãmb taa Efɛɛse, la a Poll basa a Akilas ne a Pirsill beene. A Poll kẽnga karen-doogẽ n tɩ sõs ne Zuif-rãmbã.
La b kos-a lame t'a pa be n kaoose, la a zãgsame.
A Poll pʋʋsa bãmb wẽn-na-taas n yeel-b yaa: kibsã sẽn watã, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ mam maan-a Zeruzalɛm. Wẽnnaam sã n data, mam na n leb n waa yãmb nengẽ. La yẽ kẽe koom-koglg Efɛɛs n looge.
A Poll sẽn sig Sezaare, a kẽnga Zeruzalɛm n na n tɩ pʋʋs a Zezi tẽedbã n yaool n kẽng Ãntiyos.
La yẽnda sẽn kaoos Ãntiyos bilfu, a lebg n dɩka sor n kẽng tẽng-tẽnga, n pɩʋʋg Galasi soolem ne Firzi soolem n paas karen-biisã fãa pãng b tẽebã pʋga.
Zuif a yembr yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Apolos n dag n wa Efɛɛse, yẽ roga Alegsãndri. Yẽ yaa ned sẽn ya gom-minim soaba la yẽ ra mii gʋls-sõamyã neere.
B rag n zãms-a-la Zu-soabã sore. La baa sẽn da yaa a Zã lisgã yell bal la yẽ mi wã, a ra zãmsda neba ne a sũura fãa bũmb nins sẽn wilgd a Zezi kibarã tɩrga.
Dẽ, a Apolos sɩngame n gom karen-doogã pʋg ne pɛl-kɛgenga. La a Pirsill ne a Akilas sẽn wʋm yẽ koɛɛgã, b peeg-a lame n maneg n zãms-a Wẽnnaam sorã tɩrg n paase.

A Apolos sẽn dat n kẽng Akayi wã, ba-biisã paasa yẽnda raood n gʋls sebr n tʋm karen-biisã sẽn be soolem kãngã n yet tɩ b reeg-a neere. La yẽ sẽn ta beene, a sõnga neb nins sẽn ya tẽedbã wʋsg ne Wẽnnaam barkã.
Bala, yẽ goma wʋsg ne Zuif-rãmbã, n tall gʋls-sõamyã nebã taoor n wilg-b t'a Zezi yaa Kiristã.
A Apolos sẽn wa n be Korẽntã wakate, a Poll pɩʋʋga soolem nins sẽn be zugẽ wã n kẽng Efɛɛse. A Poll yãa karen-biis kẽer be,
n sok-b tɩ b sẽn tẽ wã, b paama Sɩɩg-sõngo. La b leoka yẽnda tɩ bãmb zɩɩ n wʋm tɩ b gomd tɩ Sɩɩg-sõng n be ye.
T'a Poll sok-b tɩ rẽ wã lisg ninga b sẽn deegã yaa bʋgo? Tɩ b leok tɩ yaa a Zã lisgã.
Dẽ, a Poll yeel-b lame yaa: A Zã rag n lisda neb nins sẽn tek-b yam n kos sugrã, la b rag n yeta Israyɛl nebã tɩ b tẽ ned ningã sẽn na n pʋgl a yẽnda n wa wã. Sẽn dat n togs t'a Zezi.
Bãmb sẽn wʋm a woto, b kɩtame tɩ b lis-b koomẽ ne Zu-soab a Zezi yʋʋre.
A Poll tika bãmb ne a nusi, la Sɩɩg-sõng siga b zutu. Bãmb sɩngame n gom gom-zẽna n togs bãngr goama.
Nin-kãens fãa sõorã ra kolga piig la a yiibu.
A Poll kẽe karen-doogẽ wã n gom ne Pɛl-kɛgenga, la yẽ moona Wẽnnaam soolem koɛɛgã kiis a tãabo n maood n dat n wilg sẽn kelgd-b yẽ wã tɩ yaa sɩda.

La neb kẽer riglima b sũyã n tõgdg tɩ b ka na n tẽ ye. La b gom Zu-soaba sor wẽng neb wʋsgã taoore. Dẽ, a Poll yii bãmb sʋk, n peeg karen-biisã toor n kẽng a Tiranuus kaorengã roog pʋg n zãms-b daar fãa.
Bõn-kãng kaoosa yʋʋm a yiibu, hal tɩ Zuif-rãmba ne Gɛrk-rãmba la neb nins fãa sẽn be Azi soolma wʋm Zu-soabã koɛɛgã.
La Wẽnnaam maana bõn-bãn-kãsems ne a Poll nusi.
Hal tɩ b rɩgs pɛɛla wala fut sẽn da sɩɩs a Poll yĩngã n ningd bãad-dãmba zut la b paamda maagre, la sɩ-wẽnsã yit n basd-b lame.

Tɩt rãmb kẽer sẽn da ya Zuif buud n ya gõaadb makame n na tall Zu-soab a Zezi yʋʋrã n dig zĩn-dãmb tɩ b yi n bas bãad-dãmba. Tɩtã rãmb yeela sɩ-wẽnsã yaa: Ne a Poll sẽn moond Zezi ningã wã yʋʋre, mam yeta yãmb tɩ y yi.
Neb nins sẽn dag n maand a woto wã yaa Zuif-rãmba maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Seva kom-dibli a yopoe.
La sɩ-wẽnga leok-b lame yaa: Mam mii a Zezi, la m mii a Poll sẽn ya ned ninga. La yãmba, yãmb yaa ãnna rãmba?
La sɩ-wẽngã sẽn tar ned ningã yikame n yẽeg-b n zab ne-b n tõog-b fãa ne pãng hal tɩ b zoe n yi ro-kãng pʋg bɛɛl la ne sãmpoaga.
La Zuif-rãmba ne Gɛrk-rãmba sẽn da be Efɛɛs fãa wʋma bõn-kãnga: La rabeem yõka b fãa, la Zu-soab a Zezi yʋʋrã paama waoogre.
Neb nins sẽn tẽ wã wʋsg dag wat n togsda b sẽn da maan bũmb ninsã neba taoore.
La bãmb neb wʋsg sẽn da be bãmb sʋkã n ya bag-bʋgdbã talla b sɛbã n wa n yõog bugum neba fãa taoore. La b geela sɛba ligd n mik tɩ taa wanzuri ligd tus pis nu.
Woto kɩtame tɩ Zu-soaba koɛɛg saag ne pãnga la tõogre.
Bõn-kãens zugẽ, a Poll yãka yam n na pɩʋʋg Masedoan ne Akayi n kẽng Zeruzalɛm, la a yet tɩ yẽ sã n ta beene, yaa tɩlɛ t'a kẽng Rom tẽng me.
A Poll tʋma a sõangdb a yiib tɩ b kẽng Masedoan, yaa a Tɩmote ne a Erast. La yẽnda meng leb n paa Azi soolem n kaoos bilfu.
Wakat kãnga, rãmb-kãsems n yik Zu-soabã sor wɛɛngẽ.
Yõak a yembr n da be t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Demetiryus, yẽ ra maanda wẽn-poak a Artemi pʋʋsg ro-bõoneg ne wanzuri. A maanda a woto t'a tʋmtʋmdba paamd ligd wʋsgo.
Yẽ tigma nin-bãmb ne neb nins sẽn ya yõgsã n yeel-b yaa: Raopa, yãmb fãa miime tɩ yaa ne nug-tʋʋm kãngã la tõnd tʋmd n paamd ligdi.

La yãmb yãtame la y wʋmd bũmb nins rao a Pollã sẽn maandã. Tɩ bõe, yẽnda yetame tɩ neba nus sẽn maan wẽnnaam-dãmba ninsã ka wẽnnaam-dãmb ye, la a tõogame n tek neb wʋsg yam. La ka Efɛɛs soolem bal ye, yaa sẽn kolg Azi fãa gilli.

Sã n ka gũusi, bõn-kãnga na n sãama tõnd tʋʋmdã, la sẽn paase, a na n maaname tɩ wẽn-poak kãseng a Artemi pʋʋsgã roog ka leb n tar waoogr ye. Dẽ, Azi soolem nebã fãa ne dũniyã fãa sẽn da pʋʋsd wẽn-poak ninga ka na n le paam pẽgr ye.
La tẽnga fãa rãmbame. Bãmb yõga Gayus ne a Aristark sẽn ya Masedoan neba n yaa a Poll tũud-n-taasã, n naag taab n wudg tao-tao n kẽ reema zĩigẽ.
A Poll dag n dat n kẽnga neb kʋʋngã taoore, la karen-biisã gɩdg-a lame.
Kãsem-dãmb kẽer meng sẽn be Azi soolem n ya a Poll Zo-rãmb tʋmame tɩ b kos-a t'a ra kẽng reema zĩigẽ ye.
La wakat kãnga, neb kẽer kelemdame n yet tɩ woto, tɩ neb kẽer kelem n yeel bũmb a to. Tɩ bõe, neb kʋʋngã rãmbdame, hal tɩ neb kẽer meng rag ka mi bũmb ning yĩng sẽn kɩt tɩ b tigma ye.
La b kɩtame t'a Alegsãndr yi kʋʋngã sʋka, tɩ Zuif-rãmba tus-a t'a kẽng neba taoore. La a Alegsãndr zẽka a nug n na n gom neba taoore.
La neba sẽn bãng t'a Alegsãndr yaa Zuifã, b fãa naaga taab n kelem hal tɩ kolg lɛɛr a yiib n yetẽ tɩ Efɛɛsẽ-rãmbã wẽn-poak a Artemi yaa kãsenga.

Baoosgo, tẽnga seb-gʋlsdã tõogame tɩ neba sĩndi, la a yeel yaa: Efɛɛs neba, ãnna soab n ka mi tɩ yaa Efɛɛz tẽngã n ya Artemi kãsenga pʋʋsg roog gũuda, la Artemi naandã sẽn yi yĩngr n lʋɩ wã gũuda?
La ned ka tõe n kɩɩs bõn-kãng ye. Rẽ wã yĩnga, y tog n maaga y mense n da maan bũmb baa fʋɩ ne yãgb ye.
Tɩ bõe, rao-kãens yãmb sẽn tall n wa ka wã, b ka paooge, wala b tʋʋs tõnd wẽn-poakã ye.
Rẽ wã yĩnga, a Demetiryus ne a tʋmd-n-taasã sã n tar yell ne neda, bʋʋd ray beeme, la bʋ-kaoodb beeme. Bɩ b tɩ bʋ ne taab be.
Yãmb sã n ket n tar yɛl a taaba, bʋ-kaoodbã sã n wa tigim wa sẽn zems ne tõogã, b na ges yel-kãng yelle.
La sɩdã, b tõe dõda tõnd n yet tɩ d rãmbda tẽngã, bũmb ning sẽn maan dũnna wã yĩnga. Bala, tõnd ka tar bũmb sẽn wilgd tɩ d tara noor tɩ tigim a woto ye.
La yẽ sẽn gom a woto n sɛ, a kɩtame tɩ nebã looge.
La rãmbgã sẽn sigi, a Poll tigma karen-biisã n paas-b raood n yaool n loog n kẽng Masedoan.
Yẽ pɩʋʋga zĩig zĩig soolem kãng pʋg n sagl karen-biisã wʋsgo, n yaool n kẽng Gɛrs tẽnga.
La a Poll zĩnda Gɛrs soolem kiis a tãabo. La yẽ rag n dat n kẽe koom-koglg n kẽng Siiri, la Zuif-rãmbã sẽn soos n sed n dat yõk-a wã yĩnga, yẽ yãka yam n na n lebg n tũ Masedoan sore.

Neb nins sẽn yãag a Poll n ta Azi soolma, yaa Beere rao a Pirus biiga a Sopatɛɛr ne a Aristark ne a Sekõndus sẽn yit Tesalonik la a Gayus sẽn yit Dɛrb tẽnga, ne a Tɩmote ne a Tisik la a Torfim sẽn dog Azi soolma.
Nin-kãens renga taoor n tɩ gũ tõnd Torwas soolem.
La bur sẽn ka rã-bɩll kibsã loogr poore, tõnd mensã kẽe koom-koglg Filip. La sẽn kaoos rasem a nu, tõnd tɩ bʋʋga bãmb Torwas, la d zĩnda be rasem a yopoe.
Dimaas daar zaabre, tõnd dag n tigmame n na dɩ tẽegr buri. A Poll sẽn da tog n loog vẽkembeoogã, yẽ moona koɛɛgã ne karen-biisã n gom n kaoos halɩ n ta yʋn-sʋka.
Yĩngr doog ninga pʋg tõnd sẽn da tigma, fɩtl-dãmb wʋsg n dag n be be.

La bi-bɩɩg a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Etikus n da zao fẽnetr zugu. La a gũsa sõama, a Poll koe-moon-wokã wakate. La gõeemã sẽn dɩk-a wã yĩnga, a yii yĩngr ro-tomdem a tãab soabã n lʋɩ tẽnga. La b rɩk-a lame n mik t'a kiime.
La a Poll sigame n zõond a Etikus zug n dɩk-a a nusẽ n yeel yaa: Da maan-y yɩɩr ye, a vɩɩme.
La a Poll sẽn lebg n dʋ, a Kao burã n dɩ. La a gomame yɛs n kaoos hal tɩ beoogã vẽege, n yaool n looge.
La b yãaga bi-bɩɩgã vɩɩga. La a yɩɩ belsg kãseng bãmb fãa yĩnga.
Tõnd denga taoor n kẽ koom-koglg n kẽng Asos, yaa be la tõnd da tog n tɩ seg a Poll n dɩke, yẽnda n da yãk yam a woto n na n kẽn ne nao n kẽng be.
La a Poll sẽn seg tõnd Asose, a kẽe koom-koglgã ne tõnd n kẽng Mitilɛn.
Tõnd yika be ne koom-koglgã n looge, la vẽkembeoogo, tõnd taa tẽng sẽn boond tɩ Siyo taoore, la daar ning sẽn pʋgdã, tõnd taa Samos, la daar ninga sẽn pʋgla yẽ wã, tõnd siga Mile.
A Poll dag n sɩd yãka yam n na n loog Efɛɛs n da sig be ye, sẽn na n yɩl n da sãam weer Azi soolme wã ye. Tɩ bõe, yẽ ra yãgdame n datẽ tɩ sã n tõe, bɩ a zĩnd Zeruzalɛm Pãntekotã daare.
A Poll zĩnda Mile n tʋm koɛɛg tɩ b bool a Zezi tẽedbã kãsem-dãmbã sẽn be Efɛɛsã tɩ b wa.
La b sẽn wa n ta a Poll nengẽ, yẽ yeel-b lame yaa: Yãmb mii mam yel-manesem sẽn yɩ to-to ne yãmb wakat fãa, sẽn sɩng ne daar ning mam sẽn wa Azi soolmã pʋgẽ wã.
Mam tʋma Zu-soab yĩng ne sik-m-menga, baa ne nintãmã, la tood nins mam sẽn paamã, Zuif-rãmbã sẽn da set n dat n kʋ maamã.
Yãmb miime tɩ mam ka solg yãmb bũmb nins fãa sẽn na n sõng-y wã ye. Mam togsa yãmb bũmba fãa la m zãms-y nebã sʋka la rot pʋse.
Mam kɩsa kaset ne Zuif-rãmba la Gɛrk-rãmbã n yeel-b tɩ b tek yam n kos Wẽnnaam sugri, la b tẽ tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi.
La moasã, Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn modgd maam tɩ m kẽng Zeruzalɛmã, mam na n kẽngame, la m ka mi bũmb ning sẽn na n tɩ paam maam be ye.
Mam sẽn mi bala, yaa tɩ Sɩɩg-sõng keoogda maam tẽng tẽnga, tɩ bi-bees roogo la namsg n gũud maam.

La mam tagsdame tɩ mam vɩɩmã ka tar yõod ne maam ye. La sẽn pak maam yaa tɩ m wee n tõog n maan m tʋʋmdã hal n ta a tɛka, n tõog n baas tʋʋmd ning Zu-soab a Zezi sẽn ning mam zugã, n moon Wẽnnaam barkã koe-noogã.
Mam zĩnda yãmb sʋk n moon Wẽnnaam soolem koɛɛgã, la mam mii moasã tɩ yãmb ned baa a yen ka na n le yã mam neng yɛs ye.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ mam togsd yãmb dũnna, tɩ yãmb ned a yen sã n sãame, a taalã ka be ne maam ye.
Bala, mam togsa yãmb Wẽnnaam daabã fãa n ka solg bũmb ye.
Dẽ wã, gũus-y mense, la y ges piis nins fãa Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn kõ-y tɩ y gũ wã yelle. Rɩlg-y Zu-soabã tẽedbã b sẽn da ne b biigã zɩɩmã.
Mam miime tɩ mam loogr poore, neb sẽn wẽnd wa rigd-n-yĩid toos n na n wa yãmb sʋk n sãam piisã.
La neb n na n yik yãmb sʋkã n zãmsd nebã sẽn ka sɩda, n maan a woto n belg tẽedba tɩ b tũ-ba.
Rẽ wã yĩnga, neend-y la y tẽeg tɩ yʋʋm a tãabo, mam sagla yãmb ned kam fãa ne nintãm, wĩntoog ne yʋng n ka bas ye.
La moasã, mam basda yãmb Wẽnnaam nugẽ, la m basd-y ne bãmb bark goamã sẽn tar pãng n tõe n paas yãmb daoodo, la a kɩt tɩ yãmb yɩ pʋɩt-n-taas ne Wẽnnaam neba fãa wã.
Mam ka maan sũ-kiir ne ned ligdi, wall a sãnem, wall a fut ye.
Yãmb mens miime tɩ mam tʋma ne m meng nus n na n paam bũmb ning sẽn na sek maam ne neb nins sẽn tũud maamã.
Mam wilga yãmb bũmb fãa pʋgẽ tɩ d tog n tʋma a woto n tõog n sõng naong rãmba, la d tẽeg goam nins Zu-soab a Zezi meng sẽn yeelã: Tɩ kõ bee bark n yɩɩd tɩ reege.
A Poll sẽn gom a woto n sɛ, a yĩgimdame n pʋʋs ne bãmb fãa.
La b fãa ra yãbda wʋsgo, n mobgd a Poll n mogsd-a, n pʋʋsd-a wẽnd-na-taase.
La b sũyã sẽn sãam ne bũmb ning n yɩɩd yaa a Poll sẽn yeel tɩ b ka na n leb n yãnd-a wã. Rẽ poore, b yãaga yẽnda hal n ta koom-koglgẽ wã.
La tõnd sẽn bas bãmba, d kẽe koom-koglg n loog n kẽng tɩrg n ta Kos. La vẽkembeoogo tõnd taa Rood, n yaool n yi be n kẽng Patara.
Tõnd yãnda koom-koglg beene sẽn dag n dabd Fenisi, tõnd yaool n kẽe yẽnda n kẽnge.
Tõnd sẽn kẽng n kolg Sɩpre, tõnd bas-a-la goabg n kẽng Siiri sẽne n na yeg Tɩɩr n tɩ sig zĩig ning koom-koglgã sẽn tog n sik a zɩɩbã.
Tõnd yãa tẽedb beene la tõnd paa ne bãmb rasem a yopoe. La Sɩɩg-sõng wilga bãmb tɩ b yeel a Poll t'a ra kẽng Zeruzalɛm ye.
La rasem kãens loogr zugẽ, tõnd loogame. La b fãa ne b pagbã la b kambã yãaga tõndo, hal n yi tẽnga pʋgẽ. Tõnd yĩgimda koomã noor n pʋʋse.
Dẽ, tõnd sẽn pʋʋs taab wẽnd-na-taas n sɛ, tõnd kẽe koom-koglgẽ wã, la b lebgame n kuil b yiyã.
Tõnd sẽn kẽn ne koom-koglgã n sɛ, tõnd yii Tɩɩr n kẽng Tolemayiis n tɩ pʋʋs ba-biisã la d zĩnd ne bãmb beene daar a yen.
Vẽkembeoogo, tõnd loogame n ta Sezaare. Tõnd siga koe-moaand a Filip zakẽ. Yẽnda yaa neb a yopoe wã b sẽn da tũus Zeruzalɛmã nin-yende.
La yẽ ra tara kom-pugli a naas sẽn nan ka mi rao ye, n ya Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba.
Tõnd paa Sezaare rasem wʋsgo, la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Agabus yii Zude n wa tõnd nengẽ.
Yẽ rɩka a Poll sẽbdgã n sẽb a nao ne a nus n yeel yaa: Ade, Sɩɩg-sõng yetame tɩ Zuif-rãmbã na n sẽba ned ning sẽn so-a sẽbd kãnga wã a woto Zeruzalɛm, n ning-a bu-zẽmsa nusẽ.
Tõnd ne neb nins sẽn be Sezaare wã sẽn wʋm bõn-kãnga, tõnd kosa a Poll t'a ra kẽng Zeruzalɛm ye.
La a Poll leokame: yaa bõe n tar yãmb tɩ y yãbd n na n sãam mam sũuri? Bala, mam seglame n sɛ, la ka sẽbrã yĩng bal ye. M seglame me n na n ki Zeruzalɛm Zu-soab a Zezi yʋʋrã yĩnga.
La yẽ sẽn ka sak tõnd sẽn datã, d bas-a lame la d yeel tɩ Zu-soabã maan b raabo.
Rasem kãens sẽn looge, tõnd segla d teed n kẽng Zeruzalɛm.
Sezaare karen-biis kẽer me yãaga tõndo. B talla tõnd n tɩ ta rao a yen sẽn yit Sɩpr t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Nazõ yiri. Yẽ yaa karen-bi-kʋdre. Yaa yẽ zakẽ la tõnd tog n zĩndi.
Tõnd sẽn ta Zeruzalɛm, ba-biisã reega tõnd ne sũ-noogo.
Vẽkembeoogo, a Poll kẽnga a Zak yir ne tõndo, la a Zezi tẽedba kãsem-dãmb fãa tigma beene.
A Poll sẽn pʋʋs-b n sɛ, a sɩngame n togs bãmb bũmb nins fãa Wẽnnaam sẽn tall yẽnda n maan bu-zẽmsã sʋkã.
Bãmb sẽn kelg a Poll goama, b pẽga Wẽnnaam la b yeel a Poll yaa: Ba biiga, yãmb yãame, Zuif-rãmb tus wʋsg n lebg tẽedba, la b fãa wɩngda ne a Moyiis tõogã.
Mik b ra kɩtame tɩ bãmb tẽed tɩ yãmb zãmsda Zuif-rãmb nins fãa sẽn be bu-zẽmsa sʋkã n yet-b tɩ b wẽnemd n bas a Moyiis tõogã, la b ra kẽes b kamba bãongo, la b ra tũ mininda ye.
Dẽ wã, d na n maana wãna? Bala, neb wʋsg na n sɩd wʋmame tɩ y waame la neb kʋʋng na n tigmame.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ y maan bũmb ninga tõnd sẽn na n yeel-y wã. Tõnd tara raop a naas sẽn maan pʋleng ne Wẽnnaam.

Peeg-y-ba, n naag ne-b n sak miningã n yɩlg-y mense, la y yao yaoodã, tɩ b põng b zutã. Dẽ neba fãa na n bãngame tɩ bũmb nins fãa b sẽn wʋm tɩ b gomd yãmb wɛɛngẽ wã ka sɩd ye, la tɩ yãmb meng sakda a Moyiis tõogã.

Sã n ya ne bu-zẽms nins sẽn lebg tẽedbã, tõnd gʋls-b lame n yeel-b tɩ b ra wãb rũms nemd b sẽn maan maoong n kõ wẽn-naands ye, la b ra rɩ zɩɩm, la b ra wãb rũng sẽn sãrg nemd ye, la b ra maan wɩɩbd ye.

Vẽkembeoogo, a Poll peega nin-bãmba b naasã n naag ne-b n yɩlg-b mense, n yaool n kẽ wẽnd-doogẽ wã n togs nebã bãmb yɩlgrã rayã sẽn na n baas wakat ninga, la wakat ning bãmb ned kam fãa sẽn na n wa ne a kũun tɩ b maan maoongã.
Rasem a yopoe wã sẽn kolg pidsgu, Zuif-rãmbã sẽn yit Azi soolmã sẽn yãa a Poll wẽnd-doogã pʋgẽ, b rãmba neb kʋʋngã gilli, n yõk a Polle,

n kelemd n yetẽ yaa: Israyɛl neba, wa n sõng-y-do! Ad rao ninga sẽn zãmsd neba fãa zĩiga fãa tɩ b kɩɩs Israyɛl buudã, la b kɩɩs a Moyiis tõogã la zĩ-kãnga, la a kɩtame meng tɩ Gɛrk-rãmb kẽ wẽnd-doogẽ wã n kɩt tɩ zĩ-sõng-kãnga rẽgme.
Bala b rag n yãa Efɛɛs rao a Torfim t'a tũud a Poll tẽngã pʋgẽ, la b tagsdame t'a Poll tall-a lame n kẽ wẽnd-doogẽ wã.
Tẽngã fãa rãmbame, la neb yii zĩiga fãa n zoe n wa. B yõka a Poll n tɛ-a n yiis wẽnd-doogẽ wã, la b pag kuɩlemsã tao-tao.
La b sẽn dat kʋ a Pollã, b wa n togsa sodaas tusr naaba tɩ Zeruzalɛm fãa dãmbame.
Wakat kãng bala, yẽ yãka sodaase, la sodaas koabg nanamse, n zoe n kẽng neba nengẽ. Nebã sẽn yã sodaas tusr naaba ne sodaasã, b basa a Poll pãbre.
Dẽ, sodaas tusr naaba kolgame n yõka a Poll n kɩt tɩ b balg-a ne bãens a yiibu. La a yaool n sok a Poll sẽn ya ned ninga, la a sẽn maan bũmb ninga.

La neb kʋʋngã sʋka, kẽer kelemdame n yet tɩ woto, tɩ kẽer yet bũmb a to. Dẽ, bʋrgã sẽn ya wʋsg tɩ sodaas tusr naabã ka tõe n bãng sẽn ya sɩdã, a yeelame tɩ b tall a Poll n kẽng gãosgẽ wã.
La a Poll sẽn ta rʋʋdgã, yɩɩ tɩlɛ tɩ sodaasã tebg yẽnda, neb kʋʋngã sẽn maood n dat n maan a Poll pãnga yĩnga.
Bala, b fãa ra pʋgdame n kelemdẽ n yetẽ tɩ b kʋ-a.
La wakat ning b sẽn tar a Poll n kẽed gãosgẽ wã, a Poll yeela sodaas tusr naabã yaa: M tara noor tɩ yeel-y bũmbu? La sodaas tusr naabã sok-a lame yaa: Fo mii Gɛrk goamã?
Rẽnd fo ka Ezipt ned ninga sẽn dag n wa-a ne rãmbg pĩndã, n peeg nin-kʋʋdb tus a naas tɩ b tũ-f n kẽ weoogã wɛ?
A Poll leokame yaa: Mam yaa Zuif, m doga Tars sẽn be Silisi soolem, m yaa tẽn-kãseng neda. M bõosd-y lame tɩ y kõ-maam noor tɩ m gom ne nebã.
La sodaas tusr naabã kõ-a-la noore, la a Poll yik n yalsa rʋʋdgã zug n zẽk a nug n zãas neba, la bʋrga sɛɛme, tɩ lebg sɩddd. Dẽ, yẽ gomã ne bãmb ne hebre-rãmb goamã.
A Poll yeela nebã yaa: M ba-biisi la m ba-rãmba, kelg-y bũmb ning mam sẽn tar moasã n na n togs yãmb n yiis m meng yellẽ wã.
Bãmb sẽn wʋm t'a Poll gomd ne bãmb ne Hebre-rãmba goama, b yalsa sɩddd n yɩɩd pĩnda. Dẽ, a Poll yeel-b lame.

Mam yaa Zuif sẽn dog Tars sẽn be Silisi soolem. La b wuba maam Zeruzalɛm ka la mam zĩnda a Gamalyɛl taoor tɩ b zãms maam tɩ m bãng tõnd yaab-rãmbã tõod neere. Mam me rag n wɩngda ne Wẽnnaam tʋʋmdã wala yãmb fãa sẽn ya to-to rũnna wã.
Mam dag n namsa neb nins sẽn dag n tũud so-kãnga wã n kʋ-ba, la m yõg raop la pagb n sẽb n kẽes-b bi-bees roogo.

Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem ne kãsem-dãmbã fãa sullã yaa mam kaset dãmba. Mam tol n deega sɛb bãmb nengẽ, ba-biis nins sẽn be Damasã yĩnga, la m kẽnga be n na n tɩ sẽb tẽedba sẽn be be wã n tall-b n wa Zeruzalɛm n kɩt tɩ b sɩbg-ba.
La mam sẽn waa n be sorẽ n kolgd Damase, sẽn zems wĩnto-sʋk sasa, tao-tao bala, vẽenem kãseng n yi arzãn n yãg n gũbg maam.
Mam lʋɩɩ tẽnga, la m wʋma koɛɛg sẽn dag n yet maam yaa: "Solle! Solle! Yaa bõe tɩ fo namsd maam?"
Mam sokame tɩ Zu-soaba yãmb yaa ãnna soab tɩ mam namsd-yã? La koɛɛgã yeela maam yaa: "Mam yaa a Zezi sẽn yit Nazarɛt, soab ning fo sẽn namsdã."
Neb nins sẽn da be ne maama yãa vẽenemã, la b ka wʋm ned ninga sẽn da gomd-a ne maama koɛɛgã ye.
Dẽ, mam sokame yaa: "Zu-soaba, bõe la mam tog n maane?" La Zu-soabã yeela maam yaa: "Yik n kẽng Damas la beene, b na n togsa foom bũmb nins fãa Wẽnnaam sẽn yet foo tɩ f maana."
La vẽenemã sẽn yãg tɩ mam lebg zoangã yĩnga, mam tũud-n-taasã gãda mam nug n tae maam n ta Damase.
Mik tɩ rao a yen n dag n be be t'a yʋʋr boondẽ t'a Ananiyas n sakd tõodã, la Zuif-rãmba fãa sẽn da be be wã ra kõta yẽ kaset sõngo.
Yẽ waa mam nengẽ n yeel maam yaa: "M ba-biig a Solle, paam-y nin yɛsa." La wakat kãng bala, mam le paama m nini, la m yãnd-a lame.
A Ananiyas yeelame yaa: "Tõnd yaab-rãmba Wẽnnaam pĩnd n yãka yãmb tɩ y bãng b tʋlsem, tɩ y yã tɩrlem soabã la y wʋm bãmb noor goama.
Bala, yãmb na n yɩɩ bãmb kaset soaba n togs bũmb nins yãmb sẽn yã la y wʋmã, neba fãa taoore.
La moasã, yaa bõe tɩ y kaoosdẽ? Yik-y n pʋʋs-y ne Zu-soabã yʋʋre, n deeg koom lisgu, n paam y yel-wẽna pekre."
La mam lebg n waa Zeruzalɛm, la mam sẽn be wẽnd-doogã pʋg n pʋʋsdẽ, mam paama vẽnegre.
La m yãnda Zu-soabã, la b yeela maam tɩ m nang-pãng n yi Zeruzalɛm tao-tao, tɩ bala, tẽngã nebã ka na n deeg mam sẽn na n kɩs Zu-soaba kasetã ye.
La mam yeelame: "Zu-soaba, bãmb mens miime tɩ mam da kẽnda karen-dot pʋsẽ, n kɩtdẽ tɩ b kẽesd neb nins sẽn tẽed yãmbã bi-bees roogo, la m kɩtdẽ tɩ b pãbd-ba.
La b sẽn na n daag y kaset kɩt a Etɛn zɩɩmã wakate, mam meng ra bee be, mam da yetame tɩ b sẽn maanda yaa sõama, maam n da gũud neb nins sẽn kʋʋd a Etɛnna futu."
Dẽ, Zu-soabã yeela maam yaa: "Kẽnge, bala, m na n tʋma foom zĩ-zãrgẽ, bu-zẽmsã nengẽ."
Neba kelga a Poll hal tɩ ta wakat ninga yẽ sẽn gom gom-kãngã, la wakat kãnga, b sɩngame n zẽk b koees n yetẽ: menes-y nin-kãnga duniyã zugu! Kʋ-y-yã-a, yẽ ka tog n vɩɩmd ye.
Bãmb dag n kelemdame, n lobd b fut la b lobd tom yĩngri.
Sodaas tusr naabã yeelame tɩ b kẽes a Poll gãosgẽ wã n pãb-a ne kalwaas n sok-a n bãng sẽn ya bũmb ninga yĩng tɩ Zuif-rãmba kelemd a woto n dõt yẽnda wã.
La b sẽn sẽb a Poll ne wĩy n na n pãbe, yẽ soka sodaas koabg naab ning sẽn da be be wã tɩ rẽ yĩnga, tõogã kõta bãmb noor tɩ b pãb Rom ned ne kalwaas t'a bʋʋd meng nan ka kao?
Gom-kãensa yĩnga, sodaas koabg naaba kẽng n tɩ togsa sodaas tusr naabã bõn-kãng n yeel yaa: Yãmb na n maana a wãna? Rao-kãngã, yaa Rom neda.
Dẽ, sodaas tusr naabã wa n soka a Poll yaa: Togs maam, fo yaa Rom neda? T'a leok tɩ n-ye.
Dẽ, sodaas tusr naabã le yeelame yaa: Ad mam yaoo ligd wʋsgo, n paam lebg Rom neda. La a Poll yeelame yaa: La mam yẽ roga ne-a.

Tao-tao bala, neb nins sẽn dag n tog n pãb a Poll la b sok-a wã loogame n bas-a. La sodaas tusr naabã sẽn bãng t'a Poll yaa Rom nedã, la yẽ sẽn da kɩt tɩ b sẽb-a wã yĩnga, rabeem yõk-a lame.

La vẽkembeoogo, sodaas tusr naabã sẽn dat n bãng bũmb ninga Zuif-rãmba sẽn dõt a Pollã tiki-takɩ, yẽ kɩtame tɩ b lodg a Poll sẽbrã n bas-a. La a yeel maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb ne kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã fãa tɩ b tigim taaba. Dẽ, a kɩtame tɩ b talla a Poll n wa n yalsg-a bãmb sʋka.
A Poll gesa kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã n yeel yaa: M saam-biisi, mam kẽna Wẽnnaam taoor ne sũur kaset sẽn ya sõama hal tɩ ta rũnna.
La maan-kʋʋd kãsem a Ananiyas yeelame tɩ neb nins sẽn pẽ a Pollã wẽ a noorã.
Dẽ, a Poll yeela yẽnda yaa: Pʋ-libsem soaba, Wẽnnaam na n wẽe yãmba. Yãmb zĩndame n na n kao mam bʋʋd wa sẽn zems ne tõogo, la y kɩɩs tõogã n yet tɩ b wẽ maam.
Neb nins sẽn da be be wã yeela a Poll tɩ Wẽnnaam maan-kʋʋd kãsem la yẽ tʋʋsda.
La a Poll yeelame yaa: M saam-biisi, mam da ka mi tɩ yaa maan-kʋʋd kãsem ye, bala, Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã yeelame tɩ: "Ra gom f tẽng neb naab wẽng ye."

La a Poll sẽn mi tɩ nebã sẽn tigma kẽer yaa Saduusẽ-dãmba tɩ kẽer ya Fariisẽ-dãmbã, a zẽka a koɛɛg kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã sʋk n yeele: M saam-biisi, mam yaa Fariisẽ, la m yaa Fariisẽ biiga. Yaa mam sẽn tẽed tɩ kũum vʋʋgr beene wã yĩng n kɩt tɩ b bʋʋd mam bʋʋdo.
La a Poll sẽn yeel gom-kãnga, Fariisẽ-dãmbã ne Saduusẽ-dãmbã sɩngame n wẽ nokoɛɛma ne taaba, la nebã welga taaba.
Sɩd me, Saduusẽ-dãmbã yetame tɩ kũum vʋʋgre, wall malɛka wall Sɩɩg ka be ye. Tɩ Fariisẽ-dãmba yaool n yetẽ tɩ bõn-kãens fãa beeme.

La bʋr-kãseng yikame, la tõog karen-saam-dãmb kẽer sẽn be Fariisẽ-dãmba sullẽ wã yikame n kɩɩs ne pãng n yeel tɩ bãmb ka yã bõn-wẽng ne rao-kãngã ye, la tɩ tõeeme tɩ yaa sɩɩg wall malɛk n gom ne-a.
La nokoeemdã sẽn lebgd wʋsgã, tɩ sodaas tusr naabã zoet rabeem tɩ nebã na n wa tae a Poll n tõsã, a yeela sodaasã tɩ b sig nebã sʋk n tall a Poll n wa gãosgã pʋga.
La yʋng ninga sẽn pʋgdã, Zu-soaba vẽnega b meng ne a Poll n yeel-a yaa: keng f pɛlga, tɩ bõe, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ f kɩs mam kaset Rom tẽng me wala fo sẽn kɩs mam kaset Zeruzalɛma.
La beoogã sẽn vẽege, Zuif-rãmba yẽsa ne taab n yãk yam n wẽen tɩ b ka na n dɩ wall b yũ, sã n ka tɩ b kʋʋ a Polle.
Neb nins sẽn yẽs ne taab n wẽena sõor yɩɩda pis-naase.
Bãmb kẽng n tɩ yãa maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb ne kãsem-dãmbã n yeel-b yaa: Tõnd wẽename tɩ d ka na n lemb dɩɩbo, sã n ka tɩ d paam n kʋʋ a Polle.

Dẽ yĩngã, bɩ yãmb ne kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodba fãa kos sodaas tusr naabã tɩ b wa ne a Poll y nengẽ, wa y rat n baoo n bãnga yẽnda yellã n paase. La rẽ tɩ tõnd mensa seglame n na n kʋ-a t'a nan ka ta ka ye.
La a Poll tão biig wʋmame tɩ b set n dat n kʋʋ a Polle, la a kẽnga gãosgẽ wã n tɩ kẽ be n togs a Poll.
Dẽ, a Poll boola sodaas koabg naab a yembr n yeel-a t'a tall bi-bɩ-kãng n kẽng sodaas tusr naabã nengẽ, tɩ bala, a tara koɛɛg n dat n togs-a.
Sodaas koabg naabã peega biigã n kẽng sodaas tusr naabã nengẽ n yeel yaa: Bi-bɛɛg a Poll boola maam n kos-m tɩ m tall bi-bɩ-kãngã n wa y nengẽ t'a tara koɛɛg n dat n togs-yã.
La sodaas tusr naabã gãda bi-bɩ-kãng nug n yi kɛɛng n sok-a tɩ yaa bõe la a tar n dat n togs yẽnda.
Bi-bɩɩgã leokame yaa: Zuif-rãmba lagma taab n dat n kos yãmb tɩ y tall a Poll n wa kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã taoor wala b rat n leb n sok n bãnga yẽnda yellã n paase.

Ra kelg-y-b ye, bala, bãmb sʋka neb sẽn yɩɩd pis-naas n segend bẽdg a Poll yĩnga, la b yãka yam n wẽen tɩ b ka na n dɩ wala b yũ sã n ka tɩ b kʋ a Polle. Bãmb seglame n sɛ moasã n gũud yãmb sẽn na n yet tɩ bũmb ninga.
Sodaas tusr naabã keooga bi-bɩɩgã n yeel-a: Ra togs ned bũmb ninga fo sẽn togs maama ye.
Dẽ poore, sodaas tusr naabã boola sodaas kobs nanams a yiib n yeel yaa: Segl-y sodaas kobs-yi la wed-rʋʋdb pis-yopoe, ne kãn-tãoodb kobs-yi tɩ yʋngã wakat a wɛ sasa, y na n kẽnga hal Sezaare.
La y segl wiid me sẽn na n zombg a Poll n tall-a n kẽng Gʋvɛrneer a Feligs nengẽ tɩ bũmb ra maan-a ye.
La yẽ gʋlsa sebr n yeel a woto:
Maam a Kolood Liziyaas n pʋʋsd Gʋvɛrneer sõng a Feligs.
Zuif-rãmbã ra yõka rao-kãngã n da na n kʋ-a, la mam sẽn wʋm tɩ yẽ yaa Rom nedã, mam waa ne sodaas n fãag-a.
La mam sẽn dat n bãng sẽn ya bũmb ninga yĩng la Zuif-rãmbã rõt yẽnda wã, m tall-a lame n kẽng b kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã taoore.
La mam mikame tɩ b sẽn dõt yẽnda wã yaa nokoɛɛm sẽn kẽed ne bãmb mens tõoga yell wɛɛngẽ, la rao-kãngã ka maan bũmb sẽn zems tɩ b kʋ-a wall b kẽes-a bi-bees roog ye.
Dẽ, mam sẽn wʋm tɩ Zuif-rãmbã setame n dat n kʋ-a wã, mam tʋm-a-la yãmb nengẽ tao-tao la m yeela a rõatbã tɩ b wa yãmb taoor n togs b koɛɛgã. Wẽnd-na sõnge.
La sodaasã peega a Poll ne yʋng n tall-a hal n ta Ãntipatiris wa b sẽn da yeel bãmbã.
La vẽkembeoogo, sodaas nins sẽn kẽn ne nao wã lebg n leba gãosgẽ wã n bas wed-rʋʋdbã tɩ b tall a Poll n looge.
Bãmb sẽn ta Sezaare, b kɩsa Gʋvɛrneerã sebrã la b ning a Poll yẽ nugẽ.
Gʋvɛrneerã sẽn karem sebrã n sɛ, a soka a Poll a sẽn yit soolem ninga. La yẽ sẽn wʋm t'a Poll yita Silisi soolem,
A yeelame t'a rõatbã sã n wa n wa, a na kelg-a. La a yeelame tɩ b kẽes a Poll Herood na-zakẽ wã n gũ-a.

La rasem a nu sẽn looge, maan-kʋʋd kãsem a Ananiyas waa Sezaare ne kãsem-dãmb kẽere la gom-minim soab a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Tertull. Bãmb togsa b sẽn bʋʋd ne a Pollã yell Gʋvɛrneer a Feligs taoore.
B boola a Poll t'a wa, la a Tertull sɩngame n dõd yẽnda n yeele:
Feligs sõngo, yaa yãmb maasem yĩng tɩ tõnd paamd laafɩ hakɩɩka, la y maana yam tʋʋm n maneg soolem kãngã, tõnd deegda bãmb bũmb fãa pʋgẽ, la zĩiga fãa n pʋʋsd d zaame beoogo.
La mam ka rat n dɩk yãmb weerã n kaoos ye. Yaa woto yĩng tɩ m kot-y tɩ y maan sũ-mare n kelg tõnd wakat bilfu.
Tõnd mikame tɩ rao-kãnga yaa wẽnem soaba n wat ne rãmbg Zuif-rãmba fãa sẽn be dũniyã zugã sʋka la a yaa Nazarɛt dãmba kaoreng taoor soaba.
La a makame meng n dat n paoog wẽnd-doogã. Dẽ, tõnd yõk-a lame. Tõnd dag n dat n kao a bʋʋd wa sẽn zems tõnd tõogã.
La sodaas tusr naab a Liziyaas waa n deeg-a-la ne pãn-kãseng tõnd nusẽ.
La a yeela a Poll rõatbã tɩ b wa yãmb nengẽ. Yãmb meng tõe n sok-a lame n bãng bũmb nins fãa yĩng sẽn kɩt tɩ d bʋʋd ne-a wã.
Zuif-rãmba paasa gomda pãng n yet tɩ yaa sɩda.

Dẽ, Gʋvɛrneerã zẽka a nug n yeel a Poll t'a gome. Dẽ, a Poll dɩka koɛɛg n yeel yaa: Mam miime tɩ yãmb yaa soolem-kãngã bʋ-kaood hal yʋʋm wʋsgo. Dẽ, yaa ne kɩs-sɩd la mam na n gom yãmb taoor n yiis m meng yellẽ wã.
Yãmb meng tõe n baoome n bãnge. Sẽn ka yɩɩd rasem piig la a yiibu, mam kẽnga Zeruzalɛm n na n tɩ pʋʋs Wẽnnaam.
B ka yã maam tɩ m wẽed nokoeemd ne ned ba a yen wẽnd-doogã pʋga, wala m rãmbd neb kʋʋng karen-dot pʋse, bɩ tẽng pʋg zĩig ba a yen ye.
La bãmb ka tõe n wilg yãmb tɩ bũmb ninga b sẽn dõt maam moasã wã yaa sɩd ye.

Baoosgo, mam togsda bõn-kãnga y taoore. Mam pʋʋsda m yaab-rãmbã Wẽnnaam n tũud so-paalg ninga bãmb sẽn boond tɩ yaa kaoreng a to wã. La mam tẽeda bũmb nins fãa sẽn gʋls tõogã sɛb pʋse, la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sɛbã pʋsã.
Mam tara tẽeb pidsg gũudem kãnga, ne Wẽnnaam wa mam dõatbã mens sẽn tarã, n tẽed tɩ nin-sõama la nin-wẽns na n vʋʋgame n bas kũum.
Yaa woto yĩnga, tɩ mam me maood n dat n paam sũur kaset sẽn ya sõama Wẽnnaam la ninsaalb taoore daar fãa.
Mam yii Zeruzalɛm n kaoos yʋʋm wʋsgo, la m lebg n waa be n na n kõ m neba sõngre, la m maan maoong n kõ Wẽnnaam.
La b yaool yãa maam wẽnd-doogẽ wã tɩ m yɩlgd m menga la neb ka tigme, la rãmbg ka zĩnd ye.
La Zuif-rãmb kẽer sẽn yi Azi soolem dag n bee be la b sã n da tarẽ yell ne maam yaa bãmb n dag tog n yals yãmb taoor n bʋ ne maam.
Wall, nin-bãmba sẽn be ka wã togs b sã n yãa mam sẽn maan wẽnga, mam sẽn yals kaoreng yɛl-bʋ-kaoodbã taoorã.
Sã n ka bũmb a yembrã mam sẽn maana, m sẽn yik n yals b sʋk n zẽk m koɛɛg n yeel tɩ: "Yaa mam sẽn tẽed tɩ kũum vʋʋgr beeme wã yĩng n kɩt tɩ yãmb bʋʋd ne maam dũnna."
A Feligs sẽn mi Kirist kaorengã yell neerã, a visga bʋʋdã daar n yeel nebã tɩ b kuil tɩ sodaas tusr naab a Liziyaas sã n wa n wa, a na yaool n ges b yellã.
La yẽ yeela sodaas koabg naabã t'a gũ a Poll, la a kõ-a lohorem bilfu, la a ra gɩdg a Poll zo-rãmbã sẽn dat n sõng-a wã ye.
Rasem bilf sẽn paase, a Feligs ne a pag a Dursill sẽn ya Zuif poakã waame. La a tʋmame tɩ b bool a Poll t'a wa, la yẽ kelga a Poll sẽn togs tẽeb ne Kirist Zezi wã sẽn ya bũmb ninga.
La a Poll sẽn gom tɩrlma vɩɩm la tõog-m-menga la bʋ-kaoor sẽn watã yellã, rabeem yõka a Feligs t'a yeel a Poll t'a loog moasã tɩ yẽ sã n wa paam weere a na leb n bool-a.
A ra tẽedame me t'a Poll na n kõ-a-la ligdi, yaa rẽ yĩng n kɩt t'a bool a Poll naoor wʋsg n sõs ne-a.
La yʋʋm a yiib sẽn looge, a Porkius Festus reega a Feligs zĩig n ya Gʋvɛrneer. La a Feligs sẽn dat n maan sẽn noom Zuif-rãmba, a ka kõ a Poll lohorem ye.
A Festus sẽn wa soolma pʋg tɩ rabtãtẽ, a yii Sezaare n kẽng Zeruzalɛm.
Maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb ne Zuif-rãmba kãsem-dãmb dõta a Poll a Festus taoore.
B kosa a Festus n pẽdg-a wʋsg n dat t'a maan bãmb neer n kɩt tɩ b tall a Poll n wa Zeruzalɛm, la b rag n segla bẽdg n dat n solg n kʋ-a Poll sorã zugu.
A Festus leokame t'a bee bi-bees roog Sezaare, la sã n yɩ bilfu, yẽ menga na n lebg n lebame.
La a yeel-b lame: Bɩ yãmb kãsem-dãmb kẽer tũ maam tɩ d kẽng Sezaare, tɩ rao-kãng sã n maana sẽn ya wẽng bɩ bãmb bʋ ne-a beene.
A Festus ka kaoos b sʋk n yɩɩg rasem a nii bɩ piig ye. Dẽ a lebg n leba Sezaare. La vẽkembeoogo, a Festus zaoonda bʋʋda geer zug n yeel tɩ b tall a Poll n wa.
La a Poll sẽn ta, Zuif-rãmb nins sẽn yi Zeruzalɛma gũbga yẽnda n dõt-a ne bõn-wẽns wʋsgo, la b ka tõe n wilg tɩ b sẽn dõt a Poll ne bũmb ninsã yaa sɩd ye.
La a Poll goma n na n fãag a meng n yeel yaa: Mam ka maan bũmb sẽn ya wẽng n kɩɩs Zuif-rãmba tõogo wala sẽn kɩɩsd wẽnd-doogã bɩ Sezaar ye.
Dẽ, a Festus sẽn dat n maan sẽn noom Zuif-rãmbã, yẽ soka a Poll yaa: Fo rat n kẽnga Zeruzalɛm tɩ b tɩ bʋ f bʋʋd mam taoor yel-kãnga poorẽ bɩɩ?
A Poll leokame yaa: Mam yasa Sezaar bʋʋd geer taoore, la yaa ka la b tog kao mam bʋʋdo. Yãmb meng mii neere, tɩ mam ka maan bũmb n beeg Zuif-rãmbã ye.

Mam sã n da tarẽ kongre, la m sã n da maane tʋʋm sẽn zems ne kũum, mam kõn zãgs tɩ m ka na n ki ye. La b sẽn dõt maam ne bũmb ningã sã n ya zĩri, ned ka tõe n yõk maam n kõ-b ye. Mam data Sezaar nengẽ.
La a Festus sẽn yẽs ne a sõangdbã n sa, a leoka a Poll yaa: Fo sẽn dat Sezaar nengẽ wã, f na n kẽnga Sezaar nengẽ.
La rasem bilf sẽn looge, rĩm a Agirpa ne a Bereniis waa Sezaare n na n pʋʋs a Festus.
La b sẽn kaoos be rasem wʋsgo, a Festus togsa rĩma a Poll yellã n yeel yaa: A Feligs basa rao a yen sẽn ya bi-bɛɛg ka.
Mam sẽn wa n be Zeruzalɛm wakatã, maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb ne Zuif-rãmbã kãsem-dãmb bʋʋ ne yẽnda n kos maam tɩ m kao a bʋʋd tɩ zems kũum.
Mam leoka bãmb tɩ Rom-dãmba ka minim tɩ rɩk bi-bɛɛg n kɩs tɩ b kʋ, n ka reng n kõ-a noor t'a yals a rõatbã taoor n paam weer n gom n fãag a meng ne bũmb ninga b sẽn dõd-a wã ye.
Dẽ, b tũu maam n wa ka. La vẽkembeoogo mam zaoonda m bʋʋda geer n yeel tɩ b tall rao-kãng n wa.
La a rõatbã sẽn wa wã, b ka tol n wilg tʋʋm wẽng ba a yen rao-kãnga sẽn maane, wa mam sẽn da tagsdã ye.
Bãmb sẽn tar yell ne yẽ, yaa sẽn kẽed b mens wẽn-tũudum wɛɛngẽ, la ne rao a yen sẽn boond t'a Zezi n ki t'a poll yetẽ tɩ rao-kãng vɩɩme.
Mam sẽn da ka mi m sẽn na n maan to-to ne yel-kãngã wã, m sok-a-la a sã n datẽ lame n kẽng Zeruzalɛm tɩ b tɩ bʋ a bʋʋd be yel-kãngã wɛɛngẽ.
La a Poll kosame n yeel tɩ yẽ ratame tɩ b bas tɩ rĩm-kãsengã ges yẽ yellã yelle. Dẽ, mam kosa noor n na n tall-a hal tɩ m wa n tʋm-a Sezaar nengẽ.
A Agirpa yeela a Festus yaa: Mam me rat n kelga rao-kãngã koɛɛga. A Festus leokame tɩ beoogo, a na n bool-a lame t'a wa t'a kelg-a.
Dẽ, vẽkembeoogo, a Agirpa ne a Bereniis waa ne waoogr wʋsg n kẽ bʋʋda kaoob zĩigẽ ne sodaas tusr nanamsã, la tẽngã nin-kãsemse. La a Festus yeelame tɩ b tall a Poll n wa.

Dẽ, a Festus yeelame: Rĩm a Agirpa, la yãmb fãa sẽn be ka ne tõndã, yãmb nee rao-kãngã, ned ningã poorẽ Zuif-rãmbã neb kʋʋngã fãa sẽn wa mam nengẽ sã n ya Zeruzalɛm, wall kaane n kelem n yeel tɩ rao-kãngã ka tog n vɩɩmdã.
La ne maam, mam mikame t'a ka maan tʋʋm wẽng sẽn zems ne kũum ye. La yẽ meng sẽn yet t'a ratame tɩ rĩm kãsengã kaoo a bʋʋdã, mam yãka yam n na n tʋm-a rĩm kãsengã nengẽ.

Mam ka tar koɛɛg vẽeneg n na n gʋls n togs rĩm kãsengã rao kãngã yellã wɛɛngẽ ye. Yaa rẽndã yĩng la m bool-a t'a wa yãmb taoore, sẽn yɩɩd fãa, a bee yãmb taoore rĩm a Agirpa, tɩ y sã n sogs-a n sɛ, bɩ m yaool n paam koɛɛg n gʋlse.
Tɩ bõe, mam tagsdame tɩ yaa yalemdo tɩ tʋm bi-bɛɛg n ka tol n wilg vẽeneg a sẽn beeg ne bũmb ningã.
A Agirpa yeela a Poll tɩ b kõt-a-la noor t'a gom n yiis a meng yellẽ wã. Dẽ, a Poll tẽega a nug n yeel yaa:
Rĩm a Agirpa, mam sũur yaa noogo m sẽn paam dũnna n na n gom yãmb taoor n togs bũmb nins fãa Zuif-rãmba sẽn dõt maama wɛɛngẽ wã.
Tɩ bõe, yãmb mii Zuif-rãmba minindã ne b nokoɛɛma zãnga. Rẽ wã, mam kot-y lame tɩ y kelg maam ne sũ-mare.
Zuif-rãmba fãa mii mam vɩɩmã sẽn yɩ bũmb ninga hal mam sẽn ya bi-bilf wakate, b mii mam sẽn zĩnd m nebã sʋka la Zeruzalɛm hal sɩngrẽ wã sẽn yɩ to-to.
Bãmb mii maam hal daar zãra, b sã n dat n togs sɩda. Mam yaa Fariisẽ neb nins sẽn sakd tõnd wẽn-tũudma n yɩɩd neb a taaba ned a yembre.
La moasã, b bʋʋda ne maam, mam sẽn tẽed kãabg ninga Wẽnnaam sẽn da kãab tõnd yaab-rãmbã yĩnga.
La tõnd buud piig la a yiibã me pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam wĩntoog la yʋng n ka basdẽ ye, n gũud kãab-kãng pidsgu. Rĩm a Agirpa, yaa tẽeb pidsg gũudem kãng yĩng n kɩt tɩ Zuif-rãmbã rõd maam.
Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb Zuif-rãmbã tagsdẽ tɩ yaa toog ne Wẽnnaam tɩ b vʋʋg kũum?
Mam meng da tagsame tɩ m tog n zaba ne m pãng tɛka n kɩɩs Nazarɛt dao a Zezi yʋʋrã.
La mam maana bõn-kãng Zeruzalɛm. La mam sẽn paama noor maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb nengẽ, mam menga kẽesa Wẽnnaam nin-tũusds wʋsg bi-bees roogo. La b sã n da rat n kʋ-ba, mam ningda m nugu.
Wakat kẽere, mam kɩtedame tɩ b sɩbg-b karen-dot pʋse, n da rat n modg-b tɩ b kɩɩs b tẽebã. Mam sũurã pʋʋga wʋsg ne bãmb hal tɩ m kẽng tẽn-zẽms pʋs n tɩ nams-ba.
Yaa woto yĩnga, tɩ maan-kʋʋdbã kãsem-dãmb kõ maam noor n tʋm maam tɩ m kẽng Damas.
Rĩm a Agirpa, mam sẽn be sorẽ, wĩnto-sʋk sasa, mam yãa vẽenem sẽn yi arzãn n yãgd n yɩɩd wĩntoog vẽenem, n wa n bui maam ne m tũud-n-taasã.
Tõnd fãa lʋɩɩ tẽnga, la mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn da yet maam ne Hebre-rãmbã goam yaa: "Solle, Solle, yaa bõe tɩ fo namsd maam? Yaa toog ne foom, fo sẽn zãgsda yĩnga."
Mam sokame tɩ Zu-soaba yãmb yaa ãnna? La Zu-soabã leokame yaa: "Mam yaa a Zezi, fo sẽn namsd a soabã.
