Yik n yals yĩngri. Mam vẽnega m meng ne foom n na n kɩt tɩ f yɩ mam tʋmtʋmda, la m kaset soab n togs neb a taabã bũmb nins fo sẽn yã rũnna wã, la bũmb nins mam sẽn na n wilg fooma.
Mam yãka foo Zuif-rãmbã ne bu-zẽmsã sʋka, la m tʋmda foom b nengẽ,
tɩ f puk b nina tɩ b wẽnemd n bas likã n wa vẽenemẽ wã la b bas Sʋtãana n sak Wẽnnaam n paam b yel-wẽna sugri, la pʋɩɩr ne neb nins sẽn tẽ maam n lebg Wẽnnaam nebã."
Woto wã yĩnga, Rĩm a Agirpa, mam ka kɩɩs vẽnegr ninga sẽn yi arzãna ye.

La m deng n moona koɛɛgã Damas nebã nanda la m yaool n moon-a Zeruzalɛm ne Zude soolma fãa pʋga, la bu-zẽmsã n yeel-b tɩ b tek yam n kos sugr n sak Wẽnnaam n maan tʋʋm sẽn wilgd tɩ b sɩd teka yam.
Yaa bõn-kãnga yĩng la Zuif-rãmbã sẽn yõk maam wẽnd-doogã pʋg n na n kɩt tɩ b kʋ wã.

La Wẽnnaam gũudmã yĩnga, mam ket n vɩɩme hal tɩ ta rũnna, n kɩt kaset nin-talse la nanams taoore. La mam ka togsd bũmb a to tɩ sã n ka Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã ne a Moyiis sẽn da wilg tɩ na n waame wã bal ye.
B ra yeelame tɩ Kirist na n namsame la b na n yɩɩ pipi soab sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũum, la b na n waa ne fãagre vẽenem tõnd buudã ne bu-zẽmsã yĩnga.
La a Poll sẽn gom a woto n na n fãag a mengã, a Festus zẽka a koɛɛg n yeel-a yaa: Polle! Fo yaa gãeenga. Fo bãngrã sẽn ya wʋsgã kɩtame tɩ f lebg gãeenga.
A Poll yeelame: Festus sõngo, mam ka gãeeng ye. Mam sẽn gomda yaa sɩda la mi-m-neng goama.
Rĩm a Agirpa mii bõn-kãense, dẽ mam tõe n goma ne pɛl-kɛgeng bãmb taoore, bala mam mii vẽeneg tɩ bãmb mii b fãa, tɩ bõe bõn-kãens ka solg n maan ye.
Rĩm a Agirpa, yãmb tẽeda Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn yeel bũmb ninsã? Mam miime tɩ yãmb tẽeda bõn-kãense.
A Agirpa yeela a Poll yaa: Fo tagsdame tɩ wakate bilf pʋgẽ, f tõe n kɩtame tɩ mam yɩɩ a Zezi neda?

A Poll leokame yaa: Yaa wakat bilf pʋgẽ woo, wall yaa wakat wʋsg pʋgẽ me, mam pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam tɩ kõn yɩ yãmb y yembr bal ye. La yaa tɩ neb nins fãa sẽn kelgd mam koɛɛgã dũnna wã me, yãmb na lebg wa maam, bãn-kãensã sẽn yãk b toogo.
Dẽ, rĩma ne Gʋvɛrneera la a Bereniis ne neb nins sẽn da zĩ ne bãmbã yikame.
B sergame n yẽs ne taab n yeel tɩ rao-kãngã ka maan bũmb sẽn zems ne kũum, wall bi-bees roog kõom ye.
La a Agirpa yeela a Festus tɩ sã n ka a Poll sẽn yeel t'a rata Sezaar nengẽ wã, a ra tõe n paamẽ la lohorem.

La b sẽn yãk yam tɩ tõnd na n kẽ koom-koglg n kẽng Itali, b rɩka a Poll ne bi-bees a taaba, n kɩs soda-sull ning b sẽn boond tɩ rĩma sodaasã, sodaas koabg naab a yen yʋʋr sẽn boond t'a Zulius.
Tõnd kẽe koom-koglg sẽn yi Adarmit n dabd Azi soolem tẽnsã sẽn be koomã noor sẽne n looge. La Masedoan dao a ye sẽn yi Tesalonik t'a yʋʋr boond t'a Aristark n da be ne tõndo.
La vẽkembeoogo, tõnd taa sɩdõ. La a Zulius maana a Poll neer n kõ-a lohorem t'a kẽng n tɩ ges a Zo-rãmb n paam tɩ b sõng-a.
Tõnd sẽn yi be, d basa Sɩpr goabga, sobgã sẽn da segd tõndã yĩnga.
Tõnd sẽn pɩʋʋg ko-kãsengã sẽn pẽ Silisi ne Pamfili wã, tõnd taa Mira sẽn be lisi soolem.
La beene, sodaas koabg naabã yãa koom-koglg sẽn yi Alegsãndri n dabd Itali, la yẽ kɩtame tɩ tõnd kẽe koom-koglg-kãngã.
Tõnd kẽna bãanem-bãanem n kaoos rasem wʋsgo, la d namsa wʋsg n kolg Nid tẽnga noore. La sobgã sẽn ka sak tɩ tõnd ta be wã, tõnd yega Kɛrɛt tẽngã n kẽng Salmone sẽne.
Tõnd namsa wʋsg ne koom-koglgã n yeg Kɛrɛt kɩrenga, n ta zĩiga a yen sẽn boond tɩ Koom-koglg yalsg zĩ-neerã sẽn pẽ Laaze tẽnga.
Wakat wʋsg loogame la koom-koglgã kẽnd wa n lebga yel-pakre. Tɩ bõe, no-loeerã wakat zoe n loogame.

Yaa woto yĩng n kɩt t'a Poll keoog-b n yeel yaa: Raopa, mam neeme tɩ so-toak-kãngã na n yɩɩ wẽnga, koom-koglgã ne a zɩɩbã na n yɩɩ bõne-kãsenga, la sẽn yɩɩda, sã n ka gũusi tõnd mensã na n kii a pʋgẽ.
La sodaas koabg naabã ra kɩsa sɩd ne ned ninga sẽn get koom-koglgã kẽnd yellã ne koom-koglgã taoor soab n yɩɩd a Poll goama.

La koom-koglgã yalsg zĩig ra ka sõama tɩ pa be waood wẽnd ye, yaa woto yĩng tɩ neb wʋsg yãk yam n yeel tɩ b yi be n mao tɩ sã n tõe bɩ b ta Fenigs sẽn ya koom-koglg yalsg zĩig sẽn be Kɛrɛt n pakd n teesd wĩndgã goabga la a rɩtgã, n zĩnd be waoodã wẽnde.
Sob-fʋl-fʋl yii wĩndgã goabg n sɩng n fʋʋsdẽ, la bãmb tagsame tɩ b ra tõe n maana b sẽn dat n maan bũmb ningã. B yika ne koom-koglgã n kẽng n yeg Kɛrɛt n tũ a kɩrengã.
La sẽn yɩ bilfu, sob-kãseng b sẽn boond tɩ Erakilõ yika koomã sẽn gũbg tẽng ninga wã tãmsa sẽne.
La a sẽn wẽ koglgã t'a ka tõe n kẽng taoorã, tõnd basame tɩ sobgã peeg-koglgã.
Tõnd kolga tẽn-bil a yen sẽn be koomã sʋk tɩ b boond tɩ Kolooda. Dẽ, tõnd namsa wʋsg n tõog n yalsg koom-kogl-bilã.

La b sẽn zẽk-kogl-bilã n kẽes koom-koglgã pʋg n sɛ, b yaool n sẽba koom-koglgã ne wĩyã. La b sẽn zoet tɩ koom-koglgã na n wa tɩ sud bĩisrã sẽn be Libi yegendã, b sika koom-koglgã pɛɛla n bas tɩ sobgã peeg-koglgã.
La sobgã namsa tõnd wʋsgo, dẽ vẽkembeoogo, b loba koglgã zɩɩb koomã pʋgẽ.
La rasem a tãabẽ daarã, bãmb mens sɩngame n wʋk-koglgã teed kẽer n lob koome wã.
La kaoosa rasem wʋsg tɩ wĩndgã, wala ãdsã ka puk ye, la sobgã ra ketẽ n tara pãnga hal tɩ tõnd wa n ka leb n tẽed tɩ d na n põsame ye.

Neb nins sẽn da be koom-koglgã pʋgã maana rasem wʋsg n ka rɩ bũmb ye. Dẽ, a Poll yikame n yals b sʋk n yeel yaa: M saam-biisi, yãmb sã n dag sakẽ mam goama n ka yi n bas Kɛrɛt tẽngã, tõnd da ka na n paam bõn a woto la to-kãngã ye.
La moasã, mam sagenda yãmb tɩ y keng y sũyã tɩ bala, tõnd ned ba a yembr ka na n ki ye, sã n ka koom-koglgã bal n na n sãam.
Bala, Wẽnnaam ning sẽn so maam tɩ mam sakd-a wã malɛk waa mam nengẽ yʋngẽ,

la a yeela maam yaa: "Poll, ra zoe rabeem ye, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ fo ta Sezaar taoore. La gese, Wẽnnaam sẽn ya sõmblem soab la b maand nimbãan-zoeer ne fooma rɩka neb nins sẽn be koom-koglgã pʋg ne fooma vɩɩm n ning fo nugẽ."
Woto yĩnga, m saam-biisi, keng-y y sũyã, bala, mam tara tẽeb kãnga ne Wẽnnaam, tɩ na n yɩɩ wala b sẽn togs maana bala,
la tõnd na n tɩ teega tẽng a yen koom sẽn gubgi.
Dag n yaa yʋnd piig la a naas-n-soaba la sobgã ra lengd tõnd ko-kãsengã sẽn boond tɩ Adɩryatikã zugu. La sẽn kolg yʋn-sʋka, koom-koglgã pʋgẽ tʋmtʋmdbã tẽeme tɩ b pẽnega tẽnga.
Bãmb loee koom zulum bõn-makdgã ne wĩir n los koome wã n mak a zulma n mik tɩ yaa metr pis-tã la a yopoe. La b sẽn le zãag bilfu, b losame yɛsa n mik tɩ zulma zemsa metr pisi la a nii.

Bãmb sẽn yɛɛsd tɩ tõnd koom-koglgã na n wa tɩ wẽ kug yĩnga, b losa kug bɛd a naas sẽn da tar n yalsed koom-koglgã koomã pʋgẽ, tɩ b gãd-koglgã. La b ra yãgdame n dat tɩ beoogã vẽeg tao-tao.
Koom-koglgã tʋmtʋmdb maana wala b rat n losa kug a taab sẽn yalsed koom-koglgã koomã pʋgẽ tɩ b gãd-koglgã, mik b da soosdame n dat n sik koom-kogl bilã koome wã n zoe.
A Poll yeela sodaas koabg naabã ne sodaasã yaa: Nin-bãmba sã n ka pa koom-koglgã pʋga, yãmb kõn tõog n põs ye.
Dẽ, sodaasã wãa wĩ nins sẽn da loe kogl-bilã n pase, n bas-a t'a lʋɩ koomẽ wã.
Sẽn deng beoogã vẽegre, a Poll sagla neba fãa n yeel-b tɩ b rɩ. Yẽ yeel-b lame yaa: Ade, yaa rasem piig la a naas rũnna la yãmb sẽn gũud sobgã yõkre, n ka sakd n dɩ rɩɩb ye.
Rẽ wã, mam kota yãmb tɩ y rɩ, tɩ bõe, yaa sẽn na n fãag yãmba, la yãmb ned ba a yen zoobg ka na n menem ye.
A Poll sẽn gom a woto n sa, a rɩka bur n yals neba fãa taoor n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam barka. A sẽn pʋʋs n sa, a kaoo burã n sɩng wãbre.
Dẽ, neba fãa me kenga b pels n dɩ.
Tõnd fãa sẽn da be koom-koglgã pʋgẽ wã yaa neb kobsi la pis-yopoe la a yoobe.
La b sẽn dɩ n tɩge, b loba koodã koomã pʋgẽ n na n boog koom-koglgã zɩɩbo.

La beoogã sẽn vẽege, koom-koglgã tʋmtʋmdbã ka bãng sẽn ya tẽng ning ye. La b yãa zĩiga, kʋɩl-koakã sẽn gonge, zĩ-bĩuusgu, la bãmb yãka yam n dat tɩ sã n tõe, bɩ b tall koom-koglgã n ta beene.

Bãmb logsa bãens nins sẽn yalsd-koglgã n bas tɩ b lʋɩ koomẽ wã, la b kell n logs-koglgã wẽnemdedgã wĩ, n yaool n zẽk-koglgã taoorẽ peendã, sẽn na yɩl tɩ sobgã tus-ba, la b tees kʋɩl-koakã.
La bãmb tɩ kẽe bĩisr pʋgẽ, ko-wĩis a yiib sʋka, la b basa koglgã t'a pa be. Koglgã taoor kẽe bĩisrẽ wã sõama n ka le tõe n serg ye. La ko-pɛmã wẽe koglgã poor ne pãng n wesge.
La sodaasã da rat n kʋʋ bi-beesã tɩ b ned ba a yen da wa dug koomã n zoe y põs ye.
La sodaas koabg naabã sẽn dat n fãag a Pollã, a ka sak tɩ b maan a woto ye. Yẽ yeela neb nins sẽn mi rugbã tɩ b reng n lʋɩ koome wã n rug n yi yɩnga,
la a yeel neb a taabã tɩ b sog ra-bogdɩ, wall koom-koglgã raado, n dug n yi. La woto, neba tõog n taa yɩng ne yõore la laafɩ.
Tõnd sẽn põsã poore, d wʋmame tɩ tẽn-kãng sẽn be koomã sʋkã boondame tɩ Malt.
Tẽngã neba gesa tõnd yell neer wʋsg ne nimbãan-zoeere la saagã sẽn da ni tɩ ya waoodã yĩnga, b widga bugum n deeg tõnd fãa be tɩ d gũbg n woode.
A Poll wʋka ra-yãngls n na n ning bugmẽ wã, la bug-waolgã yĩnga, waaf n yi be n gãd a Poll nugã.

La tẽngã neb sẽn yã waafa sẽn luund a Poll nugẽ wã, b goma ne taab n yeele: Hakɩɩka rao-kãnga yaa nin-kʋʋda, tɩ bõe, baa ne yẽ sẽn põs ko-kãsengã, wẽnd tɩrlem ka rat n bas-a t'a vɩɩnd ye.
La a Poll mesga waafã t'a lʋɩ bugmẽ wã la a Poll bũmb ka zab baa bilf ye.

Nin-kãens ra gũudame n na n yã a sẽn mode wall a Poll sẽn na n lʋɩ n ki zĩig pʋgẽ. La b sẽn gũ n kaoos n mik tɩ bũmb baa fʋɩ ka maan yẽ wã, b wẽnemdame n yeel t'a Poll yaa wẽnd a yembre.
Soolem a ye n da pẽ be tɩ ya tẽn-kãng naabã n so, naabã yʋʋr la a Publius. A reega tõnd ne nonglem n sik a yir rasem a tãabo.
A Publius baaba n da gãe ne yĩn-wɩngre la sãb-noaadga, la a Poll kẽe a nengẽ n tik-a ne a nus n pʋʋs n maag-a.
Rẽ zugẽ, tẽngã bãad-dãmb a taab me waame, la b fãa paama laafɩ.
B waooga tõnd ne waoog kãsenga, la tõnd sẽn wa n na n loogã, b kõo tõnd bũmb nins fãa sẽn tõe n sõng tõnd d so-toakã pʋgẽ.
La kiis a tãab zugẽ, tõnd kẽe Alegsãndiri koom-koglg yʋʋr sẽn boond tɩ Diyoskuur yẽ zĩnda Malt waooda wẽnde.
Tõnd sẽn taa Sɩrakus tẽnga d paa be rasem a tãabo.
La tõnd yii beene n tũ koomã noor n ta Regiyo. La vẽkembeoogo, wĩndga goabg sobgã yikame, la rasem a yiib pʋgẽ, tõnd taa Pʋzoll.
Tõnd yãa ba-biis tẽn-kãng pʋga, tɩ b kos tõnd tɩ d pa be ne bãmb rasem a yopoe. Yɩɩ woto tɩ tõnd kẽng Rom.
Ba-biisã sẽn be Roma sẽn wʋm tõnd kibare, b waa n sega tõnd hal tẽms sẽn boond tɩ Apiyus ne Tʋroa-Tavɛrn. A Poll sẽn yãnd-bã, a pʋʋsa Wẽnnaam bark la a keng a pɛlga.
Tõnd sẽn wa n ta Roma, sodaas koabg naabã rɩka bi-beesã n kɩs sodaasã taoor soaba, la b kõo a Poll lohorem t'a zĩnd toore ne sodaag a yen sẽn gũud-a.

B sẽn ta Rom tɩ rabtãtẽ, a Poll boola Zuif-rãmba nin-kãsems tɩ b wa yẽ nengẽ. La b sẽn tigim taaba, a Poll goma ne bãmb a woto: M saam-biisi, baa ne mam sẽn ka maan bũmb sẽn beegd tõnd buudã, la m ka maan bũmb sẽn kɩɩsd tõnd yaab-rãmbã minungã, b yõka maam Zeruzalɛm n kɩs Rom-dãmba tɩ b kẽes maam bi-bees roogo.
La Rom-dãmba sẽn kelg maam, b rag n dat n bas-m lame, bala b ka yã mam sẽn maan bũmb n tog ne kʋʋb ye.
La Zuif-rãmba zãgsame, dẽ, yɩɩ tɩlɛ ne maam tɩ m kos n na n kẽng Sezaar nengẽ. La yaool n ka bũmb la m tar n dat n dõd m buudã ye.
Yaa woto yĩng n kɩt tɩ m dat n yãnd-yã n gom ne-yã, tɩ bõe, yaa Israyɛl neba tẽeb pidsg gũudem poorẽ la b balg maam ne bãn-kãensã.

Zuif-rãmba nin-kãsems yeela a Poll yaa: Tõnd ka reeg sebr baa a yen sẽn yi Zude soolem n gomd ne tõnd yãmb yell ye, la ba-biig baa a yen ka yi be n wa n togs tõndo, wall a gom yãmb sẽn maan tɩ ka zems ye.
La tõnd datẽ lame n kelg yãmb sẽn na n yeel tɩ bũmb ninga, bala tõnd miime tɩ zĩiga fãa, neba kɩɩsda kaoreng ning yãmb sẽn tũudã.

Bãmb yãka daar n kõ a Polle, la badaare bãmb wʋsg waa n yãnd a Poll a gãagã zĩigẽ, la yẽ goma ne bãmb yibeoog hal tɩ ta zaabre, yẽ rɩka a Moyiis tõogã ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdba sɛb n moon bãmb Wẽnnaam soolmã koɛɛg n na n wilg-b t'a Zezi koɛɛgã yaa sɩda.
Neb kẽer tẽe bũmb ning yẽ sẽn da yetã la neb kẽer kɩɩsame n ka tẽ ye.
La bãmb sẽn ka zems taab n yik n na n loogã, a Poll yeel-b-la gom kãensã bal n paase: Sɩɩg-sõng sɩd tar bʋʋm la a sẽn da gom ne y yaab-rãmbã n yeel
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs a Ezayi tɩ: "Kẽng nin-bãmbã nengẽ n tɩ yeel-b yaa: Yãmb na n wʋma sõama la y kõn wʋm a võor ye. Yãmb na n gesa sõama la y kõn yã ye.

Bala, nin-kãensã sũyã lebga riglima, b yẽda b tʋba, la b mum b nini, sẽn na yɩlẽ tɩ b nin da yã, tɩ b tʋb ra wʋm ye, tɩ b ra tags n wʋm a võor ye. La b sẽn kõn tek yam n kos sugri, sẽn na yɩl tɩ mam maag-b ye."
A Poll leb n yeelame yaa: Dẽ wã yĩnga, bãng-y tɩ b tʋma Wẽnnaam fãagr koɛɛga bu-zẽmsã tẽngẽ, la b na n kelg-a lame.
A Poll sẽn yeel a woto n sɛ, Zuif-rãmba loogdame la b wẽed nokoeemd wʋsg ne taaba.
A Poll zĩnda be yʋʋm a yiib tõre, la a yaood roogã ligdi. La yẽ ra reegda neb nins fãa sẽn da wat yẽ nengẽ wã ro-kãng pʋga.
Yẽ ra moonda Wẽnnaam soolem koɛɛgã, la a zãmsd nebã a Zezi Kirist koɛɛgã ne pɛl-kɛgenga, tɩ gɩdgr kaẽ ye.
Maam a Poll, a Zezi Kirist tʋmtʋmd b sẽn yãk t'a yɩ tẽn-tʋmdã, n welg-a toor Wẽnnaam koe-noogã yĩnga,
koe-noog ning Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n tũnug b no-rɛɛsdbã n kãab bãmb gʋls-sõamyã pʋgẽ,
la sẽn gomd bãmb Bi-ribl sẽn ya a Daviid yageng ne yĩng yelle,
la ne sɩɩgã yelle, b welga toore, la Wẽnnaam wilga ne pãng n yeel t'a Zezi yaa Bãmb Bi-ribla, bãmb sẽn vʋʋg-b n yiis kũum sʋkã yĩngã.
Yaa tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist. Yaa bãmb maasem yĩng la tõnd deeg barka, la tẽn-tʋmde, tɩ ne bãmb yʋʋre, tõnd na tall soolem toay-toayã fãa neb tɩ b wa tẽ Bãmba, la b sak Bãmba.
A Zezi Kirist sẽn bool yãmbã, yãmb me yaa soolem kãens rãmba.

Maam n tʋmd seb-kãnga neb nins fãa sẽn be Rom n ya Wẽnnaam nin-nongdse, tɩ Wẽnnaam bool-b tɩ b yɩ sõama n welg toorã nengẽ: Bɩ tõnd ba a Wẽnnaam la tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist ning yãmb zut barka la b kõ-y bãane.
Pipi, mam deng n pʋʋsda m Wẽnnaamã bark a Zezi maasem yĩnga, yãmb fãa yĩnga. Bala, yãmb tẽebã yell saaga dũni gill fãa.
Wẽnnaam mam sẽn sakd ne m sũur fãa, n moond bãmb bi-riblã koe-noogã yaa mam kaset soab tɩ mam pʋta yãmb yell daar fãa,
la wakat fãa m pʋʋsg pʋgẽ. Mam kota Wẽnnaam tɩ b sã n data, bɩ b kõ-m weer sẽn zems tɩ wa yãmb nengẽ.
Bala, mam data ne m sũur fãa n yã yãmba, tɩ m tõe n taas yãmb Sɩɩgã kũuni, tɩ yãmb tẽebã na paam pãnga,
wall tɩ tõnd pʋs n naag taab n paam raood paoosg ne tẽeb a yen tãa ning yãmb la maam sẽn tarã.
M ba-biisi, mam ka rat tɩ yãmb zɩ tɩ mam saaga naoor wʋsg n dat n wa n ges yãmba, tɩ m tõe n wom biis yãmb sʋk wa soolem a taabã pʋsẽ wã. La hal tɩ ta moasã, gɩdgr n gɩdg maam.
Mam tog n tʋma ne neb yam sẽn weke, la ne neb yam sẽn ka weke, la ne bãngdba la ne zɩtbã me.
Dẽnda n kɩt tɩ mam dat ne n sũur fãa n moon yãmb me sẽn be Rommã koe-noogã.
Bala, koe-noogã mooneg yãnd ka tar maam ye. A yaa Wẽnnaam pãng sẽn fãagd ned ning fãa sẽn tẽeda: Pipi yaa Zuif-rãmba, tɩ sẽn ka-b Zuif-rãmbã pʋgda.
Sɩd me, Wẽnnaam tɩrlmã pukda be ne tẽebo, la tẽeb yĩnga, wa b sẽn gʋlsã: Nin-tɩrg na vɩ ne tẽebo.
Tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam sũ-puugr yita yĩngr n sigd ninsaalb zutu, b sẽn paoogd Wẽnnaamã la b tʋʋm-wẽnsã yĩnga, bãmb sẽn gɩdgd sɩdã t'a ka tõe n maan a tʋʋmde, tɩ ka zemsã yĩnga.
Bala, bũmb ning fãa ned sẽn tõe n bãng sẽn kẽed ne Wẽnnaam yellã ya vẽeneg ne bãmba, tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam puk-a la bãmba.

Sɩd me, sẽn sɩng ne dũni naanego, nebã nee Wẽnnaam yɛlã ninsaal nin sẽn ka yãtã, bãmb pãng ka zĩnd sɩngr kõn zĩnd saabã la b Wẽnnaamlemã sõama. La yaa b sẽn get bãmb yɛlã, bũmb nins bãmb sẽn maandã pʋgẽ.

Dẽ, bãmb ka tõe n yã bũmb n dõd n yi ye, tɩ bõe, bãmb sẽn bãng Wẽnnaamã, b ka waoog-b wa b yaa Wẽnnaam ye, la b ka pʋʋs-b bark ye. La b tagsd sẽn ka yõodã kẽesa bãmb moogo, la bãmb sũyã sẽn ka tar yãm-wekrã kẽe lik bida pʋgẽ.
B wuka mens n yeel tɩ b yaa yam dãmbã, la b lebga yalemba.
La b teka Wẽnnaam sẽn ka kiidã ziir ne bõn-naands sẽn mamsd ninsaal sẽn kiidã, la liuuli, la nao a naase, la bõn-vuudsi.
Dẽnda n kɩt tɩ Wẽnnaam bas-b tɩ b kẽ rẽgd pʋgẽ, wa b sũyã sẽn data, tɩ b paoog b yĩnsã b toore.
Bãmb teka Wẽnnaam yellã sẽn ya sɩdã ne zĩrĩ. Bãmb pʋʋsda bõn-naandsã n sakd-ba, la b bas Naandã sẽn tog n paam waoogr wakat sẽn kõn a wã pʋʋsgo.
Dẽ n kɩt tɩ Wẽnnaam bas-b tɩ b maan yĩng ratem sẽn paoogd neda. Bala, bãmb pagbã basa gãag ning sẽn zems Wẽnnaam sẽn seglã n maand sẽn ka segd ye.

Raopã me basa pagbã gãag sẽn zems Wẽnnaam seglsã, tɩ ratem taab yĩngã rɩt bãmb wa bugum. B maanda yãnde, rao ne raoa, la b yĩnsã paamda sɩbgr sẽn zemsd ne b menengã sẽn wat ne bũmb ningã.
Bãmb sẽn ka tags tɩ yaa sõama tɩ bãng Wẽnnaamã, Wẽnnaam basame tɩ b tũud b tagsdã sẽn ya wẽnsã, tɩ b maand bũmb sẽn ka zems ye.
Ka-tɩrlem buud fãa, la pʋ-toogo, la yão-beedo, la wẽnga, la ratem-wẽnga, la nin-kʋʋbo, la zaba, la zãmbo, la sɩlem n pid bãmba.
B yaa tẽn-kãn-neba, nin-sãbsdba, wẽn-kɩɩsdbã, sũ-tʋʋls rãmba, wilg-m-mens rãmba, wuk-m-mens rãmba, n mi soay sẽn na tũ n maan wẽnga, ba-rãmb la ma-rãmb kɩɩsdba, b yam ka wek ye.
B yaa neb sẽn ka be teegre, sẽn ka tar nonglem, n ka mi sugri, n ka tar nimbãan-zoeere ye.
La baa ne b sẽn mi Wẽnnaam yelsem sẽn yet tɩ neb nins sẽn maand bõn-kãensã zemsa ne kũumã, b maand-b lame. La ka rẽ bal ye, b yetame me tɩ neb nins sẽn maand bõn-kãensã maanda neere.

Dẽ, fo sẽn ya ned ning fãa, fo sẽn kaood f taab bʋʋdã, fo kõn paam bũmb n dõd n yi ye. Bala, fo sẽn kaood neb a taab bʋʋdã, fo dogenda yell f meng zugu. Tɩ bõe, fo kaooda f taabã bʋʋdo, la f yaool n maand wa bãmb bala.
Sɩd me, tõnd miime tɩ Wẽnnaam bʋ-kaoor neb nins sẽn maand a woto wã yĩng tũuda sɩda.
Fo tẽedame tɩ f sẽn kaood f taab bʋʋdo, n maand wa bãmbã fo na n põsa Wẽnnaam bʋ-kaoorã?
Bɩ fo ka nand bãmb sõmblemã, la bãmb sũ-bʋgsmã, la bãmb sũ-marã sẽn waoogã, n ka miẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam sõmblemã tusda foom tɩ f tek yam n kos sugri?
La ne fo sũurã riglingã la f sũurã sẽn ka baood tekrã, fo tigsda sũ-puugr n bĩngd f meng Wẽnnaam sũ-puugrã daar yĩnga, daar ning bãmb bʋ-kaoorã sẽn zemsã sẽn na n pukã,
bãmb sẽn na n keo ned kam fãa wa sẽn zems a tʋʋmdã:
neb nins sẽn modgd tɩ maan neere, n baood ziiri, la waoogre, la b baood vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã na n paam-a lame,
la neb nins nokoɛɛm sɩɩg sẽn tar tɩ b kɩɩsd sɩd la b sakd ka-tɩrlemã na n paama Wẽnnaam sũ-yikri la b sũ-puugri.
Zuif-rãmb pipi tɩ sẽn ka-b Zuif-rãmbã pʋgda. Ned ning fãa sẽn maand wẽngã na n paama to-kãsenga la pelen-yɩgse.
Ned ning fãa sẽn maand neere, na n paama ziiri, waoogre la bãane. Zuif-rãmbã pipi tɩ sẽn ka-b Zuif-rãmbã pʋgda.
Bala, Wẽnnaam ka bakd neb ye.
Neb nins fãa sẽn ka bãng tõogã, la sẽn maan yel-wẽnã na sãam me tɩ tõog toor kaẽ ye. La neb nins sẽn paam tõogã la sẽn maan yel-wẽnã, tõogã la b na n ges n kao bãmb bʋʋdo.
Sɩd me, ka neb nins sẽn kelgd tõogã n zems Wẽnnaam nifẽ ye. La yaa neb nins sẽn sakd tõogã n na n paam zemsgo.
Buud a taabã sẽn ka tar tõogã sã n kell n maand bũmb nins tõogã sẽn yetã, bãmb sẽn ka tar tõogã, bãmb mensã mii b sẽn tog n maane.
B wilgdame tɩ bũmb nins tõogã sẽn datã gʋlsa bãmb sũyã pʋse. Bãmb sũ-bãngrã kɩta rẽnda kaseto, la bãmb tagsgã rõta bãmba wall a zabd n sõngd bãmba.
Daar ning Wẽnnaam sẽn na n kɩt tɩ Kirist Zezi kao nebã tʋʋm-solgdsã bʋʋd wa koe-noog ning mam sẽn moondã sẽn yetã, bõn-kãens na n pukame.
Fo boonda f meng tɩ Zuif, n teegd tõogã, n waoogd f menga, f sẽn ya wẽn-tũudã yĩngã.
Fo yetame tɩ f mii bãmb daabã, tɩ tõogã sẽn zãms foomã yĩnga, fo mii bũmb ning sẽn ya sõama la sẽn ya wẽng n bake.
Fo sẽn yet f meng tɩ f yaa zoens tɛtã, la neb nins sẽn be lik bida pʋgẽ wã vẽenemã,
n ya ka-yam dãmbã zãmsdã, la kamb karen-saambã, yaa tɩ fo tẽedame tɩ f tara bãngr la sɩd sor tõogã pʋgẽ.
Fo zãmsda neb a taabã, la f ka zãmsd f meng ye.
Fo moondame n yetẽ tɩ b ra zu ye, la f yaool n zuuda! Fo yetame tɩ b ra yo ye, la f yaool n yooda! Fo geta wẽnd-naands wa bõn-põosgo, la f yaool n kẽed b rotẽ wã n zuud-ba!
Fo sẽn dɩk tõogã n waoogd f mengã, fo kɩɩsda tõogã n paoogd Wẽnnaam.
Bala, buud a taabã neb paoogda Wẽnnaam yʋʋr yãmb yĩnga, wa sẽn be gʋls-sõamyã pʋgẽ wã.
Sɩda, bãong yaa bũmb sẽn be yõodo, fo sã n sakda tõogã. La fo sã n kɩɩs tõogã, fo bãongã lebga moonem bala.
La sẽn ka kẽ-a bãong sã n sakd bũmb nins sẽn gʋls tõogã pʋgẽ wã, b ka na n ges a moonemã wa bãong kõom sɩda?
Sẽn ka tol n kẽ-a bãongã sã n pidsd tõogã sẽn yetã, a kõn kao fo bʋʋdo, fo soab sẽn tar tõogã sebr la bãongã sɩda?
Ka ned ning sẽn tar-a Zuif yalẽ wã bal n ya Zuif ye. La bãongã ka bũmb ning b sẽn ne yĩn-nemdã pʋgẽ wã ye.

La Zuif yaa ned ning sẽn ya-a Zuif a sũur pʋgẽ, la bãong meng yaa sũurẽ dẽnda, sẽn zems Sɩɩgã rẽnda, la ka tõogã rẽnd ye. Zuif kãng pẽgr ka yit ninsaalb nengẽ ye, la yaa Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
Zu-noog ning Zuif sẽn tarã yaa bõe, wall bãongã kõom yõod yaa bõe?
A bee nafr bũmb fãa pʋgẽ. Pipi, Wẽnnaam deng n dɩka b goamã n gũnug ne Zuif-rãmbã.
La d na n yeelame tɩ bõe? Bãmb neb kẽer sã n ka maan sɩd ne Wẽnnaam, dẽ yĩnga, bãmb sẽn ka maan sɩdã na n kɩtame tɩ Wẽnnaam sɩdã ka maan a tʋʋmde?

Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ayo. Nebã tog n bãngame tɩ baa ninsaalbã fãa sã n yagda zĩrĩ, Wẽnnaam yaa sɩd-soaba, wa b sẽn gʋlsã: Tɩ ne yãmb goama, b na mik tɩ yãmb yaa tɩrga, la tɩ yãmb bʋʋda kaoob wakate, bɩ y paam tõogre.
La tõnd ka-tɩrlemã sã n kɩtdẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam tɩrlemã pukdẽ, tõnd na n yeelame tɩ bõe? Wẽnnaam sã n sak tɩ b sũur yiki, b yaa ka-tɩrlem soab sɩda? Mam sẽn gomda yaa ninsaalemdo.
Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ayo. Sã n ka rẽ, Wẽnnaam na n yɩɩ a wãn n kao dũni bʋʋdo?
La sã n yaa tɩ ne mam zĩrĩ wã Wẽnnaam sɩdã pukdame n paasde tɩ ya bãmb waoogre, bõe tɩ b na n leb n kao mam bʋʋd wa yel-wẽn maanda?
La wa tẽn-kãn-neb kẽer sẽn kãnegd tõnd n yetẽ tɩ d gomda a woto wã, bõe tɩ tõnd ka na n maand wẽng tɩ sẽn ya sõmb tõe n tũ be n wa? Nin-kãens sɩbgrã yaa bũmb sẽn zemse.
La rẽ wã, tõnd yɩɩda neb a taabã la? Baa bilfu! Bala, tõnd zoe n wilgame tɩ nebã fãa, Zuif-rãmba la sẽn ka-b Zuif-rãmbã bee yel-wẽnã yembd pʋgẽ
wa sẽn gʋlsã: Ned sẽn zems ka be ye! Baa a yen ka ye.
Ned baa a yen yam ka weke, baa a yen ka baood Wẽnnaam ye. Neba fãa menemame, n naag taab n lebg ka-barka.
Ned baa a yen ka be sẽn maand neer ye, baa a ye!
Bãmb kokorã yaa wa yaoog b sẽn fõke. B zɛlmã wã belgda neba. Ruruug zẽnem n be bãmb no-bɩmsẽ wã.
Bãmb noor pida ne kãab-wẽng la toolem.
B naowã tʋʋla ne a kẽng n tɩ raag zɩɩm.
B sẽn pɩʋʋgẽ fãa, yaa sãoong ne toog bala.
B ka mi bũmb ning sẽn wat ne laafɩ ye.
B toor ka be ne Wẽnnaam zoees ye.
Tõnd yaool n miime tɩ bũmb ning fãa tõogã sẽn yetã, a yeta neb nins fãa sẽn loe ne tõogã, tɩ noyã fãa na mume, tɩ nebã na bãng tɩ Wẽnnaam nifẽ, nebã fãa yaa bɛɛgdba.
Bala, ned baa a yen ka na n paam zemsg Wẽnnaam taoor tõogã sakr yĩng ye, bala, tõogã kɩtdame bal tɩ ned bãng yel-wẽnd sẽn ya a soaba.
La moasã Wẽnnaam tɩrlem pukame tɩ tõog toog kaẽ ye, la tõogã ne Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sɛb kɩta tɩrlemã kaseto,
sẽn yaa tɩ tẽeb ne a Zezi Kirist wata ne Wẽnnaam tɩrlem neb nins fãa sẽn tẽedã yĩnga. Bala, welgr ka ye:
Nebã fãa maana yel-wẽna, n kong Wẽnnaam ziirã.
La b paamda zemsgã zaalem bala, Wẽnnaam nimbãan-zoeerã yĩnga, fãagr ning sẽn be a Zezi Kirist pʋgẽ wã maasem yĩnga.

Yaa bãmb la Wẽnnaam pĩnd n yãk n kõ, neb nins sẽn na n tẽ bãmbã yel-wẽna yiisg yĩnga, ne b zɩɩmã. Woto na n wilga Wẽnnaam tɩrlem. Bãmb sẽn bas nebã n ka sɩbg-b b yel-wẽn nins b sẽn dag n maan Wẽnnaam sũ-marã wakatã yĩnga,
bãmb da rat n wilga b tɩrlemã moasã wakatã, tɩ nebã na bãng tɩ bãmb yaa tɩrga, bãmb sẽn kɩtd tɩ ned ning sẽn tẽed a Zezi wã zemsã.
Woto yĩngã, bõe pʋgẽ la ned tõe n waoog a menga? Bũmb ka be ye. Ne tõ-bʋgo? Ne tʋʋm tõogo? Ayo! La yaa ne tẽeb tõogo.
Bala, tõnd geendame tɩ ninsaal paamda zemsg tẽeb yĩnga, tɩ tõog tʋʋmã toog kaẽ ye.
Walla, Wẽnnaam yaa Zuif-rãmbã bal Wẽnnaam la? Bãmb ka buud a taabã me Wẽnnaam la? N-ye, bãmb yaa buud a taabã me Wẽnnaam,
bala, Wẽnnaam a yen tãa n be n na n kɩt tɩ sẽn kẽ-b bãongã zems tẽeb yĩnga, la b kɩt tɩ sẽn ka kẽ-bã me zems tẽeb yĩnga.
Woto wã, dẽ yĩnga tõnd dɩkda tẽebã n kiisd tõogã la? Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ayo. Ka woto ye: tõnd wilgdame tɩ tõogã yaa sõama.
Dẽ yĩnga, tõnd na n goma d yĩng yaab a Abraham yell n yeel tɩ bõe? Bõe la b paam-yã?
Sã n yaa sɩd tɩ yaa tʋʋmã yĩng la a Abraham paam tɩrlem, b tõe n waooga b menga. La Wẽnnaam taoore, a ka a woto ye.
Sɩd me, Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã yetame tɩ bõe? A Abraham tẽe Wẽnnaam, la Wẽnnaam gesa a Abraham wa nin-tɩrga, a tẽebã yĩnga.
La ned sã n tʋm tʋʋmde, a yaoodã ka nimbãan-zoeer kũun ye, yaa a rẽnda.
Sã n yaa ne ned ning sẽn ka tʋm-a, la a yaool n tẽ soab ning sẽn kɩtd tɩ wẽng maand lebg tɩrgã, b geta a soabã wa nin-tɩrga a tẽebã yĩnga.
Woto me, a Daviid yetame tɩ ned ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõt tɩrlem t'a ka tʋm bũmbã tara sũ-noogo. A yeelame:
Bark bee neb nins b yel-wẽnã sẽn paam sugrã, tɩ b yel-wẽnã paam ludbã zutu.
Bark bee ned ning Zu-soabã sẽn ka geelgd a yel-wẽnã zugu.
Sũ-no-kãng yaa zũinsã yĩng bal bii, bɩ yaa ne moosã me? Bala, tõnd yetame yaa: Ne a Abraham, b geelga b tẽebã wa tɩrlem.
Wakat ning b sẽn geelg b tẽebã wa tɩrlema, dẽ tɩ b dag n yaa wãn-wãna? Dẽ tɩ b dag n kẽe bãong bɩ b ka kẽ? B dag n nan ka kẽ bãong ye, b da ket n yaa moaaga.

La b reega bãongã kõom sẽn ya bãnd sẽn wilg t'a paama tɩrlem tẽeb yĩnga, la rẽ tɩ b ket n yaa moaaga. Woto, b yaa nebã fãa sẽn tẽedã ba, tɩ baa ne b sẽn ka kẽ bãongã, bɩ Wẽnnaam geelg-b tɩrlemã.
Woto bãmb yaa zũinsã me ba. Ka yĩngã bãong bal la b kẽ ye, b kẽnda tẽeb ning tõnd yaab a Abraham sẽn dag n tar b moonem wakatã pʋgẽ.
Sɩd me, ka ne tõogã la Wẽnnaam kãab a Abraham wall a yagensã tɩ b na n sooga dũni wã ye, la yaa ne tẽeb tɩrlem.
Sã n yaa tõog yĩng la ned paamd dogem-pʋɩɩre, dẽnd tẽeb yaa zaalem, la b kiisa kãabgã sẽn kãabã.
Bala, tõogã wata ne sũ-yikri, la zĩig ning tõog sẽn ka be, beegr me ka ye.

Dẽ, yaa ne tẽebo, tɩ b tõe n yeel tɩ yaa nimbãan-zoeere, tɩ kãabg ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kãabã na pids a Abraham yagensã fãa yĩnga. Ka b rãmb sẽn tar-b tõogã yĩng bal ye, la yaa ne neb nins sẽn tar-b tõnd ba a Abraham tẽebã wa b sẽn gʋlsã:
Mam kɩtame tɩ fo lebg buud wʋsg ba. Bãmb yaa tõnd fãa ba, Wẽnnaam ning b sẽn tẽ wã taoore. Yaa Wẽnnaam ning sẽn kõt kũum vɩɩm, la b kɩtd tɩ bũmb nins sẽn ka be wã zĩndi.
A Abraham maana tẽeb ne bũmb ned sẽn ka tõe n tẽ, b tẽeme n lebg soolem wʋsg ba wa Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n yeelã: Fo yagensã na n yɩɩ a woto.
B ka bas tɩ b tẽebã boog ye, b kell n maana tẽeb ne b yĩngã sẽn kolg kũumã, bal b yʋʋmã dag n kolga koabga, la a Sara rogem me ra loogame.
La Wẽnnaam sẽn kãab-bã, b ka sãmbe, b sẽn ka tẽeb yĩng ye. La b tẽebã sẽn paas-b pãngã yĩnga, b kõo Wẽnnaam waoogre.
Bala, b sũur kɛɛma ne yel-kãngã: Bũmb ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kãabã, b tara pãng n na n pids-a.
Dẽnda n kɩt tɩ b geelg a Abraham tẽebã wa tɩrlemã.
Ka bãmb b yembr yĩng la b gʋls n yeel tɩ b geelga b tẽebã wa tɩrlemã ye,
la yaa tõnd me yĩnga. B na n geelga tõnd tẽebã wa tɩrlem, tõnd sẽn tẽed a soab sẽn vʋʋg tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi tɩ b yi kũum sʋkã,
soab ning b sẽn kʋ tõnd beegr yĩnga, la sẽn vʋʋg tɩ tõnd tõe n paam tɩrlemã yĩnga.
Dẽ, tõnd sẽn paam zemsg tẽeb yĩngã, tõnd tara zems-n-taar ne Wẽnnaam tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga.
Yaa bãmb maasem yĩng la tõnd paam n kẽ barkã pʋgẽ ne tẽebo, la tõnd yasa kãenkãe bark kãng pʋgẽ, la tõnd maanda sũ-noogo, d sẽn gũud Wẽnnaam ziirã ne tẽebã yĩngã.
La sẽn yɩɩd rẽnda, tõnd maanda sũ-noog baa namsg pʋgẽ, tõnd sẽn mi tɩ namsgã wata ne sũ-mare,
tɩ sũ-mar wat ne maan-sɩd sẽn wat ne tõogre, tɩ maan-sɩd sẽn wat ne tõogrã wat ne tẽeb pidsg gũudum.
Tẽeb pidsg gũudum yaool n ka tudgd ned ye, bala, Wẽnnaam Sɩɩg-sõng b sẽn kõ tõndã pidsda tõnd sũyã ne Wẽnnaam nonglem tõnd sũyã pʋse.
Bala, wakat ning tõnd sẽn da ka pãngã, Wẽnnaam wakatã sẽn wa n ta, Kirist kii nin-wẽnsã yĩnga.
Yaa toog tɩ ned sak n ki nin-tɩrg yĩnga. Daar ninga, nina na paam raood n ki nin-sõng yĩnga.
Wakat ning tõnd sẽn dag n ket n ya yel-wẽn maandba, Kirist kii tõnd yĩnga, la ne rẽnda, Wẽnnaam wilga b nonglem tõnd yĩnga.
Moasã, tõnd sẽn paam zemsg Kirist zɩɩmã raagr yĩngã, tõnd kõn põs Wẽnnaam sũ-yikr bãmb maasem yĩng n yɩɩd sɩda?

Bala, sã n yaa tɩ tõnd sẽn dag n ket n ya bɛɛbã, tõnd yellã ne Wẽnnaamã paama yiisg Bãmb Bi-riblã kũum yĩnga, moasã yellã sẽn sa wã, tõnd kõn paam fãagr bãmb vɩɩmã yĩng n yɩɩd sɩda?
Sẽn yɩɩd rẽ yɛsa, tõnd maanda sũ-noog Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ, tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga, soab ning sẽn wa ne zemsg tõnd ne Wẽnnaam sʋk moasã wã.
Yaa woto yĩnga, a wa yel-wẽna sẽn wa dũni ned a yembr maasem yĩngã, tɩ yel-wẽnã wa ne kũum, tɩ nebã fãa kiidẽ, b fãa sẽn maan yel-wẽnã yĩngã...
Bala, hal tɩ ta wakat ning b sẽn moon tõogã, yel-wẽn dag n bee dũni, la b rag n ka geend yel-wẽnã tõogã sẽn dag n ka wã ye.
Baoosgo, kũum zĩnda a Adam wakat hal tɩ ta a Moyiis wakate. Baa neb nins sẽn ka beeg a Adam beegrã buud kiime. A Adam yaa sẽn da tog n wa-a wã wẽnego.

Kũun ning sẽn kõt zaalmã yell ka wẽnd kongrã yell ye. Bala, neb wʋsg sã n kii ned a yembr beegr yĩnga, sẽn yɩɩda, Wẽnnaam kiiga b barkã, la kũun sẽn yit ned a yen bark pʋgẽ, a Zezi Kirist, neb wʋsg zut wʋsgo.
Kũun-kãng yellã ka wẽnd nin-yend yel-wẽnã yell ye. Bala, bʋʋd sẽn pʋgd kongr a yen tãa wã wata ne sɩbgre, tɩ kũun ning sẽn kõt zaalem kongr zugẽ wã wat ne tɩrlem kũuni.
Kũum sã n bee ned a yen tãa kongrã yĩnga, neb nins sẽn dag deeg Wẽnnaam bark-kãsengã la tɩrlem kũunã kõn vɩɩmd n dɩ naam a Zezi Kirist b yen tãa maasem yĩng n yɩɩd sɩda?
Woto yĩnga, a wa ned a yen tãa beegr sẽn kɩt tɩ sɩbgr paam nebã fãa wã, woto me, tɩrlem tʋʋmd a yen tãa maasem yĩnga, tɩrlem sẽn kõt vɩɩmã tata neba fãa.
Sɩd me, a wa ned a yen tãa kɩɩsg yĩng sẽn kɩt tɩ neb wʋsg lebg yel-wẽn maandba, woto me, ned a yen tãa sakr yĩnga, b na n kɩtame tɩ neb wʋsg lebg tɩrse.
La tõog yaool n waame tɩ kongr lebg kãsenga. La zĩig ning yel-wẽn sẽn paam pãnga, barkã paama paoosg n yɩɩda.
Woto, a wa yel-wẽnã ne kũum sẽn soog zĩigã, barkã sooga zĩig me tɩrlemã yĩnga, tɩ d tõe n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa, tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga.
Dẽ, tõnd na n yeelame tɩ bõe? Tõnd na n kell n paa yel-wẽnã pʋgẽ tɩ barkã paam paoosgo?
Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ayo. Tõnd sẽn ya wa kũum ne yel-wẽna yellã, tõnd na n leb n yɩɩ a wãn n vɩ yel-wẽn pʋgẽ?
Yãmb zɩ tɩ tõnd fãa sẽn paam lisg Kirist Zezi pʋgẽ wã, yaa bãmb kũumẽ wã la tõnd lis-yã?
Woto, ne lisgã, tõnd muma ne bãmba b kũumã pʋgẽ, t'a wa ba wã ziir sẽn vʋʋg a Zezi tɩ b yi kũum sʋkã, tõnd me kẽnda vɩ-paalg pʋgẽ a woto.
Sɩd me, tõnd sã n lebga tɩɩg a yembr ne bãmba, tõnd sẽn paam pʋɩɩr ne bãmb kũumã yĩnga, tõnd na kell n yɩ bũmb a yembr ne bãmba, n paam pʋɩɩr ne bãmb vʋʋgrã.
Tõnd miime tɩ d yalẽ kʋdgã naaga ne bãmb n ka da-pɩkã zugu, tɩ yel-wẽnã ratem kãng pãng na sa, tɩ tõnd kõn leb n yɩ yel-wẽnã yems yɛs ye.
Bala, ned sã n ki, yel-wẽnã ka leb n tar pãng ne yẽnda ye.
La tõnd sã n yaool n kii ne Kiristã, tõnd tẽedame tɩ d na n vɩɩmda ne bãmba,
tõnd sẽn mi tɩ Kirist sẽn vʋʋg n yi kũum sʋkã kõn leb n ki wã yĩnga. Kũum ka leb n so bãmb ye.
Bala bãmb kiime, la yaa yel-wẽnã yiisg yĩng la bãmb ki vugr bala. La b sẽn vɩ moasã wã, b vɩɩ Wẽnnaam yĩnga.
Woto yĩnga, ges-y y meng wa kũum ne yel-wẽna yelle, la a wa neb sẽn vɩ Wẽnnaam yĩnga, Kirist Zezi lagem-n-taarã pʋgẽ.
Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ yel-wẽnã da leb n soog yãmb yĩn-kiidsã ye, la y da leb n sak a ratem wẽnsã ye.
Da dɩk-y y yĩngã will n kɩs yel-wẽnã tɩ yɩ ka-tɩrlem tʋʋm teed ye. Kõ-y y mens Wẽnnaam, wa neb sẽn vʋʋg n yi kũum sʋk n vɩ, la y kõ Wẽnnaam y yĩngã wil tɩ yɩ tɩrlem tʋʋm teedo.
Yel-wẽnã ka na n soog yãmb ye, bala, ka tõogã n leb n so yãmb ye, la yaa barkã.
La yaa bõe? Dẽ yĩnga, tõnd na n maanda yel-wẽnã, tõog sẽn ka so tõndo, la yaa barkã yĩnga? Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ayo.

Yãmb ka mi tɩ yãmb sã n kõ-y meng neda, n na n yɩ a yamb n sak-a, yãmb sɩd yaa ned ning yãmb sẽn sakdã yamba? Yãmb tõe n yɩɩ yel-wẽnã sẽn wat ne kũumã yemse, wall sakr sẽn taasd ned tɩrlem pʋgẽ wã yemse.
La Wẽnnaam sõngr yĩnga, yãmb sẽn dag n ya yel-wẽnã yemsã, yãmb saka tẽeb yẽbgr noyã b sẽn togs yãmbã ne y yamleoogo.
B sẽn yols yãmb n yiis yel-wẽnã yembdẽ wã, yãmb lebga tɩrlem yemse.

Mam gomda ne ninsaalemdo, yãmb yĩngã pãn-komsmã yĩnga. Woto me, a wa yãmb sẽn dag n kõ y yĩngã wil tɩ yɩ rẽgd la tʋʋm wẽns yemse, tɩ b maan tʋʋm wẽnsã, bɩ y kõ yĩngã wil tɩ yɩ tɩrlem yemse, tɩ b tall-y n taas yɩlgr zĩigẽ.
Balã, wakat ning yãmb sẽn dag n ya yel-wẽnã yemse, tɩrlem dag n ka so yãmb ye.
Bi-bõe la yãmb dag n womd wakat kãnga? Yaa biis nins sẽn ningd yãmb yãnd moasã wã, bala, b baoosg yaa kũum.
Moasã, yãmb sẽn paam yolsg n yi yel-wẽnã yembdẽ n lebg Wẽnnaam yemsã, yãmb bi-womdɩ yaa maneg n yɩ yɩlemde, la a baoosg yaa vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Bala, yel-wẽnã yaood yaa kũun, la kũun ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõt zaalmã yaa vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa, tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist pʋgẽ.
M ba-biisi, mam gomda ne neb sẽn mi tõogo: Yãmb zɩ tɩ tõog loeta ned a yõor tɛka?
Woto, pag sã n kuil sɩda, tõogã loee yẽndã ne a sɩdã a sɩdã yõor tɛka. La sɩdã sã n ki, tõog ning sẽn dag n loe-a ne a sɩdã yii n bas-a lame.
Dẽ, a sɩdã sã n ket n vɩ, t'a lebg dao a to paga, b na n bool-a lame tɩ pʋg-yoodre. La a sɩdã sã n ki, a paama yolsg ne tõogã. Dẽ, a sã n lebg ned a to paga, a ka pʋg-yoodr ye.
Woto me m ba-biisi, yãmb yaa kũum, sã n yaa ne tõogã yelle, Kirist yĩngã maasem yĩnga, n na n lebg ned a to rẽnda, soab ning sẽn vʋʋg n yi kũum sʋka, tɩ tõnd na wom biis Wẽnnaam yĩngã.
Bala, wakat ning yĩngã sẽn dag n so tõndã, tõogã sẽn kɩt tɩ yel-wẽnã ratem yikã dag n tʋmda tõnd yĩngã wil pʋsẽ, n kɩtdẽ tɩ tõnd womd biis sẽn wat ne kũum.

La moasã, b yiisa tõnd tõog yembd pʋgẽ, bala, tõnd yaa kũum ne bũmb nins sẽn dag gãd tõnd yembd pʋgẽ wã, tɩ tõnd Wẽnnaamã sakrã yaa sɩɩgã tõog pʋgẽ, sẽn ya tõ-paalgã, la ka leb n ya tõ-kʋdgã sẽn gʋlsã pʋgẽ ye.

Dẽ, tõnd na n yeelame tɩ bõe? Tõogã yaa yel-wẽnd la? Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ayo. La mam ka bãng yel-wẽn sẽn ya bũmb ninga, sã n ka tõogã maasem yĩng ye. Tõogã sã n dag n ka yeelẽ tɩ: Da maan sũ-kiir ye, mam dag n kõn bãng sũ-kiir sẽn yaa a soab ye.
La yel-wẽnã paama tõogã sẽn yeelã n na n kɩt tɩ sũ-kiir buud fãa kẽ maam, bala, tõog sã n kaẽ, yel-wẽn yaa bõn-kɩɩnga.
Ne maam, pĩnda, tõogã sẽn dag n ka be wã, mam dag n vɩɩme. La tõogã sẽn wa wã, yel-wẽn paama vɩɩm, tɩ mam ki.
Woto, tõogã sẽn taasd ned vɩɩm pʋgẽ wã taee maam n taas kũumẽ.
Bala, yel-wẽnã sẽn paam weerã, a talla tõogã n belg maam n tõoge, la a talla tõogã n kɩt tɩ mam ki.
Woto, tõogã yaa bõn-sõngo, noyã me yaa bõn-sõamyã, n ya tɩrse la sõama.

Dẽ yĩngã, bũmb ning sẽn ya sõama wã lebga kũum mam yĩnga? Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ayo. La sẽn na yɩlg tɩ yel-wẽn puk a meng n wilg t'a yaa yel-wẽnã, a talla bõn-sõng n wa ne mam kũum, tɩ tõogã maasem yĩnga nebã na yã tɩ yaa yel-wẽn kãseng tɩ looge.
Sɩd me, tõnd miime tɩ tõogã yaa sɩɩg bũmbu. La mam yaa yĩnga, yel-wẽn sẽn so n maand a sẽn dat-ne.
Bala, bũmb nins mam sẽn maandã, mam ka wʋmd b võor ye. Mam sẽn dat n maan bũmb ninsã, mam ka maand ye, la mam yaool n maanda bũmb nins mam sẽn kisã.
Mam sã n maanda m sẽn ka rata, mam sẽn yetã zemsda ne tõogã sẽn yetã, tɩ tõogã yaa bõn-sõngo.
Moasã, ka leb n ya maam n maand bõn-kãens ye, la yaa yel-wẽnã sẽn be mam pʋgẽ wã.
Bala, mam miime tɩ bõn-sõng ka be mam pʋgẽ, mam yĩngã pʋgẽ ye. Bala mam tõee n paama datem tɩ maan neere, la m ka tar pãn-tõog tɩ maan-a ye.
Mam ka maand neer ning mam sẽn datã ye, la m maanda wẽng ning m sẽn ka ratã.
Mam sã n maand m sẽn ka ratã, ka leb n ya maam n maand ye, la yaa yel-wẽnã sẽn be mam pʋgẽ wã.
Mam sẽn dat n maan neerã, mam mikame tɩ tõ-kãngã n be ne maam: Wẽng n yegd maam.
Mam sũurã zĩ-zulungẽ wã, mam sũ-noog bee ne Wẽnnaam tõodã.
La mam yãta tõog a to mam yĩnga wilẽ, t'a maood ne mam yam-wekrã tõogã, n kɩtd tɩ mam ya yel-wẽnã sẽn be mam yĩngã wilẽ wã tõog yamba.
Mam yaa nĩmbãan-neda. Ãnna n na n yiis maam yĩn-kãngã sẽn ya kũumã nugẽ?
Bɩ d pʋʋs Wẽnnaam bark tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga... Woto, ne mam yam-wekre, mam yaa Wẽnnaam tõogã yamba, la sã n yaa ne mam yĩngã, mam yaa yel-wẽnã tõog yamba.
Woto yĩnga, sɩbgr ka be neb nins sẽn be Zezi Kirist pʋgẽ n kẽnd wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã raabã la ka yĩng ratmã zut ye.
Sɩd me, Sɩɩg sẽn kõt vɩɩm a Zezi Kirist pʋgẽ wã tõog yolsa maam ne yel-wẽnã tõogo, la ne kũum tõog yembdo.

Bala, Wẽnnaam sẽn tʋm b meng Bi-riblã ne yĩng sẽn wẽnd yel-wẽnã rẽndã, yaa yel-wẽnã yiisg yĩnga. Bi-riblã zĩnda b yĩngã pʋgẽ n wilg tɩ yel-wẽnã ka sõama ye. La tõogã ka tõe rẽnda ye, bala, yĩngã kɩtame t'a ka pãng ye.
Kirist maana a woto tɩ tɩrlem ning tõogã sẽn yeel tɩ d tog n paamame wã na pid tõnd pʋsẽ, tõnd sẽn kẽnd wa sẽn zems Sɩɩgã raabo la ka yĩng rẽndã yĩnga.
Sɩd me, neb nins sẽn vɩ wa yĩngã sẽn datã, yĩngã sẽn dat bũmb ninsã n tusd bãmba, la yaa Sɩɩgã sẽn dat bũmb ninsã n tɛt neb nins sẽn kẽnd wa Sɩɩgã sẽn datã.
Yĩngã ratem sakr wata ne kũum, la Sɩɩgã ratem sakr wata ne vɩɩm la bãane.
Bala, yĩngã ratem sakr yaa beem ne Wẽnnaam, tɩ bõe, yĩngã ka sakd Wẽnnaam tõogã ye, la a pʋs n ka tõe n sak-a me ye.
La neb nins yĩngã ratem sẽn so wã yaool n ka tõe n ta Wẽnnaam yam ye.
Ne yãmba, yĩngã ratem ka leb n so yãmb yɛs ye, yaa Sɩɩgã n so yãmba, sã n yaa tɩ Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã bee yãmb pʋse. Ned sã n ka tar Kirist Sɩɩgã, a ka bãmb dẽnd ye.
La Kirist sã n be yãmb pʋgẽ, yaa sɩd tɩ yĩngã yaa kũum yel-wẽnã yĩnga, la Sɩɩgã kõta vɩɩm, tɩrlemã yĩnga.

La soab ning sẽn vʋʋg a Zezi tɩ b yi kũum sʋkã Sɩɩg sã n be yãmb pʋgẽ, soab kãnga, sẽn vʋʋg-a Kirist Zezi tɩ b yi kũum sʋkã na n kõo yãmb yĩn-kiidsã me vɩɩm, bãmb Sɩɩgã sẽn be yãmb pʋgẽ wã maasem yĩnga.
Woto yĩngã, m ba-biisi, tõnd tara samde, la ka yĩngã samde, n na n vɩɩmd wa yĩngã sẽn dat ye.
Yãmb sã n vɩɩmd wa yĩngã sẽn data, yãmb na ki. La yãmb sã n kɩt tɩ yĩngã tʋʋm ki ne Sɩɩgã pãnga, yãmb na vɩɩmde.
Bala, neb nins fãa Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã sẽn tɛt yaa Wẽnnaam kamba.
Yãmb ka reeg yembd sɩɩg n na n ket n vɩ rabeem pʋgẽ ye. La yãmb reega Sɩɩg sẽn kɩtd tɩ yãmb lebg Wẽnnaam kamba, tɩ Sɩ-kãng maasem yĩnga, tõnd yetame tɩ Abba, sẽn dat n yeel tɩ "m ba."
Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã meng kɩta kaset ne tõnd sɩɩgã n yetẽ tɩ tõnd yaa Wẽnnaam kamba.

La tõnd sã n yaa bãmb kamba, tõnd yaa b rãmb nins sẽn na n soog bãmb paoong me. Tõnd na n sooga Wẽnnaam paoongã, la d yaa pʋɩt-n-taas ne Kirist, a sã n yaa tɩ tõnd lagma ne bãmb n namse, tɩ d tõe n naag bãmb n paam waoogr me.
Mam getame tɩ namsg nins sẽn tar tõnd moasã wã ka tõe n dɩk n mak ne ziir ning sẽn na n puk tõnd yĩng nindaarã ye.
Dẽnda n kɩt tɩ dũni bõn-naandsã fãa gũud Wẽnnaam kambã pukr ne datem kãsenga.
Bala, bõn-naandsã kẽe faoolem pʋgẽ. Ka ne b meng yamleoog ye, la yaa ned ning sẽn kẽes-a bãmb be wã yĩnga.
B be faoolmã pʋgẽ ne tẽeb pidsg gũudum kãngã: Bõn-naands kãens na n paama yolsg ne yembdo, la sãoongã, n paam pʋɩɩr ne Wẽnnaam kambã lohorem sẽn be ziirã.
Tõnd yaool n miime tɩ hal tɩ ta moasã, bõn-naandsã fãa wẽeda siri, tɩ rogem toog tar-ba.

Sẽn yɩɩda, tõnd mensã sẽn zoe n paam Sɩɩgã reng-n-lɛmbgã, tõnd me wẽeda sir d pʋsẽ, n gũud wakat ning Wẽnnaam sẽn na n deeg tõnd n maan b kambã, la d gũud tɩ b yols tõnd yĩngã n baase.
Bala, tõnd paama fãagre, la yaa ne tẽebo. La bũmb ning fo sẽn gũud ne tẽebã sã n ya bũmb f sẽn ne, ka leb n ya tẽeb yell ye. Fo sã n ne bũmbu, f tõe n leb n tẽe a paoong yɛsa?
La tõnd sã n tẽed tɩ d na n paama bũmb nins tõnd sẽn ka ne, tõnd maood n gũud-a lame.
Woto me, Sɩɩgã wat n sõngda tõnd d pãn-komsmã pʋgẽ, bala, tõnd ka mi d sẽn segd n kos bũmb nins d pʋʋsg pʋgẽ ye. La Sɩɩgã meng yõkda sɛɛg ne sir ned sẽn ka tõe n togs ye.
La soab ning sẽn feesd sũyã mii bũmb ning Sɩɩgã sẽn data. Bãmb yõkda Wẽnnaam sɛɛg nin-sõamyã yĩng wa sẽn zemsd Wẽnnaam daabo.
La tõnd miime tɩ bũmb fãa tʋmda ne taab neb nins sẽn nong Wẽnnaamã, b rãmb sẽn paam boolg wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam yam-yãkrã sõngr yĩnga.
Bala, neb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn pĩnd b bãngã, b pĩnd n yãka yam tɩ b na n wẽnega bãmb Bi-riblã, tɩ bãmb Bi-riblã na yɩ bi-rẽeng ba-biis wʋsg sʋka.
La neb nins bãmb sẽn pĩnd n tʋlsã, b bool-b lame: La bãmb sẽn bool-b rãmbã, b kɩtame me tɩ b zemse. La neb nins bãmb sẽn kɩt tɩ b zemsã, b waoog-b lame me.
Dẽ, tõnd na n yeelame tɩ bõe ne yel-kãnga? Wẽnnaam sã n bee ne tõndo, ãnna n tõe n zab ne tõndo?
Bãmb sẽn ka bas b meng Bi-riblã tɩ b põse, n dɩk-b n kõ tɩ b kʋ tõnd fãa yĩngã, na n yɩɩ wãn tɩ b ka lagem bũmbã fãa ne bãmb n kõ tõndo, nimbãan-zoeer yĩngã?
Ãnna n na n dõd Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdsã? Yaa Wẽnnaam la sẽn kɩtd tɩ ned lebg tɩrgã.
Ãnna n na n kao b bʋʋd n sɩbg-ba? Kirist Zezi la sẽn ki-a wã. La sẽn yɩɩda, bãmb vʋʋgame, b bee Wẽnnaam nug-rɩtgo, b yõkda sɛɛg tõnd yĩnga.
Ãnna n na n welg tõnd ne Kirist nonglmã? Toogo, bɩ sũ-sãoong kãsenga, bɩ namsgo, bɩ kom, bɩ naongo, bɩ sãoongo, bɩ zabr sʋʋga?
Wa b sẽn gʋlsã: B kʋʋda tõnd daarã tõr fo yĩnga. B geta tõnd wa piis b sẽn koota.
La bõn-kãens fãa pʋgẽ, tõnd yaa tõaagdb hakɩɩka, sẽn nong-a tõndã maasem yĩnga.
Bala, mam sũur keemame tɩ kũum, wall vɩɩm, wall malegse, wall pãn-soaadba, wall bũmb sẽn be moasã, wall bũmb sẽn wata,
wall pãense, wall yĩngr neba, wall tẽngr neba, wall bõn-naandg a to baa a yen kõn n welg tõnd ne Wẽnnaam nonglem sẽn be tõnd Zu-soab a Kirist Zezi pʋgẽ wã ye.
Mam yeta sɩd Kirist pʋgẽ, mam ka yagd zĩri ye. Mam sũ-bãngrã kɩta maam bõn-kãng kaseto, Sɩɩg-sõng maasem yĩnga.
Sũ-sãoon-kãsenga, la sũ-bõdem n be mam sũurẽ wã daar fãa.
Bala, mam dag n nongẽ lame tɩ kãab wẽng zĩnd mam zugu, la m welg ne Kirist m ba-biisã, la m ba-rãmba ne yĩng yelle, sõngr yĩnga.
Bãmb yaa Israyɛl rãmba, b rãmb Wẽnnaam sẽn deeg n maan b kamba tɩ b so ziiri, la kaoolã, la tõogã, la kaorengo, la kãabdo, la yaab-rãmba.
Sã n yaa ne yĩng yelle, yaa bãmb n dog Kiristã, soab ning sẽn yɩɩd bũmba fãa, n ya Wẽnnaam sẽn ya bark soab wakat sẽn ka sɩngr n ka saabã. Ãmina!
A ka tɩ Wẽnnaam goama lebga zaalem ye. Bala, ka b rãmb fãa sẽn ya a Israyɛl yagensã n ya Israyɛl ye.
Ka b sẽn ya a Abraham roogã neb yĩng la b yaa a yagens ye. La b yeelame yaa: Na n tũnuga a Izak tɩ fo paam yagens sẽn tar fo yʋʋre,
Sẽn dat n togs tɩ ka kamb nins sẽn ya b yĩng neongã n ya Wẽnnaam kamb ye, la yaa neb nins b kãab-bã la b geend wa b yagense.
Sɩd me, ad kãabgã gomde: Woto wẽnde, mam na n lebg n waame, la rẽ t'a Sara paama bi-ribla.
Sẽn yɩɩda, yɩɩ woto me ne a Rebeka, sẽn tall tõnd ba a Izak bal pʋgã.

Bala, kamba da nan ka rog ye, la b da nan ka maan neer bɩ wẽng ye. Baoosgo, Wẽnnaam daabã kell n yalsame wa sẽn zems bãmb sẽn yãke, la yãkrã ka tũud ne tʋʋmã ye, a tũuda ne sẽn bool-a wã.
B yeela a Rebek yaa:
Yao wã na n sooga kẽemã, wa sẽn gʋlsa: Mam nonga a Zakoob, la mam kisga a Ezayu.
Dẽ, tõnd na n yeelame tɩ bõe? Dẽ yĩnga, ka-tɩrlem bee Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ laa? Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ka ye.
Bala, b yeela a Moyiis yaa: Mam na n zoee ned ning m sẽn na n zoe a nimbãanegã nimbãanega, la m na kʋma ned ning m sẽn na n kʋmã.
Woto yĩnga, yel-kãng ka tũud ne soab ning sẽn data, wall ne soab ning sẽn zoet ye, bee ne Wẽnnaam, soab ning sẽn zoet nimbãanegã.
Bala, Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã yeela Faarõ yaa: Mam zẽka foom ne m raabo, n na n tall foom n wilg m pãngã, tɩ b na moon mam yʋʋrã tẽng zug tɛk fãa.
Woto, bãmb zoeta ned ning b sẽn dat n zoe a nimbãanegã nimbãanega, la bãmb sẽn dat t'a soab sũur yɩ kɛgenga, b kengda a soabã sũurã.
Dẽ, fo na n yeela maam yaa: Bõe la bãmb na n leb n yeel tɩ ka zemse? Bala, ãnna n tõe n kɩɩs bãmb sẽn datã?
La fo yẽ, foo la ãnda n tõe n wẽ nokoeemd ne Wẽnnaam? Bũmb ning yagbã sẽn yagdã na n yeela yagbã tɩ yaa bõe yĩng t'a yagd yẽnda a woto?
Ka yagbã n so yagdã, n yãkd yagd a yembr pʋgẽ n yagd teoogo a tʋʋm sẽn be waoogre, la a yagd teoogo a tʋʋm sẽn be paoogr la?
La Wẽnnaam sã n maan sũ-mar wʋsg ne lagd sẽn wat ne sũ-yikri la sẽn maan sãoong yĩngã, n na n wilg b sũ-yikri la b kɩt tɩ nebã bãng bãmb pãngã?
La bãmb sã n dag n datame n kɩt tɩ lagd sẽn zems ne nimbãan-zoeere, la bãmb sẽn pĩnd n yãk tɩ b paam ziirã bãng bãmb ziirã sẽn zems to-to?
Dat n togs tɩ tõndo, neb b sẽn boole, ka Zuif-rãmbã sʋk bal ye, la bu-zẽmsã sʋk me,
wa bãmb sẽn yeel a Ooze sebrã pʋgẽ wã: Ned ning sẽn dag ka mam nedã, mam na n boola a soab tɩ m neda, la ned ning sẽn dag n ka m noangã, mam na n bool-a lame tɩ m noanga.
La zĩig ning meng b sẽn dag n yet bãmb tɩ b ka mam nebã, be bala, b na n boola bãmb tɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ kom-dibli.
A Ezayi me goma Israyɛl yell n yeele: Baa Israyɛl nebã sõor sã n ta ko-kãsengã biisrã sõore, neb bilf bal n na põse.
Bala, bũmb ning Zu-soabã sẽn yeelã, b na n maan-a-la zãng tẽng zugu, la b na n maan-a-la tao-tao.
La a wa a Ezayi sẽn da pĩnd n yeelã, Saasẽ sodaas naabã sã n dag ka kellẽ tõnd buudã, tõnd dag n na n lebgẽ la wa Sodom, la tõnd dag n na n wẽnegẽ la Gomoor.
Dẽ, tõnd na n yeelame tɩ bõe? Bu-zẽmsã, sẽn dag n ka baood-b tɩrlemã paama tɩrlem, tɩrlem ning tẽeb sẽn kõtã.
Tɩ Israyɛl nebã sẽn dag n baood tõog sẽn wat ne tɩrlemã ka paam tõ-kãng ye.
Bõe yĩnga? Yaa tɩ Israyɛl ka bao tɩrlemã ne tẽeb ye, la yaa ne tʋʋmã. Bãmb laka kug-lakdgã,
wa sẽn gʋlsã: Ade, mam ningda kug-lakdgã la kugr sẽn lubd neb Siyõ pʋgẽ. La ned ning sẽn tẽed-a bãmb kõn paam yãnd ye.
M ba-biisi, mam sũurã raabo, la mam bõosg ne Wẽnnaam b yĩng yaa tɩ b paam fãagre.
Bala, mam kɩta bãmb kaset n yetẽ tɩ b tara ratem wʋsg Wẽnnaam yĩnga, la b ka tar bãngr ye.
Bãmb sẽn zɩ Wẽnnaam tɩrlemã yellã, la b rat n zĩndig b meng tɩrlemã, b ka sak n tũ Wẽnnaam tɩrlemã ye.
Bala, Kirist yaa tõogã baoosg zĩiga, tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn tẽed na paam tɩrlem.
Sɩd me, a Moyiis gʋlsa tɩrlem ning tõogã sẽn wat-ne wã yell n yeele: Ned sã n maan wa tõogã sẽn yeelã, tõogã na kɩt t'a vɩɩmde.
La tɩrlem ning tẽeb sẽn wat-ne wã yeta a woto: Da tags f sũurẽ tɩ: Ãnna n na n dʋ arzãna? A rʋʋb yaa tɩ sigs Kiristã be.
Wall ãnna n na n sig bog-zulungã pʋgẽ? A sigb yaa tɩ tak Kirist n yiis kɩɩm-kulgu.
Sã n yaa a woto, tẽebã yetame tɩ bõe? Gomdã pẽe foom, a bee fo noorẽ la f sũurẽ. Yaool n yaa tẽeb gomdã la tõnd moonda.
Fo sã n kɩs Zu-soab a Zezi kaset ne f noore, la fo sã n tẽ f sũurẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam vʋʋga bãmb n yiis kũum sʋka, fo na paam fãagre.
Bala, yaa ned sẽn na n tar tẽeb a sũurẽ la a paamd tɩrlem, la yaa ned sẽn na n kɩs kaset ne a no-goam la a paamd fãagre, wa Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yetã:
Ned ning fãa sẽn tẽed bãmb kõn paam yãnd ye.
Sɩd me, welgr ka be Zuif ne Gɛrk sʋk ye: B fãa tara Zu-soab a yen sẽn maand neb nins fãa sẽn boond bãmbã neer wʋsgo.
Bala, ned ning fãa sẽn na n bool Zu-soabã yʋʋr na n paama fãagre.

La bãmb na n yɩɩ a wãn n bool ned ning b sẽn ka tẽedã yʋʋre? La b na n yɩɩ a wãn n tẽ ned tɩ b ka wʋm tɩ b gomd a yelle? La b na n yɩɩ a wãn n wʋm tɩ b gomd a yelle, koe-moaandb sã n ka beẽ?
La koe-moaandb na n yɩɩ wãn n zĩndi, ned sã n ka tʋm-ba? Wa b sẽn gʋlsã: Neb nins sẽn moond koe-noogã nao tara rasãnde.
La ka nebã fãa n sak koe-noogã ye. Dẽ n kɩt t'a Ezayi yeel yaa: Zu-soaba, ãnna n tẽ tõnd sẽn togsã?
Woto, yaa bũmb ning ned sẽn wʋmdã n wat ne tẽebo, la bũmb ning a sẽn wʋmdã yita Kirist goamã pʋgẽ.
La mam sokdame tɩ b ka wʋm laa? B wʋm-yã! Bãmb koɛɛg saaga tẽn-tõrã, la bãmb goamã taa dũni tɛk fãa.

La mam sokdame tɩ Israyɛl nebã ka bãng laa? A Moyiis n yɩ pipi n yeel yaa: Mam na n kɩtame tɩ neb sẽn ka soolem sũ-kiir yõk yãmba, la mam na n dɩka buud sẽn ka tar yam vẽnegre, n kɩt tɩ yãmb sũyã yiki.
La a Ezayi pʋs n paama raood n yeele: Neb nins sẽn dag n ka baood maamã yãa maam. La mam puka m meng ne neb nins sẽn dag n ka sokd mam yellã.
La a goma Israyɛl yell n yeele: Daarã tõre, mam tẽega m nusi, n tees neb sẽn ya kɩɩsdba, la nokoeem-wẽedba.
Dẽ, mam sokdame yaa: Wẽnnaam zãgsa b nebã laa? Yaa vẽeneg tɩ b ka zãgs-b ye. Bala, mam me yaa Israyɛl neda, a Abraham yagenga, a Bɛnzame buudu.
Wẽnnaam ka zãgs b nebã bãmb sẽn pĩnd n bãngã ye. Yãmb ka mi bũmb ning Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yeta, zĩig ning a Eli sẽn yẽgem ne Wẽnnaam Israyɛl nebã poorẽ wã?
Zu-soaba, b kʋʋ yãmb no-rɛɛsdbã, b leeba yãmb tẽn-kugã n lubi. Maam m yembr n kelle, tɩ b baood maam n na n kʋ.
La Wẽnnaam leokame tɩ bõe? Mam welga raop tus a yopoe m mengã yĩnga, la b ka yĩgimd baal taoor ye.
Woto me, moasã, neb n kelle, wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam sẽn tũus b rãmb b barkã pʋgẽ wã.

La sã n yaa ne Wẽnnaam bark la ned paamd fãagre, ka leb n ya ne tʋʋm ye. Sã n ka rẽ, barkã ka leb n ya nimbãan-zoeer ye la sã n yaa ne tʋʋmã la ned paamd fãagre, ka leb n ya nimbãan-zoeer yell ye. Sã n ka rẽ, tʋʋmd ka leb n ya tʋʋmd ye.
Dẽ, yaa bõe? Israyɛl nebã ka paam bũmb ning b sẽn dag n baoodã ye, la nin-tũusdsã paam-a lame. Neb a taabã sũy riglimame,
wa b sẽn gʋlsã: Hal tɩ ta dũnna daare, Wẽnnaam kõo bãmb gõeem sɩɩga, nin sẽn ka ne, tʋb sẽn ka wʋmda. La a Daviid yeelame yaa:
Bɩ b rɩɩbã yɩ bẽdg b yĩnga, gãmbre, kug-lakdga, la b yaoodo.
Bɩ b ninã lebg lik n ka tõe n yã ye, la y kɩt tɩ b kuudẽ n ka tõe n doog ye.
Dẽ, mam sokdame yaa: B lakame n na n lʋɩ? Yaa vẽeneg tɩ ka a woto ye. La bãmb lʋɩɩsã wa ne bu-zẽmsã fãagre, tɩ sũ-kiir na yõk Israyɛl nebã.
Bãmb lʋɩɩsã sã n zĩnda yõod ne dũni, tɩ bãmb kongrã zĩnd yõod bu-zẽmsã yĩnga, bãmb yikr zãng kõn zĩnd yõod n yɩɩda?
Bu-zẽmsã, mam yeta yãmba: Mam sẽn ya tẽn-tʋmd bu-zẽmsã sʋka, mam waoogda m tʋʋmdã,
tɩ sã n tõe, bɩ m kɩt tɩ sũ-kiir yõk mam buudã, tɩ m tõe n fãag neb kẽere.
Bala, b sẽn bas bãmb kɛɛngã sã n kɩtame tɩ dũni paam yel-manegr ne Wẽnnaam, b sẽn na n leb n deeg bãmbã na n yɩɩ a wãnã? A kõn yɩ vʋʋg n bas kũum sɩda?
La dẽenem biisã sã n welga toor Wẽnnaam yĩnga, zom nagdgã me welga toore. La yẽgrã sã n welga toor Wẽnnaam yĩnga, wilã me yaa a woto.
La sã n yaa tɩ b kʋʋsa wil kẽere, n dɩk fo sẽn ya weoogẽ oliiv tɩɩgã n lebs n tong b zĩigẽ wã, tɩ fo paam lagem-n-taar ne oliiv tɩɩgã yẽg la a sũma,
da paoog wilã n waoog f meng ye. Fo sã n waoogd f menga, bãng tɩ ka foom n zãad yẽgã ye, la yaa bãmb n zãad foom.
Daar ninga fo na n yeelame: b kʋʋsa wilã, tɩ b tõe n lebs maam n tong beene.
Yaa sõama yẽ. Yaa b ka-tẽebã yĩng la b sẽn kʋʋs-bã. La yaa tẽeb yĩng la fo ket n vɩ. Da paam wuk-m-meng tagsg ye, ayo, maan dabeem.
Bala, Wẽnnaam sã n ka bas tɩɩgã meng wila, b ka na n bas foom me ye
Ges Wẽnnaamã sõmblemã ne b toolmã yelle: Bãmb yaa toaag ne neb nins sẽn lʋɩ wã, la Wẽnnaam sõmblem fo yĩnga, fo sã n pa sõmblem-kãng pʋgẽ. Sã n ka rẽ, b na n kʋʋga foom me.
Bãmb me sã ka pa ka-tẽebã pʋgẽ, b na n lebs-b lame n tom ne tɩɩgã. Bala, Wẽnnaam pãnga sekame tɩ lebs-b n tom yɛsa.

B kʋʋga foom oliiv tɩɩg sẽn ya weoog bũmb zugu, n tong foom ne yir oliiv tɩɩga, baa ne rẽ sẽn ka zemsd ne foomã. Sẽn ya bãmb meng tɩɩg la rẽ wã, Wẽnnaam kõn lebs-b n tom be n yɩɩda, a sẽn zemsd ne bãmbã yĩnga?
Bala, m ba-biisi, mam ka rat tɩ yãmb zɩ yel-solem-kãngã ye, tɩ yãmb da wa n get y mens wa yam dãmb ye: Israyɛl nebã kenga b sũy wakat bilf yĩnga, hal tɩ bu-zẽmsã fãa na kẽ fãagrã pʋgẽ.
Rẽ zugẽ, Israyɛl nebã fãa na n paama fãagr wa sẽn gʋlsã: Yoalsdã na n yii Siyõ. B na n kɩtame t'a Zakoob bas Wẽn-kɩɩsgo.
Mam kaool ne bãmb na n yɩɩ a woto wakat ning mam sẽn na n yẽes b yel-wẽnã.
Sã n yaa ne koe-noogã yelle, b yaa bɛɛba, yãmb yĩnga. La sã n yaa ne yãkrã, Wẽnnaam nong-b lame, b ba-rãmbã yĩnga.
Bala, bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ zaalmã, ne boolg ning Wẽnnaam sẽn boolã ka tõe n viig ye.
A wa yãmb sẽn dag n kɩɩs Wẽnnaam, n paam nimbãan-zoeer moasã Israyɛl nebã kɩɩsg yĩngã,
woto me, bãmb me kɩɩsa moasã, tɩ b tõe n paam nimbãan-zoeer mosã, nimbãan-zoeer ning yãmb sẽn paamã maasem yĩnga.
Bala, Wẽnnaam kẽesa nebã fãa kɩɩsg pʋgẽ, n na n naag b fãa n zoe b nimbãanega.
Wẽnnaam arzẽgsã, la b yamã ne b bãngrã zulma wʋsgo. Ned ka tõe n vees bãmb bʋʋdã soɛy n bãng ye, la ned ka tõe n wʋm bãmb so-tũudsã võor ye. Sɩd me,
ãnna n bãng Zu-soabã tagsgo? Wall ãnna n yɩ bãmb sagenda?
Ãnna n deng n kõ bãmba, tɩ bãmb tog lebs a soaba?
Bũmb fãa yii bãmb nengẽ, bãmb n maan bũmb fãa, la bũmb fãa yaa bãmb yĩnga. Bãmb n so ziir wakat fãa. Ãmina.

Woto yĩnga, m ba-biisi, mam sagenda yãmb ne Wẽnnaam nimbãan-zoeerã tɩ y kõ y yĩnsã tɩ yɩ maan-vɩɩs sẽn welg toore, la sẽn tat Wẽnnaam yam. Yãmb sã n maan a woto, na n yɩɩ kaoreng sẽn zemse.
Da yɩ-y wa dũni kãngã nebã ye. Paam-y yam-wek-paalle, tɩ rẽ tek yãmba, tɩ y tõe n bãng Wẽnnaam daabo: Rẽ yaa sõama, n noomẽ la a zemsa zãnga.

Ne bark ning Wẽnnaam sẽn maan maamã, mam yeta yãmb ned kam fãa t'a ra tags tɩ yẽ yaa tɩrg tɩ looge, n kẽes a tagsd moog ye. La bɩ ned fãa paam tagsd sẽn zemse, t'a tõe n paam sik-m-menga, tɩ zems ne tẽeb ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ-a wã.
Sɩd me, a wa tõnd yĩngã sẽn ya a yembr n tar wil wʋsgã, la tɩ wilã fãa tʋʋm ka yembrã,
woto me, baa ne tõnd sẽn ya wʋsgã, tõnd lagem n yaa yĩng a yembr Kiristã pʋgẽ, n ya wil ne taaba.
La tõnd paama kũun toay-toayã, n zems ne bark ning Wẽnnaam sẽn maan tõndã: Sã n yaa pĩnd-n-bãngr goama, bɩ a zemsd ne tẽebã.
Sã n yaa yel-gesg tʋʋmde, bɩ a yɩ ne tʋʋmd tagsgo. Bɩ ned ning sẽn zãmsd neb wɩng ne zãmsgã.

Ned ning sẽn sagend nebã, bɩ a wɩng ne saglgo. Ned sã n ya kõata, bɩ a kõ ne sik-m-menga. Sẽn yaa-a taoor soaba, bɩ a maan a tʋʋmd ne a sũur fãa. Sẽn yaa-a nimbãan-zoɛta, bɩ yɩ ne sũ-noogo.
Kɩt-y tɩ zãmb da zĩnd nonglem pʋgẽ ye. Kisg-y wẽnga, la y nong sẽn ya sõama wã sõama.
Nong-y taab ne babiir nonglem. Nand-y taaba, n tagsd taab yelle.
Yɩ-y neb sẽn wɩngd ne tʋʋmde, la y da yɩ kʋɩɩmb ye. Wɩng-y ne sɩɩgã yelle. Maan-y Zu-soabã tʋʋmde.
Maan-y tẽeb n kɩdme. Paam-y sũ-mar toog pʋgẽ. Wɩng-y ne pʋʋsgo.
Sõng-y nin-tũusdsã sẽn dat sõngrã. Mao-y n maand-y sãambã sãando.
Ning-y neb nins sẽn namsd yãmbã zut barka. Ning-y bark la y ra kãab-b wẽng ye.
Maan-y sũ-noog ne neb nins sẽn maand sũ-noogo, la y yãb ne neb nins sẽn yãbda.
Paam-y tagsg a yen taab yĩnga. Da bao-y tɩ paam bõn-kãsems ye. Kɩt-y tɩ y ratem zĩnd ne bõn-talse. Da ges-y y mens wa yam dãmb ye.
Da lebs-y ned baa a ye wẽng wẽng yĩng ye. Bao-y bũmb nins sẽn ya sõama nebã fãa nifẽ wã.
Sã n tõe, t'a yellã sã n bee ne yãmba, bɩ y kɩt tɩ laafɩ zĩnd yãmb ne neba fãa sʋka.
M zo-nongdse, da rok-y y sũy y toor ye. Bas-y tɩ sũ-yikrã maan a tʋʋmde. Bala, b gʋlsame yaa: Zu-soabã yetame tɩ sũ-dokr yaa bãmb n so, la yaa bãmb n na n keo nebã.
Kom sã n tar fo bɛya, kõ-a t'a rɩ. Ko-yũud sã n tar-a, kõ-a t'a yũ. Bala, fo sã n maand a woto, yaa bug-saal la fo rʋʋgd a zugu.
Da sak tɩ wẽng tõog foom ye. Maan neer n tõog wẽnga.
Bɩ ned fãa sak pãn-soaadb sẽn yɩɩd-a. Bala, noor ka be sẽn ka yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ ye, la yaa Wẽnnaam n zĩnig pãn-soaadb nins sẽn be wã.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ ned ning sẽn kɩɩsd pãn-soaadb kɩɩsda Wẽnnaam noore. La neb nins sẽn kɩɩsdã na n baoo sɩbgr n kõ b mense.
Ned sã n maand neere, a ka yɛɛsd sẽn zãad-b tẽng ye. Yaa a sẽn maand wẽng la a yɛɛsd-ba. Fo ratame n da zoe pãn-soaad dabeem? Maan neere, la a na yeel tɩ f sẽn maanda yaa sõama.

Bala, a tʋmda Wẽnnaam tʋʋmde, fo sõngr yĩnga. La fo sã n maan wẽnga, maan dabeem. Bala, a sẽn zãad zabr sʋʋgã ka zaalem ye. A tʋmda Wẽnnaam yĩnga, n wilg ned ning sẽn maand wẽngã Wẽnnaam sũ-dokre, la b sũ-yikri.
Dẽ wã yĩnga, nebã tog n saka noore, sũ-yikr kãng yĩnga, la ka rẽ yĩng bal ye, yaa sũur kaset yĩng me.
Yaa bõn-kãng yĩng me la yãmb yaood yaoodã. Bala, neb nins sẽn zãad nebã bee Wẽnnaam tʋʋmd pʋgẽ, bõn-kãng maaneg yĩnga.

Kɩs-y ned fãa bũmb ning y sẽn tog n kɩs-a: Kɩs-y sẽn tog n deeg-a yaoodã yaoodo, la y kɩs sẽn tog n deeg-a yõor yaoodã yõor yaoodo, la y zoe ned ning y sẽn tog n zoe wã, la y waoog ned ning y sẽn tog n waooge.
Da tall-y ned samde, sã n ka tɩ nong taab ye. Bala, ned ning sẽn nong a taab pidsa Wẽnnaam tõogã zãnga.
Sɩd me, d tõee n gila tõod nins sẽn yet tɩ: Da yo ye, da kʋ ye, da zu ye, da kɩs kaset zĩri ye, da ges f to bũmb n dat ye, la tõod a taabã yeelame tɩ: Nong f to wa f menga.
Nonglem kɩtdame tɩ f ka maand f to wẽng ye. Dẽ, nonglem yaa tõogã pidsgu.
Yãmb sẽn mi wakat ning tõnd sẽn be wã, moasã yaa wakat tɩ y nek n bas gõeem. Bala, fãagrã pẽe ne tõnd moasã n yɩɩd wakat ning tõnd sẽn lebg tẽedbã.
Zĩigã zoee n zʋʋgame, la zĩig kolga yẽegre. Dẽ, wa-y tɩ d bas likã tʋʋma, la d bob vẽenem pʋgẽ zab-teedo.
Tɩ d kẽn ne pʋ-peelem, wa neb sẽn kẽnd wĩndga, n ka rɩt tɩ loogdẽ, la d ka rã-yũudba, n da maan raglem la yoobo, wall ka wʋm-taaba la sũ-kiir ye.
Yeelg-y Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist wa fuugu, la y ra bʋ yĩngã yelle n dat n pids a sẽn datã ye.
Reeg-y ned ning sẽn ka-a pãng tẽeb pʋgẽ wã sõama, la y ra wẽ nokoeemd ne-a a tagsg wɛɛngẽ ye.
Nina tẽedame t'a tõe n dɩɩ bũmba fãa. Ned a to sẽn ya pãn-komsem soab rɩta zẽ-vãad bala.
Bɩ ned ning sẽn dɩt-a wã ra paoog sẽn ka rɩt-a wã ye, la bɩ ned ning sẽn ka rɩt-a wã ra bʋ sẽn dɩt-a wã bʋʋd ye. Bala, Wẽnnaam reeg-a-la sõama.
Fo sẽn kaood f to tʋmtʋmd bʋʋdã, foo la ãnna? A yɛsa yĩngr t'a lʋɩtame, paka a zu-soabã. La a na n yalsa yĩngri, bala, Zu-soabã tara pãn-tõog tɩ tebend-a.
Nina tagsdame tɩ daar yɩɩda a to. Tɩ ned a to getẽ tɩ b zema taaba. Bɩ ned fãa bãng t'a sẽn tagsdã zemsame.

Ned ning sẽn tagsd dayã yellã, yaa Zu-soabã yĩng la a tagsd b yelle. Sẽn dɩt-a wã, yaa Zu-soabã yĩng la a rɩta, bala, a pʋʋsda Zu-soabã barka. Sẽn ka rɩt-a wã, yaa Zu-soabã yĩng la a ka rɩta. Yẽ me pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam barka.
Sɩd me, tõnd ned baa a yen ka vɩ a meng yĩng ye, la baa a yen ka kiid a meng yĩng ye.
Bala, tõnd sã n vɩya, yaa Zu-soabã yĩng la tõnd vɩ. La tõnd sã n ki, yaa Zu-soabã yĩng la tõnd kiyã. Tɩ tõnd vɩ, tɩ d ya kũum me, tõnd yaa Zu-soabã rẽnda.
Bala, Kirist kiime n lebg n vʋʋge, tɩ b tõe n yɩ sẽn ki-bã ne sẽn vɩ-bã Zu-soaba.
La yaa bõe tɩ fo yẽ kaood f ba-biig bʋʋdo? Wall yaa bõe yĩng tɩ fo yẽ paoogd f ba-biiga? Tõnd fãa na n yalsa Wẽnnaam bʋʋd geerã taoore.
Bala, b gʋlsame tɩ: Zu-soabã yeelame tɩ b vɩɩme, tɩ rũmã fãa na n yĩgimda bãmb taoore, la tɩ zɛlma fãa na n kõo Wẽnnaam waoogre.
Woto tõnd ned kam fãa na n togsa Wẽnnaam a meng yelle.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ d da leb n kao taab bʋʋd ye. Ayo! Tʋm-y ne y tagsgã n da wa n ning kug-lakdg wall bũmb sẽn tõe n lub neda, y ba-biig taoor ye.
Mam miime, la Zu-soab a Zezi pʋgẽ, mam mii hakɩɩka, tɩ bũmb ka be n ya rẽgd a toor ye. La ned sã n tags tɩ bõn-kãngã yaa rẽgdo, dẽ a yaa rẽgd ne yẽnda.
Fo ba-biig sũur sã n sãam fo bõn-dɩtl poorẽ, ad fo ka leb n kẽnd ne nonglem ye. Da sak tɩ f bõn-dɩtl wa ne f ba-biiga, soab ning Kirist sẽn ki a yĩngã sãoong ye.
Bũmb ning sẽn ya sõama ne yãmbã ka tog n wa ne tẽn-kãnem ye.
Bala, Wẽnnaam soolmã, ka tɩ rɩ wall tɩ yũ ye, la yaa tɩrlem la bãane, la sũ-noogo, Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn kõta.
Ned ning sẽn maand Kirist tʋʋmd a woto tata Wẽnnaam yam, la nebã me wilgdame t'a sẽn maandã zemsame.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ d bao bũmb ning fãa sẽn wat ne laafɩ la ne taab bɩɩsgo.
Da sãam Wẽnnaam tʋʋmd rɩɩb yĩng ye. Sɩd-sɩdã, bũmb fãa yaa sõama rɩɩb yĩnga. La ned sã n dɩ-a n lebg kug-lakdg neb yĩnga, a yaa wẽnga.
Yaa sõama tɩ ra wãb nemdo, wall yũ rãam, wall tɩ bas n da sɩɩs bũmb ning sẽn na n yɩ kug-lakdg f ba-biig yĩnga n kɩt a lʋɩ wall a maan pãn-komsem.
Tẽeb ning fo sẽn tarã, tall-a f meng yĩng Wẽnnaam taoore. Ned sẽn geend tɩ bũmb ning yaa sõama wã sã n ka kaood a bʋʋdo, sũ-noog soab la yẽnda.
La ned sã n wa sãmbd ne bũmb ning a sẽn dɩta, a bʋʋd zoe n kaoome, tɩ bõe, ka tẽeb n kɩt t'a maan a sẽn maandã ye. La bũmb ning fãa sẽn ka tẽeb n kɩt tɩ f maan yaa yel-wẽnde.
Tõnd dãmb sẽn tar pãngã, tõnd tog n tebenda neb nins sẽn ka pãngã b pãn-komsmã pʋgẽ, la d da bao sẽn noom tõnd ye.
Bɩ tõnd ned kam fãa maan sẽn noom a to, sẽn ya sõmb wɛɛngẽ, t'a tõe n bɩ.
Bala, Kirist ka bao sẽn noom b meng ye, la a wa b sẽn gʋlsã: Tʋy nins nebã sẽn tʋʋd yãmbã lʋɩɩ mam zugu.
Mik bũmb nins b sẽn pĩnd n gʋlsã gʋlsa tõnd zãmsg yĩnga, tɩ tõnd tõe n paam saag-sõngo, sũ-mare la belsg ning Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn kõtã yĩnga.
Bɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn pid ne sũ-mar la belsgã sõng yãmb tɩ y paam tagsg a yembr taab yĩnga, wa a Zezi Kirist sẽn datã,
tɩ yãmb na kõ Wẽnnaam sẽn ya tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist ba wã waoogre, ne yam a yembre la koɛɛg a yembre.
Reeg-y taab neer wa Kirist sẽn deeg yãmbã, Wẽnnaam waoogr yĩnga.
Sɩda, mam yetame tɩ Kirist lebga zũinsã tʋmtʋmda, sẽn na yɩlg n wilg tɩ Wẽnnaam yaa sɩda, la b wilg tɩ bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n kãab b ba-rãmbã yaa sɩda.
La buud a taabã neb waoogda Wẽnnaam, b nimbãan-zoeerã yĩnga, wa b sẽn da gʋls n yeelã: Rẽnda n kɩt tɩ mam na n gom soolem dãmb sʋk n wilg tɩ m mii yãmba, la m na n yɩɩlame n waoog y yʋʋrã.
B leb n yeelame yaa: Soolem dãmbã, lagem-y Wẽnnaam nebã n maan sũ-noogo.
N le paase, soolem dãmbã fãa neba, pẽg-y Zu-soabã, la tɩ tẽms toay-toay nebã pẽg bãmba.
A Ezayi me yeelame yaa: A Izayi yagengã na n pukame. B na n yikame n soog soolem dãmbã. Soolem dãmbã neb tẽeb na n bee ne bãmba.
Bɩ Wẽnnaam, saag-sõng sẽn yit a soab nengẽ wã pid yãmb ne sũ-noog fãa la bãan fãa tẽeb pʋgẽ, tɩ saag-sõng na pid yãmba, Sɩɩg-sõng pãng yĩnga.
Sã n yaa ne yãmb yelle, m ba-biisi, mam sũur kɛɛm tɩ yãmb pida ne sõmblem, la y pid ne bãngr fãa, la y yaa neb sẽn tõe n keoog taaba.
Baoosgo, bũmb kẽer pʋgẽ, mam gʋlsa yãmb ne gãndalsem, wa m dat n kɩtame tɩ yãmb tẽeg bũmb nins y sẽn mi, la yaa Wẽnnaam sẽn maan maam neere,

n kɩt tɩ mam ya Kirist tʋmtʋmd buud a taabã sʋkã yĩnga. Mam maanda Wẽnnaam koe-noogã tʋʋmd sẽn ya tẽeb bũmbã, tɩ buud a taabã nebã na yɩ wa kũun sẽn noom Wẽnnaam, neb Wẽnnaam Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn welg toor Wẽnnaam yĩnga.

Dẽ, mam tara bʋʋm tɩ waoog m meng Kirist pʋgẽ, Wẽnnaam taoore. 18-19 Bala, mam ka na n saag n pʋd bũmb yelle, tɩ ka Kirist sẽn tũnug maam n maane, sã n yaa m goamẽ, wall m tʋʋmẽ, tɩ ne Sɩɩg-sõng pãnga, la m maan bãn sẽn tar pãnga, la ne bõn-yɛɛsdse, tɩ m tõe n sõng buud a taabã neb tɩ b sak Wẽnnaam. Yaa woto yĩnga, sẽn sɩng ne Zeruzalɛm, n gilg hal tɩ ta Iliri, mam moona Kirist koe-noogã wʋsgo.
La mam yãka yam tɩ moon koe-noog zĩis nins b sẽn zɩ n pʋd Kirist yʋʋrã ye, tɩ m da wa n me ned a to yẽbgr zug ye. La a wa b sẽn gʋls n yeelã:
Neb nins sẽn ka gom bãmb yell b sʋkã na n yãame, la neb nins sẽn dag n ka wʋm b kibarã, na n wʋma a võore.
Rẽnda n gɩdg maam naoor wʋsg tɩ mam ka wa yãmb nengẽ ye.
Moasã, mam ka leb n tar tʋʋm zĩig soolem kãens ye. La hal yʋʋm wʋsgo, mam da ratame tɩ m sã n wa n dabd Ɛspaẽ, bɩ m tũ yãmb nengẽ.
Mam maanda tẽeb tɩ m sã n wa n loogdẽ, m na yãnd-yã, la m yamleoog tɩ zĩnd ne yãmbã sã n doke, y na yãag-m n kẽng Ɛspaẽ.
Mõs-moasã wã mam dabda Zeruzalɛm, nin-sõamyã sõngr yĩnga.
Bala, Masedoan ne Akayi nebã yãka yam n lob taab ligdi n na n sõng naong rãmbã sẽn be ba-biisã sʋk Zeruzalɛmã.

Yɩɩ bãmb yam-yãkre, la yaa bũmb b sẽn da segd n maane. Bala, buud a taabã neb sã n paama pʋɩɩr ne bõn-sõamy nins sẽn be Zuif-rãmba nengẽ tẽeba wɛɛngẽ wã, bãmb me tog n sõnga Zuif-rãmbã ne b yĩngã yelle.
B sẽn maan a woto wã, mam sã n tɩ kɩs ligdã n sa, mam na n yii be n tũ yãmb nengẽ n kẽng Ɛspaẽ.
Mam miime tɩ m sã n wa wat yãmb nengẽ, yaa ne Kirist barkã la m na n wa.
M ba-biisi, mam sagenda yãmb ne tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi yʋʋre, la ne nonglem Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn kõtã, tɩ y naag ne maam n zabe, y sẽn na n pʋʋs mam yĩnga,
tɩ mam tõe n paam yolsg ne ka-tẽeb rãmb sẽn be Zude wã, la tɩ nin-sõamy wã na reeg kũunã mam sẽn tar n kẽnd Zeruzalɛmã sõama.
Woto, sã n ta Wẽnnaam yam, mam na n taa yãmb nengẽ ne sũ-noogo, la mam na n paama vʋʋsem bilf yãmb sʋka.
Bɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn so laafɩ wã zĩnd ne yãmb fãa. Ãmina!
Mam tʋmda d ba-bi-poak a Feebe yãmb nengẽ. A yaa Sãnkre wẽnd-doogã yel-gɛt poaka.
Reeg-y-yã-a Zu-soaba pʋgẽ, wa sẽn zems nin-sõamy maanego. Bũmb sã n wa n beẽ fãa t'a rat yãmb sõngre, bɩ a paam yãmba, bala, a sõnga neb wʋsgo, la a sõnga maam me.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Piriska ne a Akilas sẽn ya mam tʋmd-n-taas a Zezi Kirist tũudmã pʋgẽ wã.
B gẽnega b yõor n na n fãag maam. Ka maam n yen n bal n pʋʋsd-b bark ye, buud a taabã wẽnd-dotã fãa me pʋʋsd-b lame.
Pʋʋs-y nin-tũusds nins sẽn be bãmb zakẽ wã me. Pʋʋs-y m zo-nongr a Epayinet sẽn ya Azi soolmã dẽenem biis Kirist yĩnga.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Maari sẽn nams a meng wʋsg yãmb yĩngã.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Andronikus ne a Zunyas sẽn ya mam ba-rãmba la m zĩnd-n-taas bi-bees roogẽ. B yaa neb tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn nong wʋsgo, la b pʋs n denga maam n lebg Kirist neba.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Ampiliyatus sẽn ya mam zo-nongr Zu-soabã pʋgẽ wã.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Yʋrbẽ sẽn ya tõnd tʋmd-n-taag Kirist pʋgẽ, la y pʋʋs m zo-nongr a Ɛstakis.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Apelɛs, sẽn modg Kirist tũudmã pʋgẽ wã. Pʋʋs-y-yã a Aristobul zaka rãmba.
Pʋʋs-y m saam-biig a Herodyõ. Pʋʋs-y neb nins sẽn be a Narsis yirã n be Zu-soabã pʋgẽ wã.
Pʋʋs-yã a Tirfɛn ne a Tɩrfoz, tɩ b yaa pagb sẽn modgd b mens Zu-soabã yĩnga. Pʋʋs-y d zo-nongr a Pɛrsid sẽn modgd a meng wʋsg Zu-soabã yĩnga.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Rufus sẽn ya nin-yãkdg Zu-soabã pʋgẽ, la y pʋʋs a ma sẽn ya mam me ma wã.
Pʋʋs-y-yã a Asẽnkirt, ne a Felgõ, ne a Hɛrmes, ne a Patrobas, ne a Hɛrmas ne ba-biis nins sẽn be ne bãmbã.
Pʋʋs-y-yã Filolog ne a Zuli, a Neere ne a ma-bi-poakã, la a Olẽmpas ne nin-sõamy nins fãa sẽn be ne bãmbã.
Pʋʋs-y taab ne mok-sõngo. Kirist Wẽnd-dotã fãa toonda yãmb pʋʋsem.
M ba-biisi, mam sagenda yãmb tɩ y gũus ne neb nins sẽn wat ne welgre la bõn-lakdse, tɩ kɩɩsd zãmsg ning yãmb sẽn paamã. Zãag-y y meng ne-ba.
Bala, neb a woto ka tʋmd tõnd Zu-soabã, Kirist yĩng ye, yaa b mens pʋs yĩnga. B belsda neb nins sẽn ka yamã ne gom noodo la ne pẽgre.
Sã n yaa ne yãmba, neba fãa mii yãmb sakrã yelle. Mam sũur nooma ne yãmb yellã, la mam nongame tɩ yãmb bãng yam ne bũmb nins sẽn ya sõama, la y yɩ yɩlma n da maand wẽng ye.
Bilf sã n paase, Wẽnnaam na n luba a Sʋtãan tɩ yãmb tab-a ne y nao wã. Bɩ tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi barkã zĩnd ne yãmba.
Mam tʋmd-n-taag a Tɩmote ne a Lusiyus la a Zazõ la Sozipatɛɛr sẽn ya m saam-biisã pʋʋsda yãmba.
Maam a Tɛrtiyus, sẽn gʋls seb-kãngã Zu-soaba pʋgẽ wã pʋʋsda yãmba.
Mam gãag-soab a Gayus sẽn ya Wẽnd-do-tõrã gãag-soabã pʋʋsda yãmba. A Erast sẽn ya tẽngã ligd gũudã pʋʋsda yãmba. D ba-biig a Kartus me pʋʋsda yãmba.
Bɩ tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist barkã zĩnd ne yãmb fãa. Ãmina.

Bɩ soab ning sẽn tar-a pãn-tõog tɩ kɩt tɩ yãmb yals kãenkãe wa koe-noogã mam sẽn moondã sẽn yetã, wa sẽn zemsd ne yel-solemdã pukri, yel-solemd ning sẽn dag n solg hal sɩngr wẽndẽ wã.
La moasã, Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã sɛb puk-a-la wa Wẽnnaam sẽn ka sɩngr kõn zĩnd saabã sẽn yeelã, n wilg soolem dãmba fãa nebã, tɩ b tõe n sak tẽebã.
Bɩ Wẽnnaam, sẽn ya b yen tãa n ya yam soabã soog ziiri, wakat fãa, a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga. Ãmina!
Maam a Polle, sẽn paam-a boolg tɩ yɩ Kirist Zezi tẽn-tʋmda, wa sẽn zems ne Wẽnnaam daabã, ne ba-biig a Sostɛn n gʋlsd seb kãngã,

n na n tʋm Wẽnnaam tẽedbã sẽn be Korẽntã. Bãmb yaa neb sẽn welg toor Kirist maasem yĩnga, tɩ b tõe n yɩ pʋ-peelem dãmba. Sebrã yaa neb nins fãa sẽn pʋʋsd ne tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist yʋʋre, baa b sẽn be zĩig ninga yĩnga. A Zezi Kirist yaa bãmb Zu-soaba, la tõnd me Zu-soaba.
Bɩ tõnd ba a Wẽnnaam ne Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist ning yãmb zut barka, la b kõ yãmb laafɩ.
Mam sã n tagsd yãmb yelle, mam pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam bark wakat fãa, b sẽn ning yãmb zut bark Kirist Zezi pʋgẽ wã yĩnga.
Tɩ yãmb paam bũmb fãa wʋsgo, sã n yaa goama wall bãngr fãa.
Bala, Kirist kasetã kɩɩ yẽg yãmb pʋgẽ sõama.
Woto, yãmb sẽn gũud tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi pukrã, kũun baa a yen ka paoog yãmb ye.
Bãmb na n kɩtame tɩ y yals kãenkãe a woto hal tɩ wakat ta, tɩ rõadg kõn zĩnd yãmb zut tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist daarã ye.
Wẽnnaam, sẽn bool-a yãmb tɩ y paam lagem-n-taar ne bãmb Bi-ribl a Zezi Kirist sẽn ya tõnd fãagdã, bãmb yaa maan-sɩd soaba.
M ba-biisi, mam bõosda yãmb ne tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist yʋʋre, tɩ y kɩt tɩ y goama tũud taaba, tɩ welgr da zĩnd yãmb sʋk ye. Zems-y taab sõama ne yam a yembre, tagsg a yembr pʋgẽ.
Bala, m ba-biisi, a Kolowe nebã wilga maam tɩ ka-wʋm-taab n be yãmb sʋka.
Mam wʋmdame tɩ yãmb ned fãa yetame tɩ yẽ yaa a Poll neda, wall a Apolos neda, wall a Sefas neda, wall Kirist neda.
Kirist welgame laa? Dẽ, b kaa a Poll da-pɩk zug yãmb yĩng laa? Bɩ yaa ne a Poll yʋʋr la yãmb paam lisgu?
Mam pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam barka, mam sẽn ka lis yãmb ned baa a yembre, sã n ka a Kirispus la a Gayusã.
Woto, ned baa a yembr ka tõe n yeel tɩ b lisa yãmb ne mam yʋʋr ye.
Mam lisa a Stefanas zaka rãmba, la mam ka mi m sã n lisa ned a to me ye.
Bala, Kirist ka tʋm maam tɩ m kẽng n lis neb ye, la yaa tɩ moon koe-noogã. Ka tɩ moon-a ne gom-minim, tɩ m ra wa n kɩt tɩ Kirist ra-pɩkã lebg bõn-yaalg ye.
Bala, da-pɩkã koɛɛgã yaa yalemd ne neb nins sẽn sãamd-bã la ne tõnd dãmb sẽn paam fãagrã, a yaa pãng sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
Rẽnda n kɩt tɩ b gʋls n yeele: Mam na n sãama yam dãmba yam, la m kɩt tɩ neb nins sẽn tar bãngr lebg zaalem.
Yam soabã bee yɛ? Tõog karen-saambã bee yɛɛne? Zamaan kãngã nokoɛɛm wẽedã bee yɛ? Dẽ yĩnga, Wẽnnaam ka kɩt tɩ dũni yam lebg yalemd sɩda?
Bala, dũni wã sẽn ka tũnug Wẽnnaam yamã n bãng bãmbã, a meng yama pʋgẽ wã yĩnga, a taa Wẽnnaam yam tɩ tall koe-moonegã yalemda n fãag neb nins sẽn tẽedã.
Zuif-rãmbã kotame tɩ b maan bõn-bãna, tɩ Gɛrk-rãmbã baood yam.
La tõnd moonda Kirist ning b sẽn ka da-pɩk zugã. Koe-kãng yaool n yaa bõn-lakdg ne Zuif-rãmbã, la a ya yalemd ne buud a taabã.
La sã n yaa ne neb nins sẽn paam-b boolgã, tɩ b yaa Zuif tɩ b yaa Gɛrke, koɛɛgã yaa pãng sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ, yam sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
Bala, bũmb ning sẽn ya yalemd ne Wẽnnaamã yaa yam n yɩɩd ninsaalbã, la bũmb ning sẽn ya pãn-komsem ne Wẽnnaam tara pãng n yɩɩd ninsaalbã.
M ba-biisi, ges-y yãmb sẽn dag n ya bũmb nins wakat ning b sẽn bool yãmba, sẽn ya-b yam dãmb wa neb sẽn yetã ka waoog yãmb sʋk ye. Pãng rãmb ka waooga, naam roog neb me ka waooga.
La Wẽnnaam yãka dũni bũmb nins sẽn ya yalemdã n na n ning yam dãmb yãnde. Wẽnnaam yãka dũni bũmb nins sẽn ya pãn-komsmã n na n ning pãens rãmbã yãnde.
Wẽnnaam dɩka dũni bũmb nins sẽn ka yõodã, bũmb nins nebã sẽn ka nandã, bũmb nins sẽn ka be wa, n na n kɩt tɩ sẽn be-bã lebg zaalem,
tɩ ned baa a yen da waoog a meng Wẽnnaam taoor ye.
Yaool n yaa Wẽnnaam n kɩt tɩ yãmb be Kirist Zezi pʋgẽ, Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ Kirist lebg tõnd yam, la d tɩrlem, la d welg-toore, la d fãagre,
t'a wa b sẽn gʋlsã: Bɩ ned ning sẽn waoogd a menga, waoog a meng Zu-soabã pʋgẽ.
M ba-biisi, sã n ya ne maam, mam sẽn wa n wa yãmb nengẽ wã, ka ne gom-minim wall yam yɩɩdem la mam wa n na n moon koɛɛg n kɩs Wẽnnaam kaset ye.
Bala, mam ka tags tɩ yaa sõama tɩ mam bãng bũmb a to yãmb sʋkã tɩ sã n ka a Zezi Kirist, soab ning b sẽn ka da-pɩk zugã ye.
Mam sẽn dag n be yãmb nengẽ wã, mam mengã dag n bee pãn-komsem pʋgẽ tɩ dabeem la rigb wʋsg dag n tar maam.
Mam goama ne m koe-moonegã ka yɩ ne yam goam sẽn na kɩt tɩ ned tẽ ye, la yɩɩ ne Sɩɩgã tʋʋma la a pãnga.
Tɩ yãmb tẽebã da wa n yẽbg ninsaalb yam zug ye, la yɩ Wẽnnaam pãngã zugu.
Yaool n yaa yam la tõnd moond neb nins sẽn zems zãngã sʋka. Ka dũni kãngã yam, wall dũni kãngã nanams yam ye. Wẽnnaam na n kɩtame tɩ bõn-kãens fãa ka zĩnd pãng ye.
Tõnd moonda Wẽnnaam yam sẽn ya yel-solemde la sẽn solge, tɩ Wẽnnaam pĩnd n segl hal sẽn deng zamaan sɩngre, tõnd waoogr yĩnga.
Dũni kãngã naab baa a yen ka bãng yam kãng ye, bala, b sã n dag n bãngẽ-yã-a, b dag n kõn ka tõnd Zu-soab sẽn so ziirã da-pɩk zug ye.

La yaa wa b sẽn gʋlsã: Bũmb ned nif sẽn nan ka yã ye, bũmb ned tʋbr sẽn nan ka wʋm ye. La bũmb sẽn nan ka wa ninsaal tagsgẽ ye, bũmb ning fãa Wẽnnaam sẽn segl neb nins sẽn nong bãmbã yĩnga.
Wẽnnaam vẽnega yam kãng ne tõndo, Sɩɩg-sõng maasem yĩnga. Bala, Sɩɩgã feesda bũmb fãa, baa ne bũmb nins sẽn solg hal Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ.
Dẽ wã, ãnna n be ninsaalb sʋk n mi ninsaal yelle, tɩ ka ninsaal sɩɩg sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã? Woto me, ned baa a yen ka mi Wẽnnaam yelle, sã n ka Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã ye.
Tõnd yaool n ka deeg dũni sɩɩg ye, la yaa Sɩɩg sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ, tɩ tõnd tõe n bãng bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ tõndo, b nimbãan-zoeerã yĩnga.
Tõnd sẽn gomd bõn-kãens yellã, ka ne goam sẽn yit ninsaal yam pʋgẽ ye, la yaa ne goam Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã sẽn kõta, n dɩkd yɛl sẽn ya sɩɩg yɛl n bilgd neb sẽn tagsd sɩɩg yɛlã yelle.

La ninsaal sẽn ya yĩng neongã ka tõe n deeg bũmb nins sẽn yit Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã nengẽ wã ye, bala, b yaa yalemd ne yẽnda. La a ka tõe n bãng-b ye, bala, yaa ne Sɩɩg-sõngã la ned tagsd b yelle.
La ned ning sẽn tagsd sɩɩgã yɛlã, yẽnda yẽ tagsda bũmb fãa yelle, la ned baa a yen ka bʋʋd yẽnda bʋʋd ye.
Sɩd me, ãnna soab n bãng Zu-soabã tagsg n na n sagl-ba? La ne tõndo, tõnd tara Kirist tagsgo.
Sã n ya ne maam, m ba-biisi, mam ka tõog n gom ne yãmb wa neb sẽn tagsd sɩɩgã yell ye, la yaa wa ne neb sẽn vɩ yĩng sakr pʋgẽ, wall kom-bõoneg Kirist pʋgẽ.
Mam ka kõ yãmb rɩ-taok ye, yaa bĩisim, bala, yãmb pʋgã da ka tõe rɩ-taok ye. La baa ne moasã me, yãmb pʋsã ket n ka tõe-a ye, bala, yãmb ket n tũuda yĩngã ratem.
Sũ-kiirã ne ka-wʋmd-taabã sẽn be yãmb sʋkã, dẽ yĩnga, yãmb ka neb sẽn sakd yĩngã ratem, la y kẽnd wa ninsaal sẽn maandã sɩda?
Ned a yen sã n yeel tɩ yẽ yaa a Poll karen-biiga, tɩ ned a to yeel tɩ yẽ yaa a Apolos karen-biiga,
ka ninsaalemd la rẽnda sɩda? A Apolos yaa bõe, t'a Poll ya bõe? Bãmb yaa tʋmtʋmdb bal Wẽnnaam sẽn tall n kɩt tɩ yãmb tẽ a Zezi, n zems ne Zu-soabã sẽn tees yãmb a soaba.
Maam n sele, t'a Apolos zãgs koom, la yaa Wẽnnaam n kɩtd tɩ koodã bɩtẽ.
Woto, ka ned ning sẽn sel-a wã la bũmb ye. Ka ned ning sẽn zãgs-a koomã me n ya bũmb ye. Yaa Wẽnnaam, soab ning sẽn kɩtd-a tɩ koodã bɩtẽ wã n ya bũmbu.
Ned ning sẽn sel-a wã, la ned ning sẽn zãgs-a koomã yaa yembr bala, la ned fãa na n deega a keoor wa zems a tʋʋmde.
Bala, tõnd yaa tʋmd-n-taas ne Wẽnnaam. Yaa yãmb la Wẽnnaam Pʋʋgo, Wẽnnaam roogo.
Wẽnnaam nimbãan-zoeerã b sẽn maana yĩnga, mam yẽbga roogã wa tãn-met sẽn tar yam, la ned a to waa n mee yẽbgrã zugu. La bɩ ned fãa gũus ne a sẽn met to-to yẽbgrã zugã.
Bala, ned baa a yen ka tõe n yẽbg yẽbgr a to tɩ ka sẽn be-a wã ye, sẽn dat n togs t'a Zezi Kirist bala.
La ned sã n me yẽbg-kãng zug ne sãnem, wall wanzuri, wall kug buud sẽn be yõodo, wall raoogo, wall yamdo, wall moodo, ned fãa tʋʋmd na n pukame.
Bala, daarã na n kɩtame tɩ b bãng-a. Tɩ bõe bugmẽ la ned fãa Tʋʋmd na n puki, la bugmã na n maka ned fãa tʋʋmd n ges a sẽn ya ne bũmb ninga.
Bugmã sã n ka rɩ tʋʋmd ned sẽn maan yẽbg-kãng zugã, sẽn tʋm-a wã na paam keoore.
La bugmã sã n dɩ tʋʋmd ning ned sẽn maane, na n yɩɩ bõn ne a soaba. Soab kãng na n paama fãagre, la a na yɩɩ wa ned sẽn pɩʋʋg bugum n põse.
Yãmb zɩ tɩ yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam roogo, la tɩ Wẽnnaam sɩɩgã bee yãmb pʋgẽ laa?
Ned sã n sãam Wẽnnaam doogã, Wẽnnaam na n sãam a soaba. Bala, Wẽnnaam doogã welga toore, la yaa yãmb la ro-kãnga.
Bɩ ned da belg a meng ye. Ned yãmb sʋkã sã n tagsd t'a tara dũni yam, bɩ a lebg yalma, t'a tõe n lebg yam soaba.
Bala, dũni yam yaa yalemd wẽnnaam taoore. Dẽ n kɩt tɩ b gʋls n yeel tɩ: Wẽnnaam yõkda yam dãmbã b sɩlmẽ wã.
B leb n gʋlsame n yeel tɩ: Zu-soabã mii yam dãmba sẽn tagsd n lebd zĩig ninga, n miẽ tɩ b tagsgã yaa zaalem bala.
Dẽ, bɩ ned baa a yen da teeg ned n na n bao waoogr ye. Bala, bũmba fãa yaa yãmb dẽnda.
A Poll woo, a Apolos woo, a Sefas woo, dũni wã woo, vɩɩma woo, kũuma woo, bũmb nins sẽn be moasã wã woo, bũmb nins sẽn wat taoorã woo, fãa yaa yãmb dẽnda.
Tɩ yãmb ya Kirist rẽnda, tɩ Kirist ya Wẽnnaam dẽnda.
Woto yĩnga, ges-y tõnd wa Kirist tʋmtʋmdba, Wẽnnaam sẽn ning b yel-soalmã yell b nusẽ.
B sẽn dat bũmb ning yel-gɛtb nengẽ bala, yaa tɩ b yã tɩ b maanda sɩd ne b tʋʋmde.
Ne maam, ka yell ne maam tɩ yãmba, wall dũni bʋ-kaoodb bʋ mam bʋʋd ye. Mam me ka kaood n meng bʋʋd ye, bala, bũmb ka zɩsg mam sũurã ye.
La ka rẽnda yĩng la mam zemsɩ ye. Sẽn kaood-a mam bʋʋd yaa Zu-soabã.

Woto yĩnga, da kao-y bũmb baa fɩ bʋʋd tɩ wakatã nan ka ta ye, tɩ Zu-soabã waoong nan ka ta ye. Bãmb sã n wa, b na n puka bũmb ning sẽn solg lik pʋgẽ wã, la b na n kɩtame tɩ bũmb nins nebã sẽn dag n saag b sũyã pʋsẽ wã pugsi. Wakat kãnga, Wẽnnaam n na n pẽg ned kam fãa.

M ba-biisi, mam dɩka mams kãens n bilg maam ne a Apolos yellã, yãmb wʋmb yĩnga. Woto, tõnd yĩnga, yãmb na zãms n bãnge, n da wa n maan tɩ yõsg bũmb ning sẽn gʋlsã ye, la yãmb ned baa a yen ka na n tong ned a yen poore, n wa waoog a menga, n paoog ned a to wã ye.
Bala, bõe n welgd foo ne f taabã? Bõe la fo tar tɩ ka ned n kõ foom? La sã n yaa tɩ yaa ned n kõ foom, bõe tɩ f waoogd f meng wa f ka reeg-a ned nengẽ?
Yãmb zoee n tɩgame, yãmb zoee n yaa arzegs rãmba, yãmb sɩngame n dɩt naam tɩ tõnd kaẽ ye. Wẽnd na kɩt tɩ y sɩd rɩ naam, tɩ tõnd me tõe n naag yãmb n dɩ naamã.

Bala, mam tẽedame tɩ Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ tõnd sẽn ya tʋmtʋmdba yɩ neba fãa zʋʋre, la neb bʋʋd sẽn kao tɩ b zems kũum, b sẽn kɩt tɩ tõnd lebg bõn-gets dũni rãmb yĩnga, la malegs yĩnga, la ninsaalb yĩngã yĩnga.
