Kirist yĩnga, tõnd yaa yalemba, la yãmb yaa yam dãmb Kirist pʋgẽ, tõnd yaa pãn-komsem dãmba, la yãmb tara pãnga. Yãmb bee waoogre, la tõnd paamda paoogre.
Hal tɩ ta moasã, kom la ko-yũudu, la naongo, la pãbre, la yeebg tara tõndo.
Tõnd tʋmda ne d nus n yaadẽ. Nebã tʋʋda tõndo, la tõnd ningd-b la barka. Neb namsda tõndo, la tõnd sakda rẽnda.
Hal tɩ ta moasã neb kãnegda tõndo, la tõnd belsda neba. Tõnd lebga wa sagd dũni neb nifẽ, ned baa a yen sẽn ka rata.
Mam ka gʋlsd yãmb yõwã n na n ning yãmb yãnd ye. Mam keoogda yãmba, yãmb sẽn ya m kom-nongdsã yĩnga.
Sɩd me, ba yãmb sã n paam tɛtb tus piig Kirist pʋgẽ, yãmb ka tar ba-rãmb wʋsg ye. Bala, yaa maam n dog yãmb Kirist Zezi pʋgẽ, koe-noogã maasem yĩnga.
Woto yĩnga, mam sagenda yãmba: Yɩ-y mam togs-n-taase.

Bõn-kãng yĩnga, mam tʋma m bi-nongr a Tɩmote sẽn maand sɩd Zu-soabã pʋgẽ wã yãmb nengẽ. Yẽ na n tẽega yãmb so-tũuds nins sẽn be Kirist pʋgẽ tɩ mam zãmsd nebã, zĩig fãa, wẽnd-dota fãa pʋsã.
Neb kẽer wuka b mense, wa mam sã n da ka tog n wa yãmb nengẽ ye.
La sã n taa Zu-soabã raabo, bilf sã n paase, mam na n waa yãmb nengẽ. Mam na n gesa wuk-m-mens rãmb kãens pãnga, la ka b goama yell ye.
Bala, Wẽnnaam soolma ka goam ye, la yaa pãnga.
Bõe la y rata? Y ratame tɩ m wa y nengẽ ne sãbsg bii, bɩ ne nonglem la ne sũ-bʋgsem yam?

Wakat fãa, d wʋmdame tɩ b gomd dẽgd sẽn maand yãmb sʋkã yelle. Tʋʋm-dẽgd ning sẽn maand yãmb sʋkã, ned pʋs n pa yãt a buud bu-zemsã meng sʋk ye. Yaa woto hal tɩ baa yãmb ned a yembr tara a ba paga.
Tɩ yãmb yaool n wuk y mense. Yãmb ka maan sũ-sãoong wa kũum yĩnga, tɩ b tõe n yiis ned ning sẽn maan a woto wã yãmb sʋk ye.
Sã yaa ne maam, baa mam yĩngã sẽn ka be be ne yãmbã, la yaa m tagsgã n be ne yãmbã, mam zoee n kaoo ned ning sẽn maan-a yell kãngã wã bʋʋdo, wa m sã n da bee be.
Bala, Zu-soab a Zezi yʋʋrã yĩnga, yãmb ne mam tagsgã naaga taaba, ne tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi pãnga.
Bɩ b bas ned a woto a Sʋtãan nugẽ, t'a yĩngã na sãame, t'a sɩɩgã na paam fãagr Zu-soab a Zezi daarã.
Bũmb ning yãmb sẽn dɩkd n waoogd y mensã ka neer ye. Yãmb ka mi tɩ rã-bɩll bilf bal kɩtedame tɩ zom-nagd tõr wuk laa?
Yiis-y rã-bɩl-kʋdgã n bas y mens n lebg yɩlma, tɩ y tõe n yɩ zom-nagd-paalga, rã-bɩll sẽn ka be yãmb pʋgẽ wã yĩnga. Bala, b kʋʋ Kirist sẽn ya tõnd zʋʋg-n-basã maoongo.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ d maan kibsã, la da yɩ ne rã-bɩl-kʋdgo, wall ne zãmb la pʋ-toog rã-bɩll ye. Bɩ yɩ ne pʋ-peelem la sɩd bur sẽn ka rã-bɩlle.
Mam gʋlsa yãmb m sebrã pʋgẽ n yeel-y tɩ y da paam lagem-n-taar ne tʋʋm-dẽgd maandbã ye.

M ka yet tɩ y lak y mens zãng fasɩ ne dũni kãnga tʋʋm-dẽgd maandbã, wall ne yão-be-nebã, la kãag n kõ m meng rãmba, wall wẽnd-naands pʋʋsdbã ye. Sã n yaa rẽ, na n yɩ tɩlɛ tɩ y yi n bas dũni.

Mam sẽn gʋls yãmb bũmb ning moasã n yetẽ wã, yaa tɩ y ra paam lagem-n-taar ne ned ning sẽn yet t'a yaa yãmb ba-biiga, n yaool n maand tʋʋm-dẽgdo, wall a ya yão-be-neda, wall wẽnd-naands pʋʋsda, wall nin-tʋʋda, wall ned neng sẽn yilimd ne rãam, wall kãag n kõ m meng soab ye. Bɩ y pʋs n da naag ned a woto n dɩ ye.
Bõe tɩ m na n kao kɛɛng neb bʋʋdo? Ka neb nins sẽn be ne yãmbã bʋʋd la yãmb kaood sɩda?
Wẽnnaam n na n kao kɛɛng nebã bʋʋdo. Gʋls-sõmyã yetame tɩ: Dig-y nin-wẽngã n yiis y sʋka.
Yãmb ned sã n tar yell ne ned a to, a saagd n kẽnda neb nins sẽn ka sakd Wẽnnaama nengẽ n bʋ-ne-a bii, bɩ yaa tẽedbã nengẽ?
Yãmb ka mi tɩ nin-sõamy wã na n kaoo dũni bʋʋd laa? La sã n yaa tɩ yaa yãmb n na n kao dũni wã bʋʋdo, dẽ yĩnga, yaa paoogr ne yãmb tɩ kao yɛl sẽn ka a woto bʋʋd sɩda?
Yãmb ka mi tɩ tõnd na n kaoo malegsã bʋʋd laa? Bõe tɩ tõnd ka na n kao vɩ-kãngã yɛlã bʋʋdo?
Yãmb sã n yaool n tar yɛl ne taab vɩ-kãngã yɛl poorẽ, yaa neb nins wẽnd-doogã sẽn ka gomd b yellã la yãmb kɩted tɩ b kao bʋʋdã.
Mam yeta woto n na n ning yãmb yãnde. Dẽ, ned ba yen ka be yãmb sʋkã n tar yam n tõe n bʋ yɛl nins sẽn be a ba-biisã sʋkã bʋʋd wɛ?
Ba-biig bʋʋda ne ba-biig a to neb sẽn ka tẽedb taoore.
Yãmb sẽn bʋʋd ne taabã zoe n yaa kongr yãmb yĩnga. Bõe tɩ yell sã n ka zemse, yãmb ka yõkd y mens n tʋk-a? Bõe tɩ yãmb ka basd bal tɩ b dɩk bũmb yãmb sẽn so?
Yaa yãmb n maand sẽn ka zemse, la y fãad neb a taaba, la yaa yãmb ba-biisi.
Yãmb zɩ tɩ neb nins sẽn maand sẽn ka zemsã ka na n paam Wẽnnaam soolem wa b rogem-pʋɩɩr laa? Da belg-y y mens ye. Tʋʋm-dẽgd maandbã, wẽn-naands pʋʋsdbã, nin-yoaadbã,
wẽng maandbã, raopã wall pagb sẽ gãe taabã, wagda wã, yão-beed dãmba, sẽn yũud-b rãam n tũubdẽ wã, nin-tʋʋdbã, fãadbã, baa a yen kõn paam Wẽnnaam soolma wa a dogem-pʋɩɩr ye.

Yãmb neb kẽer yaool n dag n yaa a woto. La yãmb paama pekre, b kɩtame tɩ yãmb lebg sõama, b kɩtame tɩ yãmb zemse, tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist yʋʋrã maasem yĩnga, la ne tõnd Wẽnnaamã Sɩɩg pãnga.
Mam tara noor tɩ maan bũmb fãa, la ka bũmba fãa n be yõod ye. Mam tara noor tɩ maan bũmb fãa, la mam ka na n sak n kẽ bũmb baa a yembr yemdẽ ye.
Rɩɩb yaa pʋg yĩnga, la pʋg yaa rɩɩb yĩnga. La Wẽnnaam na n sãama b yiiba fãa. Yĩngã ka tʋʋm-dẽgd yĩng ye, a yaa Zu-soabã yĩnga, la Zu-soabã yaa yĩngã yĩnga.
Wẽnnaam, sẽn vʋʋg-a Zu-soabã na n vʋʋga tõnd me ne b meng pãngã.
Yãmb zɩ tɩ yãmb yĩnga yaa Kirist will laa? Dẽ wã, mam na n dɩka Kirist wilã n kɩt tɩ lebg pʋg-yoodr willi?
Nokoeemd ka be tɩ yaa ayo ye. Yãmb zɩ tɩ ned sẽn lagem ne pʋg-yoodr lebga yĩng a yembr ne-a laa? Bala, b yeelame tɩ: Bãmb b yiibã na n lebga yĩng a yembre.
La ned ning sẽn loe ne Zu-soabã lebgda sɩɩg a yembr ne bãmba.
Zoe-y yoobo. Yel-wẽnd a to ninsaal sẽn maand ka be a yĩngã pʋgẽ ye. La ned ning sẽn maand yoob beegda a meng yĩnga.
Yãmb zɩ tɩ yãmb yĩnga yaa Sɩɩg-sõng roogo, Sɩɩg-sõng yãmb sẽn deeg Wẽnnaam nengẽ, la tɩ yãmb ka leb n so y meng laa?
Bala, b lebs n daa yãmb toogo. Woto yĩnga, waoog-y Wẽnnaam ne y yĩngã la ne Sɩɩgã sẽn ya Wẽnnaam dẽndã.
Ne bũmb ning yãmb sẽn gʋls maam n gom a yellã, yaa sõama rao yĩng t'a ra sɩɩs pag ye.
La sẽn na yɩl tɩ ned ra maan yoobo, bɩ ned fãa paam a paga, tɩ pag fãa paam a sɩda.
Bɩ sɩdã kɩs pagã bũmb ning a sẽn tog n kis-a wã, la tɩ pagã me maan a woto ne a sɩdã.
Pag ka tar noor ne a mengã yĩng ye, yaa a sɩdã n tar noor ne. Rao wã me ka tar noor ne a mengã yĩng ye, yaa a pagã.

Bɩ ned fãa ra mong a to, sã n ka tɩ y zemsa taab noore, wakat bilf yĩnga, tɩ y tõe n paam weer n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam. Rẽ sã n loog bɩ y leb n bao taaba, t'a Sʋtãan da wa n mak yãmba, y sẽn ka tõe y meng yĩng ye.
Mam sẽn yet woto wã, ka tõog ye, yaa sore.
Mam datẽ lame tɩ raopã fãa yɩẽ wa maam. La ned fãa deegda a kũun Wẽnnaam nengẽ, t'a zagl rẽnd ya woto, t'a zagl me rẽnd ya bũmb a to.
Sã n ya neb nins sẽn ka yi kãadmã, la pʋgkõapã, mam yet-b lame tɩ b sã n kell n pa wa mam sẽn yaa a soabã, yaa sõama.
La b sã n ka tõe b mense, bɩ b kẽ kãadem. Bala, b sã n kẽ kãadmã n são b sẽn na n kẽnd tɩ wusdẽ.
La neb nins sẽn kẽ kãadmã, mam yet-b lame (la ka maam n yet-b ye, yaa Zu-soabã) tɩ pag da yi n bas a sɩd ye.
La a sã n yi n bas-a, bɩ a kell n zĩnd a yembre, wall a maneg a yell ne-a.
La neb a taabã, m yet-b lame, ka Zu-soabã ye: D ba-biig sã n tar pag t'a ka tẽeda, n yaool n sak n na n zĩnd ne yẽnda, bɩ a ra rig-a ye.
La pag sã n tar sɩd t'a ka tẽeda, n yaool n sak n na n zĩnd ne yẽnda, bɩ a da rig-a ye.

Bala, pagã kɩtame t'a sɩdã sẽn ka tẽedã lebg nin-sõngo, la d ba-bi-raoogã me kɩtedame t'a pagã sẽn ka tẽedã lebg nin-sõngo. Sã n ka rẽ, yãmb kambã na n yɩɩ bõn-dẽgdo, tɩ b yaool n ya nin-sõamyã.
Sẽn ka tẽed-a wã sã n welge, bɩ a welge. Sã n yɩ a woto, bũmb ka loet ba-bi-raoogã bɩ ba-bi-poakã ne a to wã ye. Wẽnnaam boola tõnd tɩ d vɩɩmd laafɩ pʋgẽ.
Sɩd me, paga, fo na n yɩɩ wãn n bãng f sã n na n fãaga f sɩda? Walla, sɩda, fo na n yɩɩ wãn n bãng f sã n na n fãaga f pagã?.
Sẽn be bala, bɩ ned fãa kẽn wa pʋɩɩr ning Wẽnnaam sẽn pʋɩ n kõ-a wã, la wa boolg ning a sẽn paam Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã. Yaa woto la mam yet wẽnd-dotã fãa pʋgẽ tɩ b maane.
Wẽnnaam sẽn wa n bool yãmbã, sã n mikame tɩ y rag n ya zũnga, bɩ y kell n yɩ zũnga. La sã n yaa tɩ y rag n yaa moaaga, bɩ y ra kɩt tɩ b kẽes-y bãong ye.
Bãong kõom ka fɩ, la moonem me ka fɩ. Yaa Wẽnnaam noyã sakr la b geenda.
Bɩ ned fãa kell n pa wa a sẽn da ya to-to wakat ning a sẽn paam boolgã.
Wẽnnaam sẽn wa n bool foomã, rẽ tɩ f yaa yamba? Da maan yɩɩr ye. La f sã n tõe n paam lohorem, da bas tɩ loog ye.
Bala, yamb ning sẽn paam boolg Zu-soaba pʋgẽ, a lebga Zu-soaba burkĩna. Woto me, burkĩn ning b sẽn boolã yaa Kirist yamba.
B lebs n daa yãmb toogo. Bɩ y da le lebg ninsaalb yems ye.
M ba-biisi, bɩ ned kam fãa kell n pa n sẽn dag n ya to-to wakat ning b sẽn bool-a wã.
Sã n yaa ne pa-kuil-n-dãmba yelle, mam ka tar sẽn yit Zu-soabã nengẽ ye. Maam, ned Wẽnnaam sẽn kɩt t'a maand sɩd bãmb nimbãan-zoeerã yĩngã n wilgd m tagsgo.
Yɛl nins sẽn be moasã wã yĩnga, ad bũmb ning mam sẽn tẽed tɩ yaa sõama: Yaa sõama tɩ rao kell n yɩ a woto.
Fo tara paga? Da bao tɩ welg ne-a ye. Fo ka tar paga? Da bao pag ye.
Fo sã n yi kãadem, kõn yɩ yel-wẽnd ye. Pa-kuil sã n yi kãadem, kõn yɩ yel-wẽnd ye. La nin-bãmb na n paama sũ-sãamse, mam yaool n baooda yãmb sõngre.
M ba-biisi, (ad bũmb ning m sẽn yeta), mam yetame yaa: Weerã yaa koɛɛga. Sẽn sɩng ne moasã, bɩ neb nins sẽn tar pagbã yɩ wa neb sẽn ka tar pagba,
tɩ neb nins sẽn yãbd yɩ wa neb sẽn ka yãbdã, tɩ neb nins sẽn maand sũ-noogã yɩ wa neb sẽn ka maand sũ-noog ye, tɩ neb nins sẽn daad yɩ wa neb sẽn ka tar ye.
La tɩ neb nins sẽn zaeegd ne dũni wã yɩ wa b sẽn sɩd ka zaeegd ne-a. Bala, dũni kãnga sẽn ya to-to wã loogdame.
Mam yaool n datame tɩ yãmb yɩ neb sẽn ka maand yɩɩr ye. Ned ning sẽn ka yi-a kãadem, Zu-soabã yell n pak-a, a sẽn na n maan to-to n ta Zu-soabã yam.
Sẽn yi-a kãadem, dũni yɛl yell n pak-a, a sẽn na n maan to-to n ta a pagã yam.

La a pʋɩɩ zĩis a yiibu. Woto me pag sẽn ka tar sɩda, la pa-kuili, yaa Zu-soabã yell n pak-ba, tɩ b tõe n yi nin-sõamy b yĩngã pʋgẽ la b sɩɩgã pʋgẽ me. Sẽn kuil-a sɩda, dũni yɛl n pak-a, a sẽn na n maan to-to n ta a sɩda yam.
Mam sẽn gomd woto wã, yaa yãmb sõngr yĩnga. Ka tɩ bẽd yãmb ye, yaa sẽn na yɩl la yãmb maan sẽn zemse, n na n sõng-y tɩ y loe y meng ne Zu-soabã tɩ tak-tɩ-m-tak kaẽ ye.
Ned sã n tags t'a pa-kuil sã n yõsg sɩd wakat yaa yãnde, n dat n kuils-a, bɩ a maan a sẽn data. Rẽ ka yel-wẽnd ye. Bɩ d yi kãadem.
La sẽn yɛs-a kãenkãe, n mi a sẽn dat tɩ modgr kaẽ, yẽ sã n yãk yam a sũurẽ t'a na n basa a biig a yiri, soab kãng maana neere.
Woto, sẽn kõ-a a biig sɩd maana neere, sẽn ka kõ-a a biig sɩd maan-neer n yɩɩda.
Pag loee ne a sɩda, a sɩdã vɩɩm tɛka. La a sɩdã sã n ki, a tara noor tɩ leb n kuil ned ning a sẽn data, la sẽn be, tog n yɩɩ Zu-soabã pʋgẽ.
La ne maam, mam yetame t'a sã n kell n pa a woto, a sũur na yɩ noog n yɩɩda. Maam me yaool n tẽedame tɩ m tara Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã.
Sã n yaa ne maand nins sẽn kʋ tẽn-kugã nemdã yelle, tõnd fãa miime tɩ d tara bãngre. (Bãngr wata ne wuk-m-menga, la nonglem sõngdame.
Ned sã n tagsd t'a mii bũmbu, a ket n ka mi tɩ sek ye.
La ned sã n nong Wẽnnaam, Wẽnnaam mi-a lame).
Sã n yaa ne maandã b sẽn kʋ wẽn-naandsã nemd wãbr yelle, tõnd miime tɩ wẽn-naandg ka be dũni ye, la tɩ Wẽnnaam a yen bal n be.
Bala, baa ne bũmb nins sẽn be yĩngr wall tẽng zug tɩ b boond tɩ wẽnnaam-dãmbã (la wẽnnaam-dãmba ne zu-soben-dãmba sõor waooga).

Ne tõndo, Wẽnnaam a yen bal n be, n ya ba. Bũmb fãa yita bãmb nengẽ, tõnd yaa bãmb dẽnda. La zu-soab a yen tãa n be, a Zezi Kirist, soab ning maasem yĩng bũmb fãa sẽn be, la tõnd sẽn be.
La ka neba fãa n mi bõn-kãng ye. Sɩd me, neb kẽer yam sẽn ket n togl ne Wẽn-naandsã yellã wãbda nem-kãens sẽn yɩ maoongã. La bũmb kãng rẽgemda bãmb sũ-bãngrã sẽn ka pãngã.
Ka rɩɩb n na n pẽneg tõnd ne Wẽnnaam ye: Tõnd sã n ka rɩt-a, bũmb ka paoog tõnd ye. La tõnd sã n n dɩt-a, a ka paasd tõnd fʋɩ.
Baoosgo, bɩ y gũus tɩ yãmb lohormã da wa n lebg kug-lakdg neb nins sẽn ka pãnga yĩng ye.
Bala, ned sã n yã foom a tar bãngrã tɩ f zĩ wẽn-naandg karen-doogẽ n dɩtẽ, rẽ yĩnga, a sũ-bãngrã sẽn ka pãngã ka na n kɩt t'a me wãb maand sẽn kʋ wẽn-naandsã nemdo?
Woto, fo bãngrã kɩtame tɩ ka pãng soabã, ba-biig ning Kirist sẽn ki a yĩngã sãame.
Fo sã n maan yel-wẽnd a woto n beeg f ba-biisã, tɩ b sũ-bãngrã sẽn ka pãngã lak foom, fo beega Kirist.
Yaa woto n kɩt tɩ rɩɩb sã n ya kug-lakdg m ba-biig yĩnga, mam kõn leb n wãb nemd lae-lae, tɩ m da wa n kɩt tɩ m ba-biig lʋɩ ye.
Mam ka tar lohorem laa? Mam ka tẽn-tʋmd laa? Mam ka yã d Zu-soab a Zezi laa? Yãmb ka mam tʋʋmd Zu-soabã pʋgẽ biis laa?
Mam sã n ka tẽn-tʋmd neb kẽer yĩnga, mam yaa tẽn-tʋmd yãmb yĩnga. Yãmb yaa mam sẽn ya Zu-soabã tẽn-tʋmdã tʋʋmd kaset bãnde.
Gomd ning mam sẽn tar n leokd neb nins sẽn bʋʋd ne maama yaa woto.
Tõnd ka tar noor tɩ dɩ la d yũ laa?
Tõnd ka tar noor tɩ peeg d tão n maan d paga, wa tẽn-tʋmdb a taaba, la Zu-soabã ba-bi-raopa la a Sefas sẽn maanã laa?
Bɩ yaa maam bal ne a Barnabas n ka tar noor tɩ tʋme?
Ned a ãe n be sodaarẽ la a get a meng yelle? Ãnna n send nasaar sãbga, n ka rɩt a biisi? Ãnna n kɩɩmd rũms n ka yũud b bĩisim?
Dẽ yĩnga, yaa mam sẽn ya ninsaalã yĩng la m gomd a woto? Tõogã meng ka gomd a woto sɩda?
Bala, b gʋlsa a Moyiis tõogã pʋgẽ n yeele: Naaf ning sẽn pãbd-a koodã zɛɛgẽ wã, da ning a noor yʋk ye. Naafã yell n pak Wẽnnaam bii?
Bɩ yaa tõnd yĩng bal la b gom-yã? N-ye! Yaa tõnd yĩng la b gʋls rẽnda. Sẽn kood-a tog n koo ne saagre, la sẽn pãbd-a koodã me tog n pãbda ne saagr t'a na n paama a pʋɩɩre.
Sã n yaa tɩ tõnd bʋda sɩɩgã arzegs yãmb yĩnga, rẽ yĩnga, tõnd sã n tigsd yãmb arzegsã, yõsgame sɩda?
Neb a taab sã n dɩt yãmb yõodo, ka tõnd n pʋs n tog n dɩ n yɩɩda? La tõnd ka maan wa noor ning d sẽn tarã ye. Ayo, tõnd sakda fãa, tɩ d da wa ning gɩdgr Kirist koe-noogã taoor ye.
Yãmb ka mi tɩ neb nins sẽn maand-b Wẽnnaam tʋʋmdã, wẽnd-doogã n dɩlgdba, la tɩ neb nins sẽn tʋmd tẽn-kugrẽ wã paamda pʋɩɩr bũmb nins b sẽn yõogd tẽn-kugrã zugã pʋgẽ laa?
Woto me, Zu-soabã kõo noor tɩ koe-noogã dɩlg neb nins sẽn moond koe-noogã.
Ne maam, mam ka tʋm ne no-kãens baa a yembr ye, la mam ka gʋlsd a woto tɩ y na kõ-m ye. Bala, mam sẽn kiid n são... Ned baa a yen kõn yiis waoogr ning mam sẽn tar yel-kãng pʋgẽ wã ye.
Ne maam, tɩ moon koe-noogã ka waoogr baoob ye. Wẽnnaam n yet-m tɩ m moone. Mam sã n ka moon koe-noogã, toog n na n paam maam.
Mam sã n moon ne yamleoogo, mam paamda a keoore. La mam sã n moon-a modgr yĩnga, yaa tʋʋmd b sẽn dogl m zugu.
Mam keoor la bʋgo? Yaa tɩ m sã n moond koe-noogã, bɩ m moon-a zaalem, n ka deeg bũmb nins koe-noogã sẽn kõt maam ne-wã ye.
Bala, baa ned a yen sẽn ka so maamã, mam maana m meng tɩ yɩ neba fãa tʋmtʋmda, tɩ m tõe n paam neb fãa sõor m sẽn tõe n paam n yɩɩda.

Ne Zuif-rãmbã, mam yɩɩ wa Zuif, tɩ m tõe n paam-ba. Ne neb nins a Moyiis tõogã sẽn loe wã, mam yɩɩ wa ned a Moyiis tõogã sẽn loe, la a Moyiis tõogã yaool n ka loe maam, tɩ m tõe n paam neb nins tõogã sẽn loe wã.

Ne neb nins sẽn ka be tõogã pʋgẽ wã, mam yɩɩ wa ned sẽn ka be tõogã pʋgẽ ye, la mam mengã yaool n ka ned sẽn be Wẽnnaam tõogã poorẽ ye, mam bee Kirist tõogã pʋgẽ, tɩ m tõe n paam neb nins sẽn ka be tõogã pʋgẽ wã.

Ne neb nins sẽn be pãn-komsem pʋgẽ wã, mam yɩɩ pãn-komsem soaba, tɩ m tõe n paam pãn-komsem dãmbã. Mam maana m meng tɩ yɩ bũmba fãa naaba fãa yĩnga, tɩ sẽn wa n ya neng ning fãa, bɩ m fãag neb kẽere.
Mam maanda bũmba fãa koe-noogã yĩnga, tɩ m tõe n paam pʋɩɩr a pʋgẽ.
Yãmb zɩ tɩ neb nins sẽn zoet zoeesã zĩigẽ wã, nebã fãa n zoeta, la tɩ yaa nin yen tãa n deegd keoorã laa? Bɩ y zoe y sẽn na zoe to-to n paam keoorã.
Ned ning sẽn yõgd maoor modgda a meng n basd bũmb kẽere. Bãmb maanda a woto n dat maanf sẽn sãamda, la tõnd maandame n dat maanf sẽn ka sãamd ye.
Mam yẽ, mam zoetame, la ka wa ned sẽn ka mi a sẽn dabdẽ ye. Mam lobda nug-gila, la ka tɩ pãb pemsem ye.
Ayo, mam namsda m yĩngã sõama, n kɩted t'a sakd-ma, m sẽn zoet dabeem tɩ mam sẽn moon neb a taabã, bɩ b da wa n yeel tɩ mam ka zems ye.
M ba-biisi, mam ka rat tɩ yãmb zɩ yel-kãngã ye. Tõnd ba-rãmba fãa zĩnda sawadgã tẽngre, b fãa pɩʋʋga ko-kãsengã pʋga,
a Moyiis pʋgẽ, b fãa paama lisg sawadgã ne ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ,
b fãa rɩɩ sɩɩg rɩɩb a yembre,
la b fãa yũu sɩɩg bõn-yũudl a yembre. Bala, b fãa ra yũuda koom sẽn yit pĩig sẽn da pʋgd bãmbã pʋgẽ, la pĩ-kãng ra yaa Kirist.
La bãmb neb wʋsg ka ta Wẽnnaam yam ye, bala, b kii weoogẽ wã.
Bõn-kãens yaa mamsg tõnd yĩnga, tɩ tõnd da wa paam datem-wẽns wa bãmb sẽn da paamã ye.
Da yɩ-y wẽn-naands pʋʋsdb wa bãmb neb kẽer sẽn dag n yɩ, tɩ b gʋls n wilgã. B yeelame yaa: Nebã zĩndame n na n dɩ la b yũ. Rẽ poore, b yikame n na n noog b sũuri.
Tɩ d da maan rẽgd wa bãmb neb kẽer sẽn maane, tɩ neb tus pisi la a tã ki daar a yembrã ye.
Tɩ d da mak Zu-soabã wa bãmb neb kẽer sẽn mak-ba, tɩ wiis sãam-ba ye.
Da yẽgem-y wa bãmb neb kẽer sẽn maane, tɩ sãamdã sãam-ba ye.
Bõn-kãens paama bãmba, tɩ yɩ mamsgo, la b gʋlsame n na n keoog tõnd dãmb sẽn mi tɩ wakatã taa a saabã.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ ned ning sẽn tagsd t'a yasa yĩngrã gũus n da wa lʋɩ ye.

Makr baa a yen sẽn nan ka mak ninsaal ka mak yãmb ye. Wẽnnaam yaa sɩd maanda, la b ka na n sak tɩ yãmb paam makr sẽn yɩɩd y pãng ye. La makr sã n wa, Wẽnnaam na n n kõo yãmb maane y sẽn na maan n yi, tɩ yãmb tõe yals makrã pʋgẽ.
Woto yĩnga, m Zo-nongdse, zoe-y wẽn-naands pʋʋsgo.
Mam sẽn gomd ne yãmbã, yaa wa ne neb yam sẽn vɩ. Yãmb mens tags bũmb ning mam sẽn yetã yelle.
Bark bõn-yũudlã tõnd sẽn ningd barkã, a ka kɩted tɩ tõnd paam lagem-n-taar ne Kirist zɩɩmã sɩda? Burã tõnd sẽn kaoodã, a ka kɩted tɩ tõnd paam lagem-n-taar ne Kirist yĩngã sɩda?
Burã sẽn ya a yembrã, tõnd sẽn ya wʋsgã, d yaa yĩng a yembre. Bala, tõnd fãa wãbda bur a yembre.
Ges-y neb nins sẽn ya Israyɛl neb ne yĩng yellã: Neb nins sẽn wãbd dũms nins b sẽn tall n maan maandã nemdã, b ka tar lagem-n-taar ne tẽn-kugrã sɩda?
Mam yetame tɩ bõe? Mam yetame tɩ maandã sẽn kʋ wẽn-naandsã nemdã yaa bũmb laa? Bɩ tɩ wẽn-naandg yaa bũmbu? Baa bilfu.
Maoongã sẽn kʋʋdã, yaa zĩn-dãmb yĩnga, la ka Wẽnnaam yĩng ye. La mam yaool n ka rat tɩ yãmb paam lagem-n-taar ne zĩn-dambã ye.
Ka tõe n yũud Zu-soabã bõn-yũudlã, la y yũud zĩn-dãmbã me rẽnd ye. Yãmb ka tõe n naag n dɩt Zu-soabã dɩɩbo, la y le naag n dɩt zĩn-dãmb dɩɩb ye.
Dẽ yĩnga, tõnd datame tɩ Zu-soabã sũ-kiir yik laa? Dẽ yĩnga, tõnd pãng yɩɩda bãmb laa?
Noor beeme tɩ maan fãa, la ka bũmb fãa n be yõod ye. Noor beeme tɩ maan bũmb fãa, la ka fãa n sõngd ye.
Bɩ ned baa a yen da bao a meng sõngr ye, a bao a to rẽnda.
Sũur kaset yĩnga, bɩ y rɩ bũmb ning fãa sẽn koosd raagẽ, n da sok a kibar ye.
Bala, tẽngã yaa Zu-soabã n so, la bũmb nins fãa sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã me, yaa bãmb n so.
Ned sẽn ka tẽed sã n bool yãmb tɩ y wa rɩ, tɩ yãmb sak n kẽnge, sũur kaset yĩnga, bɩ y rɩ bũmb ning fãa a sẽn kõt yãmbã, n da sok a kibar ye.
La ned sã n yeel yãmb tɩ: Yõwã yɩɩ maoongo, bɩ y ra rɩ, soab ning sẽn pĩnd n wilg yãmbã yĩnga, la sũur yĩng me.
Mam sẽn gomd sũur kasetã yellã, ka yãmb sũur kasetã ye, yaa ned a to wã rẽnda. Sɩd me, bõe yĩng tɩ sũur kaset sẽn ka mam dẽnd na n wa kao mam lohorem bʋʋdo?
Mam sã n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam bark la m dɩ, bõe yĩng tɩ b na n kãn maam ne bũmb ning mam sẽn pʋʋs bark a yĩnga?
Yãmb sã n dɩtẽ, wall y yũuda, wall bũmb ning fãa y sẽn maanda, maan-y fãa Wẽnnaam waoogr yĩnga.
Da yɩ-y kug-lakdg sẽn ka-b Zuif-rãmbã yĩnga, wall Zuif-rãmbã yĩnga, wall Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdsã yĩng ye.
Wa mam me sẽn maand sẽn noom nebã, n ka baood m meng nafre, la yaa neb wʋsgã rẽndã, tɩ b tõe n paam fãagrã.
Yɩ-y mam togs-n-taase, wa mam meng sẽn ya Kirist togs-n-taagã.
Mam pẽgda yãmba, yãmb sẽn tẽr mam yell bũmb fãa pʋgẽ wã yĩnga, la tɩ yãmb sakd bũmb nins mam sẽn yeel yãmb tɩ y maanã.
Mam yaool n datame tɩ yãmb bãng tɩ Kirist yaa dao fãa Zu-soaba, la dao yaa pag zu-soaba, la tɩ Wẽnnaam yaa Kirist Zu-soaba.
Rao ning fãa sẽn lud a zug n pʋʋs wall a togs bãngr goam paoogda a Zu-soabã.
La pag fãa sẽn ka lud a zug n pʋʋs wall a togs bãngr goam paoogda a Zu-soabã. Yaa wa a sẽn põng a zugu.
Pag sã n ka teeg a zug peende, bɩ a wõrs a zoobdã me. La sã n yaa tɩ pag zoobd wõrsg wall a zug põngr yaa yãnde, bɩ a teeg peende.
Dao ka tog n teeg peend ye, a sẽn ya Wẽnnaam ziir la b wẽnegã yĩnga. La pag yaa dao ziiri.
Sɩd me, ka pag la b yãk n naan dao ye, la yaa dao la b yãk n naan paga.
La b ka naan dao pag yĩng ye, yaa pag la b naan dao yĩnga.
Dẽ n kɩt tɩ pag tog n ning ned sẽn so-a yẽ wã bãnd a zugẽ, malegsã yĩnga.
Baoosgo, Zu-soabã pʋgẽ, pag ka be tɩ rao kaẽ ye, la rao ka be tɩ pag kaẽ ye.
Bala, a wa b sẽn yãk rao pʋgẽ n naan pagã, yaa pag me n dog daoa, la fãa yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
Yãmb mens tags n gese, rẽ yĩnga, segdame tɩ pag pʋʋs Wẽnnaam n ka teeg a zug peende?
Vɩɩmã meng sẽn ya to-to wã ka zãmsd tõnd tɩ yaa yãnd ne rao tɩ paam zoob-wogdo,
la tɩ pag sã n tar zoob-wogdo bee neer ne-a sɩda? Sɩd me, b kõ-a la zoobdã tɩ lud a zugã wa peende.
Ned sã n minim kɩɩsgo, tõnd yẽ ka minim a woto, la Wẽnnaam doogã me ka minim ye.
Mam sẽn kõt yãmb koe-kãensã wã, bũmb ning mam sẽn ka pẽgda, yaa tɩ yãmb sẽn tigindã, ka tɩ y na yɩ sõama n yɩɩd ye, yaa tɩ yɩ wẽng n yɩɩda.
Pipi, mam wʋmdame tɩ yãmb sã n wa n tigim taaba, welgr n be yãmb sʋka (la mam tẽeda koe-kãng bilfu).
Yaa tɩlɛ tɩ welgr sɩd zĩndi, tɩ b na bãng neb nins sẽn zems pẽgr yãmb sʋkã.
Dẽ, yãmb sẽn tigimd taabã, ka tɩ rɩ Zu-soabã rɩɩb ye.
Bala, kẽer sẽn dengd b taab n dɩtẽ rɩta b mens rɩɩbo, tɩ nina zĩ ne kom, tɩ nina nin tuubd ne rãam.

Yãmb ka tar yiy n na n dɩt be la y yũud be laa? Bɩ yãmb ka nand Wẽnnaam doogã, la y dat n paoog neb nins sẽn ka tar bũmbã? Mam na n yeela yãmb tɩ bõe? Mam na n pẽga yãmba? Yel kãngã pʋgẽ yẽ, mam kõn pẽg yãmb ye.
Bala, bũmb ning mam sẽn taas yãmbã, mam deeg-a la Zu-soabã nengẽ. Yʋng ning b sẽn yõk a Zezi n kõ wã, Zu-soab a Zezi dɩka buri,
n pʋʋs Wẽnnaam barka, n yaool n kao-a n yeele: Yõwã yaa mam yĩng mam sẽn kõt yãmba. Maand-y woto n tẽegd mam yelle.
B sẽn dɩ n sa me, a Zezi dɩka bõn-yũudlã n yeele: Bõn-yũudl kãngã yaa kãab-paalg sẽn kãab mam zɩɩmã pʋgẽ: Maand-y a woto n tẽegd mam yell wakat fãa yãmb sẽn na yũ-a.
Bala, wakat ning fãa yãmb sẽn wãbd bur kãngã, la y yũud bõn-yũudl kãngã, yãmb wilgda Zu-soabã kũum hal tɩ b lebg n wa.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ ned sã n wãb burã la a yũ Zu-soabã bõn-yũudlã ne paoogre, a beegda Zu-soabã yĩng ne b zɩɩmã.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ ned fãa fees a menga, la a yaool n wãb burã la a yũ bõn-yũudlã.
Bala, ned ning sẽn wãbd burã la a yũud bõn-yũudlã, la a ka nand Zu-soabã yĩnga, yaa bʋʋd a meng yĩng la a wãbd la a yũuda.
Yaa rẽnda n kɩt tɩ bãad-rãmb la koms-rãmb ya wʋsg yãmb sʋka, la tɩ neb wʋsg kiime.
Tõnd sã n da kaoẽ d meng bʋʋdo, Wẽnnaam dag n kõn kaoẽ tõnd bʋʋd ye.
La bʋʋd ning Wẽnnaam sẽn bʋʋdã pʋgẽ, b sɩbgda tõndo, tɩ b da wa n naag tõnd ne dũni wã n sɩbg ye.
Woto yĩnga, m ba-biisi, yãmb sã n tigim taab n na n dɩ zu-soabã kũum tẽegr dɩɩbã, bɩ y yals n gũ taaba.
Kom sã n tar neda, bɩ a dɩ a yiri, tɩ y da wa n tigim taab n bao sɩbgr n kõ y mens ye. Mam sã n wa wa, m na ges yɛl a taabã yelle.
M ba-biisi, mam ka rat tɩ yãmb zĩnd zɩɩlem pʋgẽ Sɩɩg-sõng kũunã yell wɛɛngẽ ye.
Yãmb mii yãmb sẽn dag n ket n ya nin-zaalse, tɩ yãmb sũyã loe ne wẽn-naands sẽn ya mugsi, tɩ y ka tõe n lak ne-bã.

Yaa rẽ yĩng tɩ mam yet yãmb tɩ ned ka be, Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã sẽn na n tus-a t'a yeel tɩ kãab wẽng n be a Zezi zug ye. La ned baa a yembr me ka tõe n yeel t'a Zezi yaa Zu-soaba, sã n ka Sɩɩg-sõng n kɩt t'a yeel ye.
Kũunã yaa toay-toaya, la yaa Sɩɩg a yembr n kõte.
Tʋʋmã sẽn tʋmd to-to wã yaa toay-toaya, la yaa Zu-soab a yembr yĩng la b tʋmda.
Tʋʋmã yaa toay-toaya, la yaa Wẽnnaam a yembr n tʋmd fãa neba fãa pʋse.
Sɩɩgã belem pukda ned kam fãa vɩɩmẽ, nebã fãa sõngr yĩnga.
Sɩd me, Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã kõta ned a yembr yam gomde, n kõ ned a to bãngr gomde, la yaa Sɩɩg a yembr n maand rẽ.
Sɩ-kãng kõta ned a to tẽebo, n kõ ned a to maagr kũuni, la yaa Sɩɩg a yembre.

Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã kõta ned a to bõn-bãn maaneg kũuni, n kõ ned a to pĩnd-n-bãngr gomde, n kõ ned a to pãn-tõog tɩ bãng sɩɩsã n welg taaba, n kõ ned a to gom-zẽn buud toay-toaya, la ned a to gom-zẽn deesgo.
Yaa Sɩɩg a yen tãa n maand bõn-kãensã fãa, n pʋɩt kũunã n kõt ned kam fãa wa b sẽn data.
Sɩd me, a wa yĩng sẽn ya yembr n yaool n tar wil wʋsgã, la tɩ yĩngã wilã, baa ne b sẽn ya wʋsgã b yaa yĩng a yembr balã, Kirist me yaa a woto bala.
Bala, yaa Sɩɩg a yembr pʋgẽ la b lis tõnd fãa, Zuif-rãmba, sẽn ka-b Zuif-rãmba, yemse, burkĩmba, tɩ d tõe n lebg yĩng a yembre. La tõnd fãa yũu Sɩɩg a yembr n yiis d ko-yũudu.
Woto, yĩng ka will a yembr bal ye, yaa wil wʋsgo.
Naoor sã n yeel tɩ yẽ sẽn ka nugã yĩnga, yẽ ka yĩngã willi, rẽ ka kɩted t'a ka yĩngã will ye.
La tʋbr sã n yeel tɩ yẽ sẽn ka nifã yĩnga, yẽ ka yĩngã willi, rẽ ka kɩted t'a ka yĩngã will ye.
Yĩngã tõr sã n dag n yaẽ nifu, tʋbr da na n bee yɛ? La fãa sã n dag n yaẽ tʋbre, yõor da na n bee yɛ?
Ad Wẽnnaam ninga wilã yĩngã pʋgẽ wa b sẽn data.
Yĩngã tõr sã n dag n yaẽ will a yembre, yĩngã meng da na n beẽ la yɛɛne?
Woto wã, yĩngã wil yaa wʋsgo, la yaa yĩng a yembre.
Nif ka tõe n yeel nug t'a ka rat a sõngr ye, la zug ka tõe n yeel nao t'a ka rat b sõngr ye.
Ayo, ka woto ye, yĩngã wil nins sẽn wẽnda b pãngã ka ta b taabã, n tar yõod yĩngã pʋgẽ.
La wil nins tõnd sẽn get tɩ b ka be waoogr n ta b taabã, tõnd waoogd-b lame n yɩɩda. Woto, yĩngã wil nins sẽn ka togd ne gesgã, tõnd geta b yell sõama,
la wil nins sẽn sakd gesgã ka baood tɩ d ges b yell woto ye. Wẽnnaam sẽn ning yĩngã wilã to-to wã, b kɩtame tɩ wil nins sẽn ka tar waoogrã na paam waoogre,
tɩ welgr da wa n zĩnd yĩngã pʋgẽ ye, la tɩ wilã me na ges taab yelle.
Yĩngã will a yembr sã n namsdẽ, wil a taabã fãa naaga yẽnda n namsdẽ. La a yembr sã n paam waoogre, b fãa naagda yẽnda n kɩdemdẽ.
Yãmb yaa Kiristã yĩnga, la yãmb ned kam fãa yaa bãmb yĩngã wila.

Wẽnnaam ninga neb b roogẽ wã: pipi rãmb yaa tẽn-tʋmdbã, tɩ Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã ya yiib rãmba, tɩ karen-saam-dãmbã ya tãab rãmba. Rẽ poore, bõn-bãn maaneg kũun n be, tɩ maagr kũuni, sõngr kũuni, lʋɩ neb taoor kũuni, gom-zẽn buud toay-toay kũun n pʋgda.
Dẽ yĩnga, neba fãa yaa tẽn-tʋmdb laa? B fãa yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb laa? B fãa yaa karen-saam-dãmb laa? B fãa maanda bõn-ban laa?
B fãa tara maagr kũun laa? B fãa gomda gom-zẽn laa? B fãa reesda gom-zẽn laa?
Bao-y kũun nins sẽn ya sõama n yɩɩdã. La mam na n wilga yãmb sor sẽn yɩɩd a taaba fãa.
Mam sã n tõog n gomd ninsaalb la malegsã goam buud fãa, mam sã n ka tar nonglem, mam yaa wa waag sẽn maand bʋʋre, wall keoonf sẽn wẽeda.
La mam sã n paam pĩnd-n-bãngr goam kũuni, la yel-soalma fãa bilgri, la bãngr fãa, la hal baa mam sã n tar tẽeb sẽn tõe n sers tãmse, mam sã n ka tar nonglem, mam ka fɩ.
La mam sã n dɩk n paoongã fãa n pʋɩ tɩ naong rãmbã tõe n paam rɩɩbo, mam sã n kõ m yĩngã tɩ b yõog bugum, mam sã n ka tar nonglem, rẽ fãa ka yõod ye.
Nonglem tara sũ-mare, nonglem sõngda neb a taaba, a ka maand sũ-kiir ye. Nonglem ka fʋʋmd a menga, a ka maand wilg-m-menga,
a ka maand zãmb baa bilfu, a ka baood a meng nafr bal ye, a ka yikd a sũuri, a ka bĩngd wẽng ning b sẽn maan-a wã a sũurẽ ye,
a ka maand sũ-noog ne ka-tɩrlem ye. Ayo! A maanda sũ-noog ne sɩda,
a maanda sugr bũmb fãa yĩnga, a tẽeda bũmb fãa, a tara saag-sõng ne bũmb fãa, la a sakda bũmb fãa.
Nonglem ka sat abada. Pĩnd-n-bãngr goam na sa, gom-zẽn na sa, bãngr na sa.
Bala, tõnd sẽn bãngdã, yaa wɛdg-wɛdga, la pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã d sẽn togsdã yaa wedse.
La sẽn zems-a zãngã sã n wa, b na n sɛɛsa sẽn ya-a wedsã.
Mam sẽn dag n ya biigã, mam goam dag n yaa yãag goama, mam tagsg dag n yaa yãag tagsgo. Mam sẽn lebg raowã, mam sɛɛsa bũmb nins sẽn dag n ya yãadrã.

Tõnd sẽn ne rũnna wã, yaa wa nin-gɛtg pʋgẽ, pulum-pulum. La wakat sã n ta, tõnd na yã-b neng ne nenga. Mam sẽn mi rũnna wã yaa wedse, la wakat sã n ta, mam na bãng bãmb wa bãmb sẽn bãng maamã.
Moasã, ad bũmb a tãab nins sẽn paadã: yaa tẽebo, la saag-sõngo, la nonglem. La sẽn ya kãseng bãmb sʋk n yɩɩdã, yaa nonglem.
Bao-y nonglem. Dat-y Sɩɩg-sõng kũunã me, la sẽn yɩɩd fãa, bɩ y dat pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã.
Sɩd me, sẽn gomd-a ne gom-zẽn ka gomd ne ninsaalb ye, a gomda ne Wẽnnaam. Bala, ned baa a yen ka wʋmd a võor ye, la Sɩɩgã kɩtame t'a togsd yel-soalma.
La sẽn togsd-a pĩnd-n-bãngr goam gomda ne ninsaalbã, n bɩɩsd-ba, n sagend-ba, n belsd-ba.
Sẽn gomd-a gom-zẽn bɩɩsda a menga. Sẽn togsd-a pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã bɩɩsda wẽnd-doogã.

Mam datame tɩ yãmb ned kam fãa gom gom-zẽna, la mam sẽn dat n yɩɩda, yaa tɩ yãmb togs pĩnd-n-bãngr goama. Sẽn togsd-a pĩnd-n-bãngr goam yɩɩda sẽn gomd-a gom-zẽnã, sã n ka t'a soab rees-a lame tɩ wẽnd-doogã tõe n paam bɩɩsg a pʋgẽ.
M ba-biisi, mam sã n wa yãmb nengẽ, n tõdg a wa ne vẽnegr gomde, wall bãngr gomde, wall pĩnd-n-bãngr gomde, wall zãmsgo, n gomd ne gom-zẽna, a yõod yaa bõe ne yãmba?
Wa b sẽn na n peeb wall b wẽ teed sẽn ka tar vɩɩm, wa wɩɩg wall pɛndga, tɩ ka tũud sõama, ned na n yɩɩ a wãn n bãng yɩɩl ning wɩɩgã sẽn peebdã, wall pɛndgã sẽn wẽedã?
Baorg sã n peebd tɩ ka vẽenega, ãnna n na n segl a meng zabr yĩnga?
Woto me, yãmb sã n gomd goam neb sẽn ka wʋmd a võore, nebã na n yɩɩ a wãn n bãng yãmb sẽn dat n togs bũmb ningã?
Baa dũni pʋgẽ goam buudã sẽn ya wʋsgã, baa a yen ka be n ya sɩɩ tɩ ned ka wʋmdẽ ye.
Woto, gomd sã n gomd tɩ mam ka wʋmd a võore, mam yaa nin-zẽng sẽn gomd-a wã yĩnga, la sẽn gomd-a wã me na n yɩɩ nin-zẽng mam yĩnga.
Woto yĩnga, yãmb sẽn dat Sɩɩg-sõng kũunã, bɩ y kɩt tɩ ya wẽnd-doogã bɩɩsg yĩng la yãmb baood-b wʋsgo.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ ned ning sẽn gomd gom-zẽn tog n pʋʋs n tõog n deesdẽ.
Bala, mam sã n gomd ne gom-zẽna, mam sɩɩgã yẽ pʋʋsdame, la mam yamã ka maand baa fɩ.
Woto wã, m na n maana bõe? Mam sɩɩgã na n pʋʋsdame, la mam yamã me na n pʋʋsdame. Mam sɩɩgã na n yɩɩndame, la mam yamã me na n yɩɩndame.
Fo sã n pʋʋsd Wẽnnaam bark ne f sɩɩgã, ned ning sẽn zĩ ne nebã n kelgdẽ wã na n maana a wãn n leok tɩ ãmin fo bark pʋʋsgã yĩnga, a sẽn ka wʋmd bũmb ning fo sẽn yetã?
Yaa sɩd tɩ yãmb pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam bark sõama, la ned a to wã ka paamd bɩɩsg a pʋgẽ ye.
Mam pʋʋsda Wẽnnaam barka, mam sẽn gomd gom-zẽn n yɩɩd yãmb fãa wã yĩnga.
La wẽnd-doogẽ wã, mam nong n goma goam a nu ne m yamã, tɩ b tõe n kõ neb a taabã zãmsgo, n yɩɩd tɩ gom goam tus-piig ne gom-zẽna.
Sã n ya ne tagsg wɛɛngẽ, bɩ y da yɩ wa kamb ye. Yɩ-y wa kamb wẽng maaneg wɛɛngẽ, la wa daop sẽn bɩ, tagsgã wɛɛngẽ.
B gʋlsa tõodã sebr pʋgẽ n yeele: Zu-soabã yeelame tɩ yaa ne buud a to neba, la ne sãamb noy la mam na n gom ne nin-kãensã. La baa ne rẽnda, b ka na n kelg maam ye.
Woto yĩnga, gom-zẽnã yaa bãnd neb nins sẽn ka tẽedã yĩnga, la ka tẽedbã yĩng ye. La pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã yaa bãnd tẽedbã yĩnga, la ka sẽn ka tẽedbã yĩng ye.
Woto, wẽnd-doogã neb fãa sã n tigim taaba, tɩ neba fãa gomd gom-zẽna, tɩ neb wa bal n na n kelge, wall sẽn ka tẽedb sã n wa, b kõn yeel tɩ yãmb yaa gãeems sɩda?
La neba fãa sã n togsd pĩnd-n-bãngr goama, tɩ ned sẽn ka tẽeda, wall kɛlgd bal wa, neba fãa goamã kẽed-a lame, b fãa bʋʋda yẽ bʋʋdo,
b pukda bũmb nins sẽn solg a sũurẽ. Wakat kãnga, a na n wõgemda Wẽnnaam taoor n waoog bãmba, la a na n mooname n yeel tɩ Wẽnnaam sɩd bee yãmb sʋka.

Woto wã, m ba-biisi, d na n maana a wãna? Yãmb sã n tigim taaba, ned sã n tar yɩɩlle, wall saglgo, wall vẽnegre, wall gom-zẽnga, wall gom-zẽn deesgo, bɩ ned fãa maan a tʋʋmd nebã bɩɩsg yĩnga.
Sã n yaa gom-zẽn goama, bɩ neb a yiib wall a tãab bal gome, yembr yembre, tɩ ned reesdẽ.
La ned sã n ka be n deesdẽ, bɩ ned fãa sĩnd wẽnd-doogẽ, n gom a pʋgẽ la a gom ne Wẽnnaam.
Ne neb nins sẽn togsd pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã, bɩ neb a yiib wall a tãab gome, tɩ neb a taabã bʋ b goama n gese.
Ned sẽn be be sã n paam vẽnegre, bɩ sẽn da gomd-a wã sĩndi.
Bala, yãmb fãa tõe n togsda pĩnd-n-bãngr goam n deesd taaba, tɩ nebã fãa na paam zãmsgo, la tɩ neba fãa na paam saglgo.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sɩɩs sakd-b lame.
Bala, Wẽnnaam ka bʋrg Wẽnnaam ye, b yaa laafɩ Wẽnnaam. Wa sẽn maand Wẽnnaam nin-sõamy wã wẽnd-dotẽ wã,
bɩ pagbã sĩnd b noy tigindã pʋse, bala, b ka tar noor tɩ gom be ye. Bɩ b yɩ sakdba, wa Wẽnnaam tõogã me sẽn yetã.
B sã n dat n sok bũmb kẽer võor n bãnge, bɩ b tɩ sogs b mens sɩdbã yiri. Bala, a yaa bũmb sẽn ka zems tɩ pag gom wẽnd-doogẽ ye.
Wẽnnaam goama yii yãmb nengẽ bii, bɩ yaa yãmb nengẽ bal la a ta-yã?
Ned sã n tẽed t'a yaa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsa, wall tɩ Wẽnnaam ninga gomd a noorẽ, bɩ a bãng tɩ bũmb ning mam sẽn gʋls n togs yãmbã yaa Zu-soabã tõogo.
La ned sã n zɩ yel-kãnga, bɩ nebã me ra bãng a soab ye.
Woto yĩnga, m ba-biisi, bɩ ned fãa dat pĩnd-n-bãngr goam kũuni, la y da gɩdg neb tɩ b da gom gom-zẽn ye.
La bɩ y maan bũmb fãa tɩ zemse, la tũud taab sõama.
M ba-biisi, mam tẽegda yãmb koe-noog ning mam sẽn moon yãmb tɩ yãmb deege, n yas a pʋgẽ kãenkãe wã.
Koe-no-kãng maasem yĩnga yãmb paama fãagre, yãmb sã n tall-a wa mam sẽn togs-a yãmbã. Sã n ka yɩ a woto, yãmb tẽe zaalem bala.
Koɛɛg ning mam sẽn taas yãmbã, yaa mam me sẽn deege: Yaa tɩ wa Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yetã, Kirist kii tõnd yel-wẽnã yĩnga.
B mum-b lame, la wa Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yetã, b vʋʋga dasem a tãab daare,
la a Sefas yãa bãmba, tɩ karen-biisã piig la a yiibã me yã bãmba.
Rẽ poore, tõnd ba-biis sẽn yɩɩd bãmb kobs-nu yãa bãmb wakat a yembre. Bãmb neb wʋsg ket n vɩɩme, la kẽer me kiime.
Rẽ poore, a Zak yãa bãmba, la tẽn-tʋmdbã fãa yãa bãmba.
Bãmb fãa poore, b puka b meng ne maam tɩ m yã-ba, baa mam sẽn ya wa biig sẽn dog n pa ta wã.
Bala, tẽn-tʋmdbã sʋka, maam n ka ta m taaba, la mam ka zems tɩ b bool maam tɩ tẽn-tʋmd ye. Tɩ bõe, mam namsa Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdsã.

Wẽnnaam barkã yĩnga, mam yaa m sẽn ya a soaba, la bãmb nimbãan-zoeer mam yĩngã ka yɩ zaalem ye. Ayo! Mam tʋmame n yɩɩd tẽn-tʋmdbã fãa. La ka mam mengã n tʋm ye, yaa Wẽnnaam barkã sẽn be mam pʋgẽ wã.
Woto yĩnga, tɩ yaa maam, tɩ yaa bãmba, bũmb ning tõnd sẽn moondã la woto, la yaa bõn-kãng la yãmb sẽn tẽ wã.
La sã n yaa tɩ b moondame tɩ Kirist vʋʋgame n yi kũum sʋka, yɩta a wãn tɩ neb kẽer yãmb sʋk yetẽ tɩ kũum vʋʋgr ka be?
Sã n yaa tɩ kũum vʋʋgr ka be, rẽnd Kirist me ka vʋʋg ye.
La sã n yaa tɩ Kirist ka vʋʋge, rẽnd tõnd koe-moonegã yaa tʋʋm zaalle, la yãmb tẽebã me ka võor ye.
Sã n yaa tɩ kũum ka vʋʋgda, kɩtame meng tɩ tõnd yagd zĩrĩ ne Wẽnnaam yelle. Bala, tõnd yagda zĩrĩ n yetẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam vʋʋga Kirist tɩ b yaool n ka vʋʋg-b ye.
Bala, kũum sã n ka vʋʋgdẽ, rẽnd Kirist me ka vʋʋg ye.
La sã n yaa tɩ Kirist ka vʋʋge, rẽnd yãmb tẽebã ka yõod ye, la yãmb ket n bee y yel-wẽnã pʋgẽ.
La neb nins sẽn ki Kirist tũudum pʋgẽ wã yell sãamame.
Sã n yaa vɩ-kãngã pʋgẽ yĩng bal la tõnd be ne Kiristã, ned ka be t'a nimbãaneg le ta tõnd ye.
La moas-moasã wã yẽ, Kirist vʋʋgame n yi kũum sʋka. Bãmb n yɩ pipi soab Wẽnnaam sẽn vʋʋge, sẽn ki-bã sʋka.
Bala, a wa kũumã sẽn tũnug dao a yen tãa n wa wã, kũum vʋʋgrã me tũnuga dao a yen tãa n wa.
La a wa neba fãa sẽn kiid a Adam maasem yĩngã, woto me, neba fãa na n vʋʋgame, Kirist maasem yĩngã.
La ned fãa na n talla a zĩiga: Kirist n na n yɩ dẽenem soaba, a Zezi waoongã raare. Neb nins bãmb sẽn so wã na yaool n pʋgle.
Kirist sã n saas naam fãa, la pãn-soaadb fãa, la pãng fãa, b na n dɩka soolmã n lebs ba a Wẽnnaam. Dẽ, bũmb fãa saab taame.
Bala, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ Kirist rɩ naam, hal tɩ ta daar ning b sẽn na n kɩt tɩ b tab b bɛɛbã fãa n zĩẽ.
Yaoolem bɛ Kirist sẽn na n sãam yaa kũumã.
Sɩd me, Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ Kirist soog bũmba fãa. La b sã n yet tɩ Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ Kirist soog bũmba fãa, dat n yeelame tɩ ned ning sẽn kɩt tɩ bãmb soogã ka naag tɩ bãmb soẽ ye.
La Wẽnnaam sã n kɩt t'a Zezi soog bũmba fãa n sa, a Zezi mengã na n saka ned ning sẽn kɩt tɩ bãmb soog bũmb fãa wã, sẽn na yɩl la Wẽnnaam yɩ taoor soab bũmb fãa pʋgẽ.
Sã n ka yɩ a woto, neb nins sẽn deegd kiidbã zĩig tɩ b lisd-bã na n maana a wãna? Kũum sã n ka vʋʋgd lae-lae, bõe yĩng tɩ nebã kɩted tɩ b lis-b kiidbã yĩngã?
La yaa bõe yĩng tɩ tõnd gẽnegd d yõor wakat fãa?
M ba-biisi, mam yeta yãmb ne waoogr ning yãmb ya mam yĩng tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi pʋgẽ wã, tɩ daar fãa, kũum n be mam taoore?
Sã n yaa ninsaalb gesg yĩng la mam mao ne we-rũms Efɛɛsã, a yõod yaa bõe ne maam? Sã n yaa tɩ kũum ka vʋʋgda, bɩ d dɩ la d yũ. Bala, beoogo, d na n kiime.
Da belg-y y mens ye: Tũud-n-ta-wẽng sãamda minim-sõamyã.
Teem-y nao-kẽndre, n kẽn wa nin-tɩrse, la y ra maan yel-wẽn ye. Yaa yãmb yãnde, la mam yetame tɩ yãmb neb kẽer ka mi Wẽnnaam ye.
La nina na n sokame tɩ sẽn ki-bã na n vʋʋga wãn-wãna, la b na n talla yĩn-bʋg buudu?
Ka-yam soaba! Tẽeg tɩ bũmb ning fo sẽn bʋd ka yita, a sã ka ki ye.
La fo sẽn dɩk bũmb ning n bʋdã, a ka yit n ket n ya a woto ye. Yãmb bʋta bõn-buugu, wa bɩle wall bũmb a to.
La Wẽnnaam kõt-a la yĩng ning bãmb sẽn data, la kood buud fãa tara a tɩɩg buudu.
Bõn-vɩɩlɩ wã fãa nemd ka wẽnd taab ye. Ninsaal nemd yaa toore, rũms nemd yaa toore, bõn-pɩgs nemd yaa toore, zĩm nemd yaa toore.
Arzãn yĩns me beeme tɩ tẽng zug yĩns me beẽ. Arzãn yĩnga neerem yaa toor ne tẽng zug ka yĩngã.
Wĩntoog vẽenem toore, kiuug vẽenem toore, ãds vẽenem toore. Bala, ãdsã mens vẽenem ka zems taab ye.
Yaa woto me ne kũumã vʋʋgre. B sã n na n mum ninsaala, rẽ t'a yaa bõn-põaagdga. La a sã n wa na n vʋʋge, a ka lebd n yɩ bõn-põaagdg ye.
B sẽn wat n na n mum-a wã, ka be sẽn get ye. La a sã n wa na n vʋʋge, na n yɩɩ ne ziiri. B sẽn wat n na n mum-a wã, rẽ t'a ka pãng ye. La a sã n wa na n vʋʋge, a pida ne pãnga.
B sẽn wa n mumd-a wakatã, rẽ t'a yaa ninsaal yĩnga, la a sã n wa na n vʋʋge, a na n yaa sɩɩga. Ninsaal yĩng sã n beẽ, sɩɩg yĩng me beeme.
Rẽnda n kɩt tɩ b gʋls n yeel tɩ: Pipi dao a Adam lebga nin-vɩɩga. La yaoolem Adamã lebga sɩɩg sẽn kõt vɩɩm.
Ka sɩɩg yĩngã n deng ye, yaa ninsaal yĩngã, tɩ sɩɩg rẽndã yaool n pʋgda.
Pipi raowã b sẽn yãk tẽng tom n naanã yaa tẽng bũmbu. La yiib soabã yita arzãna.
Tẽng nedã sẽn ya bũmb ningã, tẽng nebã fãa me yaa a woto. La arzãn nedã sẽn ya bũmb ningã, arzãn nebã me yaa a woto.
A wa tõnd sẽn tall tẽng nedã wẽnegã, tõnd na n talla arzãn nedã me wẽnego.
M Ba-biisi, mam sẽn dat n yeelã, yaa tɩ ninsaal yĩng la zɩɩm ka tõe n paam Wẽnnaam soolmã ye, la bõn-põaagdg ka paamd n lebg sẽn ka põogd ye.
Ad mam togsda yãmb yel-solemde: Tõnd fãa ka na n ki ye. Tõnd fãa na n paama tedgr
wakat a yembre, nif kamsg pʋgẽ, yaoolem baorg peebgã wakate. Bala, a na n peebame, la neb nins sẽn ki wã na n vʋʋgame n tar yĩns sẽn ka põogd ye, la tõnd me na n paama tedgre.
Sɩd me, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ yĩn-põaagdgã tek n lebg yĩng sẽn ka põogda, tɩ yĩn-kiidgã tek n lebg yĩng sẽn ka kiid ye.
Yĩn-põaagdgã sã n wa lebg yĩng sẽn ka põogda, tɩ yĩn-kiidgã lebg yĩng sẽn ka kiida, wakat kãng la bũmb ning b sẽn gʋlsã na n pidsi. B yeelame yaa: Tõogr n vel kũum.
Kũum, fo tõogrã bee yɛ? Kũum, fo toogã bee yɛ?
Yaa yel-wẽnã la kũumã toolem, la yaa tõogã n kõt yel-wẽnã pãnga.
La bark Wẽnnaam! Bãmb kɩtedame tɩ tõnd paam tõogre, tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi maasem yĩnga.

Woto yĩnga, m ba-bi-nongdse, yals-y kãenkãe, tɩ bũmb da tõog n vigs yãmb ye. Kẽng-y taoor Zu-soabã tʋʋmd pʋgẽ wakat fãa, yãmb sẽn mi tɩ tʋʋmd ning yãmb sẽn tʋmd Zu-soabã yĩngã ka na n yɩ zaalmã yĩnga.
Sã n yaa ne nonglem kũunã y sẽn na n kõ Kirist tẽedbã sẽn be Zeruzalɛmã yĩngã, bɩ yãmb me maan wa mam sẽn yeel Galasi soolem wẽnd-dotã tɩ b maanã.
Dasem a yopoe wã pipi daarã, bɩ yãmb ned kam fãa bĩng bũmb ning a sẽn tõe n kõ wã kɛɛnga, a yiri, tɩ y da wa yals n gũ mam waoong n na n yaool n tigs kũunã ye.
La mam sã n wa, mam na n kõo neb nins yãmb sẽn yãk tɩ b tall y kũunã n kẽng Zeruzalɛmã kaset sɛb tɩ b zã n kẽnge.
La sã n ya tɩlɛ tɩ mam mengã kẽng Zeruzalɛm, b na tũ maam n kẽnge.
Mam sã n pɩʋʋg Masedoane, mam na n waa yãmb nengẽ, bala, mam na n pɩʋʋga Masedoan.
Daar ninga, mam na n zĩnda ne yãmb bilfu, wall m na n zĩnda yãmb nengẽ hal tɩ waoodã wẽnd looge, tɩ yãmb na kɩt tɩ b tall maam n kẽng zĩig ning mam sẽn na n kẽngã.
So-kãngã wã, mam ka rat n pɩʋʋg bal n ges yãmb la m loog ye. Mam saagdame tɩ Zu-soabã sã n sake, mam na n zĩnda ne yãmb bilfu.
Baoosgo, mam na n paa Efɛɛs hal tɩ ta Pãntekotã.
Bala, dignoor n pak hal yalenga, mam tʋʋmdã yĩnga, la sẽn kis-b maamã sõor waoogame.
A Tɩmote sã n ta, bɩ y maan y sẽn na maan t'a sẽn be yãmb sʋkã, bɩ a pɛlg yɩ kãenkãe, bala, a tʋmda Zu-soabã tʋʋmd wa mam me sẽn maandã.
Woto yĩnga, bɩ ned baa a yen da get-a n pa nandẽ ye. Kɩt-y tɩ b yãag-a t'a lebg n wa mam nengẽ ne laafɩ, bala, mam gũuda yẽ ne ba-biisã
Ne ba-biig a Apolos yelle, mam keng-a-la sõama n yeel-a t'a tũ ba-biisã n wa yãmb nengẽ, la a dag n ka yãk yam tɩ wa be moasã ye. A sã n wa paam weere, a na wa.
Neend-y-yã! Yals-y kãenkãe tẽebã pʋgẽ! Yɩ-y raopa, keng-y y mense.
Bɩ bũmb nins fãa sẽn maand yãmb sʋkã yɩ ne nonglem.
M ba-biisi, bũmb a yembr la mam leb n dat n yeel yãmb tɩ y maane. Yãmb miime t'a Stefanas zaka rãmb n yɩ pipi tẽedb Akayi soolmã, la tɩ b tʋmdame n sõngd Kirist tẽedbã.
Sak-y neb a woto, la y sak neb nins fãa sẽn naag tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ n tʋmdẽ wã.
Mam sũur yaa noog ne a Stefanas la a Fortunatus la a Akayikus sẽn wa mam nengẽ wã. B yiisa yãmb velem sẽn dag n tar maamã,
bala, b kɩtame tɩ maam ne yãmb sɩɩsã gãande. Bãng-y neb a woto yõod sẽn zem to-to.
Wẽnd-dot nins sẽn be Azi soolmã neb pʋʋsda yãmba. A Akilas ne a Pirsil la Wẽnnaam nebã sẽn tigimd bãmb zakẽ wã toonda yãmb pʋʋsem Zu-soabã pʋgẽ.
D ba-biisã fãa toonda yãmb pʋʋsem. Pʋʋs-y taab ne mok-sõngo.
Yaa maam a Poll mengã nug n gʋls pʋʋsmã.
Ned sã n ka nong Zu-soabã, bɩ kãab-wẽng zĩnd a zugu. Maranata!
Bɩ Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist barkã zĩnd ne yãmba!
Mam nonga yãmb fãa Kirist Zezi pʋgẽ.
Maam a Poll sẽn ya a Zezi Kirist tʋmtʋmd Wẽnnaam sẽn yãkã, la tõnd ba-biig a Tɩmote n tʋmd seb kãngã Wẽnnaam nebã sẽn be Korẽntã, la Wẽnnaam neba fãa sẽn be Akayi soolmã fãa pʋgã.
Bɩ y reeg bark la laafɩ sẽn yit tõnd ba a Wẽnnaam la Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist nengẽ.
Pẽgr Wẽnnaam sẽn ya tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist ba wã! Ba sẽn ya nimbãan-zoɛta la Wẽnnaam sẽn belsd nebã wakat fãa.
Bãmb belsda tõnd d toodã fãa pʋgẽ, tɩ tõnd sẽn paamd belsg Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã, tõnd na tõog n bels neb nins sẽn be tood buud fãa pʋgẽ wã ne bels-kõngo.
Bala, a wa Kirist namsgã sẽn paamd tõndã, woto me, tõnd paamda belsg wʋsg Kirist maasem yĩng me.

Tõnd sã n namsdẽ, yaa tɩ yãmb na paam belsog la fãagre. Tõnd sã n paamd belsgo, yaa sẽn na yɩl la yãmb paam belsog sẽn na kõ yãmb pãng tɩ y tõog n sak namsg nins tõnd sẽn paamdã ne sũ-mare.
La tõnd sũur keema sõama ne yãmba, bala, tõnd miime tɩ yãmb sẽn naag n sak namsgã, yãmb tara pʋɩɩr ne belsgã me.
Sɩd me, d ba-biisi, tõnd ka rat tɩ yãmb zɩ tood nins tõnd sẽn paam Azi soolmẽ wã ye. Tõnd namsa wʋsg tɩ looge, n yɩɩg tõnd pãnga, hal tɩ d dag n ka le tẽed tɩ d na n vɩɩmdame ye.
Tõnd da tagsda d sũyã pʋs tɩ b na n kʋʋ tõndo, rẽ sẽn paam tõndã yaa sẽn na n yɩl tɩ tõnd kõn teeg d mens ye, la tɩ d na teeg Wẽnnaam ning sẽn vʋʋgd kũuma.
Yaa Wẽnnaam kãng n fãag tõndo, la b na fãag tõnd ne kũum a woto buudu. N ye tõnd tara tẽ-kãngã tɩ b na n leb n fãaga tõnd yɛsa.
Yãmb mens me sẽn sõng tõnd n pʋʋsd tõnd yĩngã, woto, Wẽnnaam na n leoka neb wʋsg pʋʋsg n sõng tõndo, la neb wʋsg na n pʋʋsa Wẽnnaam bark tõnd yĩnga.

Bala, bũmb ning sẽn kõt tõnd sũ-noogã, yaa tõnd sũ-bãngrã sẽn kɩt kaset tɩ dũni wã neb sʋka, tõnd kẽna ne sõmblem la pʋ-peelem sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã yĩnga, la d kẽna yãmb sʋk a woto n yɩɩda. La ka yɩ ne ninsaal yam ye, yaa ne Wẽnnaam barkã la d maan woto.
Tõnd sẽn gʋlsd yãmbã ka bũmb a to ye, yaa yãmb sẽn karẽmd n yãtẽ la y wʋmdẽ wã bala. La mam tẽedame tɩ yãmb na n bãnga zãnga,
a wa yãmb sẽn zoe n sɩng n bãng tɩ Zu-soabã waoong daare, tõnd yaa yãmb zu-zẽkre, tɩ yãmb ya tõnd zu-zẽkre.
La tẽ-kãnga pʋgẽ, mam da rat n deng n waa yãmb nengẽ, sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ yãmb tõe n paam bark naoor a yiib-n-soaba.
M da rat n yii yãmb nengẽ n tũ Masedoan, la m yi Masedoan n lebg n wa yãmb nengẽ tɩ y sõng-m ne zude kẽndã.
Dẽ yĩnga, mam sẽn da tʋlg n maan bõn-kãngã, mam wilgdame tɩ m ka yas m zĩ-yend bii? Bɩ mam yam-yãkra yaa ninsaal dẽnda tɩ mam tõe n yeel tɩ n-ye, n leb n yeel tɩ ayo?
Sã n ya sɩd me tɩ Wẽnnaam yaa sɩd soaba, koɛɛg ning tõnd sẽn gom ne yãmba ka yɩ n-ye n leb n ya ayo ye.
Bala, maam ne a Sɩlvẽ la a Tɩmote sẽn da moon Wẽnnaam bi-ribl a Zezi Kirist koɛɛg yãmb sʋka ka yɩ n-ye la ayo ye, la a Zezi pʋgẽ, yaa n-ye bal n be.
Wẽnnaam kãabdã fãa yaa n-ye ning sẽn be-a Kirist pʋgẽ wã. Dẽ, yaa a Zezi maasem yĩng la tõnd yet tɩ: ãmina! Wẽnnaam waoogr yĩnga.
Yaa Wẽnnaam n kɩted tɩ tõnd ne yãmb yalsd kãenkãe Kirist tũudmã pʋgẽ, la bãmb yãka tõnd n welg tõnd toore.
Bãmb n ning tõnd bãnd b yʋʋrã yĩnga, la b ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn ya arzegs nins bãmb sẽn bĩng tõndã reng-n-lɛmbg tõnd sũyã pʋgẽ.
Mam dɩkda Wẽnnaam tɩ ya m kaset soaba, la m sã n yagda zĩrĩ, bɩ b reeg m sɩɩgã: Yaa sẽn na n sõng yãmb yĩng n kɩt tɩ mam ka leb n wa Korẽntã.
Ka tɩ tõnd dat n modga yãmb y tẽeba pʋg ye, la yaa tɩ tõnd dat n naaga yãmb n tʋm tɩ y paam sũ-noogo. Bala, yãmb kɩɩ yẽg tẽebã pʋgẽ.
Dẽ, mam yãka yam m sũurẽ n ka rat n leb n wa yãmb nengẽ ye. Sẽn na yɩl n da wa sãam yãmb sũyã ye.
Bala, mam sã n sãam yãmb sũyã, ãnna n tõe n kõ maam sũ-noogo, sã n ka mam sẽn sãam neb nins sũyã bala?

Mam gʋlsa wa mam sẽn da gʋlsã, tɩ mam sã n wa wa, bɩ m da paam sũ-sãoong ne neb nins sẽn da tog n kõ maam sũ-noogã ye. La mam sũur keema ne yãmb fãa, bala, mam sũ-noog yaa yãmb fãa sũ-noogo.
Yaa to-kãseng pʋga, la sũ-sãoong ne nintãm pʋg la mam dag n gʋls yãmba. A ka sẽn na n sãam yãmb sũy ye, la yaa tɩ yãmb na bãng nonglem kãseng ning mam sẽn tar yãmb yĩngã.
Ned sã n yɩ sabaab tɩ sũ-sãoong wa, ka maam bal sũur la a sãame ye, yaa yãmb fãa, la bas-y tɩ m yeel tɩ yãmb neb kẽere, n da wa yag zĩrĩ ye.
Sɩbgr ning yãmb neb wʋsg sẽn sɩbg nin-kãnga soabã sek-a lame.
La sẽn ya neer n yɩɩd moasã, yaa tɩ yãmb tog n kõ-a-la sugri, la y bels-a tɩ sũ-sãoong-kãseng da wa yõk-a, n kẽes-a pãn-komsem pʋg ye.
Dẽ, mam sagenda yãmb tɩ y maan bũmb sẽn wilgd tɩ y nong-a lame.
Bala, mam sẽn da gʋls yãmba me, da yaa sẽn na n mak yãmb n bãng y sã n yaa sakdb bũmb fãa pʋgẽ.

La yãmb sẽn kõt ned ninga sugr a beegr yĩngã, mam me kõt-a-la sugri. La ne maam, mam sẽn maan sugrã, sã n yaa tɩ bũmb n be m sẽn tog n kõ sugri, yaa yãmb yĩng la m maan bõn-kãng Kirist nifẽ,
sẽn na yɩl tɩ sʋtãana ra wa tõog tõnd ye. Bala, tõnd mii a Sʋtãan sɩlmã.
La mam sẽn ta Torwas n na n moon Kirist koe-noogã, baa ne Zu-soabã sẽn pak sor be n kõ maama,
mam sɩɩgã da ka gãe ye, mam sẽn ka yãnd m ba-biig a Titã yĩnga. Dẽ, mam basa bãmb n kẽng Masedoan.
Bark Wẽnnaam sẽn kɩtd tɩ tõnd paamd tõogr daar fãa Kiristã tũudum pʋgẽ wã, la b kɩtdẽ tɩ ne tõndo, nebã bãngd Kirist zĩiga fãa, wa yũ-noog sẽn saagd to-to wã.
Sɩd me, tõnd yaa wa wisd sẽn tar yũ-noog Kirist sẽn dɩk n kõ Wẽnnaam, tɩ tõnd be neb nins sẽn paam fãagrã, la neb nins sẽn na n sãamã sʋka.
Ne neb kẽere, tõnd yaa kũum yũug sẽn wat ne kũum, la ne neb a taaba, tõnd yaa vɩɩm yũug sẽn wat ne vɩɩm. Ãnna n tar pãng n tõe n maan bõn-kãensã?

Bala, tõnd ka wẽnd wa neb wʋsg sẽn dɩkd Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã n leebd n baood yõodã ye. Ayo, tõnd sẽn gomdã yaa ne pʋ-peelem, la goamã yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ, la tõnd gomda Wẽnnaam taoore, la Kirist tũudmã pʋgẽ.
Dẽ wã, dat n yeelame tɩ tõnd leb n sɩngame n na n pẽg d mens bii? Wall tõnd da rata kaset sɛb n wilg yãmb wa neb a taabã sẽn maandã, wall d rata yãmb kaset sɛb n wilg neb a taabã?
Yãmb yaa tõnd sebr sẽn gʋls tõnd sũyã pʋse, neba fãa sẽn mi la b karemdẽ.

Yaa vẽeneg tɩ yãmb yaa Kirist sebre, tõnd sẽn gʋls n tʋme. Ka sẽn gʋls ne gʋls-koom ye, la yaa sẽn gʋls ne Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ wã sɩɩga. Ka sẽn gʋls kug-wals zut ye, la yaa sẽn gʋls yãmb sũyã pʋse.
Yaa tẽeb pidsg-gũudum kãng la tõnd tar Wẽnnaam nengẽ, Kirist maasem yĩnga.
Ka rat n yeel tɩ tõnd mens tara pãng n tõe n maan bũmb kãng ne d mens pãng ye, la yaa tɩ tõnd pãngã yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ d tõe n yɩ bãmb tʋmtʋmdba kãab-paalgã maasem yĩnga. Ka ne tõog sẽn gʋlsã ye, la yaa ne Sɩɩg-sõngo. Bala, tõog sẽn gʋlsã kʋʋdame, la Sɩɩg-sõng kõta vɩɩm.

La sã n yaa tɩ tõog ning sẽn wat-a ne kũuma, b sẽn gʋls-a kug-wals zutã, a sã n da tar ziir hal tɩ Israyɛl kambã rag n ka tõe n ges a Moyiis nengã, yẽ nengã sẽn yãgd ne ziirã yĩnga, tɩ yaool n yaa ziir sẽn na n wa n loogã,
rẽ wã, Sɩɩgã sẽn maand tʋʋmd ningã kõn tall ziir n yɩɩd sɩda.
Tʋʋmd ning sẽn wat ne sɩbgrã sã n da tar ziiri, yaa tʋʋmd ninga sẽn wat ne tɩrlma n tar ziir n yɩɩda.
La b sã n na n mak-b ne taaba, bũmb ninga sẽn ya wa a talla ziirã ka yɩ ziir ye, ziir ning sẽn ya kãseng n yɩɩdã yĩnga.
Rẽnda wã yĩnga, sã n yaa tɩ bũmb ning sẽn loogda paama a ziiri, dẽnd bũmb ning sẽn ka loogdã n tar ziir yɩɩda.
Dẽ, tõnd sẽn tar tẽeb-pidsg gũudum kãngã wã, tõnd tara raood wʋsgo.
La tõnd ka maand wa a Moyiis sẽn da lut a nengã ne peende, tɩ Israyɛl kambã da yã ziir kãng sẽn ya bõn-loaagdgã sɛɛbã ye.
La bãmb yama pagame, bala, hal tɩ ta moasã, bãmb sã n karemd kãab kʋdgã, peen-kãng ket n beeme. Peen-kãng ka tõe n pilg tɩ sã n ka ne a Kirist ye.
Hal tɩ ta moasã, b sã n karẽmd a Moyiis sebrã peenda ket n luda b yama.
La b sã n wẽnemd n tek yam n tẽ "Zu-soabã", peendã pilgdame.
La b sẽn yet tɩ "Zu-soabã", rat n yeelame tɩ Sɩɩga, la Zu-soabã Sɩɩg sẽn be zĩig ninga, lohorem bee be.
Tõnd fãa nems pilgame tɩ nebã ne Zu-soabã ziir kãng beene wa neng-gɛtgẽ, la Zu-soabã, sẽn ya-a Sɩɩgã, tedga tõnd tɩ d wẽneg bãmba, n paamd ziir n paasdẽ.
Wẽnnaam sẽn zoe tõnd nimbãaneg n kõ tõnd tʋʋm kãnga wã yĩng n kɩt tɩ tõnd ka boogd d raood ye.
Tõnd kɩɩsda bũmb nins solg n ya yãn-tʋʋma, tõnd ka tʋmd ne sɩlem ye. La tõnd ka tekd Wẽnnaam goama ye. Tõnd wilgda sɩdã vẽenega, n paamd kaset sõng neba fãa sũyã pʋs Wẽnnaam taoore.
La tõnd sẽn moond koe-noog ningã wã sã n ket n solgame, a solga ne neb nins sẽn na n sãama.
Yaa neb nins sẽn ka tẽed-bã. Dũni kãngã na-wẽngã sẽn yaa a sʋtãan sẽn lud b yamã tɩ b ka tõe n yã Kirist sẽn ya Wẽnnaam mengã wẽnegã koe-noogã ziirã yĩnga.
Ka tõnd mens koɛɛg la d moond ye, yaa a Zezi Kirist koɛɛg la tõnd moonda. La a Zezi maasem yĩnga, tõnd boonda d mens tɩ yãmb tʋmtʋmdba.
Bala, Wẽnnaam sẽn yeel tɩ vẽenem na n yãga lik pʋgẽ wã, yaa Wẽnnaam n kɩt tɩ vẽenemã yãg tõnd sũyã pʋse, tɩ tõnd yã Wẽnnaam ziirã sẽn pɩnd Kirist nengã zugu.
Tõnd zãada paoon-kãngã d yĩnsã sẽn ya wa yagd laasã pʋse. Tɩ pãn-kãseng kãngã na yɩ Wẽnnaam dẽnda, la kõn yɩ tõnd dẽnd ye.
Tõnd paamda namsg buud toor-toore, la b ka kʋʋd tõnd ye. Tõnd dag n ka mi d sẽn na n maaneg ye, la tõnd ka boogd raood ye.
Neb namsda tõndo, la Wẽnnaam sõngda tõndo. B pãbda tõnd n lubdẽ, la d ka kiid ye.
Tõnd tara a Zezi kũuma mamsg d yĩnsã pʋs daar fãa, tɩ neba na yã a Zezi vɩɩmã tõnd yĩnsã pʋse.
Bala, tõnd sẽn vɩ wã, b kẽnda ne tõnd kũum zĩigẽ wakat fãa a Zezi yĩnga, sẽn na n yɩl t'a Zezi vɩɩmã me na puk tõnd yĩn-kiidsã pʋse.
Woto, kũum n maand a tʋʋmd tõnd pʋse, tɩ vɩɩm maand a tʋʋmd yãmb pʋse.
La a wa Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yeel tɩ: Mam tẽeme. Yaa woto yĩng la m n gom-yã. Tõnd me tẽedame, la yaa woto yĩng me n kɩt tɩ tõnd sẽn gomdã.
La d miime tɩ sẽn vʋʋg-a Zu-soab a Zezi wã na n naaga tõnd me ne a Zezi n vʋʋge, la na n kɩtame tɩ tõnd ne yãmb naag taab n yals bãmb taoore.
Bala, bõn-kãens sẽn maandã yaa yãmb yĩnga, tɩ barkã sẽn tat neb wʋsgã kɩt tɩ b pʋʋs Wẽnnaam barka, Wẽnnaam waoogr yĩnga.
Yaa woto yĩng n kɩt tɩ tõnd ka boogd d daood ye. La baa tõnd yĩngã sã n sãame, tõnd sɩɩgã lebgda paalg daar fãa.
Bala, tõnd sẽn na n paam namsg bilf wakat bilf pʋgẽ wã Kɩtdame tɩ tõnd na n paam ziir kãseng sẽn kõn sa n yɩɩda.

Sẽn paase, tõnd sẽn getã, ka bũmb nins nin sẽn ne wã ye, tõnd geta bũmb nins nin sẽn ka tõe n yã wã. Bala, bũmb nins nin sẽn ne wã loogdame, la bũmb nins nin sẽn ka ne wã paada wakat sẽn kõn sa.

Sɩd me, tõnd miime tɩ tõnd tẽng zug ka roogã sẽn ya fu-roogã sã n wa n sãame, tõnd tara roog arzãn pʋga, sẽn ya Wẽnnaam n me. Yaa roog sẽn paad wakat sẽn kõn sa, sẽn ka ninsaalb nus n me ye.
La tõnd sidgda ro-kãng pʋg me n dat arzãn doogã n yeelg n yɩɩd a yembrã,
tɩ tõnd sã n paam yeelgre, tõnd kõn yɩ bɛɛl ye.
Bala, tõnd sẽn ket n be fu-ro-kãngã pʋgã, tõnd sidgdame n tar namsgo, la ka tɩ tõnd dat n yeega tẽng zug roogã ye, la yaa tɩ tõnd data arzãn doogã n yeelge, tɩ vɩɩmã vel yĩn-kiidgã.
Yaa Wẽnnaam n maan tõnd tɩ d yɩ a woto, bãmb n kõ tõnd Sɩɩg-sõng tɩ ya arzegs nins b sẽn bĩng tõndã reng-n-lɛmbga.
Dẽ wã, daar fãa tõnd tara raood wʋsgo, la d miime tɩ tõnd sẽn be yĩn-kãnga pʋgẽ wã, tõnd zãra ne Zu-soabã.
Bala, tõnd kẽnda ne tẽebo, la d ka yã n yaool n tẽed ye.
Tõnd tara raood wʋsgo, la tõnd nongẽ lame n yi n bas yĩng kãnga n kẽng Zu-soabã nengẽ n yɩɩda.
Yaa woto yĩng me tɩ tõnd maoodẽ, n dat n ta bãmb yam, tõnd sã n be yĩn-kãnga pʋga, wall d sã n wa n yi n bas-a.
Bala, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ tõnd fãa yals Kirist bʋʋdã geer taoore, tɩ b keo ned kam fãa wa sẽn zems tʋʋm nins yẽ sẽn tʋm a yĩngã pʋgã. Sã n ya tʋʋm-sõama wall tʋʋm-wẽnse.
Tõnd sẽn mi Zu-soabã rabeem zoeesã, tõnd baoodame n sagl nebã n tõog tɩ b tẽ. Wẽnnaam mii tõnd sõama. La mam tẽedame tɩ yãmb sũyã pʋse, yãmb me mii maam.

Tõnd ka le wilgd yãmb yɛs tɩ tõnd zemsame ye, la tõnd kõta yãmb weer tɩ y maan sũ-noog tõnd yĩnga, tɩ yãmb na tõog n leok neb nins sẽn waoogd b mens ne nin sẽn ne bũmb ninsã, la ka sẽn be sũurẽ wã.
Sɩd me, sã n ya tɩ tõnd yaa ka-yam dãmba, yaa Wẽnnaam yĩnga, la tõnd sã n tara yam, yaa yãmb sõngr yĩnga.
Bala, Kirist nonglemã n so tõndo. Tõnd sẽn bãng vẽeneg n welg tɩ nin-yend n ki neb a fãa yĩnga, tɩ rẽ rat n yeel tɩ yaa neba fãa n ki wã.
A Zezi kii neba fãa yĩnga, tɩ sẽn vɩ-bã kõn leb n vɩ b mens yĩng ye, la b na n vɩɩ sẽn ki-a bãmb yĩng n vʋʋg n bas kũumã yĩnga.

Woto, sẽn sɩng ne moasã, tõnd ka leb n get ned wa sẽn zems ninsaal tagsg ye, la baa tõnd sã n dag n gesa Kirist wa sẽn zems ninsaal tagsgo, moasã, tõnd ka le get bãmb wa sẽn zems ninsaal tagsg yɛs ye.
Ned sã n tũud Kirist, yẽ soab yaa nin-paalga. Bõn-kʋdã loogame, tɩ bũmba fãa lebg paalse.
La yõwã fãa yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ. Kirist maasem yĩnga, Wẽnnaam yiisa yell ning sẽn da be tõnd ne bãmb sʋkã, n kõ tõnd zabr paasg tʋʋmde.
Bala, yaa ne Kirist la Wẽnnaam yiis yell ning sẽn da be bãmb ne dũniyã sʋka, n ka le geelgd ninsaalbã beegrã ye. La b ninga zabr paasg koɛɛg togsg tõnd zutu.
Dẽ, tõnd yaa Kirist tʋmtʋmdba, tɩ tõnd sẽn gomd ne yãmbã, yaa Wẽnnaam n tall tõnd n gomd ne yãmba: Tõnd kota yãmb ne Kirist yʋʋr tɩ y leb n paam lagem-n-taar ne Wẽnnaam!
Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ Kirist sẽn ka maan yel-wẽna lebg yel-wẽn tõnd yĩnga, tɩ tõnd tõe n lebg nin-tɩrs Kirist pʋg Wẽnnaam taoore.
Tõnd sẽn ya Wẽnnaam tʋmd-n-taasã yĩnga, tõnd kota yãmb tɩ y ra bas bark ninga yãmb sẽn deeg Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã tɩ yɩ zaalem ye.
Bala, bãmb yetame: Mam leoka foom sẽn zems a wakate, la fo sẽn dat fãagr wakate, mam waa n sõnga foom. Ade, moasã yaa wakat sẽn zemse. Ade, moasã yaa fãagr daare.
Tõnd ka rat tɩ d yel-manesem baa yen lub ned ye, tɩ ned da wa n gom tõnd tʋʋmdã wẽng ye.
La bũmb fãa pʋga tõnd wilgdame tɩ tõnd yaa Wẽnnaam tʋmtʋmdba, n maand sũ-mar wʋsg namsgã pʋgẽ, la naongã pʋgẽ, la sũ-sãamsã pʋgẽ,
la pãbre, la bi-bees rot kõom, la tẽn-dãmbg pʋgẽ, la tʋʋm-wɛgl pʋgẽ, la gõeem sẽn ka be, la kom pʋgẽ.
Tõnd wilgdame tɩ d yaa Wẽnnaam tʋmtʋmdba, ne pʋ-peelem, ne bãngre, ne sũ-maasem ne sõmblem, ne Sɩɩg-sõngo, la ne nonglem sẽn ka naag ne zãmbo,
ne koɛɛg sẽn ya sɩda, la ne Wẽnnaam pãnga, ne tɩrlem zab teed sẽn tar n zabdẽ, la sẽn tar n kogend d menga, waoogre, la paoogr pʋgẽ,
yʋ-beedo la yʋ-noog pʋgẽ, neb geta tõnd wa zĩrĩ be-neba baa ne tõnd sẽn togsd sɩdã.
B geta tõnd wa sãamba, baa ne b fãa sẽn mi tõndã. B geta tõnd wa kiidba, la tõnd yaool n vɩɩme. B geta tõnd wa neb b sẽn sɩbgde, la b ka kʋʋd tõnd ye.

B geta tõnd wa sũ-saoong rãmba la tõnd tara sũ-noog daar fãa. B geta tõnd wa naong rãmba, la tõnd kɩtdame tɩ neb wʋsg lebgd arzegs rãmba. B geta tõnd wa neb sẽn ka tar baa fʋɩ, la tõnd yaool n tara bũmb fãa.
Korẽnt neba, tõnd goma vẽeneg ne yãmba. D pelga d pʋs ne yãmba.
Tõnd ka solg yãmb d nonglem ye. La yãmb ka wilg tõnd y nonglem ye.
Mam gomda ne yãmb wa m kamba, bɩ y tags tõnd yell wa tõnd sẽn tagsd yãmb yellã. Yãmb me pelg y pʋs ne tõndo.
Bɩ y da paam lagem-n-taar ne neb nins sẽn ka tẽedbã ye. Bala, bõe lagem-n-taar n be tɩrlem ne wẽng sʋka? Wall bõe lagem-n-taar n be vẽenem ne lik sʋka?
La bõe zems-n-taar n be Kirist ne a Sʋtãan sʋka? Wall ned ning sẽn tẽedã tara bõe pʋɩɩr ne ned ning sẽn ka tẽedã?

Bõe lagem-n-taar n be Wẽnnaam doogã ne wẽn-naands sʋka? Bala, tõnd yaa Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ roogo, wa Wẽnnaam sẽn yeel tɩ: Mam na n zĩnda ne bãmba, la m kẽn bãmb sʋka. Mam na n yɩɩ bãmb Wẽnnaam, la bãmb na n yɩɩ mam neba.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ Zu-soaba yetẽ yaa: Yi-y bãmb sʋka, welg-y toor ne-ba. La y ra sɩɩs bũmb sẽn ya rẽgd ye, la mam na reeg yãmba.
Mam na n yɩɩ yãmb Ba, la yãmb na n yɩɩ mam kom-dibli la m kom-pugli. Yaa Zu-soabã, sẽn-tõe-a fãa wã n yeele.
Woto yĩnga, m zo-nongdse, tõnd sẽn tar kãab kãensã wã, bɩ d yɩlg d mens ne rẽgd ninga sẽn dẽgemd yĩngã ne sɩɩgã, n bɩ sõmblem sẽn zems zãng pʋgẽ n paase, Wẽnnaam dabeem zoees pʋgẽ.
Bas-y tɩ d paam weer y sũyã pʋsẽ. Tõnd ka maan ned baa yen wẽnga, tõnd ka sãam ned baa a yen yelle, tõnd ka zãmb ned n deeg a bũmbu.
Mam sẽn gomd a woto wã, ka sẽn na n mong yãmb bʋʋm ye. Bala, mam dag n zoe n yeelame tɩ tõnd tagsda yãmb yelle, d sã n vɩ wall d sã n ki.
Mam sũur keema wʋsg ne yãmba, mam sũur nooma ne yãmba. Mam paamda belsgo. Baa tõnd namsgã fãa pʋgẽ, mam tara sũ-no-kãsenga.
Bala, tõnd sẽn ta Masedoan soolmẽ wã tɛka, tõnd yĩnsã ka tol n paam vʋʋsg baa bilf ye. Tõnd paama namsg buud fãa. Yɩng yaa maoore, la pʋgẽ yaa rabeem.
La Wẽnnaam sẽn belsd sũ-sãoong rãmbã, b belsa tõnd ne a Tit waoongã.

La ka ne a Tit waoongã bal ye, leb n yaa ne belsg ning yẽ sẽn paam yãmb nengẽ wã me. Yẽ togsa tõnd yãmb sẽn dat maam wʋsg to-to wã, yãmb nintãm la y sẽn dat n sõng maam to-to wã. Rẽ kɩtame tɩ mam paam sũ-noog wʋsg n paase.
Baa mam sebrã sã n sãama yãmb sũyã, mam ka maand m bãngẽ ye. La baa mam sã n maana m bãngẽ, yɩɩ wakat bilf pʋgẽ, mam sẽn yã tɩ seb-kãngã sãama yãmb sũyã yĩnga.

Mam maanda sũ-noog moasã, la ka m sẽn sãam yãmb sũyã yĩng ye. Yaa yãmb sũ-sãoongã sẽn kɩt tɩ yãmb tek yam n kos sugrã yĩnga. Bala, yãmb sũ-sãoongã yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ. Rẽ wã, tõnd ka maan yãmb bũmb sẽn na n sãam-y ye.
Sɩd me, sũ-sãoong ninga sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã kɩtdame tɩ ned tek yam n kos sugr n paam fãagre, la ned ka maand a bãngẽ rẽ yĩng ye. La dũni wã sũ-sãoong wata ne kũum.

La ad sũ-sãoong ninga sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ wã sẽn modg yãmb tɩ y maan bũmb ninsi: A kɩtame tɩ y yiis yell y mens zutu, a waa ne sũ-pa-noaanga, a waa ne rabeem, a waa ne ratem kãsenga, a waa ne yamleoogo, a waa ne sɩbgre. Bũmba fãa pʋgẽ, yãmb wilgame tɩ y ka tar yell yel-kãnga pʋg ye.
Rẽ wã, mam sẽn gʋls yãmbã, ka sẽn maan-a yellã yĩnga, a ka ned ning yẽ sẽn beegã me yĩng ye. La yaa sẽn na n yɩl tɩ yãmb sẽn nong tõnd to-to wã yɩ vẽeneg yãmb sʋk Wẽnnaam taoore.
Yaa rẽ n kɩt tɩ tõnd paam belsgã. La sẽn paasd tõnd sẽn paam belsgã, a Tit sẽn paam raood ning yãmb fãa nengẽ t'a sũurã noomẽ wã leb n kõo tõnd sũ-noog wʋsg n yɩɩd yɛsa.

Sã n ya mam sẽn pẽg m meng bilf a Tit taoor yãmb wɛɛngẽ wã, bõn-kãng yãnd ka tar maam ye. Wa tõnd sẽn dag n togs yãmb sɩd daar fãa wã, woto me, tõnd sẽn pẽg d mens yãmb wɛɛngẽ a Tit taoorã me yɩɩ sɩda.
La a Tit sã n tẽeg yãmb fãa sakrã yelle, a paamda nonglem wʋsg yãmb yĩng n paasdẽ, bala yãmb deega yẽnda ne rabeem la rigbu.
Mam maanda sũ-noogo, mam sẽn n tõe n kɩs sɩd ne yãmb bũmb fãa pʋgẽ wã yĩnga.
M ba-biisi, tõnd datame tɩ yãmb bãng Wẽnnaam barkã sẽn puk wẽnd-dot nins sẽn be Masedoannã sʋk to-to.
Baa ne bãmb sẽn paam makr ne tood wʋsgã, bãmb sũ-noogã yɩɩ kãsenga, tɩ baa ne b naongã sẽn ya wʋsgã, b kõo wʋsg ne sũyã fãa.
Mam kɩta kaset tɩ bãmb kõo ne b pãng tɛka. B kõo ne yamleoog n yɩɩd b pãng sẽn tõe menga.
Bãmb kosa tõnd ne b sũyã fãa tɩ d bas-b tɩ b naag n sõng Wẽnnaam nin-tũusidsã sẽn be Zeruzalɛmã.
Bãmb deng n dɩka b mens n kõ Zu-soabã, la b sak tõnd ne Wẽnnaam daabo. Woto yɩɩda tõnd sẽn da tẽedã.
Tõnd kosa a Tit me t'a maan nonglem tʋʋm-kãng yẽ sẽn sɩng yãmb sʋkã n baase.
A wa yãmb sẽn modgd ne bũmb fãa wã: Sã n ya tẽebo, goama, bãngre, la yãmb sẽn wɩngd ne bũmb fãa, la y tar nonglem tõnd yĩngã, bɩ y modg ne nonglem tʋʋm kãng maaneg me.
Mam sẽn yet a woto wã, ka pãng la m dat n maan-y ye, la yaa sẽn na n dɩk neb a taabã sẽn maandã n mak n ges yãmb nonglema sã n yaa sɩda.
Bala, yãmb mii tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist barkã. Tɩ baa bãmb sẽn ya arzɛk soabã, b maana b meng naong soab yãmb yĩnga, tɩ ne bãmb naongã, yãmb na paam arzegse.

Yaa mam tagsog la m kõt yel-kãngã zugu. Bala, bõn-kãng toga ne yãmba, yãmb sẽn yɩ pipi rãmb sẽn sɩng ne rɩɩgẽ n maan ligd-lobrã, la ka y sẽn yɩ pipi rãmb n maan-a wã bal ye, yãmb n yɩ pipi rãmb n tʋlg n na n maan-a.
Rẽ wã, moasã, bɩ y maan-a n baase, tɩ yãmb sẽn yãk yam n wilg tɩ y rat n maan-a lame wã, bɩ y kell n tall datem n maan-a n baase, la maan-y-yã-a wa sẽn zems yãmb pãnga.
Bala, ned sã n tar datem tɩ kõ wa sẽn zems yẽ sẽn tar bũmb ningã, a tata Wẽnnaam yam n yɩɩd yẽ sẽn na n dat n kõ bũmb ning yẽ sẽn ka tarã.
Bala, mam ka rat tɩ yãmb sẽn sõngd neb a taabã kẽes yãmb naong pʋg ye. La yaa sẽn na yɩl tɩ yãmb zeng taaba, tɩ yãmb sẽn tar bũmb ning tɩ sek moasa wã tõe n sõng bãmb b naongã pʋgẽ,
la tɩ bãmb me sã n wa tar bũmb ning tɩ sekd-ba, bɩ b tõe n sõng yãmb me y naongã pʋgẽ. Sã n yɩ a woto, yãmb na n yɩɩ zem-taaba,
tɩ yɩ wa gʋls sõamyã sẽn yeel tɩ: Ned ning sẽn paam wʋsgã ka tar baa fʋɩ tɩ loog ye, la bũmb ka paoog ned ning sẽn paam bilfã ye.
Bark Wẽnnaam, bãmb sẽn ning yam-yãk-kãnga me a Tit sũurẽ yãmb yĩngã.
Bala, a Tit saka tõnd kosgã, la yẽ sẽn tar ratma, a yãka yam ne a sũur fãa n na n wa yãmb nengẽ.
Tõnd tʋmda ba-biig ning sẽn tar pẽgr zĩiga fãa ne koe-noogã tʋʋmd a Zezi tẽedba sʋkã t'a tũ a Tit.
Sẽn yɩɩd fãa, a Zezi tẽedbã yãka yẽnda t'a yãag tõnd sõngr-tʋʋm-kãnga pʋgẽ, tõnd sẽn tʋmd Zu-soaba meng waoogr yĩnga, la tɩ yɩ kaset tɩ tõnd tara ratem tɩ maan ne d sũyã fãa.
Tõnd maanda a woto tɩ ned da wa n tõog n dõd tõnd ne ligd kãng sẽn ya wʋsg tɩ tõnd get a yellã wɛɛngẽ ye.
Bala, tõnd baood n maana sẽn ya neere, ka Zu-soaba nifẽ bal ye, la ninsaalba nifẽ me.
Tõnd tʋmda d ba-biiga ne bãmba. Tõnd paama weer naoor wʋsg n mak a tʋʋmdã ratem n gese, la moasã a wilgame t'a tara ratem ne tʋʋma n yɩɩd pĩnda, a sẽn kɩs sɩd ne yãmbã yĩnga.
Woto, sẽn kẽed ne a Tit wɛɛngẽ, yẽ yaa mam tũud-n-taaga la m tʋmd-n-taag yãmb yĩnga. La sã n ya ne d ba-biisã, bãmb yaa neb tẽedbã sẽn tʋme, Kirist waoogr yĩnga.
Dẽ wã, bɩ y maan bũmb n wilg bãmb ne a Zezi tẽedbã tɩ yãmb tara nonglem, tɩ rẽ na n wilgame tɩ tõnd dag n tara bʋʋm la d sẽn pẽgd yãmb bãmb nifẽ wã.
Ka tɩlɛ tɩ mam gʋls yãmb sõngr ning sẽn tog n kõ tẽedbã wɛɛngẽ ye.
Sɩd me, mam mii yãmb ratem sõngã, la mam pẽga m meng yãmb wɛɛngẽ Masedoan neba taoor n yeel tɩ Akayi neba rag n seglame n sɛ hal rɩɩgẽ, la yãmb sẽn modgdã kɩtame tɩ neb wʋsg me rat n maane.
Mam tʋmda ba-biisã yãmb nengẽ, tɩ tõnd sẽn pẽg yãmbã kõn yɩ zaalem bõn-kãng wɛɛngẽ ye, la tɩ yãmb na segl n sɛ wa mam sẽn yeelã.
Mam ka rat tɩ Masedoan nebã yãag maam n wa n mik tɩ yãmb ka segl n sɛ ye, tɩ tõnd sẽn kɩs sɩd ne yãmbã da wa n lebg yãnd ne tõnd ye. La yaa m sẽn ka rat n yeel tɩ yãmb yãnda yĩnga.

Dẽ, mam tagsdame tɩ yaa neer tɩ m kos ba-biisã tɩ b reng maam taoor n wa yãmb nengẽ, n ges nonglem kũunã yãmb sẽn zoe n kãabã yelle, tɩ y tõe n segl n sɛ, tɩ yɩ yamleoog kũuni, la ra yɩ wa zoe-bõn kũun ye.
Bãng-y tɩ ned ning sẽn bʋt bilf na n tigsa bilfu, la ned ning sẽn bʋt wʋsg na n tigsa wʋsgo.
Bɩ ned kam fãa kõ wa sẽn zems a sẽn yãk yam a sũur pʋgẽ, la ra yɩ ne neng-gãneng wall modgr ye. Bala, Wẽnnaam nonga ned ning sẽn kõt ne sũ-noogo.
La Wẽnnaam tara pãn-tõog tɩ kõ yãmb bark buud fãa tɩ seke. Tɩ yãmb tõe n paam bũmb fãa, daar fãa, sẽn na sõng yãmb y ratmã fãa pʋgẽ n sek n kell tɩ y maan tʋʋm soamã fãa,
tɩ yɩ wa gʋls sõamyã sẽn yeelã: A kɩtame t'a tʋʋm sõama wã saag zĩig fãa. A kõo naong rãmba. Yẽ tɩrlem paada wakat sẽn kõn sa.
Soab ning sẽn kõt-a ka-koaad bõn-buudu, la b kõt-a bur t'a rɩtẽ wã na n kõo yãmb bõn-buudu, la b kɩt t'a wom wʋsgo, la b kɩt tɩ yãmb tɩrlma biis yɩ wʋsgo.
Woto, yãmb na paam arzegs bũmb fãa pʋgẽ, n yãk tɩ yɩ nonglem kũuni tɩ neb wʋsg na pʋʋs Wẽnnaam barka, kũuna tõnd sẽn kõ-bã yĩnga.
Bala, ka Wẽnnaam nebã bal la nonglem kũun kãngã na n sõng ye. A na n kɩtame tɩ neb wʋsg pʋʋs Wẽnnaam barka.
Bãmb sã n paam sõng-kãnga, b na n pẽga Wẽnnaam, yãmb sẽn sak n kɩs Kirist koe-noogã kaseto, la yãmb sẽn kõ kũun wʋsg bãmb yĩnga, la neba fãa yĩngã.
B pʋʋsda yãmb yĩng ne nonglem, Wẽnnaam sẽn sik bark kãseng yãmb zutã yĩnga.
Bark Wẽnnaam, bãmb kũuna noor sẽn ka tõe n togsa yĩnga.
Maam a Poll kota yãmb ne sũ-bʋgsem, Kirist sõmblemã pʋgẽ, mam sẽn ya nin-bʋgsga, m sẽn wat n be ne yãmba la m ya nin-toaag m sẽn wat n zãr ne yãmbã.

Mam kota yãmba, tɩ mam sã n wa n be yãmb nengẽ, bɩ y ra maan tɩ yɩ tɩlɛ tɩ mam yɩ nin-toaag wa mam sẽn tagsd n na n yɩ nin-toaag ne neb nins sẽn tagsd tɩ tõnd kẽnda wa sẽn zems yĩngã datmã ye.
Tõnd sɩd bee yĩng pʋga, la tõnd ka zabd wa yĩngã sẽn zabdã ye.
Bala, tõnd sẽn tar zab-teed nins n zabdẽ wã ka yĩng zab-teed ye. La zab-te-kãens tara pãng Wẽnnaam nifẽ n tõe n leeb pãens rãmbã n lubi.
Tagsd nins ne bũmb nins fãa sẽn zẽkd b mens n zabdẽ tɩ nebã kõn bãng Wẽnnaamã, tõnd leebd-b lame n lubdẽ, la tõnd tõogda tagsd buud fãa n kɩt tɩ b sak Kiristã.
Yãmb sã n wa n sak zãng fasɩ, tõnd seglame n na n sɩbg kɩɩsg buud fãa.
Yãmb geta bũmb nins yãmb ninã sẽn ne wã! Ned sã n tẽed t'a yaa Kirist rẽnda, bɩ a meng bãng bõn-kãngã me: Yẽ sã n ya Kirist rẽnda, tõnd me yaa Kirist rẽnda.
La baa mam sã n maand sũ-noog wʋsg bilf ne noor ning Zu-soabã sẽn kõ tõnd tɩ d paas yãmb pãnga, la ka sẽn na n sãam yãmbã, yãnd kõn yõk maam ye.
Mam ka rat t'a yɩ wa mam dat n kẽesa yãmb dabeem ne mam sɛbã ye.
Bala, b yetame tɩ: A Poll sɛba yaa toogo, la b tara pãnga, la b meng sã n be tõnd sʋka, b ka pãng ye, la b goamã ka tar yõod ye.
Bɩ ned ning sẽn gomd a woto wã bãng neer tɩ tõnd sẽn ka be yãmb sʋk n gomd to-to d sɛbã pʋsã, tõnd sã n wa n be yãmb sʋk me, tõnd tʋʋmã yaa a woto bala.
Tõnd ka saagd n zeng d mens wall d mak d mens ne neb nins sẽn wilgd tɩ b mens zemsame wã ye. La bãmb sẽn mamsd b mens la b makd b mens ne taabã, b ka yam ye.
Sã n yaa ne tõndo, tõnd ka rat n pẽg d mens tɩ loog ye, la tõnd na n dɩka mamsg ne tʋʋmd ning Wẽnnaam sẽn pʋɩ n kõ tõndo, la b leb n kɩt tɩ d tõog n ta hal yãmb nengẽ wã.
Tõnd ka loogd d toadg wa tõnd dag n ka ta hal yãmb nengẽ ye. Bala, tõnd talla Kirist koe-noogã n ta hal yãmb nengẽ.
Tõnd ka pẽgd d mens tɩ loog ne tʋʋm sẽn ya ned a to rẽnd ye. La tõnd tẽedame tɩ yãmb tẽebã sã n paasdẽ, tõnd tʋʋmdã na n lebga kãseng yãmb sʋka, zĩig ning sẽn ya tõnd dẽndã,
tɩ d moon koe-noogã soolem nins sẽn be yãmb taoorã, la ka tɩ d pẽg d mens ne tʋʋm nins sẽn zoe n tʋm neb a taab soolmẽ ye.
Wa Wẽnnaam gʋls sõamyã sẽn yeelã: Ned ning sẽn na n pẽg a menga, bɩ a pẽg a menga, a sẽn tũud Zu-soabã yĩnga.
Bala, ka ned ning sẽn wilgd t'a zemsame wã n tat Wẽnnaam yam ye, yaa Zu-soabã sẽn wilgd tɩ ned ninga zemsame wã.
Mam nongẽ la yãmb sã n da tõe n sakẽ mam yalemdã bilfu! La yãmb sakdame.

Bala, mam maanda sũ-kiir yãmb yĩnga, la yaa sũ-kiir sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ, tɩ bõe mam sẽn dɩk yãmb n kõ sɩd a yen tãa wã yĩnga. Tɩ mam tõe tall yãmb n kẽng Kirist nengẽ wa pʋg-sad sẽn ka sãam ye.
La baoosgo, a wa waafã sẽn maan sɩlem n zãmb a Awa wã, mam yɛɛsdame tɩ yãmb yam na n wa wẽnemd n lebg wẽng n kɩt tɩ y bas y sõmblema ne y pʋ-peelma y sẽn tar Kirist yĩngã.

Bala, ned a to sã n yɩ pipi n wa moon yãmb Zezi a to, tɩ ka Zezi ninga tõnd sẽn da moon yãmbã, wall yãmb sã n deeg sɩɩg a to sẽn ka Sɩɩg ninga yãmb sẽn dag n deegã, wall koe-noog a to tɩ ka yãmb sẽn da reeg pĩndã, yãmb sakda yẽ soab sõama.
La mam yaool n tẽedame tɩ m ka yɩ poorẽ soab bũmb baa a fʋɩ pʋgẽ, ne tẽn-tʋmdb nins sẽn yet b mens tɩ b yaa tẽn-tʋmd-kãsemsã ye.
Baa mam sã n ka gom minim-soaba, mam ka ned sẽn ka tar bãngr ye. La tõnd wilga bõn-kãng vẽeneg yãmb sʋk wakat fãa, bũmb fãa pʋga.
Bɩ Mam sẽn moon yãmb Wẽnnaam koe-noogã zaalma, n sik m meng n zẽk yãmbã, m maana yel-wẽnde?
Mam fãa a Zezi tẽedbã sẽn be zĩis a taabã, mam sẽn sak tɩ bãmb yao maam tɩ m sõng yãmba yĩnga. La mam sẽn da wa n be yãmb nengẽ n dat sõngrã, mam ka yɩ zɩɩb ned baa a ye yĩng ye.

Bala, ba-biis nins sẽn yi Masedoan n wa wã kõo maam bũmb ning sẽn da paoog maamã. Bũmba fãa pʋgẽ, mam gũusa m menga, n da wa n yɩ zɩɩb yãmb yĩng ye, la mam na n kell n gũusa m menga ne bõn-kãnga.
Ne Kirist sɩdã sẽn be mam sũurẽ wã, mam yetame tɩ ned ka tõe n gɩdg maam tɩ m ka pẽg m meng bõn-kãng wɛɛngẽ Akayi soolmã pʋgẽ ye.
Bõe yĩng tɩ m yet a woto? Yaa mam sẽn ka nong yãmb yĩng bii? Wẽnnaam menga miime tɩ mam nonga yãmba.
Mam sẽn maand bũmb ninga, mam na n kell n maan-a lame yɛsa, tɩ gɩdg neb nins sẽn baood weer n dat n pẽg b mens n yeel tɩ bãmb sẽn tʋmdã ne tõnd sẽn tʋmdã yaa a yembrã.
Nin-bãmba rãmb yaa zãmb tẽn-tʋmdba, la belgr tẽn-tʋmdba, n toeemd b mens n ya wa Kirist tẽn-tʋmdba.
La yõwã ka bõn-lingdg ye, bala, sʋtãanã meng toeemda a meng n lebg wa malɛk sẽn tar vẽenem.
Dẽ wã, yẽ tʋmtʋmdbã me sã n toeemd b mens n lebgd wa tɩrlem tʋmtʋmdba, ka bõn-yɛɛsdg ye. Bãmb baoosg na n yɩɩ wa b tʋʋmã sẽn ya to-to wã.
Mam leb n yetame: Bɩ ned da ges maam wa yalem ye, wall y sã n get maam wa yalma, bɩ y sak n deeg maam wa yalma, tɩ mam me tõe n pẽg m meng bilfu.
Mam sẽn gomd bũmb ningã, ka Zu-soabã n yet tɩ m gom ye. La mam gomda ne pɛl-kɛgenga, wa m yaa yalma, n pẽg m meng bõn-kãng pʋgẽ.
Neb wʋsg sẽn pẽgd b mens ne dũni yɛlã, mam me na n pẽga m menga.
Yãmb sẽn ya yam dãmb n yaool n sakd n deegd yalemb ne yamleoogo!
Sɩd me, yãmb sakdame tɩ b kẽesd yãmb yembdo, tɩ b rɩt yãmba, tɩ b fãad yãmba, tɩ b ka nand yãmba, la b pãbd yãmb pegse.
Mam yetame tɩ yaa yãnde. Tõnd maana pãn-komsem n ka tõog n maan a woto ye. Baoosgo, ne bũmb ning fãa ned sẽn tar raood tɩ pẽg a menga, mam me tara raoodo, mam gomda wa yalma.
Bãmb yaa Hebre rãmba? Mam me yaa Hebre. Bãmb yaa Israyɛl buudu? Mam me yaa Israyɛl neda. B yaa a Abraham yagense? Mam me yaa a Abraham yagenga

Bãmb yaa Kirist tʋmtʋmdba? Maam n leb n yɩɩda. Mam gomda wa m zugã ka be ye. Sã n ya ne tʋʋma, maam n yɩɩd-ba, ne bi-bees roog kõom, maam n yɩɩd-ba, ne pãbr deegre, maam n leb n yɩɩd-ba, la mam kolga kũum naoor wʋsgo.
Zuif-rãmbã pãba maam ne kalwaas a yen ka pis-naase, naoor a nu.
B pãba maam ne rasab naoor a tã, b loba maam kug vugri, koom-kogond sãama naoor a tã tɩ mam be b pʋse. Mam paa koom zug daar tõre la yʋng tõre.

Kʋɩls rag n na n dɩɩ maam wakat kẽere, m kẽna pʋse. Fãadb rag n na n fãa maam. Mam tẽngẽ neb baoo n na n sãama maam. Neb nins sẽn ka Zuif buudã baoo n na n sãama maam, mam paama tood tẽns pʋsẽ, mam dag n na n kii wetẽ. Mam dag n na n kii ko-kãsengã zugu, zãmb ba-biis rag n na n kʋʋ maam.
Mam tʋma tʋʋm-kegemse, mam namsame. Wakat kẽere, mam ka gũs ye. Kom la ko-yũud yõka maam. Mam gãanda kom wakat kẽere. Wakat kẽere, waood yõka maam la fut paooga maam,
tɩ m ka gomd bũmb nins sẽn ketã ye. Mam tara zɩɩb daar fãa, a Zezi tẽedbã fãa yɛl sẽn pak maamã yĩnga.
Ãnna pãng n boog tɩ mam dẽnd ka booge? Annã n lʋɩ yel-wẽnd pʋgẽ tɩ mam sũur ka sãame?
Pẽg-m-meng sã n noome, mam na pẽg m pãng-komsem.
Wẽnnaam sẽn ya tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Ba wã, sẽn tar-a bark wakat sẽn kõn sa wã miime tɩ mam ka yagd zĩrĩ ye!...
Mam sẽn wa n be Damasã, rĩm a Areta Gʋvɛrneerã ra kɩtdame tɩ b gũud Damas tẽnga noy n dat n yõk maam.
La b kẽesa maam peoogẽ n tũnug roog fẽnetr n sik maam lalgã poor tɩ mam põse, t'a ka paam maam ye.
Yaa tɩlɛ tɩ m pẽg m menga? Bõn-kãng ka tar yõod ye. Baoosgo, mam na n togsa mam sẽn yã yãab ninsi, la vẽnegr nins Zu-soabã sẽn kõ maamã.

Yʋʋm piig la a naas sẽn looge, mam bãnga Kirist tẽed a yembr sẽn paam zẽkr n ta saas a tãab soabã. Mam ka mi yẽ soab sã n da bee a yĩngã pʋga, wall a sã n da ka be a yĩng pʋgẽ ye, la Wẽnnaam miime.
Rao-kãngã sã n da bee a yĩngã pʋga, wall a ka be, mam ka mi ye, la Wẽnnaam miime, la mam sẽn mi yaa tɩ
rao-kãngã zẽkame n kẽng Paradi, la a wʋma goama, ned sẽn ka tõe n togs ye, la b sẽn ka kõ ninsaal noor t'a gom-a ye.
Mam na n pẽga m meng rao-kãnga wɛɛngẽ, la mam mengã wɛɛngẽ, mam ka na n pẽg n meng ye. Sã n ka m pẽg m meng pãn-komsem bala.
La mam sã n dat n pẽg m menga, mam ka na n maan yalemd ye, bala mam na n togsa sɩda. La mam gũusda m meng tɩ ned da wa n yã mam sẽn maandã, la a wʋm mam sẽn gõmdã n tags tɩ maam n yɩɩd ye.
La sẽn na n yɩl tɩ mam da wuk m meng vẽneg-kãsem kãensã yĩnga, b ninga gõaag mam yĩnga pʋgẽ, sẽn ya sʋtãan tʋmtʋmd t'a paoogd maam, tɩ mam da wa n pid ne wuk m meng ye.
Mam bõsa Zu-soaba naoor a tãab tɩ b kɩt tɩ bõn-kãng loog n bas maam.
La b yeela maam yaa: "Mam barka sekda foom. Bala, yaa pãn-komsmã pʋg la mam pãngã maand a tʋʋmde." Dẽnd mam na n maana sũ-noog m pãn-komsmã pʋga, tɩ Kirist pãngã zĩnd mam zugu.

Yaa woto yĩng tɩ mam maand sũ-noog m pãn-komsmã pʋgẽ, paoogrã pʋgẽ, m sẽn ka tar m sẽn dat pʋgẽ, namsg pʋgẽ, la tood mam sẽn sak Kirist yĩngã pʋgẽ. Bala yaa mam pãn-komsmã wakat la mam tar pãnga.
Yãmb modga maam tɩ m yɩ yalma. Sɩd me, yaa yãmb n da tog n gom n sõng maam. Bala, b sẽn boond-b rãmb tɩ tẽn-tʋmd-kãsemsã pʋs n ka yɩɩd maam ye, baa ne mam sẽn ka baa fɩ wã.
Bãn nins sẽn ya toor n wilgdẽ tɩ mam yaa tẽn-tʋmdã maana yãmb sʋk tɩ neba yã, yɩɩ ne sũ-mare, makrã fãa pʋgẽ, la ne bãna, la bõn-yɛɛsdse, la ne bõn-bãna.
Yaa bõe la yãmb paam-y tɩ ka ta a Zezi tẽedba a taabã sẽn tarã, sã n ka mam sẽn ka sak tɩ y ges mam yellã bala? Kõ-y-m sugr ne kong kãngã.

Ade, mam seglame n sɛ n na n wa yãmb nengẽ naoor a tãab-n-soaba, la yãmb ka na n ges mam yell ye. Bala, mam ka baood yãmb bũmb ye, la yaa yãmb mensã la m baooda. Sɩd me, ka kamb n tog tigs paoong b ba-rãmb yĩng ye, la yaa ba-rãmbã n tog n tigs paoong b kamb yĩnga.
Ne maam, mam na n kɩsa bũmb fãa ne yamleoogo, la m kɩs m menga fãa yãmb mensa yĩnga. Mam sẽn nong yãmb wʋsgã kɩtame tɩ yãmb ka le nong maam wʋsg laa?
Baa sã n ya a woto, mam ka yɩ zɩɩb yãmb yĩng ye la nina na n tagsame tɩ mam maana sɩlem n paam yãmba.
Rẽ yĩnga, mam sẽn tʋm neb nins yãmb nengẽ wã, m tũnuga bãmb ned a bõe n belg yãmb n deeg bũmbu?

Mam sagla a Tit t'a wa yãmb nengẽ, la m tʋma ba-biig a yen t'a tũ yẽnda. Rẽ yĩnga, a Tit belga yãmb n deeg bũmbu? Yẽnda tagsgã ne mam dẽnda ka a yembr sɩda? Tõnd tʋʋm tʋmdɩ wã ka a yembr sɩda?

Hal daar zãra, yãmb da tagsame tɩ tõnd dat n baoo bʋʋm yãmb taoore, la ka a woto ye. Yaa Wẽnnaam taoore, Kirist tũudmã pʋgẽ la tõnd gomda. M zo-nongdse, bõn-kãensã fãa yaa yãmb tẽebã bɩɩsg yĩnga.

Bala, mam zoeta m na n wa wa n mik tɩ yãmb ka ya wa mam sẽn datã ye, la tɩ yãmb da mik tɩ mam mengã ka ya wa yãmb sẽn datã ye. Mam yɛɛsdame tɩ welgre, la sũ-kiiri, la kis-taaba, la geesem-geesem, la wɩdga, la paoog-taaba, la wuk-m-meng la zũnglug na n wa zĩnd yãmb sʋka.

Mam zoeta m na n wa wa yãmb nengẽ, tɩ mam Wẽnnaamã leb n ning maam yãnd yãmb yĩnga, la tɩ mam da wa n yãbe, neb wʋsg sẽn dag n maan yel-wẽn n ka tek yam n kos sugr yĩnga, la b tʋʋm-dẽgdã la b yoobã yĩnga, la tʋʋm beedã b sẽn maana yĩng ye.
Mam wata yãmb nengẽ naoor a tãab-n-soaba. Yɛla fãa na n paama manegre, ne neb a yiib bɩ a tãab kaseto.

Mam sẽn dag n zĩnd yãmb nengẽ naoor a yiib-n-soabã, mam dag n zoee n togsa yãmb bõn-kãngã, la dũnna, mam sẽn ka be yãmb nengẽ wã, mam leb n deng n togsd-a-la neb nins sẽn maan yel-wẽna wakat sẽn loogã, la neb a taabã fãa. Mam sã n lebg n wa yãmb nengẽ, m ka na n bas ned baa yembr ye.
Bala, yãmb baooda bãnd sẽn wilgd tɩ Kirist tũnugda maam n gomda. Bãmb yaool n ka pãn-komsem soab yãmb yĩng ye, la b yaa pãn-kãseng soab yãmb sʋka.

Bala, b kaa a Zezi da-pɩk zug b pãn-komsem yĩnga, la bãmb vɩɩ ne Wẽnnaam pãnga. Tõnd me yaa pãn-komsem dãmb a Zezi tũudmã pʋgẽ, la tõnd vɩɩ ne bãmba n tʋmd yãmb yĩnga, ne Wẽnnaam pãnga.
