Dẽ yĩnga, ka bãmb n paoogd yʋ-sõng ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ yãmbã?
Sɩda, yãmb sã n sakd Wẽnnaam soolem tõog sẽn be gʋls-sõamyã pʋgẽ, n yetẽ tɩ: Nong f to wa f mengã, yãmb maanda neere.
La yãmb sã n get nebã n tũusd-ba, yãmb maanda yel-wẽnde, la tõogã kɩtame tɩ yãmb bãng tɩ y beegame.
Bala, ned ning fãa sẽn sak-a tõodã fãa, n yaool n maan yel-wẽnd n kɩɩs a yen tãa, a lebga bɛɛgd ne tõodã fãa.
Soab ning sẽn yeel tɩ: Ra yo wã, soab kãng me n yeel tɩ: Ra kʋ wã. La fo sã n ka n maan yoobo, n yaool n kʋ neda, fo lebga tõog kɩɩsda.
Gom-y la y tʋm wa neb b sẽn na n tall lohorem tõog n kao b bʋʋdo.
Bala, ned sã n ka tar nimbãan-zoeere, bʋʋdã me ka na n zoe a nimbãaneg ye. Nimbãan-zoeer tõogda bʋʋdo.
M ba-biisi, ned sã n yet t'a tara tẽeb n yaool n ka tʋmdẽ, a yõod yaa bõe? Dẽ yĩnga, tẽ-kãng tõe n fãagame?
D ba-bi-raoog bɩ d ba-bi-poak sã n ya beelle, tɩ daar fãa bɩ a ka tar dɩɩb n dɩtẽ,
tɩ yãmb ned a yembr yeel-a yaa: Kẽng-y ne laafɩ, yiis f waoodo, la f rɩ n tɩge, n yaool n ka kõ-a bũmb ning a sẽn tog n paam a sõngr yĩnga, gom-kãng yõod bee yɛ?
Yaa a woto me ne tẽebã. Tẽeb sã n ka naag ne tʋʋma, a mengã yaa kɩɩnga.
La nina na n yeelame: Fo tara tẽebo, la mam tʋmdame. Wilg maam f tẽeb tɩ tʋʋm ka tũ ye, la mam na n talla m tʋʋma n wilg foom m tẽebo.
F tẽedame tɩ Wẽnnaam a yen bal n be. Yaa sõama. Zĩn-dãmbã me tẽedame, la b rigda ne rabeem.
Yam ka sek soaba, fo rat n bãngame tɩ tẽeb sẽn ka naag ne tʋʋm ka yõod laa?
Ka ne tʋʋm la tõnd ba a Abraham paam tɩrlem, a sẽn ning a biribl a Izak tẽn-kugr zug n kõ Wẽnnaamã laa?
Fo neeme tɩ tẽeb n dag n naag ne a tʋʋmã, la a tʋʋmã yĩnga, Wẽnnaam kɩtame t'a tẽebã zems zãnga.
Woto, Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõngã paama pidsgu. B yeelame yaa: A Abraham tẽe Wẽnnaam, la b gesa rẽnda wa tɩrlem a yĩnga. La b bool-a lame tɩ Wẽnnaam zoa.
Yãmb neeme tɩ yaa ne tʋʋm la ned paamd tɩrlem, la ka ne tẽeb bal ye.
Pʋg-yoodr a Rahaab me, ka ne tʋʋm yĩng la a paam tɩrlem a sẽn deeg Israyɛl gũusdbã, la a kɩt tɩ b tũ sor a to n loogã sɩda?
Yĩng sã n ka naag ne sɩɩga, a yaa kũum. Woto me, tẽeb sã n ka naag ne tʋʋma a yaa kɩɩnga.
M ba-biisi, bɩ yãmb neb wʋsg da bao tɩ lebg karen-saamb dãmb ye, bala, yãmb miime tɩ tõnd karen-saamb dãmbã bʋʋd na n yɩɩ toog n yɩɩda.
Tõnd fãa tudgda ne tuudg buud wʋsgo. Ned sã n ka tudg ne a goama, a yaa ned sẽn zems zãnga, n tõe n gãd a yĩngã tõre.
Tõnd sã n ningd wiid noey salba tɩ b na sak tõndo, tõnd kɩtedame tɩ b yĩngã kẽnd tõnd sẽn datẽ.
Ges koom-kogl-bɛdã me, baa b sẽn ya bɛd to-to, tɩ sob-kãseng tusd-ba, yaa kom-koglg wẽnemdg-bil bal n kɩted tɩ koglgã teesd a soabã sẽn datẽ.
Woto me, zelemd yaa yĩngã wil-bil a yembre, la a waoogda a meng ne bũmb kãsemse. Ges-y bug-bil bal sẽn tõe n yõog we-kãsengã.
Zelemd me yaool n yaa bugum, a yaa wẽng zĩ-kãsenga. Zelemd bee tõnd yĩnga wila sʋka, a rẽgemda yĩngã tõre, la a wɩngda tõnd vɩɩmã tõr t'a lebg bas. A bugma yita bug-tẽnga.
Ninsaal wõra we-rũmsã buud fãa, liuuli buud fãa bõn-vuuds buud fãa, koomẽ rũms buud fãa, n kɩt tɩ b sakd yẽnda.
La ned baa a yen ka tõe n tõog a zelemd t'a sak-a ye. A yaa wẽng ned sẽn ka tõe n wõr n tõog ye. A pida ne zẽnem kʋʋdga.
Tõnd pʋʋsda Zu-soabã sẽn ya tõnd ba wã bark ne d zelemdã, la yaa ne yẽ me la tõnd kãabd neb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn naan n wẽneg b mengã.
Bark la kãab-wẽng yita noor a yembr pʋgẽ. M ba-biisi, a ka tog n yɩɩ a woto ye.
Dẽ yĩnga, ko-noog ne ko-tood tõe n bula ko-nif a yembrẽ?
Dẽ yĩnga m ba-biisi, kankang tõe n woma oliiv sɩda, bɩ nasaar-sãbg tõe n woma kankama? Ko-nif sẽn yiisd ko-yamsem ka tõe n yiis ko-noog ye.
Ãnna yãmb sʋkã n ya yam soaba, t'a yam weke? Bɩ a yel-manesem-sõngã wilg a tʋʋm sẽn yɩt ne bʋgsem la yam.
La sũ-ki-toaag sã n be yãmb sũuri, tɩ geesem-geesem me beẽ, da waoog-y y mense, la y da yag zĩrĩ n kɩɩs sɩdã ye.
Yam kãng ka yam sẽn yit yĩngr ye. A yita tẽng zug n ya yĩng rẽnda, la zĩn-dãmb dẽnda.
Bala, sũ-kĩir la geesem-geesem sẽn be zĩig ningã, zũnglug la maan wẽns buud fãa bee be.
Yam sẽn yit yĩngrã yaa sõama zãnga, la sẽn paase, a baooda laafɩ, a wata ne sũ-bʋgsem, la sugri, la a pida ne nimbãan-zoeere la bi-sõamyã fãa, la a ka be bakre la zãmb ye.
Tɩrlem bil bʋta laafɩ pʋgẽ, la yaa laafɩ baoodbã n bʋt-a.
Maoorã ne zabã sẽn be yãmb sʋkã yita yɛ, sã n ka yãmb datem sẽn maood ne taab yãmb yĩngã wil pʋsẽ wã pʋgẽ?
Yãmb get n datame la y ka paamd ye. Yãmb yaa nin-kʋʋdba la sũ-ki-neba, n yaool n ka tõe n paam baa fɩ ye. Yãmb zabdame la y maoodẽ, la y ka paamd ye, bõe yĩnga, yãmb ka kot ye.
Yãmb kotame la y ka paamd ye, bala bũmb ning yãmb sẽn tags n kosã ka sõama ye. Yãmb kotame n dat n tall n maan y yĩnsã sẽn datã.
Yãmb sẽn ya nin-yoaadbã, yãmb ka mi tɩ dũni nonglem yaa beem ne Wẽnnaam laa? Dẽ, ned sã n dat n yɩ dũni zoa, a yɩta Wẽnnaam bɛyã.
Yãmb tẽedame tɩ Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã sẽn yet tɩ: Yaa ne sũ-kiir la Wẽnnaam nong sɩɩg ninga b sẽn kɩt tɩ b be yãmb pʋgẽ wã, b gomda zaalem laa?
La bãmb kõta bark sẽn yɩɩda, bala b gʋls-sõamyã yetame yaa: Wẽnnaam kɩɩsda tɩtaam-dãmbã la b ningda sik-m-mens-rãmbã zut barka.
Dẽ wã sak-y Wẽnnaam. Kɩɩs-y Sʋtãana la a na zoe n zãag ne yãmba.
Kolg-y Wẽnnaam, la bãmb na pẽneg yãmba. Yel-wẽn-maandba, nudg-y y nusã. Yam a yiib rãmbã, nedg-y y sũyã.
Bãng-y y nimbãanegã sẽn yaa a soaba, maan-y sũ-sãoongo, yãb-y-yã. Bɩ y laadã tek n lebg wiisgu, tɩ y sũ-noogã lebg sũ-sãoongo.
Sik-y y meng Zu-soabã taoore, la bãmb na zẽk yãmba.

M ba-biisi, da gom-y taab yell wẽng ye. Ned ning sẽn gomd a ba-biig yell wẽnga, wall a kaood a bʋʋdo, a gomda tõogã yell wẽnga, la a kaood tõogã bʋʋdo. La fo sã n kaood tõogã bʋʋdo, fo ka tõ-sakd ye, fo yaa a bʋ-kaooda.
Wẽnnaam b yen tãa n ya tõogã soaba, la bʋ-kaooda. Bãmb n tõe n fãag neda, bãmb n tõe n sãam-a. La fo yaa ãnna n kaood f to bʋʋdo?
Yãmb dãmb sẽn yet tɩ: Dũnna wall beoogo, tõnd na n kẽnga tẽn-kãnga, n zĩnd be yʋʋmde, n leeb n paam yõodo. Yaa yãmb la m gomd-ne.
Yãmb sẽn ka mi y vɩɩmã sẽn na n yɩ to-to beoogã, yãmb yaa walem sẽn zẽkd wakat bilf pʋgẽ bala, la a menemdẽ wã.
Yãmb tog n yeelame yaa: Zu-soabã sã n data, tõnd na vɩɩmde, la d na n maan woto wall woto.
La moasã, yãmb waoogda y mens y tɩtaamã pʋgẽ. Tɩtaam a woto buud fãa yaa wẽnga.
Ned sã n mi tɩ maan neere, n yaool n ka maandẽ, a maanda yel-wẽnde.
Mosã, mam gomda ne yãmba, arzegsã rãmba! Wɩsg-y y meng n yãbe, tood nins sẽn na n wa yãmb zutã yĩnga!
Yãmb arzɛkã põogame. Zũnzũy dɩɩ yãmb futã.

Tẽngempiisim n dɩ yãmb sãnemã ne y wanzuri wã, la b tẽngempiismã na n yɩɩ kaset sẽn kaood yãmb bʋʋdo, n sãam yãmb yĩngã wa bugum. Yãmb tigsa paoong mosã wakat sẽn ya yaoolmã n bĩngi.
Ade, tẽn-tʋmdb nins sẽn tigs yãmb koodã tɩ yãmb yaool n ka yao-bã kelemdame. Tigsdbã kelems zẽk n taa pãn-kẽemd soabã tʋbẽ.
Yãmb vɩɩmda rɩ-n-tɩk pʋgẽ, la teed sẽn nags sʋka. Yãmb wuba y mens sãoong daarã yĩnga.
Yãmb kaoo nin-tɩrg bʋʋd n kʋ-a, la yẽ ka kɩɩs yãmb ye.
Woto yĩnga, m ba-biisi, maan-y sũ-mar hal tɩ ta Zu-soabã waoongo. Ad ka-koaad gũuda a pʋtã bi-sõamyã n pid ne sũ-mar a yĩnga, hal t'a paam sigr saaga la bõn-bɩʋʋng saaga.
Bɩ yãmb me maan sũ-mare, n keng y raoodo, bala, Zu-soabã waoong kolgame.
M ba-biisi, da yẽgem-y ne taaba, tɩ Zu-soabã ra wa kao yãmb bʋʋd ye. Ad bʋ-kaoodã yɛsa dignoorẽ wã.
M ba-biisi, dɩk-y Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn gom Zu-soabã yʋʋrã yĩngã mamsgo la b sũ-marã tɩ yɩ mamsg yãmb yĩnga.

Gese, tõnd yetame tɩ neb nins sẽn yals-b kãenkãe wã yaa sũ-noog rãmba. Yãmb wʋmame tɩ b gom a Zoob sũ-marã yelle, la yãmb yãa baoosg ning Zu-soabã sẽn kõ-a wã. Bala, Zu-soabã pida ne nonglem la nimbãan-zoeere.
M ba-biisi, sẽn yɩɩd fãa, bɩ y da wẽen ne arzãna, wall ne tẽngã, wall ne wẽeneg buud a to ye. La bɩ yãmb n-ye yɩ n-ye, tɩ yãmb ayo yɩ ayo tɩ bʋʋd da wa n lʋɩ y zut ye.
Ned bee yãmb sʋk n namsdẽ? Bɩ a pʋʋse. Ned n tar sũ-noogo? Bɩ a yɩɩl Wẽnnaam yɩɩla.
Ned n be yãmb sʋkã n ka keeme? Bɩ a bool Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdsã kãsem-dãmbã, la bɩ bãmb tik-a ne kaam ne Zu-soabã yʋʋre, n pʋʋs a yĩnga.
Tẽeb pʋʋsg na n fãaga bãadã, la Zu-soabã na n yik-a lame, la a sã n da maana yel-wẽna, a na paam sugri.
Woto yĩngã, vẽneg-y n togs-y taab y yel-wẽna, la y pʋʋs taab yĩnga, tɩ y tõe n paam maagre. Nin-tɩrg pʋʋsgo, a sẽn pʋʋs ne a sũur fãa tara tõogr wʋsgo.
A Eli dag n yaa ninsaal wa tõndo. A pʋʋsa ne pẽdgre, tɩ saag kõn ni ye, la saag ka tok tẽng yʋʋm a tãab la kiis a yoob ye.
La a leb n pʋʋsame, la saag yii yĩngr n ni, la tẽng bõn-koaadl woma biisi.
M ba-biisi, yãmb ned a yembr sã n menem n zãag ne sɩdã, tɩ ned a to leb n tall-a t'a wa a pʋgẽ,
bɩ y bãng tɩ ned ning sẽn leb n tall-a yel-wẽn-maandã t'a bas meneng sorã n lebg n wa wã, a fãaga ned yõore, la a sõng-a t'a paam yel-wẽn wʋsg sugri.
Maam a Pɩyɛɛr sẽn ya a Zezi Kirist tẽn-tʋmdã n tʋmd seb-kãngã Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdsã sẽn sãeeg n be Põ la Galasi la Kapados la Azi ne Bitini soolem n lebg sãamb beene wã.

Yãmb yaa tõnd ba a Wẽnnaam neb b sẽn tũusi, wa sẽn zems bãmb sẽn pĩnd n bãngã, tɩ Sɩɩg-sõng welg-y toor tɩ y zĩnd pʋ-peelem n yɩ sakdb n paam t'a Zezi zɩɩmã pek yãmba. Bɩ y paam bark la laafɩ wʋsgo.

Pẽgr Wẽnnaam ning sẽn ya tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist ba. Bãmb nimbãan-zoeerã sẽn ya kãsengã yĩnga, b kõo tõnd dogem paalg a Zezi Kirist sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũuma maasem yĩnga, tɩ tõnd tar tẽeb pidsg gũudum
sẽn vɩ, la d paam dogem-pʋɩɩr sẽn ka tõe n sãame, wall rẽgme, wall zelg ye. La b bĩng-a-la arzãn pʋg yãmb yĩngã,
yãmb tẽebã yĩnga, Wẽnnaam pãngã zãada yãmba, tɩ yãmb na paam fãagr ning sẽn segl n sɛ, n na n puk yaoolem wakatã.
Yãmb maanda sũ-noog bõn-kãng yĩnga, baa ne sẽn ya tɩlɛ tɩ yãmb paam makr buud toay-toay sẽn namsd yãmb moasã wakat bilf yĩngã.

Yaa sẽn na yɩl n mak yãmb tẽeba n bãng a sẽn ya a soaba. Sãnem yaa bõn-sãamdga, la baoosgo b makd-a-la ne bugum n getẽ. La yãmb tẽebã sẽn tar yõod wʋsg n yɩɩd sãnemã, b makd-a lame n getẽ, t'a Zezi Kirist waoongã daare, bɩ y paam pẽgre la ziiri ne waoogre.
Baa ne yãmb sẽn nan ka yã a Zezi Kiristã, yãmb nonga bãmba. Baa yãmb sẽn nan ka yã bãmbã, yãmb tẽeda bãmba, n maand sũ-noog noor sẽn ka tõe n togse, la sẽn tar ziiri.
Bala, yãmb paama y sɩɩsã fãagr tɩ yɩ y tẽebã keoore.
Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn pĩnd n togs bark ning Wẽnnaam sẽn da bĩng yãmb yĩngã baoome la b vees n na n bãng fãag-kãnga võore.

Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã maoome, n bao n na n bãng Kirist Sɩɩgã sẽn be bãmb pʋsẽ wã sẽn pĩnd n gomd Kirist namsgã, ne b waoongã sẽn na n pʋglã sẽn n na n yɩ wakat ninga, la sẽn na n tũ ne bũmb ninga.

La Wẽnnaam vẽnega b no-rɛɛsdbã tɩ b bãng tɩ bãmb sẽn deeg koɛɛg ningã ka bãmb mens yĩng ye, la yaa yãmb yĩnga la b ya bõn-kãens tʋmtʋmdba. Moasã, neb nins sẽn moon yãmb koe-noogã togsa yãmb bõn-kãens ne Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn yi arzãnã pãnga, la baa malegsã mens datẽ lame n wʋm a võore.
Yaa woto yĩnga, yõk-y y tagsgo, yɩ-y gũus-m-mens-rãmba, la y paam tẽeb pidsg gũudum sẽn ya sõama zãng ne bark ning b sẽn na n kõ yãmb Kirist waoongã wakatã.
Bɩ y yɩ kom-sakdse, la y da sak wẽng ratem nins yãmb sẽn dag n sak wakat sẽn looge, y sẽn da be y zɩɩlmã pʋg ye.
La soab ning sẽn bool-a yãmbã sẽn ya sõama wã yĩnga, bɩ yãmb me welg toor n yɩ sõama y yel-manesem buud fãa pʋgẽ.
Bala, Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã yetame yaa: Bɩ y yɩ pʋ-peelem dãmba, bala, mam yaa pʋ-peelem soaba.
Yãmb sã n pʋʋsd Wẽnnaam ning sẽn ka tũusd nebã, la sẽn kaood ned kam fãa bʋʋd wa sẽn zems a tʋʋmdã, bɩ y kẽn ne gũus-m-menga, yãmb sẽn ket n be dũni zug wakate.
Sɩd me, yãmb miime tɩ ka ne bõn-sãamds sẽn wẽnd ligdi, wall sãnem, la b fãag yãmb n yiis vɩɩmã minind nins sẽn ka yõodã yãmb sẽn deeg y yaab-rãmba nengẽ wã pʋgẽ ye.
La yaa ne Kirist zɩɩma sẽn ya sõama wʋsgã, Kirist yɩɩ wa pe-bil sẽn ka tar yelle, la sẽn ka
tar bãnde, Wẽnnaam dag n pĩnd n yãka Kirist sẽn deng dũni naanego, la b waa yãmb yĩnga, yaoolem zamaana pʋgẽ.
Kirist maasem yĩnga, yãmb tẽeda Wẽnnaam ning sẽn vʋʋg-a Kirist n bas kũum la b kõ-b waoogrã. Sẽn na yɩl tɩ yãmb tẽebã ne y teegrã zĩnd ne Wẽnnaam.
Yãmb sẽn sak sɩdã n yɩlg y mensã, sẽn na n yɩlẽ n paam nonglem meng-meng ba-biisã yĩngã, bɩ y nong taab wʋsg ne y sũyã fãa,
yãmb sẽn paam rog-paalgã yĩnga, ka bõn-buud sẽn sãamd n kɩt tɩ yãmb paam dogem paalgã ye, la yaa bõn-buud sẽn ka sãamda, yaa Wẽnnaam goamã sẽn vɩ n paad wakat sẽn kõn sa wã.
Bala, Ninsaal fãa wẽnda wa moodo, la a waoogrã fãa wẽnda wa mo-pui. Mood kʋɩtame la mo-pui sʋʋgdame
La Zu-soabã goam paada wakat sẽn kõn sa. Yaa koe-kãng la koe-noogã b sẽn togs yãmbã.
Dẽ yĩngã, bas-y pʋ-toog fãa, la sɩlem fãa, la zãmbo, la sũ-kiiri, la paoogr goam buud fãa.
Yɩ-y wa kom-peelse, n tʋlg Wẽnnaam goamã sẽn ya wa bĩisim sẽn ka pulã, t'a bɩɩs yãmb tɩ y paam fãagre,
sã n yaa tɩ yãmb pẽnega Zu-soabã n bãng tɩ b yaa sõama.
Kolg-y Zu-soab a Zezi sẽn ya "kug-vɩɩg" ninsaalbã sẽn zãgsã, la sẽn ya kugr Wẽnnaam sẽn yãke, la sẽn be yõod bãmb taoorã.

La yãmb mens sẽn wẽnd kug-vɩɩsã, me-y y mens tɩ yɩ Sɩɩg-sõng roogo, la maan-kʋʋdb sẽn ya sõama, n kõt Wẽnnaam maoong sẽn ya Sɩɩg-sõng rẽnda, n tat Wẽnnaam yam a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga.
Bala, Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõamyã pʋgẽ b yeelame yaa: Ade, mam dɩgenda kugr sẽn tar pãng Siyõ pʋgẽ, mam sẽn yãke, la m sẽn waooge. La ned ning sẽn tẽed-a kug-kãnga, a kõn paam yãnd ye.

Dẽ yĩnga, bãmb kug-kãng bee yõod wʋsg ne yãmb sẽn tẽedã, la ne neb nins sẽn ka tẽedã, kugr ning tãn-metbã sẽn zagsã, kug-kãng lebga roogã pãng kugri, a soakã zĩigẽ. La a yaa kug-lakdg nebã yĩnga. La pĩig sẽn lubd nebã.
Bãmb lakda kug-kãnga, b sẽn ka sakd Wẽnnaam goamã yĩnga. La Wẽnnaam dag n pĩnd n miime tɩ na n yɩɩ a woto ne-ba.

La yãmb yẽ, yãmb yaa buud b sẽn tũusi, la naam maan-kʋʋdba, la buud sẽn welg toor Wẽnnaam yĩnga, neb Wẽnnaam sẽn da tɩ y moon n wilg sẽn bool-a yãmb n yiis likã pʋgẽ, n kẽes-y vẽenem sẽn be ziirã pʋgã tʋʋm sõama wã.
Pĩnda, yãmb dag n ka Wẽnnaam neb ye, la moasã, yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam neba. Yãmb sẽn dag n ka paam nimbãan-zoeerã, moasã, yãmb paama nimbãan-zoeere.
Mam zo-nongdse, yãmb sẽn ya sãamb la kaoos-wetã, mam sagenda yãmb tɩ y da sak yĩngã ratem wẽnsã sẽn zabd ne sɩɩgã ye.

Paam-y yel-manesem sẽn ya sõama neb nins sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaamã sʋka, tɩ baa b sẽn dõt yãmb zĩig ning fãa n yetẽ tɩ y yaa tʋʋm wẽns maandbã, bɩ b yã yãmb tʋʋm sõama wã n waoog Wẽnnaam, b waoongã daare.
Zu-soabã maasem yĩnga, sak-y dũniyã nebã tõod fãa, sã n ya rĩm-dãmba sẽn so pãnga,
sã n ya nanams rĩmã sẽn tʋm tɩ b sɩbg neb nins sẽn maand wẽngã, la b waoog neb nins sẽn maand neerã.
Bala, yaa Wẽnnaam daab tɩ yãmb sẽn maand neerã, y na kɩt tɩ yalemb bas b zɩɩlem goamã.
Kẽn-y wa burkĩmba, la y ra sak tɩ yãmb lohormã yɩ pʋ-toog lillidg ye. Bɩ y tʋm wa Wẽnnaam tʋmtʋmdba.
Waoog-y neba fãa. Nong-y y ba-biisã, la y zoe Wẽnnaam. Waoog-y rĩma.
Tʋmtʋmdba, sak-y y zu-soben-dãmba la y zoe-ba. La ka zu-soben-dãmb nins sẽn ya nin-sõama la sũ-bʋgsem dãmbã bal ye. Sak-y neb nins sẽn ya
nin-toosã me. Bala, ned sã n sak namsg sẽn ka zems ne-a, a sẽn sakd Wẽnnaam yĩnga, yõwã bee barka.
Sɩd me, yãmb sã n sak tɩ b nams yãmb y sẽn maan yel-wẽnd yĩnga, bõe waoogr n be be? La yãmb sã n maan tʋʋm sõama n sak namsg bõn-kãens yĩnga, yõwã bee bark Wẽnnaam taoore.
Sɩd me, yaa bõn-kãng yĩng la b bool yãmba. Tɩ bõe, Kirist me namsa yãmb yĩnga, n bas mamsg ne yãmba, tɩ y tũ bãmb naowã.
Bãmb ka tol n maan yel-wẽnd ye, la b ka tol n wʋm zĩrĩ goam sẽn yi bãmb noorẽ ye.
Neb tʋʋ bãmba, la b ka tʋʋs n lebs ye. Neb namsa bãmba, la b ka zab ne-b ye. B basa b yɛlã sẽn kaood-a bʋʋd tɩrgã nugẽ.
Kirist meng n deeg tõnd yel-wẽnã b yĩngã pʋgẽ da-pɩkã zugu, tɩ tõnd sẽn ya wa kũum yel-wẽnã wɛɛngẽ wã, tõnd na vɩɩmd n maan tɩrlem. Yaa bãmb poglgã yĩng la yãmb paamd maagre.
Bala, yãmb dag n wẽnda piis sẽn meneme, la moasã, yãmb lebgame n wa y sɩɩsã pe-kɩɩma la b guudã nengẽ.
Woto me, pagba, bɩ yãmb ned kam fãa sak a sɩda, tɩ baa bãmb neb kẽer sẽn ka sakd Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã, bɩ b
sẽn yãt b pagbã yel-manesmã sẽn ya sõama wã, la sẽn waoogd bãmbã, kɩt tɩ b sak Wẽnnaam, tɩ ka tũ ne goam ye.
Da bao-y neerem ning ninã sẽn tõe n yã wã bala, sẽn ya zut pãnengo, wall sãnem faon-teedo, wall nagem fut yeelgr ye.
La yãmb tog n baoo neerem ning sẽn solge, n be ned kam fãa sũurẽ, la sẽn ka sãamdã, sẽn ya sũ-bʋgsem sɩɩga, la sũ-maasem. Ade, yaa bõn-kãensã n tar yõod wʋsg Wẽnnaam nifẽ.
Kʋdemd wakate, pʋg-sõama nins sẽn da tẽed Wẽnnaamã dag n manegda b mens a woto, n sakd b sɩdba.
Rẽndã n kɩt t'a Sara dag n sakd a Abraham n boond-a t'a Zu-soaba. Yãmb sã n maan tʋʋm sõama, n ka sak n bas tɩ bãmb kẽes yãmb dabeem, yãmb lebga a Sara kom-pugli.

Woto me, raopa, bɩ yãmb ned kam fãa vɩɩmd ne a paga, la y bãng tɩ bãmb yaa neb sẽn ka tar pãng wa yãmb ye. Maan-y-b wa sẽn zemse, n nand-ba, bala, b yaa pʋɩt-n-taas ne yãmba, vɩɩm ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ wã pʋgẽ, maan-y-yã a woto tɩ bũmb baa fʋɩ ra wa gɩdg yãmb pʋʋsg ye.
Sẽn na n baase, bɩ yãmb fãa paam tagsg a yembre, la yam a yembre. Paam-y nonglem y ba-biis yĩnga, la y pid ne nimbãan-zoeere la sik-m-menga.

Da lebs-y ned wẽnga, a sẽn maan yãmb wẽng yĩng ye, la y ra tʋʋs n lebs b sẽn tʋʋs yãmb yĩng ye. Da maan-y-yã a woto ye. Bɩ y lebs barka, bala, yaa bõn-kãng yĩng la b bool yãmb tɩ y na paam bark tɩ yɩ y pʋɩɩre.
Wẽnnaam gʋls sõama yetame yaa: Sɩd me, ned sã n dat t'a vɩɩm yɩ-a noogo, la a paam sũ-noog a vɩɩm wakate, bɩ a gũus t'a zelemd da gom wẽng ye la a ra sak t'a noor gom zĩrĩ goam ye.
Bɩ a zãag a meng ne wẽnga, la a maan neere, bɩ a bao laafɩ ne nebã, la a pʋg laafɩ wã.
Bala, Zu-soabã geta nin-tɩrse, bãmb kelgda nin-tɩrs pʋʋsgo, la b wẽnemdeda b neng n basd neb nins sẽn maand wẽngã.
Yãmb sã n wɩngd ne tʋʋm sõama maanego, ãnna n na n maan yãmb wẽnga?
La baa yãmb sã n paamd namsg tɩrlem yĩnga, yãmb na paam sũ-noogo. Da zoe-y ninsaalbã sẽn zoet bũmb ningã ye, la y ra sãam y sũy ye.
Bɩ y waoog Kirist sẽn ya yãmb Zu-soabã, y sũyã pʋsẽ. Bɩ y yɩ neb sẽn tõe wakat fãa, n leokd neb nins sẽn sokd yãmb n dat n bãng y tẽebã yellã ne sũ-maasem la ne sik-m-menga.
Paam-y sũur kaset sõngo, tɩ baa sẽn ya zĩig ning fãa, bɩ neb nins sẽn kãnegd-b yãmbã, n gomd yãmb wẽng Kirist tũudmã pʋgẽ wã paam yãnde.
Bala, sã n taa Wẽnnaam yam tɩ tõnd paam namsg d sẽn maan neer yĩnga, yõwã n ya sõama n yɩɩd tõnd sẽn na n paam namsg d sẽn maan wẽng yĩnga.

Sɩd me, Kirist me kii vugr bal yel-wẽna yiisg yĩnga. Bãmb sẽn ya nin-tɩrgã, b kii ka-tɩrlem dãmbã yĩnga, sẽn na yɩl n tall yãmb n ta Wẽnnaam nengẽ. B kʋʋ bãmb yĩngã, la Sɩɩg-sõng leb n kõo bãmb vɩɩm.
La Sɩ-kõng maasem yĩnga, bãmb kẽnga kɩɩm-kulg me n tɩ moon koɛɛgã sɩɩs nins b sẽn da balgã sʋka.
Bãmb yaa neb nins sẽn yɩ kɩɩsdb wakat sẽn looge, Wẽnnaam sẽn maan sũ-mar n kaoos wakat ning a Nowe sẽn maan koom koglgã tɩ neb bilfu, dat n togs tɩ neb a nii wã kẽe a pʋgẽ n põs koomã.

Rẽndã ra mamsda koom lisg ning sẽn fãagd yãmb rũnna-rũnna wã. Yaa lisg sẽn ka yĩng rẽgd yiisg yĩng ye, la yaa kosg sẽn kot Wẽnnaam ne sũur kaset sẽn ya sõama, a Zezi Kirist sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũumã maasem yĩnga.
A Zezi Kirist zẽk n bee arzãna, n be Wẽnnaam dɩtgo, la malɛk-rãmbã ne pãn-soaadbã, la pãens rãmbã sakda bãmba.
Dẽ wã yĩnga, Kirist sẽn nams b yĩnga pʋgẽ wã yĩnga, bɩ yãmb me paam tagsg a yen ne bãmba. Bala, ned ning sẽn nams a yĩngã pʋg basa yel-wẽnã,
tɩ wakat ning sẽn ket yẽ sẽn na n vɩɩmd a yĩngã pʋgã, yẽnda kõn leb n vɩ wa sẽn zems ninsaal datem ye, la a na n vɩɩmda wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam datem.

Sɩd me, wakat sẽn looge, yãmb dag n maanda wa neb nins sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaamã sẽn maandã. Yaa n sekame. Yãmb dag n kẽnda raglem pʋga, ratem wẽnse la yũ rãam n tuubdẽ wã pʋga, la rã-tɩgrã ne yão-beedã pʋga, la wẽn-naandsã pʋʋsg sẽn ya bõn-wẽng wʋsgã pʋga.
Yãmb sẽn ka le naagd neb nins sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaamã n maand tʋʋm-dẽgd kãensã, a linga bãmb tɩ b kãnegd yãmba.
Bãmb na n yals n togsa b yɛlã soab ning sẽn segl n sɛ n na n kao nin-vɩɩs la kũum bʋʋdã taoore.
Sɩd me, yaa rẽ yĩng n kɩt tɩ b moon koe-noogã neb nins sẽn ki wã me, tɩ ninsaalbã sẽn kao bãmb bʋʋd wa sẽn zems yĩngã rẽndã, bɩ Wẽnnaam nifẽ bãmb na vɩ sɩɩg pʋgẽ.
Bũmb fãa sɛɛb wakat kolgame. Dẽ wã yĩnga, yɩ-y neb sẽn tar yam la gũus-m-mens-rãmba, n kẽng taoor ne pʋʋsgo.
La sẽn deng bũmb fãa, nong-y taab daar fãa. Bala, nonglem luta yel-wẽn wʋsgo.
Maan-y taab sãando, tɩ yẽgõng kaẽ ye.
Yãmb ned kam fãa sẽn deeg kũunã, rɩk-y-b n tʋm n sõng neb a taaba, wa Wẽnnaam barkã kũun toay-toayã yel-gɛtb sẽn ya sõama.

Ned sã n gomda, bɩ a gom wa sẽn zemsd Wẽnnaam goamã sẽn yetã. Ned sã n sõngdẽ, bɩ a sõng wa sẽn zemsd pãng ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ-a wã, tɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn so ziiri la pãng wakat sẽn kõn sa wã paam waoogr bũmba fãa pʋga, a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga. Ãmina!
Mam zo-nongdse, ra sak-y tɩ nams-toaag ning sẽn be yãmb sʋk n makd yãmbã yɩ lingr ne yãmba, tɩ ya wa yaa yel-sãang n paamd yãmb ye.
Ka tog n yɩ a woto ye, maan-y sũ-noogo, yãmb sẽn paam pʋɩɩr ne Kirist namsgã yĩnga, tɩ yãmb tõe n maan sũ-noog n kɩdem wakat ning bãmb ziirã sẽn na n pukã.
B sã n nams yãmb Kirist yʋʋrã yĩnga, y zug yaa noogo, bala, Sɩɩg ninga sẽn be ziirã sẽn ya Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã bee yãmb zutu.
Bɩ yãmb ned baa a yen da paam namsg a sẽn ya nin-kʋʋd yĩnga, wall wagdr yĩnga, wall tʋʋm-wẽns maand yĩnga, wall a sẽn ya ned sẽn kẽed yɛl sẽn ka pak-a yĩng ye.
La ned sã n paamd namsgo, a sẽn ya Kirist tẽed yĩnga, bɩ a ra zoe yãnd ye, a pẽg Wẽnnaam, b sẽn boond yẽ tɩ Kirist tẽedã yĩnga.

Bala, moasã yaa wakat b sẽn na n sɩng bʋʋdã kaoob ne Wẽnnaam nebã. La sã n mikame tɩ yaa ne tõnd la b na n sɩng bʋʋdã kaoobo, neb nins sẽn ka sakd-b Wẽnnaam koe-noogã baoosg na yɩɩ a wãna?
La sã n yaa tɩ nin-tɩrg fãagr paoong yaa toogo, dẽ ned ning sẽn ya wẽn-kɩɩsd la yel-wẽn-maandã yell na n yɩɩ a wãna?
Rẽ wã yĩnga, bɩ neb nins sẽn paamd namsg wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam tʋlsmã rɩk b sɩɩsã n bas Wẽnnaam sẽn ya naanda la sɩd soabã nugẽ, n kell n maan neere.
Dẽ, mam sagenda kãsem-dãmbã sẽn be yãmb sʋkã, mam me sẽn ya kãsem wa bãmbã, la m ya Kirist namsgã kaset soabã, la m ya pʋɩt-n-taag ne Kirist ziirã sẽn na n wa pukã yĩnga.
Rɩlg-y Wẽnnaam piisã sẽn be ne yãmbã. La ka ne modgr ye, yaa ne yamleoogo wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam daabã. La ka paoong ratem yĩng ye, yaa ne sũur sẽn ya sõama.
La ka tɩ y soog nebã b sẽn gũneg yãmbã ne pãng ye, la yaa tɩ yãmb na yɩ mamsg wʋsg piisã yĩnga.
La Pe-kɩɩmbã kãsem sã n wa puki, yãmb na n paama maanf sẽn tar ziiri, la sẽn ka sãamd ye.
Woto me, kom-bɩɩse, sak-y kãsem-dãmbã. La bɩ yãmb fãa paam sik-m-menga, yãmb ne taab sʋka. Bala, Wẽnnaam kɩɩsda wuk-m-mens rãmbã, la b ningd sik-m-mens rãmbã zut barka.
Dẽ wã, sik-y y mens Wẽnnaam sẽn ya pãng soabã taoore, tɩ bãmb tʋlsma wakat sã n ta, bɩ bãmb zẽk yãmba.
Sik-y yãmb yɩɩrã fãa n bas ne bãmba, bala, bãmb n get yãmb yelle.
Yɩ-y neb sẽn tar yam! Gũus-y-yã! Yãmb bɛyã sẽn ya a Sʋtãan gõodame n kelemd wa gɩgemde, n baood a sẽn tõe n paam a soab n sãame.
Kɩɩs-y-yã-a, n yals tẽebã pʋg kãenkãe, la y bãng tɩ namsg a woto buud me namsda yãmb ba-biisã sẽn be duniyã pʋgã.

Yãmb sã n nams wakat bilf pʋgẽ, Wẽnnaam sẽn so bark fãa wã, sẽn bool-a yãmb tɩ y wa paam pʋɩɩr ne ziir ning sẽn kõn sa a Zezi kirist maasem yĩngã, bãmb menga na n zãmsa yãmba, n paas yãmb pãnga, n kɩt tɩ yãmb kɩ yẽga, la b kɩt tɩ yãmb yɩ neb sẽn ka vigsd ye.
Bɩ pãngã yɩ bãmb dẽnd zamaan o zamaane! Ãmina.
Yaa ne tõnd ba-biig a Sɩlvẽ sẽn ya sɩd soabã nug la mam gʋlsd seb-bi-kãngã n na n tʋm yãmba, la m sagl-yã, la m wilg-y tɩ yãmb sẽn be bark ning pʋgã n ya Wẽnnaam bark meng-menga.
A Zezi tẽedbã sẽn be Babilonna, ne m biig a Mark me pʋʋsda yãmba.
Pʋʋs-y taab n mok taab ne nonglem mokre. Bɩ Yãmb fãa sẽn tũud Kiristã paam laafɩ!

Maam a Sɩmo Pɩyɛɛr sẽn ya a Zezi Kirist yamba, la b tẽn-tʋmdã n tʋmd seb-kãnga neb nins sẽn paam tẽeb sẽn tar yõod wa tõnd dẽnda nengẽ. Yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã ne d Fãagd a Zezi Kirist tɩrlem tʋʋmdã maasem yĩng la d paam-a.
Bɩ Yãmb sẽn bãng Wẽnnaam ne tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi wã kɩt tɩ y paam bark la laafɩ wʋsgo.
Wẽnnaam pãngã kõo tõnd bũmb ning fãa sẽn tõe n sõng tõnd tɩ d vɩɩmd Wẽnnaama tũudum pʋgẽ, la a kɩt tɩ d bãng soab ning sẽn bool-a tõnd tɩ d paam bãmb ziirã ne b sõmblemã.

Yaa bõn-kãens maasem yĩng la b kõ tõnd kãabs nins sẽn ya sõama la kãsemsã, tɩ yãmb sã n zoe n bas ratem-wẽnsã sẽn be dũniyã n wat ne sãoongã, kãab kãens yĩnga, yãmb na paam Wẽnnaam yalẽ wã.
La bõn-kãng yĩng me, maan-y y pãng sẽn tõe fãa, tɩ y tẽebã naag ne sõmblem, tɩ y sõmblemã naag ne bãngre.
La bãngrã pʋgẽ, bɩ y mao n paas yõk-m-menga la yõk-m-menga pʋgẽ, bɩ y paas sũ-tõogo la sũ-tõogã pʋgẽ, bɩ y paas Wẽnnaam sakre.
La Wẽnnaam sakrã pʋgẽ, maan-y taab ba-biir manesem la ba-biir manesem pʋgẽ, paas-y nonglem.
Sɩd me, bõn-kãensã sã n be yãmb pʋsẽ, la b sã n paamd pãng be n paasdẽ, b na n kɩtame tɩ yãmb maan tʋʋma la y wom biis sẽn na n kɩt tɩ yãmb bãng tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi kirist n paase.
La ned ning sẽn ka tar bõn-kãens yaa zoanga, la a nina mumame, la a yĩmdame tɩ yẽ paama pekr ne yel-wẽn nins yẽ sẽn da maan tɩ loogã.
M ba-biisi, yaa woto yĩnga, modg-y n yals-y kãenkãe Wẽnnaam sẽn bool yãmbã pʋgẽ, la b sẽn yãk yãmbã pʋgẽ, yãmb sã n maan woto, yãmb kõn tol n bʋdg n bas y tẽebã ye.
Yaa woto n na n kɩt tɩ b kõ yãmb noor zãnga, tɩ y kẽ tõnd Zu-soab la d fãagd a Zezi Kirist soolem sẽn kõn sa wã pʋgẽ.
Yaa woto yĩng tɩ mam na n tẽegd yãmb bõn-kãens daar fãa, baa ne yãmb sẽn zoe n mi-bã, la y sẽn yas kãenkãe sɩd-kãngã pʋgẽ wã.
Mam tagsame tɩ yaa neere, tɩ mam sẽn ket n vɩ yĩn-kiid-kãngã sẽn ya wa fu-roogã pʋga, bɩ m tẽeg-y tɩ y ra gũs ye.
Bala, mam miime tɩ sã n yɩ bilfu, mam na n yii yĩn-kiid-kãngã pʋgẽ, wa tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist sẽn vẽneg-a ne maama.
La mam na n modgame tɩ mam loogr poore, bɩ yãmb tõog n tẽegd bõn-kãens yell bũmb fãa pʋgẽ.
Sɩd me, tõnd ka tũnug soalem b sẽn tags n naane, n togs yãmb tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist pãn-kãsengã la bãmb waoongã yell ye, la yaa tɩ tõnd mens nin yãa bãmb ziirã.
Bala, bãmb deega waoogr la ziir tõnd Ba a Wẽnnaam nengẽ. Yaa bãmb sẽn wa n wʋm naam sẽn be ziirã koɛɛg sẽn gom ne bãmb n yeel tɩ: Ada yaa mam bi-ribl nongr sẽn ta mam yam zãnga.
Yaa tõnd sẽn wa n be tãn-sõngã zug ne bãmbã la tõnd wʋm koe-kãng sẽn yi arzãn n gome.

Tõnd leb n mii vẽeneg tɩ pĩnd-n-bãngr goam sẽn da togsã yaa sɩda. Yaa neer tɩ yãmb ges bõn-kãens wa y sẽn get fɩtl sẽn be zĩ-likẽ n yãgd n gũud hal beoog sẽn na n vẽeg tɩ yibeoog ãdgã yãg yãmb sũyã pʋse.
Sẽn deng bũmb fãa, bãng-y tɩ ned ka be n tõe n bilg Wẽnnaam gʋls-sõmyã pĩnd-n-bãngr gomd baa a yen võor ne a meng pãng ye.
Bala, pĩnd-n-bãngr gomd baa a ye zɩ n tol n yɩ ne ninsaal tʋlsem ye, la yaa Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn kõ bũmb ningã la ninsaalbã reegd n togsd Wẽnnaam yĩnga.

Zĩrĩ-bãngdb n dag n zĩnd Wẽnnaam neba sʋka. Woto me, zĩrĩ karen-saam-dãmb n be yãmb sʋkã. B na n maana sɩlem n wa ne zãmsg sẽn menesd neba, la b na n kɩɩsa Zu-soab ning sẽn fãag-a bãmbã, la b na n taka sãoong sẽn kõn kaoos n wa b mens zutu.
Neb wʋsg na n pʋga bãmb b tʋʋm-beedã pʋgẽ, la sɩd sorã na n paama tʋʋsgo, bãmb tʋʋm-beedã yĩnga.
Bãmb rat-wʋsgã yĩnga, b na n belga yãmb ne sɩlem goam n fã yãmba. La bãmb sɩbgrã sɩnga hal daar zãr n watẽ, la bãmb sãoongã ka na n vaal ye.
Bala, Wẽnnaam ka bas tɩ malegs nins sẽn maan-b yel-wẽna põs ye B rig-b lame n lobe, n kẽes-b bog-zulung sẽn ya lik bida pʋgẽ, n balg-b be n gũud bʋʋdã kaoob daare.
Wẽnnaam ka bas pĩnd dũniyã t'a põs ye. Yaa neb a nii bal la bãmb põsg-yã: Ya a Nowe n dag n ya tɩrlmã koe-moaanda. La Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ sa-kãseng wa ni wẽn-kɩɩsdbã dũni zugu.
Wẽnnaam sɩbga tẽns nins sẽn boond tɩ Sodom la Gomoorã, n kɩt tɩ b lebg tompeglem, tɩ yɩ mamsg wẽn-kɩɩsdb nins sẽn na n pʋgl n wa wã yĩnga.
La Wẽnnaam fãaga nin-tɩrg a Lot. Yẽ sũur da sãama hal wʋsgo, nin-wẽns kãensã tʋʋm-dẽgdã sẽn ya wʋsgã yĩnga.
Bala, nin-tɩr-kãng sẽn da be bãmb sʋk n yãt tʋʋm-dẽgd nins b sẽn maandã, la a wʋmdẽ wã, a sũurã ra sãamda daar fãa, t'a namsd wʋsg a tɩrlmã pʋgẽ.
Rẽ wã, Zu-soabã mii b sẽn na n maan to-to n fãag neb nins sẽn sakd bãmbã makr wakate, la b sẽn na n maan to-to n bĩng tʋʋm-wẽns maandbã n sɩbg-b bʋʋdã kaoob daare.

Sẽn pʋs n yɩɩd fãa, yaa neb nins sẽn be tʋʋm-dẽgd maaneg ratem pʋgã, n baood n maan yĩngã tʋlsem, la b kɩɩsd Wẽnnaam noorã. Zĩrĩ karen-saam-dãmbã yaa sek-m-mens-rãmba, la tɩta-neba, b ka yɛɛsd tɩ paoog yĩngr rãmb ziirã ye. B tʋʋd-b lame.
Baa malegs nins sẽn tar pãng ne pãn-tõog n yɩɩd bãmbã yaool n ka gomd yĩngr pãens rãmbã wẽng Zu-soabã taoor ye.
Nin-wẽn-kãensã wẽnda rũms sẽn sakd b mens ratem, tɩ b belma yõod yaa yõk n kʋ balã. Bãmb paoogda bũmb nins b sẽn ka mi. Bãmb mens tʋʋm dẽgdã n na n sãam-ba.

Bãmb tʋʋm wẽnsã yĩnga, b na n deega tʋʋm wẽns yaoodo. Bãmb getame tɩ tʋm wẽngã ratem tʋʋm ne wĩntoog yaa sũ-noog bũmbu. Bãmb yaa wẽns la rẽgdo, la b sẽn naagd yãmb n dɩtẽ wã wakate, b maanda sũ-noog ne b zãmbã.
Bãmb nina geta pʋg-yoaadba, la b zɩ n maan yel-wẽn n tɩg ye. B belgda neb nins yam sẽn yuusdã n tõogdẽ, b sũyã pida ne maan sɩlem n kãag n kõ b mense. Wẽnnaam kãab-wẽng bee bãmb zutu.
Bãmb bʋdg n basa so-tɩrgã, n menem n tũ a Beoor biig a Balaam sore. Yẽ sakame n na n maan wẽng n deeg yaoodo,
la a paama lengre, a kɩɩsgã yĩnga. Bõang sẽn ka gomd goma wa ninsaala n gɩdg Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs kãng yalem-tʋʋmã.
Nin-kãens wẽnda buls sẽn ka tar koom ye, la wa sawat sobg sẽn dɩkda. B zĩig na n yɩɩ lik sẽn ya bida pʋgẽ.
Ne bãmb wuk-m-meng gom-minimã, la b gom-vɩɩdã, b rɩkda b yĩngã ratem sẽn ya tʋʋm-dẽgdã n belgd neb nins sẽn nan lak b mens ne sẽn vɩ-b wẽng maaneg pʋgẽ wã.
B kãabda nebã lohorom, tɩ bãmb mensã yaool n ya tʋʋm-dẽgd yemse, bala, ned kam fãa yaa bũmb ning sẽn tõog yẽ wã yamba.
Sɩd me, nebã sã n bãng tõnd Zu-soab la d fãagd a Zezi Kiristã, n yi n bas dũni wã dẽgdã, n leb n kẽ a pʋgẽ t'a tõog bãmba, bãmb yaoolem toogã wẽng na n yɩɩga pipi rẽndã.
Bala, bãmb sã n dag n ka bãngẽ tɩrlmã sor n são bãmb sẽn bãng-a, n yaool n wẽnemd n bas tõ-sõng ning b sẽn dag n kõ bãmbã.
Bũmb ning sẽn paam bãmbã yaa wa yel-bũnd ning sẽn ya sɩdã sẽn yeelã: Baagã lebg n tɩ rɩɩ a sẽn dag n wʋbã, la kurku-yãangã b sẽn nan pekã leb n tɩ bilma begdã.
Mam zo-nongdse, ade, zoe n yaa sebr a yiib-n-soab mam sẽn gʋlsd yãmba. Sɛb a yiibã fãa pʋse, mam tẽegda yãmba, sẽn na n yɩl tɩ yãmb yamã puk vẽenega,
tɩ yãmb tõog n tẽeg Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛs sõmyã sẽn dag n deng n togsã, la tõnd Zu-soab la d Fãagdã tõogã yãmb tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn zãms yãmbã.
Sẽn deng bũmb fãa, bãng-y tɩ yaoolem wakate, neb sẽn laad neb n na n zĩndi. B na n yaala yãmba, b na n yɩɩ neb sẽn sakd b mens yĩngã ratem.
La b na n yeelame yaa: "Bãmb sẽn da kãab tɩ b na n lebg n waame wã, b bɛɛ?"
Sɩd me, yaa ne yamleoog la b yĩm tɩ wakat sẽn looge, saasẽ la tẽng zĩndame. Wẽnnaam gomame tɩ tẽng puk koomã sʋka, la yɩɩ koomã la Wẽnnaam kɩt tɩ lebg tẽnga.
La b yĩmame tɩ tẽngã Wẽnnaam sẽn naan a woto wã, yaa ko-kãsengã n leb n dɩ-a t'a sãame.
La ne gom-kãng bala, saasẽ la rũnna dũni wã bĩnga bugum yĩnga. B bĩng-b-la b sẽn na n kao nin-wẽnsã bʋʋd n kɩt tɩ b sãamã daar yĩnga.
Mam zo-nongdse, bũmb a yen n be yãmb sẽn ka tog n yĩm ye, yaa tɩ ne Zu-soabã, daar a yen yaa wa yʋʋm tusri, la yʋʋm tusr yaa wa daar a yen.

Wẽnnaam ka basd tɩ bãmb sẽn kãabã kaoos n pids wa neb kẽer sẽn tagsdã ye. La yaa tɩ bãmb maanda sũ-mar ne yãmba, b sẽn ka rat tɩ ned baa a yen sãama yĩnga. Bãmb ratem yaa tɩ yãmb fãa tek yam n kos sugri.
Zu-soabã daar na n waa wa wagdre. Badaare, saasẽ na n looga ne bʋr-kãsenga. Bugma sẽn kok teed ninsã na n yẽnegame, la dũni wã ne bũmb nins sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã na n dɩɩ bugum.
Rẽ wã yĩnga, bõn-kãensã fãa sẽn na n wa n yẽnegã yĩnga, ges-y tɩ yãmb yel-manesmã ne y Wẽnnaamã tũub yɩ sõama!
Gũu-y-yã, la y modg n kɩt tɩ Wẽnnaam daarã wa tao-tao. Yaa daar ning saasẽ sẽn kok bugmã sẽn na n yẽneg tɩ teedã fãa sẽn kok bugum na n yẽnegã.
La tõnd gũuda Wẽnnaam sẽn pʋlem saasẽ paalg la dũni paalgã, tɩ tɩrlem na n zĩnd a pʋgã.
Mam zo-nongdse, gũudum kãngã pʋgẽ, modg-y tɩ bãmb na mik tɩ yãmb ka tar rẽgdo, la tɩ y ka tar bũmb sẽn ka zemse, la tɩ y bee laafɩ pʋga.
Bãng-y tɩ tõnd Zu-soabã sẽn maand sũ-marã, yaa tɩ yãmb na paam fãagre, wa tõnd ba-bi-nongr a Poll sẽn gʋls me n wilg yãmb wa sẽn zems yam ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ yẽnda wã.

A Poll maanda a woto a sɛbã fãa pʋse, sɛbã a sẽn gʋls n gomd bõn-kãens yelle, la sẽn tar koees b wʋmb sẽn ya toogo, tɩ neb nins sẽn ka mi wã, la sẽn nan ka kɩ-b yẽgã toeemd b võor wa b sẽn toeemd gʋls-sõmyã fãa võor tɩ gõdg n sãamd-bã.
Woto yĩnga, m ba-bi-nongdse, yãmb sẽn pĩnd n paam tɩ b keoog yãmbã, maan-y gũusgu, tɩ neb nins toog sẽn ka be ne Wẽnnaam sakrã bʋdgrã da wa tus yãmb tɩ y ka leb n yas kãenkãe yɛs ye.
Bɩ yãmb bɩ tõnd Zu-soaba la d Fãagd a Zezi Kirist barkã pʋgẽ, la y bãngd-b yellã n paasdẽ. Bãmb n so ziir sẽn sɩng ne moasã hal tɩ ta wakat sẽn kõn sa.
Tõnd gʋlsda yãmb sẽn kẽed ne vɩɩm koɛɛga wɛɛngẽ, koɛɛg ning sẽn dag n be hal sɩngr wẽndẽ wã, tɩ tõnd wʋm a kibarã, tɩ d mens nin yãnd-a wã, tɩ tõnd ges-a wã, la d sɩɩs-a ne d nusã,
b puk-a lame tɩ tõnd yã. Yaa rẽ yĩngã, tɩ tõnd kõt yãmb koe-kãng kaseto, la d togsd yãmb vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã koɛɛg sẽn dag n be tõnd Ba nengẽ, tɩ b vẽneg-a ne tõndã.
Bũmb ning tõnd sẽn yã la d wʋma, tõnd togsd-a-la yãmb me, tɩ yãmb me tõe n paam lagem-n-taar ne tõndo. La tõnd lagem-n-taarã bee ne d ba wã, la ne b Bi-ribl a Zezi Kirist.
Tõnd gʋlsda bõn-kãngã tɩ tõnd sũ-noogã na pid zãnga.
Ad koɛɛg ningã tõnd sẽn wʋm a Zezi Kirist nengẽ n togsd yãmbã: Wẽnnaam yaa vẽenem la lik baa bilf ka be bãmb pʋgẽ ye.
Tõnd sã n yetẽ tɩ d tara lagem-n-taar ne bãmba n yaool n kẽnd lik pʋgẽ, tõnd yagda zĩrĩ la d ka maand sɩd ye.
La tõnd sã n kẽnd vẽenemẽ wa bãmb mengã sẽn be vẽenemẽ wã, tõnd tara lagem-n-taar ne taaba, la bãmb Bi-ribl a Zezi zɩɩmã pekda tõnd yel-wẽna fãa n yiisi.
Tõnd sã n yetẽ tɩ d ka tar yel-wẽnde, tõnd belgda d mense la sɩd ka be tõnd pʋgẽ ye.
Tõnd sã n vẽneg n togs Wẽnnaam d yel-wẽna, bãmb yaa sɩd soaba la tɩrga tɩ maan tõnd sugr d yel-wẽna yĩnga, la b pek tõnd n yiis d tʋʋm-wẽnsã fãa.
Tõnd sã n yeel tɩ d ka maan yel-wẽnde, tõnd geta Wẽnnaam wa zĩrĩ yagda, la bãmb goamã ka be tõnd pʋgẽ ye.
Mam kom-bõonego, m gʋlsda yãmb bõn-kãngã sẽn na yɩl tɩ y ra maan yel-wẽn ye. La ned sã n maan yel-wẽna, tõnd tara sɛ-yõakd sẽn be d ba wã nengẽ: Yaa tɩrlem soab a Zezi Kirist.
B talla a Zezi meng n maan maoong tõnd yel-wẽna sugr kũun yĩnga, la ka tõnd bal yel-wẽnã yĩng ye, la dũni neba fãa me yel-wẽna yĩnga.
Tõnd sã n sak Wẽnnaam tõodã, dẽ tõnd miime tɩ d bãnga bãmba.
Ned ning sẽn yet t'a mii Wẽnnaam la a yaool n ka sakd b tõodã, yẽ soab yaa zĩrĩ yagda la sɩd ka be yẽ pʋgẽ ye.
La ned ning sẽn sakd Wẽnnaam goamã, a wilgdame t'a nonga Wẽnnaam sɩd-sɩda. Ad tõnd sẽn tõe n bãng to-to tɩ d bee bãmb pʋgẽ:
Sẽn yet-a tɩ yẽ paada Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ tog n kẽnda wa a Zu-soabã sẽn dag n kẽndã.
M kom-nongdse, ka tõ-paalg la mam gʋlsd yãmb ye, yaa tõ-kʋdg yãmb sẽn dag n paam hal sɩngrẽ wã. Tõ-kʋdg kãnga yaa koɛɛg ning yãmb sẽn dag n wʋma.
Mam sẽn gʋlsd yãmbã yaa tõ-paalg me. Yel-kãng yaa sɩd Zu-soabã pugẽ, la yãmb pʋse. Bala, lik bida wã loogdame, la vẽenem sɩd-sɩdã zoe n yãgdame.
Ned ning sẽn yet t'a bee vẽenemẽ n yaool n kis a ba-biiga, a ket n bee lik bida pʋgẽ.
Ned ning sẽn nong a ba-biig bee vẽenemẽ bũmb ka be n na n lub-a ye.
La ned ning sẽn kis a ba-biig bee lik bida pʋgẽ. Yẽ kẽnda likã pʋgẽ, n ka mi a sẽn dabdẽ ye, bala likã kɩtame t'a ninã ka ne ye.
Kom-bõonego, mam gʋlsda yãmb tɩ bala, Kirist yʋʋrã yĩnga yãmb paama y yel-wẽna sugri.

Ba-rãmba, mam gʋlsda yãmb tɩ bala, yãmb sẽn bãng soab ning sẽn be-a hal sɩngr wẽndẽ wã yĩnga. Kom-bɩɩse, mam gʋlsda yãmba, tɩ bala, yãmb tõoga wẽng soabã. Kom-bõonego, mam gʋlsa yãmba, tɩ bala, yãmb bãnga d ba wã.

Ba-rãmba, mam gʋlsa yãmba, tɩ bala, yãmb bãnga soab ning sẽn be hal sɩngr wẽndẽ wã. Kom-bɩɩse, mam gʋlsa yãmba, tɩ bala, yãmb tara pãnga, tɩ Wẽnnaam goamã be yãmb pʋgẽ, la tɩ y tõoga wẽng soabã.
Da nong-y dũni wã, wall bũmb ning sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã ye. Ned sã n nong dũni wã, d ba wã nonglem ka be a soab pʋgẽ ye.
Bala, bũmb nins fãa sẽn be dũniyã pʋgã, sã n ya yĩng ratem wẽngã, la ninã sẽn get bũmb nins n datã, la wilg-m-meng arzegs sẽn wat-ne wã ka yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ ye, a yita dũni nengẽ.
Dũni loogdame la a ratem wẽngã me loogdame. La ned ning sẽn maand Wẽnnaam daab paada wakat sẽn kõn sa.
Mam kom-bõonego, moasa yaa yaoolem wakate. Wa yãmb sẽn dag n wʋm tɩ Kirist kɩɩsd n watã, ad Kirist kɩɩsdb wʋsg n be moasã. Rẽ kɩtame tɩ tõnd miẽ tɩ yaa yaoolem wakate.
Bãmb yii tõnd sʋka la b rag n ka tõnd neb ye. Tɩ bõe, bãmb sã n dag n yaẽ tõnd neba, b dag n na n paa ne tõndo. La b sẽn maan to-to wã wilgda vẽeneg tɩ ka neba fãa n yaa tõnd neb ye.
Yãmb mensã paamame tɩ soab ning sẽn welg-a toorã kõ yãmb b Sɩɩgã, la yãmb fãa tara bãngre.
Mam sẽn gʋls yãmbã, ka tɩ yãmb ka mi sɩdã ye, la yaa yãmb sẽn mi-a wã yĩnga, la zĩrĩ sẽn ka yit sɩd pʋgẽ wã yĩnga.
Ãnna la zĩrĩ yagdã, sã n ka ned ning sẽn kɩɩsda t'a Zezi ka Kiristã? Ned ning sẽn yet t'a ka mi d ba ne b bi-riblã yaa Kirist kɩɩsda.
Ned ning fãa sẽn yet t'a ka mi bi-riblã ka tar ba wã me ye, la ned ning sẽn yet t'a mii biigã, a tara ba wã me.
Sã n ya ne yãmba, koɛɛg ning yãmb sẽn dag n wʋm hal sɩngrẽ wã tog n paa yãmb pʋse. Bũmb ning yãmb sẽn wʋm hal sɩngrẽ wã sã n pa yãmb pʋse, yãmb me na n paa bi-riblã ne ba wã pʋga.
Ad bũmb ning Kirist sẽn kãab tõndã: Yaa vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Mam gʋlsa yãmb bõn-kãense, neb nins sẽn belgd yãmba wɛɛngẽ.

La ne yãmba, Sɩɩg-sõng ning yãmb sẽn deeg bãmb nengẽ wã bee yãmb pʋse, la yãmb ka baood tɩ b zãms yãmb ye. La wa bãmb Sɩɩgã sẽn zãmsd yãmb bũmb fãa wã, tɩ yaa sɩdã, la ka zĩrĩ wã, woto, bɩ y pa ne Kirist wa Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn zãms yãmb to-to wã.
La moasã, mam kom-bõonego, bɩ y pa Kirist pʋga, tɩ bãmb sẽn na n wa pukã wakate, bɩ tõnd paam pɛl-kɛgenga, tɩ bãmb waoongã daare, yãnd kõn yõk tõnd bãmb taoor ye.
Yãmb sã miẽ tɩ Kiristã yaa tɩrlem soaba, bɩ y bãng tɩ ned ning fãa sẽn maand sẽn ya tɩrg yaa Wẽnnaam biiga.
Ges-y nonglem ninga d ba wã sẽn nong tõndã, bala b boonda tõnd tɩ Wẽnnaam kamba. La tõnd sɩd yaa bãmb kamba. Ad bũmb ning sẽn kɩt tɩ dũni wã ka mi tõndã: Yaa t'a ka bãng d ba wã ye.

Mam zo-nongdse, tõnd yaa Wẽnnaam kamb moasã, la tõnd sẽn na n yɩ bũmb ningã nan ka puk nand ye. La tõnd miime tɩ Kirist sã n wa n puki, tõnd na n yɩɩ wa bãmba, tɩ bõe, tõnd na n yãa bãmb sẽn yaa a soabã.
Ned ninga fãa sẽn tẽed Kiristã yel-kãngã pidsg yĩnga, a yɩlgda a meng n lebg yɩlemd wa a Zezi Kirist sẽn ya yɩlemdã.
Ned ninga fãa sẽn maand yel-wẽnde, a kɩɩsda tõogã me. Yel-wẽna yaa tõogã kɩɩsgo.
La yãmb miime t'a Zezi waame n na n yiis yel-wẽna, la yel-wẽnd ka tol n be bãmb pʋgẽ ye.
Ned ning fãa sẽn be Kirist pʋgẽ ka maand yel-wẽn ye. Ned ning fãa sẽn maand yel-wẽn ka yã bãmba, la a ka bãng-b ye.
Kom-bõonego, bɩ y ra sak tɩ ned ba a yen belg yãmb ye. Ned ning sẽn maand tɩrlem yaa tɩrg wala a Zezi Kirist sẽn ya tɩrgã.
Ned ning sẽn maand yel-wẽn yaa rõatã neda, bala rõatã sɩng n maanda yel-wẽn hal sɩngr wẽndẽ. Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã waame n na n sãam rõatã tʋʋma.
Wẽnnaam sẽn dog ned ninga fãa ka maand yel-wẽn ye, Wẽnnaam yalẽ wã sẽn be yẽ pʋgẽ wã yĩnga. La sẽn ya Wẽnnaam n dog-a wã yĩnga, a ka tõe n ket n maand yel-wẽn ye.
Yaa woto la b bãngd sẽn ya-b Wẽnnaam kamba la sẽn ya-b rõatã kamb n bake. Ned ning fãa sẽn ka maand tɩrga la sẽn ka nong a ba-biig ka Wẽnnaam biig ye.
Ad koɛɛg ning yãmb sẽn wʋm hal sɩngrẽ wã: Bɩ d nong taaba.
Bɩ d ra maan wala a Kaẽ sẽn da ya wẽng soabã rẽndã, la sẽn kʋ a ba-biigã ye. La bõe yĩng n kɩt t'a kʋ-a? Yaa yẽ tʋʋma sẽn da ya wẽns t'a ba-biigã tʋʋma zemsã yĩnga.
M ba-biisi, dũniyã neba sã n kis yãmba, bɩ y ra yɛɛs ye.
Tõnd sẽn nong d ba-biisã yĩnga, tõnd miime tɩ d yii kũum zĩigẽ n kẽ vɩɩm zĩigẽ. Ned ning sẽn ka tar nonglem bee kũum pʋgẽ.
Ned ninga fãa sẽn kis a ba-biig yaa nin-kʋʋda, la yãmb miime tɩ nin-kʋʋd ba a yen ka tar vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã tɩ bee a pʋgẽ ye.
Ne bõn-kãnga, tõnd bãnga nonglem sẽn ya bũmb ninga: Yaa t'a Zezi Kirist kõo bãmb vɩɩmã tõnd yĩnga. Tõnd me tog n kõo d vɩɩmã d ba-biisã yĩnga.
Ned sã n tar dũni arzegse, n neẽ t'a ba-biig rat sõngre, tɩ yẽ ka zoe a nimbãaneg n sõng-a, yẽ na n yɩɩ a wãn yeel t'a nonga Wẽnnaam?
Kom-bõonego, bɩ tõnd nonglem ra yɩ noor goama wall no-noom ye. Bɩ a yɩ ne tʋʋma la ne sɩda.
Rẽ na n kɩtame tɩ tõnd bãng tɩ d yaa sɩd-dãmba, la tõnd na n paama sũur laafɩ Wẽnnaam taoore,
baa ne tõnd sũya sẽn mongd tõnd bʋʋm to-to. Bala, Wẽnnaam yɩɩda tõnd sũyã, la b mii bũmb fãa.
Mam zo-nongdse, tõnd sũurã sã n ka mongd tõnd bʋʋm, tõnd pɛlg yaa kɛgeng Wẽnnaam taoore,
tõnd sẽn kot bũmb ninga fãa, bãmb kõta tõndo, tõnd sẽn sakd bãmb tõodã la d maand sẽn tat bãmb yamã yĩnga.
Ad bãmb tõogã la a woto: Yaa tɩ d tẽ bãmb bi-ribl a Zezi Kirist yʋʋre, la tɩ d nong taab wala sẽn zems tõog ning a Zezi sẽn kõ tõndã.
Ned ning sẽn sakd bãmb tõodã bee Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ, tɩ Wẽnnaam be yẽ pʋgẽ. Woto, tõnd miime tɩ bãmb bee tõnd pʋgẽ, Sɩɩg-sõng bãmb sẽn kõ tõndã maasem yĩnga.
Mam zo-nongdse, ra tẽ-y sɩɩsã fãa ye, mak-y-b n ges n bãng b sã n yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ. Bala, belgr no-rɛɛsdb wʋsg n wa dũniyã pʋga.
Ad bũmb ning sẽn na n kɩt tɩ yãmb bãng tɩ yaa Wẽnnaam Sɩɩgã: Sɩɩg ning fãa sẽn yet t'a Zezi Kirist waa ne yĩnga, Sɩ-kãng yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ.
La sɩɩg ninga fãa sẽn ka kɩt-a kaset kãng ka yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ ye, a yaa Kirist kɩɩsdã sɩɩga. Sɩɩg ning yãmb sẽn dag n wʋm t'a watame wã, la moasã, a zoee n bee dũniyã pʋgẽ.
Ne yãmba, mam kom-bõonego, yãmb yaa Wẽnnaam kamba, la y tõoga belgr no-rɛɛsdbã, bala, soab ning sẽn be yãmb pʋgẽ wã yɩɩda sẽn be-a dũniyã pʋgẽ wã.
Bãmb yaa dũniyã rẽnda, yaa rẽ yĩng la b goama sẽn yɩt dũni nengẽ wã, la dũniyã kelgd-b lame.
La ne tõndo, tõnd yaa Wẽnnaam dẽnda. Ned ning sẽn mi Wẽnnaam kelgda tõndo, la ned ning sẽn ka mi Wẽnnaam ka kelgd tõnd ye. Yaa woto la tõnd na n bãng sɩd Sɩɩgã ne tudgr sɩɩgã n bake.
M zo-nongdse, d nong taaba, bala, nonglem yita Wẽnnaam nengẽ, la ned ning fãa sẽn nong a taab yaa Wẽnnaam biiga, la a mii Wẽnnaam.
Ned ning sẽn ka nong a taab ka bãng Wẽnnaam ye, bala Wẽnnaam yaa nonglem.
Ad Wẽnnaam sẽn puk b nonglemã to-to tõnd yĩnga: Bãmb tʋma b Bi-ribl yendã dũniyã pʋgẽ tɩ tõnd tõe n paam vɩɩm bãmb maasem yĩnga.
Nonglem kãng ka tõnd sẽn nong Wẽnnaam yĩng ye, yaa bãmb sẽn nong tõndo, n tʋm b Bi-riblã tɩ b yɩ maoong tõnd yel-wẽna sugr kũun yĩngã yĩnga.
Mam zo-nongdse, Wẽnnaam sã n nong tõnd hal wʋsg a woto, tõnd me tog n nonga taaba.
Ned baa a yen zɩ n yã Wẽnnaam ye. Tõnd sã n nong taaba, Wẽnnaam bee tõnd pʋgẽ, la bãmb nonglema zemsa zãng tõnd pʋgẽ.
Ad bũmb ning sẽn kɩted tɩ tõnd bãng tɩ d bee Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ, la tɩ bãmb bee tõnd pʋgẽ: Yaa tɩ bãmb kõo tõnd b Sɩɩgã.
La tõnd yãame la d kɩt kaset tɩ d ba wã tʋma b Bi-riblã tɩ b yɩ dũni fãagda.
Ned ning sẽn yet t'a Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-ribla, Wẽnnaam bee a soab pʋgẽ, la a soab bee Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ.

La ne tõndo, tõnd bãnga nonglem ning Wẽnnaam sẽn tar tõnd yĩngã, la tõnd tẽe nonglem kõngo. Wẽnnaam yaa nonglem. Ned ning sẽn be nonglem pʋgẽ, a bee Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ, la Wẽnnaam bee yẽ soab pʋgẽ.
Nonglema sã n zems zãng tõnd pʋsẽ, dẽ, bʋʋda kaoob daare tõnd pɛlg na n yɩɩ kãenkãe, bala, Kirist sẽn ya to-to wã, tõnd me vɩɩmã yaa a woto dũni kãngã pʋga.
Rabeem ka be nonglem pʋgẽ ye, la nonglem sẽn zems zãng yiisda rabeem. Bala, rabeem wilgdame tɩ sɩbgr n be, la ned ning sẽn zoet rabeem, nonglemã ka zems zãng yẽ pʋgẽ ye.
Ne tõndo, tõnd tara nonglem, Wẽnnaam sẽn deng n nong tõndã yĩnga.
Ned sã n yet t'a nonga Wẽnnaam n yaool n kis a ba-biiga, yẽ soab yaa zĩrĩ yagda. Bala, ned ning sẽn ka nong a ba-biig a sẽn ne wã, a ka tõe n nong Wẽnnaam yẽ sẽn ka ne wã ye.
Dẽ, ad tõog ninga Kirist sẽn kõ tõndã: Ned ning sẽn nong Wẽnnaam, tog n nonga a ba-biig me.
Ned ning fãa sẽn tẽed t'a Zezi yaa Kiristã, yaa Wẽnnaam n dog yẽ soaba. La ned ning fãa sẽn nong soab ning sẽn dog-a bãmbã, nonga bãmb sẽn dog a soabã me.
Ad bũmb ning sẽn kɩted tɩ tõnd bãng tɩ d nonga Wẽnnaam kambã: Yaa tõnd sẽn na n nong Wẽnnaam la d sakd bãmb tõodã.
Bala, tɩ nong Wẽnnaam yaa tɩ sak bãmb tõodã. La bãmb tõodã ka toog ye.
Bala, Wẽnnaam sẽn dog a soab fãa tõogda dũniyã. Ad tõogr ning sẽn tõogd dũni wã: yaa tõnd tẽebã.
Ãnna n tõogd dũni wã, sã n ka ned ninga sẽn tẽed t'a Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã.
Yaa a Zezi Kirist n wa ne koom, la zɩɩm, la ka ne koom bal ye, la yaa ne koom la zɩɩm, la yaa Sɩɩg-sõng n kɩt kaseto, Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn ya sɩd soabã yĩnga.
Bala, yaa neb a tãab n kɩt kaset arzãn pʋga: yaa ba wã, la gomdã, la Sɩɩg-sõngo. La bãmb b tãabã yaa yembre.
La bũmb a tãab n be n kɩt kaset tẽng zugu: yaa Sɩɩg-sõngo, la koom, ne zɩɩm. La bãmb b tãabã kaset zemsda taaba.
Tõnd sã n deegd ninsaalb kaseto, Wẽnnaam kaset n ya kãsẽng n yɩɩda. Tɩ bõe, ad Wẽnnaam kaseto: Yaa tɩ Wẽnnaam kɩta b Bi-riblã kaseto.

Ned ning sẽn tẽed Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã tara kaset kãngã a meng pʋgẽ. Ned ning sẽn ka tẽed Wẽnnaam, a maanda bãmb tɩ b yɩ wa zĩrĩ yagda yẽ sẽn ka tẽed kaset ninga Wẽnnaam sẽn kɩs b Bi-riblã wɛɛngẽ wã yĩnga.
Kaset kãng la woto: Wẽnnaam kõo tõnd vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa, la vɩ-kãng bee b Bi-riblã pʋgẽ.
Ned ninga sẽn tar-a Bi-riblã tara vɩɩmã, la ned ninga sẽn ka tar-a Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã ka tar vɩɩmã ye.
Mam gʋlsa yãmb bõn-kãngã, sẽn na yɩl tɩ yãmb bãng tɩ yãmb sẽn tẽed Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã yʋʋrã, yãmb tara vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Ad pɛl-kɛgeng ning tõnd sẽn tar bãmb taoorã: Tõnd sã n kos bũmb sẽn zems ne bãmb daabo, b kelgda tõndo.
La tõnd sã n miẽ tɩ b kelgda tõndo, sẽn ya bũmb ninga la tõnd kos-yã, tõnd miime tɩ d paama bũmb ninga tõnd sẽn kos bãmbã.

Ned sã n yã a ba-biig sẽn maan yel-wẽnd sẽn ka wat ne kũum, bɩ a pʋʋse, la Wẽnnaam na kõ-a vɩɩm. Yaa neb nins sẽn maand-b yel-wẽn sẽn ka wat ne kũuma yĩnga la y tog n pʋʋse. Yel-wẽnd n be n wat ne kũum, ka yel-wẽn kãng yĩng la mam sẽn yet tɩ y pʋʋsã ye.
Tʋʋm-wẽng fãa yaa yel-wẽnde, la yel-wẽn n be n ka wat ne kũum ye.
Tõnd miime tɩ Wẽnnaam sẽn dog ned ning fãa ka maand yel-wẽn ye, la Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã gũuda yẽnda, la wẽng soabã ka sɩɩsd yẽ ye.
Tõnd miime tɩ d yaa Wẽnnaam dẽnda, la dũniyã zãng bee wẽng soabã nugẽ.

Tõnd miime me tɩ Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã waame, la b kõo tõnd bãngr tɩ d bãng soab ning sẽn yaa sɩdã. La tõnd bee sẽn ya-a sɩdã pʋgẽ, b Bi-ribl a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩnga. Yaa bãmb la Wẽnnaam sɩd-sɩda la vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa.
Mam kom-bõonego, lak-y y mens ne wẽn-naandsã.
Kãsma n tʋmd seb-kãnga pag a Kirya sẽn ya Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdgã ne a kambã mam sẽn nong sɩd pʋgẽ wã. La ka maam m ye n nong-b ye, neb nins fãa sẽn bãng sɩdã me nong-b lame,
sɩdã sẽn be tõnd pʋgẽ, la sẽn na n pa ne tõnd wakat sẽn kõn sa wã yĩnga.
Barka, la nimbãan-zoeere, la laafɩ sẽn yit tõnd ba a Wẽnnaam nengẽ, la bãmb Bi-ribl a Zezi Kirist nengẽ na n paa ne tõndo, sɩdã ne nonglema pʋgẽ.
Mam paama sũ-noog wʋsgo, mam sẽn mik tɩ fo kamb kẽer n kẽnd sɩdã pʋgẽ, wa sẽn zems tõog ning d ba wã sẽn kõ tõndã.
Moasã, Kirya, bũmb ninga mam sẽn gʋlsd foomã ka tõ-paalg ye, yaa tõog ning tõnd sẽn dag n paam hal sɩngrẽ wã, mam kota foom tɩ d nong taabã.
La nonglem yaa tɩ kẽn wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam tõodã. Yaa tõ-kãng pʋgẽ la yãmb tog n kẽne, wa yãmb sẽn zãms hal sɩngrẽ wã.
Bala, bɛlgdb wʋsg n kẽ dũniyã pʋgẽ n ka kɩt kaset t'a Zezi waa ne yĩng ye. Ad yaa yẽ soab la bɛlgdã la Kirist kɩɩsdã.
Gũus-y y mens n da wa menes tõnd tʋʋmdã biis ye, la tɩ y na reeg keoor sẽn ya kãsenga.
Ned ning fãa sẽn loogd rẽnda, n ka paad Kirist zãmsgã pʋgẽ ka tar Wẽnnaam ye, la ned ning sẽn paad zãmsgã pʋgẽ tara ba wã la Bi-riblã.
Ned sã n wa yãmb nengẽ tɩ ka ne zãms-kãnga, bɩ y ra reeg-a y yiri, la y pʋs n da pʋʋs-a tɩ wẽnd na kaoos-a ye.
Bala, ned ninga sẽn pʋʋs-a tɩ wẽnd na kaoos-a naagda yẽnda a tʋʋm-wẽnsã pʋgẽ.

Baa ne mam sẽn tar bũmb wʋsg sẽn na gʋls yãmbã, mam ka tʋlg n na n gʋls-b ne seb-vãoogo la ne gʋls-koom ye. Mam maanda tẽeb tɩ m na n waa yãmb nengẽ, n gom ne yãmb neng ne nenga, tɩ tõnd sũ-noogã na pid zãnga.
Fo ba-bi-poakã sẽn ya Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdgã kambã pʋʋsda foom.
Kãsmã n tʋmd seb-kãnga ba-bi-nongr a Gayus sẽn ya ned mam sẽn nong sɩdã pʋgẽ wã.
Mam zo-nongre, mam bõsda Wẽnd tɩ fo yɛlã fãa na kẽnd sõama, la tɩ fo yĩnga tar laafɩ wala f sɩɩgã yɛlã sẽn ya sõma wã.
Ba-biisã sẽn wa n kɩs kaset ne sɩd ninga sẽn be fo pʋgẽ, la fo sẽn kẽnd sɩdã pʋgẽ to-to wã, mam maana sũ-noog wʋsgo.
Bũmb ka kõt maam sũ-noog n yɩɩd mam sẽn na n wʋm tɩ b gomd tɩ mam kambã kẽnda sɩdã pʋgẽ ye.
Mam zo-nongre, bũmb ning fo sẽn maand ba-biisã yĩngã, fo maanda ne sɩda, baa ne ba-bi-sãamsã.
Bãmb kɩsa fo nonglema kaset tẽedba taoore. Fo sã n sõng-b so-toakã wɛɛngẽ, wa sẽn zems Wẽnnaam yam ned sẽn tog n maane na yɩ neere.
Bala yaa a Zu-soabã yʋʋrã yĩng la b kẽng-yã, la b ka reeg baa fɩ neb nins sẽn ka pʋʋsd Wẽnnaama nengẽ ye.
Dẽ, tõnd tog n deega nin-bãmba-rãmba, tɩ tõnd tõe n yɩ tʋmd-n-taas ne bãmba, sɩdã yĩnga.
Mam gʋlsa koees bilf n tʋm a Zezi tẽedbã, la a Diyotɛrf sẽn nong n yɩ taoor soab bãmb sʋkã ka sakd n deeg ye.

Yaa woto yĩng tɩ mam sã n wa wa, mam na n tẽega tʋʋm nins yẽ sẽn maandã, a sẽn saad n gomd tõnd yell-wẽngã. Tɩ rẽ ka sek-a ye. Yẽ mengã ka reegd ba-biisã ye, la yẽ gɩdgda neb nins sẽn dat n deeg-bã, la a rigd-b n yiisd a Zezi tẽedbã sʋka.
M zo-nongre, da maan togs-n-taar ne sẽn ya wẽng ye, maan togs-n-taar ne sẽn ya neere. Ned ning sẽn maanda neer yaa Wẽnnaam neda, la ned ning sẽn maand wẽng ka yã Wẽnnaam ye.
Neba fãa ne sɩdã meng kɩta a Demetiryus kaset sõngo. Tõnd me kɩta yẽ kaset sõngo, la fo miime tɩ tõnd kaset yaa sɩda.
Mam tara bũmb wʋsg m sẽn da tõe n gʋlsẽ foom, la m ka rat n gʋls-b ne gʋls-koom la ne gʋlsdg ye.
Mam maanda tẽeb tɩ sã n yɩ bilfu, m na n yãa foom, la d na n goma ne taab neng ne nenga.
Bɩ laafɩ zĩnd ne foom. F zo-rãmba pʋʋsda foom, pʋʋs d zo-rãmba fãa yembr yembre.
Maam a Zuud sẽn ya a Zezi Kirist tʋmtʋmda la a Zak ba-biigã n tʋmd seb-kãngã neb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn boole, tɩ tõnd nong-b ba a Wẽnnaam pʋgẽ tɩ Wẽnnaam bĩng-b a Zezi Kirist yĩngã.
Bɩ Wẽnnaam nimbãan-zoeere la b laafɩ la b nonglem zĩnd ne yãmb wʋsg n paase.

Mam zo-nongse, mam sẽn dag n tʋlg ne m sũur fãa n na n gʋls yãmb sẽn kẽed ne fãagr ning tõnd fãa sẽn tarã wɛɛngẽ wã mam mikame tɩ yaa tɩlɛ ne maam tɩ m gʋlse, n sagl yãmb tɩ y zab tẽebã zabre, tẽeb ning b sẽn dag n kõ Wẽnnaam nebã vugr bal wakat fãa yĩngã.

Bala, raop kẽer n soos n kẽ yãmb sʋka. Bãmb yaa wẽn-kɩɩsdb sẽn tekd tõnd Wẽnnaamã bark koɛɛgã n maand raglem la b kɩɩsd a Zezi Kirist sẽn ya tõnd karen-saamb la d Zu-soab sẽn ka to wã. La b gʋlsa sɩbgr ning b sẽn na n paamã hal daar zãra.

Yãmb sẽn bãng bõn-kãensã fãa vugr bal wakat fãa yĩngã, mam dat n tẽega yãmb tɩ Zu-soabã sẽn fãag Israyɛl kambã n yiis Ezipt tẽngã n sa wã, b yaool n kɩtame tɩ neb nins sẽn ka tẽ-bã sãame.

La malegs nins sẽn ka pa zĩig ninga sẽn zems ne bãmbã, la b sẽn yi n bas b mens zĩigã, Wẽnnaam balg-b-la bãens n bĩng-b lik bida pʋgẽ wakat sẽn kõn sa yĩngã, n gũudẽ tɩ ra-kãsengã sẽn ya bʋʋdã kaoob daarã ta.
Woto me, Sodom la Gomoor la tẽns nins sẽn pẽ bãmbã sẽn maan yoob a woto n bao gãag buud sẽn ka segdã, b sɩbga bãmb ne bugum sẽn ka kiida tɩ b yɩ mamsg neb a taab yĩnga.
Baa ne rẽ, nin-kãensa me, rẽgemda b yĩnsã b magbã pʋgẽ, n paoogd noor ning Zu-soaba sẽn tar ne bãmbã la b tʋʋd yĩngr pãens rãmbã.
La baa malɛk-rãmba naab a Misɛl sẽn dag n kɩɩsd bɛlgdã sẽn yetã n wẽed nokoeemd ne-a a Moyiis kũuma poorẽ wã, a ka saag n gom n paoog-a ye. A yeelame yaa: Bɩ Zu-soaba sɩbg-fo.
La nin-kãensã yẽ, b gomdame n tʋʋd bũmb ning sẽn ka mi wã, la bũmb nins b yamã sẽn kɩtd tɩ b miẽ wã bala, wa rũmsã sẽn ka tar tagsgã sẽn maandã, bõn-kãng sãamda bãmb bala.
Bãmb na paam toogo, tɩ bõe, b tũu a Kaẽ sorã, bãmb kẽesa b mens a Balaam tudgrã pʋgẽ, yaood yĩnga. La bãmb sẽn kɩɩs wala a Koore wã, b sãamame.

Bãmb n wat ne yɛl yãmb ba-biir nonglem dɩɩbã wakatã, n kɩdemd be n ka zoet yãnde, n dɩt n digda. B yaa wa sawat sẽn ka koom tɩ sobg rɩkd-ba, n ya wa tɩɩs sʋʋgr wakat tɩɩs sẽn ka tar biisi, tɩɩs sẽn kʋɩ n leb n kʋɩ, n vigs n gãe.
B yaa wa ko-kãseng ko-pɛm sẽn yikd ne pãnga, n yiisd b yãnd puudu, b yaa wa ãd-saadse, tɩ Wẽnnaam bĩng-b lik bida pʋgẽ, wakat sẽn kõn sa yĩnga.
A Henok sẽn ya yãmb yaab a yopoe soab sẽn sɩng ne a Adama, togsa bãngr goam bãmb yĩng me n yeel yaa: Ad Zu-soaba waa ne b nin-sõamy kʋʋng-kʋʋngo,
n na n bʋ neba fãa bʋʋdo, la b kɩt tɩ tʋʋm-wẽns maandbã yals n logs tʋʋm-wẽns nins fãa b sẽn maanã yelle, la gom-wẽns nins yel-wẽn maandb sẽn ya wẽn-kɩɩsdbã sẽn gom bãmba.
Bãmb yaa neb sẽn nong yẽgõngo, sũ-pa-noom-dãmb sẽn tũud b yĩnsa ratem tɩ b noyã gomd wilg-m-meng goama, n belsd nebã n dat n paam bũmbu.
La yãmba m zo-nongdse, tẽeg-y bũmb nins tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist tẽn-tʋmdbã sẽn da pĩnd n yeel yãmb tɩ na n waame wã yelle.
B ra yeta yãmb yaa: Wakat sɛɛb wakate, nin-yaandb n na n zĩndi, n kẽnd wa Wẽnnaam ka ye, n tũud b yĩnsã ratem.
Ad yaa, bãmb n wat ne welgre, n ya neb sẽn vɩ yĩngã yĩnga, tɩ Wẽnnaam Sɩɩg ka b pʋgẽ ye.
La yãmba, m Zo-nongdse, bɩ y kẽng taoor ne tẽ-sõngã y sẽn tarã. Pʋʋs-y ne Sɩɩg-sõng pãnga,
la y kel n yals Wẽnnaam nonglmã pʋgẽ la y gũud tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist nimbãan-zoeerã sẽn na n kɩt tɩ d paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã.
Zoe-y neb kẽer nimbãanega, neb nins yam sẽn yuusdã.
Zɛɛg-y-b n fãag-b n yiis bugmẽ wã. Zoe-y neb a taabã nimbãanega, nimbãaneg sẽn naag ne rabeem, n kisg hal baa fuug ning b yĩnsã ratem sẽn dẽgmã.
Bɩ soab ning sẽn tõe n gũ yãmb tɩ y ka lʋɩ, la la b kɩt tɩ y puk bãmb ziirã taoor ne kɩdeng tɩ rõadg kaẽ wã,

Wẽnnaam b yen tãa sẽn ya soab ning sẽn fãag-a tõndo, d Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist maasem yĩngã, soog ziiri, la naam, la pãnga la noore, sẽn sɩng ne wakat sẽn dag n ka be, la moasã, la zamaan fãa sẽn wata. Ãmina.

Woto yaa a Zezi Kirist vẽnegr Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ bãmb tɩ b wilg b nonglem yemsã bũmb nins sẽn tog n zĩnd wakat bilf sã n paase. La a Zezi Kirist tʋma b malɛk t'a wilg b tʋmtʋmd a Zã bõn-kãense.
Yaa yẽnda n yɩ kaset soaba, n togs nebã Wẽnnaam goama la a Zezi Kirist kasetã, n wilg bũmb nins fãa yẽ sẽn yã wã.
Bark bee neb nins sẽn karemd pĩnd-n-bãngr gom-kãensã wã zutu, la neb nins sẽn kelgda la b sakd bũmb nins sẽn gʋls tɩ be a pʋgẽ wã zutu. Bala wakatã kolgame.

Maam a Zã n tʋmd seb kãnga wẽnd-dot a yopoe wã sẽn be Azi Porvẽnsã pʋgẽ wã. Bɩ soab ning sẽn be, la sẽn dag n be la sẽn watã, n paas sɩɩs a yopoe wã sẽn be bãmb geerã taoorã, la a Zezi Kirist sẽn ya kaset soab sẽn ya tɩrga, la pipi soab Wẽnnaam sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũum la dũniyã rĩm-dãmba Rĩmã ning yãmb zut barka, la b kõ-y bãane. Soab ning sẽn nonga tõndo, n pek tõnd ne b zɩɩmã
n yiis d yel-wẽna, n maan tõnd tɩ d lebg soolem maan-kʋʋdb bãmb ba a Wẽnnaam yĩngã, bãmb n tog ne ziiri la pãng zamaan o zamaane! Ãmina!
Ade bãmb wata ne sawato. Ninsaal fãa na n yãa bãmba, hal baa ne neb nins sẽn dag n kõs bãmbã. La buuda fãa sẽn be dũni zugã na n wiisa bãmb yĩnga. N-ye! Ãmina!
Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam yetame yaa: Maam yaa Alfa la Omega, soab ning sẽn be moasa, la sẽn dag n be la sẽn wata, soab ning sẽn tõeyã fãa wã.

Maam a Zã sẽn ya yãmb ba-biiga la sẽn naag yãmb n paamd namsgo, la sẽn naag yãmb n tar pʋɩɩr ne Wẽnnaam soolem, la m naag n maood a Zezi tũudmã pʋgẽ wã, mam dag n bee Patmoos sẽn ya tẽng koom sẽn gũbgi, Wẽnnaam goamã la a Zezi kasetã yĩnga.
Zu-soaba daare, Sɩɩg-sõng pida maam, la mam wʋma koe-kãseng sẽn wẽnd baorg koɛɛg m poorẽ.
A da yetame yaa: Gʋls bũmb nins fo sẽn ne wã sebr zug n tʋm wẽnd-dot yopoe wã sẽn be Efɛɛse, la Ismirn la Pɛrgam la Tɩyatɩɩr la Sard la Filadɛlfi ne Laodise.
Mam wẽnemdame n na n ges ned ning sẽn da gomd-a ne maamã. La mam sẽn wẽnemde, mam yãa sãnem fɩtl-dogends a yopoe,
la ned sẽn be fɩtl-dogends a yopoe wã sʋka, n wẽnd Ninsaal Bi-ribla. B rag n yera fuug sẽn sig n ta b nao wã, la b ra sẽbga b yãoog ne sãnem sẽbdga.
B zugã zoobd rag n yaa peels wa pe-kõbdo la wa lamdo. B ninã ra yaa wa bug-witim.
B naowã ra yaa wa zũud b sẽn zug boaag pʋgẽ t'a mooge, la b koɛɛgã ra yaa wa ko-kãsemsã bʋrgo.

Bãmb da zãada ãds a yopoe ne b rɩtgo. Zabr sʋʋg sẽn tar noey a yiib sẽn dɩt n da yit bãmb noorẽ wã. La bãmb nengã ra yaa wa wĩntoogo wakat ning a sẽn yãgd ne a pãng tɛkã. Fɩtl dogends a yopoe (1.12)
Mam sẽn yãnd-bã, mam lʋɩɩ b taoor n ya wa kũum. Bãmb tika maam ne b nug-rɩtg n yeel yaa: Da maan rabeem ye!
Mam yaa dẽenem la yaoolem soaba, soab ning sẽn vɩ. Mam dag n kiime, la ad-ma, mam vɩɩme, zamaan o zamaane. Mam tara kũum ne kɩɩm-kulg kʋɩlen-biisi.
Dẽ wã, gʋls bũmb nins fo sẽn yã, bũmb nins sẽn be moasã, la bũmb nins sẽn na n yaool n maanã.

Ad ãds a yopoe wã fo sẽn yã mam rɩtgã ne sãnem fɩtl-dogends a yopoe wã yel-solemdã võore: Ãds a yopoe wã yaa wẽnd-dot a yopoe sẽn be tẽms a yopoe wã gũudba, la sãnem fɩtl-dogends a yopoe wã yaa wẽnd-dot a yopoe wã sẽn be tẽms a yopoe wã.
Gʋls Efɛɛs wẽnd-doogã gũud n yeel-a yaa: Ad bũmb ning a soab sẽn zãad ãds a yopoe ne a rɩtgo, la a kẽnd sãnem fɩtl-dogends a yopoe wã sʋkã sẽn yeta:

"Mam mii tʋʋm nins y sẽn maanã, la y sẽn tʋmd to-to, la m mii y modgrã. Mam miime tɩ yãmb ka tõe n sak tɩ nin-wẽns zĩnd ne-y ye. Yãmb maka neb nins sẽn yet tɩ b yaa tẽn-tʋmdb n yaool n ka tẽn-tʋmdbã n gese, la yãmb mikame tɩ b yaa zĩrĩ yagdba.
Yãmb nangda pãnga, yãmb namsa mam yʋʋrã yĩnga, la yãmb ka boog y raood ye.
La yell ning mam sẽn tar ne yãmba, yaa tɩ yãmb basa y pipi nonglmã.

Dẽ wã, bɩ y tẽeg zĩig ning yãmb sẽn lʋɩ wã. Tek-y yam n kos sugri, la y leb n tʋm y pipi tʋʋma. Sã n ka rẽ, mam na n waa yãmb nengẽ, la m na n yiisa yãmb fɩtl-doagendgã a zĩigẽ, sã n ka tɩ yãmb teka yam n kos sugri.
Baoosgo yãmb tara bõn-sõng a yembre: yaa tɩ yãmb kisa Nikolayit-dãmba tʋʋma, tʋʋm nins mam me sẽn kisã."
Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar-a tʋb kelg bũmb ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn yet wẽnd-dotã: Mam na n kõo tõaagd fãa noor t'a rɩ vɩɩm tɩɩgã sẽn be Wẽnnaam Paradi pʋgẽ wã biisi.
Gʋls Ismirn wẽnd-doogã gũud n yeel-a yaa: Sẽn ya-a dẽenem la yaoolem soaba, sẽn dag n ki-a n leb n vʋʋgã yetame yaa:

"Mam bãnga yãmb namsgã ne y naongã, la yãmb yaool n yaa arzegs rãmba, la mam bãnga kãnegr ning neb nins sẽn yet tɩ b yaa Zuif-rãmb n yaool n ka Zuif-rãmba, la b ya Sʋtãanã karen-doogã rãmb sẽn kãnegd yãmbã.

Da maan-y rabeem ne namsg ning y sẽn na n namsã ye. Gese, Sʋtãanã na n kẽesa yãmb neb kẽer bi-bees roogo, sẽn na n yɩl n mak yãmba, la yãmb na n paama namsg rasem piiga. Kel n maan-y neer hal tɩ ta kũum, la mam na kõ yãmb vɩɩm maanfo." Maanfo (2.10)
Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar tʋb kelg bũmb nins Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn yet wẽnd-dotã. Kũum a yiib soabã ka na n sɩɩs ned ning sẽn na n paam-a tõogrã ye.
Gʋls Pɛrgam wẽnd-doogã gũud n yeel-a yaa: Soab ning sẽn zãad-a zabr sʋʋg sẽn tar noey a yiib sẽn dɩtã yetame yaa:

"Mam mii yãmb sẽn be zĩig ningã: zĩ-kãng yaa a Sʋtãan geere. Yãmb talla mam yʋʋrã, la yãmb ka bas y tẽeb ne maam baa wakat ning b sẽn kʋ mam kaset tɩrg soab a Ãntipaas yãmb sʋka, zĩig ning a Sʋtãan sẽn be wã.

La mam tara yell bilf ne yãmba. Yaa tɩ neb n be yãmb sʋkã n tũud a Balaam zãmsgã. Yẽ ra zãmsa a Balak t'a maan bẽdg n kɩt t'a Israyɛl yagensã rɩ wẽnd-naands maand nemdo, la b maan yoobo, tɩ rẽ lub-ba.
Yãmb me tara neb kẽer me sẽn sakd Nikolayit-dãmba zãmsgo.
Dẽ wã, bɩ y tek yam n kos sugri, sã n ka rẽ, bilf sã n paase, mam na n waa yãmb nengẽ, la m na n zaba ne bãmb ne m noorẽ zabr sʋʋgã."

Bɩ sẽn tar-a tʋb kelg bũmb nins Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn yet wẽnd-dotã. Mam na n kõo ned ning sẽn na n tõogã man sẽn solge, la kug-pɛɛlga. Kugrã zugu, yʋ-paalg n gʋls be ned baa a yen sẽn ka mi, sã n ka ned ning sẽn deegd-a kugrã.
Gʋls Tɩyatɩɩr wẽnd-doogã gũud n yeel-a yaa: Ad Wẽnnaam Bi-riblã, sẽn tar-a nin sẽn wẽnd bug-witim t'a nao wẽnd wa zũudã sẽn yeta:
"Mam bãnga yãmb tʋʋma la y nonglemã, la y tẽebã, la y tʋʋm sõamy wã, la y sũ-marã ne y yaoolem tʋʋmã sẽn ya wʋsg n yɩɩd y pipi tʋʋmã.

La mam tara yell ne yãmba: yaa tɩ yãmb basa pag a Zezabɛll t'a zãmsd nebã. A yetame t'a yaa no-rɛɛsa, n zãmsd nebã la a belgd mam tʋmtʋmdbã tɩ b maand yoobo, la b wãbd wẽnd-naands maand nemdo.
Mam kõo yẽ weer t'a tek yam n kos sugr a yoobã yĩnga, la yẽ ka rat n kos sugr a yĩng ye.
Gese, mam na n gãneg-a-la tẽnga la to-kãseng pʋga, yẽ ne neb nins sẽn maand yoob ne yẽ wã, sã n ka tɩ b teka yam n bas b tʋʋmã.
Mam na n kɩtame tɩ kũum kʋ a kambã, la wẽnd-dotã fãa na n bãngame tɩ mam yaa soab ning sẽn feesd tagsd la sũyã, la mam na n yaoo yãmb ned kam fãa wa sẽn zems a tʋʋmã.
La yãmb Tɩyatɩɩr neb a taaba fãa sẽn ka sakd zãms-kãngã, la sẽn ka bãng a Sʋtãan yel-solgdsã wa b sẽn mi n yetã, mam yeta yãmb tɩ m ka na n zɩlg yãmb zɩɩb a to ye.
Bũmb ning sẽn be bala, yaa tɩ y tall bũmb nins yãmb sẽn tarã kãenkãe hal tɩ mam wa.
Ned ning sẽn na n tõoge, la ned ning sẽn na n tall-a mam tʋʋmã hal tɩ wakat ta, mam na n kõo yẽ noor t'a soog soolem dãmba.
Yẽ na n zãa naam dasaar sẽn ya kut n soog-ba, wa b sẽn wãad tãnd lagdo, wa mam meng sẽn deeg m ba nengẽ wã.
La mam na n kõo yẽ yibeoog ãdga.
Bɩ sẽn tar-a tʋb kelg bũmb nins Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn togsd mam wẽnd-dotã.
Gʋls Sard wẽnd-doogã gũud n yeel-a yaa: Ad soab ning sẽn tar Wẽnnaam sɩɩs a yopoe la ãds a yopoe wã sẽn yeta: "Mam bãnga yãmb tʋʋmã. Yãmb yʋʋr yiime tɩ y vɩɩme la y yaool n yaa kũum.
Maan gũusgu la f kɩt tɩ sẽn be fo pʋgẽ n nan ka ki wã leb n yẽege. Bala, mam mikame tɩ yãmb tʋʋmã ka zems mam Wẽnnaamã taoor ye.

Dẽ wã, bɩ y tẽeg yãmb sẽn deeg koɛɛgã la y wʋm-a to-to wã, tall-y-yã-a la y kos sugri. Yãmb sã n ka gũusi, mam na n waa yãmb nengẽ wa wagdre, la yãmb ka na n bãng sẽn ya wakat ning la mam na n wa n ling yãmbã ye.
Baoosgo, yãmb tara neb kẽer Sard sẽn ka rẽgem b fut ye. Bãmb na n kẽna ne maam ne fu-peelse, bãmb sẽn zems tɩ kẽn ne maamã yĩnga.
Ned ning sẽn na n tõogã na n yeelga fu-peels a woto. Mam ka na n yẽes yẽ yʋʋrã vɩɩm sebrã pʋgẽ ye, la mam na n boola yẽ yʋʋrã m ba la malegsã taoore."
Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar-a tʋb kelg bũmb ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn togsd wẽnd-dotã.

Gʋls Filadɛlfi wẽnd-doogã gũud n yeel-a yaa: Ad bũmb sõmblem soabã, sɩd soabã, sẽn tar-a a Daviid kʋɩlen-bilã, soab ning sẽn pakd tɩ ned ka tõe n pagã, soab ning sẽn pagd tɩ ned ka tõe n pakã sẽn yeta:
"Mam bãnga yãmb tʋʋmã. Gese, mam ninga kʋɩleng sẽn pak yãmb taoore tɩ ned ka tõe n pag-a ye, tɩ bala yãmb pãngã paoodame, la yãmb talla mam koɛɛgã, la y ka kɩɩs mam yʋʋrã ye.

Ade, mam na n ninga neb nins sẽn ya a Sʋtãan tũudbã yãmb nugẽ. Bãmb boonda b mens tɩ Zuif-rãmba tɩ yaool n ka sɩd ye, bala b yagda zĩrĩ. Gese, mam na n kɩtame tɩ b wa n wõgemd yãmb taoore, la b bãng tɩ mam nonga yãmba.
Yãmb sẽn tall mam koɛɛg ning sẽn kɩt tɩ yãmb nangd pãng mam pʋgẽ wã yĩnga, mam me na n kogla yãmb wakat ning makrã sẽn na wa dũniyã tɛk fãa n mak nebã sẽn be a zugã.
Mam wata tao-tao. Gãd-y bũmb nins yãmb sẽn tarã kãenkãe, tɩ ned da reeg yãmb maanfã ye.

Mam na n kɩtame tɩ ned ning sẽn tõog-a wã lebg ra-luk mam Wẽnnaamã roog pʋga, la yẽ kõn le yi be ye. Mam na n gʋlsa mam Wẽnnaamã yʋʋre, la m Wẽnnaamã tẽng sẽn ya Zeruzalɛm paalg sẽn yit mam Wẽnnaamã nengẽ arzãn n sigdã yʋʋr yẽ zugu, la m gʋls mam yʋ-paalegã yẽ zugu."
Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar kelg bũmb nins Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn yet wẽnd-dotã.
Gʋls Laodise wẽnd-doogã gũud n yeel-a yaa: Ad bũmb ning sẽn ya-a Ãmina, la kaset soab sẽn ya tɩrga, la sɩd soaba, sẽn naan-a Wẽnnaam bõn-naandsã sẽn yeta:
"Mam bãnga yãmb tʋʋmã. Yãmb ka maasga la y ka tʋʋlg me ye. Mam nongẽ la yãmb sẽn dag n na n yaẽ tʋʋlga wall maasga.
Woto, yãmb sẽn ya zalzal n ka maasg la y ka tʋʋlgã yĩnga, mam na n wʋka yãmb m noorẽ.

Yãmb sẽn yet tɩ yãmb yaa arzegs rãmba, tɩ y paama arzegse la yãmb ka le rat baa fʋɩ wã yĩnga, la yãmb sẽn ka mi tɩ y yaa nimbãan-neba, n be namsg pʋgẽ la y ya naong rãmba la y zoẽnse la bɛɛlã yĩnga,

mam sagenda yãmb tɩ y ra sãnem mam nengẽ, sẽn zug ne bugum, tɩ y tõe n lebg arzegs rãmba, la y ra fu-peels mam nengẽ, tɩ y tõe n paam n yeelge, n lud y yãnd n da yɩ a zaal ye, la y ra nin kaam mam nengẽ n sõog y ninã tɩ y tõe n yã.
Mam lengda neb nins fãa mam sẽn nonge, la m sɩbgd-ba. Dẽ wã, bɩ y nang pãnga la y tek yam n kos sugri.
Ade, mam yasa rig-noorẽ n kabsdẽ. Ned sã n wʋm mam koɛɛgã n pak kʋɩlengã, mam na n kẽe yẽ roogẽ n dɩ ne yẽnda la yẽ na n dɩɩ ne maam.
Mam na n kɩtame tɩ ned ning sẽn tõogã zĩnd ne maam mam geerã zug wa mam sẽn tõoge, n zao ne m ba b geerã zugã."
Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar tʋb kelg bũmb ning Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn yet wẽnd-dotã.

Dẽ poore, mam gesame, la haya! Mam yãa kʋɩleng sẽn pak arzãn pʋga. La pipi koɛɛg ning sẽn wẽnd baorg mam sẽn da wʋm t'a gomd ne maamã yeela maam yaa: Rʋ yĩngr ka, la mam na n kɩtame tɩ fo yã bũmb nins sẽn ya tɩlɛ tɩ wa zĩndã.
Tao-tao bala, Sɩɩg-sõng pida maam. La ade, geer n da be arzãn pʋga, la ned n dag n zao geerã zugu.
Ned ning sẽn zao-a geerã zugã dag n wẽnda wa kug sẽn be yõod n boond tɩ zaspe la sardoan. La saag-gomtɩʋʋg sẽn wẽnd wa kugr sẽn boond tɩ emerood n dag n gũbg geerã.
La gɛy pisi la a naas n dag n gilg ge-kãsengã, la kãsem-dãmb pisi la a naas n zao b zutu, n yer fu-peelse, la b n fõg sãnem maanf-rãmba.
Sa-yãgbo, la kelemse, la sa-kelems n yit geerẽ wã. Fɩtl-dãmb a yopoe n be geerã taoor n wit ne pãnga. Bãmb yaa Wẽnnaam sɩɩs a yopoe wã.
Geerã taoor daag n gãnega bũmb sẽn pɩnd wa vɛɛre, n tud n ya wa kiristalle. La geerã sʋk ne sẽn gũbg geerã fãa, bõn-vɩɩs a naas n be be n pid ne nin taoor la poorẽ.
Pipi bõn-vɩɩgã wẽnda wa gɩgemde, la yiib soabã wẽnda wa nag-bila la tãab soaba neng wẽnda wa ninsaal nenga, la naas soaba wẽnda wa panantugr sẽn yɩgda.

Bõn-vɩɩs a naasã ned kam fãa tara pɩgs a yoobe, la b pida ne nin zĩiga fãa, la b pʋgẽ me. Wĩndg la yʋngo b yetame tɩ: Sõngo, sõngo, Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam sẽn Tõeya fãa wã yaa sõngo. Bãmb da beeme la b bee moasa la b watame, n ka basdẽ ye.
La wakat ning bõn-vɩɩs a naasã sẽn na n waoog sẽn zao-a geerã zugu, n vɩ zamaan o zamaana, la b zẽk b yʋʋre, la b pʋʋs-b barkã,
kãsem-dãmbã pisi la a naasã na n wõgemda sẽn zao-a geerã zugu la b sẽn vɩ zamaan o zamaana taoore, n waoogd-ba, la b na n lobda b maanf-rãmba geerã taoor la b yetẽ:
Tõnd Zu-soaba la d Wẽnnaam, yãmb n zems tɩ reeg ziiri, la waoogre, la pãnga. Bala, yãmb n naan bũmb fãa, la yaa yãmb daab yĩng la y naan-b tɩ b beẽ.
La mam yãa sebr sẽn be sẽn zao-a geerã zugã nug rɩtgẽ. Sebrã pʋg ne a poorã fãa gʋlsame, la b sog-a-la ne sogds a yopoe.
La mam yãa malɛk sẽn tar pãng sẽn zẽkd a koɛɛg n sokdẽ yaa: Ãnna n zems tɩ sok sogdsã la a lak sebrã?
La ned baa a yen da ka be arzãn wall tẽng zugu, wall tẽnga tẽngr sẽn dag n tõe n lak sebrã wall a ges-a ye.
La b sẽn ka yã ned baa a ye sẽn zems tɩ lak sebrã wall tɩ ges-a wã yĩnga, mam da yãbda wʋsgo.
La kãsem-dãmba ned a yen yeela maam yaa: Da yãb ye. Ad Zuda buudã gɩgemd sẽn ya a Daviid yagengã paama tõogre, n na n sok sogds a yopoe wã la a lak sebrã.

La mam yãa pe-bil sẽn yas yĩngr geerã sʋka la bõn-vɩɩs a naasã ne kãsem-dãmba sʋka, la a yaa wa pesg b sẽn kʋ. Pe-bilã da tara yɩɩl a yopoe la nin a yopoe sẽn ya Wẽnnaam sɩɩs a yopoe wã b sẽn tʋm dũniyã tɛk fãa wã.
Pe-bilã waa n deega sebrã sẽn be sẽn zao-a geerã zugã nug rɩtgẽ wã.

Pe-bilã sẽn deeg sebrã, bõn-vɩɩs a naasã ne kãsem-dãmbã pisi la a naasã wõgemda bãmb taoore, la bãmb ned kam fãa zãada pɛndg la sãnem laag sẽn pid ne tɩdar sẽn tar yũ-noogo, sẽn ya nin-sõamyã pʋʋsgo.

La bãmb da yɩɩnda yɩɩn-paalg n yetẽ: Yãmb n zems tɩ reeg sebrã la y sogs a sogdsã, bala b ra kʋʋ yãmba, la yãmb fãaga neb buud fãa pʋgẽ, goam buud fãa pʋgẽ, tẽms fãa pʋgẽ, soolem fãa pʋgẽ ne yãmb zɩɩm tɩ b lebg Wẽnnaam neba.
Yãmb kɩtame tɩ bãmb lebg soolem la maan-kʋʋdb tõnd Wẽnnaamã yĩnga, la bãmb na n dɩɩ naam dũni zugu.
Mam gesame la m wʋma malegs wʋsg sẽn gũbg geerã, ne bõn-vɩɩsã la kãsem-dãmbã koeese, la bãmb sõorã yaa tus piig naoor tus piiga, la tus naoor tusa.
Bãmb da zẽkda b koees n yetẽ: Pe-bil ning b sẽn dag n kʋ wã zemsame tɩ reeg pãn-tõogo, la arzegse la yam la pãnga, la waoogre, la ziiri la pẽgre.

La mam wʋma bõn-nandsã fãa sẽn be arzãna la sẽn be tẽng zug la tẽngã tẽngre la ko-kãsenga zugu la bũmb nins fãa sẽn be be wã sẽn yet yaa: Sẽn zao-a geerã zugã la pe-bilã n tog ne pẽgre, la waoogre, la ziiri la pãnga, zamaan o zamaane.
La bõn-vɩɩs a naasã yeelame yaa: Ãmina! La kãsem-dãmbã yĩgimdame n waoog-ba.
Pe-bilã sẽn sok soagdg a yembr sogds a yopoe wã sʋkã, mam gesame, la mam wʋma bõn-vɩɩs a naasã ned a yembr sẽn gom ne koɛɛg sẽn wẽnd wa sa-kɛleng n yeel yaa: Wa!
Mam gesame, la mam yãa wed-moaag sẽn ya pɛɛlga. Sẽn zao-a weefã ra zãada tãpo, la b kõo yẽ maanfo. La a kẽnga wa tõaagda, n na n tõoge.
Pe-bilã sẽn sok soagdg a yiib soabã, mam wʋma bõn-vɩɩg a yiib soabã sẽn yeel yaa: Wa!
La wed-moaag a to kõbg sẽn ya miuug wa bugum yiime. La b kõo sẽn da zao-a yẽ wã pãn-tõog t'a yiis dũni laafɩ, tɩ nebã kood taaba. La b kõo yẽ zabr sʋ-kãsenga.
La bãmb sẽn sok soagdg a tãabẽ soabã, mam wʋma bõn-vɩɩg a tãabẽ soabã sẽn yeel yaa: Wa! Mam gesame, la mam yãa wed-moaag sẽn ya sablga. Sẽn zao-a yẽnda wã dag n zãada balãns a nugẽ.

La mam wʋma bũmb sẽn wẽnd wa koɛɛg bõn-vɩɩs a naasa sʋka. A da yetame yaa: bɩle bɛɛl ne wũmbl na n koosa hal deniye. Orz ne wũmbl a tãab na n koosa deniye. La sã n ya kaamã la divẽ wã, ra sɩɩs-b ye.
Pe-bilã sẽn sok soagdg a naas soabã, mam wʋma bõn-vɩɩg a naas-n-soaba koɛɛg sẽn yeel yaa: Wa!

Mam gesame la mam yãa wed-moaag t'a kõbgã ya kẽeg-kẽega. Sẽn da zao-a yẽnda wã yʋʋr boondame t'a kũum, la kɩɩm-kulg ra pʋgda yẽnda. La b kõo bãmb pãn-tõog tɩ b tõog dũniyã ned a yembr neb a naas fãa sʋk n kʋ-b ne zabr sʋʋga, la kom, la bãase, la ne dũniyã we-rũmsi.
Pe-bilã sẽn sok soagdg a nu soabã, mam yãa b sẽn dag n kʋ neb nins Wẽnnaam koɛɛgã poorẽ la b sẽn kɩs kasetã yĩngã sɩɩs sẽn be tẽn-kugrã tẽngre.
Bãmb zẽka b koees ne pãng n yeel yaa: Zu-soben-sõng la sɩd soaba, yãmb na n gũume hal tɩ ta dabʋr tɩ y yaool n kao duniyã nebã bʋʋdo, la y rok y sũur tõnd zɩɩma raagr yĩnga?
B kõo bãmb ned kam fãa fu-pɛɛlga, la b yeel-b tɩ b kel n vʋʋs wakat bilf yɛsa, hal tɩ bãmb tʋmd-n-taasã ne b ba-biisã b sẽn na n kʋ wa b sẽn kʋ bãmbã sõor pidi.
Pe-bilã sẽn sok soagdg a yoob soabã, mam gesame. Tẽn-digimdg kãseng n zĩndi. Wĩndga lebga sableg diga wa bot sẽn wʋg ne rũm-sableg kõbdo, la kiuugã zãng lebga wa zɩɩm,
la yĩngr ãdsã sʋʋga tẽngã zug wa kankang sob-kãseng sẽn wẽ t'a kankam yorge.
Sa-gãongã looga wa sebr b sẽn pili. La tãmsã fãa ne tẽns nins koomã sẽn gũbgã sersa b zĩisẽ.
Dũni rĩm-dãmbã la a nin-kãsemse la a sodaas nanamse la a arzegs rãmba la a pãens rãmba la a yemse, ne burkĩmbã, b fãa soonda tãms bogdẽ la tãms pĩis sʋka.
La b yeta tãmsã ne pĩisã tɩ b lʋɩ n põd-ba, n solg-b tɩ b zãag ne sẽn zao-a geerã zugã gesgo la ne pe-bilã sũ-puugri.
Bala, Wẽnnaam ne pe-bilã sũ-puugrã ra-kãsengã taame, la ãnna n na n tõog n põse?
Dẽ poore, mam yãa malegs a naas sẽn yas dũniyã kɩrems a naasã. Bãmb da yõka dũniyã sobd a naasã, sẽn na yɩl tɩ b ra wẽ tẽngã wall ko-kãsengã wall tɩɩg baa a yembr ye.

La mam yãa malɛk a to sẽn yi yaang n zẽkdẽ, la yẽ ra zãada Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ wã bãn-ningdga. Malɛkã zẽka a koɛɛg n kelem n yeel malegs a naasã b sẽn da kõ noor tɩ b maan tẽngã ne ko-kãsengã wẽngã yaa:
Da maan-y tẽngã wall ko-kãsengã wall tɩɩsã bũmbu, hal tɩ tõnd paam n ning d Wẽnnaamã tʋmtʋmdbã rĩyã bãnde.
La mam wʋma neb nins b sẽn ning bãndã sõore. Yaa neb tus koabg la tus pis-naas la a naase, a Israyɛl buudã fãa kambã sʋka.
A Zuda buudã neb b sẽn ning bãndã sõor tus piig la a yiibu. A Rubɛn buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu. A Gaad buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu,
a Azɛɛr buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu, a Neftali buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu, a Manase buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu,
a Sɩmyõ buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu, a Levi buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu, a Isakaar buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu,
a Zabilõ me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu, a Zozɛf buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu, a Bɛnzame buudã me yaa neb tus piig la a yiibu.

Dẽ poore, mam gesame, la mam yãa neb kʋʋng wʋsg ned sẽn ka tõe n sõd n sɛ ye, sẽn yi soolem dãmba fãa pʋse, buud fãa pʋse, tẽns toay-toay fãa pʋse, la sẽn gomd goam buud toor-toore. Bãmb dag yera fu-peelse la b zãad koms vãad b nusẽ n yas geerã taoore la pe-bila taoore.
Bãmb dag n zẽkda b koees ne pãng n yetẽ: Fãagrã bee ne tõnd Wẽnnaam sẽn zao geerã zugã, la ne pe-bilã.
La malegsã fãa ra yas n gũbga geerã ne kãsem-dãmbã la bõn-vɩɩs a naasã. Bãmb wõgemdame n fõgen b nens tẽng geerã taoor n waoog Wẽnnaam
n yetẽ yaa: Ãmina! Pẽgre, la ziiri, la yam la bark pʋʋsgo, la waoogre, la pãn-tõogo, la pãng yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã n so zamaan o zamaana! Ãmina!
Dẽ, kãsem-dãmbã ned a yembr gomame n sok maam yaa: Neb nins sẽn yeelg fu-peelsã yaa ãnna rãmba, la b yita yɛ?
Mam leoka yẽ yaa: M zu-soaba, yãmb n mi. La a yeela maam yaa: Yaa neb nins sẽn yi to-kãsengã pʋgẽ wã. Bãmb pegsa b fut pe-bilã zɩɩmẽ tɩ b lebg peelse.
Yaa woto yĩng n kɩt tɩ b be Wẽnnaam geerã taoore, n tʋmd Wẽnnaam tʋʋmd wĩndg la yʋng bãmb roogã pʋgẽ. Ned ning sẽn zao-a geerã zugã na n zĩnda ne bãmba n gũ-ba.
Kom kõn le yõk-ba, ko-yũud kõn leb n yõk-ba, la wĩntoogo, wall tʋʋlg kõn leb n wẽ-b ye.
Bala, Pe-bilã sẽn be geerã sʋkã na n dɩlga bãmba, la b tall-b n kẽng vɩɩm ko-bunds zĩisẽ, la Wẽnnaam na n yẽesa nintãm b ninẽ.
Pe-bilã sẽn sok soagdg a yopoe soabã, arzãn pʋg yɩɩ sɩddd tɩ kolg lɛɛr pʋɩ-sʋka.
Mam yãa malegs a yopoe sẽn yas Wẽnnaam taoorã, la b kõ-b-la bard a yopoe.

La malɛk a to n waa n yalsa tẽn-kugrã zugẽ. Yẽ ra zãada wisd laag sẽn ya sãnem. B kõo yẽ tɩdar wʋsg t'a naag ne nin-sõamyã fãa pʋʋsg n yõog sãnem tẽn-kugrã sẽn be geerã taoorã zugu, tɩ yɩ maoongo.
Tɩdarã bug-zõos naaga ne nin-sõamyã pʋʋsg n yi malɛkã nugẽ n zẽk yĩngri, Wẽnnaam taoore.
Malɛkã rɩka wisd laagã n pids-a ne tẽn-kugrã zug bugmã n lob-a tẽngã zugu. Sa-kelemse la kelemse la sa-yãgbo la tẽn-digimdg zĩndame.
La malegs a yopoe wã sẽn da zãad bard a yopoe wã seglame n na n peeb bardã.

Pipi malɛkã peeba baorgo. La sapɩlem ne bugum sẽn kalem ne zɩɩm zĩndame, la b lob-b-la tẽng zugu. Tẽngã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk rɩɩ bugum, tɩɩg a yembr tãab sʋk dɩɩ bugum, la mo-maasã fãa rɩɩ bugum. Bardo (8.6)
Malɛk a yiib-n-soabã peeba baorgo. La b loba bũmb sẽn wẽnd wa tãn-kãseng sẽn dɩt bugum ko-kãsengã pʋga. La ko-kãsengã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk lebga zɩɩm.
La bõn-naands nins sẽn dag n be ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ n vɩ wã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk kiime. La koom kogondã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk sãamame.
Malɛk a tãab-n-soabã peeba baorgo. La ãd-kẽeng sẽn dɩt bugum wa bug-vɩleng n yii yĩngr n lʋɩ. Yẽ lʋɩɩ ko-zoetmã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk zugu, la ko-bundsã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk zugu.
Ad-kãng yʋʋr boondame t'a Zẽnem. La koomã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk lebga zẽnem, la koomã sẽn lebg zẽnemã kʋʋ ninsaalb wʋsgo.

Malɛk a naas-n-soabã peeba baorgo. La wĩntoogã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋka, la kiuugã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋka, la ãdsã pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋk pãng saame, sẽn na yɩlg la pʋɩɩr a yembre tãab sʋk lebg lika, tɩ wĩndg vẽenem pãng boog sẽn tat pʋɩɩr a yembr tãab sʋka, tɩ yʋng vẽenem pãng boog a woto.

Mam gesame, la m wʋma sɩl-kẽeng sẽn yɩgd sa-gãnã sʋka, n zẽk a koɛɛg ne pãng n yetẽ yaa: Toogo! Toogo! Ninsaalbã sẽn be tẽng zugã na n paama toogo, bardã a taabã malegs sẽn na n peebã koees yĩnga.
Malɛk a nu soaba peeba baorgo. Mam yãa ãdg a yen sẽn yi saasẽ n lʋɩ tẽngã zugu. La b kõo yẽ bulg sẽn zulum n ka tar tɛk kʋɩlen-bila.
Yẽ paka bul-zulungã, la bug-zõos sẽn wẽnd wa wʋn-kãseng bug-zõos yii bulgẽ wã. La bug-zõosã sẽn yi bulgẽ wã soba wĩntoogã ne pemsma.
Sʋy yii bug-zõosẽ wã n sãeeg n kẽ tẽngã, la b kõo bãmb pãn-tõog sẽn ya wa tẽng zug namsã sẽn tarã.
La b yeel-b lame tɩ b ra sɩɩs moodã sẽn be tẽng zugã wall bũmb baa a yen sẽn ningd vãado wall tɩɩg baa a yembr ye, b zab ne neb nins sẽn ka tar Wẽnnaam bãnd b rĩyẽ wã bala.
B ka kõ sʋyã noor tɩ b kʋ nebã ye, la yaa tɩ nams-b kiis a nu. La namsg ning b sẽn namsd nebã wẽnda wa nang sẽn dũmd ned t'a namsd to-to wã.
Da-kãense, ninsaalbã na n baoo kũum la b kõn yãnd-a ye. Bãmb na n datame n ki, la kũum na n zoee n zãaga ne bãmba.
