Sʋy kãens wẽnda wa wiid sẽn seglg zabr yĩnga. Bũmb n da be b zutẽ wã n ya wa maanf-rãmba, n wẽnd wa sãnem, la b nensã ra yaa wa ninsaalb nense.
Sʋyã rag n tara zoobd wa pagb zoobdo, la b yẽnã dag n wẽnda wa gɩgemd yẽna.
Bãmb da tara yãad sẽn ya wa kut gãntigsi, la b pɩgsã bʋrg ra yaa wa terok-rãmb wiid wʋsg sẽn tat n zoet n dabd zabr zĩigẽ bʋrgo.
Bãmb dag n tara zʋy sẽn wẽnd nams zʋyã, la b tara zʋ-gõose, la pãn-tõog ning bãmb sẽn na n tall n nams ninsaalbã kiis a nu wã ra bee bãmb zʋyẽ wã.
Bãmb tara b naaba, bul-zulung malɛkã t'a so bãmba. A yʋʋr ne Hebre yaa "Abadõ" la ne Gɛrk yaa "Apolyõ," sẽn dat n togs tɩ sãamda.
Pipi toogã loogame. Ad tood a yiib n ket n wat yõwã poore.
Malɛk a yoobẽ soabã peeba baorgo. La mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yi sãnem tẽn-kugrã sẽn be Wẽnnaam taoorã yɩɩl a naasẽ wã.
Koɛɛgã yeela malɛk a yoobẽ soabã sẽn da zãad baorga yaa: Baag malegs a naasã b sẽn balg kʋɩl-kãseng ning sẽn boond tɩ Efartã zugã.
La b baaga malegs a naasã sẽn da segl n sɛ wakate, la daare, la kiuugu ne yʋʋmdã yĩngã, tɩ b kʋ ninsaalbã ned a yembr tãab fãa sʋka.
La zab-zabdbã sẽn ya wed-rʋʋdbã sõor dag n yaa tus kẽema kobs-yi. Mam wʋma b sõorã.

Woto, vẽnegrã pʋgẽ mam yãa wiidã ne neb nins sẽn zao-bã. Bãmb da tara gãntigsi, tɩ b kõbgã ya wa bugum, la wa kugr b sẽn boond tɩ safɩɩre la wa kidbri. Wiidã zut dag n wẽnda gɩgem zutu. Bugum ne bug-zõos la kidbr n dag n yit b noeyẽ wã.
To-kãensã a tãabã sẽn ya bugmã, la bug-zõosã ne kidbrã sẽn da yit wiidã noeyẽ wã kʋʋ ninsaalbã ned a yembr tãab sʋka.
Bala, wiidã pãn-tõogã bee b noeyẽ wã ne b zʋyẽ wã. Bãmb zʋyã wẽnda wa wiisi. Zʋyã tara zutu, la yaa rẽ la b tar n namsd ninsaalbã.

La neb a taabã sẽn kell tɩ to-kãensã ka kʋ wã ka tek yam n kos sugr tʋʋm nins b nusã sẽn tʋmã yĩng ye. Bãmb ka bas zĩn-dãmba ne wẽn-naands sẽn maan ne sãnem la wanzuri, la zũudu, la kuga, la raadã waoogr ye. Wẽn-naandsã ka tõe n yã wall b wʋme, wall b kẽn ye.
Bãmb ka kos sugr b nin-kʋʋrã la b bag-bʋgrã ne b yoobã la b wagdmã yĩng ye.
Mam yãa malɛk a to sẽn tar pãnga, sẽn yer sawadgo n yi arzãn n sigda, la saag-gomtɩʋʋg n da be yẽ zugẽ wã. A nengã da yaa wa wĩntoogo, la a naowã da yaa wa bugum.
Yẽ ra zãada seb-bil sẽn lake. A tilga a rɩtg naoorã ko-kãsengã zugu, la a tilg a goabg naoorã tẽngã zugu.
A zẽka a koɛɛg n tãs ne pãng wa gɩgemd sẽn kelemde. Malɛkã sẽn kelmã, sa-kelems a yopoe wã gomame tɩ nebã wʋme.
Sa-kelems a yopoe wã sẽn gomã, mam dag n na n gʋlsame, la mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yi arzãn n yeel yaa: ning bũmb nins sa-kelems a yopoe wã sẽn togsã soagdga, la f ra gʋls-b ye.
La malɛk ning mam sẽn da yã t'a yas ko-kãsenga ne tẽngã zugã zẽka a nug rɩtg n tees yĩngri,

la a wẽena ne soab ning sẽn vɩ-a zamaan o zamaanã, sẽn naan-a yĩngr ne bũmb nins sẽn be be wã, la dũniyã ne bũmb nins sẽn be be wã la ko-kãsenga ne bũmb nins sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã, n wẽen n yeel tɩ b ka na n leb n kõ weer yɛs ye,
la tɩ daar ning malɛk a yopoe soabã sẽn wat n segl n na n peeb baorgã, wakat kãng la Wẽnnaam yel-solemdã na n paam pidsg wa b sẽn dag n togs b tʋmtʋmdbã sẽn ya bãmb no-rɛɛsdbã koe-noogã.
La koɛɛg ning sẽn yi arzãn tɩ mam wʋmã leb n goma ne maam n yeel yaa: Kẽng n tɩ reeg seb-bilã sẽn lakã, malɛk ning sẽn yas-a ko-kãsengã ne tẽngã zugã nugẽ.
Mam kẽnga malɛkã nengẽ n yeel-a t'a kõ maam seb-bilã. La a yeela maam yaa: Reeg-a n vele. A na n pidsa fo pʋgã ne toolem liga, la fo noorẽ wã, a na n yɩɩ noog wa sɩɩdo.
Mam deega seb-bilã malɛkã nugẽ n vele. A yɩɩ noog wa sɩɩd mam noorẽ wã, la mam sẽn vel-a wã, mam pʋgã pida ne toolem.
Dẽ poore, b yeela maam yaa: Yaa tɩlɛ tɩ fo leb n togs bãngr goam yɛs n gom neb wʋsg yelle, la buud wʋsg yelle la goam buud wʋsg yelle la rĩm-dãmb wʋsg yelle.
B kõo maam tãnwĩig sẽn wẽnd wa dasaar n yeel maam yaa: Yik n mak Wẽnnaam doogã ne tẽn-kugrã, la neb nins sẽn be beene n pʋʋsdẽ wã.
La bas Wẽnnaam doogã samandã kɛɛng n da mak-a ye, tɩ bala, b kõ-a la bu-zẽmsã, la bãmb na n taba tẽn-sõngã kiis pis-naas la a yiibu.
Mam na n kõo m kaset dãmb a yiibã pĩnd-n-bãngr goam kũuni, tɩ b yeelg bot n togs bãngr goamã rasem tusr la kobs-yi la pis-yopoe.
Yaa bãmb la Oliiv tɩɩs a yiibu la fɩtl-dogends a yiibã sẽn yas tẽngã Zu-soabã taoorã.
Ned sã n dat n nams-ba, bugum n yit bãmb noorẽ wã n dɩt b bɛɛbã. N-ye, ned sã n dat n nams-ba, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ kũum a woto kʋ-a.

Bãmb tara pãn-tõog n tõe n pag yĩngr tɩ saag ka ni dasem nins bãmb sẽn pĩnd n togsã tɛk ye, la b tara pãn-tõog n tõe n tek ko-rãmbã tɩ lebg zɩɩm, la b kɩt tɩ tood buud fãa paam nebã tẽng zugu, wakat ninga fãa b sẽn date.
Bãmb sã n wa kɩs b kasetã n sɛ, rũng ning sẽn yit bog-zulungẽ wã na n yika zabr ne bãmba, n tõog-ba, n kʋ-ba.
La b kũumã na n paa tẽn-kãseng ning b sẽn boond sɩɩg wɛɛngẽ tɩ Sodom la Eziptã pʋgẽ, vɩʋʋgẽ, zĩig ning meng b sẽn dag n ka bãmb Zu-soabã da-pɩk zugã.
Tẽns toay-toay neba, la buud toay-toay neba, la neb sẽn gomd goam buud toor-toore, la soolem toay-toay neb na n yãa bãmb kũumã rasem a tãab la pʋɩ-sʋka, la b kõn sak tɩ b rɩk-b n tɩ mum ye.

Dũni nebã na n maana sũ-noog ne bũmb ning sẽn paam kaset dãmb a yiibã, la b na n kɩdmame. Bãmb na n tʋma kũun n kõ taaba, bala Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdb a yiib kãens da namsa nebã sẽn be tẽngã zugã.
La rasem a tãab la pʋɩ-sʋkã zugẽ, vɩɩm sɩɩg sẽn yi Wẽnnaam nengẽ kẽe bãmb pʋsẽ la b yikame n yals b nao zutu. Rabeem kãseng yõka neb nins sẽn yãt bãmbã.
No-rɛɛsdb a yiibã wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yi arzãn n yeel-b yaa: Wa-y yĩngr ka! Bãmb kẽe sawadgẽ n zẽk n kẽng arzãna, la b bɛɛbã yãnda bãmba.

Wakat kãnga bala, tẽn-digimdg sẽn ya kãseng zĩndame, la tẽngã pʋɩɩr a yembr piig sʋk sirgame. Tẽn-digimdg kãng kʋʋ neb tus a yopoe, la rabeem yõka neb a taabã, la b kõo arzãn Wẽnnaamã waoogre.
Toog a yiib soabã loogame. Ad keta bilf tɩ toog a tãab soabã wa.
Malɛk a yopoe soabã peeba baorgo. La koe-kãsems zĩnda arzãn n yeel yaa: Dũniyã soolem lebga tõnd Zu-soabã ne bãmb Kiristã n so. Bãmb na n dɩɩ naam zamaan o zamaana!
Kãsem-dãmb pisi la a naasã sẽn dag n zao b gɛyã zut Wẽnnaam taoorã wõgemdame n fõgen b nens tẽng n waoog Wẽnnaam n yeele:
Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam sẽn Tõeya fãa, sẽn be, la sẽn dag n be wã, tõnd pʋʋsd-y la barka, yãmb sẽn deeg y pãn-kãsengã la y sẽn zĩndig y naamã yĩnga.

Soolem toay-toayã rãmb ra yika b sũyã, la yãmb sũ-puugrã waame, la wakat taame tɩ y na n kao neb nins sẽn ki wã bʋʋdo, la y keo y no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn ya yãmb tʋmtʋmdbã ne y nin-tũusidsã la neb nins sẽn zoet yãmb yʋʋrã, nin-talse la nin-kãsemse, la y sãam neb nins sẽn sãamd tẽngã.
B paka Wẽnnaam roogã sẽn be arzãnã, la b yãa Wẽnnaam kãabg koglgã b roogã pʋga. Sa-yãgbo, la koeese, la sa-kelemse la tẽn-digimdg ne sapɩlem wʋsg zĩndame.
Bõn-bãnd sẽn ya kãseng puka arzãna. Yaa pag sẽn pil wĩntoog wa fuugu, n tab kiuugã ne a nao, la a fõgen maanf sẽn maan ne ãds piig la a yiibu.
Pagã ra tʋtame, la a kʋmda rogem kʋnkʋma, rogmã toog sẽn namsd-a yĩnga.
Bõn-bãnd a to puka arzãna: Ad yaa bõnin-kãseng sẽn ya miuugu, n tar zut a yopoe ne yɩɩl piiga, la maanf-rãmb n da fõg a zut a yopoe wã.
Yẽ zʋʋrã rag n kãagda ãdsã sẽn be yĩngrã, yembr taab fãa sʋk n lobd tẽng zugu. Bõninã yik n yalsa pag ning sẽn dat n dogã taoore, tɩ pagã sẽn dog yee, bɩ yẽ vel a biigã.
Pagã roga bi-ribla, rao sẽn na n zã kut dasaar n soog soolem fãa. La b zẽka pagã biig t'a kẽng Wẽnnaam nengẽ, la b geerẽ wã.
La pagã zoee n kẽnga weoogẽ, zĩig ninga Wẽnnaam sẽn dag n segl a yĩngã, tɩ b tõe n dɩlg-a be rasem tusr la kobs yi la pis yoobe.
Zab-kãseng zĩnda arzãna. Malegs naab a Misɛl ne a malegsã zaba ne bõninnã. Bõninnã me ne a malegsã zabame,
la b ka tõog ye. La zĩig ka leb n zĩnd arzãn yẽ yĩng ye.
B riga bõnin-kãsengã, wag-kʋdrã b sẽn boond tɩ rõatã la a Sʋtãana, soab ning sẽn belgd tẽngã zĩig ning fãa neb sẽn be wã nebã. B tusa yẽnda ne a malegsã n lob tẽng zugu.

Dẽ, mam wʋma koe-kãseng arzãn pʋgẽ sẽn yeel yaa: Moasã, fãagre, la pãnga, la tõnd Wẽnnaamã naam la bãmb Kiristã noor waame. Bala, b luba tõnd ba-biisã rõatã, soab ning sẽn dag n dõt bãmb Wẽnnaam taoor wĩndg la yʋngã.
D ba-biisã tõoga rõatã ne pe-bilã zɩɩm pãnga, la ne kasetã bãmb sẽn kɩtã pãnga, la bãmb ka nong b vɩɩmã, hal n zoe kũum ye.

Yaa woto yĩnga, bɩ arzãna la yãmb dãmb sẽn be beene wã maan sũ-noogo! Toog na n paama tẽngã ne ko-kãsengã. Bala, Sʋtãana sig n waa yãmb nengẽ ne sũ-puugri, a sẽn bãng t'a wakatã sẽn ketã ka waoogã yĩnga.
Bõninnã sẽn yã tɩ b loba yẽnda tẽng zugã, a babsa pag ning sẽn dog-a bi-riblã.
La b kõo pagã panantug-kẽeng pɩgs a yiib t'a yɩk n kẽng weoogẽ wã, a zĩigẽ wã, zĩig ning b sẽn na n dɩlg-a wakat a yembre, la wakat dãmba, la wakat pʋɩ-sʋkã, tɩ waafã ra yã-a ye.
La waafã kɩtame tɩ koom yi a noorẽ wã, n ya wa mogr koom ne pʋgl pagã, sẽn na yɩl tɩ koomã kãag pagã.
La tẽngã sõnga pagã, n yaag a noor n vel koomã bõninnã sẽn yiis a noorẽ wã.
Bõninnã sũur puuga ne pagã, la a kẽngame n tɩ yik zabr ne pagã yagensã sẽn kellã, neb nins sẽn sakd Wẽnnaam tõodã la sẽn tall-b a Zezi kasetã.
La bõninnã yik n yalsa ko-kãsengã bĩisr zugu.
Dẽ poore, mam yãa rũng sẽn yi ko-kãsengẽ wã n tar yɩɩl piiga la zut a yopoe, la maanf-rãmb piig n dag n be a yɩɩla zutu, la Wẽnnaam tʋʋsg yʋy n dag n gʋls a zutẽ wã.
Rũngã mam sẽn yã wã ra wẽndã wa ãbga, t'a naowã wẽnd wa wʋrs naowã, t'a noorã wẽnd wa gɩgemd noore. Bõninnã kõo rũngã a pãngã la a geerã la a pãn-tõogã.
La mam yãa rũngã zug a yen sẽn pogle, n ya wa a na n kiime, la a poglgã sẽn da tog n kʋ-a wã maagame. Neba fãa sẽn be tẽng zugã yɛɛsame la b tũu rũngã.
B wõgemda bõninnã taoore a sẽn kõ rũngã pãn-tõogã yĩnga. B wõgemda rũngã taoore, n yeele: Ãnnã n wẽnd rũngã, la ãnna n tõe n zab ne-a?
B kõo rũngã noor t'a gom wilg-m-meng goama la Wẽnnaam paoogr goama. La b kõo yẽ pãn-tõog t'a tʋm kiis pis-naas la a yiibu.
Rũngã yaaga a noor n na n gom n paoog Wẽnnaam, n paoog bãmb yʋʋrã la b sɛk-roogã, la neb nins sẽn be arzãnã.
La b kõo yẽ noor t'a yik zabr ne Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdsã n tõog-ba. B kõo yẽ pãn-tõog t'a tõog buud fãa, la tẽng fãa neba, la goam buud fãa neba la soolem fãa.
La neba fãa sẽn be tẽng zugu, tɩ b yʋy ka gʋls vɩɩm sebr sẽn ya pe-bil ning b sẽn kʋ hal dũni naaneg wakatã sebrã pʋgẽ wã wõgemda rũngã taoore.
Ned sã n tar tʋb bɩ a kelge!
Ned sã n tog n kẽ yembdo, a na n kẽ yembdo. Ned sã n kʋ ne zabr sʋʋga, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ b kʋ-a ne zabr sʋʋga. Wẽnnaam nin-tũusdsã modgr la b tẽebã la woto.
Dẽ poore, mam yãa rũng a to sẽn yi tẽnga pʋgẽ. A ra tara yɩɩl a yiib sẽn wẽnd wa pe-bil yɩɩla, la a ra gomda wa bõninnã.
Yẽ da tʋmda ne pipi rũngã pãn-tõogã fãa a nifẽ, la a kɩtame tɩ tẽngã ne nebã sẽn be a zugã wõgemded pipi rũngã sẽn da paam sãmpog-kʋʋdg tɩ maagã taoore.
Rũng a yiib-n-soabã maana bãn-kãsemse, hal n kɩtdẽ tɩ bugum yit yĩngr n sigd tẽngã zug nebã nifẽ.
Ne bãn b sẽn kõ-a noor t'a maan pipi rũngã taoorã, a belga nebã sẽn be tẽng zugã, n yeel-b tɩ b maan rũng ning sẽn paam poglg ne zabr sʋʋg n kell n põsã bõn-naandga.

B kõo rũng a yiib-n-soabã pãn-tõog t'a kɩt tɩ pipi rũngã bõn-naandgã paam sɩɩga, sẽn na yɩl la bõn-naandgã gome la a kɩt tɩ b kʋ neb nins fãa sẽn kõn wõgemd rũngã bõn-naandgã taoorã.
La a kɩtame tɩ neba fãa, nin-tals la nin-kãsemse, arzegs rãmb la naong rãmba, yemse ne burkĩmb reeg bãnd b nug-rɩtgo wall b rĩyã zutu,
la tɩ ned baa a yen ra tõog n da wall a koose, t'a ka tar bãndã, rũngã yʋʋre, wall a yʋʋrã geel-bilã ye.
Yam la woto. Bɩ ned ning sẽn tar yam geelg rũngã yʋʋr geelg sõore. Bala, yaa ninsaal yʋʋr geelg sõore, la a yʋʋrã geelg sõor yaa 666.
Mam gesame, la m yãa pe-bilã sẽn yik n yas Siyõ tãngã zugu, tɩ neb tus koabg la tus pis-naas la a naas sẽn da tar pe-bilã yʋʋr ne b ba wã yʋʋr sẽn gʋls b rĩyẽ wã be ne bãmba.
Mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yi arzãna, n wẽnd wa ko-kãsems koɛɛga, wa sa-kɛleng kãseng bʋrgo, la rãamd ninga mam sẽn wʋma ra wẽnda wa pend-wẽebd sẽn wẽed b pendse.
B yɩɩnda yɩɩn-paalg geerã taoore, la bõn-vɩɩs a naasã ne kãsem-dãmbã taoore. Ned ba a yen ra ka tõe n zãms yɩɩllã ye, sã n ka neb 144.000 sẽn dag n paam fãagr dũni zugã.

Yaa neb nins sẽn ka rẽgem b mens ne pagbã, bala b ka sãam ye. Bãmb na n pʋgda pe-bilã n dabd zĩig ninga fãa b sẽn dabda. B raa bãmb n yiis neba sʋka, tɩ b yɩ wa dẽenem biis Wẽnnaam ne pe-bilã yĩnga,
la zĩrĩ ka tol n zĩnd b noeyẽ ye. Rõadg ka be b zut ye.

Mam yãa malɛk a to sẽn yɩgd n pɩʋʋgd yĩngri: A dag n tara koe-noog sẽn paad wakat sẽn kõn sa, n na n togs neb nins sẽn be tẽng zugã, soolem fãa, buud fãa, goam buud fãa neba, la tẽng fãa neba.
Yẽ, zẽka a koɛɛg n yetẽ yaa: Zoe-y Wẽnnaam dabeem la y waoog bãmba. Bala wakat taame tɩ bãmb na n kao bʋʋdo. Wõgemd-y soab ning sẽn naan-a yĩngr la tẽngã, ko-kãseng ne ko-bundsã taoore.
Malɛk a to sẽn ya yiib-n-soab pʋglame n yetẽ yaa: A lʋɩɩme! A lʋɩɩme! Babilon kãsengã sẽn kɩt tɩ soolem dãmba fãa yũ yẽ yoobã sẽn ka koakã divẽ wã lʋɩɩme.
Malɛk a to sẽn ya tãab-n-soab pʋgla bãmb ne koe-kãseng n yeele: Ned sã n wõgemd rũngã ne a bõn-naandgã taoore, la a sã n deeg bãndã a dĩirẽ wall a nug zugu,
yẽ soab me na n yũu Wẽnnaam sũ-puugrã divẽ sẽn ka pulli tɩ b kiig bãmb sũ-puugr laagẽ wã. La yẽ na n paama namsg bugmẽ la kidbr pʋga, maleg-sõamy wã ne pe-bilã taoore.
Bãmb namsgã bug-zõos zẽkda zamaan o zamaane. La wĩndg ne yʋngo, neb nins sẽn wõgemded rũngã ne a bõn-naandgã taoorã, la ned ning sẽn deeg-a yẽ yʋʋrã bãndã ka tol n tar vʋʋsem ye.
Woto yĩnga, nin-sõamy wã tog n nanga pãnga, n sakd Wẽnnaam tõodã la b tall tẽeb ne a Zezi.

Mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yi arzãn n yetẽ: Gʋlse: sẽn sɩng ne moasã, bark bee kũum nins sẽn kiid Zu-soaba tũudum pʋgẽ wã zutu. Sɩɩg-sõng yetame tɩ n-ye, tɩ b tõe n bas b tʋʋmã n vʋʋse, bala bãmb tʋʋmã pʋgd-b lame.
Mam gesame la m yãa sawad-pɛɛlga, la ned sẽn wẽnd wa ninsaal n dag n zao sawadgã zugu. A rag n fõgena a zug sãnem maanfo, la a zãad goeoog sẽn dɩt a nugẽ.
Malɛk a to yii wẽnd-doogẽ wã n zẽk a koɛɛg n gom ne sẽn zao-a sawadgã ne pãng n yeel yaa: Yulumd f goeoogã n wʋre. Wʋrb wakat taame, bala, bõn-koaadlã sẽn be tẽng zugã bɩɩme.
La sẽn zao-a sawadgã zugã yulumda a goeoogã tẽngã zugu, la b tigsa tẽng zug bõn-koaadlã.
Malɛk a to yii wẽnd-doogã sẽn be arzãnã pʋgẽ. Yẽ me rag n tara goeoog sẽn dɩte.

Malɛk a to sẽn dag n tar pãn-tõog ne bugum yii tẽn-kugrẽ wã, n zẽk a koɛɛg n yeel malɛk ning sẽn zãad goeoog sẽn dɩtã yaa: Yulumd f goeoogã sẽn dɩtã, n yãgs nasaar-sibã sẽn be tẽng zugã gĩna, bala, a sibã bɩɩme.
Malɛkã yulumda a goeoogã tẽngã zugu. A yãgsa nasaar-sibã sẽn be tẽng zugã biisi n lob-b divẽ wẽkr kogl kãsengã sẽn ya Wẽnnaam sũ-puugr zĩigẽ wã pʋga.
La b taba koglgã pʋgẽ tẽngã kɛɛnga, la zɩɩm yii koglgẽ wã n zoe. A zulmã tata wiid salba, la a zoeeme n ta kɩlo kobs-tã.
Dẽ poore, mam yãa bãnd a to arzãn sẽn ya kãseng n sek gesgo. Yaa malegs a yopoe sẽn da zãad tood a yopoe, yaoolem dãmbã. Bala yaa ne to-kãens la Wẽnnaam sũ-puugrã na n pidsi.

La mam yãa bũmb sẽn ya wa ko-kãseng sẽn ya neng-gɛtga, n kalem ne bugum. La mam yãa neb nins sẽn tõog rũngã ne a bõn-naandgã la a yʋʋrã geel-bilã sẽn yɛs yĩngri, nen-gɛtgã sẽn wẽnd ko-kãsengã zugu. Bãmb da zãada Wẽnnaam pendse.

Bãmb yɩɩnda Wẽnnaam tʋmtʋmd a Moyiis yɩɩllã, la pe-bilã yɩɩlle: Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam sẽn Tõeya fãa, yãmb tʋʋmã yaa kãsemse la b bee neere! Soolem dãmba rĩma, yãmb tʋʋmã zemsame la b yaa sɩda.
Zu-soaba, ãnna n ka na n zoe yãmba, la a ka na n waoog yãmb yʋʋrã? Bala, yãmb y yen tãa n welg toore. La soolem dãmba fãa na n waa n wõgemda yãmb taoore, yãmb tɩrlemã sẽn pukã yĩnga.
Rẽ poore, mam gesame, la b paka kaset fu-roogã yɩlgr zĩigã arzãn pʋga.
Malegs nins sẽn da zãad tood a yopoe wã yii yɩlgr doogẽ wã. Bãmb dag n yera lẽ pɛɛlg fasɩ fut sẽn yãgda. La b rag n sẽba b yãad ne sãnem sẽbdse.
Ned a yembr bõn-vɩɩs a naasã sʋk kõo malegs a yopoe wã sãnem laas a yopoe sẽn pid ne Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ zamaan o zamaanã sũ-puugri.
La yɩlgr doogã pida ne bug-zõose, Wẽnnaam ziirã ne b pãngã yĩnga, la ned baa a yen da ka tõe n kẽ yɩlgr doogẽ wã ye, hal tɩ toodã malegs a yopoe wã sẽn tarã sɛ.
Mam wʋma koe-kãseng sẽn yi wẽnd-doogẽ wã n yeel malegs a yopoe wã yaa: Kẽng-y n tɩ kiig-y Wẽnnaam sũ-puugrã sẽn be laas a yopoe wã pʋsã dũniyã zugu.
Pipi soabã kẽngame n tɩ kiig sẽn be yẽ laagẽ wã dũniyã zugu. La nod-kɛgeng sẽn ya toaag yõka neb nins sẽn dag n tar rũngã gʋlsem bãnde la b wõgemded bõn-naandgã taoorã.
Malɛk a yiib-n-soaba kiiga sẽn be yẽ laagẽ wã ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ, la a lebga zɩɩm wa kũum zɩɩm. La bõn-vɩɩs nins fãa sẽn dag n be ko-kãsengã pʋgã kiime.
Malɛk a tãab-n-soabã kiiga sẽn be yẽ laagẽ wã kʋɩlsã ne ko-bundsã pʋse, la b lebga zɩɩm.
La mam wʋma ko-rãmbã malɛkã sẽn yeel yaa: yãmba, soab ning sẽn dag n be, la sẽn be moasã, n welg toorã, yãmb sẽn kao bʋʋdã a woto wã zemsame.
Bala, bãmb daaga neb nins sẽn welg toorã la yãmb no-rɛɛsdbã zɩɩm, la yãmb kõ-b-la zɩɩm tɩ b yũ. Rẽ segda ne bãmba.
La mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn yi tẽn-kugrẽ wã n yeel yaa: Hakɩɩka, Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam sẽn Tõeya fãa, yãmb bʋʋda kaoob yaa sɩda la tɩrga.
Malɛk a naas-n-soabã kiiga sẽn be yẽ laagẽ wã wĩntoogã zugu. La b kõo wĩntoogã pãng t'a yõog ninsaalbã ne bugum,
la tʋʋl-kãseng yõoga nebã. Bãmb paooga Wẽnnaam ning sẽn tar-a noor ne to-kãensã yʋʋre, la b ka tek yam n kos sugr n na n kõ Wẽnnaam waoogr ye.
Malɛk a nu soabã kiiga sẽn be yẽ laagẽ wã rũngã geerã zugu. La yẽ soolemã lebga lik bida. Toogã kɩtame tɩ ninsaalbã rũmd b zɛlma.
La toodã ne noadã sẽn tar bãmbã yĩnga, b paooga arzãnã Wẽnnaamã, la b ka tek yam n kos sugr b tʋʋm wẽnsã yĩng ye. Sũ-puugr laaga (16.1)
Malɛk a yoob-n-soabã kiiga sẽn be yẽ laagẽ wã kʋɩl-kãseng ning sẽn boond tɩ Efartã zugu. La kʋɩlgã koom kʋɩɩme tɩ lebg sor rĩm-dãmb nins sẽn yit yaangã yĩnga.
Mam yãa sɩ-rẽgd a tãab sẽn wẽnd wa loms sẽn yit dargõ wã noorẽ la rũngã noorẽ la belgr no-rɛɛsã noorẽ.
Bãmb yaa sɩɩse, zĩn-dãmb sẽn maand bõn-yɛɛsdse, la sẽn kẽngd dũni gill fãa rĩm-dãmbã nengẽ n na n tɩ tigs-b Wẽnnaam sẽn tõe fãa ra-kãsenga sẽn ya zabr daarã yĩnga.
Ad mam wata wa wagre. Bark bee ned ning sẽn ka gõe la sẽn yer a futu, sẽn na yɩl la a da kẽn beelle, la tɩ nebã kõn ya a yãndã zugu.
B tigma nanamsã zĩig a yen sẽn boond ne Hebre goam tɩ Harmagedõ.
Malɛk a yopoe soabã kiiga sẽn be yẽ laagẽ wã pemsma pʋga. La koe-kãseng yii geerẽ wã, wẽnd-doogẽ wã n yeel yaa: Maaname n sa!
La sa-yãgb ne koeese, la sa-kelems ne tẽn-digimdg sẽn ya kãseng zĩndame, la hal ninsaalb sẽn be dũni zug tɛka, tẽn-digimdg sẽn ya kãseng a woto nan ka tol n zĩnd ye.
Tẽn-kãsengã welga zĩis a tãabo. Soolem toay-toayã tẽns lʋɩɩme, la Wẽnnaam tẽega Babilon kãsengã yelle, n na n kɩt t'a yũ bãmb sũ-puug-kãsengã divẽ wã sẽn be laagẽ wã.
Koomã sẽn gũbg tẽns ninsã fãa zoeeme, la ned ka leb n yã tãmsã ye.
La sapɩlem zɩslem sẽn kolg kɩlo pis-naas yii yĩngr n dʋʋg ninsaalbã zutu. La sapɩlmã toog yĩnga, nebã paooga Wẽnnaam. Bala to-kãng talla pãng tɩ looge.
Dẽ poore, malegs a yopoe wã sẽn da zãad laas a yopoe wã, b ned a yembr waa n goma ne maam n yeele: Wa tɩ m na n wilga foom pʋg-yood kãsengã sẽn zĩ ko-kãsemsã zutã bʋʋdo.
Yaa ne yẽnda la dũniyã rĩm-dãmbã maan yoobo, la dũni nebã ra yũu yẽ yoobã divẽ tɩ b nens yilim.
Malɛkã rɩka maam m tagsgã pʋgẽ n kẽng weoogẽ. La mam yãa pag sẽn zao rũng sẽn ya miuug mass, n pid ne yʋɩ sẽn paoogd Wẽnnaam, la a tara zut a yopoe ne yɩɩl piiga.

Pagã ra yera fuug sẽn ya miu-kẽega la miuug mass n nags a meng ne sãnem la kuga b raab sẽn ya toogo, la pɛrl dãmba. Pagã ra zãada sãnem laag a nugẽ, la laagã ra pida ne tʋʋm wẽnse la ne pagã yoobã rẽgdo.
Yʋʋr n da gʋls pagã rĩirẽ, yaa yel-solemde: Babilon kãsengã, dũni pʋg-yoaadbã ne tʋʋm-wẽns ma.
Mam yãame tɩ neb nins sẽn welg toore, la a Zezi kaset dãmbã zɩɩm yilimd pagã nenga. Mam sẽn yãnd-a wã, linga mam wʋsgo.
La malɛk soka mam yaa: Bõe yĩng tɩ ya lingr ne foom? Mam na n togsa foom pagã ne rũng ning sẽn zɩt yẽnda, n tar zut a yopoe ne yɩɩl piigã yel-solemdã.

Rũng ning fo sẽn yã wã rag n beeme, la a ka leb n beẽ ye. A na n yii bog-zulungẽ wã n kẽng sãoong zĩigẽ. La dũni neb nins yʋy sẽn ka gʋls vɩɩm sebrã pʋgẽ hal dũni naaneg wẽndẽ wã sã n yã rũngã, a na n yɩɩ lingr ne bãmba, rũngã sẽn dag n be, n wa ka leb n beẽ la a na n leb n pukã yĩnga.
Bãngr sẽn yɩt ne yam n tog n zĩnd ka: Zut a yopoe wã yaa tãms a yopoe nins pagã sẽn zao b zutã.
Leb n yaa rĩm-dãmb a yopoe. Bãmb b nu n lʋɩ t'a yembr beẽ, t'a to wã nan ka wa nand ye, la a sã n wa wa, a tog n dɩɩ naam wakat bilfu.
Rũng ning sẽn dag n be, n ka leb n be wã meng yaa rĩm a nii soaba. Yẽ me yaa rĩm-dãmb a yopoe wã ned a yembre. La a rabda sãoong zĩigẽ.
Yɩɩl piigã fo sẽn yã wã yaa rĩm-dãmb piig sẽn nan ka reeg soolem ye, la b reegda pãn-tõog wa rĩm-dãmbã lɛɛr a yen yĩng ne rũngã.
Bãmb yam yaa a yembre, la b kõta rũngã b pãngã ne b pãn-tõogã.

Bãmb na n zaba ne pe-bilã. La pe-bilã na n tõog-b lame, tɩ bõe bãmb yaa zu-soben-dãmb Zu-soaba la rĩm-dãmba Dĩma. La neb nins b sẽn boolã, neb nins b sẽn tũusã ne neb nins sẽn maand sɩda, n be ne pe-bilã na n tõog-b lame me.
Malɛkã yeela maam yaa: koom nins fo sẽn yã tɩ pʋg-yoodrã zĩ b zutã yaa neba la neb kʋʋndo, la soolem dãmba la goam buud toay-toay neba.
Yɩɩl piigã fo sẽn yã wã, n paas rũngã na n kisga pʋg-yoodrã, n dees a futã n bas-a a zaala, la b wãb a nemdã, la b ning-a bugum t'a rɩ tẽma.
Bala, Wẽnnaam ninga bãmb sũyã pʋs tɩ b maan Wẽnnaam daabo, la b naag taab yam a yembre, n dɩk b naamã n kõ rũngã hal tɩ Wẽnnaam goamã wa paam pidsgu.
La pagã fo sẽn yã wã yaa tẽn-kãseng ning sẽn so-a dũniyã rĩm-dãmbã.
Rẽ zugẽ, mam yãa malɛk a to sẽn tar pãn-kãseng sẽn yi arzãn n sigda, n tar noor sõama la a zĩirã kõo dũniyã vẽenem.
Malɛkã zẽka a koɛɛg ne pãng n yeele: A lʋɩɩme! A lʋɩɩme! Babilon kãsengã lʋɩɩme! Yẽ lebga zĩn-dãmb yiri, la zĩ-dẽgd fãa, la bõn-yɩgd rẽgd fãa neba sẽn kis zĩiga,
Soolem dãmba fãa sẽn yũ Wẽnnaam sũ-puugr wa divẽ yẽ yoobã yĩnga, tɩ dũni rĩm-dãmb maan yoob ne yẽnda, la tɩ dũni lɛɛbdb tũnug yẽ nag-teedã pãng n lebg arzegs rãmba.

La mam wʋma koɛɛg a to sẽn yi arzãn n yeele: Mam neba, yi-y tẽngã pʋga, tɩ y da wa n naag n maan yel-wẽn ning a sẽn maandã, la tɩ y da wa n naag yẽnda n paam tood nins sẽn na n paam-a wã ye.
Bala, yẽ yel-wẽna zamame hal n tãag arzãna, la Wẽnnaam tẽega a ka-tɩrlem tʋʋmã yelle.
Yao-y yẽnda wa yẽ sẽn yao wã, la y lebs-a a tʋʋmã naoor a yiibu! Wamd ning pʋgẽ a sẽn kiigã, kiig-y-yã a woto naoor a yiib n kõ-a.

Yẽ sẽn waoog a meng n kẽ nagma pʋgẽ n ta zĩig ningã, kɩt-y t'a toogã ne a sũ-sãoongã ta a boto. Tɩ bõe, a yeta a sũurẽ yaa: Mam zĩi wa rĩm-poaka, mam ka pʋgkõore, la mam kõn tol n paam kũum sũ-sãoong ye.
Rẽnda yĩngã, yẽ toodã na n waa daar a yen pʋgẽ: bãag sẽn na n kʋ-a, sũ-sãoongo, kom, la bugum na n dɩ-a lame. Bala, Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam, sẽn kaood-a yẽ bʋʋdã yaa pãn-kẽeng soaba.
Dũniyã rĩm-dãmb nins fãa sẽn maan yoob ne tẽn-kãngã, la b paam te-neeb ne yẽ wã sã n wa yã tẽngã sẽn dɩt bugmã bug-zõose, b na n yãbame n wiis a yĩnga.
Bãmb sẽn zoet rabeem tɩ yẽ toogã na n wa paam bãmbã yĩnga, b na n yalsa yɩɩg n yeel yaa: Kato! Kato! Tẽn-kãsengã, Babilon tẽng sẽn tar pãnga! Fo sɩbgr waa wakat a yen pʋgẽ bala.
La dũni fãa toandb yãbdame n wiisd yẽ yĩnga, ned baa a yen sẽn ka le raad bãmb koosmã yĩnga:

Yaa sãnem, la wanzuri, la kug sẽn be yõod wʋsgo, la pɛrl dãmba, la lẽ peen-sõamyã, la peen-miu-kẽese, la peen fʋlfʋle, la pɛɛl sẽn ya miuug-mas, la raoog buud fãa sẽn tar yũ-noogo, la teoog buud fãa sẽn maan ne wob-yẽna, la teed buud fãa sẽn maan ne raad sẽn be yõod wʋsgo, la sẽn maan ne zũudu, la kutu, la kug sẽn boond tɩ marbre,

kanell la ra-pegd buud sẽn tar yũ-noogo, la zẽ-biis sẽn kõt yũ-noogo, la tɩdare, la vãad buud sẽn boond tɩ miir, la wisdu, la divẽ, la kaam, la zom-bãanega, la koodo, la niis ne piisi, la wed-moose, la terok-rãmba, hal baa ninsaalba.
Fo sẽn da rat bũmb ning ne f sũur fãa wã loog n basa foom. Bõn-sõamy wã fãa, wall bõn-neebã menemame n bas foom, la ned kõn leb n yã-b abada.
Toandb nins sẽn tũnug Babilon n lebg arzegs rãmbã sẽn zoet rabeem ne toog ning sẽn na n paam tẽn-kãngã yĩngã, b na n yalsa yɩɩga, n yãbe, n maan sũ-sãoongo.

Bãmb na n yeelame yaa: Kato! Kato! Tẽn-kãsengã sẽn dag n yer fu-neeba la fu-miu-kẽese la fut sẽn ya miid mas n nags a meng ne sãnem ne kug sẽn be yõodo la pɛrl dãmba! Wakat a yen pʋgẽ bala, b sãama arzegs wʋsg a woto.
Koom kogond zu-soben-dãmba fãa ne neb nins fãa sẽn be koom kogondã pʋsã, la koom kogondã pʋg tʋmtʋmdbã ne neb nins fãa sẽn tolemd ne koom kogondã dag n yasa yɩɩga,
la b sẽn yã bugmã sẽn dɩt tẽngã bug-zõosã, b kelmame n yeele: Tẽn-bʋg n dag n wẽnd tẽn-kãsengã?

Bãmb da yugda b zut tom, n yãbda n maand sũ-sãoong wa kũum n ki, la b kelemdẽ n yetẽ: Kato! Kato! Tẽn-kãseng ning sẽn dag n tar paoong wʋsg tɩ neb nins fãa sẽn tar koom kogond ko-kãsengã zugã tũnug be n lebg arzegs rãmbã, wakat a yen pʋgẽ bala, a lebga rasempʋɩɩga.

Arzãna, maan sũ-noog ne bũmb ning sẽn paam-a wã. Yãmb me sẽn welg toor Wẽnnaam yĩnga, la tẽn-tʋmdba la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã, maan-y sũ-noogo. Bala Wẽnnaam sẽn kao tẽngã bʋʋdã, b roka yãmb sũuri.

Dẽ, malɛk sẽn tar pãng tebga kugr sẽn wẽnd neer sẽn ya bedr n lob-a ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ n yeele: B na n tusa Babilon sẽn ya tẽn-kãsengã a woto ne pãng n lubi, la ned kõn leb n yãnd-a yɛs ye.
La ned kõn leb n wʋm pend-wẽedba, la yʋʋmba, la wɩɩs ne bar-pɛɛbdbã rãamd fo pʋgẽ ye. Ned kõn leb n yã nug-tʋʋmd buud baa a yen soab beene ye, la ned kõn leb n wʋm neer rãamd beene ye.
Fɩtl vẽenem kõn leb n yãg be ye, la ned kõn le wʋm pʋg-paal sɩd ne a pʋg-paalã koees beene yɛs ye. Bala, fo toandbã dag n yaa dũni nin-kãsemse, fo belga soolem dãmba fãa ne f bagrã.
La b yãa Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã ne nin-sõamyã, la neb nins fãa b sẽn kood dũniyã zugã zɩɩm fo pʋgẽ.
Rẽ poore, mam wʋma koe-kãseng arzãn pʋgẽ sẽn wẽnd neb kʋʋng wʋsg koees sẽn yet yaa: Halleluya! Fãagr la ziir ne pãng yaa tõnd Wẽnnaamã n so,
bãmb bʋ-kaoorã sẽn ya sɩd la tɩrgã yĩnga. Wẽnnaam kaoo pʋg-yood kãsengã sẽn dag n sãamd dũni ne a yoobã bʋʋdo. La Wẽnnaam doka n tʋmtʋmdbã sũuri, yẽ sẽn daag bãmb zɩɩmã yĩnga.
La b leb n yeela naoor a yiib soab yaa: Halleluya! La yẽ bug-zõos zẽkda zamaan o zamaane.
Kãsem-dãmbã pisi la a naasã ne bõn-vɩɩs a naasã wõgemdame n waoog Wẽnnaam sẽn zao geerã zugã n yeel tɩ ãmina! Halleluya!
Koɛɛg yii geerẽ wã n yeel yaa: Yãmb fãa sẽn ya Wẽnnaam tʋmtʋmdbã, yãmb dãmb sẽn zoet bãmbã, nin-tals la nin-kãsemse, pẽg-y tõnd Wẽnnaamã.

La mam wʋma koɛɛg sẽn wẽnd wa neb kʋʋng wʋsg koeese, n wẽnd wa ko-kãsems koeese, n wẽnd wa sa-kelems kãsems koees sẽn yet yaa: Halleluya! Bala tõnd Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam sẽn Tõeya fãa wã zĩndiga b naam.
D maan sũ-noog n kɩdme, la d waoog bãmba, bala pe-bilã pʋg-peegrã daar taame, la bãmb pʋg-paalã segla a meng n sɛ.
B kõo pʋg-paalã lẽ sõng fuug sẽn pɩnd n ka tar rẽgd t'a yeelge. Lẽ sõng fuugã yaa nin-sõamy wã tʋʋm sõamyã.
Malɛkã yeela maam yaa: Gʋlse: Bark bee neb nins b sẽn bool tɩ b wa pe-bilã pʋg-peegr kibsã zutu! La a yeela maam yaa: Koe-kãngã yaa Wẽnnaam meng goama.

La mam wõgemda yẽ taoor n na n waoog-a, la a yeela maam yaa: Da saag n maan a woto ye! Mam yaa fo tʋmd-n-taaga la fo ba-biis nins sẽn tar a Zezi kasetã tʋmd-n-taaga. Waoog Wẽnnaam! Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã goam yita a Zezi kasetã pʋga.
Dẽ poore, mam yãnda arzãn sẽn pake, la mam yãa wed-moaag sẽn ya pɛɛlga. Ned ning sẽn zao-a weefã yʋʋr la a Sɩd-maanda la a Sɩd-sɩda. Bãmb bʋʋda bʋʋdã ne tɩrlem la b zabd ne tɩrlem.
Bãmb ninã yaa wa bug-witim. Maanf-rãmb wʋsg n fõg bãmb zugã. Bãmb tara yʋʋr sẽn gʋls tɩ ned baa a yen ka mi, sã n ka bãmb mengã bala,
la b yera fu-taok sẽn los zɩɩmẽ. Bãmb yʋʋr la a Wẽnd-gomde.
Sodaasã sẽn be arzãnã dag n zaoo wed-peels n pʋgd bãmba, n yer lẽ sõng fut sẽn ya peels la yoalgma.

Zabr sʋʋg sẽn dɩt n dag yit b noorẽ wã n na n sɩbg soolem dãmbã. Bãmb na n zãa kut dasaar n dɩlg-ba. Bãmb na n taba bũmb nins sẽn be Wẽnnaam sẽn Tõeya fãa wã sũ-puugr sẽn ya kãsenga divẽ wẽkr koglgã pʋgẽ wã.
Bãmb tara yʋʋr sẽn gʋls b fuugã zug la b geerã zugu: rĩm-dãmb Rĩma, la zu-soben-dãmb Zu-soaba.
Mam yãa malɛk sẽn yas wĩntoogã pʋgẽ. Yẽ zẽka a koɛɛg ne pãng n yeel bõn-yɩgdɩ wã fãa sẽn yɩgd yĩngrã yaa: wa-y n tigm-y taab Wẽnnaam kibs kãsengã yĩnga,
tɩ y tõe n dɩ rĩm-dãmb nemdo, sodaas nanams nemdo, pãens rãmbã nemdo, wed-moos ne b rʋʋdbã nemdo, neb fãa nemdo, burkĩmb la yemse, nin-tals ne nin-kãsemse.
Mam yãa rũngã ne dũni rĩm-dãmbã ne b sodaasã sẽn tigim taab n na n zab ne soab ning sẽn zao-a wed-pɛɛlgã, la ne a sodaasã.

La b yõga rũngã ne zãmb no-rɛɛs ning sẽn dag n maan bõn-yɛɛsds rũngã taoor n belg neb nins sẽn deeg rũngã bãndã la b wõgemded yẽ bõn-naandgã taoorã. B loba bãmb b yiiba fãa vɩɩs bugum mogr sẽn dɩt kidbr pʋgẽ.
La sʋʋg ning sẽn dag n yit soab ning sẽn zao wed-moaagã zugã noorẽ wã kʋʋ neb a taabã. La bõn-yɩgdɩ wã fãa rɩɩ bãmb nemdã n tɩge.
Dẽ poore, mam yãa malɛk sẽn yi arzãn n sigda, n zãad bog zulungã kʋɩlen-biiga la bãng-kãseng a nugẽ.
Malɛkã yõka dargõ wã sẽn ya wag-kʋdrã, la rõatã, la a Sʋtãan n balg-a yʋʋm tusr yĩnga.

A lob-a-la bog-zulungã pʋgẽ n page, la a sog bokã noor Sʋtãanã zugẽ, sẽn na yɩl t'a da leb n belg soolem dãmba yɛsa, hal tɩ yʋʋm tusrã pidsi. Rẽ poore, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ b lok-a n bas wakat bilf yĩnga.

Mam yãa naam-gɛyã. La b kõo neb nins sẽn zĩnd gɛyã zutã noor tɩ b bʋ bʋʋdo. La mam yãa neb nins b sẽn fiuus b zut a Zezi kasetã ne Wẽnnaam goamã yĩngã sɩɩse, la neb nins sẽn dag n ka wõgemd rũngã wall a bõn-naandgã taoore, la b ka reeg bãndã b rĩyẽ wall b nusã zutã sɩɩse. Bãmb vʋʋgame n dɩ naam ne Kirist yʋʋm tusri.
La kũ-rãmb a taabã ka vʋʋg ye, hal tɩ yʋʋm tusrã pidsi. Vʋʋg-kãng yaa dẽenem vʋʋgre.
Neb nins sẽn naag n paam dẽenem vʋʋgrã tara bark la sõmblem. Kũum a yiib soabã ka tar b tʋʋmd ye. Bãmb na n yɩɩ Wẽnnaam ne Kiristã maan-kʋʋdba, la b na n dɩɩ naam ne Kiristã yʋʋm tusri.
Yʋʋm tusrã sã n wa pidi, b na n yiisa a Sʋtãan a bi-bees roogẽ wã n bas-a,
la a na n yiime n belg soolem nins sẽn be dũniyã kɩrems a naasã neba, Gaoog ne Magaoog, sẽn na n yɩl n tigim bãmb zabr yĩnga. Bãmb sõorã yaa wa ko-kãsengã bĩisri.
Bãmb yiime n yɛdg tẽng zugu, la b kẽe nin-sõamy wã tãb-sikẽ wã, la tẽn-nongrẽ wã. La bugum yii arzãn n sig n dɩ-ba.
B loba bɛlgdã, soab ning sẽn dag n belgd nebã bugum mogr sẽn dɩt kidbr pʋga, zĩig ning rũngã ne belgr no-rɛɛsã sẽn be wã. Bãmb na n namsa wĩndg ne yʋngo, zamaan o zamaane.
Dẽ poore, mam yãa ge-kãseng sẽn ya pɛɛlga, ne ned ninga sẽn zao-a geerã zugã. La dũniyã ne saasẽ zoee bãmb taoor n looge, la zĩig ka leb n be bãmb yĩng ye.

La mam yãa neb nins sẽn ki wã, nin-kãsemse, nin-talse tɩ b yas geerã taoore. La b lagsa sɛba, la b laka sebr a to sẽn ya vɩɩm sebre. B bʋʋ sẽn ki-bã bʋʋdo, n zems ne bũmb nins sẽn gʋls sɛbã pʋsã, n zems ned fãa tʋʋmd sẽ yɩ a soaba.
Ko-kãsengã lebsa kũum nins sẽn da be be wã, tɩ kũumã ne kɩɩm-kulg lebs kũum nins sẽn da be be wã, la b bʋʋ bãmb ned kam fãa bʋʋd wa sẽn zems a tʋʋma.
B loba kũumã ne kɩɩm-kulg bugum mogrã pʋga. Bugum mogrã yaa kũum a yiib soaba.
B loba ned ning fãa b sẽn ka yã a yʋʋr tɩ gʋls vɩɩm sebrã pʋgẽ wã bugum mogrã pʋga.
Mam yãa yĩngr paalga la dũni paalga, bala, dẽenem yĩngrã ne dẽenem tẽngã loogame, la ko-kãsengã ka leb n be yɛs ye.
La mam yãa tẽn-sõngã, Zeruzalɛm paalgã sẽn yi Wẽnnaam nengẽ n sigda, la a wẽnda wa pag sẽn nags a meng a sɩd yĩnga.
Mam wʋma koe-kãseng sẽn yi geerẽ wã n yeele: Ad Wẽnnaam yirã bee ninsaalb sʋka. Wẽnnaam na n zĩnda ne nebã. Bãmb na n yɩɩ Wẽnnaam neba, la Wẽnnaam mengã na n paa ne bãmba.
Wẽnnaam na n yẽesa nintãm fãa sẽn be b ninẽ wã. Kũum kõn le zĩnd ye, la sũ-sãoong wall yãbre, wall toog kõn leb n zĩnd ye, bala, dẽenem bũmba fãa loogame.
Ned ning sẽn zao geerã yeelame yaa: Ade, mam maanda bũmba fãa paalse. La b yeel yaa: Gʋlse, bala, gom-kãensã yaa vẽenega la b yaa sɩda.
Bãmb yeela maam yaa: Maaname! Maam la Alfa la Omega, Sɩngre la Sɛɛbo. Mam na n kõo ned ning ko-yũud sẽn tarã vɩɩm ko-bundmã zaalem.
Ned ning sẽn na n tõogã pʋɩɩr na n yɩɩ a woto: Mam na n yɩɩ Wẽnnaam, la yẽ na n yɩɩ mam biiga.

La sã n ya ne rabeembã, la ka-tẽeb rãmbã, la tʋʋm-dẽgd maandbã, la nin-kʋʋdba, la nin-yoaadbã, la tɩ-maandbã, la wẽn-naands pʋʋsdbã, la zĩri yagdbã fãa, bãmb pʋɩɩr na n yɩɩ tɩ kẽ bugum mogrẽ wã, zĩig ning kidbr sẽn dɩtã. Rẽ yaa kũum a yiib soabã.
Dẽ poore, malegs a yopoe wã sẽn da zãad laas a yopoe sẽn pid ne yaoolem tood a yopoe wã ned a yembr waa n goma ne maam n yeel yaa: Wa tɩ m na n wilg-f la pʋg-paalã, pe-bilã pagã.
Malɛkã rɩka maam m yamẽ n kẽng tãn-kãseng sẽn ya luglg zugu. La a wilga maam tẽn-sõngã sẽn ya Zeruzalɛmã sẽn yi yĩngri, Wẽnnaam nengẽ n sigdã.
Tẽngã da tara Wẽnnaam zĩirã. Yẽ rasãndã dag n wẽnda wa kugr sẽn be yõod wʋsg neerlem, wa kugr sẽn boond tɩ zaspe n tõnd wa vɛɛre.
A rag n tara lal-kãseng sẽn ya zãondgo. A rag n tara zag-noey piig la a yiibu, tɩ malegs piig la yiib be zag-noeyẽ wã. Yʋy n da gʋls b zutu: Yaa Israyɛl buud piig la a yiibã yʋya.
Zag-noey a tãab n be yaanga, t'a tãab be rɩtgo, t'a tãab be goabga, t'a tãab be nin-taoore.
Tẽngã lalg mee yẽbgr piig la a yiib zugu, la b gʋlsa pe-bilã tẽn-tʋmdb piig la yiibã yʋy yẽbg-kãens zutu.
Malɛk ning sẽn dag n gom-a ne maama dag n tara makdg sẽn ya sãnem dasaare, n na n mag tẽngã ne a zag-noeyã la a lalgã.
Tẽngã ra yaa maoko, t'a woglmã ne a yalmã zem taaba. Malɛkã maga tẽngã ne sãnem dasaarã: Yaa kɩlo tus a yi. A woglmã ne a yalmã la a zãntlemã rag n zema taaba.
Yẽ maka lalgã: A yaa kãntɩɩs koabg la pis-naas la a naase, ninsaal kãntɩɩga, sẽn ya a yembr ne malɛkã kãntɩɩga.
Lalga mee ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ zaspe, la tẽngã yaa sãnem halaal sẽn wẽnd wa vɛɛr halaale.

Tẽngã lalgã yẽbgrã rag n nagsa ne kug buud fãa sẽn be yõodo. Pipi yẽbgrã yɩɩ ne zaspe, la yiib-n-soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ safɩɩre, la tãab-n-soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ kalsedoan, la naas-n-soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ emeroode,

la a nu soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ sadonigsi, la a yoob soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ sardoan, la a yopoe soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ kirzolit, la a nii soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ beril, la a wɛ soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ topaaze, la piig soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ kirzopraaze, la piig la a yen soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ hiyasẽnte, la piig la a yiib soabã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ ametist.
Zag-noeyã piig la yiibã yɩɩ ne kugr sẽn boond tɩ pɛrle. Zag-noor fãa yaa kug-yende. Tẽngã soay yaa sãnem halaale, n tõnd wa vɛɛre.
Mam ka yã wẽnd-doog tẽngã pʋg ye, bala, Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam sẽn Tõeya fãa wã la pe-bilã me yaa tẽngã wẽnd-doogo.
Tẽngã ka baood tɩ wĩntoog bɩ kiuug yãg beene ye, bala, Wẽnnaam ziirã kõt-a-la vẽenem, la pe-bilã yaa a fɩtla.
Soolem dãmbã na n kẽna bãmb vẽenemẽ wã, la dũni rĩm-dãmbã na n waa ne b zĩirã beene.
Tẽngã zag-noey kõn pag wĩndg ye, yʋng ka na n zĩnd beene ye.
B na n talla soolem dãmba ziirã la b waoogrã n wa beene.
Bũmb sẽn ya rẽgdo, wall ned ning sẽn maan wẽnga wall a yagd zĩrẽ kõn kẽ be ye. Yaa neb nins yʋy sẽn gʋls pe-bilã vɩɩm sebrẽ wã bal n na n kẽ.
Malɛkã wilga maam vɩɩm koomã kʋɩlga, kʋɩlg sẽn pɩnd wa vɛɛre, la a yita Wẽnnaam ne pe-bilã geerẽ wã.
Vɩɩm tɩɩgã be tẽngã sʋka la kʋɩlgã kɩrems a yiibẽ wã. A womda naoor piig la a yiibu, a womda a biisã kiuug fãa. Tɩɩgã vãad tar n maagda soolem toay-toayã neb bãase.
Wẽnnaam sẽn kãab bũmb wẽng kõn leb n zĩnd be ye. Wẽnnaam ne pe-bilã geer na n zĩnda tẽngã pʋga. Bãmb tʋmtʋmdbã na n waooga bãmba,
b na n yãa Wẽnnaam nenga, la Wẽnnaam yʋʋrã na n zĩnda bãmb dĩyẽ.
Yʋng kõn le zĩnd ye, la nebã kõn dat fɩtl vẽenem wall wĩntoog vẽenem ye, bala, Zu-soab a Wẽnnaam n na n yɩɩ bãmb vẽenem. La bãmb na n dɩɩ naam zamaan o zamaana.

Malɛkã yeela maam yaa: Sãmbg ka be gom-kãens pʋgẽ ye, la b yaa sɩda. Zu-soabã sẽn ya no-rɛɛsdbã sɩɩs Wẽnnaamã tʋma b malɛk t'a wilg bãmb tʋmtʋmdbã bũmb nins sẽn tog n zĩnd bilf sã n paase.
La a Zezi yeelame: Gese, bilf sã n paas bala mam na n waame. Bark bee ned ning sẽn sakd seb-kãngã bãngr goamã zugu.
Yaa maam a Zã n wʋm bõn-kãense la m yã-ba. La mam sẽn wʋm bõn-kãens la m yã-bã, mam wõgemda malɛk ning sẽn da wilgd-b maamã taoor n na n waoog-a.

La a yeela maam yaa: Ra saag n maan a woto ye! Mam yaa fo tʋmd-n-taaga, la Wẽnnaam no-rɛɛsdbã sẽn ya fo ba-biisã tʋmd-n-taaga, la neb nins sẽn sakd seb-kãngã goamã tʋmd-n-taaga. Waoog Wẽnnaam!
Dẽ poore malɛkã yeela maam yaa: Da solg seb-kãngã pĩnd-n-bãngr goamã ye! Bala, b pidsgã wakat kolgame.

Bɩ ned ning sẽn ya ka-tɩrlem soab kell n paas a ka-tɩrlemã, tɩ ned ning sẽn ya tʋʋm dẽgd soab kell n dẽgem a meng n paase, tɩ ned ning sẽn ya tɩrg kell n maan tɩrlem n paase, tɩ ned ning sẽn ya yolgemd kell n yɩ yolgemd n paase!
A Zezi yeelame: Gese, bilf bal sã n paase, mam na n waame, la mam zãada keoor n watẽ n na n keo ned kam fãa wa sẽn zems a tʋʋmde.
Maam la Alfa la Omega, dẽenem la yaoolem, Sɩngre la Sɛɛbo.
Bark bee neb nins sẽn pegsd b futu, sẽn na n yɩl la b paam noor tɩ rɩ vɩɩm tɩɩgã biisi la b tũ tẽngã noey n kẽ tẽngã pʋgẽ wã zutu.
Tʋʋm dẽgd maandbã, ninsaan-baasã, tɩ-rɩtbã, nin-yoaadbã, nin-kʋʋdbã, wẽnd-naands pʋʋsdbã, la ned ning fãa sẽn nong zĩrĩ la sẽn yagd zĩri paada yɩng n ka kẽ tẽngã pʋgẽ ye.
Maam a Zezi n tʋm m malɛk t'a wa n kis yãmb bõn-kãens kaset wẽnd-dotã pʋse. Mam yaa a Daviid tɩ-tobeng la a yagenga, la yibeoog ãd-yãgdga.
Sɩɩg-sõng ne pʋg-paalã yetame yaa: Wa-y yã! Bɩ ned ning sẽn wʋmd-a yeel tɩ: Wa-y-yã! Bɩ ko-yũud sẽn tar a soab wa, la sẽn dat-a bɩ a reeg vɩɩm koom zaalem!
Mam yeta ned ning fãa sẽn wʋmd seb-kãnga bãngr goamã tɩ ned sã n paas bũmb be, Wẽnnaam na n paasa tood nins b sẽn bils seb-kãngã pʋgẽ wã yẽ sɩbgrã zugu.
La ned sã n boog bãngr gom-kãensã sebrã goama, Wẽnnaam na n deega pʋɩɩr ning yẽ sẽn da na n paam ne vɩɩm tɩɩgã la tẽn-sõngã b sẽn bils seb-kãngã pʋgẽ wã n bas-a.
Ned ning sẽn kɩt-a bõn-kãensã kasetã yetame yaa: N-ye, bilf bal sã n paase mam na n waame. Ãmina! Zu-soab a Zezi, wa-y-yã!
Bɩ Zu-soab a Zezi barkã zĩnd ne yãmb fãa.
